Na Aiya ba Rispa faa atweaatam de sɛw ɔbotan no so fae, na wamma wim nnomaa ammesisi wɔn so awia, na anadwo nso, wamma wuram mmoa amma wɔn ho, fi otwabere mfiase kosii sɛ osu tɔ fii soro beguu wɔn so.

2 Samuel 21:11
Akyiri yi, wɔkɔkaa nea Aiya ba Rispa, Saul yefam no, ayɛ kyerɛɛ Dawid. 

2 Samuel 21:12
Enti Dawid kogyee Saul nnompe ne ne ba Yonatan nnompe fii Yebes-Gileadfo hɔ; wɔn na wokowiaa wɔn fii Bet-San abɔnten so, baabi a Filistifo de wɔn kɔsɛnee, da a Filistifo no kum Saul wɔ Gilboa no. 

2 Samuel 21:13
 Na ɔde Saul nnompe ne ne ba Yonatan nnompe fi hɔ bae; afei wɔkɔsesaw mmarima a wɔsensɛn wɔn no nso nnompe. 

2 Samuel 21:14
Na wobesiee Saul ne ne ba Yonatan nnompe wɔ Benyamin asase Sela so wɔ ne papa Kis amusiei, na wɔyɛɛ nea ɔhene hyɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa. Eyi akyi no, Onyankopɔn tiee asase no ho sufrɛ.

2 Samuel 21:15
 Na Filistifo no san ne Israel koe. Na Dawid ne ne nkoa sian kɔe ne Filistifo no kɔkoe, na Dawid brɛe.

2 Samuel 21:16
Ɛnna Yisbi-Benob a ofi Refaim abran asefo mu a ne peaw ho kɔbere mu duru yɛ nnwetɛbona ahasa, na nkrante foforo bɔ n’asen no pɛe sɛ ɔbɔ Dawid kum no. 

2 Samuel 21:17
Ntɛm ara na Seruia ba Abisai bɛboaa no, na ɔbɔɔ Filistini no kum no. Ɛnna Dawid mmarima no kaa ntam guu no so sɛ: “Wo ne yɛn mmfi adi nnkɔ ɔsa bio, anyɛ saa a wubedum Israel kanea!”

2 Samuel 21:18
Eyi akyi no, ɛbae sɛ wɔne Filistifo koe bio wɔ Gob. Saa bere no, Husani Sibekai bɔɔ Sipai a ofi Refaim abran asefo mu no kum no.

2 Samuel 21:19
Na wɔsan ne Filistifo no koe wɔ Gob, na Betlehemni Yaare-Oregim ba Elhanan bɔɔ Gitini Goliat kum no; ɔno na na ne peaw te sɛ ntamanwemfo nsadua no.

2 Samuel 21:2
Enti ɔhene frɛɛ Gibeonfo no ne wɔn kasae. Nso na Gibeonfo no nyɛ Israelfo. Na wɔyɛ Amorifo a Israel kaa ntam kyerɛɛ wɔn no nkae, nanso Saul pɛe sɛ okunkum wɔn, Israel ne Yuda ho mmɔden bɔ nti. 

2 Samuel 21:20
Wɔsan koe bio wɔ Gat; na ɔbarima tenten kɛse bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsateaa yɛ asia asia, na ne nansoaa nso yɛ asia asia, ne nyinaa si aduonu anan; ɔno nso fi Refaim asefo mu. 

2 Samuel 21:21
Na otwa Israel mpoa daa, na Dawid nua Simea ba Yonatan bɔɔ no kum no.

2 Samuel 21:22
Na nnipa baanan yi yɛ Refaim asefo a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ Gat, na wɔtotɔe Dawid ne ne nkoa nsam.

2 Samuel 21:221
Samuel

2 Samuel 21:3
Ɛnna Dawid bisaa Gibeonfo no sɛ: “Dɛn na menyɛ mma mo, na dɛn na memfa mpata mo na ama moahyira Awurade agyapade?” 

2 Samuel 21:4
Na Gibeonfo no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Saul ne ne fie asɛm no nyɛ dwetɛ ne sika asɛm, na enni yɛn nsam nso sɛ yebekum obi wɔ Israel.” Na ɔkae sɛ: “Nea mobɛka biara, mɛyɛ ama mo.” 

2 Samuel 21:5
Ɛnna wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Ɔbarima a ɔsɛee yɛn na ɔbɔɔ pɔw sɛ ɔbɛtɔre yɛn ase afi Israel asase nyinaa so no, 

2 Samuel 21:6
ma wɔmfa ne mmarima baason a wofi ne mma mu mma yɛn, na yɛmfa wɔn nsensɛn Awurade anim wɔ Saul a Awurade paw no no kurow Gibea mu.” Enti ɔhene kae sɛ: “Mede wɔn bɛma mo.”

2 Samuel 21:7
Nanso Awurade ntam a ɛda Dawid ne Saul ba Yonatan ntam no nti, ɔhene huu Saul ba Yonatan ba Mefiboset mmɔbɔ. 

2 Samuel 21:8
Enti ɔhene faa Aiya babea Rispa mmabarima baanu a ɔwoo wɔn maa Saul no, Armoni ne Mefiboset, ne Saul babea Mikal mmabarima baanum a ɔwoo wɔn maa Meholatni Basilai ba Adriel no. 

2 Samuel 21:9
Na ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ Gibeonfo no nsa, na wɔn nso sensɛn wɔn wɔ bepɔw so, Awurade anim, na baason no nyinaa totɔe prɛko. Wokunkum wɔn otwabere no da a edi kan, bere a wofi atokotwa ase no. 

2 Samuel 22:1
Dawid kaa dwom yi mu nsɛm kyerɛɛ Awurade, ɛda a Awurade gyee no fii n’atamfo nyinaa nsam, na ogyee no fii Saul nsam no. 

2 Samuel 22:10
Okuntun ɔsoro mu sianee.

2 Samuel 22:11
Ɔtenaa kerubim so tui,

2 Samuel 22:12
Ɛnna ɔde sum twaa ne ho hyiae sɛ ɔsese,

2 Samuel 22:13
N’anim hann mu na nsramma a ɛredɛw fi bae.

2 Samuel 22:14
Awurade fi ɔsoro boboom,

2 Samuel 22:15
Ɔsomaa agyan bae, na ɔde bɔɔ wɔn hwetee;

2 Samuel 22:16
Na ɛpo mu aka yiyii adi,

2 Samuel 22:17
Ɔteɛɛ ne nsa fii soro, bɛfaa me;

2 Samuel 22:18
Ogyee me fii me tamfo hoɔdenfo nsam;

2 Samuel 22:19
Wɔbɛtoaa me m’amanehunu da mu,

2 Samuel 22:2
Ɔkae sɛ:

2 Samuel 22:20
Oyii me kogyinaa nea ɛhɔ trɛw;

2 Samuel 22:21
Awurade tuaa me ka sɛnea me trenee te;

2 Samuel 22:22
Efisɛ mafa Awurade akwan so,

2 Samuel 22:222
Samuel

2 Samuel 22:23
N’atemmusɛm nyinaa wɔ m’anim,

2 Samuel 22:24
Mayɛ me ho pɛ mama no,

2 Samuel 22:25
 Awurade atua me ka sɛnea me trenee te;

2 Samuel 22:26
Ɔnokwafo na wo ne no bedi no nokwaredi mu;

2 Samuel 22:27
Nea ɔma ne ho tew na wobɛtew wo ho ama no;

2 Samuel 22:28
Ɔman a wɔbrɛ wɔn ho ase no, wugye wɔn;

2 Samuel 22:29
O Awurade, wone me kanea;

2 Samuel 22:3
 Me botantim Nyankopɔn a miguan mekɔtoa no, Me kyɛm ne me nkwagye abɛn, m’abantenten ne, Me guankɔbea, me Gyefoɔ; a wugyee me fii akakabensɛm mu.

2 Samuel 22:30
Wo nti, mitumi tow hyɛ afowfo dɔm so;

2 Samuel 22:31
 Nyankopɔn de, ne kwan yɛ pɛ;

2 Samuel 22:32
Hena ne Onyankopɔn, gye sɛ Awurade nko?

2 Samuel 22:33
 Nyankopɔn yi ne me guankɔbea a ɛyɛ den,

2 Samuel 22:34
Ɔma me nan yɛ sɛ ɔforote de,

2 Samuel 22:35
Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa akodi,

2 Samuel 22:36
Wode wo nkwagye kyɛm maa me,

2 Samuel 22:37
Wotrɛw m’anammɔn tutu mu wɔ m'ase,

2 Samuel 22:38
Mɛtiw m’atamfo kosii sɛ mɛsɛee wɔn;

2 Samuel 22:39
Mɛtɔree wɔn ase na mebobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔansɔre bio;

2 Samuel 22:4
Misu mefrɛ Awurade, Ɔno a ɔfata ayeyi no,

2 Samuel 22:40
Wode ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔso ama ɔsa,

2 Samuel 22:41
 Womaa m'atamfo dan wɔn akyi kyerɛɛ me,

2 Samuel 22:42
Wohwɛe, nanso na ogyefo bi nni hɔ,

2 Samuel 22:43
Mɛyamm wɔn muhumuhu sɛ asase so mfutuma,

2 Samuel 22:44
Wuyii me fii me man kasatia mu.

2 Samuel 22:45
Ahɔho nso bɛbrɛ wɔn ho ase ama me;

2 Samuel 22:46
Ahɔho bekisa,

2 Samuel 22:47
Awurade te ase; nhyira nka me Botantim no,

2 Samuel 22:48
 Nyankopɔn na ɔtɔ were ma me;

2 Samuel 22:49
Ɔno na ogye me fi m’atamfo nsam.

2 Samuel 22:5
Asorɔkye a edi awu twaa me ho hyiae; na ɔsɛe nsuyiri nso yii me hu daa.

2 Samuel 22:50
Ɛno nti, mɛda wo ase amanaman mu, O Awurade,

2 Samuel 22:51
Ɔno na ɔyɛ nkwagye nnwuma akɛse ma ne hene,

2 Samuel 22:6
Asaman nhama twaa me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn;

2 Samuel 22:7
M’ahohia mu, misu mefrɛɛ Awurade,

2 Samuel 22:8
Ɛnna asase hinhimii, na ɛwosow biribiri;

2 Samuel 22:9
Wusiw fii ne hwenem, na n’anom gya nso hyew ade;

2 Samuel 23:1
Eyinom ne Dawid nsɛm a etwa to:

2 Samuel 23:10
Ɔno na ɔsɔre kunkum Filistifo no kosii sɛ ne nsa gyenee, nso ne nsa fam ne nkrante no ho, ma enti Awurade de nkonimdi kɛse gyee ɔman no saa da no; ɔman no de, nea wɔyɛe ara ne sɛ wodii akyi yiyii wɔn a wakunkum wɔn no ho nneɛma.

2 Samuel 23:11
Nea odi ne so ne Hararini Agee ba Samma. Na Filistifo no boaboaa wɔn ho ano wɔ Lehi; naasase bi da hɔ a asedua pii wɔ so, na Filistifo no nti, ɔman no aguan. 

2 Samuel 23:12
Na ɔno de, ɔtew gyinaa asase no mfinimfini ko gyei; okunkum Filistifo no, na Awurade de nkonimdi kɛse gyee wɔn.

2 Samuel 23:13
Na atitiriw aduasa no mu baasa kɔɔ Dawid nkyɛn Adulam ɔbodan no mu otwabere; saa bere no, na Filistifo no abɔ nsra Refaim asasetaw no so. 

2 Samuel 23:14
Saa bere no, na Dawid wɔ bepɔw so atrae no mu, na na Filistifo awɛmfo dɔm nso wɔ Betlehem. 

2 Samuel 23:15
Akyire yi, ɛdɔɔ Dawid kɔn na ɔkaa sɛ: “O sɛ anka obi bɛma me Betlehem kurow pon ano abura mu nsuo anom a!” 

2 Samuel 23:16
Ɛnna nnɔmmarima baasa no bɔ wuraa Filistifo nsraban no mu, na wɔkɔsaw Betlehem kurow pon ano abura mu nsu, na wɔde brɛɛ Dawid. Nanso wannom, na mmom ohwie guu fam maa Awurade.

2 Samuel 23:17
Na ɔkae sɛ: “O Awurade, ɛmpare me sɛ mɛyɛ saa! Mmarima a wɔde wɔn kra too wɔn nsam yi mogya na mennom anaa?” Enti wannom.

2 Samuel 23:18
Seruia ba Yoab nua Abisai na na ɔyɛ aduasa no so panyin. Ɔno na otumi gyinaa ne nan so de peaw kunkum nnipa ahasa; naɔwɔ din sɛ baasa no. 

2 Samuel 23:19
Naodi mu sen aduasa no mufo a wɔaka, na odii wɔn so panyin, nanso wanto baasa a wodi kan no.

2 Samuel 23:2
Awurade honhom nam me so kasae,

2 Samuel 23:20
Yehoiada ba Benaia, ɔkokodurufo aseni no yɛɛ nneɛma pii wɔ Kabseel; ɔno na okum Moabni Ariel mmabarima baanu no. Ɔno ara nso na osian kokum gyata wɔ asubura mu da bi a sukyerɛmma tɔe. 

2 Samuel 23:21
Ɔbarima yi ara nso na okokum Egyptni ɔbran bi no. NaEgyptni no kura peaw de, nanso ɔde abaa kɔɔ Egyptni no so kohwim peaw no fii ne nsam, na ɔde ne peaw no kum no. 

2 Samuel 23:22
Saa nneɛma yi na Yehoiada ba Benaia yɛe, na onyaa din sɛ nnɔmmarima baasa no. 

2 Samuel 23:223
Samuel

2 Samuel 23:23
Naodi mu sen aduasa no, na mmom wanto baasa a wodi kan no. Nanso Dawid sii no ankɔbeahene.

2 Samuel 23:24
NaYoab nua Asahel ka aduasa no ho; nnɔmmarima no bi ne Betlehemni Dodo ba Elhanan, 

2 Samuel 23:25
Harodni Samma, Harodni Elika, 

2 Samuel 23:26
Paltini Heles, Tekoani Ikes ba Ira, 

2 Samuel 23:27
Anatotni Abiesar, Husani Mebunai, 

2 Samuel 23:28
Ahohini Salmon, Netofani Maharai, 

2 Samuel 23:29
Netofani Baanah ba Heleb, Ribai ba Yitai a ofi Benyaminfo kurow Gibea mu, 

2 Samuel 23:3
Israel Nyankopɔn kae,

2 Samuel 23:30
Piratoni Benaia, Hidai a ofi Gaase subon no mpɔtam hɔ, 

2 Samuel 23:31
Arbatni Abi-Albon, Bahurimni Asmawet, 

2 Samuel 23:32
Saalbonni Eliaba, Yasen mma, Yonatan, 

2 Samuel 23:33
Hararini Samma, Hararini Sarar ba Ahiam, 

2 Samuel 23:34
Maakatni ba Ahasbai ba Elifelet, Giloni Ahitofel ba Eliam, 

2 Samuel 23:35
Karmelni Hesro, Arabiani Paarai, 

2 Samuel 23:36
Natan a ofi Soba ba Yigal, Gadni Bani, 

2 Samuel 23:37
Ammonni Selek ne Beerotni Naharai a wɔyɛ Seruia ba Yoab akodekurafo, 

2 Samuel 23:38
Yitrini Ira, Yitrini Gareb, 

2 Samuel 23:39
Hitini Uria. Wɔn nyinaa si aduasa ason.

2 Samuel 23:4
Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ anɔpa hann, bere a owia pue,

2 Samuel 23:5
Ɛnyɛ saa na me fie te Onyankopɔn ani so anaa?

2 Samuel 23:6
 Nanso ahuhufoɔ de, wɔn nyinaa te sɛ nsɔe a wɔatow agu; Na wɔmfa nsa nso mu.

2 Samuel 23:7
Sɛ onipa rekɔ wɔn so a,

2 Samuel 23:8
 Eyinom ne Dawid nnɔmmarima no din: Takemoni Yoseb-Basebet a ɔyɛ baasa no so panyin. Ɔno na ogyinaa ne nan so de peaw kunkum nnipa ahanwɔtwe da koro. 

2 Samuel 23:9
Ahohi ba Dodo ba Eleasar na odi hɔ. Ɔka nnɔmmarima baasa a na wɔne Dawid nam a wokotwaa Filistifo no mpoa no ho. Nawɔaboaboa wɔn ano wɔ hɔ sɛ wɔrebedi ako, enti Israel mmarima san wɔn akyi. 

2 Samuel 24:1
Na Awurade bo fuw Israel bio, na opiapiaa Dawid hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Kɔ na kɔkan Israel ne Yuda.”

2 Samuel 24:10
Bere a Dawid kan ɔman no wiei no, ne koma fii ase bɔɔ no. Ɛnna Dawid ka kyerɛɛ Awurade sɛ: “Ade a mayɛ yi de, mayɛ bɔne kɛse. Na afei Awurade, mepa wo kyɛw, ma w’akoa bɔne ntwam nkɔ, na madi nkwaseasɛm paa.” 

2 Samuel 24:11
Bere a Dawid sɔree anɔpa no, Awurade asɛm baa odiyifo Gad a ɔyɛ Dawid ɔdehufo no nkyɛn sɛ:

2 Samuel 24:12
“Kɔ, na kɔka kyerɛ Dawid sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade aka ni: “Nneɛma abiɛsa na mede resi w’anim. Yi mu biako na memfa nyɛ wo.”’” 

2 Samuel 24:13
Ɛnna Gad siim kɔɔ Dawid anim kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mfe ason ɔkɔm na memfa mmra w’asase so anaa asram abiɛsa a w’atamfo bɛtaa wo so ma woaguan wɔn anim anaa nnansa a ɔyaredɔm bɛba w’asase so? Afei hwɛ na kyerɛ mmuae a memfa nkɔma Nea ɔsomaa me no.” 

2 Samuel 24:14
Ɛnna Dawid ka kyerɛɛ Gad sɛ: “Asɛm yi ama mabotow. Mesrɛ wo, ma yɛnhwe Awurade nsam mmom, na ne mmɔborɔhunu dɔɔso, na onipa nsam de, mma mennhwe.”

2 Samuel 24:15
Enti Awurade de ɔyaredɔm baa Israel so fi anɔpa no kosii bere a ɔhyɛe no, maa nnipa mpem aduɔson wuwui fi Dan kosi Beer-Seba. 

2 Samuel 24:16
Na ɔbɔfo no de ne nsa kyerɛɛ Yerusalem so sɛ ɔresɛe hɔ. Na mmusu a ɛbae no yɛɛ Awurade mmɔbɔ, enti ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfo a ɔrekunkum nnipa no sɛ: “Ayɛ yiye! Fa wo nsa to hɔ.” Saa bere no, na Awurade bɔfo no gyina Yebusini Arauna awiporowbea no nkyɛn.

2 Samuel 24:17
Bere a Dawid huu ɔbɔfo a ɔrekunkum nnipa no, ɔne Awurade kasae, na ɔkae sɛ: “Me na mafom, na me na mayɛ amumɔyɛde. Nguan yi de, dɛn na wɔayɛ? Mesrɛ wo, me mmom na teɛ wo nsa wɔ me so, me ne me m'agya fie so.”

2 Samuel 24:18
Akyiri yi, Gad baa Dawid nkyɛn saa da no bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Foro kɔ Yebusini Arauna awiporowbea hɔ na kosi afɔremuka wɔ hɔ ma Awurade.” 

2 Samuel 24:19
Na Dawid foro kɔe sɛnea Gad asɛm a Awurade hyɛe no te. 

2 Samuel 24:2
Enti ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ asraafo so panyin Yoab a ɔka ne ho no sɛ: “Kokyinkyin Israel mmusuakuw nyinaa mu fi Dan kosi Beer-Seba, na monkan ɔman no, na minhu ɔman no dodow.” 

2 Samuel 24:20
Bere a Arauna hwɛe na ohuu ɔhene ne ne nkoa sɛ wɔreba ne nkyɛn no, ntɛm ara na Arauna fii adi de n’anim kobutuw fam ɔhene anim. 

2 Samuel 24:21
Ɛnna Arauna bisae sɛ: “Dɛn na ɛde me wura ɔhene aba n’akoa nkyɛn yi?” Na Dawid ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mebae sɛ merebɛtɔ awiporowbea yi afi wo hɔ na masi afɔremuka wɔ so ama Awurade, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mmusu no befi ɔman no so.” 

2 Samuel 24:22
Nanso Arauna ka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ: “Ma me wura ɔhene mfa, na ɔmmɔ afɔre biara a eye n’ani so wɔ so. Hwɛ, anantwi a wode bɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne awiporow ade ne anantwi no ho nneɛma a wode bɛyɛ nnyina ni. 

2 Samuel 24:224
Samuel

2 Samuel 24:23
O ɔhene, Arauna de ne nyinaa ma ɔhene.” Na Arauna ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene bio sɛ: “Ma Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ani nsɔ wo.”

2 Samuel 24:24
Nanso, ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ Arauna sɛ: “Dabi, ɔtɔ na mɛtɔ atua ho ka, na meremmɔ ɔhyew afɔre mma Awurade a merentua ka.” Enti Dawid tɔɔ awiporowbea no ne anantwi no tuaa nnwetɛbona aduonum. 

2 Samuel 24:25
Na Dawid sii afɔremuka wɔ hɔ maa Awurade, na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre wɔ so. Na Awurade tiee asase no ho sufrɛ, na ɔhaw no fii Israel so.

2 Samuel 24:3
Nanso Yoab ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Ma Awurade wo Nyankopɔn mma ɔman no mmu mmɔ ho ɔha na me wura ɔhene aniwa nhu. Na dɛn nti na me wura ɔhene pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ eyi?”

2 Samuel 24:4
Nanso, ɔhene asɛm bu faa Yoab ne asahene no so. Enti Yoab ne asahene no fii ɔhene anim kɔe kɔkan Israel man no. 

2 Samuel 24:5
Wokotwaa Yordan, na wɔsoɛɛ Aroer wɔ kurow a ɛda subon mu no nifa so, na wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Gadfo asase so kɔɔ Yaser. 

2 Samuel 24:6
Afei wɔkɔɔ Gilead ne Tatim-Hodsi asase so, na wɔtoaa so koduu Dan-Yaan, na wɔdan wɔn ani kɔɔ Sidon. 

2 Samuel 24:7
Ɛnna wɔkɔɔ Tiro, kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban no ne Hiwifo ne Kanaanfo nkurow nyinaa mu, na wokowiei wɔ Negeb kurow Beer-Seba a ɛwɔ Yuda asase so no mu. 

2 Samuel 24:8
Enti wokyinkyin asase no nyinaa so, na asram akron ne adaduonu akyi no, wɔsan baa Yerusalem.

2 Samuel 24:9
Afei Yoab de nnipa a wɔkan wɔn no dodow ho amanneɛbɔ brɛɛ ɔhene; Israel dodow si mmarima a wɔtwe nkrante mpem ahanwɔtwe, na Yuda dodow si mmarima mpem ahanum.

2 Samuel 3:1
Na akodi a ɛbɛdaa Saul fie ne Dawid fie ntam no kyɛe; Dawid kɔɔ so yɛɛ den, na Saul fie de, ɛbrɛɛ ase da biara.

2 Samuel 3:10
sɛ wɔbɛma ahenni no afi Saul fie, na wɔde Dawid ahengua asi Israel ne Yuda so, afi Dan akosi Beer-Seba.” 

2 Samuel 3:11
Na wantumi amfa asɛm biara ammua Abner bio efisɛ na osuro no.

2 Samuel 3:12
Ɛhɔ ara na Abner tuu abɔfo kɔɔ Dawid nkyɛn kɔkae sɛ: “Hena na asase no yɛ ne dea?” Na ɔde kaa ho sɛ: “Wo ne me nyɛ apam, na hwɛ, mɛboa wo adan Israel nyinaa aba wo nkyɛn.” 

2 Samuel 3:13
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Eye! Me ne wo bɛyɛ apam. Ade biako pɛ na merebisa afi wo hɔ, ɛne sɛ, ‘Mma m’anim, gye sɛ wode Saul babea Mikal abrɛ me ansa na woabehu m’anim.’” 

2 Samuel 3:14
Bio nso Dawid tuu abɔfo kɔɔ Saul ba Is-Boset nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Fa me yere Mikal a mede Filistifo ɔha mmarima ano were gyee no aware no ma me.” 

2 Samuel 3:15
Enti Is-Boset soma ma wɔkɔfaa no fii ne kunu Paltiel a ɔyɛ Lais ba no nkyɛn. 

2 Samuel 3:16
Ɔrekɔ no, ne kunu no nso dii n’akyi; ɔde su dii n’akyi ara koduu Bahurim. Na Abner ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “San w’akyi kɔ!” Ɛnna ɔsan kɔe.

2 Samuel 3:17
NaAbner de nkra akɔma Israel mpanyimfo sɛ: “Efi tete na mopɛe sɛ Dawid di mo so hene. 

2 Samuel 3:18
Enti afei monkẽka mo ho, na Awurade ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ, ‘M’akoa Dawid nsa so na menam begye me man Israel afi Filistifo ne wɔn atamfo nyinaa nsam.’” 

2 Samuel 3:19
Na Abner ne Benyaminfo nso kasae, na ɛno akyi no, Abner kɔkaa nea eye wɔ Israel ani so nyinaa ne nea eye wɔ Benyamin fie nyinaa ani so kyerɛɛ Dawid wɔ Hebron.

2 Samuel 3:2
Saa bere no, wɔwoo mma maa Dawid wɔ Hebron; n’abakan ne Amnon a ɔne Yesreelni Ahinoam woo no no. 

2 Samuel 3:20
Bere a Abner ne mmarima aduonu baa Dawid nkyɛn wɔ Hebron no, Dawid tow pon maa Abner ne mmarima a wɔka ne ho no. 

2 Samuel 3:21
Na Abner ka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ: “Ma mensɔre nkɔ na menkɔboaboa Israel nyinaa ano mmra me wura ɔhene nkyɛn na wɔne wo nyɛ apam, na woadi hene sɛnea wo kra pɛ biara.” Enti Dawid gyaa Abner kwan ma ɔkɔe asomdwoe mu.

2 Samuel 3:22
Ɛbae sɛ na Dawid nkoa ne Yoab akɔfow nneɛma reba, na asade a wɔde reba no dɔɔso. Saa bere no, na Abner nni Dawid nkyɛn wɔ Hebron, efisɛ na wagya no kwan ma ɔkɔ asomdwoe mu. 

2 Samuel 3:23
Samuel

2 Samuel 3:23
Yoab ne dɔm a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa bedui, na nkurɔfo bɛbɔɔ Yoab amanneɛ sɛ: “Ner ba Abner baa ɔhene nkyɛn, na wagya no kwan ma ɔkɔ asomdwoe mu.” 

2 Samuel 3:24
Ɛnna Yoab kɔɔ ɔhene nkyɛn kɔkae sɛ: “Dɛn na woayɛ yi? Hwɛ! Abner baa wo nkyɛn. Dɛn nti na woagyaa no ma ɔkɔ saa yi? 

2 Samuel 3:25
Wo ara wunim Ner ba Abner; ɔbae sɛ ɔrebɛdaadaa wo na wahu wo nkɔree ne wo mmae mu, na wahu biribiara a woreyɛ.”

2 Samuel 3:26
Yoab kaa saa no, ofii adi fii Dawid nkyɛn, na otuu abɔfo ma wotiw Abner, na wɔma ofii Sira abura no ho san bae; naDawid nnim ho hwee. 

2 Samuel 3:27
Bere a Abner san baa Hebron no, Yoab de no kɔɔ nkyɛn, kurow pon no mu sɛ ɔrekɔka asɛm bi akyerɛ no kokoam. Nanso ɔde peaw wɔɔ ne yam wɔ hɔ ma owui, ne nua Asahel mogya nti. 

2 Samuel 3:28
Na akyiri yi a Dawid tee no, ntɛm ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Me ne m’ahenni di Ner ba Abner mogya ho bem kosi daa wɔ Awurade anim. 

2 Samuel 3:29
Ɛnsan mmegu Yoab, ne ne papa fie nyinaa atifi, na mma ɔbarima a ne ho sen anaa ɔkwatani anaa ɔbarima a okura akurokurowa anaa onipa a ɔtɔ nkrante ano anaa nea aduan abɔ no mmpa Yoab fie!” 

2 Samuel 3:3
Nea ɔto so abien ne Kileab a ɔne Karmelni Nabal yere Abigail woo no no, na nea ɔto so abiɛsa ne Absalom, Gesur hene Talmai babea Maaka ba no. 

2 Samuel 3:30
 Na Yoab ne ne nua Abisai kum Abner efisɛ okum wɔn nua Asahel wɔ Gibeon ɔko no mu.

2 Samuel 3:31
Na Dawid ka kyerɛɛ Yoab ne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa sɛ: “Munsunsuan mo ntade mu, na mumfura atweaatam na munsu nni Abner anim.” Ɔhene Dawid nso dii ahamankaa no akyi. 

2 Samuel 3:32
Na wosiee Abner wɔ Hebron; ɔhene maa ne nne so sui wɔ Abner amusiei hɔ, na ɔman no nyinaa nso sui. 

2 Samuel 3:33
Na ɔhene twaa Abner ho kwadwom sɛ:

2 Samuel 3:34
Wɔankyekyere wo nsa,

2 Samuel 3:35
Akyi yi, ɔman no nyinaa bae sɛ wɔrebɛkorɔkorɔ David ama no adidi saa da no, nanso Dawid kaa ntam sɛ: “Sɛ medidi anaa mede biribi ka m’ano ansa na owia akɔtɔ a, Onyankopɔn ntua me ka na ɔmfa bi nka ho!” 

2 Samuel 3:36
Ɔman no nyinaa hui, na ɛsɔɔ wɔn ani. Sɛ ade biara a ɔhene yɛe te no, eyi nso sɔɔ ɔman no nyinaa ani. 

2 Samuel 3:37
Na ɔman no nyinaa ne Israel nyinaa hui saa da no sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔhene na ɔma wokum Ner ba Abner.

2 Samuel 3:38
Na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: “Munnim sɛ okunini ne onipa kɛse na watɔ nnɛ wɔ Israel yi? 

2 Samuel 3:39
Wɔasra me asi me hene de, nanso ɛnnɛ meyɛ mmerɛw, na saa mmarima yi, Seruia mma yi yɛ den ma me dodo. Nea ɔyɛ bɔne no, Awurade ntua no ka sɛnea ɔno ara ne bɔne te.”

2 Samuel 3:4
 Na nea ɔto so anan ne Hagit ba Adoniya, na nea ɔto so anum ne Abital ba Sefatia. 

2 Samuel 3:5
Nea ɔto so asia ne Dawid yere Egla ba Yitream. Eyinom na wɔwoo wɔn maa Dawid wɔ Hebron.

2 Samuel 3:6
Bere a Saul fie ne Dawid fie ntam akodi no rekɔ so no nyinaa, na Abner rehyɛ ne dibea den wɔ Saul fie. 

2 Samuel 3:7
Na Saul wɔ ɔyefam bi a ne din de Rispa a ɔyɛ Aiya babea. Akyiri yi, Is-Boset ka kyerɛɛ Abner sɛ: “Dɛn nti na wokɔɔ me papa yefam no ho?” 

2 Samuel 3:8
Ɛnna asɛm a Is-Boset kae no nti Abner bo fuw denneennen, na ɔkae sɛ: “Meyɛ ɔkraman ti wɔ Yuda? Mayɛ wo papa Saul fie ne ne nuanom ne ne nnamfo paa adɔe abesi nnɛ, na minyii wo nhyɛɛ Dawid nsa, nanso nnɛ worebu me atɛn bɔne a meyɛe wɔ ɔbea ho nti. 

2 Samuel 3:9
Sɛnea Awurade kaa ntam kyerɛɛ Dawid no, sɛ manyɛ saa amma no a, Onyankopɔn ntua Abner ka na ɔmfa bi nka ho, 

2 Samuel 4:1
 Na bere a Saul ba Is-Boset tee sɛ Abner awu wɔ Hebron no, ne nsam gowee, na Israelfo nyinaa nso yɛɛ basaa. 

2 Samuel 4:10
bere a obi bɛka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Hwɛ, Saul awu’ na ɛyɛɛ n’ani so sɛ wabɛka asɛmpa no, misoo ne mu kum no wɔ Siklag de mituaa n'asɛm no so ka , 

2 Samuel 4:11
na sɛ nnipa abɔnefo akokum ɔtreneeni wɔ ɔno ara ne fie wɔ ne mpa so a, ɛnde dɛn na mɛyɛ wɔn? Meremmisa ne mogya mfi mo nsam anaa, na merenyi mo mfi asase so?” 

2 Samuel 4:12
Ɛnna Dawid hyɛɛ ne mmerante no, na wokum wɔn twitwaa wɔn nsa ne wɔn nan, na wɔkɔsɛn wɔn wɔ Hebron ɔtare no ho. Na wɔfaa Is-Boset ti no kosiei wɔ Abner amusiei hɔ wɔ Hebron.

2 Samuel 4:2
Na Saul ba no wɔ afowfo so asahene baanu bi, obiako din de Baanah, na obiako nso din de Rekab; wɔyɛ Beerotni Rimon, Benyamin aseni no mma. Na wɔfa Beerot sɛ ɛka Benyamin asase ho.

2 Samuel 4:24
Samuel

2 Samuel 4:3
Na Beerotfo no guan kɔɔ Gitaim, na wɔkɔyɛɛ ahɔho wɔ hɔ de besi nnɛ.

2 Samuel 4:4
Na Saul ba Yonatan wɔ ɔbabarima bi a ɔyɛ obubuafo. Nea ɛbae ne sɛ, bere a wofi Yesreel bɛkaa nea ato Saul ne Yonatan no, na wadi mfe anum, na ɔbea a ɔhwɛ no no faa no sɛ ɔde no reguan. Bere a ɔbea no de ahopopo reguan no, abofra no hwee fam, na obubui. Ne din de Mefiboset.

2 Samuel 4:5
Ɛnna Beerotni Rimon mma Rekab ne Baanah siim kɔɔ Is-Boset fie awia ketee; nso na wada awianna. 

2 Samuel 4:6
Na wɔkɔɔ ofie no mfinimfini yɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ mmarima a wɔrepɛ awi, na wɔde ade wɔɔ ne yam. Na Rekab ne ne nua Baanah guanee a obiara anhu wɔn. 

2 Samuel 4:7
Bere a wɔkɔɔ ofie hɔ no, na ɔda ne mpa so wɔ pia mu, na wɔde ade kɔwɔɔ no kum no, na wotwaa ne ti, na wɔde ne ti no sii kwan so nantew anadwo no nyinaa kɔɔ Araba. 

2 Samuel 4:8
Ɛnna wɔde Is-Boset ti no kɔmaa Dawid wɔ Hebron, na wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Wo tamfo Saul a na ɔrepɛ wo kra no ba Is-Boset ti ni. Na ɛnnɛ, Awurade atɔ were ama me wura ɔhene wɔ Saul ne n’asefo so.”

2 Samuel 4:9
Nanso Dawid ka kyerɛɛ Beerotni Rimon mma Rekab ne ne nua Baanah sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade a ogyee me kra fii ahohia nyinaa mu te ase yi, 

2 Samuel 5:1
Ɛnna Israel mmusuakuw no nyinaa baa Dawid nkyɛn wɔ Hebron bɛkae sɛ: “Hwɛ, yɛyɛ wo dompe ne wo honam. 

2 Samuel 5:10
Na Dawid yɛɛ kɛse ara, na asafo Nyankopɔn Awurade dii n’akyi.

2 Samuel 5:11
Na Tiro hene Hiram somaa abɔfo kɔɔ Dawid nkyɛn, de kyeneduru nnua ne dua adwumfo ne abantofo kaa ho kɔe, na wofii ase sii ofie maa Dawid. 

2 Samuel 5:12
Na Dawid hui sɛ Awurade ama n’ahenni atim Israel so, na ne man Israel nti, wama n’ahenni so.

2 Samuel 5:13
Bere a Dawid fi Hebron bae no, ɔwarewaree ayefam ne yerenom bio wɔ Yerusalem, na wɔsan woo mmabarima ne mmabea bebree maa Dawid. 

2 Samuel 5:14
Mma a wɔwoo wɔn maa no wɔ Yerusalem no din ni: Sammua, Sobab, Natan ne Solomon, 

2 Samuel 5:15
ne Ibhar, Elisua, Nefeg ne Yafia, 

2 Samuel 5:16
ne Elisama, Eliada ne Elifelet.

2 Samuel 5:17
Filistifo no tee sɛ wɔasra Dawid asi no hene wɔ Israel so. Enti Filistifo no nyinaa bɛhwehwɛɛ Dawid. Bere a Dawid tee no, osiane kɔɔ aban no mu. 

2 Samuel 5:18
Na Filistifo no bae, na wɔbɛnantenantew Refaim asasetaw no so. 

2 Samuel 5:19
Ɛnna Dawid bisaa Awurade sɛ: “Menkɔ Filistifo no so? Wode wɔn bɛhyɛ me nsa anaa?” Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ: “Kɔ, na mede Filistifo no bɛhyɛ wo nsa.” 

2 Samuel 5:2
Efi tete, bere a Saul di yɛn so hene no, wo na wudii Israel anim de wɔn kɔe na wode wɔn bae, na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ, ‘Wo na wobɛyɛn me man Israel, na wo na wubedi Israel anim.’” 

2 Samuel 5:20
Enti Dawid kɔɔ Baal-Perasim, na Dawid kunkum wɔn wɔ hɔ. Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Awurade adi m’anim abu afa m’atamfo so sɛnea nsu bu fa nneɛma so no.” Ɛno na ɛma ɔfrɛɛ hɔ Baal-Perasim. 

2 Samuel 5:21
Na wogyigyaw wɔn ahoni wɔ hɔ, na Dawid ne ne mmarima no sesaw de kɔe.

2 Samuel 5:22
Akyiri yi, Filistifo no bae bio, na wɔbɛnantenantew Refaim asasetaw no so. 

2 Samuel 5:23
Ɛnna Dawid bisaa Awurade, nanso ɔkae sɛ: “Nkohyia wɔn. Kɔ na kofi wɔn akyi bra, na tow hyɛ wɔn so wɔ baka nnua no anim. 

2 Samuel 5:24
Sɛ ɛba sɛ wote nnyigyei a ɛte sɛ nnipa nantew wɔ baka nnua no so a, keka wo ho saa bere no, efisɛ saa bere no na Awurade adi w’anim rekokunkum Filistifo asraafo no.” 

2 Samuel 5:25
Enti Dawid yɛɛ saa; ɔyɛɛ sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ no no ara, na okunkum Filistifo no fi Geba de kɔe ara kosii Geser.

2 Samuel 5:25
Samuel

2 Samuel 5:3
Enti Israel mpanyimfo nyinaa baa ɔhene nkyɛn wɔ Hebron, na Ɔhene Dawid ne wɔn yɛɛ apam Awurade anim wɔ Hebron, na wɔsraa Dawid de no sii Israel so hene.

2 Samuel 5:4
Dawid bedii hene no, na wadi mfe aduasa, na odii hene mfe aduanan. 

2 Samuel 5:5
Odii Yuda so hene mfe ason ne asram asia wɔ Hebron, na odii Israel ne Yuda nyinaa so hene mfe aduasa abiɛsa wɔ Yerusalem. 

2 Samuel 5:6
Ɛnna ɔhene ne ne mmarima kɔɔ Yerusalem sɛ wɔne Yebusifo a wɔtete asase no so no rekɔko, nanso wɔka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ: “Woremma ha; anifuraefo ne mpakye na wɔbɛpam wo.” Wɔn adwene yɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Dawid remma ha.” 

2 Samuel 5:7
Ne nyinaa akyi no, Dawid kɔfaa Sion abannennen no, kyerɛ sɛ, Dawid Kurow no. 

2 Samuel 5:8
Ɛnna Dawid kae saa da no sɛ: “Obiara a ɔbɛtow ahyɛ Yebusifo so no, ma ɔmfa suka no mu nkɔ mpakye ne anifuraefo a wɔyɛ Dawid kra atamfo no so!” Ɛno nti na wɔka sɛ: “Onifuraefo ne apakye remma fie hɔ.” 

2 Samuel 5:9
Afei Dawid kɔtenaa abannennen no mu, na wɔfrɛɛ hɔ Dawid Kurow. Na Dawid fii ase sisii adan hyiae de fi Milo ne ne mfinimfini. 

2 Samuel 6:1
Ɛnna Dawid san boaboaa Israel mmarima akantinka nyinaa ano; wɔn dodow si mpem aduasa. 

2 Samuel 6:10
Na Dawid ampɛ sɛ ɔde Awurade adaka no ba ne nkyɛn wɔ Dawid Kurow mu. Enti Dawid ma wɔde man kɔɔ Gatni Obed-Edom fie.

2 Samuel 6:11
Na Awurade adaka no kaa Gatni Obed-Edom fie asram abiɛsa, na Awurade kɔɔ so hyiraa Obed-Edom ne ne fie nyinaa. 

2 Samuel 6:12
Akyiri yi, wɔbɛbɔɔ Ɔhene Dawid amanneɛ sɛ: “Nyankopɔn adaka no nti, Awurade ahyira Obed-Edom fie ne nea ɔwɔ nyinaa.” Ɛnna Dawid kɔfaa Nyankopɔn adaka no fii Obed-Edom fie ahurusi mu sɛ ɔde rekɔ Dawid Kurow mu. 

2 Samuel 6:13
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a wɔn a wɔso Awurade adaka no tuu anammɔn asia no, ntɛm ara na ɔde nantwinini ne aboa a wadɔ bɔɔ afɔre.

2 Samuel 6:14
Saa bere no, na Dawid hyɛ nwera pa asɔfotade, na Dawid de n’ahoɔden nyinaa resaw wɔ Awurade anim. 

2 Samuel 6:15
Na Dawid ne Israel fie nyinaa de osebɔ ne mmɛnhyɛn de Awurade adaka no bae. 

2 Samuel 6:16
Bere a wɔde Awurade adaka no duu Dawid Kurow mu no, Saul babea Mikal hwɛɛ mfɛnsere mu, na ohui sɛ Ɔhene Dawid rehuruhuruw, na ɔresaw twa ne ho wɔ Awurade anim, na obuu ɔhene animtiaa ne komam. 

2 Samuel 6:17
Na wɔde Awurade adaka no bae, na wɔde besii ne sibea wɔ ntamadan a Dawid si maa no no mu. Ɛnna Dawid bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre wɔ Awurade anim. 

2 Samuel 6:18
Bere a Dawid wiee ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre no, ohyiraa ɔman no wɔ asafo Awurade din mu. 

2 Samuel 6:19
Bio nso ɔmaa ɔmanfo no, Israel ɔman mu no nyinaa, ɔbarima ne ɔbea biara, paanoo sebɔw biako ne nankum ne aba bobe tetare, na ɛno akyi no, ɔmanfo no nyinaa kokɔɔ wɔn afie.

2 Samuel 6:2
Na Dawid ne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa sɔree, na wɔkɔɔ Baale-Yuda sɛ wɔrekɔfa asafo Awurade, Nyankopɔn a ɔte kerubim so no adaka a ne din da so no afi hɔ aba. 

2 Samuel 6:20
Ɛnna Dawid san kɔe sɛ ɔrekohyira ne fie, na Saul babea Mikal fii adi behyiaa Dawid, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Anuonyam bɛn ara na Israel hene ahyɛ ne ho nnɛ yi sɛ wapa ne ho wɔ ne nkoa mfenaa anim sɛnea mmarima ahuhufo no bi pa ne ho nyinaa no!” 

2 Samuel 6:21
Na Dawid buaa Mikal sɛ: “Awurade a ofii wo papa ne ne fie nyinaa akyi bɛpaw me de me yɛɛ Awurade man Israel so panyin no anim na migorui, na medi ahurusi bio Awurade anim. 

2 Samuel 6:22
Mɛbrɛ me ho ase akyɛn saa koraa, na mɛyɛ m’ani so famfamni; mfenaa a wokaa wɔn ho asɛm no, wɔn ara anim na mɛhyɛ me ho anuonyam.” 

2 Samuel 6:23
Enti Saul babea Mikal de, wanwo ba kosii ne wuda.

2 Samuel 6:26
Samuel

2 Samuel 6:3
Nanso teaseɛnam foforo bi so na wɔde Nyankopɔn adaka no sii, na wɔde fii Abinadab fie a ɛwɔ koko so no; Abinadab mma Ussa ne Ahio dii teaseɛnam foforo no anim.

2 Samuel 6:4
Enti wɔde fii Abinadab fie a ɛwɔ koko so no—ɛne Nyankopɔn adaka no; Ahio na odii Adaka no anim. 

2 Samuel 6:5
Na Dawid ne Israel fie nyinaa de nnwonto nneɛma a wɔde ɔpopaw nnua ayɛ nyinaa bi ne asankuten ne asanku ne mpintin ne nnɔnnɔmma ne nnawuta dii ahurusi Awurade anim. 

2 Samuel 6:6
 Na wɔde nkakrankakra beduu Nakon awiporowbea hɔ, na ɛhɔ na Ussa teɛɛ ne nsa kosoo Nyankopɔn adaka no mu, efisɛ ɛkaa kakraa bi sɛ anka anantwi no redan ahwe hɔ. 

2 Samuel 6:7
Ɛhɔ ara na Awurade bo fuw Ussa, na Nyankopɔn bɔɔ no hwee fam sɛ ɔyɛɛ aniammɔho saa, na owui wɔ Nyankopɔn adaka no ho. 

2 Samuel 6:8
Ɛnna Dawid bo fuwii sɛ Awurade abufuw adɛw ahyɛ Ussa. Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔ Peres-Ussa de besi nnɛ.

2 Samuel 6:9
Na Dawid suroo Awurade saa da no, na ɔkae sɛ: “Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Awurade adaka no aba me nkyɛn?”

2 Samuel 7:1
 Na ɛbae sɛ bere a ɔhene bɛtenaa ne fie, na Awurade maa no ɔhome fii n’atamfo nyinaa ho hyiae no, 

2 Samuel 7:10
Na mesiesie baabi ama me man Israel na mede wɔn akodua hɔ; ɛhɔ na wɔbɛtena, na biribiara renhaw wɔn adwene bio. Amumɔyɛfo asefo biara renteetee wɔn bio sɛ kan nna no, 

2 Samuel 7:11
nna a mede atemmufo sisii me man Israel so no. Mɛma woahome afi w’atamfo nyinaa nsam.

2 Samuel 7:12
Sɛ wo nna wie du na wo ne w’agyanom kɔda a, mɛma w’aseni bi so afi w’asen mu w’akyi, na mɛma n’ahenni atim. 

2 Samuel 7:13
Ɔno na obesi ofie ama me din, na mɛma n’ahengua atim afebɔɔ. 

2 Samuel 7:14
Me na mɛyɛ n’agya, na ɔno nso ayɛ me ba. Sɛ ɔyɛ bɔne nso a, mede nnipa poma ne nnipa mma mmaa mɛteɛ no so. 

2 Samuel 7:15
 Na m’adɔe de, ɛremfi ne so sɛnea miyi fii Saul a mituu no w’anim so no. 

2 Samuel 7:16
Wo fie ne w’ahenni betim w’anim afebɔɔ, na w’ahengua nso betim afebɔɔ.”’”

2 Samuel 7:17
Sɛnea nsɛm yi nyinaa ne anisoadehu yi nyinaa te no, saa na Natan ka kyerɛɛ Dawid.

2 Samuel 7:18
Eyi akyi no, Ɔhene Dawid bɛtenaa Awurade anim, na ɔkae sɛ: “O Awurade Nyankopɔn, hena ne me, na me fie yɛ dɛn a wode me abedu ha yi? 

2 Samuel 7:19
Nanso eyi nyinaa yɛ w’ani so ade ketewa bi, O Awurade Nyankopɔn; woasan aka nea ɛbɛba w’akoa fie so daakye-daakye, na eyi ne mmara a wode ama adesamma, O Awurade Nyankopɔn. 

2 Samuel 7:2
ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ odiyifo Natan sɛ: “Hwɛ, me de, mete ofie a wɔde nkyeneduru asi mu, nanso Nyankopɔn adaka no si ntamadan mu.” 

2 Samuel 7:20
Dɛn bio na Dawid nkɔ so nka nkyerɛ wo, O Awurade Nyankopɔn? Wo na wunim w’akoa yiye. 

2 Samuel 7:21
W’asɛm nti woayɛ nneɛma akɛse yi nyinaa sɛnea ɛwɔ wo koma mu, na woama w’akoa ahu.

2 Samuel 7:22
Enti na woso kokuroo no, O Awurade Nyankopɔn; obiara nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ wo, na Onyame biara nni hɔ sɛ wo, sɛnea nsɛm a yɛde yɛn aso ate no nyinaa te no. 

2 Samuel 7:23
Na ɔman biako bɛn na ɛwɔ asase so a ɛte sɛ wo man Israel a Onyankopɔn gyee wɔn fae sɛ ɔman? Ɔman bɛn na wonam wɔn so ayɛ anwonwadwuma akɛse de anya din? Ɛnyɛ wo man a wugyee wɔn fii Egypt, a wɔn nti wopam amanaman no ne wɔn anyame no? 

2 Samuel 7:24
Na woasiesie wo man Israel afa de  wɔn ayɛ wo man daa, na wo, Awurade na woayɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn.

2 Samuel 7:25
“Afei O Awurade Nyankopɔn, ma asɛm a woaka afa w’akoa ne ne fie ho no ntim daa, na yɛ sɛnea woaka no.

2 Samuel 7:26
Na wo din bɛkorɔn daa, na nkurɔfoɔ nka sɛ, ‘Asafo Awurade ne Israel Nyankopɔn,’ na ma w’akoa Dawid fi ntim w’anim pintinn. 

2 Samuel 7:27
Na wo, asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn na woayi no adi akyerɛ w’akoa sɛ, ‘Mɛkyekye ofie ama wo.’ Ɛno nti na w’akoa anya akokoduru rebɔ wo saa mpae yi. 

2 Samuel 7:27
Samuel

2 Samuel 7:28
Na afei, O Awurade Nyankopɔn, wo ara ne Onyankopɔn, na wo nsɛm yɛ nokware, na wode adepa yi ahyɛ w’akoa bɔ.

2 Samuel 7:29
Enti ma no nyɛ wo fɛ na hyira w’akoa fi na agyina w’anim daa ɛfiri sɛ wo, O Awurade Nyankopɔn, wo na woaka, na wo nhyira mu na wobɛhyira w’akoa fi daa.”

2 Samuel 7:3
Ɛnna Natan ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Nea ɛda wo koma so biara, kɔ na kɔyɛ, na Awurade di w’akyi.”

2 Samuel 7:4
Ɛbae sɛ saa anadwo no, Awurade asɛm baa Natan nkyɛn sɛ: 

2 Samuel 7:5
“Kɔ na kɔka kyerɛ m’akoa Dawid sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade aka ni: “Wo na wubesi ofie ama matena mu anaa? 

2 Samuel 7:6
Efi da a mikoyii Israelfo fii Egypt bae de besi nnɛ, mentenaa ofie mu da, ntamadan mu ara na madi akɔneaba. 

2 Samuel 7:7
Bere a menantew Israelfo mu no nyinaa, da bɛn na meka kyerɛɛ Israel mmusuakuw a mehyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛn me man Israel no bi sɛ, ‘Dɛn nti na munsii kyeneduru fie mmaa me?’”’ 

2 Samuel 7:8
Afei eyi na ka kyerɛ m’akoa Dawid, ‘Nea asafo Awurade aka ni: “Me na miyii wo fii mmoa adidibea sɛ gyae mmoa akyidi na bedi me man Israel so hene. 

2 Samuel 7:9
 Na medii w’akyi baabiara a wokɔe, na metwaa w’atamfo nyinaa fii w’anim, na mama woanya din kɛse sɛ asase so atitiriw no din. 

2 Samuel 8:1
Akyiri yi, ɛbae sɛ Dawid kaa Filistifo no gui, dii wɔn so nkonim, na Dawid gyee Meteg-Amma fii Filistifo no nsam.

2 Samuel 8:10
Enti Toi somaa ne ba Yoram kɔɔ Ɔhene Dawid nkyɛn kokyiaa no, na ɔmaa no amo sɛ ɔne Hadadeser ako aka no agu, nea ɛwom ne sɛ, na Hadadeser taa ne Toi di ako, na ɔde dwetɛ ne sika ne kɔbere nneɛma nyinaa bi kɔmaa no. 

2 Samuel 8:11
Ɔhene Dawid hyiraa eyinom nyinaa so maa Awurade, sɛnea ohyiraa dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ a ogye fii amanaman a odii wɔn so nkonim no nyinaa nkyɛn so no; 

2 Samuel 8:12
efi Siria ne Moab ne Ammon asefo ne Filistifo ne Amalekfo nsam ne Soba hene Rehob ba Hadadeser asade mu. 

2 Samuel 8:13
Bere a Dawid kɔkaa Edomfo mpem dunwɔtwe gui wɔ Nkyene Bon no mu bae no, ogyee din. 

2 Samuel 8:14
Na ɔde asraafodɔm koguu Edom; ɔde asraafodɔm no koguu Edom baabiara, na Edomfo nyinaa bɛyɛɛ Dawid nkoa. Na Awurade bɔɔ Dawid ho ban ma odii nim baabiara a ɔkɔe nyinaa.

2 Samuel 8:15
Dawid kɔɔ so dii Israel nyinaa so hene; Dawid buu atɛn na odii asɛntrenee maa ne man nyinaa daa. 

2 Samuel 8:16
Na Seruia ba Yoab na ɔda asraafo no ano, na Ahilud ba Yehosafat nso ne ɔhene krakye [Ɔsɛnkaefo]. 

2 Samuel 8:17
Na Ahitab ba Sadok ne Abiatar ba Ahimelek na wɔyɛ asɔfo, na Seraia nso ne ɔkyerɛwfo. 

2 Samuel 8:18
Na Yehoiada ba Benaia na ɔda Keretifo ne Peletifo no ano, na Dawid mma no nso yɛ asɔfo.

2 Samuel 8:2
Na ɔkaa Moabfo nso gui, na ɔma wɔdedaa fam, de susuhama susuw wɔn; osusuw ahama abien sɛ wonkum wɔn, ne hama biako pɛpɛɛpɛ sɛ wɔntena nkwa mu. Na Moabfo bɛyɛɛ Dawid nkoa a wotua tow ma no.

2 Samuel 8:28
Samuel

2 Samuel 8:3
Na Dawid kum Soba hene Rehob ba Hadadeser bere a na ɔresan akɔko agye asubɔnten Eufrate ho nkurow no. 

2 Samuel 8:4
Na Dawid ko gyee apɔnkɔsotefo apem ahanson ne mmarima mpem aduonu a wɔnam fam fii ne nsam. Ɛnna Dawid twitwaa nteaseɛnam apɔnkɔ no nyinaa nantin ntini, na ogyaw nteaseɛnam apɔnkɔ no mu ɔha.

2 Samuel 8:5
Bere a Siriafo a wɔwɔ Damasko no bae sɛ wɔrebɛboa Soba hene Hadadeser no, Dawid kunkum Siriafo mmarima mpem aduonu abien. 

2 Samuel 8:6
Afei, Dawid de asraafodɔm koguu Siria a ɛwɔ Damasko, na Siriafo bɛyɛɛ Dawid nkoa a wotua tow ma no. Na Awurade bɔɔ Dawid ho ban maa no dii nim wɔ baabiara a ɔkɔe nyinaa. 

2 Samuel 8:7
Afei nso Dawid gyigyee sika kɔkɔɔ akyɛm a na ekurakura Hadadeser nkoa no, na ɔde baa Yerusalem. 

2 Samuel 8:8
Na Ɔhene Dawid faa kɔbere bebree pa fii Hadadeser nkurow Beta ne Berota mu kɔe.

2 Samuel 8:9
Hamat hene Toi tee sɛ Dawid aka Hadadeser asraafodɔm no nyinaa agu. 

2 Samuel 9:1
Na Dawid bisae sɛ: “Obi da so wɔ hɔ a waka Saul fie a Yonatan nti metumi ayɛ no adɔe anaa?” 

2 Samuel 9:10
Enti dɔw asase no ma no, wo ne wo mma ne wo nkoa, na fa ɛso nnɔbae bra na wo wura banana fiefo nnya aduan nni. Wo wura banana Mefiboset de, obedidi me pon so daa.”

2 Samuel 9:11
Na Siba ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Nea me wura ɔhene hyɛe sɛ menyɛ mma n’akoa nyinaa no, ɛno ara na w’akoa bɛyɛ; nso Mefiboset de, onnidi me pon so sɛ ahenemma no bi.” 

2 Samuel 9:12
Na Mefiboset wɔ ɔbabarima kumaa bi a ne din de Mika, na wɔn a wɔte Siba fie nyinaa yɛ Mefiboset nkoa. 

2 Samuel 9:13
Na Mefiboset tenaa Yerusalem, na odidii ɔhene pon so daa. Na ɔyɛ obubuafo.

2 Samuel 9:2
Na Saul fie akoa bi wɔ hɔ a ne din de Siba. Enti wɔkɔfrɛɛ no baa Dawid nkyɛn, na ɔhene bisaa no sɛ: “Wone Siba?” Na ɔkae sɛ: “W’akoa ne no.” 

2 Samuel 9:29
Samuel

2 Samuel 9:3
Na ɔhene bisaa no sɛ: “Obi nni Saul fie bio a mede Onyankopɔn adɔe bɛyɛ no?” Ɛnna Siba ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Yonatan babarima bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ obubuafo.” 

2 Samuel 9:4
Na ɔhene bisaa no sɛ: “Ɔwɔ he?” Ɛnna Siba ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Hwɛ! Ɔwɔ Amiel ba Makir fie wɔ Lo-Debar.”

2 Samuel 9:5
Ntɛm ara na Ɔhene Dawid soma ma wɔkɔfaa no fii Amiel ba Makir fie wɔ Lo-Debar bae. 

2 Samuel 9:6
Bere a Saul ba Yonatan ba Mefiboset duu Dawid nkyɛn no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔkotow de n’anim butuw fam. Na Dawid kae sɛ: “Mefiboset!” Na ɔkae sɛ: “W’akoa ni.” 

2 Samuel 9:7
Na Dawid ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nsuro, na wo papa Yonatan nti mɛyɛ wo adɔe, na mɛdan wo nana Saul asase nyinaa ama wo, na woadidi me pon so daa.”

2 Samuel 9:8
Ɔkaa saa no, ɔkotowee na ɔkae sɛ: “W’akoa ne hena a woatwa w’ani ahwɛ ɔkraman funu a ɔte sɛ me yi?”

2 Samuel 9:9
Na ɔhene frɛɛ Saul somfo Siba, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ade biara a ɛyɛ Saul ne ne fie nyinaa dea no, mede ama wo wura ba nana no. 

1 Ahene 1:1
Na Ɔhene Dawid abɔ akwakoraa na wadi nna pii; sɛ wɔde ntama pii kata ne ho mpo a, ne ho nyɛ no hyew. 

1 Ahene 1:10
odiyifo Natan ne Benaia ne nnɔmmarima no ne ne nua Solomon de, wamfrɛ wɔn. 

1 Ahene 1:11
Ɛnna Natan ka kyerɛɛ Solomon maame Bat-Seba sɛ: “Wontee sɛ Hagit ba Adoniya abɛyɛ ɔhene na yɛn wura Dawid nnim ho hwee yi? 

1 Ahene 1:12
Afei bra ma mintu wo fo, na gye wo kra ne wo ba Solomon nso kra nkwa. 

1 Ahene 1:13
Kɔ Ɔhene Dawid nkyɛn na kɔka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Ɛnyɛ wo, me wura ɔhene, na wokaa w’afenaa ntam sɛ: “Wo ba Solomon na obedi hene m’akyi, na ɔno na ɔbɛtena m’ahengua so”? Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na Adoniya abɛyɛ ɔhene yi?’ 

1 Ahene 1:14
Na hwɛ! Bere a wugu so ne ɔhene rekasa wɔ hɔ no, me nso medi w’akyi aba na mabɛfoa wo nsɛm no so.”

1 Ahene 1:15
Enti Bat-Seba kɔɔ ɔhene nkyɛn wɔ pia mu. Na ɔhene abɔ akwakoraa posoposo, na Sunamni Abisag te ɔhene nkyɛn hwɛ no. 

1 Ahene 1:16
Ɛnna Bat-Seba kotow ɔhene anim, na ɔhene bisaa no sɛ: “Asɛm bɛn na wode nam?” 

1 Ahene 1:17
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Me wura, wo na wokaa w’afenaa, Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn ntam sɛ, ‘Wo ba Solomon na obedi hene m’akyi, na ɔno na ɔbɛtena m’ahengua so.’ 

1 Ahene 1:18
Na hwɛ! Adoniya abɛyɛ ɔhene, nanso me wura ɔhene nnim ho hwee. 

1 Ahene 1:19
Ɔde anantwinini ne mmoa a wɔadɔ ne nguan pii abɔ afɔre, na wafrɛfrɛ ahenemma no nyinaa ne ɔsɔfo Abiatar ne ɔsahene Yoab, na w’akoa Solomon de, wamfrɛ no. 

1 Ahene 1:2
Enti ne nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ma wɔnhwehwɛ ababaa bi a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun mmrɛ me wura ɔhene na ɔmmɛtena ɔhene ho na ɔnhwɛ wo; ɔbɛda wo kokom na me wura ɔhene ho ayɛ no hyew.” 

1 Ahene 1:20
Na wo, me wura ɔhene, wo na Israel nyinaa ani da wo so sɛ wobɛkyerɛ wɔn nea ɔbɛtena me wura ɔhene ahengua so n’akyi. 

1 Ahene 1:21
Nea ɛbɛba ara ne sɛ, sɛ me wura ɔhene ne n’agyanom kɔda a, me ne me ba Solomon ho bɛba asɛm.”

1 Ahene 1:22
Na hwɛ! bere a ogu so ne ɔhene rekasa no, odiyifo Natan baa hɔ. 

1 Ahene 1:23
Ɛhɔ ara na wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Odiyifo Natan aba!” Ɛnna ɔbaa ɔhene anim na ɔde n’anim butuw fam ɔhene anim. 

1 Ahene 1:24
Ɛnna Natan kae sɛ: “Me wura ɔhene, enti wo na wokae sɛ, ‘Adoniya na obedi hene m’akyi, na ɔno na ɔbɛtena m’ahengua so’ anaa? 

1 Ahene 1:25
Ɛnnɛ wasian kɔ sɛ ɔde anantwinini ne mmoa a wɔadɔ ne nguan pii rekɔbɔ afɔre, na wafrɛfrɛ ahenemma no nyinaa ne asahene no ne ɔsɔfo Abiatar; hwɛ, wɔredidi na wɔrenom wɔ n’anim, na nea wɔreka ara ne sɛ, ‘Ɔhene Adoniya nnya nkwa!’ 

1 Ahene 1:26
Na me, w’akoa, me ne ɔsɔfo Sadok ne Yehoiada ba Benaia ne w’akoa Solomon de, wamfrɛ yɛn.

1 Ahene 1:27
Sɛ me wura ɔhene na wama asɛm yi aba saa a, ɛnde wode nea ɔbɛtena me wura ɔhene ahengua so, n’akyi ahintaw w’akoa.”

1 Ahene 1:28
Ɛnna Ɔhene Dawid kae sɛ: “Momfrɛ Bat-Seba mma me.” Enti ɔbaa ɔhene nkyɛn begyinaa ɔhene anim. 

1 Ahene 1:29
Ɛnna ɔhene kaa ntam sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade a ogyee me kra fii ahohia nyinaa mu te ase yi, 

1 Ahene 1:3
Enti wokokyin hwehwɛɛ Israel asase nyinaa so sɛ wobenya ababaa bi a ne ho yɛ fɛ. Na wokohuu Sunamni Abisag de no brɛɛ ɔhene. 

1 Ahene 1:30
sɛnea mede Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn kaa wo ntam sɛ, ‘Wo ba Solomon na obedi hene m’akyi, na ɔno na ɔbɛtena m’ahengua so adi m’ade!’ no, saa na mɛyɛ ɛnnɛ da yi.” 

1 Ahene 1:31
Ɛnna Bat-Seba de n’anim butuw fam, na ɔkotow ɔhene kae sɛ: “Me wura Ɔhene Dawid nnya nkwa daa!”

1 Ahene 1:32
Ɛhɔ ara na Ɔhene Dawid kae sɛ: “Momfrɛ ɔsɔfo Sadok ne odiyifo Natan ne Yehoiada ba Benaia mma me.” Ɛnna wɔbaa ɔhene anim. 

1 Ahene 1:33
Na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Momfa mo wura nkoa nka mo ho na momma me ba Solomon ntena m’afurumpɔnkɔ no so mfa no nsian nkɔ Gihon. 

1 Ahene 1:34
Na ɔsɔfo Sadok ne odiyifo Natan nsra no ngo wɔ hɔ mfa no nsi Israel so hene, na monhyɛn abɛn nka sɛ, ‘Ɔhene Solomon nnya nkwa!’ 

1 Ahene 1:35
Munni n’akyi mfa no mmra na ɔmmɛtena m’ahengua so. Ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ɔhene asi m’ananmu, na ɔno na mahyɛ no Israel ne Yuda ɔkannifo.” 

1 Ahene 1:36
Ɛhɔ ara na Yehoiada ba Benaia buaa ɔhene sɛ: “Amen! Saa ara nso na Awurade, me wura ɔhene Nyankopɔn nka. 

1 Ahene 1:37
Sɛnea Awurade dii me wura ɔhene akyi no, saa ara na onni Solomon akyi, na ɔmma n’ahengua nyɛ kɛse nsen me wura Ɔhene Dawid ahengua.”

1 Ahene 1:38
Ɛnna ɔsɔfo Sadok ne odiyifo Natan ne Yehoiada ba Benaia ne Keretifo ne Peletifo no sian kɔe, na wɔmaa Solomon tenaa Ɔhene Dawid afurumpɔnkɔ no so de no kɔɔ Gihon. 

1 Ahene 1:39
Afei ɔsɔfo Sadok faa abɛn a ngo wom no fii ntamadan no mu na ɔsraa Solomon ngo, na wofii ase hyɛn mmɛn no ma ɔman no nyinaa bɔ gyee so sɛ: “Ɔhene Solomon nnya nkwa!” 

1 Ahene 1:4
Na ababaa no ho yɛ fɛ papa; ɔbɛtenaa ɔhene ho hwɛɛ no, na ɔhene ankɔ ne ho.

1 Ahene 1:40
Ɛno akyi no, ɔman no nyinaa tu dii n’akyi, na ɔman no hyɛn ntɛntɛbɛn dii ahurusi kɛse paa, na gyegyeegye no maa asase wosowee.

1 Ahene 1:41
Na Adoniya ne wɔn a ɔfrɛɛ wɔn a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa tee; na wɔadidi awie. Bere a Yoab tee mmɛn no nnyigyei no, ɛhɔ ara na obisae sɛ: “Na kurom gyegyeegye yi kyerɛ dɛn?” 

1 Ahene 1:42
Ogu so rekasa no, ɔbɛhwɛ a ɔsɔfo Abiatar ba Yonatan anim ni. Ɛnna Adoniya kae sɛ: “Bra mu, na woyɛ ɔbarima a wofata, na wode asɛmpa nam.” 

1 Ahene 1:43
Ɛnna Yonatan buaa Adoniya sɛ: “Dabi! Yɛn wura Ɔhene Dawid de Solomon asi hene. 

1 Ahene 1:44
Na ɔhene maa ɔsɔfo Sadok ne odiyifo Natan ne Yehoiada ba Benaia ne Keretifo ne Peletifo kaa ne ho, na wɔma ɔtenaa ɔhene afurumpɔnkɔ no so. 

1 Ahene 1:45
Afei ɔsɔfo Sadok ne odiyifo Natan sraa no ngo sii no hene wɔ Gihon, na wɔde ahurusi fi hɔ bae, na kurow no mu ayɛ hoo. Ɛho dede na motee no. 

1 Ahene 1:46
Afei nso, Solomon atena ahenni agua no so. 

1 Ahene 1:47
Bio nso, ɔhene nkoa baa hɔ behyiraa yɛn wura Ɔhene Dawid, na wɔkae sɛ, ‘Wo Nyankopɔn mma Solomon din nyɛ kɛse nsen wo din, na ɔmma n’ahengua nyɛ kɛse nsen w’ahengua!’ Ɛnna ɔhene bɔɔ ne mu ase ne mpa so. 

1 Ahene 1:48
Na nea ɔhene nso kae ni, ‘Nhyira nka Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a ɛnnɛ wayi obi atena m’ahengua so ma mede m’aniwa ahu yi!’”

1 Ahene 1:49
Ɛnna ehu kaa wɔn a Adoniya afrɛfrɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinaa, na obiara sɔre faa ne kwan. 

1 Ahene 1:5
Saa bere no nyinaa na Hagit ba Adoniya memaa ne ho so kae sɛ: “Me na medi hene!” Na ɔma wɔyɛɛ teaseɛnam maa no, na onyaa apɔnkɔsotefo ne mmarima aduonum a wotu mmirika di n’anim. 

1 Ahene 1:50
Na Solomon nti, Adoniya nso suroe. Enti ɔsɔre kɔe, na okosoo mmɛn a etuatua afɔremuka no ho no mu. 

1 Ahene 1:51
Ɛnna wɔbɛbɔɔ Solomon amanneɛ sɛ: “Ɔhene Solomon ho hu atɔ Adoniya so, enti wakoso afɔremuka ho mmɛn no mu, na ose, ‘Momma Ɔhene Solomon nni kan nka me ntam sɛ ɔremfa nkrante nkum n’akoa ansa.’” 

1 Ahene 1:52
Ɛnna Solomon kae sɛ: “Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔbarima a ɔfata a, ɛnde ne nhwi biako mpo rentɔ fam, nanso sɛ wohu bɔne bi wɔ ne ho a, ɛnde obewu.” 

1 Ahene 1:53
Enti Ɔhene Solomon somae ma wɔkɔfaa no fii afɔremuka no ho bae. Na ɔba bɛkotow Ɔhene Solomon, na Solomon ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɔre, na kɔ wo fie.”

1 Ahene 1:6
Na ne papa anka asɛm bi a ɛbɛhaw no ankyerɛ no da sɛ: “Dɛn nti na woreyɛ eyi?” Na ne ho nso yɛ fɛ yiye; ne maame woo no Absalom akyi. 

1 Ahene 1:7
 Na Adoniya ne Seruia ba Yoab ne ɔsɔfo Abiatar faa adamfo, na wɔbɛyɛɛ n’akyitaafo boaa no. 

1 Ahene 1:8
Na ɔsɔfo Sadok ne Yehoiada ba Benaia ne odiyifo Natan ne Simei ne Rei ne Dawid nnɔmmarima no de, wɔankodi Adoniya akyi.

1 Ahene 1:9
 Na Adoniya de nguan ne anantwi ne mmoa a wɔadɔ bɔɔ afɔre Sohelet botan a ɛwɔ En-Rogel no ho, na ɔfrɛɛ ne nuanom, ahenemma no nyinaa, ne Yuda mmarima a wɔyɛ ɔhene nkoa no nyinaa; 

1 Ahene 10:1
 Na Seba hemmaa tee Solomon ho asɛm a ɛfa Awurade din ho. Enti ɔbae sɛ ɔde aborɔme rebɛsɔ no ahwɛ. 

1 Ahene 10:10
Ɛnna ɔmaa ɔhene sika dwetikɛse ɔha aduonu, ne balsam ngo pii pa, ne aboɔden abo. Balsam ngo dodow a Seba hemmaa de maa Ɔhene Solomon no, ɛso bi amma bio.

1 Ahene 10:11
Bio nso na Hiram ahyɛn a ɛde sika fi Ofir ba no de almug nnua pii pa ne aboɔden abo nso fi Ofir ba. 

1 Ahene 10:110
Ahene

1 Ahene 10:12
Na ɔhene de almug nnua yɛɛ ɔdan nnyinaso wɔ Awurade fie ne ahemfie, na ɔde bi nso yɛɛ asanku ne asankuten maa nnwontofo no. Ɛde besi nnɛ no, almug nnua a ɛte saa bi mmae da, na wonhuu ɛso bi bio.

1 Ahene 10:13
 Na ɔhene Solomon nso de nea Seba hemmaa bisae nyinaa maa no; ɛsono nea Ɔhene Solomon ankasa yii ne yam de maa no. Ɛno akyi no, ɔsan n’akyi kɔɔ n’asase so, ɔne ne nkoa.

1 Ahene 10:14
Sika a na Solomon nya wɔ afe biako mu no mu duru yɛ sika dwetikɛse ahansia aduosia asia; 

1 Ahene 10:15
ɛsono ahonyade a na akwantufo ne aguadifo no de ba, ne nea Arabiafo ahene nyinaa ne asase no so amradofo de ba.

1 Ahene 10:16
Na Ɔhene Solomon de sika mfrafrae yɛɛ akyɛm akɛse ahanu ɔde sika nnwetɛbona ahansia guu akyɛm no biara ho, 

1 Ahene 10:17
na ɔde sika mfrafrae yɛɛ nkatabo ahasa ɔde sika mmɛnnaa abiɛsa guu nkatabo no biara ho. Na ɔhene de guu Lebanon Kwaefie hɔ.

1 Ahene 10:18
Afei nso ɔhene yɛɛ asommɛn ahengua kɛse bi, na ɔde sika amapa duraa ho. 

1 Ahene 10:19
Atrapoe a ɛwɔ so asia na wɔforo de kɔ ahengua no anim, na wɔayɛ biribi kurukuruwa akata ahengua no soro, na faako a wɔtena no, nsa wɔ ha ne ha, na agyata abien gyinagyina nsa no ho.

1 Ahene 10:2
Ɔde dɔm kɛse pa ne yoma a wɔsoso balsam ngo ne sika pii pa ne aboɔden abo baa Yerusalem. Obeduu Solomon nkyɛn, na ɔkaa biribiara a ɛda ne koma so kyerɛɛ ɔhene. 

1 Ahene 10:20
Agyata dumien gyinagyina atrapoe a ɛwɔ so asia no so; biako wɔ ha, na biako nso wɔ ha. Wɔnyɛɛ bi saa da ahenni biara mu.

1 Ahene 10:21
Ade a Ɔhene Solomon nom mu nyinaa, wɔde sika na ɛyɛe, na Lebanon Kwaefie hɔ anwenne nyinaa, wɔde sika amapa na ɛyɛe. Wɔamfa dwetɛ anyɛ emu biara, efisɛ Solomon nna mu no, na wɔmfa nyɛ hwee. 

1 Ahene 10:22
Na ɔhene wɔ Tarsis ahyɛn pii wɔ po so a ɛne Hiram ahyɛn kɔ kwan so. Mfe abiɛsa biara, na Tarsis ahyɛn no de sika ne dwetɛ ne asommɛn ne nkontromfi ne koohaa ba.

1 Ahene 10:23
Enti Ɔhene Solomon yɛɛ kɛse wɔ ahonyade ne nyansa mu sen asase so ahene a aka nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 10:24
Asase so nnipa nyinaa baa Solomon anim betiee nyansa a Onyankopɔn de ahyɛ ne komam no.

1 Ahene 10:25
Obiara de n’akyɛde bae afe biara: dwetɛ ne sika nneɛma ne ntade, akode, balsam ngo, apɔnkɔ ne mfurumpɔnkɔ.

1 Ahene 10:26
Na Solomon boaboaa nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ pii ano, na onyaa nteaseɛnam apem ne ahanan ne apɔnkɔ mpem dumien, na ɔde ne nyinaa kɔɔ nteaseɛnam nkurow mu ne ɔhene nkyɛn wɔ Yerusalem.

1 Ahene 10:27
Na ɔhene maa dwetɛ dɔɔso pii wɔ Yerusalem sɛ abo, na ɔmaa nkyeneduru dɔɔso pii sɛ ankye nnua a ɛwɔ Sefela.

1 Ahene 10:28
Apɔnkɔ a Solomon kra fii Egypt bae no nso, ɔhene aguadifo no kɔtɔɔ apɔnkɔkuw biara sɛnea wɔn bo te. 

1 Ahene 10:29
Na wɔtɔɔ nteaseɛnam a wɔde fi Egypt bae no biara nnwetɛbona ahansia, na wɔtɔɔ ɔpɔnkɔ biara nso nnwetɛbona ɔha aduonum. Saa na Hitifo ahene ne Siria ahene yɛe. Wɔnam aguadifo no so na wɔkrae.

1 Ahene 10:3
Ɛnna Solomon nso buaa no ne nsɛm no nyinaa. Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛkyeree ɔhene so a wantumi ankyerɛ no.

1 Ahene 10:4
Bere a Seba hemmaa huu Solomon nyansa nyinaa, ne ofie a wasi, 

1 Ahene 10:5
ne ne pon so nnuan, ne ne nkoa atenae, ne n’asomfo a wɔsom wɔ pon ho ne wɔn ntade, ne nsa ne ɔhyew afɔre a ɔbɔ daa wɔ Awurade fie no, asɛm no mee ɔhemmaa no. 

1 Ahene 10:6
Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Wo nyansa ne wo ho nsɛm a metee wɔ m’asase so nyinaa, mahu sɛ ɛyɛ nokware. 

1 Ahene 10:7
Mannye nsɛm no anni kosii sɛ m’ankasa mede m’aniwa behui; nea wɔka kyerɛɛ me no, nokwasɛm ni, ennu fa mpo! Wo nyansa ne w’ahonyade boro nea metee ho asɛm no koraa. 

1 Ahene 10:8
Anigye ne wo nkurɔfo; anigye ne wo nkoa yi a wogyina w’anim daa tie wo nyansa no! 

1 Ahene 10:9
Nhyira nka Awurade wo Nyankopɔn; ɔno na ayɛ no fɛ sɛ ɔde wo bɛtena Israel agua so; Awurade dɔ Israel kosi daa, enti na wasi wo hene sɛ bu atɛn na di asɛntrenee.”

1 Ahene 11:1
 Na Ɔhene Solomon dɔɔ mmea ananafo pii kaa Farao babea no ho: Moabfo, Ammonfo, Edomfo, Sidonfo ne Hitifo mmea, 

1 Ahene 11:10
Na wabɔ no kɔkɔ wɔ eyi ho sɛ onnkodi anyame foforo akyi, nanso wanni nea Awurade hyɛɛ no no so. 

1 Ahene 11:11
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Solomon sɛ: “Sɛ woayɛ eyi na woanni m’apam ne m’ahyɛde a mehyɛɛ wo so nti, ohwim na mehwim ahenni no afi wo nsam, na w’akoa na mede bɛma no. 

1 Ahene 11:111
Ahene

1 Ahene 11:12
Nanso wo papa Dawid nti, merenyɛ eyi wɔ wo bere so. Wo ba nsam na mehwim afi. 

1 Ahene 11:13
Mmom ɛnyɛ ahenni no nyinaa na mehwim. M’akoa Dawid ne Yerusalem a mapaw nti, mede abusuakuw biako bɛma wo ba.”

1 Ahene 11:14
Ɛnna Awurade maa ɔsɔretiafo bi a wɔfrɛ no Hadad sɔre tiaa Solomon. Ɔyɛ Edomni a ofi ɔhene asefo mu. Na ɔte Edom. 

1 Ahene 11:15
Bere bi a Dawid kunkum Edomfo, na ɔsahene Yoab kɔe sɛ ɔrekosie wɔn a wɔawuwu no, ofii ase kunkum Edom mmarima nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 11:16
 Asram asia na Yoab ne Israel nyinaa dii wɔ hɔ kosii sɛ okunkum Edom mmarima nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 11:17
Na Hadad ne Edom mmarima bi a wɔyɛ ne papa nkoa a wɔka ne ho guan kɔɔ Egypt; saa bere no, na Hadad yɛ abofra kumaa. 

1 Ahene 11:18
Enti ɔne wɔn fi Midian kɔɔ Paran, na wɔkɔfaa mmarima fi Paran ne wɔn kɔɔ Egypt hene Farao nkyɛn wɔ Egypt, na ɔno nso maa no fie. Bio nso, ɔmaa no aduan ne asase. 

1 Ahene 11:19
Na Hadad kɔɔ so nyaa Farao anim dom ma enti ɔmaa no ɔyere; ɔde n’ankasa ne yere ɔhemmaa Tapenes nuabea maa no waree. 

1 Ahene 11:2
aman a Awurade kaa wɔn ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Israel no, sɛ: “Monnkɔ wɔn mu, na mommma wɔn nso mmma mo mu; dan na wɔbɛdan mo koma akodi wɔn anyame akyi.” Wɔn na Solomon de ne ho kɔfam wɔn ho dɔɔ wɔn. 

1 Ahene 11:20
Akyiri yi Tapenes nuabea no woo ɔbabarima a wɔfrɛ no Genubat maa no; Farao fie na Tapenes twaa abofra no nufu, na Genubat ne Farao mma tenaa Farao fie hɔ.

1 Ahene 11:21
Na Hadad tee wɔ Egypt sɛ Dawid ne n’agyanom akɔda, na ɔsahene Yoab nso awu. Enti Hadad ka kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: “Gya me kwan ma menkɔ me kurom.” 

1 Ahene 11:22
Na Farao bisaa no sɛ: “Wote me nkyɛn yi, dɛn na ehia wo a enti wopɛ sɛ wokɔ wo kurom?” Ɛnna obuae sɛ: “Hwee nhia me, gya ara na gya me kwan ma menkɔ.”

1 Ahene 11:23
 Na Onyankopɔn san maa ɔsɔretiafo foforo, Eliada ba Reson sɔre tiaa no; ɔno na oguan fii ne wura Soba hene Hadadeser nkyɛn no. 

1 Ahene 11:24
Ɔboaboaa mmarima bi ano baa ne nkyɛn, na ɔbɛyɛɛ afowfo no so sahene bere a Dawid kunkum Sobafo no. Enti wɔkɔɔ Damasko kɔtenaa hɔ, na wodii ade wɔ Damasko. 

1 Ahene 11:25
Ɔno nso sɔre tiaa Israel, Solomon nna nyinaa sɛnea Hadad haw wɔn no; bere a odii ade wɔ Siria no nyinaa, okyii Israel kɔkɔkɔkɔ.

1 Ahene 11:26
Efraimni Nebat a ofi Sereda no ba Yeroboam, Solomon akoa a ne maame ne okunafo Serua nso sɔree, na ɔtew ɔhene anim atua. 

1 Ahene 11:27
Nea enti a ɔtew ɔhene anim atua ni: Solomon kyekyee Milo, na otuatuaa ne papa Dawid Kurow afasu no. 

1 Ahene 11:28
Na Yeroboam yɛ ɔbarima kokodurufo a ne ho yɛ den. Solomon hui sɛ aberante no yɛ obi a ɔpɛ adwuma, enti ɔyɛɛ no Yosef fie apaafo nyinaa sohwɛfo. 

1 Ahene 11:29
Saa bere no, Yeroboam fii adi fii Yerusalem, na Siloni odiyifo Ahiya hyiaa no kwan so; na Ahiya de ntama foforo akata ne ho na na obiara nka wɔn baanu ho wɔ wuram hɔ. 

1 Ahene 11:3
Onyaa yerenom ahanson a wɔyɛ adehye, ne ayefam ahasa. Na ne yerenom no de nkakrankakra dan ne koma. 

1 Ahene 11:30
Ɛnna Ahiya soo ntama foforo a ɛkata ne ho no mu, na osunsuanee mu asinasin dumien. 

1 Ahene 11:31
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Yeroboam sɛ:

1 Ahene 11:32
Na m’akoa Dawid ne Yerusalem, kurow a mapaw afi Israel mmusuakuw nyinaa mu nti, megyaw abusuakuw biako ama no. 

1 Ahene 11:33
Nea enti a mereyɛ saa ne sɛ, wɔagyaw me akɔkotow Sidonfo nyamewa Astoret ne Moabfo nyame Kemos ne Ammonfo nyame Milkom; wɔannantew m’akwan so anyɛ nea ɛteɛ m’ani so, na wɔanni m’ahyɛde ne m’atemmusɛm so sɛ ne papa Dawid. 

1 Ahene 11:34
Nanso merennye ahenni no nyinaa mfi ne nsam, efisɛ mɛyɛ no otitiriw, ne nkwa nna nyinaa, m’akoa Dawid a mapaw no nti, efisɛ ɔno de, odii me mmara nsɛm ne m’ahyɛde so. 

1 Ahene 11:35
Ogye na megye ahenni no afi ne ba nsam na mede ama wo; mmusuakuw du na mede bɛma wo. 

1 Ahene 11:36
Na sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a m’akoa Dawid benya kanea daa m’anim wɔ Yerusalem, kurow a mapaw de me din ato so no mu nti, mede abusuakuw biako bɛma ne ba. 

1 Ahene 11:37
 Na wo na mɛfa wo, na wubedi nea wo kra pɛ biara so, na wubedi Israel so hene. 

1 Ahene 11:38
Sɛ wudi nea mɛhyɛ wo nyinaa so, na wonantew m’akwan so yɛ nea ɛteɛ m’ani so, na wudi m’ahyɛde ne me mmara nsɛm nyinaa so sɛnea m’akoa Dawid yɛe no a, ɛnde me nso medi w’akyi, na mɛkyekye daa fie ama wo sɛnea makyekye bi ama Dawid no, na mede Israel bɛma wo. 

1 Ahene 11:39
Eyi nti mɛbrɛ Dawid asefo ase, nanso ɛrenyɛ nna nyinaa.’”

1 Ahene 11:4
Na Solomon nkwakoraabere mu no, ne yerenom dan ne koma kodii anyame foforo akyi; ne koma anni mu wɔ Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn ho sɛ ne papa Dawid koma. 

1 Ahene 11:40
Enti Solomon pɛe sɛ okum Yeroboam. Ɛnna Yeroboam sɔre guan kɔɔ Egypt hene Sisak nkyɛn, na ɔtenaa Egypt kosii sɛ Solomon wui.

1 Ahene 11:41
Solomon ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe ne ne nyansa nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Solomon ho nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 11:42
Nna a Solomon de dii Israel nyinaa so hene wɔ Yerusalem no si mfe aduanan. 

1 Ahene 11:43
Na Solomon ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no n'agya Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Rehoboam bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 11:5
 Enti Solomon kodii Sidonfo nyamewa Astoret ne Milkom, Ammonfo akyiwade no, akyi. 

1 Ahene 11:6
Na Solomon fii ase yɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na wanni Awurade akyi ankosi ase sɛ ne papa Dawid.

1 Ahene 11:7
Saa bere no na Solomon sii sorɔnsorɔmmea maa Kemos, Moabfo akyiwade no, wɔ bepɔw a ɛwɔ Yerusalem anim no so, na osii bi nso maa Molek, Ammonfo akyiwade no. 

1 Ahene 11:8
 Na saa na ɔyɛ maa ne yerenom ananafo a wɔhyew aduhwam no, na wɔbobɔɔ afɔre maa wɔn anyame no nyinaa.

1 Ahene 11:9
Ɛnna Awurade bo fuw Solomon efisɛ ne koma dan fii Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a oyii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no mprenu no ho. 

1 Ahene 12:1
 Na Rehoboam siim kɔɔ Sekem, na Sekem na Israel nyinaa bae besii no hene. 

1 Ahene 12:10
Ɛnna mmerante a ɔne wɔn sii so no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nkurɔfo a wɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ, ‘Wo papa maa yɛn kɔndua yɛɛ duru; na wo de, ma emu nyɛ hare mma yɛn’ no, sɛɛ na ka kyerɛ wɔn, ‘Me nsateaa ketewa mpo mu bɛyɛ duru asen me papa sisi. 

1 Ahene 12:11
Na sɛ me papa de kɔndua a emu yɛ duru soaa mo a, me de, mede bi bɛka mo kɔndua no ho. Sɛ me papa de mpire na ɛhwee mo a, me de, mede nkekantwɛre na ɛbɛhwe mo.’”

1 Ahene 12:112
Ahene

1 Ahene 12:12
 Na sɛnea Rehoboam kae sɛ, “Monkɔ, na nnansa akyi monsan mmra” no, Yeroboam ne nkurɔfo no nyinaa baa ɔhene nkyɛn ne nnansa so. 

1 Ahene 12:13
Na ɔhene ne nkurɔfo no ankasa abodwo so, na wamfa mpanyimfo afotu a wɔde maa no no. 

1 Ahene 12:14
Sɛnea mmerante no tuu no fo no, saa na ɔne wɔn kasae sɛ: “Sɛ me papa maa mo kɔndua yɛɛ duru a, me de, mede bi bɛka mo kɔndua no ho. Sɛ me papa de mpire na ɛhwee mo a, me de, mede nkekantwɛre na ɛbɛhwe mo.” 

1 Ahene 12:15
Enti ɔhene antie nkurɔfo no; Awurade na ɔma ɛbaa saa na ama asɛm a Awurade nam Siloni Ahiya so ka kyerɛɛ Nebat ba Yeroboam no aba mu.

1 Ahene 12:16
 Na Israel nyinaa hui sɛ ɔhene antie wɔn, enti wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Dɛn na yɛne Dawid wɔ yɛ? Yenni agyapade biara wɔ Yese ba no mu. O Israelfo, obiara nkɔ ne fie! Afei Dawid, wo ara hwɛ wo fie.” Ɛnna Israelfo kokɔɔ wɔn ntamadan mu. 

1 Ahene 12:17
 Nanso Israelfo a wɔtete Yuda nkurow mu no de, Rehoboam kɔɔ so dii wɔn so hene.

1 Ahene 12:18
Ɛno akyi no, Ɔhene Rehoboam somaa Adoram a ɔhwɛ apaafo so no, nanso Israelfo nyinaa siw no abo kum no. Ɔhene Rehoboam de, ɔbɔɔ mmɔden foro kɔtenaa teaseɛnam no mu guan kɔɔ Yerusalem. 

1 Ahene 12:19
Atua a Israelfo tew wɔ Dawid fie so no, wɔannyae mu de besi nnɛ.

1 Ahene 12:2
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a Nebat ba Yeroboam wɔ Egypt a ɔtee nea asi no, saa bere no, Ɔhene Solomon nti, na Yeroboam aguan akɔtena Egypt, ntɛm ara, 

1 Ahene 12:20
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a Israelfo nyinaa tee sɛ Yeroboam asan aba no, ntɛm ara na wɔsoma kɔfrɛɛ no baa asafo no anim, na wosii no Israel nyinaa so hene. Obiara anni Dawid fie akyi bio, gye Yuda abusuakuw no nko.

1 Ahene 12:21
Bere a Rehoboam beduu Yerusalem no, ntɛm ara na ɔboaboaa Yuda fie ne Benyamin abusuakuw mu nnɔmmarima a wɔapaw wɔn, mpem ɔha aduɔwɔtwe, ano sɛ wɔne Israel fie rekɔko na wɔasan adan ahenni no ama Solomon ba Rehoboam. 

1 Ahene 12:22
Ɛnna Nyankopɔn asɛm baa Onyankopɔn nipa Semaia nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 12:23
“Ka kyerɛ Solomon ba Rehoboam, Yuda hene, ne Yuda ne Benyamin fie nyinaa, ne ɔman no nkae sɛ, 

1 Ahene 12:24
‘Nea Awurade aka ni: “Mo ne mo nuanom Israelfo no nnkɔko. Obiara nsan nkɔ ne fie, na me na mama asɛm yi aba saa.”’” Enti wotiee Awurade asɛm, na wɔsan kɔɔ wɔn afie, sɛnea Awurade kae no.

1 Ahene 12:25
Na Yeroboam san kyekyee Sekem wɔ Efraim mmepɔw so, na ɔtenaa hɔ. Afei ofii hɔ san kɔkyekyee Penuel. 

1 Ahene 12:26
Ɛnna Yeroboam kae wɔ ne komam sɛ: “Anhwɛ a, ahenni no bɛsan akodi Dawid fiefo nsam. 

1 Ahene 12:27
Sɛ ɔmanfo yi fi kɔ Yerusalem bere nyinaa kɔbɔ afɔre wɔ Awurade fie hɔ a, wɔn koma bɛsan adan akodi wɔn wura, Yuda hene Rehoboam akyi; wobekum me na wɔasan akodi Yuda hene Rehoboam akyi.” 

1 Ahene 12:28
Enti ɔhene tuu agyina, na ɔyɛɛ sika anantwi mma abien, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Ɛyɛ den dodo sɛ mobɛkɔ Yerusalem. Israelfo, mo Nyankopɔn a oyii mo fii Egypt asase so no ni.”

1 Ahene 12:29
Na ɔde biako sii Betel, na ɔde biako a aka no nso sii Dan. 

1 Ahene 12:3
wɔsoma kɔfrɛɛ no bae. Ɛno akyi no, Yeroboam ne Israel asafo no nyinaa bae bɛka kyerɛɛ Rehoboam sɛ: 

1 Ahene 12:30
Eyi ma wɔyɛɛ bɔne, na ɔman no kɔsom nea ɛwɔ Dan no anim.

1 Ahene 12:31
Na ɔyeyɛɛ sorɔnsorɔmmea afie, na oyiyii ɔmanfo a wɔnyɛ Lewi asefo no bi hyɛɛ wɔn asɔfo. 

1 Ahene 12:32
Ɛnna Yeroboam hyɛɛ fa ɔsram a ɛto so awotwe no da a ɛto so dunum no te sɛ fa a wɔhyɛ wɔ Yuda no, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛbɔ afɔre wɔ afɔremuka a osii wɔ Betel no so ama anantwi mma a ɔyɛe no; ɔmaa asɔfo a ɔde wɔn sisii hɔ wɔ Betel no som wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea a ɔyɛe no anim. 

1 Ahene 12:33
Enti ofii ase bɔɔ afɔre wɔ afɔremuka a osii wɔ Betel no so, ɔsram a ɛto so awotwe no da a ɛto so dunum no, ɔsram a ɔno ara bɔɔ ne tirim de sii hɔ no; ɔhyɛɛ fa maa Israelfo, na ɔhyew aduhwam wɔ afɔremuka no so de bɔɔ afɔre.

1 Ahene 12:4
“Wo papa maa yɛn kɔndua yɛɛ duru; wo de, ma adwuma dennen a wo papa ma yɛyɛe ne ne kɔndua duruduru a ɔde too yɛn so no mu nyɛ hare, na yɛbɛsom wo.”

1 Ahene 12:5
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔ, na nnansa akyi monsan mmra m’anim.” Na nkurɔfo no fii n’anim kɔe. 

1 Ahene 12:6
 Na ɔhene Rehoboam ne mpanyimfo a ne papa Solomon te ase no na wotu no fo no kotuu agyina sɛ: “Afotu bɛn na mowɔ ma me na mede akobua nkurɔfo no?” 

1 Ahene 12:7
Ɛnna wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ ɛnnɛ wobɛyɛ akoa ama nkurɔfo yi na woasom wɔn a, ɛnde wo ne wɔn nkasa na fa asɛmpa bua wɔn, na wɔn nso bɛsom wo daa.”

1 Ahene 12:8
Nanso wamfa mpanyimfo no afotu a wɔde maa no no, na mmom ɔne mmerante a ɔne wɔn sii so a wotu no fo no kotuu agyina. 

1 Ahene 12:9
Na obisaa wɔn sɛ: “Afotu bɛn na mowɔ ma me na mede akobua nkurɔfo a wɔkae sɛ, ‘Ma kɔndua duruduru a wo papa de too yɛn so no mu nyɛ hare’ no?” 

1 Ahene 13:1
 Bere a Yeroboam gyina afɔremuka no ho rehyew afɔrebɔde no, Onyankopɔn nipa bi nam Awurade asɛm so fi Yuda baa Betel. 

1 Ahene 13:10
Enti osiim faa ɔkwan foforo so na wamfa ɔkwan a ɔnam so baa Betel no so.

1 Ahene 13:11
Na odiyifo akwakoraa bi te Betel, na ne mma kɔkaa nea Nyankopɔn nipa no yɛe wɔ Betel saa da no nyinaa kyerɛɛ no, na nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene no nso, wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn papa. 

1 Ahene 13:113
Ahene

1 Ahene 13:12
Ɛnna wɔn papa bisaa wɔn sɛ: “Ɛhe na ɔfa kɔe?” Na ne mma no kyerɛɛ no ɔkwan a Nyankopɔn nipa a ofi Yuda bae no faa so kɔe. 

1 Ahene 13:13
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ne mma no sɛ: “Monhyehyɛ afurum no mma me.” Enti wɔhyehyɛɛ afurum no maa no, na ɔtenaa so kɔe.

1 Ahene 13:14
Otiw Nyankopɔn nipa no kɔtoo no sɛ ɔte dua kɛse bi se. Ɛnna obisaa no sɛ: “Wone Nyankopɔn nipa a ofi Yuda bae no?” Na obuae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ me.” 

1 Ahene 13:15
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ma yɛnkɔ fie na kodidi.” 

1 Ahene 13:16
Nanso ɔkae sɛ: “Merentumi ne wo nsan nkɔ, na merentumi ne wo nkɔ fie, na merentumi ne wo nnidi nnom nsu wɔ ha. 

1 Ahene 13:17
Efisɛ saa na wɔnam Awurade asɛm so hyɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Nnidi, na nnom nsu wɔ hɔ. Ɔkwan a wobɛfa so akɔ no, nsan mfa so mma.’” 

1 Ahene 13:18
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Me nso meyɛ odiyifo te sɛ wo ara, na ɔbɔfo bi nam Awurade asɛm so aka akyerɛ me sɛ, ‘Ma ɔnsan ne wo mmra wo fie na ommedidi na ɔnnom nsu.’” Nanso atoro na odi kyerɛɛ no. 

1 Ahene 13:19
Enti ɔsan ne no kɔe sɛ ɔrekodidi na wanom nsu wɔ ne fie.

1 Ahene 13:2
Ɛnna ɔnam Awurade asɛm so teɛɛm kyerɛɛ afɔremuka no sɛ: “O afɔremuka, afɔremuka, nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Hwɛ! Wɔbɛwo ɔbabarima Dawid fie, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Yosia! Na ɔde sorɔnsorɔmmea asɔfo a wɔbɔ wo so afɔre no bɛbɔ afɔre wɔ wo so, na ɔbɛhyew nnipa nnompe wɔ wo so.’” 

1 Ahene 13:20
Na ɛbae sɛ wɔte pon ho no, Awurade asɛm baa odiyifo a ɔkɔsan no bae no nkyɛn; 

1 Ahene 13:21
na ɔteɛɛm frɛɛ Nyankopɔn nipa a ofi Yuda bae no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Sɛ woatew Awurade ahyɛde so atua na woanni mmara nsɛm a Awurade wo Nyankopɔn de maa wo so, 

1 Ahene 13:22
na woasan w’akyi akodidi na woanom nsu wɔ beae a ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ: “Nnidi, na nnom nsu wɔ hɔ,” no nti, wo funu renkɔ w’agyanom amusiei.’”

1 Ahene 13:23
Ɛbae sɛ odidi nom wiei no, ntɛm ara na ɔhyehyɛɛ afurum maa no, kyerɛ sɛ, odiyifo a ɔde no san bae no. 

1 Ahene 13:24
Enti osiim kɔe. Akyiri yi gyata tow hyɛɛ no so wɔ kwan so kum no, na ɔtow ne funu too kwan no mu. Na afurum no gyina ho, na gyata no nso gyina funu no ho. 

1 Ahene 13:25
Na nkurɔfo bi betwaam na wohuu funu no sɛ ɛda kwan no mu na gyata no gyina funu no ho. Enti wɔbɛbɔɔ amanneɛ wɔ odiyifo akwakoraa no kurom hɔ.

1 Ahene 13:26
Bere a odiyifo a ɔde no san fi ɔkwan no so bae no tee asɛm no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn nipa a ɔtew Awurade ahyɛde so atua no; ɛno nti na Awurade de no maa gyata sɛ ɔntow nhyɛ no so nkum no sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no no te.” 

1 Ahene 13:27
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ne mma no sɛ: “Monhyehyɛ afurum no mma me.” Na wɔhyehyɛ maa no. 

1 Ahene 13:28
Ɛnna osiim kɔe na ɔkɔtoo ne funu no sɛ ɛda ɔkwan no mu, na afurum no ne gyata no gyinagyina funu no ho. Na gyata no nwee funu no, na ontetew afurum no nso. 

1 Ahene 13:29
Na odiyifo no maa Nyankopɔn nipa no funu so de too afurum no so, na ɔsan de no bae. Enti odiyifo akwakoraa no de no baa ne kurom sɛ ɔrebesu no na wasie no. 

1 Ahene 13:3
Na ɔmaa sɛnkyerɛnne saa da no sɛ: “Sɛnkyerɛnne a Awurade aka sɛ ebesi ni: Hwɛ! Afɔremuka no mu bɛpae, na nso a ɛwɔ so no abɔ apete.”

1 Ahene 13:30
Na ɔde ne funu no bɛtoo n’ankasa amusiei, na wosuu no sɛ: “Due, me nua!” 

1 Ahene 13:31
 Na osiee no wiei no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne mma no sɛ: “Sɛ miwu a munsie me amusiei a wosiee Nyankopɔn nipa no. Ne nnompe ho na momfa me nnompe ngu. 

1 Ahene 13:32
Na nea ɔnam Awurade asɛm so ka tiaa afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Betel ne sorɔnsorɔmmea afie a ɛwowɔ Samaria nkurow mu no, ne nyinaa bɛba mu.”

1 Ahene 13:33
Asɛm yi akyi no, Yeroboam ansan amfi ne kwammɔne ho, na mmom ɔsan de ɔmanfo no biara kɛkɛ yeyɛɛ asɔfo maa sorɔnsorɔmmea no. Obiara a n’ani gye ho no, ɔmaa no tumi, na ɔkae sɛ: “Ma ɔno nso nyɛ sorɔnsorɔmmea sɔfo.” 

1 Ahene 13:34
Na eyi bɛyɛɛ Yeroboam fie bɔne ne ade a ɛbɛma wɔapopa wɔn na wɔatɔre wɔn ase afi asase so.

1 Ahene 13:4
Bere a ɔhene tee Nyankopɔn nipa no asɛm a ɔka tiaa afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Betel no, ntɛm ara na Yeroboam yii ne nsa fii afɔremuka no so teɛɛ ne nsa kae sɛ: “Monkyere no!” Ɛhɔ ara, ne nsa a ɔde kyerɛɛ no so no senee, na wantumi anka anto ne ho. 

1 Ahene 13:5
Na afɔremuka no mu paee, na nso a ɛwɔ afɔremuka no so bɔ petee sɛnea sɛnkyerɛnne a Nyankopɔn nipa no nam Awurade asɛm so kae no te.

1 Ahene 13:6
Ɛnna ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn nipa no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, pa Awurade wo Nyankopɔn no kyɛw ma me, na bɔ mpae ma me na me nsa no nyɛ yiye.” Na Nyankopɔn nipa no paa Awurade kyɛw, na ɔhene nsa no yɛɛ yiye, na ɛyɛɛ sɛnea ɛte kan no. 

1 Ahene 13:7
Ɛnna ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn nipa no sɛ: “Ma yɛnkɔ fie na kodidi, na menkyɛ wo ade.” 

1 Ahene 13:8
Nanso Nyankopɔn nipa no ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Sɛ wode wo fie fa mpo ma me a, me ne wo renkɔ, na merennidi na merennom nsu wɔ ha.

1 Ahene 13:9
Efisɛ saa na wɔnam Awurade asɛm so hyɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Nnidi, na nnom nsu, na ɔkwan a wobɛfa so akɔ no, nsan mfa so mma.’” 

1 Ahene 14:1
 Saa bere no ara mu na Yeroboam ba Abia yaree. 

1 Ahene 14:10
eyi nti mede mmusu reba Yeroboam fie so, na metwa Yeroboam fie barima biara akyene, Israel nipahunu a onni ɔboafo mpo; mɛpra Yeroboam fie nyinaa akɔ sɛnea obi pra nantwibin kɔtow gu no.

1 Ahene 14:11
Yeroboam ho nipa biara a obewu wɔ kurow mu no, akraman na ebedi ne nam, na nea obewu wɔ wuram no, wim nnomaa na ebedi ne nam, efisɛ Awurade na waka.”’

1 Ahene 14:114
Ahene

1 Ahene 14:12
“Enti sɔre na kɔ wo fie. Sɛ wo nan si kurow no mu ara pɛ a, abofra no bewu. 

1 Ahene 14:13
Israel nyinaa besu no na wɔasie no, na ɔno nkutoo ne Yeroboam ho nipa a wobesie no, efisɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn ahu adepa bi wɔ ne ho, Yeroboam fiefo mu. 

1 Ahene 14:14
Na Awurade bɛma ɔhene bi so wɔ Israel a obetwa Yeroboam fie akyene da no, na sɛ ɛba mu saa bere yi nso ɛ? 

1 Ahene 14:15
Awurade bɛbɔ Israel sɛnea demmire hinhim nsu mu, na obetutu Israel ase afi asase pa a ɔde maa wɔn agyanom yi so, na ɔbɛbɔ wɔn apete akɔ asubɔnten kɛse no agya, abosonnua a wɔayeyɛ de ahyɛ Awurade abufuw nti. 

1 Ahene 14:16
Na Yeroboam bɔne a wayɛ a ama Israel nso ayɛ bɔne nti, ɔbɛpo Israel.”

1 Ahene 14:1718
Ɛnna Yeroboam yere sɔre siim kɔɔ Tirsa. Bere a ɔreyɛ adu ofie no kwan ano no, abofra no wui.  Enti wosiee no, na Israel nyinaa suu no sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔnam n’akoa odiyifo Ahiya so kae no te.

1 Ahene 14:19
 Na Yeroboam ho nsɛm a aka, n’akodi ne sɛnea odii ade no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 14:2
Enti Yeroboam ka kyerɛɛ ne yere sɛ: “Sɔre ɛ, na sakra wo ho na obiara anhu sɛ wone Yeroboam yere, na kɔ Silo. Hwɛ! Ɛhɔ na odiyifo Ahiya wɔ. Ɔno na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ mɛyɛ ɔman yi hene. 

1 Ahene 14:20
Nna a Yeroboam de dii hene no si mfe aduonu abien, na ɛno akyi no, ɔne n’agyanom kɔdae, na ne ba Nadab bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 14:21
Solomon ba Rehoboam nso dii hene wɔ Yuda. Rehoboam bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduanan biako, na odii ade mfe dunson wɔ Yerusalem, Israel mmusuakuw no nyinaa kurow a Awurade paw sɛ ne din ntena hɔ no mu. Ne maame din de Naama a ɔyɛ Ammonni. 

1 Ahene 14:22
Na Yuda kɔɔ so yɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne de huruu ne bo sen nea wɔn agyanom bɔne a wɔyɛe no nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 14:23
Wɔn nso yeyɛɛ sorɔnsorɔmmea ne abosom adum ne abosonnua wɔ nkoko atenten nyinaa so ne nnua kusuu nyinaa bi ase. 

1 Ahene 14:24
Na asɔrefie mmarima nguaman mpo wɔ asase no so. Wɔyɛɛ akyide a amanaman a Awurade pam wɔn fii Israelfo anim no yɛe nyinaa bi.

1 Ahene 14:25
Ɛbae sɛ Ɔhene Rehoboam afe a ɛto so anum mu no, Egypt hene Sisak baa Yerusalem so. 

1 Ahene 14:26
Na ɔfaa Awurade fie akorade ne ahemfie hɔ akorade no. Ɔfaa biribiara; ɔfaa sika akyɛm a Solomon yɛe no nyinaa nso. 

1 Ahene 14:27
Ɛno nti Ɔhene Rehoboam yɛɛ kɔbere akyɛm de sii ananmu, na ɔde hyɛɛ ammirikatufo a wɔwɛn ahemfie pon ano no mpanyimfo nsa. 

1 Ahene 14:28
Na bere biara a ɔhene bɛba Awurade fie hɔ no, ammirikatufo no ba bɛsesaw, na wɔsan de kɔ awɛmfo dan no mu.

1 Ahene 14:29
Rehoboam ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 14:3
Fa paanoo du ne tetare, ne ɛwo toa biako, na kohu no. Ɔno na ɔbɛka nea ɛbɛyɛ abofra no akyerɛ wo.”

1 Ahene 14:30
 Na akodi bɛdaa Rehoboam ne Yeroboam ntam daa. 

1 Ahene 14:31
Na Rehoboam ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ Dawid Kurow mu. Ne maame din de Naama a ɔyɛ Ammonni. Na ne ba Abiam bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 14:4
Enti Yeroboam yere yɛɛ saa. Na ɔsɔre kɔɔ Ahiya fie wɔ Silo. Saa bere no na Ahiya nhu ade, na onyin nti n’ani ayɛ kusukusu.

1 Ahene 14:5
Na Awurade aka akyerɛ Ahiya sɛ: “Yeroboam yere reba wo nkyɛn abebisa biribi ne ba ho efisɛ ɔyare. Sɛɛ ne sɛɛ na ka kyerɛ no. Sɛ ɔba a, ɔbɛsakra ne ho ayɛ ne ho sɛ obi foforo.”

1 Ahene 14:6
Bere a Ahiya tee ɔbea no nan ase wɔ ne kwan ano ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Yeroboam yere, bra mu. Dɛn nti na woasakra wo ho ayɛ wo ho sɛ obi foforo bere a wɔasoma me sɛ menka asɛm a ano yɛ den nkyerɛ wo yi? 

1 Ahene 14:7
Kɔka kyerɛ Yeroboam sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn aka ni: “Memaa wo so wɔ me man mu ma wudii me man Israel anim, 

1 Ahene 14:8
na mihwim ahenni no fii Dawid fie de maa wo, nanso woanyɛ sɛ m’akoa Dawid a odii me mmara nsɛm so na ɔde ne koma nyinaa dii m’akyi, na nea ɛteɛ nkutoo na ɔyɛe m’anim no; 

1 Ahene 14:9
woayɛ bɔne asen wɔn a wodii w’anim nyinaa, na woayɛ nyame foforo ne dade ahoni de ahyɛ me abufuw, na me de, woatow me akyene w’akyi; 

1 Ahene 15:1
 Nebat ba Ɔhene Yeroboam afe a ɛto so dunwɔtwe mu na Abiam bedii Yuda so hene. 

1 Ahene 15:10
 Na odii hene mfe aduanan biako wɔ Yerusalem; na ne na din de Maaka a ɔyɛ Abisalom babea.

1 Ahene 15:11
 Na Asa yɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so sɛ ne nana Dawid. 

1 Ahene 15:115
Ahene

1 Ahene 15:12
Enti otutuu mmarima nguaman no fii asase no so, na oyiyii abosom fi a n’agyanom yeyɛe no nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 15:13
 Na ne maame Maaka nso, otuu no ade so, na wamma wanyɛ ɔbaapanyin bio, efisɛ ɔyɛɛ ohoni huhuuhu bi a wɔde som abosonnua; ɛno akyi no, Asa twaa ohoni no kɔhyewee wɔ Kidron subon no ho. 

1 Ahene 15:14
 Nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea no de, wanyiyi amfi hɔ. Na Asa koma dii mu wɔ Awurade ho ne nna nyinaa.

1 Ahene 15:15
Na ɔde n'agya kronkronne ne nea n’ankasa n'akronkronne baa Awurade fie hɔ, dwetɛ ne sika ne anwenne no.

1 Ahene 15:16
Na akodi bɛdaa Asa ne Israel hene Baasa ntam wɔn nna nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 15:17
Enti Israel hene Baasa baa Yuda so, na ofii ase sɛ ɔrekyekye Rama sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara remfi adi nkɔ Yuda hene Asa nkyɛn na obiara nso remfi ne nkyɛn mma. 

1 Ahene 15:18
Ɛnna Asa faa Awurade fie ne ahemfie akorade mu dwetɛ ne sika a aka nyinaa de hyɛɛ n’asomfo nsam, na Ɔhene Asa somaa wɔn kɔɔ Tabrimon ba Hesion ba, Siria hene Ben-Hadad a ɔte Damasko no nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: 

1 Ahene 15:19
“Apam da me ne wo ntam, ne me papa ne wo papa ntam. Merebɛkyɛ wo dwetɛ ne sika. Kɔ, na kotwa apam a wo ne Israel hene Baasa ayɛ no mu, na omfi me so nkɔ.” 

1 Ahene 15:2
Odii hene mfe abiɛsa wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Maaka a ɔyɛ Abisalom babea. 

1 Ahene 15:20
Ɛnna Ben-Hadad tiee Ɔhene Asa, na ɔsomaa n’asahene kɔɔ Israel nkurow so, na wɔkɔyɛɛ Iyon ne Dan ne Abel-Bet-Maaka pasaa, ɛne Kineret kosii Naftali nsase nyinaa so. 

1 Ahene 15:21
Na Baasa tee no, ntɛm ara na ogyaee Rama kyekye, na ɔtenaa Tirsa. 

1 Ahene 15:22
Ɛnna Ɔhene Asa boaboaa Yuda nyinaa ano a wannyaw obiara, na wɔkɔsesaw abo ne nnua a na Baasa de rekyekye Rama no, na ɔde kɔkyekyee Geba wɔ Benyamin, ne Mispa.

1 Ahene 15:23
Asa ho nsɛm a aka nyinaa, ne nnwuma akɛse ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne nkurow a ɔkyekyee no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. Nanso ne nkwakoraabere mu no, ɔyaree ne nan. 

1 Ahene 15:24
Na Asa ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ ne nana Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Yehosafat bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 15:25
Na Yeroboam ba Nadab bedii Israel so hene, Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so abien mu; odii Israel so hene mfe abien. 

1 Ahene 15:26
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na ɔnantew ne papa kwan ne bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛnam so maa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no mu. 

1 Ahene 15:27
Na Ahiya ba Baasa a ofi Isakar fie bɔɔ ne ho pɔw; Baasa kum no wɔ Gibeton a ɛwɔ Filistifo asase so bere a na Nadab ne Israel nyinaa atwa Gibeton ho ahyia no. 

1 Ahene 15:28
Enti Baasa kum no wɔ Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so abiɛsa mu, na odii n’ade. 

1 Ahene 15:29
Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔhene ara pɛ, okunkum Yeroboam fiefo nyinaa. Wannyaw Yeroboam ho nipa biara a ahome wɔ ne mu; ɔtɔree wɔn nyinaa ase sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔnam n’akoa Siloni Ahiya so kae no te; 

1 Ahene 15:3
Akwammɔne a ne papa dii kan faa so no nyinaa, ɛno ara na ɔno nso faa so; ne koma anni mu wɔ Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn ho sɛ ne nana Dawid koma. 

1 Ahene 15:30
Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne ne abohurude a ɔyɛ de hyɛɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no abufuw no nti na ɛbaa saa. 

1 Ahene 15:31
Nadab ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 15:32
 Na akodi bɛdaa Asa ne Israel hene Baasa ntam wɔn nna nyinaa.

1 Ahene 15:33
Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so abiɛsa mu no, Ahiya ba Baasa bɛyɛɛ Israel nyinaa so hene wɔ Tirsa mfe aduonu anan. 

1 Ahene 15:34
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na ɔnantew Yeroboam kwan ne bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛnam so maa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no mu.

1 Ahene 15:4
 Nanso Dawid nti, Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn ma onyaa kanea wɔ Yerusalem bere a ɔmaa ne ba so wɔ n’akyi no, na ɔmaa Yerusalem gyinae, 

1 Ahene 15:5
efisɛ Dawid yɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so, na wannan amfi biribiara a ɔhyɛɛ no no ho ne nkwa nna nyinaa, gye Hitini Uria asɛm no nko mu. 

1 Ahene 15:6
Na akodi bɛdaa Rehoboam ne Yeroboam ntam ne nkwa nna nyinaa.

1 Ahene 15:7
 Na Abiam ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. Na akodi bɛdaa Abiam ne Yeroboam nso ntam. 

1 Ahene 15:8
Na Abiam ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no wɔ Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Asa bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 15:9
Israel hene Yeroboam afe a ɛto so aduonu mu na Asa bedii Yuda so hene. 

1 Ahene 16:1
 Ɛnna Awurade asɛm baa Hanani ba Yehu nkyɛn tiaa Baasa sɛ: 

1 Ahene 16:10
Na Simri kɔɔ no so kɔbɔɔ no kum no wɔ Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so aduonu ason mu, na obedii n’ade. 

1 Ahene 16:11
Bere a ɔbɛtenaa ahengua no so dii hene ara pɛ na okunkum Baasa fiefo nyinaa. Wannyaw ɔbarima biara anaa ne ho nipa biara a obetumi abɛtɔ were, anaa n’adamfo biara. 

1 Ahene 16:116
Ahene

1 Ahene 16:12
Enti Simri tɔree Baasa fiefo nyinaa ase, sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔnam odiyifo Yehu so ka tiaa Baasa no te; 

1 Ahene 16:13
bɔne a Baasa ne ne ba Ela yɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne de wɔn abosonhuhuw no hyɛɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn abufuw no nyinaa nti na ɛbaa saa. 

1 Ahene 16:14
Ela ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

1 Ahene 16:15
Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so aduonu ason mu no, Simri bedii hene nnanson wɔ Tirsa, bere a ɔman no abɔ Gibeton a ɛwɔ Filistifo asase so no ho nsra no. 

1 Ahene 16:16
Saa bere no, nnipa a wɔabɔ nsra no nyaa nkra sɛ: “Simri abɔ ɔhene ho pɔw akum no.” Enti Israel nyinaa de ɔsahene Omri sii Israel so hene wɔ nsra no mu saa da no. 

1 Ahene 16:17
Ɛnna Omri ne Israelfo a wɔka ne ho nyinaa fii Gibeton, na wobetwaa Tirsa ho hyiae. 

1 Ahene 16:18
Afei bere a Simri hui sɛ wɔafa kurow no, ntɛm ara na ɔkɔɔ ahemfie abantenten mu hɔ, na ɔde ogya too mu hyew ne ho ne ahemfie no, na owui; 

1 Ahene 16:19
bɔne a ɔyɛe, sɛ ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na ɔnantew Yeroboam kwan so ne bɔne a ɔmaa Israel nso yɛe no mu nti na ɛbaa saa. 

1 Ahene 16:2
“Me na memaa wo so fii mfutuma mu yɛɛ wo me man Israel so panyin, nanso esiane sɛ woafa Yeroboam kwan so, na woama me man Israel ayɛ bɔne de wɔn bɔne ahyɛ me abufuw nti, 

1 Ahene 16:20
Simri ho nsɛm a aka ne pɔw a ɔbɔe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

1 Ahene 16:21
Saa bere no, Israel man no mu kyɛɛ abien. Ɔman no fa kodii Ginat ba Tibni akyi sii no hene, na ɔfa a aka no nso kodii Omri akyi. 

1 Ahene 16:22
Ewiee ase no, Omri akyitaafo no dii Ginat ba Tibni akyitaafo no so nkonim. Ɛnna Tibni wui, na Omri dii hene.

1 Ahene 16:23
Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so aduasa biako mu no, Omri bɛyɛɛ Israel hene mfe dumien. Odii ade mfe asia wɔ Tirsa. 

1 Ahene 16:24
 Na ɔtɔɔ Samaria bepɔw fii Semer hɔ maa no dwetɛ dwetikɛse abien, na ɔkyekyee kurow wɔ bepɔw no so, na ɔde bepɔw no wura Semer din too kurow a ɔkyekyee no so, na ɔfrɛɛ no Samaria. 

1 Ahene 16:25
Na Omri yɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne; ɔyɛɛ bɔne sen wɔn a wodii n’anim nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 16:26
Ɔfaa Nebat ba Yeroboam kwan nyinaa ne bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛnam so maa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no so, bɔne a wɔyɛe de wɔn abosonhuhuw no hyɛɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn abufuw no. 

1 Ahene 16:27
Omri ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe ne ne nnwuma akɛse no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

1 Ahene 16:28
Na Omri ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no Samaria, na ne ba Ahab bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 16:29
 Na Omri ba Ahab nso bedii Israel so hene wɔ Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so aduasa awotwe mu. Omri ba Ahab dii Israel so hene mfe aduonu abien wɔ Samaria. 

1 Ahene 16:3
merebɛpra Baasa ne ne fie nyinaa akɔ, na mɛyɛ ne fie sɛ Nebat ba Yeroboam fie. 

1 Ahene 16:30
Na Omri ba Ahab yɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sen wɔn a wodii n’anim nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 16:31
Na wammu no hwee sɛ ɔbɛnantew Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne mu, na mpo ɔkɔwaree Sidonfo hene Etbaal babea Yesebel, na ɔkɔsom Baal bɔɔ ne mu ase maa no. 

1 Ahene 16:32
Bio nso osii afɔremuka maa Baal wɔ Baal fie a osii wɔ Samaria no. 

1 Ahene 16:33
Na Ahab sii ɔbosom dua; enti Ahab yɛɛ bɔne de hyɛɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn abufuw sen Israel ahene a wodii n’anim nyinaa.

1 Ahene 16:34
Ne bere so na Betelni Hiel kyekyee Yeriko. Ɔde ne ba panyin Abiram twaa so de too kurow no fapem, na ɔde ne ba kumaa Segub twaa so de sisii n’apon sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔnam Nun ba Yosua so kae no te.

1 Ahene 16:4
Baasa ho nipa biara a obewu wɔ kurow mu no, akraman na ebedi ne nam, na nea obewu wɔ wuram no, ewim nnomaa na ebedi ne nam.”

1 Ahene 16:5
Baasa ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe ne ne nnwuma akɛse no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 16:6
Na Baasa ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no wɔ Tirsa, na ne ba Ela bedii n’ade. 

1 Ahene 16:7
Bio nso, Awurade nam Hanani ba odiyifo Yehu so kasa tiaa Baasa ne ne fie, efisɛ ɔyɛɛ Awurade bɔne de ne nsa ano adwuma hyɛɛ no abufuw sɛ Yeroboam fie, na okum Nadab nso.

1 Ahene 16:8
Yuda hene Asa afe a ɛto so aduonu asia mu no, Baasa ba Ela bɛyɛɛ Israel hene mfe abien wɔ Tirsa.

1 Ahene 16:9
Bere a ɔwɔ Tirsa ofiepanyin Arsa fie rewe nsa abow wɔ Tirsa no, n’akoa Simri, nteaseɛnam fa so panyin no bɔɔ ne ho pɔw. 

1 Ahene 17:1
 Ɛnna Tisbini Elia a ofi Gileadfo mu bɛka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a migyina n’anim no te ase yi, obosu anaa osu rentɔ mfe yi mu gye sɛ ɛnam m'asɛm so!”

1 Ahene 17:10
Ɛnna ɔsɔre kɔɔ Sarefat, na bere a oduu kurow no pon ano no, hwɛ! ɔbea kunafo bi a ɔrepɛ nnyina ni. Enti ɔfrɛɛ ɔbea no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, fa nsu kakra gu kuruwa mu ma me, na mennom.” 

1 Ahene 17:11
Bere a ɔbea no siim sɛ ɔrekɔfa aba no, ɔfrɛɛ no bio ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, ɛyɛ a fa paanoo kakra hyɛ wo nsam brɛ me.” 

1 Ahene 17:117
Ahene

1 Ahene 17:12
Ɛnna ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn no te ase yi, minni paanoo biara; esiam nsa ma pɛ na aka wɔ kuku mu ne ngo kakraa bi a ɛwɔ ahina mu, na merepɛ mmobaa abien akɔyɛ biribi ama me ne me ba adi, na yɛawu.”

1 Ahene 17:13
Ɛnna Elia (Elijah) ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nsuro. Wo de, kɔyɛ nea woaka no. Mmom di kan fa nea ɛwɔ hɔ no bi yɛ paanoo ketewaa bi brɛ me ansa na woayɛ bi ama wo ne wo ba no. 

1 Ahene 17:14
Na asɛm a Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn aka ni, ‘Esiam a ɛwɔ kuku mu no rensa, na ngo a ɛwɔ ahina mu no nso rensa kosi da a Awurade bɛma osu atɔ agu asase no so.’” 

1 Ahene 17:15
Enti ɔkɔyɛe sɛnea Elia kae no; na ɔbea no nyaa aduan dii nna pii, ɔne ne fiefo ne odiyifo no. 

1 Ahene 17:16
Kuku no mu esiam no ansa, na ahina no mu ngo no nso ansa, sɛnea Awurade nam Elia so kae no.

1 Ahene 17:17
Na ɛbae sɛ nsɛm yi akyi no, ɔbea no, kyerɛ sɛ, ofiewura no, babarima yaree, na yare no mu yɛɛ den kosii sɛ afei de na ahome biara nni ne mu bio. 

1 Ahene 17:18
Ɛnna ɔbea no ka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: “O Nyankopɔn nipa, dɛn na me ne wo wɔ yɛ? Woaba ha sɛ worebɛkae me me bɔne na woakum me ba.” 

1 Ahene 17:19
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no sɛ: “Fa wo ba no ma me.” Na ogyee no fii ne kokom de no kɔɔ abansoro pia a ɔte mu no mu, na ɔde no too ne mpa so. 

1 Ahene 17:2
Na Awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 17:20
