Ɛnna ɔteɛɛm frɛɛ Awurade sɛ: “O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, okunafo a mabɛsoɛ no yi, wode mmusu reba ne so sɛ worekum ne ba yi?” 

1 Ahene 17:21
Ɛnna obutuw abofra no so mprɛnsa, na ɔteɛɛm frɛɛ Awurade sɛ: “O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, mesrɛ wo, ma abofra yi kra nsan mmra ne mu.” 

1 Ahene 17:22
Na Awurade tiee Elia nne, enti abofra no kra san baa ne mu, na ɔbaa nkwa mu. 

1 Ahene 17:23
Ɛnna Elia faa abofra no fii atifi dan no mu baa fie no mu, na ɔde no brɛɛ ne maame; afei Elia kae sɛ: “Hwɛ, wo ba no te ase.” 

1 Ahene 17:24
Ɛnna ɔbea no ka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: “Afei na mahu sɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn nipa ampa, na Awurade asɛm a ɛwɔ w’anom no yɛ nokware.”

1 Ahene 17:3
“Fi ha kɔ, na fa w’ani kyerɛ apuei fam kohintaw Kerit subon a ɛwɔ Yordan apuei no ho. 

1 Ahene 17:4
Subon no mu nsu na nom, na mahyɛ nkwaakwaadabi sɛ ɔbrɛ wo aduan wɔ hɔ.” 

1 Ahene 17:5
Ntɛm ara na ɔkɔyɛɛ nea Awurade kae no, enti ɔkɔtenaa Kerit subon a ɛwɔ Yordan apuei no ho. 

1 Ahene 17:6
Nadaa nkwaakwaadabi brɛ no paanoo ne nam anɔpa, na anwummere nso wɔbrɛ no paanoo ne nam, na subon no mu nsu na ɔnomee. 

1 Ahene 17:7
Nanso nna bi akyi no, subon no mu nsu yowee, efisɛ na osu ntɔ asase no so.

1 Ahene 17:8
Ɛnna Awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 17:9
“Sɔre kɔ Sarefat a ɛwɔ Sidonfo asase so na kɔtena hɔ. Hwɛ! mɛma ɔbea bi a ɔyɛ okunafo ama wo aduan wɔ hɔ.” 

1 Ahene 18:1
 Na nna pii akyi no, Awurade asɛm baa Elia nkyɛn wɔ afe a ɛto so abiɛsa no mu sɛ: “Kɔ, na fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ Ahab, efisɛ merebɛma osu atɔ agu asase no so.” 

1 Ahene 18:10
Sɛ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn te ase yi, ɔman anaa ahenni biara nni hɔ a me wura nsoma nkɔhwehwɛɛ wo wɔ hɔ. Sɛ wɔka sɛ, ‘Onni ha’ a, ɔma ahenni anaa ɔman no ka ntam de kyerɛ sɛ wonhuu wo. 

1 Ahene 18:11
Nanso wuse: ‘Kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ, “Mahu Elia.”’ 

1 Ahene 18:118
Ahene

1 Ahene 18:12
Sɛ mifi w’anim kɔ a, nea ɛbɛba ne sɛ, Awurade honhom bɛfa wo akɔ baabi a minnim; nanso sɛ mekɔbɔ Ahab amanneɛ na wanhu wo a, okum na obekum me; w’akoa de, efi me mmofraase na masuro Awurade. 

1 Ahene 18:13
Wɔnkaa nea meyɛe nkyerɛɛ me wura bere a Yesebel kunkum Awurade adiyifo no anaa? Mede Awurade adiyifo no mu ɔha kohintaw ɔbodan mu, aduonum aduonum, na memaa wɔn aduan ne nsu daa. 

1 Ahene 18:14
Nanso wuse, ‘Kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ, “Mahu Elia.”’ Okum na obekum me.” 

1 Ahene 18:15
Ɛnna Elia kae sɛ: “Sɛ asafo Awurade a migyina n’anim no te ase yi, ɛnnɛ meyi me ho adi akyerɛ no.”

1 Ahene 18:16
Ɛnna Obadia kohyiaa Ahab ka kyerɛɛ no; na Ahab nso kohyiaa Elia.

1 Ahene 18:17
Ɛbae sɛ bere a Ahab huu Elia pɛ, Ahab ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wo a wode mmusu aba Israel so, wuni?”

1 Ahene 18:18
Ɛnna obuae sɛ: “Ɛnyɛ me na mede mmusu aba Israel so, ɛyɛ wo ne wo papa fiefo, efisɛ moagyaw Awurade mmara nsɛm akodi Baal anyame akyi. 

1 Ahene 18:19
Na afei soma ma wɔnkɔboaboa Israel nyinaa ano mmehyia me wɔ Bepɔw Karmel so, wɔne Baal adiyifo ahanan aduonum ne abosonnua ho adiyifo ahanan a wodidi Yesebel pon so no.” 

1 Ahene 18:2
Enti Elia kɔe sɛ ɔde ne ho rekɔkyerɛ Ahab bere a na ɔkɔm no mu ayɛ den wɔ Samaria no.

1 Ahene 18:20
Enti Ahab soma kɔɔ Israelfo nyinaa mu na wɔkɔboaboaa adiyifo no ano baa Bepɔw Karmel so.

1 Ahene 18:21
Ɛnna Elia twiw baa ɔman no nyinaa nkyɛn bɛkae sɛ: “Da bɛn na mubehinhim nsɛm abien ntam akosi? Sɛ Awurade ne Nyankopɔn a, munni n’akyi, na sɛ Baal nso a, munni n’akyi.” Na ɔman no amma no mmuae biara. 

1 Ahene 18:22
Na Elia toaa so ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Mene Awurade diyifo a waka, me nkutoo na maka, nanso Baal adiyifo yɛ ahanan aduonum. 

1 Ahene 18:23
Na afei momma wɔmma yɛn anantwinini nkumaa abien, na momma wɔmfa nantwi kumaa biako na wontwitwa mu asinasin ngu nnyina so, nanso wɔmmfa ogya nnto mu. Me nso mesiesie nantwi kumaa a aka no de agu nnyina so, nanso meremfa ogya nto mu. 

1 Ahene 18:24
Na mommɔ mo nyame din mfrɛ no, na me nso mɛbɔ Awurade din afrɛ no; Onyame a ɔde ogya begye so no, ɔno ne Nyankopɔn.” Ɛnna ɔman no nyinaa buae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ asɛmpa.”

1 Ahene 18:25
Afei Elia ka kyerɛɛ Baal adiyifo no sɛ: “Mompaw nantwinini kumaa biako mfa, na munni kan nsiesie, efisɛ mo na modɔɔso; mommɔ mo nyame din mfrɛ no, na mmom mommfa ogya nnto mu.” 

1 Ahene 18:26
Ɛnna wɔfaa nantwinini a ɔde maa wɔn no. Afei wosiesiei, na wɔbɔɔ Baal din frɛɛ no fi anɔpa kosii owigyinae sɛ: “O Baal, gye yɛn so!” Nanso wɔante nne bi, na obi nso annye so. Saa bere no nyinaa na wɔrehuruhuruw twa afɔremuka a wɔasi no ho hyia. 

1 Ahene 18:27
Eduu owigyinae no, Elia fii ase dii wɔn ho fɛw sɛ: “Monteɛteɛm denneennen, na ɔyɛ onyame; ebia na ɔredwen asɛm bi ho, anaa ebia ɔkɔ baabi so rekogya n’anan. Ebia na wada, na ɛsɛ sɛ onyan!” 

1 Ahene 18:28
Na wɔde nne kɛse teɛteɛɛm, na sɛnea wɔn amanne te no, wɔde asekan twitwaa wɔn ho de mpeaw wowɔɔ wɔn ho kosii sɛ mogya guu wɔn so. 

1 Ahene 18:29
Na ɛbae sɛ owigyinae twaam no, wɔtoaa so yeyɛe sɛ adiyifo kosii aduan afɔre bere, nanso wɔante nne bi, obiara annye so, na wɔante obiara nka.

1 Ahene 18:3
Saa bere no ara mu na Ahab frɛɛ Obadia a ɔyɛ ne fiepanyin no. Na Obadia yɛ obi a osuro Awurade yiye. 

1 Ahene 18:30
Afei Elia ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ: “Muntwiw mmɛn me.” Na ɔman no nyinaa twiw bɛn no. Ɛnna osiesiee Awurade afɔremuka a wɔabubu no no. 

1 Ahene 18:31
Enti Elia tasee abo dumien sɛnea Yakob mma mmusuakuw dodow te; ɔno na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wɔbɛfrɛ wo Israel.” 

1 Ahene 18:32
Na ɔde abo no sii afɔremuka Awurade din mu, na otwaa ɔkaa ne kɛse te sɛ asase a wobetumi agu aba susukora abien wɔ so wɔ afɔremuka no ho nyinaa hyiae. 

1 Ahene 18:33
Ɛno akyi no, ɔhyehyɛɛ nnyina no wɔ so, na otwitwaa nantwinini no mu asinasin de guu nnyina no so. Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Momfa nsu nhyehyɛ nhina akɛse anan amaama, na munhwie ngu ɔhyew afɔre ne nnyina no so.” 

1 Ahene 18:34
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Monsan nyɛ bio.” Na wɔsan yɛe bio. Na ɔsan kae sɛ: “Monyɛ no ne mprɛnsa so.” Na wɔyɛɛ no ne mprɛnsa so. 

1 Ahene 18:35
Enti nsu no fofaa afɔremuka no ho nyinaa hyiae, na ɔkano nso, ɔde nsu hyɛɛ no ma.

1 Ahene 18:36
Bere a aduan afɔre bere dui no, Elia twiw bɛn afɔremuka no, na ɔkae sɛ: “O Awurade, Abraham ne Isak ne Israel Nyankopɔn, ɛnnɛ ma wonhu sɛ wone Onyankopɔn wɔ Israel, na me nso meyɛ w’akoa, na w’asɛm so na menam ayɛ eyinom nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 18:37
Gye me so, O Awurade, gye me so, na ɔman yi nhu sɛ wo Awurade, wone Nyankopɔn, na wo na woasan adan wɔn koma aba.”

1 Ahene 18:38
Ɛnna Awurade gya tɔ fi soro bae, na ɛbɛhyew ɔhyew afɔre no ne nnyina no ne abo ne dɔte no, na ɛyow nsu a ɛwɔ ɔkano mu nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 18:39
Bere a ɔman no nyinaa hui no, ntɛm ara na wɔde wɔn anim butubutuw fam kae sɛ: “Awurade ne Nyankopɔn! Awurade ne Nyankopɔn!” 

1 Ahene 18:4
Enti bere a Yesebel kunkum Awurade adiyifo no, Obadia faa adiyifo no mu ɔha de wɔn kohintaw ɔbodan mu, aduonum aduonum, na ɔmaa wɔn aduan ne nsu. 

1 Ahene 18:40
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkyere Baal adiyifo no! Mommma wɔn mu biako mpo mmfi mo nsa!” Ɛhɔ ara na wɔkyeree wɔn, na Elia de wɔn sian kɔɔ Kison subon no ho kokunkum wɔn wɔ hɔ.

1 Ahene 18:41
Afei Elia ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: “Kɔ na kodidi na nom efisɛ mate osu kɛse nka.” 

1 Ahene 18:42
Na Ahab kodidi nomee. Elia de, ɔforo kɔɔ Karmel atifi de n’anim kobutuw fam na ɔde ne ti hyɛɛ ne nkotodwe ntam. 

1 Ahene 18:43
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, foro kɔhwɛ po fam.” Enti ɔkɔhwɛe, na ɔkae sɛ: “Manhu hwee.” Na ɔkaa no mpɛn ason kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “San kɔ.” 

1 Ahene 18:44
Ɛbae sɛ bere a ɔkɔɔ nea ɛto so ason no, ɔbɛkae sɛ: “Hwɛ! mihuu omununkum ketewa bi a ne kɛse te sɛ onipa nsam sɛ efi po mu reforo kɔ soro.” Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Foro kɔka kyerɛ Ahab sɛ, ‘Siesie wo teaseɛnam na sian kɔ, na osu anka wo anhyɛ ha!’” 

1 Ahene 18:45
Na omununkum maa wim yɛɛ tumm, na mframa bɔe na osu kɛse fii ase tɔe. Na Ahab de ne teaseɛnam no ani kyerɛɛ Yesreel. 

1 Ahene 18:46
Na Awurade nsa wɔ Elia so, enti ɔkyekyeree n’asen tuu mmirika kosian Ahab ho koduu Yesreel.

1 Ahene 18:5
Ahab ka kyerɛɛ Obadia sɛ: “Kɔhwehwɛ asase no so nsuti ne nsubon nyinaa ho. Ebia yebenya sare momono, na ama yɛatumi akora apɔnkɔ ne mfurumpɔnkɔ no nkwa so na mmoa no ansan anwuwu bio.” 

1 Ahene 18:6
Enti wɔkyɛɛ asase no mu ma obiara faa ne kwan. Ahab de n’ani kyerɛɛ baabi, na Obadia nso de n’ani kyerɛɛ baabi foforo.

1 Ahene 18:7
Bere a Obadia nam kwan so rekɔ no, ɔbɛhwɛ a Elia na ɔreba abehyia no yi. Ɛhɔ ara na ohui sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno, na ɔde n’anim butuw fam kae sɛ: “Me wura Elia ni anaa?” 

1 Ahene 18:8
Ɛnna obuae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ me. Kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ, ‘Mahu Elia.’” 

1 Ahene 18:9
Nanso obuae sɛ: “Bɔne bɛn na mayɛ a enti wopɛ sɛ wode w’akoa hyɛ Ahab nsa ma okum me? 

1 Ahene 19:1
 Na Ahab kaa nea Elia ayɛ nyinaa ne sɛnea ɔde nkrante akunkum adiyifo no nyinaa kyerɛɛ Yesebel. 

1 Ahene 19:10
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Ninkunu na matwe ama asafo Nyankopɔn Awurade, efisɛ Israelfo agyaw w’apam, w’afɔremuka nso, wɔadwiriw agu, wɔde nkrante akunkum w’adiyifo, na me nko na maka; na wɔrehwehwɛ me kra akum me.” 

1 Ahene 19:11
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Fi adi kogyina bepɔw no so Awurade anim.” Na hwɛ! Awurade twaam, na mframa kɛse a ano yɛ den paapaee mmepɔw na ɛbubuu abotan dii Awurade anim. Na Awurade nni mframa no mu. Mframa no akyi no, asase wosoe. Na Awurade nni asasewosow no mu.

1 Ahene 19:119
Ahene

1 Ahene 19:12
 Na asasewosow no akyi no, ogya bae. Na Awurade nni ogya no mu. Na ogya no akyi no, ɛnne a ɛwɔ fam kasae bɔkɔɔ. 

1 Ahene 19:13
Bere a Elia tee ɛnne no ara pɛ, ɔde ne ntama kataa n’anim, na ofii adi kogyinaa ɔbodan no ano; na hwɛ! ɔtee nne bi, na ɛkasa kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Elia, dɛn na woreyɛ wɔ ha?” 

1 Ahene 19:14
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Ninkunu na matwe ama asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, efisɛ Israelfo agyaw w’apam, w’afɔremuka nso, wɔadwiriw agu, wɔde nkrante akunkum w’adiyifo, na me nko na maka; na wɔrehwehwɛ me kra akum me.”

1 Ahene 19:15
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “San sim kɔ Damasko sare so; kɔ na kɔsra Hasael na si no Siria so hene. 

1 Ahene 19:16
Nimsi ba Yehu nso, sra no na si no Israel so hene; na sra Safat ba Elisa a ofi Abel-Mehola no na yɛ no odiyifo ma onsi w’ananmu. 

1 Ahene 19:17
Na ɛbɛba sɛ nea obeguan Hasael nkrante ano no, Yehu bekum no, na nea obeguan Yehu nkrante ano nso, Elisa bekum no. 

1 Ahene 19:18
Na mama nnipa mpemnson aka Israel a wommuu nkotodwe nkotow Baal, na wɔmfew n’ano.”

1 Ahene 19:19
Enti ofii hɔ kɔe, na okohuu Safat ba Elisa sɛ ɔrefɛtɛw asase, na anantwi mpamho dumien di n’anim, na ɔne nea ɛto so dumien no na ɛnam. Ɛnna Elia kɔɔ ne nkyɛn de n’atade koguu ne so. 

1 Ahene 19:2
Ɛnna Yesebel tuu ɔbɔfo kɔka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: “Sɛ ebedu ɔkyena sesɛɛ na memmaa wo kra nyɛɛ sɛ wɔn mu biako kra a, anyame no ntua me ka na wɔmfa bi nka ho!” 

1 Ahene 19:20
Ɛhɔ ara na ogyaw anantwi no hɔ tuu mmirika dii Elia akyi kae sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, ma minkofifew me papa ne me maame ano mfa nkra wɔn ansa na mabedi w’akyi.” Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Kɔ bra; masiw wo kwan anaa?” 

1 Ahene 19:21
Enti ɔsan fii n’akyi, na ɔfaa anantwi no abien kum wɔn, na ɔde nnua a na esuso anantwi no mu yɛɛ nnyina noaa wɔn nam, na ɔde maa nkurɔfo no ma wodii. Ɛno akyi no, ɔsɔre kodii Elia akyi, na ɔsom no.

1 Ahene 19:3
Enti ohuu saa no, ehu kaa no. Enti ɔsɔre guan de peree ne kra, na okopuee Beer-Seba a ɛwɔ Yuda asase so. Ɛnna ogyaw ne somfo no wɔ hɔ. 

1 Ahene 19:4
Na ɔde n’ani kyerɛɛ sare so twaa da koro kwan, na ɔkɔtenaa sisia dua bi ase. Afei ɔsrɛe sɛ ne kra nwu, na ɔkae sɛ: “Afei de, ɛdɔɔso! O Awurade, gye me kra fi me nsam, na minye mensen m’agyanom.”

1 Ahene 19:5
Afei ɔde ne ho too fam, na ɔfaa mu dae wɔ sisia no ase. Na hwɛ! ɔbɔfo bi bɛkaa no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɔre didi.” 

1 Ahene 19:6
Ɔnkɔhwɛ a, paanoo na egu abo hyehyeehye so na nsutoa nso wɔ n’atifi yi. Na odidi nomee, na ɛno akyi no, ɔsan dan ne ho too hɔ. 

1 Ahene 19:7
Akyiri yi, Awurade bɔfo no san bae ne mprenu so bɛkaa no kae sɛ: “Sɔre didi, na akwantu no ware papa ma wo.” 

1 Ahene 19:8
Enti ɔsɔre didi nomee, na ɔde ahoɔden a onya fii aduan no mu twaa kwan adaduanan, awia ne anadwo; ɔkɔe ara koduu Nyankopɔn bepɔw, Horeb so.

1 Ahene 19:9
Ɛhɔ na ɔkɔhyɛn ɔbodan bi mu sɛ ɔbɛda hɔ anadwo no; na hwɛ! Awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn wɔ hɔ, na obisaa no sɛ: “Elia, dɛn na woreyɛ wɔ ha?” 

1 Ahene 2:1
Na Dawid nna bɛnee sɛ owu, na ɔhyɛɛ ne ba Solomon sɛ: 

1 Ahene 2:10
Afei Dawid ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no Dawid Kurow mu. 

1 Ahene 2:11
Nna a Dawid de dii Israel so hene no si mfe aduanan. Ɔtenaa Hebron dii ade mfe ason, na ɔtenaa Yerusalem nso dii ade mfe aduasa abiɛsa.

1 Ahene 2:12
 Enti Solomon na ɔtenaa n'agya Dawid ahengua so, na n’ahenni tim pintinn.

1 Ahene 2:12
Ahene

1 Ahene 2:13
Na Hagit ba Adoniya baa Solomon maame Bat-Seba nkyɛn. Ɛnna maame no bisaa no sɛ: “Asomdwoe so na woreba anaa?” Na obuae sɛ: “Asomdwoe so.” 

1 Ahene 2:14
Na ɔtoaa so kae sɛ: “Mede abisade bi rebɛto w’anim.” Ɛnna maame no kae sɛ: “Kasa.” 

1 Ahene 2:15
Na ɔno nso kae sɛ: “Wo ara wunim sɛ me na anka ɛsɛ sɛ ahenni no ba me nsam, na me na na Israel nyinaa ani da so sɛ mɛyɛ ɔhene; nanso ahenni no dan kodii me nua no nsam, na Awurade na ɔma ekodii ne nsam. 

1 Ahene 2:16
Na afei mede abisade bi rebɛto w’anim. Mmɔ m’asɛm no ngu.” Ɛnna maame no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Kasa.” 

1 Ahene 2:17
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, kɔka kyerɛ Ɔhene Solomon sɛ ɔmfa Sunamni Abisag mma me nware. Minim sɛ wo de, ɔremmɔ w’asɛm ngu.” 

1 Ahene 2:18
Ɛnna Bat-Seba kae sɛ: “Yoo, asɛmpa! Mɛkɔ na me ne ɔhene akɔkasa ama wo.”

1 Ahene 2:19
Enti Bat-Seba kɔɔ Ɔhene Solomon nkyɛn sɛ ɔrekɔka Adoniya asɛm no akyerɛ no. Ntɛm ara na ɔhene sɔre kohyiaa no, na ɔhene bɔɔ ne mu ase maa no. Afei ɔkɔtenaa n’ahengua so, na ɔhene ma wɔde akongua besii hɔ maa ne maame ma ɔtenaa ne nifa so. 

1 Ahene 2:2
“Merekɔ asase sofo nyinaa kwan, enti yɛ den na yɛ ɔbarima. 

1 Ahene 2:20
Ɛnna ne maame kae sɛ: “Abisade ketewa bi na mede rebɛto w’anim. Mmɔ m’asɛm no ngu.” Enti ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Awo, kasa na meremmɔ w’asɛm ngu.” 

1 Ahene 2:21
Na ne maame toaa so sɛ: “Fa Sunemni Abisag ma wo nua Adoniya aware.” 

1 Ahene 2:22
Ɛhɔ ara na Ɔhene Solomon ka kyerɛɛ ne maame sɛ: “Adɛn nti na worebisa Sunemni Abisag ama Adoniya? Ɛnde bisa ahenni no nso ma no ɛ, efisɛ ɔyɛ me nua panyin; bisa ma ɔne ɔsɔfo Abiatar ne Seruia ba Yoab.”

1 Ahene 2:23
Ɛnna Ɔhene Solomon kaa Awurade ntam sɛ: “Sɛ mamma Adoniya amfa ne kra antwa asɛm a waka yi so a, ɛnde Onyankopɔn ntua me ka na ɔnsan mfa bi nka ho. 

1 Ahene 2:24
Na sɛ Awurade a wama m’ase atim na wama meda so te me papa Dawid ahengua so, na wama manya ofie sɛnea ɔkae no, te ase yi, ɛnnɛ Adoniya bewu.” 

1 Ahene 2:25
Ɛhɔ ara na Ɔhene Solomon somaa Yehoiada ba Benaia ma ɔkɔtow hyɛɛ no so kum no.

1 Ahene 2:26
Na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ ɔsɔfo Abiatar sɛ: “Kɔ w’asase so wɔ Anatot! Wofata owu, nanso ɛnnɛ merenkum wo, efisɛ wosoaa Awurade Nyankopɔn adaka no me papa Dawid anim, na me papa amanehunu nyinaa mu no, wuhuu amane bi.” 

1 Ahene 2:27
Enti Solomon pam Abiatar sɛ onnni Awurade sɔfo bio na ɛmaa Awurade asɛm a ɔka tiaa Eli fie wɔ Silo no baa mu.

1 Ahene 2:28
Yoab tee asɛm no, na Yoab guan kɔɔ Awurade ntamadan no mu kosoo afɔremuka ho mmɛn no mu denneennen—efisɛ Yoab ankɔ Absalom afa de, nanso okodii Adoniya akyi. 

1 Ahene 2:29
Ɛnna wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ Ɔhene Solomon sɛ: “Yoab aguan kɔ Awurade ntamadan no mu, na ɔwɔ afɔremuka no ho.” Enti Solomon somaa Yehoiada ba Benaia, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Kɔ, kɔtow hyɛ no so kum no!” 

1 Ahene 2:3
Di Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛde so na nantew n’akwan so. Di n’ahyɛde ne ne mmara nsɛm ne n’atemmusɛm ne n’adansesɛm so sɛnea wɔakyerɛw Mose mmara no mu no, na ama woadi yiye biribiara a wobɛyɛ mu ne baabiara a wobɛkɔ; 

1 Ahene 2:30
Ɛnna Benaia kɔɔ Awurade ntamadan no mu kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea ɔhene aka ni, ‘Fi adi’” Nanso obuaa no sɛ: “Dabi! Na ɛha ara na mewu mada.” Ɛnna Benaia bɛbɔɔ ɔhene amanneɛ sɛ: “Nea Yoab aka ni, na sɛɛ na obuaa me.” 

1 Ahene 2:31
Ɛnna ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Yɛ sɛnea waka no ara na tow hyɛ no so kum no, na munsie no na munyi mogya a Yoab hwie gui kwa no mfi me so ne m'agya fie so. 

1 Ahene 2:32
N’ankasa mogya na Awurade de begu n’atifi, efisɛ ɔde nkrante kum mmarima baanu a wɔteɛ na woye sen no a na me papa Dawid nnim ho hwee; okum Ner ba Abner, Israel sahene no ne Yeter ba Amasa, Yuda sahene no. 

1 Ahene 2:33
Na wɔn mogya mmra Yoab ne n’asefo atifi nkosi daa; Dawid ne n’asefo ne ne fie ne n’ahengua de, Awurade bɛma wɔanya asomdwoe daa.” 

1 Ahene 2:34
Ɛnna Yehoiada ba Benaia foro kɔe, na ɔkɔtow hyɛɛ no so kum no, na wosiee no ne fie nkyɛn wɔ sare so. 

1 Ahene 2:35
Afei ɔhene de Yehoiada ba Benaia sii n’ananmu wɔ asraafo no so, na ɔsɔfo Sadok nso, ɔhene de no sii Abiatar ananmu.

1 Ahene 2:36
Ɛnna ɔhene soma kɔfrɛɛ Simei bae, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Si ofie wɔ Yerusalem fa, na ɛhɔ ara na tena. Mfi hɔ nkɔ baabiara. 

1 Ahene 2:37
Na ɛda a wubefi adi akotwa Kidron subon no, hu sɛ owu na wubewu. Mogya ho afɔdi begu wo ara w’atifi.” 

1 Ahene 2:38
Ɛnna Simei ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Wonkaa bɔne. Sɛnea me wura ɔhene aka no, saa na w’akoa bɛyɛ.” Na Simei tenaa Yerusalem nna pii.

1 Ahene 2:39
Na ɛbae sɛ mfe abiɛsa akyi no, Simei nkoa baanu guan kɔɔ Maaka ba Akis, Gat hene no nkyɛn. Ɛnna nkurɔfo bɛka kyerɛɛ Simei sɛ: “Hwɛ, wo nkoa no wɔ Gat.” 

1 Ahene 2:4
ɛno na Awurade bɛma asɛm a ɔka faa me ho yi aba mu sɛ, ‘Sɛ wo mma bɛhwɛ wɔn akwan yiye na wɔde wɔn koma nyinaa ne wɔn kra nyinaa anantew m’anim nokware mu a, obusuani a ɔbɛtena Israel ahengua so remmɔ wo.’

1 Ahene 2:40
Ntɛm ara na Simei sɔre hyehyɛɛ n’afurum, na ɔkɔɔ Akis nkyɛn wɔ Gat kɔhwehwɛɛ ne nkoa no, na Simei de ne nkoa no fi Gat bae. 

1 Ahene 2:41
Ɛnna wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Solomon sɛ: “Simei afi Yerusalem akɔ Gat aba.” 

1 Ahene 2:42
Ɛhɔ ara na ɔhene soma kɔfrɛɛ Simei, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mamma woanka Awurade ntam, na mammɔ wo kɔkɔ sɛ, ‘Ɛda a wubefi adi akɔ baabi no, owu na wubewu,’ na wo nso woanka ankyerɛ me sɛ: ‘Asɛm a woaka yi de, wonkaa bɔne, mate’? 

1 Ahene 2:43
Adɛn nti na woanni Awurade ntam ne mmara a mehyɛɛ wo no so?” 

1 Ahene 2:44
Enti ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ Simei sɛ: “Wo ara wunim adebɔne a wo koma nim sɛ wode yɛɛ me papa Dawid no nyinaa; Awurade bɛdan wo bɔne no agu wo ara w’atifi. 

1 Ahene 2:45
Na Ɔhene Solomon de, wobehyira no, na Dawid ahengua nso betim Awurade anim daa.” 

1 Ahene 2:46
Ɛnna ɔhene hyɛ maa Yehoiada ba Benaia kɔtow hyɛɛ no so kum no.

1 Ahene 2:5
“Wo ara wunim nea Seruia ba Yoab de yɛɛ me, sɛ okum Israel asahene baanu, Ner ba Abner ne Yeter ba Amasa; ɔkaa ɔsa mu mogya gui asomdwoe bere mu, na ɔde ɔsa mu mogya kekaa abɔso a ɛbɔ n’asen ne mpaboa a ɛhyɛ ne nan no ho. 

1 Ahene 2:6
Fa wo nyansa no yɛ adwuma, na mma ɔmmfa ne ti so dwen nnkɔ asaman asomdwoe mu.

1 Ahene 2:7
“Na Gileadni Basilai mma no, yɛ wɔn adɔe, na fa wɔn ka wɔn a wodidi wo pon so no ho, efisɛ wɔbaa me nkyɛn bɛboaa me bere a miguan fii wo nua Absalom anim no.

1 Ahene 2:8
“Na Benyaminni Gera ba Simei a ofi Bahurim no te wo nkyɛn ha yi ara; ɔno na ɔdomee me yayaayaw da a merekɔ Mahanaim no, nanso osian behyiaa me Yordan ho, na mekaa no Awurade ntam sɛ, ‘Meremfa nkrante nkum wo.’ 

1 Ahene 2:9
Mma ɔmmfa ne ho nnni. Woyɛ ɔbarima nyansafo, na wunim nea ɛsɛ sɛ wode yɛ no; mogya mu na ma ne ti so dwen nsian nkɔ asaman.”

1 Ahene 20:1
Ɛnna Siria hene Ben-Hadad boaboaa n’asraafodɔm nyinaa ano; na ahene aduasa abien ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam ka ne ho, na obetwaa Samaria ho hyiae sɛ ɔne wɔn rebɛko. 

1 Ahene 20:10
Ben-Hadad soma kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ mfutuma a ɛbɛka Samaria no betumi ayɛ m’akyidifo nyinaa nsa amaama a, anyame no ntua me ka na wɔmfa bi nka ho!” 

1 Ahene 20:11
Ɛnna Israel hene nso buae sɛ: “Monkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Mma nea ɔhyɛ akotade nnhoahoa ne ho sɛ nea ɔreyi agu hɔ.’” 

1 Ahene 20:12
Bere a ɔtee asɛm yi no, na ɔne ahene no renom nsawɔ asese ase, ɛhɔ ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: “Mommoaboa mo ho!” Na wofii ase boaboaa wɔn ho sɛ wɔrekɔ kurow no so.

1 Ahene 20:120
Ahene

1 Ahene 20:13
Na hwɛ! odiyifo bi baa Israel hene Ahab nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘Woahu dɔm kɛse yi nyinaa? Hwɛ, ɛnnɛ mede wɔn bɛhyɛ wo nsa na woahu sɛ mene Awurade.’” 

1 Ahene 20:14
Ɛnna Ahab bisae sɛ: “Ɛnam hena so?” na obuae sɛ: “Nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Ɛnam amankuw mmapɔmma no mmerante no so.’” Na ɔhene san bisae sɛ: “Hena na obebue ɔko no ano?” na obuae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ wo!”

1 Ahene 20:15
Ɛnna ɔkan amankuw mmapɔmma no mmerante no; na wɔn dodow sii ahanu aduasa abien. Ɛno akyi no, ɔkan Israel nyinaa mu nnipa a wɔkɔ ɔsa; wɔn dodow sii mpemnson. 

1 Ahene 20:16
Afei wofii adi kɔe owigyinae. Na Ben-Hadad awe nsa abow wɔ asese no mu, ɔne ahene no, ahene aduasa abien a wɔka ne ho wɔboa no no. 

1 Ahene 20:17
Bere a amansini mmapɔmma no mmerante no dii kan fii adi no, ɛhɔ ara na Ben-Hadad soma kɔɔ hɔ, na wɔbɛbɔɔ no amanneɛ sɛ: “Mmarima bi fi Samaria reba.” 

1 Ahene 20:18
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Sɛ asomdwoe mu mpo na wɔbae a, monkyere wɔn anikan, na sɛ ɔko nso nti na wɔbae a, anikan ara na monkyere wɔn.” 

1 Ahene 20:19
Eyinom na wofii adi fii kurow no mu bae, amansini mmapɔmma no mmerante no ne asraafo a wodi wɔn akyi no. 

1 Ahene 20:2
Afei otuu abɔfo kɔɔ Israel hene Ahab nkyɛn wɔ kurow no mu kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Ben-Hadad se ni, 

1 Ahene 20:20
Na obiara bobɔɔ onipa a ofii adi behyiaa no no, na Siriafo guanee, na Israelfo tiw wɔn. Siria hene Ben-Hadad de, ɔtenaa ɔpɔnkɔ so ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo guanee. 

1 Ahene 20:21
Na Israel hene fii adi kɔbobɔɔ apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam no, na ɔde okunkɛse kunkum Siriafo no.

1 Ahene 20:22
Akyiri yi, odiyifo no kɔɔ Israel hene nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Kɔ na kɔhyɛ wo ho den, na hu nea wobɛyɛ efisɛ sɛ afe kɔ behyia a, Siria hene bɛba wo so.”

1 Ahene 20:23
Siria hene nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wɔn Nyankopɔn yɛ mmepɔw Nyankopɔn. Ɛno nti na wɔn ho yɛɛ den sen yɛn no. Enti ma yɛne wɔn nkɔko wɔ asase a ɛda fam so, na hwɛ sɛ yɛn ho renyɛ den nsen wɔn anaa. 

1 Ahene 20:24
Na eyi na yɛ: Yiyi ahene no nyinaa fi mu, na fa amradofo sisi wɔn ananmu. 

1 Ahene 20:25
Afei kan asraafodɔm a wɔn dodow te sɛ asraafodɔm a wohweree wɔn no, na apɔnkɔ nhyɛ apɔnkɔ ananmu na nteaseɛnam nhyɛ nteaseɛnam ananmu na yɛne wɔn nkɔko wɔ asase a ɛda fam so, na hwɛ sɛ yɛn ho renyɛ den nsen wɔn anaa.” Enti otiee wɔn nne, na ɔyɛɛ saa.

1 Ahene 20:26
Na afe kɔ behyiae no, Ben-Hadad boaboaa Siriafo ano, na wosiim kɔɔ Afek sɛ wɔne Israel rekɔko. 

1 Ahene 20:27
 Na wɔboaboaa Israelfo nso ano, na wɔmaa wɔn nea wohia, na wofii adi sɛ wɔrekohyia wɔn; Israelfo bɔɔ nsra te sɛ nguankuw nketewa abien wɔ wɔn anim, nanso Siriafo no de, wɔhyɛɛ asase no so ma. 

1 Ahene 20:28
Ɛnna Nyankopɔn nipa no bɛn Israel hene bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Esiane sɛ Siriafo aka sɛ: “Awurade yɛ mmepɔw Nyankopɔn na ɔnyɛ asase a ɛda fam Nyankopɔn” nti, mede dɔm kɛse yi nyinaa bɛhyɛ wo nsa na moahu sɛ mene Awurade.’”

1 Ahene 20:29
Na wɔbɔɔ nsra nnanson; eyinom anim kyerɛ eyinom anim. Da a ɛto so ason no, ɔko no fii ase, na da koro, Israelfo kunkum Siriafo mmarima mpem ɔha a wɔnam fam. 

1 Ahene 20:3
‘Wo dwetɛ ne wo sika yɛ me dea, na wo yerenom ne wo mma a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ nso yɛ me dea.’” 

1 Ahene 20:30
 Nanso wɔn a wɔkae no guan kɔɔ Afek kurow no mu; ɛnna ɔfasu no bu guu mmarima mpem aduonu ason a wɔkae no so. Ben-Hadad de, oguanee, na ɔkɔhyɛɛ pia mu wɔ kurow no mu.

1 Ahene 20:31
Ɛnna ne nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Yɛate sɛ Israel fie ahene yɛ ahene a wɔyɛ adɔe. Enti yɛsrɛ wo, ma yɛmfa atweaatam mmobɔ yɛn asen na yɛmfa nhama mmobɔ yɛn ti nkɔ Israel hene nkyɛn. Ebia ɔbɛkora wo kra so.” 

1 Ahene 20:32
Enti wɔfaa atweaatam bobɔɔ wɔn asen na wɔde nhama bobɔɔ wɔn ti kɔɔ Israel hene nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea w’akoa Ben-Hadad aka ni, ‘Mesrɛ wo, ma me kra ntena nkwa mu.’” Ɛnna obisaa wɔn sɛ: “Ɔda so te ase anaa? Me nua ne no.” 

1 Ahene 20:33
Ɛnna mmarima no faa no sɛ asɛmpa na ɛreba, na ɔno ara ne tirim asɛm na waka no, na wɔkae sɛ: “Ben-Hadad yɛ wo nua.” Na ɔno nso kae sɛ: “Monkɔfa no mmra.” Enti Ben-Hadad baa ne nkyɛn, na ntɛm ara ɔma ɔforo bɛtenaa teaseɛnam no mu.

1 Ahene 20:34
Ɛnna Ben-Hadad ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nkurow a me papa gye fii wo papa nsam no, mɛsan adan ama; paw mmorɔn wɔ Damasko fa sɛnea me papa nso paw bi fae wɔ Samaria no.”

1 Ahene 20:35
Na ɔbarima bi a ofi adiyifo no asefo mu nam Awurade asɛm so ka kyerɛɛ ne yɔnko sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, bɔ me.” Nanso ɔbarima no ammɔ no. 

1 Ahene 20:36
Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ woantie Awurade nne nti, bere a worefi me nkyɛn akɔ yi, gyata bekum wo.” Ɛno akyi no, ofii ne nkyɛn kɔe na okohyiaa gyata ma okum no.

1 Ahene 20:37
 Na okohuu ɔbarima foforo, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔno nso sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, bɔ me.” Ɛnna ɔbarima no bɔɔ no; ɔbɔɔ no piraa no.

1 Ahene 20:38
Afei odiyifo no kɔe kogyinaa kwan so twɛn ɔhene no, na ɔde biribi kataa n’anim. 

1 Ahene 20:39
Bere a ɔhene no rebetwam no, ɔfrɛɛ ɔhene kae sɛ: “W’akoa fi kɔɔ ɔko no mfinimfini; na hwɛ! na ɔbarima bi refi ɔko no mu akɔ, na ɔde obi bɛhyɛɛ me nsa ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Hwɛ ɔbarima yi so. Sɛ ɔyera a, wo kra besi ne kra ananmu, anyɛ saa a, wobɛkari dwetɛ dwetikɛse biako ahyɛ mu.’ 

1 Ahene 20:4
Ɛnna Israel hene buae sɛ: “Sɛnea woaka no, me wura ɔhene, me ne nea mewɔ nyinaa yɛ wo dea.”

1 Ahene 20:40
Ɛbae sɛ bere a w’akoa redi akɔneaba no, hwɛ, onipa no guanee.” Ɛnna Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Saa na w’atemmu bɛyɛ. Wo ara na woabua.” 

1 Ahene 20:41
Ntɛm ara na oyii ade no fii n’anim, na Israel hene huu onipa ko a ɔyɛ, sɛ ofi adiyifo no mu. 

1 Ahene 20:42
Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘Sɛ woama ɔbarima a makyerɛ sɛ wɔnsɛe no afi wo nsa nti, wo kra besi ne kra ananmu, na wo man besi ne man ananmu.’” 

1 Ahene 20:43
N’ano sii no, Israel hene de n’ani kyerɛɛ ne fie; na wayɛ mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ na wabotow, na ɔkɔɔ Samaria.

1 Ahene 20:5
Akyiri yi, abɔfo no san ba bɛkae sɛ: “Nea Ben-Hadad aka ni, ‘Mesoma baa wo nkyɛn sɛ: “Fa wo dwetɛ ne wo sika ne wo yerenom ne wo mma ma me. 

1 Ahene 20:6
Ɔkyena sesɛɛ nso, mɛsoma me nkoa aba wo nkyɛn, na wɔbɛhwehwɛ wo fie ne wo nkoa afie mu, na ɛbɛba sɛ ade biara a ɛyɛ fɛ w’ani so no, wɔbɛfa akura wɔn nsam de aba.”’”

1 Ahene 20:7
Ɛhɔ ara na Israel hene frɛɛ asase no so mpanyimfo nyinaa bɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ sɛ: “Mesrɛ mo, monhwɛ nhu sɛ mmusu na onipa yi rehwehwɛ; ɔsoma bɛka kyerɛɛ me sɛ memfa me yerenom ne me mma ne me dwetɛ ne me sika mma no, na mamfa ankame no.” 

1 Ahene 20:8
Ɛnna mpanyimfo no nyinaa ne ɔman no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ntie nea waka no, na mpene so.” 

1 Ahene 20:9
Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ Ben-Hadad abɔfo no sɛ: “Monkɔka nkyerɛ me wura ɔhene sɛ, ‘Nea wudii kan soma bɛka kyerɛɛ me no, mɛyɛ ne nyinaa, na eyi de, ɛnyɛ ade a metumi ayɛ.’” Ɛnna abɔfo no fii hɔ kɔe, na wɔkɔbɔɔ no amanneɛ.

1 Ahene 21:1
Na nsɛm yi akyi no, na Yesreelni Nabot wɔ bobeturo bi a ɛbɛn Samaria hene Ahab ahemfie wɔ Yesreel. 

1 Ahene 21:10
Afei momma mmarima ahuhufo baanu ntena n’anim na wonni adanse ntia no sɛ, ‘Woadome Onyankopɔn ne ɔhene!’ Afei momfa no mfi adi nkosiw no abo mma onwu.”

1 Ahene 21:11
Enti ne kuromfo no, mpanyimfo ne mmapɔmma a wɔwɔ ne kurom hɔ no yɛɛ nea Yesebel de nkra brɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ no, wɔyɛe sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ krataa a ɔde kɔmaa wɔn no mu pɛpɛɛpɛ.

1 Ahene 21:12
Wɔkae ma wodii mmuada, na wɔmaa Nabot tenaa nnipa no ti. 

1 Ahene 21:121
Ahene

1 Ahene 21:13
Mmarima ahuhufo baanu bɛtenaa n’anim, na mmarima ahuhufo no dii adanse tiaa no, kyerɛ sɛ, wodii adanse tiaa Nabot wɔ nnipa no anim sɛ: “Nabot adome Onyankopɔn ne ɔhene!” Afei wɔde no fii adi kɔɔ kurotia, na wokosiw no abo ma owui. 

1 Ahene 21:14
Ɛnna wɔsoma kɔka kyerɛɛ Yesebel sɛ: “Wɔasiw Nabot abo ma wawu.”

1 Ahene 21:15
Bere a Yesebel tee sɛ wɔasiw Nabot abo ma wawu no, ɛhɔ ara na Yesebel ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: “Sɔre kɔfa Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo a wamfa amma wo annye sika no, na Nabot nte nkwa mu bio, wawu.” 

1 Ahene 21:16
Bere a Ahab tee sɛ Nabot awu no, ntɛm ara na ɔsɔre kɔɔ Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo no mu sɛ ɔrekɔfa.

1 Ahene 21:17
Na Awurade asɛm baa Tisbini Elia nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 21:18
“Sɔre kohyia Israel hene Ahab a ɔwɔ Samaria no. Ɔwɔ Nabot bobeturo no mu, wakɔ hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔfa. 

1 Ahene 21:19
Kɔka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade se ni: “Woakum obi asan afa n’ade?”’ San ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade aka ni, “Faako a akraman taforoo Nabot mogya no, ɛhɔ ara na akraman bɛtaforo wo nso wo mogya.”’”

1 Ahene 21:2
Enti Ahab ka kyerɛɛ Nabot sɛ: “Fa wo bobeturo no ma me ɛ, na memfa nyɛ mfikyifuw, efisɛ ɛbɛn me fie; mɛma wo bobeturo a eye sen eyi de asi ananmu. Anaa wopɛ nso a, mɛma wo sika de atua ka.” 

1 Ahene 21:20
Ɛnna Ahab ka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: “Woahu me, O me tamfo?” na ɔno nso kae sɛ: “Mahu wo. ‘Esiane sɛ woatɔn wo ho sɛ wobɛyɛ Awurade ani so bɔne nti, 

1 Ahene 21:21
hwɛ, mede mmusu reba wo so; mɛpra w’akyi nyinaa akɔ, na matwa Ahab fie barima biara akyene, Israel nipahunu a onni ɔboafo anaa ɔdehye mpo. 

1 Ahene 21:22
Na mɛyɛ wo fie sɛ Nebat ba Yeroboam fie ne Ahiya ba Baasa fie, bɔne a woayɛ de ahyɛ me abufuw ne bɔne a woama Israel nso ayɛ nti.’ 

1 Ahene 21:23
Na Yesebel nso, nea Awurade aka wɔ ne ho ne sɛ, ‘Akraman na ebedi Yesebel nam wɔ Yesreel asase no so. 

1 Ahene 21:24
Ahab ho nipa biara a obewu wɔ kurow mu no, akraman na ebedi ne nam, na nea obewu wɔ wuram no, ewim nnomaa na ebedi ne nam. 

1 Ahene 21:25
 Ampa, obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛɛ n’ade sɛ Ahab a ɔtɔn ne ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, a ne yere Yesebel nso piapiaa no no. 

1 Ahene 21:26
Na ɔyɛɛ akyide a enye koraa kodii abosom fi akyi, sɛnea Amorifo a Awurade pam wɔn fii Israelfo anim nyinaa yɛe no.’”

1 Ahene 21:27
Bere a Ahab tee nsɛm yi no, ɛhɔ ara na osuan n’atade mu, na ɔde atweaatam kataa ne ho; odii mmuada na ɔdaa atweaatam mu na ɔnantew awerɛhow mu. 

1 Ahene 21:28
Ɛnna Awurade asɛm baa Tisbini Elia nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 21:29
“Woahu sɛnea me nti Ahab abrɛ ne ho ase no? Esiane sɛ wabrɛ ne ho ase m’anim nti, meremfa mmusu no mma wɔ ne nna mu. Ne ba nna mu na mede mmusu no bɛba ne fie.”

1 Ahene 21:3
Nanso Nabot ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: “Ɛmpare me sɛ megyina Awurade anim de m’agyanom agyapade ama wo.” 

1 Ahene 21:4
Ɛnna Ahab de awerɛhow baa ne fie mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ, asɛm a Yesreelni Nabot ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Meremfa m’agyanom agyapade mma wo” no nti. Na ɔbɛdaa ne mpa so dan n’ani, na wannidi.

1 Ahene 21:5
Ɛnna ne yere Yesebel baa ne nkyɛn bebisaa no sɛ: “Dɛn nti na wo honhom abotow na wunnidi yi?” 

1 Ahene 21:6
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ne yere sɛ: “Me ne Yesreelni Nabot kasae, na meka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Fa wo bobeturo no ma me, na memma wo sika mfa ntua ka. Anaa wopɛ nso a, ma memma wo bobeturo foforo nsi ananmu.’ Nanso ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Meremfa me bobeturo no mma wo.’” 

1 Ahene 21:7
Ɛnna ne yere Yesebel ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ɛnyɛ wo na wudi Israel so hene? Sɔre didi na ma wo koma ntɔ wo yam. Me ara mede Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo no bɛma wo.” 

1 Ahene 21:8
Enti ɔkyerɛw krataa wɔ Ahab din mu de ɔhene nsɔano sɔɔ ano, na ɔde krataa no kɔmomaa kurom hɔ mpanyimfo ne mmapɔmma a wɔne Nabot te no. 

1 Ahene 21:9
Nsɛm a ɔkyerɛw wɔ krataa no mu ne sɛ: “Monka mma wonni mmuada, na momma Nabot ntena nnipa no ti. 

1 Ahene 22:1
Na wɔtenaa hɔ mfe abiɛsa a akodi amma Siria ne Israel ntam. 

1 Ahene 22:10
Saa bere no, na Israel hene ne Yuda hene Yehosafat tete wɔn nhengua so hyehyɛ wɔn ntade wɔ Samaria kurow pon ano awiporowbea hɔ, na adiyifo no nyinaa gyinagyina wɔn anim hyehyɛɛ nkɔm. 

1 Ahene 22:11
Na Kenaana ba Sedekia yɛɛ dade mmɛn, na ɔkae sɛ: “Nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Eyi na wode bɛpempem Siriafo no de akosi sɛ wobɛtɔre wɔn ase.’” 

1 Ahene 22:12
Adiyifo nkae no nyinaa nso hyehyɛɛ nkɔm koro no ara sɛ: “Kɔ Ramot-Gilead so na kodi nkonim, na Awurade de wɔn bɛhyɛ ɔhene nsa.”

1 Ahene 22:122
Ahene

1 Ahene 22:13
Na nea wɔsomaa no sɛ ɔnkɔfrɛ Mikaia mmra no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Hwɛ! Adiyifo no nyinaa de anokoro aka asɛmpa akyerɛ ɔhene, enti ma w’asɛm nyɛ sɛ wɔn de no, na ka asɛmpa.” 

1 Ahene 22:14
Nanso Mikaia kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade te ase yi, nea Awurade bɛka akyerɛ me no, ɛno ara na me nso mɛka.” 

1 Ahene 22:15
Bere a obeduu ɔhene anim no, ɔhene bisaa no sɛ: “Mikaia, yɛne Ramot-Gilead nkɔko, anaa yennyae?” Ɛhɔ ara na obuaa ɔhene sɛ: “Monkɔ na munkodi nkonim, na Awurade de wɔn bɛhyɛ ɔhene nsa.” 

1 Ahene 22:16
Ɛnna ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mpɛn ahe na memma wonka ntam sɛ nokware nkutoo na ka wɔ Awurade din mu kyerɛ me?” 

1 Ahene 22:17
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Hwɛ, mihu Israel sɛ wɔabɔ wɔn nyinaa ahwete wɔ mmepɔw no so sɛ nguan a wonni ɔhwɛfo. Na Awurade aka sɛ: ‘Eyinom nni wura. Enti ma obiara nsan nkɔ ne fie asomdwoe mu.’”

1 Ahene 22:18
Ɛnna Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: “Ɛnyɛ asɛm a mekae no na ɛda hɔ yi, sɛ ‘ɔrenhyɛ me ho nkɔm pa bi, na mmom nkɔm bɔne’?”

1 Ahene 22:19
Na odiyifo no toaa so sɛ: “Enti tie nea Awurade wɔ ka: Mihu Awurade sɛ ɔte n’ahengua so a ɔsoro asafodɔm nyinaa gyinagyina ne nifa ne ne benkum. 

1 Ahene 22:2
Na ɛbae sɛ afe a ɛto so abiɛsa mu no, Yuda hene Yehosafat kɔɔ Israel hene nkyɛn. 

1 Ahene 22:20
Na Awurade bisae sɛ, ‘Hena na ɔbɛkɔ akɔdaadaa Ahab ma ɔne Ramot-Gilead akɔko na watɔ?’ Afei oyi ka sɛɛ, na oyi nso aka sɛɛ. 

1 Ahene 22:21
Akyiri yi, honhom bi fi begyinaa Awurade anim kae sɛ: ‘Me na mɛkɔ akɔdaadaa no.’ Ɛnna Awurade bisaa no sɛ, ‘Wobɛyɛ no dɛn?’ 

1 Ahene 22:22
Na ɔno nso buae sɛ, ‘Mɛkɔ akɔyɛ atoro honhom wɔ n’adiyifo no nyinaa anom.’ Ɛnna Onyankopɔn kae sɛ, ‘Wubetumi adaadaa no ampa, nea worekɔyɛ no, ɛbɛyɛ yiye. Enti kɔ na kɔyɛ saa.’ 

1 Ahene 22:23
Enti hu sɛ Awurade de atoro honhom na ahyɛ w’adiyifo yi nyinaa anom, nanso mmusu na Awurade aka afa wo ho.”

1 Ahene 22:24
Ɛnna Kenaana ba Sedekia twiw bɛn Mikaia bɛbɔɔ no sotɔre bisaa no sɛ: “Ɛhefa na Awurade honhom nam twaa me ho ne wo bɛkasae?” 

1 Ahene 22:25
Na Mikaia buaa no sɛ: “Ɛda a wobɛhyɛn pia mu akohintaw no na wubehu baabi a ɛnam bae.” 

1 Ahene 22:26
Ɛnna Israel hene no kae sɛ: “Momfa Mikaia nkɔma amrado Amon ne ɔhene ba Yoas. 

1 Ahene 22:27
Na monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: ‘Nea ɔhene aka ni: “Momfa saa akoa yi nto nneduadan mu, na momma no ahohia aduan nni ne ahohia nsu nnom nkosi sɛ mɛba asomdwoe mu.”’” 

1 Ahene 22:28
Ɛnna Mikaia kae sɛ: “Sɛ wosan ba asomdwoe mu paa a, ɛnde na ɛnyɛ Awurade na ɔne me kasae.” Na ɔka kaa ho sɛ: “Mo nyinaa nso muntie bi.”

1 Ahene 22:29
Na Israel hene ne Yuda hene Yehosafat kɔɔ Ramot-Gilead so. 

1 Ahene 22:3
Ɛnna Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: “Munnim sɛ Ramot-Gilead yɛ yɛn dea? Nanso yɛn de, yɛte hɔ komm na yennye mfii Siria hene nsam.” 

1 Ahene 22:30
Ɛnna Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: “Mɛsakra me ho akɔ akono, nanso wo de, hyɛ wo ntade.” Enti Israel hene sakraa ne ho na ɔkɔɔ akono hɔ. 

1 Ahene 22:31
Na Siria hene no ahyɛ ne nteaseɛnam so asahene aduasa abien no sɛ: “Mo ne akumaa anaa ɔkɛse nnko, Israel hene nko na momfa mo ani nsi no so.” 

1 Ahene 22:32
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a nteaseɛnam so asahene no huu Yehosafat pɛ, wɔkeka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ: “Ampa, Israel hene no ni.” Enti wɔkɔɔ no so sɛ wɔne no rekɔko. Ɛnna Yehosafat teɛteɛɛm hwehwɛɛ ɔboafo. 

1 Ahene 22:33
Enti bere a nteaseɛnam so asahene no hui sɛ ɛnyɛ Israel hene no, ntɛm ara na wogyaee n’akyi di.

1 Ahene 22:34
Na ɔbarima bi tow n’agyan a n’ani nna, na ɛkɔwɔɔ Israel hene no mmɔtoam ne nkataboɔ no ntam. Enti ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ ne teaseɛnam kafo no sɛ: “Dan wo ho na fa me fi akono ha kɔ, na wɔapira me pira bɔne.” 

1 Ahene 22:35
Ɔko no mu yɛɛ den saa da no, na wɔde ɔhene no gyinaa teaseɛnam no mu de n’ani kyerɛɛ Siriafo no, na eduu anwummere no na wawu; n’apirakuru no mogya nwini guu ɔko teaseɛnam no mu. 

1 Ahene 22:36
 Na wɔpae wɔ nsra no nyinaa mu owiatɔ bere sɛ: “Obiara nkɔ ne kurow mu, na obiara nkɔ n’asase so!” 

1 Ahene 22:37
Saa na ɛyɛe a ɔhene wui. Wɔde no baa Samaria, na wosiee ɔhene wɔ Samaria. 

1 Ahene 22:38
Na wɔkɔhohoroo teaseɛnam no mu wɔ Samaria abura no ho, na akraman bɛtaforoo ne mogya, nguaman nso guaree wɔ hɔ, sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔkae no kyerɛ.

1 Ahene 22:39
Ahab ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne asommɛn fie a osii, ne nkurow a ɔkyekyee nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 22:4
Na asɛm a obisaa Yehosafat ne sɛ: “Wo ne me bɛkɔ Ramot-Gilead so ne wɔn akɔko anaa?” Ɛnna Yehosafat ka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: “Me ne wo nyinaa yɛ onipa biako. Me man ne wo man nso yɛ biako. M’apɔnkɔ ne w’apɔnkɔ yɛ biako.”

1 Ahene 22:40
Na Ahab ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na ne ba Ahasia bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 22:41
Asa ba Yehosafat bedii Yuda so hene wɔ Israel hene Ahab afe a ɛto so anan mu. 

1 Ahene 22:42
Yehosafat bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduasa anum, na odii hene mfe aduonu anum wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Asuba a ɔyɛ Silhi babea. 

1 Ahene 22:43
Na ɔhene no nantew ne papa Asa akwan nyinaa so, na wamman amfi ho, na ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so. Gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no nko na amfi hɔ. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na wɔhyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ. 

1 Ahene 22:44
Na asomdwoe tenaa Yehosafat ne Israel hene ntam. 

1 Ahene 22:45
 Na Yehosafat ho nsɛm a aka, ne nnwuma akɛse ne n’akodi no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

1 Ahene 22:46
Asɔrefie mmarima nguaman a wɔkae wɔ ne papa Asa bere so no, otuu wɔn ase fii asase no so.

1 Ahene 22:47
Na ɔhene bi nni Edom; amrado na odii hene.

1 Ahene 22:48
Yehosafat yeyɛɛ Tarsis ahyɛn a ɔde bɛkɔ Ofir akɔfa sika kɔkɔɔ, nanso antumi ankɔ efisɛ ɛsɛesɛee wɔ Esion-Geber. 

1 Ahene 22:49
Ɛnna Ahab ba Ahasia ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: “Ma me nkoa mmɛka wo nkoa ho, ahyɛn no mu,” nanso Yehosafat ampene.

1 Ahene 22:5
Na Yehosafat san ka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: “Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, anka bisa Awurade anom asɛm ansa.” 

1 Ahene 22:50
Na Yehosafat ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ ne nana Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Yehoram bedii n’ade.

1 Ahene 22:51
Ahab ba Ahasia bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria, Yuda hene Yehosafat afe a ɛto so dunson mu, na odii Israel so mfe abien. 

1 Ahene 22:52
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na ɔfaa ne papa kwan so ne ne maame kwan so ne Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no kwan so. 

1 Ahene 22:53
Ɔsom Baal, na ɔsɔree no, na ɔhyɛɛ Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn abufuw sɛnea ne papa yɛe no ara.

1 Ahene 22:6
Ɛnna Israel hene boaboaa adiyifo no ano, mmarima bɛyɛ ahanan, na obisaa wɔn sɛ: “Me ne Ramot-Gilead nkɔko, anaa minnyae?” Na wɔkae sɛ: “Kɔ, na Awurade de wɔn bɛhyɛ ɔhene nsa.”

1 Ahene 22:7
Ɛnna Yehosafat bisae sɛ: “Awurade diyifo foforo biara nni hɔ bio anaa? Momma yɛmfa no so mmisa.” 

1 Ahene 22:8
Na Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: “Obiako da so wɔ hɔ a yebetumi afa no so abisa Awurade, nanso me de metan no, mempɛ n’asɛm koraa efisɛ ɔnhyɛɛ me ho nkɔm pa da, sɛ bɔne nko ara na ɔka. Ɔne Yimla ba Mikaia.” Nanso Yehosafat ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mma ɔhene nnka saa.”

1 Ahene 22:9
Ɛnna Israel hene frɛɛ ahemfie mpanyimfo no bi, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Kɔfa Yimla ba Mikaia bra ntɛm.” 

1 Ahene 3:1
Na Solomon ne Egypt hene Farao dii ayeware, na ɔkɔwaree Farao babea de no baa Dawid Kurow mu kosii sɛ owiee ɔno ara ne fie ne Awurade fie ne Yerusalem ho fasu no nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 3:10
Na asɛm no sɔɔ Awurade ani sɛ Solomon abisa eyi. 

1 Ahene 3:11
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ woabisa eyi, na woammisa nna dodow ne ahonyade amfa, anaa w’atamfo kra, na woabisa nhumu a wode bebu atɛn nti, 

1 Ahene 3:12
hwɛ! mɛyɛ nea woaka no. Hwɛ! mɛma wo nyansa ne ntease koma a obiara a odii w’anim annya bi da, na w’akyi nso, obiara rensɔre a ɔbɛyɛ sɛ wo. 

1 Ahene 3:13
Ahene

1 Ahene 3:13
Na nea woammisa, ahonyade ne anuonyam nso, mede bɛma wo; mɛma wo nea ɔhene biara a odii w’anim bae nnyaa bi da, wo nna nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 3:14
Na sɛ wonantew m’akwan so di m’ahyɛde ne me mmara nsɛm so sɛnea wo papa Dawid nantewee no a, me nso mɛma wo nna aware.”

1 Ahene 3:15
Bere a Solomon ani so tetew no no, ohui sɛ ɛyɛ ɔdae. Ɛnna ɔbaa Yerusalem begyinaa Awurade apam adaka no anim, na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre, na ɔtow pon maa ne nkoa nyinaa.

1 Ahene 3:16
Akyiri yi, mmea nguaman baanu bi baa ɔhene nkyɛn begyinaa n’anim. 

1 Ahene 3:17
Na ɔbea biako kae sɛ: “Me wura, mepa wo kyɛw, me ne ɔbea yi te ofie biako mu, na mewoe ɔba wɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ fie hɔ. 

1 Ahene 3:18
 Na mewoe akyi nnansa, ɔbea yi nso woe. Yɛn nyinaa wɔ faako, na ɔhɔho biara nka yɛn ho wɔ ofie hɔ. Yɛn baanu pɛ na yɛwɔ ofie hɔ. 

1 Ahene 3:19
Akyiri yi, ɔbea yi daa ne ba so anadwo ma owui. 

1 Ahene 3:2
Sorɔnsorɔmmea ara na ɔman no bɔɔ afɔre, efisɛ ebesi saa bere no, na wonsii ofie mmaa Awurade din. 

1 Ahene 3:20
Bere a w’afenaa ada a me ba no da me nkyɛn no, ɔsɔree anadwo dasum bɛfaa me ba no me nkyɛn de no kɔtoo ne nkyɛn, na ɔde ne ba a wawu no bɛtoo me nkyɛn. 

1 Ahene 3:21
Mesɔree anɔpa sɛ merema me ba no nufu, mehwɛe no, na wawu. Bere a mehwɛɛ no yiye anɔpa no, mihui sɛ ɔnyɛ me ba a mewoe no.” 

1 Ahene 3:22
Ɛnna ɔbea biako no kae sɛ: “Woboa, me ba na ɔte ase no, wo ba ne nea wawu no!” Saa bere no nyinaa nea na ɔbea biako no ka ara ne sɛ: “Woboa, wo ba ne nea wawu no, me ba na ɔte ase no.” Na wɔkasakasae wɔ ɔhene anim.

1 Ahene 3:23
Ɛnna ɔhene kae sɛ: “Oyi se, ‘Me ba na ɔte ase yi, wo ba ne nea wawu no!’ na oyi nso se, ‘Woboa, wo ba ne nea wawu no, me ba na ɔte ase no!’” 

1 Ahene 3:24
Afei ɔhene kae sɛ: “Momfa nkrante mmrɛ me.” Ɛnna wɔde nkrante baa ɔhene anim. 

1 Ahene 3:25
Na ɔhene kae sɛ: “Mompae abofra a ɔte ase no mu abien, na momfa ɔfa mma mmea no biako, na momfa ɔfa a aka nso mma ɔfoforo no.” 

1 Ahene 3:26
Esiane sɛ ɔbea a ne ba ne abofra a ɔte ase no yam hyehyee no ne ba no ho nti, ɛhɔ ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Me wura, mepa wo kyɛw! Momfa abofra a ɔte ase no mma no. Munnkum no.” Ɔbea biako no de, saa bere no nyinaa nea na ɔreka ara ne sɛ: “Ɛbɛbɔ me ne wo nyinaa. Mompae ne mu!” 

1 Ahene 3:27
Ɛnna ɔhene kae sɛ: “Momfa abofra a ɔte ase no mma no. Munnkum no. Ne maame ne no.”

1 Ahene 3:28
Israel nyinaa tee atɛn a ɔhene abu no, na wosuroo ɔhene efisɛ wohui sɛ Onyankopɔn nyansa wɔ ne mu a ɔde bu atɛn.

1 Ahene 3:3
Na Solomon kɔɔ so dɔɔ Awurade, na ɔnantew ne papa Dawid ahyɛde mu. Sorɔnsorɔmmea ara na ɔbɔɔ afɔre ne ɔhyew afɔre daa.

1 Ahene 3:4
Ɛnna ɔhene kɔɔ Gibeon kɔbɔɔ afɔre wɔ hɔ efisɛ ɛhɔ ne sorɔnsorɔmmea kɛse no. Solomon de mmoa apem na ɛbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre wɔ afɔremuka no so. 

1 Ahene 3:5
Awurade yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ Solomon dae mu anadwo wɔ Gibeon, na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Bisa me nea menyɛ mma wo.” 

1 Ahene 3:6
Ɛnna Solomon kae sɛ: “Wo na woyɛɛ me papa, w’akoa Dawid adɔe kɛse, sɛnea ɔde nokwaredi ne trenee ne koma a edi mu nantew w’anim no, na wodaa adɔe kɛse yi adi kyerɛɛ no daa; woama wanya ɔba ma wabɛtena n’ahengua so ɛnnɛ da yi. 

1 Ahene 3:7
Na afei Awurade me Nyankopɔn, wo na woasi w’akoa hene de no asi me papa Dawid ananmu, nanso me de, meyɛ abofra koraa. Minnim sɛnea mefi adi na maba mu. 

1 Ahene 3:8
Na w’akoa wɔ wo man a woapaw wɔn no mu, ɔman a wɔdɔɔso na wɔn dodow nti, wontumi nkan wɔn na wontumi mmu wɔn ano. 

1 Ahene 3:9
Na ma w’akoa ahobrɛase koma a ɔde bebu wo man atɛn, de ahu papa ne bɔne mu; hena na obetumi abu wo man duruduru yi atɛn?”

1 Ahene 4:1
Ɔhene Solomon kɔɔ so dii Israel nyinaa so hene. 

1 Ahene 4:10
Hesed ba, onyaa Arubot na Soko ne Hefer asase nyinaa nso hyɛ ne nsa; 

1 Ahene 4:11
Abinadab ba, onyaa Dor bepɔw so nkurow nyinaa ɔwaree Solomon babea Tafat; 

1 Ahene 4:12
Ahilud ba Baana, onyaa Taanak ne Megido ne Bet-Sean nyinaa, baabi a ɛbɛn Saretan a ɛwɔ Yesreel ase no, efi Bet-Sean kosi Abel-Mehola kosi Yokmeam mpɔtam; 

1 Ahene 4:13
Geber ba, onyaa Ramot-Gilead na Manase ba Yair nkuraa-nkuraa a ɛwowɔ Gilead no hyɛ ne nsa; na Argob a ɛwɔ Basan no nso hyɛ ne nsa: nkurow akɛse aduosia a ɛwɔ ɔfasu ne kɔbere mmeamu;

1 Ahene 4:14
Ahene

1 Ahene 4:14
Ido ba Ahinadab, onyaa Mahanaim; 

1 Ahene 4:15
Ahimaas, onyaa Naftali ɔno nso waree Solomon babea Basemat; 

1 Ahene 4:16
Husai ba Baana, onyaa Aser ne Bealot; 

1 Ahene 4:17
Parua ba Yehosafat, onyaa Isakar; 

1 Ahene 4:18
Ela ba Simei, onyaa Benyamin; 

1 Ahene 4:19
Uri ba Geber, onyaa Gilead asase, Amorifo hene Sihon asase, ne Basan hene Og de; okunini biako na na ɔda akunini a wɔaka no nyinaa ano wɔ asase no so.

1 Ahene 4:2
Na ne mpanyimfo din na edidi so yi: na Sadok ba Asaria ne ɔsɔfo; 

1 Ahene 4:20
Na Yuda ne Israel dɔɔso, wɔn dodow te sɛ mpoano anhwea; wodidi nomee, na wodii ahurusi.

1 Ahene 4:21
Solomon dii ahenni nyinaa so, efi asubɔnten kɛse no ho kosi Filistifo asase so ne Egypt hye so. Nkurɔfo de akyɛde brɛɛ Solomon, na wɔsom no ne nkwa nna nyinaa.

1 Ahene 4:22
Na Solomon fie da koro aduan yɛ esiam muhumuhu susukoraa aduasa ne esiam foforo biara susukoraa aduosia, 

1 Ahene 4:23
anantwi akɛse du ne anantwi a wɔkɔ adidi aduonu ne nguan ɔha, aforote ne adowa ne awansan ne nnomaa a wɔadɔ da nkyɛn. 

1 Ahene 4:24
Na odii biribiara a ɛwɔ asubɔnten kɛse no fa ha so, efi Tifsa kosi Gasa, ne ahene a wɔwɔ asubɔnten kɛse no fa ha nyinaa; onyaa asomdwoe n’ahenni nyinaa mu wɔ afa nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 4:25
Na Solomon nna nyinaa mu no, Yuda ne Israel tenaa hɔ dwoodwoo, obiara tenaa ne bobe ne ne borɔdɔma ase, efi Dan kosi Beer-Seba.

1 Ahene 4:26
Na Solomon nyaa apɔnkɔdan mpem aduanan maa ne nteaseɛnam, ne apɔnkɔsotefo mpem dumien.

1 Ahene 4:27
Na akunini yi maa Ɔhene Solomon ne obiara a ɔtena Ɔhene Solomon pon ho aduan, obiara ne ɔsram a ɔde ne de ba. Wɔamma biribiara anka mu. 

1 Ahene 4:28
Na wɔde atoko ne sare brɛɛ apɔnkɔ no ne apɔnkɔ a wɔn ho yɛ hare no; wɔde kɔɔ baabiara a ehia, sɛnea obiara adwuma te.

1 Ahene 4:29
Na Onyankopɔn kɔɔ so maa Solomon nyansa ne ntease pii ne nhumu koma sɛ mpoano anhwea.

1 Ahene 4:3
 Na Sisa mma Elihoref ne Ahiya yɛ akyerɛwfo; Ahilud ba Yehosafat ne ɔhene krakye; 

1 Ahene 4:30
Na Solomon nyansa dɔɔso sen Apuei Famfo nyinaa nyansa ne Egypt nyansa nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 4:31
Na onim nyansa sen onipa biara; ɔsen Esrahini Etan ne Mahol mma Heman ne Kalkol ne Darda. Ne din hyetaa aman a atwa hɔ ahyia nyinaa mu. 

1 Ahene 4:32
Otumi buu mmɛ mpem abiɛsa, na ne nnwom yɛ apem ne anum. 

1 Ahene 4:33
Ɔkaa nnua ho asɛm, efi Lebanon nkyeneduru so kosi sommɛ a efifi dan ho so; ɔkaa mmoa ne nnomaa ne mmoa a wɔwea ne mpataa ho asɛm. 

1 Ahene 4:34
Nkurɔfo fi amanaman so betiee Solomon nyansa; wofi asase so ahene a wɔtee ne nyansa no nyinaa nkyɛn bae.

1 Ahene 4:4
Yehoiada ba Benaia na ɔda asraafo no ano, na Sadok ne Abiatar yɛ asɔfo; 

1 Ahene 4:5
Natan ba Asaria na ɔda akunini no ano, na Natan ba Sabud yɛ ɔsɔfo ne ɔhene adamfo; 

1 Ahene 4:6
Ahisar ne fiepanyin, na Abda ba Adoniram na ɔhwɛ apaafo so.

1 Ahene 4:7
Na Solomon wɔ akunini dumien a wɔdeda Israel nyinaa ano, na wɔn na wɔmaa ɔhene ne ne fiefo aduan. Wɔde hyɛɛ wɔn nsa sɛ obiara mfa aduan mmra ɔsram biako afe biara. 

1 Ahene 4:8
Wɔn din ni: Hur ba, onyaa Efraim mmepɔw so nkurow; 

1 Ahene 4:9
Deker ba, onyaa Makas ne Saalbim ne Bet-Semes ne Elon-Bet-Hanan; 

1 Ahene 5:1
Tiro hene Hiram tee sɛ Solomon na wɔasra no asi no hene, ne papa ananmu, enti ɔsomaa ne nkoa kɔɔ ne nkyɛn efisɛ Hiram dɔɔ Dawid daa. 

1 Ahene 5:10
Enti Hiram maa Solomon kyeneduru ne ɔpopaw nnua dodow biara a ɔpɛ. 

1 Ahene 5:11
Solomon nso maa Hiram awi susukoraa mpem aduonu ne ngo pa susukoraa mpem aduonu sɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ ne fiefo. Saa na Solomon de maa Hiram afe biara. 

1 Ahene 5:12
Na Awurade de, ɔmaa Solomon nyansa sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ no bɔ no, na asomdwoe tenaa Hiram ne Solomon ntam, na wɔn baanu yɛɛ apam.

1 Ahene 5:13
Na Ɔhene Solomon de apaafo fi Israel nyinaa kɔ; apaafo no dodow yɛ mmarima mpem aduasa.

1 Ahene 5:14
Ɔsram biara ɔde wɔn mu mpem du kɔ Lebanon. Sɛ wokodi ɔsram biako wɔ Lebanon a, na wɔabedi asram abien wɔ wɔn afie; Adoniram na na ɔda apaafo no ano. 

1 Ahene 5:15
Ahene

1 Ahene 5:15
Solomon nyaa nnipa mpem aduɔson a wɔsoasoa nneɛma, ne nnipa mpem aduɔwɔtwe a wɔpae abo wɔ mmepɔw so, 

1 Ahene 5:16
ɛsono Solomon akunini a wɔhwɛ adwuma no so no; wɔn nso yɛ mpanyimfo mpem abiɛsa ahasa a wɔhwɛ adwumayɛfo so. 

1 Ahene 5:17
Ɛnna ɔhene hyɛe sɛ wɔmpae abo akɛse a ne bo yɛ den, na wɔmfa abo a wɔapae no nto ofie no fapem. 

1 Ahene 5:18
Enti Solomon adansifo ne Hiram adansifo ne Gebalfo paee abo no, na wosiesiee nnua ne abo a wɔde besi ofie no.

1 Ahene 5:2
 Na Solomon nso soma kɔɔ Hiram nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: 

1 Ahene 5:3
“W’ankasa wunim sɛ ɔko a atamfo de twaa me papa Dawid ho hyiae nti, wantumi ansi ofie amma Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn din, kosii sɛ Awurade de wɔn guu ne nan ase. 

1 Ahene 5:4
Seesei Awurade me Nyankopɔn ama me ɔhome afa nyinaa ahyia. Ɔtamfo biara nni hɔ, na bɔne biara nso nni hɔ. 

1 Ahene 5:5
Mepɛ sɛ misi ofie ma Awurade me Nyankopɔn din sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ me papa Dawid bɔ yi sɛ, ‘Wo ba a mede no bɛtena w’ahengua so asi w’ananmu no, ɔno na obesi ofie ama me din.’ 

1 Ahene 5:6
Enti afei hyɛ ma wontwa nkyeneduru wɔ Lebanon mma me; me nkoa bɛba abɛka wo nkoa ho, na wo nkoa akatua nyinaa, mede bɛma wo sɛnea wobɛkyerɛ biara, efisɛ wunim sɛ yenni obiara wɔ yɛn mu a onim nnuatwa te sɛ Sidonfo.”

1 Ahene 5:7
Bere a Hiram tee Solomon nsɛm no ara pɛ, odii ahurusi kɛse, na ɔkae sɛ: “Nhyira nka Awurade nnɛ sɛ wama Dawid ɔba nyansafo a ɔredi ɔman kɛse yi so!” 

1 Ahene 5:8
Ɛnna Hiram soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Solomon sɛ: “Nea wobɛka kyerɛɛ me no, mate, na kyeneduru ne ɔpopaw nnua ho asɛm no nso, mɛyɛ w’apɛde ama wo. 

1 Ahene 5:9
Me nkoa na wɔde befi Lebanon aba mpoano, na me nso makyekyere agu po so de akɔ baabi a wobɛkyerɛ sɛ memfa nkɔ; ɛhɔ na mɛma wɔasansan na woabɛfa. Wo nso yɛ m’apɛde ma me na ma me fiefo aduan.”

1 Ahene 6:1
Bere a Israelfo fi Egypt asase so bae no afe a ɛto so ahanan aduɔwɔtwe a ɛyɛ Solomon afe a ɛto so anan bere a ɔbɛyɛɛ Israel hene no, ofii ase sɛ ɔresi ofie ama Awurade wɔ ɔsram Siw, ɔsram a ɛto so abien no mu. 

1 Ahene 6:10
Afei nso, osisii nsɛmso wɔ ɔdan no ho nyinaa hyiae, ne tenten yɛ basafa anum, na wɔde kyeneduru nnua susoo mu bɔɔ ɔdan no mu.

1 Ahene 6:11
Ɛnna Awurade asɛm baa Solomon nkyɛn sɛ: 

1 Ahene 6:12
“Ofie a woresi yi ho de, sɛ wonantew m’ahyɛde mu na woyɛ m’atemmusɛm na wudi me mmara nsɛm nyinaa so na wonantew mu a, me nso mɛma wo ho asɛm a meka kyerɛɛ wo papa Dawid no nyinaa aba mu; 

1 Ahene 6:13
mɛtena Israelfo mu, na merennyaw me man Israel.”

1 Ahene 6:14
Na Solomon sii dan no wiei. 

1 Ahene 6:15
 Na ɔde kyeneduru nnua yɛɛ ɔdan no mu afasu. Efi ɔdan no fam kosi nsɛmso no mpuran ho no, ɔde nnua kataa ho, na ɔde ɔpopaw nnua nso sɛm ɔdan no fam. 

1 Ahene 6:16
Ahene

1 Ahene 6:16
Bio nso, ɔde kyeneduru ntaboo yɛɛ biribi wɔ ɔdan no akyi a ɛyɛ basafa aduonu, efi fam kosi nsɛmso no so, na ɔyɛɛ Kronkron mu Kronkronbea wɔ ɔdan no pia mu. 

1 Ahene 6:17
Na ɔdan no yɛ basafa aduanan, kyerɛ sɛ, asɔredan a ɛwɔ anim no. 

1 Ahene 6:18
Na nkyeneduru a ɛwɔ ɔdan no mu no, wodii aduaba agude nkuruwankuruwa ne nhwiren a ahanhan adwini wɔ so. Wɔde kyeneduru na ɛyɛɛ ne nyinaa; wɔanhu abo biara wɔ mu.

1 Ahene 6:19
 Na osiesiee ɔdan no pia mu pia no mu sɛ ɔde Awurade apam adaka no besi hɔ. 

1 Ahene 6:2
Ɔdan a Ɔhene Solomon si maa Awurade no, ne ntwemu yɛ basafa aduosia, ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa aduonu, na ne tenten yɛ basafa aduasa. 

1 Ahene 6:20
Pia mu pia no ntwemu yɛ basafa aduonu, ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa aduonu, na ne tenten yɛ basafa aduonu; ɔde sika amapa duraa mu, na afɔremuka no nso, ɔde kyeneduru duraa ho. 

1 Ahene 6:21
Na Solomon de sika amapa duraa ɔdan no mu, na ɔde sika ntweaban twaa pia mu pia no anim, na ɔde sika duraa mu. 

1 Ahene 6:22
Ɔde sika duraa ɔdan no mu nyinaa kosii sɛ owiee ɔdan no ho adwuma nyinaa; afɔremuka a ɛkyerɛ pia mu pia hɔ no nso, ɔde sika duraa ho nyinaa.

1 Ahene 6:23
Bio nso, ɔde nku dua yɛɛ kerubim abien wɔ pia mu pia no mu, biako biara tenten yɛ basafa du. 

1 Ahene 6:24
 Na kerubim no ataban biako tenten yɛ basafa anum, na kerubim no ataban biako a aka no nso tenten yɛ basafa anum. Efi n’ataban biako ano kosi biako ano yɛ basafa du. 

1 Ahene 6:25
 Na kerubim a ɔto so abien no nso de yɛ basafa du. Kerubim abien no nyinaa tenten ne wɔn kɛse yɛ pɛ. 

1 Ahene 6:26
Kerubim biako tenten yɛ basafa du, na saa na obiako a waka no nso te. 

1 Ahene 6:27
Ɛnna ɔde kerubim no sisii pia mu pia no mu; na kerubim no ntaban mu atrɛtrɛw. Kerubim no biako ataban ka ɔfasu no, na obiako nso de ka ɔfasu a ɛwɔ ɔfa nohoa no; wɔn ntaban a aka no kyerɛ ɔdan no mfinimfini, na biako ataban ka biako ataban. 

1 Ahene 6:28
Bio nso, ɔde sika duraduraa kerubim no ho.

1 Ahene 6:29
Odii kerubim ne mmedua ne nhwiren a ahanhan adwini wɔ ɔdan no afasu no ho, pia no mu, na ɔyɛɛ bi nso wɔ pia mu ne asa no so. 

1 Ahene 6:3
Abantenten a ɛwɔ asɔredan no anim no, ne ntwemu yɛ basafa aduonu, ofie no anim. Ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa du ɔdan no anim.

1 Ahene 6:30
Ɔde sika duraa ɔdan no fam, pia no mu, ne asa no so. 

1 Ahene 6:31
Na pia mu pia kwan no, ɔde nku dua na ɛyɛɛ n’apon: nkyɛnmu adum ne apongua ne abupɛn anum mu biako. 

1 Ahene 6:32
Ɔde nku dua na ɛyɛɛ n’apon abien no, na odii kerubim ne mmedua ne nhwiren a ahanhan adwini wɔ ho, na ɔde sika duraa ho; ɔde sika nso guu kerubim ne mmedua adwini no so. 

1 Ahene 6:33
Saa na ɔyɛɛ asɔredan kwan ne nku dua apongua no, n’afa anan no nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 6:34
Ɔde ɔpopaw nnua na ɛyɛɛ apon abien no. Ɔpon biako bɔ ho abien na etumi dannan, na ɔpon a aka no nso bɔ ho abien na etumi dannan. 

1 Ahene 6:35
 Na odii kerubim ne mmedua ne nhwiren a ahanhan adwini wɔ ho, na ɔde sika guu adwini no ho.

1 Ahene 6:36
Afei ɔde abo a wɔasen toatoaa so abiɛsa na ɔde kyeneduru nnua totoo so yɛɛ adiwo a ɛwɔ mfinimfini no.

1 Ahene 6:37
Wɔtoo Awurade fie no fapem afe a ɛto so anan, Siw a ɛyɛ ɔsram a ɛto so abien no mu; 

1 Ahene 6:38
afe a ɛto so dubiako, Bul a ɛyɛ ɔsram a ɛto so awotwe mu no, wowiee ofie no ho adwuma nyinaa sɛnea wɔkyerɛe sɛ wonsi no ne ne nsusuwso nyinaa. Enti ɔde mfe ason na esi wiei.

1 Ahene 6:4
Ɔyeyɛɛ ɛdan no ho mpomma a emu aniahunuankansa tintim wɔ fie no mu. 

1 Ahene 6:5
Afei ɔtotoo fasuo de twaa ɔdan no ho hyiae, wɔ asɔredan no ankasa ne ne pia mu pia no ho, na ɔyeyɛɛ nkyɛnmu mpia wɔ ho nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 6:6
Nkyɛnmu pia a ɛwɔ ase no, na ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa anum, nea ɛwɔ mfinimfini no, na ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa asia na nea ɛto so abiɛsa no, na ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa ason; ɔyeyɛɛ ɔdan no akyi mmamma de twaa ho nyinaa hyiae, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔremfa biribiara nwurawura ɔdan no afasu mu.

1 Ahene 6:7
Ɔdan no ankasa de, bere a wɔresi no, wɔde abo amuamu a wɔapae ayɛ ho biribiara awie na esii; bere a wɔresi ɔdan no, wɔante asae anaa akuma anaa nnade biara nka wɔ fie hɔ. 

1 Ahene 6:8
Pia a ɛwɔ ase no kwan da ɔdan no nifa fam, na atrapoe a akyinkyim na wɔforo de kɔ mfinimfini de no ne nea ɛto so abiɛsa no mu. 

1 Ahene 6:9
Na ɔsii dan no wieeɛ no, ɔde kyeneduru mpuran ne ntaaboo sam ɔdan no so. 

1 Ahene 7:1
Na Solomon ankasa fie nso, ɔde mfe dumiɛnsa na esii, na owiee ne fie no ho adwuma nyinaa.

1 Ahene 7:10
Na abo a ne bo yɛ den a wɔde too fapem no yɛ abo akɛse; abo no bi yɛ basafa du na ebi nso yɛ basafa awotwe. 

1 Ahene 7:11
Abo a ne bo yɛ den a wɔasen no pɛpɛɛpɛ ne kyeneduru na ɛdeda so. 

1 Ahene 7:12
Ɔde abo a wɔasen toatoaa so abiɛsa, na ɔde kyeneduru nnua totoo so de yɛɛ ɔfasu twaa adiwo kɛse no ho hyiae; saa na ɔyɛe wɔ Awurade fie adiwo a ɛwɔ mfinimfini no ho, ne ofie no abantenten no ho.

1 Ahene 7:13
Ɛnna Ɔhene Solomon soma ma wɔkɔfaa Hiram fi Tiro bae. 

1 Ahene 7:14
Na ɔyɛ kɔbere dwumfo a ɔwɔ nyansa ne ntease ne nimdeɛ a ɔde yɛ kɔbere ho adwuma biara; ne maame yɛ Naftali abusuakuw mu kunafo, na ne papa yɛ Tironi. Ɔbaa Ɔhene Solomon nkyɛn bɛyɛɛ ne nnwuma nyinaa maa no.

1 Ahene 7:15
Na oguu kɔbere adum abien no; adum no biara tenten yɛ basafa dunwɔtwe, na basafa dumien hama na etwa adum no biara ho hyia. 

1 Ahene 7:16
Na ɔde kɔbere yɛɛ ntaaso abien wɔ adum no so. Ntaaso no biako tenten yɛ basafa anum, na ntaaso biako no nso tenten yɛ basafa anum. 

1 Ahene 7:17
Ahene

1 Ahene 7:17
Atena a wɔanwene no ntweaban nkyinkyimii wɔ adum no ntaaso no so; ason wɔ ntaaso biako so, na ason wɔ ntaaso biako no nso so. 

1 Ahene 7:18
Na ɔyeyɛɛ granate akutu a ɛsesaso, hankare abien wɔ atena biako ho de twaa adum no ntaaso ho hyiae; saa na ɔyɛe wɔ ntaaso biako no nso ho. 

1 Ahene 7:19
Ɔyɛɛ abantenten ho adum no ntaaso sɛ sukooko, basafa anan. 

1 Ahene 7:2
Afei osii Lebanon Kwaefie no; ne ntwemu yɛ basafa ɔha, ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa aduonum, na ne tenten nso yɛ basafa aduasa, na osi sii kyeneduru adum a ɛsesaso anan so; wɔde kyeneduru nnua guu adum no so. 

1 Ahene 7:20
Na ntaaso no wɔ adum abien no so, na ɛbɛn afuru a atena wɔ ho no; ɔyeyɛɛ granate akutu ahanu a ɛsesaso de twaa ntaaso biara ho hyiae.

1 Ahene 7:21
Na osisii asɔredan abantenten no ho adum no. Enti edum a ɔde sii nifa no, ɔfrɛɛ no Yakin, na edum a ɔde sii benkum no, ɔfrɛɛ no Boas. 

1 Ahene 7:22
Odii sukooko adwini wɔ adum no soro. Enti ɔde nkakrankakra wiee adum no ho adwuma nyinaa.

1 Ahene 7:23
Ɔyɛɛ ɛposɛn a wɔagu no nso; efi ano kosi ano yɛ basafa du. Ano yɛ kurukuruwa hyia, na ne tenten yɛ basafa anum. Basafa aduasa hama na etwa ho hyia. 

1 Ahene 7:24
Ɔyɛɛ biribi te sɛ aduaba agude nkuruwankuruwa wɔ ase nyinaa hyiae; edu wɔ basafa biako biara mu, na atwa po no nyinaa ho ahyia. Aduaba agude nkuruwankuruwa no sesaso, hankare abien, na oguu ɛno ne ɛposɛn no nyinaa prɛko. 

1 Ahene 7:25
Ɔde taa anantwi dumien akyi; abiɛsa ani kyerɛ atifi fam, abiɛsa ani kyerɛ atɔe fam, abiɛsa ani kyerɛ anafo fam, na abiɛsa ani kyerɛ apuei fam, na ɛposɛn no taa wɔn so, na wɔn akyi nyinaa hyehyɛ ase. 

1 Ahene 7:26
Ne pipiripi te sɛ nsayam; ɔyɛɛ ano te sɛ kuruwa ano, te sɛ sukooko nhwiren a apae. Bat susuhina mpem abien na wɔde gu mu.

1 Ahene 7:27
Na ɔyeyɛɛ kɔbere nnaka du a wɔde twe nsu; adaka biara ntwemu yɛ basafa anan, ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa anan na ne tenten yɛ basafa abiɛsa. 

1 Ahene 7:28
Sɛɛ na ɔyɛɛ nnaka a wɔde twe nsu no: nhyehyem ntraantraa wɔ ho, na nhyehyem no hyehyɛ mmeamu mu. 

1 Ahene 7:29
Ɔyeyɛɛ agyata ne anantwi ne kerubim wɔ nhyehyem a ɛhyehyɛ mmeamu no mu so, na saa na ɔyɛe wɔ mmeamu no ankasa so. Nhwiren nkyekyeree sensɛn agyata ne anantwi no atifi ne wɔn ase. 

1 Ahene 7:3
 Na wɔde kyeneduru sɛm mpuran a ɛdeda adum aduanan anum so no soro. Adum dunum sesaso wɔ ɔfabiara. 

1 Ahene 7:30
Adaka no biara wɔ kɔbere ntwahonan anan ne kɔbere nhyɛmudua; ɛwɔ nsisonan anan, na oguu nsisonan no wɔ ɔsɛn no ase, na nhwiren nkyekyeree wowɔ nkyɛnkyɛn. 

1 Ahene 7:31
Ano no, efi emu de no kosi nsisonan no yɛ basafa biako; ano yɛ kurukuruwa, na ɔyɛɛ ne kɔn no basafa biako ne fa; odii adwini nso wɔ ano. Nhyehyem no yɛ ahinanan na ɛnyɛ kurukuruwa. 

1 Ahene 7:32
Ntwahonan anan no wɔ nhyehyem ntraantraa no ase, na ntwahonan no nsa wɔ nsutwe adaka no ase; ntwahonan biara tenten yɛ basafa biako ne fa. 

1 Ahene 7:33
Ɔyɛɛ ntwahonan no te sɛ teaseɛnam ntwahonan. Ne nsa no ne ne hankare ne ne nhyehyem ne mfinimfini nyinaa, wogui. 

1 Ahene 7:34
Nsisonan anan wowɔ adaka biara afaanan no ho; adaka no ne nsisonan no bom biako. 

1 Ahene 7:35
Adaka no atifi no, ɔyɛɛ ne kɔn no kurukuruwa hyiae; ne tenten yɛ basafa fa, na adaka no soro ne ne nkyɛnmu ne nhyehyem ntraantraa no, ne nyinaa bom biako. 

1 Ahene 7:36
Afei odii kerubim ne agyata ne mmedua adwini wɔ ne nkyɛnmu nnade ntraantraa ne nhyehyem no so sɛnea ɔkwan a ɛdeda ntam te, na ɔyeyɛɛ nhwiren nkyekyeree nso wɔ ho hyiae. 

1 Ahene 7:37
Saa na ɔyeyɛɛ nsutwe nnaka du no; ne nyinaa yɛ ade koro, na ne tenten ne ne kɛse yɛ pɛ.

1 Ahene 7:38
Na ɔyeyɛɛ kɔbere asɛn du. Bat susuhina aduanan na emu biara betumi afa. Ɔsɛn biara yɛ basafa anan. Nsutwe adaka du no biara, ɔsɛn biako si so. 

1 Ahene 7:39
Afei ɔde nsutwe nnaka no anum sisii ɔdan no nifa, na ɔde anum nso sisii ɔdan no benkum; ɔde ɛpo no sii ɔdan no nifa, apuei fam de rekɔ anafo.

1 Ahene 7:4
Mfɛnsere no nso sesaso wɔ afaabiɛsa, na mfɛnsere kyerɛkyerɛ mfɛnsere anim ntoatoaso abiɛsa.

1 Ahene 7:40
Na Hiram yeyɛɛ asɛn ne sofi ne nyaawa no. Enti Hiram wiee adwuma a ɔyɛ maa Ɔhene Solomon wɔ Awurade fie no ho nyinaa: 

1 Ahene 7:41
Adum abien ne ntaaso a ɛte sɛ ɔsɛn a ɛwɔ adum abien no so, ne atena abien a ɛkata adum no so ntaaso nkuruwankuruwa abien no ho, 

1 Ahene 7:42
ne atena abien no ho granate akutu ahanan no, ne atena no biara ho granate akutu a ɛsesaso, hankare abien a wɔde akata adum abien no so ntaaso a ɛte sɛ ɔsɛn no ho, 

1 Ahene 7:43
ne nsutwe nnaka du ne asɛn du a esisi nsutwe nnaka no so, 

1 Ahene 7:44
ne ɛpo no ne anantwi dumien a ɛpo no taa wɔn akyi no, 

1 Ahene 7:45
ne ade a wɔde sesaw nso ne sofi ne nyaawa ne nneɛma yi na Hiram de kɔbere a wɔabere ho yɛ maa Ɔhene Solomon wɔ Awurade fie no ho nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 7:46
Yordan Mantam mu na ɔhene de dɔte guu nneɛma yi, Sukot ne Saretan ntam.

1 Ahene 7:47
Na Solomon ankari anwenne no efisɛ na ɛdɔɔso pii pa. Wɔammu kɔbere no dodow ano. 

1 Ahene 7:48
Na Solomon yeyɛɛ Awurade fie hɔ anwenne no nyinaa: sika afɔremuka ne apon a wɔbɛhyehyɛ paanoo wɔ so, 

1 Ahene 7:49
ne sika amapa akaneadua, anum sisi nifa na anum nso sisi benkum wɔ pia mu pia no anim, ne nhwiren ne akanea ne afagya a wɔde sika yeyɛe, 

1 Ahene 7:5
N’apon ne n’apongua afaanan nyinaa yɛ pɛ, na mfɛnsere a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ mfɛnsere anim ntoatoaso abiɛsa no nso te saa.

1 Ahene 7:50
ne asɛn ne adumgya ne nyaawa ne nkuruwa ne ogya nkukuwa a wɔde sika amapa yeyɛe no; ɛne pia mu pia, kyerɛ sɛ, Kronkron mu Kronkronbea hɔ apon no nsiso, ne asɔrefie no apon a wɔde sika yeyɛe no nyinaa.

1 Ahene 7:51
Wowiee Awurade fie adwuma a Solomon yɛe no nyinaa, na Solomon de nneɛma a ne papa Dawid yɛɛ no kronkron no bae; ɔde sika ne dwetɛ ne anwenne no nyinaa beguu Awurade fie adekora adan no mu.

1 Ahene 7:6
 Na ɔyɛɛ Adum Abrannaa ne ne ntwemu yɛ basafa aduonum, na ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ basafa aduasa; ɔde adum yɛɛ abrannaa foforo wɔ anim, na okuruw so.

1 Ahene 7:7
Ɔyɛɛ Ahengua Abrannaa no, atemmu abrannaa a obebu atɛn wɔ hɔ no nso; ɔde kyeneduru sɛm dan no mu fi fam kosii nsɛmso no so.

1 Ahene 7:8
Na ne fie a n’ankasa bɛtena mu a ɛwɔ ɔfanohoa no, na ɛmmɛn Abrannaa dan no. Ɔyɛɛ no te sɛ ɛno. Na Solomon san sii ofie a ɛte sɛ Abrannaa dan no maa Farao babea a ɔwaree no no.

1 Ahene 7:9
Ne nyinaa, ɔde abo a ne bo yɛ den a wɔasen no pɛpɛɛpɛ a wɔde abo sradaa atwitwa anim ne akyi na ɛyɛe, efi ne fapem so kosi n’atifi, ne abɔnten kosi adiwo kɛse hɔ. 

1 Ahene 8:1
Saa bere no Solomon boaboaa Israel mpanyimfo ano, mmusuakuw mu atitiriw ne Israelfo agyanom mpanyimfo nyinaa, sɛ wɔmmra Ɔhene Solomon nkyɛn wɔ Yerusalem, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔfa Awurade apam adaka no mfi Dawid Kurow mu, kyerɛ sɛ Sion, mmra. 

1 Ahene 8:10
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a asɔfo no fii adi fii kronkronbea hɔ no, omununkum bɛhyɛɛ Awurade fie no ma.

1 Ahene 8:11
Omununkum no nti, asɔfo no antumi annyina hɔ ansom, efisɛ Awurade anuonyam hyɛɛ Awurade fie no ma. 

1 Ahene 8:12
Saa bere no Solomon kae sɛ: “Awurade aka sɛ omununkum kusuu mu na ɔbɛtena. 

1 Ahene 8:13
Matumi asi tenabea a ɛkorɔn ama wo, na mayɛ baabi a wobɛtena daa.”

1 Ahene 8:14
Afei, ɔhene dan n’ani sɛ ɔrehyira Israel bagua no nyinaa bere a Israel bagua no nyinaa gyinagyina wɔn nan so no. 

1 Ahene 8:15
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Nhyira nka Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔde n’ano kasa kyerɛɛ me papa Dawid, na ɔnam ne nsa so ama aba mu no; ɔno na ɔkae sɛ, 

1 Ahene 8:16
‘Efi da a miyii me man Israel fii Egypt de besi nnɛ da yi, minyii Israel mmusuakuw no kurow bi sɛ wonsi ofie mma me wɔ hɔ mma me din ntena hɔ, nanso mɛpaw Dawid ma wabedi me man Israel so.’ 

1 Ahene 8:17
Na ɛda me papa Dawid koma so sɛ obesi ofie ama Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn din. 

1 Ahene 8:18
Ahene

1 Ahene 8:18
Nanso Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me papa Dawid sɛ, ‘Esiane sɛ ɛda wo koma so sɛ wubesi ofie ama me din nti, woayɛ ade sɛ ɛda wo koma so. 

1 Ahene 8:19
Na mmom ofie no de, ɛnyɛ wo na wubesi; wo ba a obefi w’asen mu aba na obesi ofie no ama me din.’ 

1 Ahene 8:2
Enti Israel mmarima nyinaa boaboaa wɔn ano baa Ɔhene Solomon nkyɛn afahyɛ no ase, wɔ ɔsram Etanim, ɔsram a ɛto so ason no mu. 

1 Ahene 8:20
 Afei Awurade ama asɛm a ɔkae no aba mu, asɛm a Awurade kae sɛ mɛsɔre abesi me papa Dawid ananmu na matena Israel ahengua so na masi ofie ama Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn din, 

1 Ahene 8:21
na mapɛ baabi de Adaka no asi no; emu na apam a Awurade ne yɛn agyanom yɛe bere a oyii wɔn fii Egypt asase so no wɔ.”

1 Ahene 8:22
Afei Solomon kogyinaa Awurade afɔremuka no anim wɔ Israel bagua no nyinaa anim trɛw ne nsam kyerɛɛ ɔsoro. 

1 Ahene 8:23
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “O Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, Onyame biara nni hɔ, ɔsoro ne asase so a ɔte sɛ wo; wo a wokora apam ne adɔe so ma wo nkoa a wɔde wɔn koma nyinaa nantew w’anim no. 

1 Ahene 8:24
Wo na woama bɔ a wohyɛɛ w’akoa, me papa Dawid no aba mu; wo na wode w’ano hyɛɛ bɔ no, na ɛnnɛ da yi wonam wo nsa so ama aba mu. 

1 Ahene 8:25
Enti afei, Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, ma bɔ a wohyɛɛ w’akoa, me papa Dawid no nnyina. Woka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Sɛ wo mma hwɛ wɔn akwan yiye na wɔnantew m’anim sɛnea woanantew m’anim yi a, obusuani a ɔbɛtena Israel agua so remmɔ wo, m’anim.’ 

1 Ahene 8:26
O Israel Nyankopɔn, ma bɔ a wohyɛɛ w’akoa, me papa Dawid no ntim.

1 Ahene 8:27
“Enti Onyankopɔn bɛtena asase so ampa ara? Hwɛ! Ɔsoro ne ɔsoro mu soro mpo ntumi nkora wo, na ofie a masi yi na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn!

1 Ahene 8:28
Nanso, dan w’ani kyerɛ w’akoa mpaebɔ ne ne nkotɔsrɛ, O Awurade me Nyankopɔn, na tie w’akoa sufrɛ ne mpae a merebɔ w’anim nnɛ da yi.

1 Ahene 8:29
Bue w’aniwa hwɛ ofie yi awia ne anadwo, faako a wokae sɛ, ‘Me din bɛtena hɔ’ no, na tie mpae a w’akoa de n’ani kyerɛ ha bɔ no. 

1 Ahene 8:3
Ɛnna Israel mpanyimfo nyinaa bae, na asɔfo no kɔsoaa Adaka no. 

1 Ahene 8:30
Sɛ w’akoa ne wo man Israel de wɔn ani kyerɛ ha bɔ mpae a, tie yɛn nkotɔsrɛ; sɛ edu w’asom, wo soro tenabea hɔ a, tie yɛn. Tie na fa kyɛ yɛn.

1 Ahene 8:31
“Sɛ onipa bi yɛ ne yɔnko bɔne na ne yɔnko no ma odi nsew ka ntam ma asodi bɛda no so, na ɔba w’afɔremuka no anim ofie yi mu bere a wadi nsew no a, 

1 Ahene 8:32
ɛnde fi wo soro hɔ tie na yɛ biribi fa bu wo nkoa no ntam atɛn, na bu ɔbɔnefo no fɔ ma ne bɔne nkogu n’atifi, na bu ɔtreneeni no bem ma no, sɛnea ne trenee te.

1 Ahene 8:33
“Sɛ wo man Israel di nkogu wɔ atamfo anim, bɔne a wɔayɛ wo nti, na sɛ wɔsan ba wo nkyɛn bɛkamfo wo din, na wɔbɔ mpae de wɔn nkotɔsrɛ ba w’anim ofie yi mu a, 

1 Ahene 8:34
ɛnde wo ara fi soro hɔnom tie, na fa wo man Israel bɔne kyɛ wɔn, na san fa wɔn bra asase a wode maa wɔn agyanom no so.

1 Ahene 8:35
“Sɛ ɔsoro mu to na osu antɔ, bɔne a wɔayɛ wo nti, na brɛ a woabrɛ wɔn ase nti, wɔsan fi wɔn bɔne ho de wɔn ani kyerɛ ha bɔ mpae na wɔkamfo wo din a, 

1 Ahene 8:36
ɛnde wo ara fi ɔsoro hɔ tie, na fa wo nkoa, wo man Israel bɔne kyɛ wɔn efisɛ wo na wokyerɛkyerɛ wɔn ɔkwan pa a wɔmfa so; ma osu ntɔ w’asase a wode ama wo man sɛ wɔn agyapade no so.

1 Ahene 8:37
“Sɛ ɔkɔm na ɛbɛba asase no so oo, sɛ ɔyaredɔm na ɛbɛba oo, sɛ ɔhyew na ɛbɛba oo, sɛ ɔyare na ebesi wɔn afuw so oo, sɛ mmoadabi ne ntɛfrɛw na ɛbɛba oo, sɛ wɔn atamfo na wɔbɛtow ahyɛ wɔn nkurow so oo, ɔhaw anaa ɔyare biara a ɛbɛba wɔn so no, 

1 Ahene 8:38
mpaebɔ anaa nkotɔsrɛ a onipa biara anaa wo man Israel nyinaa de bɛba w’anim no,—efisɛ obiara nim ne komam haw—sɛ wɔtrɛw wɔn nsam kyerɛ ofie yi a, 

1 Ahene 8:39
ɛnde wo ara fi ɔsoro, wo tenabea hɔ tie na fa bɔne kyɛ na ma onipa biara sɛnea n’akwan te, efisɛ wo na wunim ne komam na wo nko ara na wunim nea ɛwɔ adesamma nyinaa komam; 

1 Ahene 8:4
Na wɔde Awurade adaka no ne ahyiae ntamadan ne anwenne kronkron a ɛwɔ ntamadan no mu nyinaa bae; asɔfo ne Lewifo no na wɔde bae. 

1 Ahene 8:40
ɛno bɛma wɔasuro wo wɔn nkwa nna nyinaa, nna dodow a wobedi wɔ asase a wode maa yɛn agyanom no so no.

1 Ahene 8:41
“Afei ɔhɔho a omfi wo man Israel mu mpo, sɛ wo din nti ofi akyirikyiri asase so ba, 

1 Ahene 8:42
 efisɛ wɔbɛte wo din kɛse ne wo nsa a ɛyɛ den ne wo basa a woateɛ mu no ho asɛm na ɔde n’ani kyerɛ ofie yi bɔ mpae a, 

1 Ahene 8:43
wo ara fi ɔsoro, wo tenabea hɔ tie na yɛ ɔhɔho no abisade a ɔde to w’anim nyinaa ma no, na ama asase so aman nyinaa ahu wo din na wɔasuro wo sɛnea wo man Israel suro wo no, na wɔahu sɛ wo din na ɛda ofie a masi yi so.

1 Ahene 8:44
“Sɛ wo man fi adi ne wɔn atamfo kɔko ɔkwan a wobɛsoma wɔn no so, na wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛ kurow a woapaw ne ofie a masi ama wo din yi na wɔbɔ Awurade mpae a, 

1 Ahene 8:45
wo nso fi ɔsoro tie wɔn mpaebɔ ne wɔn nkotɔsrɛ na di wɔn asɛm ma wɔn.

1 Ahene 8:46
“Sɛ wɔyɛ bɔne tia wo efisɛ onipa biara nni hɔ a ɔnyɛ bɔne, na sɛ wo bo fuw wɔn na wode wɔn hyɛ wɔn atamfo nsa ma atamfo no de wɔn kɔ nkoasom mu, atamfo asase a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri anaa nea ɛbɛn so, 

1 Ahene 8:47
na wɔn ani ba wɔn ho so, asase a wɔde wɔn akɔyɛ nkoa wɔ hɔ no so, na wɔsan ba wo nkyɛn bɛkotow srɛ wo, asase a wɔakɔyɛ hɔ nkoa no so na wɔka sɛ, ‘Yɛayɛ bɔne, yɛafom, na yɛadi amumɔyɛsɛm,’ 

1 Ahene 8:48
na sɛ wɔde wɔn koma nyinaa ne wɔn kra nyinaa san ba wo nkyɛn, wɔn atamfo a wɔde wɔn ayɛ nkoa no asase so, na wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛ asase a wode maa wɔn agyanom ne kurow a woapaw ne ofie a masi ama wo din yi bɔ mpae a, 

1 Ahene 8:49
wo nso fi ɔsoro, wo tenabea hɔ tie wɔn mpaebɔ ne wɔn nkotɔsrɛ, na di wɔn asɛm ma wɔn, 

1 Ahene 8:5
Na Ɔhene Solomon ne Israel bagua a wɔka ne ho, wɔn a wɔbaa ne frɛ no nyinaa wɔ Adaka no anim de nguan ne anantwi rebɔ afɔre; mmoa no dodow nti wɔantumi ankan wɔn, na wɔantumi ammu wɔn ano.

1 Ahene 8:50
na wo man a wɔayɛ wo bɔne no, fa bɔne a wɔayɛ wo no nyinaa kyɛ wɔn, na ma wonnya mmɔborɔhunu, wɔn a wɔde wɔn ayɛ nkoa no anim, na wonhu wɔn mmɔbɔ 

1 Ahene 8:51
 efisɛ wɔyɛ wo man ne w’agyapade a wuyii wɔn Egypt, fii dade fononoo no mu de wɔn bae; 

1 Ahene 8:52
bue w’aniwa wɔ w’akoa nkotɔsrɛ ne wo man Israel nkotɔsrɛ so, na tie wɔn sufrɛ a wɔde ba w’anim nyinaa. 

1 Ahene 8:53
O Awurade Nyankopɔn, wo na wuyii wɔn yɛɛ w’agyapade fii asase so aman nyinaa mu, sɛnea wonam w’akoa Mose so kae bere a wuyii yɛn agyanom fii Egypt no.”

1 Ahene 8:54
Bere a Solomon wiee mpae a ɔbɔɔ Awurade, ne nkotɔsrɛ a ɔde kɔɔ n’anim yi nyinaa no, ɔsɔre fii Awurade afɔremuka no anim; ɔsɔre fii ne nkotodwe anim, na ogyaee ne nsam a watrɛw akyerɛ ɔsoro no. 

1 Ahene 8:55
Afei ɔsɔre gyinaa hɔ, na ɔde nne kɛse hyiraa Israel bagua no nyinaa sɛ: 

1 Ahene 8:56
“Nhyira nka Awurade a wama ne man Israel ɔhome sɛnea bɔ a ɔhyɛe nyinaa te no. Nneɛma pa a ɔnam n’akoa Mose so hyɛɛ ho bɔ no nyinaa, biako mpo antɔ fam. 

1 Ahene 8:57
Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn nni yɛn akyi sɛnea odii yɛn agyanom akyi no. Mma ɔmmpo yɛn na mma onnnyaw yɛn, 

1 Ahene 8:58
na ɔnnan yɛn koma mmra ne nkyɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew n’akwan nyinaa so na yɛadi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛde ne n’atemmusɛm a ɔde yɛɛ ahyɛde maa yɛn agyanom no so. 

1 Ahene 8:59
Na me nsɛm a mede ayɛ nkotɔsrɛ Awurade anim yi, ma ɛmmɛn Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn awia ne anadwo, na onni n’akoa asɛm mma no na onni ne man Israel nso asɛm mma wɔn, sɛnea ehia da biara; 

1 Ahene 8:6
Afei asɔfo no de Awurade apam adaka no baa ne sibea, pia mu pia no mu, Kronkron mu Kronkronbea hɔ, na wɔde sii kerubim no ntaban ase.

1 Ahene 8:60
na ama asase so aman nyinaa ahu sɛ Awurade ne Onyankopɔn, na obiara nni hɔ bio.

1 Ahene 8:61
Momma mo koma nni mu Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn ho, na monnantew n’ahyɛde so na munni ne mmara nsɛm so sɛnea ɛte nnɛ da yi.”

1 Ahene 8:62
Na ɔhene ne Israel nyinaa bɔɔ afɔre kɛse Awurade anim. 

1 Ahene 8:63
Solomon de anantwi mpem aduonu abien ne nguan mpem ɔha aduonu bɔɔ asomdwoe afɔre a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔbɔ ma Awurade no, na ɔhene ne Israel nyinaa buee Awurade fie no ano. 

1 Ahene 8:64
Saa da no, ɔhene yɛɛ Awurade fie adiwo no mfinimfini hɔ kronkron, efisɛ ɛhɔ na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne aduan afɔre no, na asomdwoe afɔre ho srade no nso, ɛhɔ na ɔhyew no; na kɔbere afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Awurade anim no sua dodo sɛ ɔbɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne aduan afɔre na wahyew asomdwoe afɔre ho srade no wɔ so. 

1 Ahene 8:65
Saa bere no, Solomon dii afahyɛ no, ɔne Israel nyinaa, bagua kɛse a wofi Hamat hye so kosi Egypt subon ano no, wodii no nnanson Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn anim, na wodii nnanson bio kaa ho ma ɛyɛɛ nnafua dunan. 

1 Ahene 8:66
Na da a ɛto so awotwe no, ogyaa ɔman no kwan, na wohyiraa ɔhene de anigye ne akomatɔyam kokɔɔ wɔn afie, adepa a Awurade ayɛ ama n’akoa Dawid ne ne man Israel nyinaa nti.

1 Ahene 8:7
Na kerubim no atrɛtrɛw wɔn ntaban mu, faako a Adaka no si no, enti kerubim no kataa Adaka no ne ɛho nnua so. 

1 Ahene 8:8
Na ɛho nnua no woware, enti na wohu nnua no ti wɔ Kronkronbea hɔ wɔ pia mu pia no anim, nanso na wonhu wɔ abɔnten, na ɛhɔ na ɛwɔ de besi nnɛ. 

1 Ahene 8:9
Hwee nni Adaka no mu, gye abopon abien a Mose de guu mu wɔ Horeb no; da a Israel mma fi Egypt asase so reba a Awurade ne wɔn yɛɛ apam no na ɔde guu mu.

1 Ahene 9:1
Bere a Solomon wiee Awurade fie ne ahemfie no ne biribiara a ɛbaa Solomon komam sɛ ɔbɛyɛ no ara pɛ, 

1 Ahene 9:10
Solomon de mfe aduonu na esii afie abien no, Awurade fie ne ahemfie no, 

1 Ahene 9:11
 na Tiro hene Hiram de kyeneduru ne ɔpopaw nnua ne sika dodow biara a Solomon pɛ maa no, na ɛno akyi no, Ɔhene Solomon de nkurow aduonu a ɛwɔ Galilea asase so maa Hiram. 

1 Ahene 9:12
Ɛnna Hiram fi Tiro kɔhwɛɛ nkurow a Solomon de maa no no, nanso n’ani annye ho koraa. 

1 Ahene 9:13
Enti obisaa no sɛ: “Me nua, nkurow bɛn na wode ama me yi?” Na wɔbɛfrɛɛ no Kabul Asase de besi nnɛ.

1 Ahene 9:14
Hiram soma ma wɔde sika dwetikɛse ɔha aduonu kɔmaa ɔhene.

1 Ahene 9:15
Apaafo a Ɔhene Solomon ma wosii Awurade fie ne n’ankasa fie ne Milo ne Yerusalem fasu ne Hasor ne Megido ne Geser no ho nsɛm ni. 

1 Ahene 9:16
 Na Egypt hene Farao akɔ Geser so akɔko agye de ogya ahyew, na Kanaanfo a wɔtete kurow no mu nso, wakunkum wɔn. Enti ɔde maa ne babea, Solomon yere no, de gyaa no kwan.

1 Ahene 9:17
Na Solomon san kyekyee Geser ne Anafo Bet-Horon, 

1 Ahene 9:18
ne Baalat ne Tamar a ɛwɔ sare so, asase no so, 

1 Ahene 9:19
Ahene

1 Ahene 9:19
ne adekora nkurow a abedi Solomon nsam, ne nteaseɛnam nkurow no ne apɔnkɔsotefo nkurow, ne biribiara a Solomon ani gyee ho a ɔpɛe sɛ ɔyɛ wɔ Yerusalem ne Lebanon ne nsase a odi so no nyinaa so. 

1 Ahene 9:2
Awurade yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ Solomon ne mprenu so sɛnea oyii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no Gibeon no. 

1 Ahene 9:20
Nkurɔfo a wɔkae a wofi Amorifo, Hitifo, Perisifo, Hiwifo ne Yebusifo mu a wɔnka Israelfo ho nyinaa no, 

1 Ahene 9:21
wɔn mma a wɔkaa asase no so a Israelfo antumi ansɛe wɔn no, Solomon hyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔyɛɛ nkoadwuma de besi nnɛ. 

1 Ahene 9:22
Israelfo de, Solomon amfa obiara anyɛ akoa; mmom na wɔyɛ akofo ne n’asomfo ne ne mmapɔmma ne n’akunini ne wɔn a wɔhwɛ ne nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo so. 

1 Ahene 9:23
Akunini so mpanyimfo a wɔhwɛɛ Solomon adwuma so no yɛ ahanum aduonum; wɔn na wɔhwɛɛ adwumayɛfo a wokura adwuma no mu so.

1 Ahene 9:24
 Nso Farao babea no de, ofii Dawid Kurow mu kɔɔ ofie a wasi ama no no mu. Saa bere no na ɔhene kyekyee Milo.

1 Ahene 9:25
Na Solomon bɔɔ afɔre mprɛnsa afe biara wɔ afɔremuka a osi maa Awurade no so, ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre. Na ɔhyew aduhuam wɔ afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Awurade anim no so; owiee ofie no koraa.

1 Ahene 9:26
Ɔhene Solomon yeyɛɛ ahyɛn pii wɔ Esion-Geber a ɛbɛn Elot a ɛwɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no ano wɔ Edom asase so no. 

1 Ahene 9:27
Na Hiram taa soma ne nkoa, hyɛnmufo a wonim po so adwumayɛ, ma wɔkɔka Solomon nkoa ho, ma wɔde ahyɛn kɔ kwan so. 

1 Ahene 9:28
Na wɔkɔɔ Ofir, na wonyaa sika dwetikɛse ahanan aduonu de brɛɛ Ɔhene Solomon.

1 Ahene 9:3
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mate wo mpaebɔ ne wo nkotɔsrɛ a wode baa m’anim bɛsrɛɛ me no. Mayɛ ofie a woasi yi kronkron de me din ato so kosi daa; m’aniwa ne me koma bɛtena hɔ daa.

1 Ahene 9:4
Na wo, sɛ wode koma a edi mu ne teeyɛ nantew m’anim sɛnea wo papa Dawid nantew m’anim no, na woyɛ nea mahyɛ wo nyinaa, na wudi m’ahyɛde ne m’atemmusɛm so a, 

1 Ahene 9:5
me nso mɛma w’ahengua atim Israel so daa, sɛnea mehyɛɛ wo papa Dawid bɔ no, sɛ, ‘Obusuani a ɔbɛtena Israel ahengua so remmɔ wo.’ 

1 Ahene 9:6
Na sɛ mo ne mo mma dan mo ho fi m’akyi, na moanni me mmara nsɛm ne m’ahyɛde a mede asi mo anim no so, na mokɔ kɔsom anyame foforo na mokotow wɔn a, 

1 Ahene 9:7
ɛnde me nso metwa Israel afi asase a mede ama wɔn no so, na ofie a mayɛ no kronkron ama me din yi, mɛtow afi m’anim akyene, na wɔde Israel aka asɛm aserew adi ho fɛw aman nyinaa mu.

1 Ahene 9:8
Na ofie yi bɛdan amamfo, na obiara a otwam no de ahodwiriw bɛhwɛ na wabɔ hwirema aka sɛ, ‘Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na Awurade yɛɛ asase ne ofie yi sɛɛ?’ 

1 Ahene 9:9
Na wɔbɛka sɛ, ‘Wɔagyaw Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn a oyii wɔn agyanom fii Egypt asase so no ntia; wɔagyaw no hɔ akodi anyame foforo akyi na wɔakotow asɔre wɔn. Ɛno nti na Awurade de amanehunu yi nyinaa aba wɔn so no.’”

2 Ahene 1:1
 Na Ahab wu akyi no, Moab tew Israel so atua.

2 Ahene 1:10
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ aduonum so safohene no sɛ: “Sɛ meyɛ Onyankopɔn nipa a, ɛnde ogya mfi soro mmɛhyew wo ne w’aduonum.” Na ogya fii soro bae, na ɛbɛhyew ɔne n’aduonum no.

2 Ahene 1:11
Na ɔsomaa aduonum so panyin foforo ne n’aduonum kɔɔ ne nkyɛn. Ɔno nso kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “O Nyankopɔn nipa, ɔhene se, ‘Sian bra ntɛm.’” 

2 Ahene 1:12
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Sɛ meyɛ Nyankopɔn nipa a, ɛnde ogya mfi soro mmɛhyew wo ne w’aduonum.” Na Onyankopɔn gya fii soro bae, na ɛbɛhyew ɔne n’aduonum no.

2 Ahene 1:13
Ɛnna ɔsan somaa aduonum so safohene a ɔto so abiɛsa ne n’aduonum. Bere a aduonum so safohene a ɔto so abiɛsa no kɔe no, okobuu nkotodwe Elia anim paa no kyɛw kae sɛ: “O Nyankopɔn nipa, mesrɛ wo, ma me kra ne wo nkoa aduonum yi akra nsom bo w’ani so. 

2 Ahene 1:14
Hwɛ, ogya fi soro bɛhyew aduonum so mpanyimfo baanu a wodii kan bae no ne wɔn aduonum aduonum no. Na me de, ma me kra nsom bo w’ani so.”

2 Ahene 1:15
Ɛnna Awurade bɔfo ka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: “Sian ne no nkɔ. Nsuro no.” Enti ɔsɔree, na osian ne no kɔɔ ɔhene nkyɛn. 

2 Ahene 1:16
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘So Onyankopɔn bi nni Israel a wubetumi abisa no hɔ ade nti na woasoma abɔfo sɛ wɔnkɔ Ekron nyame Baal-Sebub hɔ abisa yi? Eyi nti mpa a woaforo no, worensi mfi so, efisɛ owu na wubewu.’” 

2 Ahene 1:17
Na nkakrankakra, owui sɛnea Awurade asɛm a Elia kae no te. Na Yehoram bedii n’ade wɔ Yehosafat ba, Yuda hene Yehoram afe a ɛto so abien mu, efisɛ na onni ɔbabarima.

2 Ahene 1:18
Nneɛma a aka a Ahasia yɛe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

2 Ahene 1:2
Na Ahasia fii ne dan a ɛwɔ Samaria n'abansoro ahunaniankansa mu bɛhwee fam, na ɛbɔɔ no yare. Enti ɔsomaa abɔfo, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔ nkobisa Ekron nyame Baal-Sebub mma me sɛ mefi ɔyare yi mu afi anaa.” 

2 Ahene 1:3
Na Awurade bɔfo ka kyerɛɛ Tisbini Elia sɛ: “Sɔre kohyia Samaria hene abɔfo no na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘So Onyankopɔn bi nni Israel nti na morekɔ Ekron nyame Baal-Sebub hɔ abisa yi? 

2 Ahene 1:4
Enti nea Awurade se ni: “Mpa a woaforo no, worensi mfi so, efisɛ owu na wubewu.”’” Ɛnna Elia fii hɔ kɔe.

2 Ahene 1:5
Ɛnna abɔfo no san baa ne nkyɛn, na bere a wɔn a ɔsomaa wɔn no san baa ne nkyɛn no, ɛhɔ ara na obisaa wɔn sɛ: “Dɛn nti na moasan aba yi?” 

2 Ahene 1:6
Ɛnna wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ɔbarima bi fi behyiaa yɛn, na ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ, ‘Monsan nkɔ ɔhene a ɔsomaa mo no nkyɛn, na monkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘So Onyankopɔn bi nni Israel nti na morekɔ Ekron nyame Baal-Sebub hɔ abisa yi? Eyi nti mpa a woaforo no, worensi mfi so, efisɛ owu na wubewu.’”’” 

2 Ahene 1:7
Na obisaa wɔn sɛ: “Ɔbarima a ofi behyiaa mo a ɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ mo no, na ɔte dɛn?” 

2 Ahene 1:8
Ɛnna wobuaa no sɛ: “Ɔyɛ ɔbarima bi a ɔhyɛ atade a wɔde aboa nhwi ayɛ, na ɔde aboa nhoma abɔso abɔ n’asen.” Ɛhɔ ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ Tisbini Elia.”

2 Ahene 1:9
Na ɔsomaa aduonum so safohene ne n’aduonum kɔɔ ne nkyɛn. Bere a ɔkɔe no, ɔkɔtoo no sɛ ɔte bepɔw no atifi. Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nyankopɔn nipa, ɔhene se, ‘Sian bra.’” 

2 Ahene 10:1
 Na Ahab wɔ mmabarima aduɔson wɔ Samaria. Enti Yehu kyerɛw krataa de soma kɔɔ Samaria kɔmomaa Yesreel atitiriw, mpanyimfo ne wɔn a wɔhwɛ Ahab mma so no sɛ: 

2 Ahene 10:10
Enti munhu sɛ Awurade asɛm biara nni hɔ a Awurade aka atia Ahab fiefo a ɛbɛtɔ fam na ɛremma mu. Awurade na wayɛ asɛm a ɔnam n’akoa Elia so kae no.” 

2 Ahene 10:11
Afei nso, Yehu kunkum obiara a ɔkae wɔ Ahab fie wɔ Yesreel ne n’akunini ne ne mfɛfo ne n’asɔfo nyinaa, na obiara anka amma no bio.

2 Ahene 10:12
Na ɔsɔre siim sɛ ɔrekɔ Samaria. Na nguanhwɛfo fie a wɔmantam nguan wom no wɔ kwan no so. 

2 Ahene 10:13
Na Yehu hyiaa Yuda hene Ahasia nuanom. Ɛnna obisaa wɔn sɛ, “Ɛhefo ne mo?” na wobuae sɛ: “Yɛyɛ Ahasia nuanom, na yɛrekɔ akɔhwɛ sɛnea ɔhene mma ne ɔhemmaa mma no ho te.” 

2 Ahene 10:14
Ntɛm ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Monkyere wɔn anikan!” Ɛnna wɔkyeree wɔn anikan na wokunkum wɔn wɔ ofie a wɔmantam nguan wom no abura ho; na wɔyɛ mmarima aduanan abien, na wɔannyaw obiako mpo.

2 Ahene 10:15
Ofi hɔ rekɔ no, ohuu Rekab ba Yehonadab sɛ ɔrebehyia no. Ohyiraa no, na obisaa no sɛ: “Wo koma di mu me ho sɛnea me koma di mu wo ho no?”

2 Ahene 10:16
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Bɛsen kogya me na kɔhwɛ ninkunu a meretwe ama Awurade.” Na wɔma ɔtenaa teaseɛnam no mu ne no kɔe. 

2 Ahene 10:17
 Na obeduu Samaria, na okunkum Ahab ho nnipa a wɔaka wɔ Samaria nyinaa kosii sɛ ɔtɔree wɔn ase sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ Elia no te.

2 Ahene 10:18
Bio nso, Yehu boaboaa ɔman no nyinaa ano hyiae, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Ahab som Baal kakraa bi. Yehu de, ɔbɛsom no bebree. 

2 Ahene 10:19
