Enti momfrɛfrɛ Baal adiyifo no nyinaa, wɔn a wɔsom no ne asɔfo no nyinaa mmra me nkyɛn. Munnnyaw obiako mpo, efisɛ merebɛbɔ afɔre kɛse ama Baal. Obiara a wamma ase no, ɔrentena nkwa mu.” Nanso na Yehu pɛ sɛ okunkum Baal asomfo no nti na ɔde anitew yɛɛ saa no.

2 Ahene 10:2
“Sɛ mo nsa ka krataa yi a, sɛ mo wura mma wɔ mo nkyɛn, na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ ne kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban ne akode nso wɔ mo nsam yi, 

2 Ahene 10:20
Na Yehu kae sɛ: “Momfa nto gua na wɔnyɛ nhyiam titiriw mma Baal.” Enti wɔde too gua. 

2 Ahene 10:21
Ɛno akyi no, Yehu de nkra kɔɔ Israel nyinaa, na Baal asomfo no nyinaa behyiaam. Obiako mpo anka a wamma bi. Wɔbaa Baal fie hɔ maa Baal fie hɔ nyinaa yɛɛ ma kyeree so. 

2 Ahene 10:210
Ahene

2 Ahene 10:22
Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ nea ɔhwɛ ntade dan so no sɛ: “Fa ntade brɛ Baal asomfo no nyinaa.” Enti ɔde ntade no brɛɛ wɔn. 

2 Ahene 10:23
Ɛnna Yehu ne Rekab ba Yehonadab baa Baal fie hɔ. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Baal asomfo no sɛ: “Monhwehwɛ mo mu yiye na Awurade asomfo no biara ammɛfra mo mu; momma ɛnka Baal asomfo nkutoo.” 

2 Ahene 10:24
Afei wɔbae sɛ wɔrebɛbɔ afɔre ne ɔhyew afɔre, na Yehu de mmarima aduɔwɔtwe gyinagyinaa abɔnten twɛnee, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Sɛ mo mu bi ma mmarima a mede wɔn bɛhyɛ mo nsa no bi guan a, ɛnde ne kra besi onii no kra ananmu.”

2 Ahene 10:25
Bere a owiee ɔhyew afɔre no, ɛhɔ ara na Yehu ka kyerɛɛ ammirikatufo ne akunini no sɛ: “Mommra mmekunkum wɔn! Mommma obiara mmfi adi.” Ɛnna ammirikatufo ne akunini no fii ase de nkrante kunkum wɔn, na wɔtotow wɔn guu abɔnten, na wɔkɔe ara koduu Baal abosonnan no mu. 

2 Ahene 10:26
Ɛnna woyiyii Baal fie hɔ abosom adum no fii adi, na wɔhyew ne nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 10:27
Bio nso, wobubuu Baal honi no, na Baal fie no nso wobubui, na wɔde yɛɛ agyananbea de besi nnɛ.

2 Ahene 10:28
Saa na ɛyɛe a Yehu tuu Baal ase fii Israel. 

2 Ahene 10:29
Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no nko na Yehu antwe ne ho amfi ho; ɛno ne sika nantwi mma a na biako si Betel na biako nso si Dan no. 

2 Ahene 10:3
monhwehwɛ mo wura mma no mu nea oye paa a asɛm nni ne ho, na momfa no nsi ne n'agya agua so. Na monko mma mo wura fie.”

2 Ahene 10:30
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yehu sɛ: “Sɛ woadi asɛmpa na woayɛ nea ɛteɛ m’ani so, na woayɛ nea ɛwɔ me komam sɛ mede bɛyɛ Ahab fiefo nyinaa nti, wubenya mma a wɔbɛtena Israel ahengua so de akosi awo ntoatoaso anan so.” 

2 Ahene 10:31
Nanso Yehu anhwɛ amfa ne koma nyinaa annantew Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn mmara mu. Wannan amfi Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no ho.

2 Ahene 10:32
Saa nna no mu na Awurade fii ase twitwaa Israel nsase nkakrankakra; Hasael kɔɔ so kunkum wɔn wɔ Israel nsase nyinaa so, 

2 Ahene 10:33
efi Yordan ho kosi owiapuei, Gileadfo nsase nyinaa, Gadfo ne Rubenfo ne Manasefo de, efi Aroer a ɛbɛn Arnon subon ne Gilead ne Basan nso.

2 Ahene 10:34
Yehu ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe ne ne nnwuma akɛse nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 10:35
Na Yehu ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no wɔ Samaria, na ne ba Yehoahas bedii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 10:36
Nna a Yehu de dii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria no si mfe aduonu awotwe.

2 Ahene 10:4
Na ehu kɛse kaa wɔn, na wɔkae sɛ: “Hwɛ! Ahene baanu mpo antumi annyina n’anim, na yɛn na yebetumi agyina?” 

2 Ahene 10:5
Enti ofiepanyin no ne kurow so hwɛfo no ne mpanyimfo no ne wɔn a wɔhwɛ mma no so no soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Yehu sɛ: “Yɛyɛ wo nkoa, enti nea wobɛka akyerɛ yɛn biara, yɛbɛyɛ. Yɛrensi obiara hene. Nea eye w’ani so biara, yɛ.”

2 Ahene 10:6
Na ɔkyerɛw wɔn krataa a ɛto so abien sɛ: “Sɛ mowɔ m’afa na sɛ me nne na mubetie a, ɛnde muntwitwa mo wura mmabarima a wɔwɔ mo nkyɛn no ti, na mommra me nkyɛn ɔkyena saa bere yi wɔ Yesreel.”

2 Ahene 10:7
Bere a wɔn nsa kaa krataa no ara pɛ, wɔfaa ɔhene mmabarima aduɔson no kunkum wɔn, na wɔde wɔn ti guu nkɛntɛn mu, na wɔsoma de kɔmaa no wɔ Yesreel. 

2 Ahene 10:8
Ɛnna ɔbɔfo bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wɔde ahenemma no ti aba.” Na ɔkae sɛ: “Mommoaboa ano akuw abien mfa ngu ɔkwan no ano nkosi anɔpa.” 

2 Ahene 10:9
Eduu anɔpa no, ofii adi. Na ogyinaa hɔ ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ: “Moyɛ treneefo. Me de, mebɔɔ me wura ho pɔw kum no; nanso hena na okum eyinom nyinaa? 

2 Ahene 11:1
 Na Ahasia maame Atalia hui sɛ ne ba no awu. Enti ɔsɔre kunkum ahenni no asefo nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 11:10
Afei ɔsɔfo no de Ɔhene Dawid mpeaw ne akyɛm nketewa a ɛwɔ Awurade fie hɔ no maa ɔha ha so mpanyimfo no. 

2 Ahene 11:11
Na ammirikatufo no nyinaa faa wɔn akode kurakuraa wɔn nsam, na wogyinagyinaa ofie no benkum ne ne nifa so ne afɔremuka no ho ne ofie no ho, na wotwaa ɔhene no ho hyiae. 

2 Ahene 11:12
Ɛnna ɔde ɔhene ba no fii adi bae, na ɔde ahemmotiri bɔɔ ne ti, na ɔde Adanse no hyɛɛ ne nsa. Wɔsraa no, na wosii no hene. Afei wɔbobɔɔ wɔn nsam kae sɛ: “Ɔhene nnya nkwa!”

2 Ahene 11:13
Bere a Atalia tee gyegyeegye sɛ ɔman no retu mmirika no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔbaa nkurɔfo no nkyɛn Awurade fie hɔ. 

2 Ahene 11:14
Ɔhwɛe no, ohui sɛ ɔhene no gyina edum no ho sɛnea amanne te, na mpanyimfo ne ntorobɛnto wɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn, na ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa redi ahurusi na wɔrehyɛn ntorobɛnto. Ɛhɔ ara na Atalia suan n’atade mu na ɔteɛɛm sɛ: “Atirisopam! Atirisopam!” 

2 Ahene 11:15
Ɛnna ɔsɔfo Yehoiada frɛɛ ɔha ha so mpanyimfo ne asraafo so mpanyimfo no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Montwe no mfi nnipa no mu, na obiara a obedi n’akyi no, momfa nkrante nkum no!” Na ɔsɔfo no aka sɛ: “Munnkum no wɔ Awurade fie.” 

2 Ahene 11:16
Enti wɔde wɔn nsa soo no mu, na wɔde no beduu apɔnkɔ pon no ano, ahemfie hɔ, na wokum no wɔ hɔ.

2 Ahene 11:17
Ɛnna Yehoiada maa ɔhene no ne ɔman no nyinaa ne Awurade yɛɛ apam sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Awurade man; na ɔmaa ɔhene no ne ɔman no nso yɛɛ bi. 

2 Ahene 11:18
Ɛno akyi no, ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa kɔɔ Baal fie hɔ, na wodwiriw n’afɔremuka no gui; wobubuu n’ahoni no pasaa, na Baal sɔfo Mattan nso, wokum no afɔremuka no anim.

2 Ahene 11:19
Afei ɔfaa ɔha ha so mpanyimfo ne Karia awɛmfo ne ammirikatufo ne ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa sɛ wɔmfa ɔhene no mfi Awurade fie hɔ mmra. Enti wɔfaa ammirikatufo pon no mu kɔɔ ahemfie hɔ, na ɔhene no tenaa ahengua no so. 

2 Ahene 11:2
Nanso Ɔhene Yoram babea Yehoseba a ɔyɛ Ahasia nuabea no faa Ahasia ba Yehoas, na owiaa no fii ahenemma a na wɔrekunkum wɔn no mu, ɔne ɔbea a ɔhwɛ no no, na ɔde no kohintaw ɔdan a mpa sisi mu no mu. Wɔde abofra no hintaw Atalia, enti wɔannya no ankum no. 

2 Ahene 11:20
Na ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa kɔɔ so dii ahurusi, na asomdwoe baa kurow no mu. Atalia de, wɔde nkrante kum no ahemfie hɔ.

2 Ahene 11:21
Yehoas bedii ade no, na wadi mfe ason.

2 Ahene 11:211
Ahene

2 Ahene 11:3
 Na ɔne no tenaa Awurade fie hɔ ahintawee mu mfe asia bere a Atalia dii asase no so hemmaa no.

2 Ahene 11:4
Na afe a ɛto so ason mu no, Yehoiada soma kɔfrɛɛ Kari awɛmfo ne ammirikatufo ɔha ha so mpanyimfo no baa ne nkyɛn wɔ Awurade fie, na ɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam ma wɔkaa ntam wɔ Awurade fie hɔ, na ɛno akyi no, ɔde ɔhene ba no kyerɛɛ wɔn. 

2 Ahene 11:5
Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Nea monyɛ ni: Mo mu nkyem abiɛsa mu biako mmra homeda, na mommɛwɛn ahemfie no yiye; 

2 Ahene 11:6
nkyem abiɛsa mu biako nkɔ Sur Pon no ano, na nkyem abiɛsa mu biako nso mmegyina ɔpon a ɛwɔ ammirikatufo no akyi no ano; obiara nnyina ne gyinabea nwɛn ofie no yiye. 

2 Ahene 11:7
 Na mo mu akuw abien a wɔn nyinaa fi adi kɔ homeda no, wɔn nso nwɛn Awurade fie no yiye, ɔhene no nti. 

2 Ahene 11:8
Na obiara mfa n’akode nkura ne nsam, na muntwa ɔhene no ho nhyia. Obiara a ɔbɛba awɛmfo no mu no, munkum no. Na montra ɔhene ho, n'adifi ne ne muba mu.”

2 Ahene 11:9
Enti ɔha ha so mpanyimfo no yɛɛ nea ɔsɔfo Yehoiada kae no nyinaa. Na wɔfaa wɔn mu mmarima a wɔreba hɔ homeda abɛsom ne wɔn a wɔabɛsom na wɔrekɔ homeda no bae, na wɔbaa ɔsɔfo Yehoiada nkyɛn. 

2 Ahene 12:1
 Na Yehu afe a ɛto so ason mu no, Yehoas bedii hene, na odii ade mfe aduanan wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne maame din de Sibiya a ofi Beer-Seba. 

2 Ahene 12:10
Na sɛ wohu sɛ sika pii aba adaka no mu a, ntɛm ara ɔhene kyerɛwfo ne ɔsɔfo panyin no ba bɛkyekyere, na wɔkan sika a wonya wɔ Awurade fie no. 

2 Ahene 12:11
Afei wɔde sika a wɔakan no hyɛ adwumayɛfo a wɔde wɔn asisi Awurade fie so no nsa, na wɔde tua dua adwumfo ne adansifo a wɔreyɛ adwuma Awurade fie hɔ no ka, 

2 Ahene 12:12
na wɔde bi nso tua abantofo ne abopaefo no ka, na wɔde bi tɔ nnua a wɔapae ne abo a wɔapae a wɔde besiesie faako a asɛesɛe wɔ Awurade fie hɔ no, na wɔde bi nso tuatua biribiara a wɔyɛ de siesiee ofie no ho ka.

2 Ahene 12:13
Nanso wɔamfa sika a wɔde ba Awurade fie no bi anyɛ Awurade fie hɔ dwetɛ asɛn ne adumgya ne nyaawa ne ntorobɛnto ne sika nneɛma ne dwetɛ nneɛma no biara; 

2 Ahene 12:14
mmom, wɔde sika no maa adwumayɛfo no, na wɔn nso de siesiee Awurade fie no. 

2 Ahene 12:15
Na nnipa a wɔde sika hyɛɛ wɔn nsa sɛ wɔmfa mma adwumayɛfo no, wɔne wɔn ammu ho akontaa, efisɛ wɔyɛɛ adwuma no nokwaredi mu. 

2 Ahene 12:16
Asodi afɔre sika ne bɔne afɔre sika no de, wɔamfa amma Awurade fie hɔ, na wɔde maa asɔfo no.

2 Ahene 12:17
Saa bere no, Siria hene Hasael foro kɔɔ Gat so ne no kɔkoe, na ogye fae; ɛno akyi no, Hasael de n’ani sii Yerusalem so sɛ ɔne wɔn rebɛko. 

2 Ahene 12:18
Ɛnna Yuda hene Yehoas sesaw ayɛyɛde kronkron a ne nananom, Yuda ahene Yehosafat ne Yehoram ne Ahasia, ayɛ no kronkron no, ne n’ayɛyɛde kronkron ne sika a ɛwɔ Awurade fie ne ahemfie akorade mu no nyinaa, na ɔsoma de kɔmaa Siria hene Hasael. Ɛnna ofii Yerusalem so kɔe.

2 Ahene 12:19
Yehoas ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 12:2
 Na Yehoas yɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so, ne nna a ɔsɔfo Yehoiada kyerɛkyerɛɛ no no nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 12:20
Nanso Yehoas nkoa sɔre bɔɔ ne ho pɔw, na wokum no wɔ Milo aban no ho, ɔkwan a ɛkɔ Sila no so. 

2 Ahene 12:21
Ne nkoa Simeat ba Yosakar, ne Somer ba Yehosabad na wɔbɔɔ no, na owui. Na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Amasia bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 12:212
Ahene

2 Ahene 12:3
 Nanso Sorɔnsorɔmmea no nko na amfi hɔ. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na wɔhyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ.

2 Ahene 12:4
 Na Yehoas ka kyerɛɛ asɔfo no sɛ: “Ayɛyɛde kronkron sika a wɔde ba Awurade fie nyinaa, ankorankoro tow, obiara kra ti sika, ne sika biara a ɛba obi komam sɛ ɔde bɛba Awurade fie no, 

2 Ahene 12:5
ma asɔfo no nnyigye mfi wɔn amannifo nkyɛn, na wonsiesie ofie no baabiara a asɛe.”

2 Ahene 12:6
Eduu Ɔhene Yehoas afe a ɛto so aduonu abiɛsa mu no, na asɔfo no nsiesiee faako a asɛesɛe wɔ ofie hɔ no. 

2 Ahene 12:7
Enti Ɔhene Yehoas frɛɛ ɔsɔfo Yehoiada ne asɔfo no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Dɛn nti na munsiesiee faako a asɛesɛe wɔ ofie hɔ no? Ɛno nti afei munnnyigye sika mmfi mo amannifo nkyɛn bio, na momfa sika no mma na wɔmfa nsiesie faako a asɛesɛe wɔ ofie hɔ no.” 

2 Ahene 12:8
Ɛnna asɔfo no penee so sɛ wɔrennyigye sika mfi ɔman no nkyɛn bio, na wɔrensiesie faako a asɛesɛe wɔ ofie hɔ no.

2 Ahene 12:9
 Ɛnna ɔsɔfo Yehoiada faa adaka bi, na otuu ne mmuaso no mu tokuru de sii afɔremuka no nkyɛn wɔ nifa so, nea wɔfa ba Awurade fie no; ɛhɔ na asɔfo no, wɔn a wɔhwɛ ɔpon ano no de sika a wɔde baa Awurade fie no nyinaa kogui. 

2 Ahene 13:1
 Ahasia ba, Yuda hene Yehoas afe a ɛto so aduonu abiɛsa mu no, na Yehu ba Yehoahas bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe dunson. 

2 Ahene 13:10
Yuda hene Yoas afe a ɛto so aduasa ason mu no, Yehoahas ba Yehoas bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe dunsia. 

2 Ahene 13:11
Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne. Wannan amfi Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no mu biara ho. Ɛno ara mu na ɔnantewee.

2 Ahene 13:12
 Na Yehoas ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne ne nnwuma akɛse, ne sɛnea ɔne Yuda hene Amasia koe no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 13:13
Na Yoas ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na Yeroboam bɛtenaa n’agua so. Wosiee Yehoas wɔ Samaria kaa Israel ahene ho.

2 Ahene 13:14
Elisa yaree ɔyare a ɛde no bɛkɔ owu mu. Enti Israel hene Yehoas siim kɔɔ ne nkyɛn kosui n’anim, na ɔkae sɛ: “M'agya, m'agya, Israel teaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo!” 

2 Ahene 13:15
Ɛnna Elisa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Fa tadua ne agyan.” Enti ɔfaa tadua ne agyan kurae. 

2 Ahene 13:16
Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: “Fa wo nsa so tadua no mu.” Na ɔde ne nsa soo mu, na Elisa nso de ne nsa guu ɔhene no nsa so. 

2 Ahene 13:17
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Bue apuei mfɛnsere no.” Na obuei. Ɛnna Elisa kae sɛ: “Tow!” Na ɔtowee. Afei ɔkae sɛ: “Awurade nkonimdi agyan ni; Siria so nkonimdi agyan ni! Wobɛbɔ Siria wɔ Afek akosi sɛ wubewie wɔn koraa.”

2 Ahene 13:18
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Sesaw agyan no.” Ɛnna ɔsesawee. Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: “Fa bobɔ fam.” Na ɔde bɔɔ hɔ mprɛnsa na ogyaee. 

2 Ahene 13:19
Na Nyankopɔn nipa no bo fuw no, na ɔkae sɛ: “Anka ɛsɛ sɛ wode bɔ hɔ mpɛn anum anaa asia! Ɛno de, anka wobɛbɔ Siria awie wɔn koraa, nanso seesei de, mprɛnsa pɛ na wobɛbɔ Siria.”

2 Ahene 13:2
Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne; Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no akyi na odii. Wannan amfi ho. 

2 Ahene 13:20
Ɛno akyi no, Elisa wui na wosiee no. NaMoab afowfo ba asase no so afe biara mfiase. 

2 Ahene 13:21
Bere bi na wɔrekosie ɔbarima bi, wɔnkɔhwɛ a, afowfo no na wɔreba yi. Ntɛm ara na wɔtow ɔbarima no too baabi a wosiee Elisa no, na woguanee. Bere a ɔbarima no amu kaa Elisa nnompe no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔbaa nkwa mu, na ɔsɔre gyinaa ne nan so.

2 Ahene 13:213
Ahene

2 Ahene 13:22
Na Siria hene Hasael haw Israel, Yehoahas nna nyinaa mu. 

2 Ahene 13:23
Nanso apam a Awurade ne Abraham ne Isak ne Yakob yɛe no nti, ɔdom wɔn huu wɔn mmɔbɔ, na otwaa n’ani hwɛɛ wɔn na wampɛ sɛ ɔsɛe wɔn; wantow wɔn amfi n’anim ankyene besi nnɛ. 

2 Ahene 13:24
Na Siria hene Hasael wui, na ne ba Ben-Hadad bedii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 13:25
Na Yehoahas ba Yoas san gyee nkurow a wogye fii ne papa Yehoahas nsam ɔko mu no fii Hasael ba Ben-Hadad nkyɛn. Yoas dii no so nkonim mprɛnsa, na ogyee Israel nkurow no bio.

2 Ahene 13:3
Awurade bo fuw Israel pii, enti ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ Siria hene Hasael ne Hasael ba Ben-Hadad nsa, wɔn nna nyinaa.

2 Ahene 13:4
Akyiri yi, Yehoahas hwehwɛɛ Awurade, na Awurade tiee no; ohuu nhyɛso a ɛbaa Israel so, nhyɛso a Siria hene de baa wɔn so no. 

2 Ahene 13:5
Enti Awurade maa Israel ogyefo ma wofii Siria nsam, na Israelfo tenatenaa wɔn afie mu sɛ kan no. 

2 Ahene 13:6
 Nanso Yeroboam fie bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no de, wɔantwe wɔn ho amfi ho. Ɛno ara mu na wɔnantewee; ɔbosom dua no nso amfi Samaria. 

2 Ahene 13:7
Na wɔannyaw dɔm biara amma Yehoahas gye  apɔnkɔsotefo aduonum ne nteaseɛnam du ne mmarima mpem du a wɔnam fam, efisɛ Siria hene kunkum wɔn, na ɔyɛɛ wɔn sɛ awiporowbea mfutuma.

2 Ahene 13:8
Yehoahas ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne ne nnwuma akɛse no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 13:9
Na Yehoahas ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no wɔ Samaria, na ne ba Yehoas bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 14:1
 Yehoahas ba, Israel hene Yoas afe a ɛto so abien mu no, Yuda hene Yehoas ba Amasia bedii hene. 

2 Ahene 14:10
Woaka Edom agu, enti wo koma ama ne ho so. Fa w’anuonyam na hwɛ so tena wo fie. Dɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ wudi aperepere na wo ne Yuda nyinaa hwe ase?” 

2 Ahene 14:11
Nanso Amasia antie.

2 Ahene 14:12
Na Yuda dii nkogu wɔ Israel anim ma obiara guan kɔɔ ne ntamadan mu. 

2 Ahene 14:13
Na Yuda hene Amasia, Yehoas ba, Ahasia ba no de, Israel hene Yehoas kyeree no wɔ Bet-Semes, na ɔde no baa Yerusalem, na obebuu Yerusalem fasu no guu mu, efi Efraim Pon ano kosi Twea Pon no ano, basafa ahanan. 

2 Ahene 14:14
Ɔsesaw sika ne dwetɛ ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ Awurade fie nyinaa ne ahemfie hɔ akorade, na ɔfaa ebinom nnommum kaa ho san kɔɔ Samaria.

2 Ahene 14:15
Yehoas ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe ne ne nnwuma akɛse ne sɛnea ɔne Yuda hene Amasia koe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 14:16
Na Yehoas ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no wɔ Samaria kaa Israel ahene ho, na ne ba Yeroboam bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 14:17
Israel hene Yoas, Yehoahas ba no wu akyi no, Yuda hene Amasia, Yehoas ba no, tenaa ase mfe dunum kaa ho. 

2 Ahene 14:18
Amasia ho nsɛm a aka no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

2 Ahene 14:19
Akyiri yi, wɔ bɔɔ ne ho pɔw wɔ Yerusalem, enti oguan kɔɔ Lakis; nanso wɔsoma tiw no Lakis kokum no wɔ hɔ. 

2 Ahene 14:2
Obedii ade no na wadi mfe aduonu anum, na odii ade mfe aduonu akron wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Yehoadin a ofi Yerusalem. 

2 Ahene 14:20
Enti wɔde no too apɔnkɔ so besiee no Yerusalem kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ Dawid Kurow mu. 

2 Ahene 14:21
Afei Yuda man no nyinaa faa Asaria a saa bere no na wadi mfe dunsia no, na wosii no hene ma odii ne papa Amasia ade. 

2 Ahene 14:214
Ahene

2 Ahene 14:22
Ɔno na ɔkyekyee Elat na ɔsan de maa Yuda bere a ɔhene no ne n’agyanom kɔdae no.

2 Ahene 14:23
Yoas ba, Yuda hene Amasia afe a ɛto so dunum mu no, Israel hene Yoas ba Yeroboam bedii hene wɔ Samaria mfe aduanan biako. 

2 Ahene 14:24
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne. Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no, wannan amfi emu biara ho. 

2 Ahene 14:25
Ɔno na ɔsan gyee Israel ahye maa wɔn, efi Hamat kosi Araba po no ano, sɛnea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn asɛm a ɔnam n’akoa Yona, Amitai ba, odiyifo a ofi Gat-Hefer so kae no te. 

2 Ahene 14:26
Na Awurade huu amanehunu pii a Israel faa mu no.  Na ɛyɛ nwene papa, na akoa anaa ɔdehye ne ɔboafo bi nni Israel. 

2 Ahene 14:27
Nanso na Awurade ahyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔrempopa Israel din mfi ɔsoro ase. Enti ɔnam Yehoas ba Yeroboam nsa so gyee wɔn.

2 Ahene 14:28
Yeroboam ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne ne nnwuma akɛse, sɛnea odii ako na ɔsan de Damasko ne Hamat maa Yuda wɔ Israel no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 14:29
Na Yeroboam ne n’agyanom Israel ahene no kɔdae, na ne ba Sakaria bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 14:3
Na ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so, nanso wanto ne nana Dawid. Nea ne papa Yoas yɛe no, ɛno ara bi na ɔno nso yɛe. 

2 Ahene 14:4
 Nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea no nko na amfi hɔ. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na wɔhyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ. 

2 Ahene 14:5
Bere a ahenni no timm ne nsam ara pɛ na okunkum ne nkoa a wokum ne papa, ɔhene no. 

2 Ahene 14:6
Awudifo no mma de, wankum wɔn, na ɔyɛɛ nea wɔakyerɛw wɔ Mose mmara nhoma no mu sɛnea Awurade hyɛe sɛ: “Munnkum agyanom nea wɔn mma ayɛ ho nti, na munnkum mma nea wɔn agyanom ayɛ ho nti; na mmom obiara bɔne na monhwɛ ho nkum no.” 

2 Ahene 14:7
Ɔno na okunkum Edomfo wɔ Nkyene Bon no mu, mmarima mpem du, na ogyee Sela wɔ ɔko no mu, na ɔtoo hɔ din Yokteel de besi nnɛ.

2 Ahene 14:8
Saa bere no, Amasia tuu abɔfo kɔɔ Yehu ba Yehoahas ba, Israel hene Yehoas nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Bra ma yɛmfa mmɔ ani.” 

2 Ahene 14:9
Na Israel hene Yehoas nso soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Yuda hene Amasia sɛ: “Lebanon nsɔensɔe soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Lebanon kyeneduru sɛ, ‘Fa wo babea ma me babarima nware.’ Nanso, Lebanon wuram aboa bi a ɔretwam tiatiaa nsɔensɔe no so kum no. 

2 Ahene 15:1
 Israel hene Yeroboam afe a ɛto so aduonu ason mu no, Yuda hene Amasia ba Asaria bedii hene. 

2 Ahene 15:10
Na Yebes ba Salum bɔɔ ne ho pɔw, na ɔbɔɔ no kum no wɔ Yibleam, na obedii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 15:11
Sakaria ho nsɛm a aka no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

2 Ahene 15:12
Saa na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yehu sɛ: “Wubenya mma a wɔbɛtena Israel ahengua so de akosi awo ntoatoaso anan so.” Na ɛbaa mu saa.

2 Ahene 15:13
Yebes ba Salum bedii hene wɔ Yuda hene Usia afe a ɛto so aduasa akron mu, na odii ade ɔsram biako pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ Samaria. 

2 Ahene 15:14
Na Gadi ba Menahem siim fii Tirsa kɔɔ Samaria, na ɔkɔbɔɔ Yebes ba Salum kum no wɔ Samaria, na obedii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 15:15
Salum ho nsɛm a aka ne pɔw a ɔbɔe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 15:16
Saa bere no, Menahem fi Tirsa kɔsɛee Tifsa ne nea ɛwom nyinaa ne ne nsase; efisɛ wɔanhiɛ no nti, ɔsɛee no. Emu apemfo nso, ɔpaapaee wɔn nyinaa mu.

2 Ahene 15:17
Yuda hene Asaria afe a ɛto so aduasa akron mu no, Gadi ba Menahem bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe du. 

2 Ahene 15:18
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne. Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no, wannan amfi emu biara ho, ne nna nyinaa mu. 

2 Ahene 15:19
Na Asiria hene Pul baa asase no so. Enti Menahem maa Pul dwetɛ dwetikɛse apem sɛ onso ne mu mmoa no mma ahenni no nyɛ den ne nsam. 

2 Ahene 15:2
Obedii ade no, na wadi mfe dunsia, na odii hene mfe aduonum abien wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Yekolia, na ofi Yerusalem. 

2 Ahene 15:20
Israelfo nkyɛn na Menahem gyigyee dwetɛ no, adefo no nyinaa hɔ; ogyee obiara hɔ dwetɛ nnwetɛbona aduonum, na ɔde maa Asiria hene. Ɛno nti Asiria hene san n’akyi, na wantena asase no so hɔ. 

2 Ahene 15:21
Menahem ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 15:215
Ahene

2 Ahene 15:22
Na Menahem ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na ne ba Pekahia bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 15:23
Yuda hene Asaria afe a ɛto so aduonum mu no, na Menahem ba Pekahia bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe abien. 

2 Ahene 15:24
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne. Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no, wannan amfi ho. 

2 Ahene 15:25
Na ne kunini Remalia ba Peka bɔɔ ne ho pɔw, na ɔne Gileadfo aduonum bɔɔ no kum no wɔ Samaria ahemfie abantenten no mu, ɔne Argob ne Arie. Okum no, na obedii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 15:26
Pekahia ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

2 Ahene 15:27
Yuda hene Asaria afe a ɛto so aduonum abien mu no, na Remalia ba Peka bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe aduonu. 

2 Ahene 15:28
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne. Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no, wannan amfi ho. 

2 Ahene 15:29
Israel hene Peka nna mu no, Asiria hene Tiglat-Pilesa bae bɛfaa Eyon ne Abel-Bet-Maaka ne Yanoa ne Kedes ne Hasor ne Gilead ne Galilea, Naftali nsase nyinaa, na ɔfaa wɔn nnommum kɔɔ Asiria. 

2 Ahene 15:3
Ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so sɛnea ne papa Amasia yɛe no ara. 

2 Ahene 15:30
Na Ela ba Hosea bɔɔ Remalia ba Peka ho pɔw, na ɔbɔɔ no kum no, na obedii n’ade Usia ba Yotam afe a ɛto so aduonu mu. 

2 Ahene 15:31
Peka ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Israel ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu.

2 Ahene 15:32
Remalia ba, Israel hene Peka afe a ɛto so abien mu na Yuda hene Usia ba Yotam bedii hene. 

2 Ahene 15:33
Obedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu anum, na odii hene mfe dunsia wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Yerusa a ɔyɛ Sadok babea. 

2 Ahene 15:34
 Na ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so. Sɛnea ne papa Usia yɛe no, saa na ɔno nso yɛe. 

2 Ahene 15:35
 Gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no nko na amfi hɔ. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na wɔhyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ. Ɔno na osii Awurade fie pon a ɛwɔ atifi fam no. 

2 Ahene 15:36
Yotam ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 15:37
Nna no mu na Awurade maa Siria hene Resin ne Remalia ba Peka kɔɔ Yuda so. 

2 Ahene 15:38
Na Yotam ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ ne nana Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Ahas bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 15:4
 Gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no nko na amfi hɔ. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na wɔhyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ. 

2 Ahene 15:5
Akyiri yi, Awurade de ɔyare bɔɔ ɔhene no, na ɔyaree kwata kosii ne wuda; ɔkɔtenaa ne fie, na ɔhene no ba Yotam na ɔhwɛɛ ofie no so, na ɔno na obuu ɔman no mu nnipa atɛn. 

2 Ahene 15:6
Asaria ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 15:7
Na Asaria ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Yotam bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 15:8
Yuda hene Asaria afe a ɛto so aduasa awotwe mu no, Yeroboam ba Sakaria bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria asram asia. 

2 Ahene 15:9
 Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea n’agyanom yɛe no. Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no, wannan amfi ho. 

2 Ahene 16:1
 Remalia ba Peka afe a ɛto so dunson mu na Yuda hene Yotam ba Ahas bedii hene. 

2 Ahene 16:10
Na Ɔhene Ahas siim kohyiaa Asiria hene Tiglat-Pilesa wɔ Damasko, na okohuu afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Damasko no. Enti Ɔhene Ahas soma ma wɔde afɔremuka no nsusuwso ne ne yɛbea nyinaa kɔmaa ɔsɔfo Uriya. 

2 Ahene 16:11
Na ɔsɔfo Uriya sii afɔremuka no. Sɛnea Ɔhene Ahas soma fii Damasko bɛka kyerɛɛ ɔsɔfo Uriya no, saa ara na ɔyɛɛ no de twɛn sɛ Ɔhene Ahas befi Damasko aba. 

2 Ahene 16:12
Bere a ɔhene fi Damasko bae no, ɔhene behuu afɔremuka no, na ɔhene twiw bɛn afɔremuka no, na ɔbɔɔ afɔre wɔ so. 

2 Ahene 16:13
Na ɔtoaa so bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne n’aduan afɔre wɔ afɔremuka no so; ohwiee afɔrebɔ nsa guu so na ɔpetee n’asomdwoe afɔre mogya nso wɔ so. 

2 Ahene 16:14
 Na kɔbere afɔremuka a esi Awurade anim no, oyi fii ofie no anim, n’afɔremuka no ne Awurade fie no ntam, na ɔde besii n’afɔremuka no nkyɛn wɔ atifi fam. 

2 Ahene 16:15
Na Ɔhene Ahas hyɛɛ ɔsɔfo Uriya sɛ: “Afɔremuka kɛse no so na bɔ anɔpa ɔhyew afɔre ne anwummere aduan afɔre ne ɔhene ɔhyew afɔre ne n’aduan afɔre ne asase no so nnipa nyinaa ɔhyew afɔre ne wɔn aduan afɔre, na hwie wɔn afɔrebɔ nsa gu so; ɔhyew afɔre mogya ne afɔrebɔ mogya no nyinaa nso, pete wɔ so. Kɔbere afɔremuka no de, mɛhwɛ nea mede bɛyɛ.” 

2 Ahene 16:16
Na ɔsɔfo Uriya yɛɛ nea Ɔhene Ahas hyɛe no nyinaa.

2 Ahene 16:17
Bio nso, Ɔhene Ahas twitwaa nnaka a wɔde twe nsu no ho nhyehyem ntraantraa no mu asinasin, na oyiyii asɛn no fii so; oyii po no fii kɔbere anantwi a ɛtaa wɔn akyi no so, na ɔde sii abo nsɛwee bi so. 

2 Ahene 16:18
Homeda abrannaa a wɔakuru so a wɔasi wɔ ofie hɔ ne ɔhene abɔnten kwan ano no nso, oyi fii Awurade fie hɔ, Asiria hene nti.

2 Ahene 16:19
Ahas ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 16:2
Ahas bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu, na odii hene mfe dunsia wɔ Yerusalem, nanso wanyɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn ani so sɛ ne nana Dawid. 

2 Ahene 16:20
Na Ahas ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no kaa n’agyanom ho wɔ Dawid Kurow mu, na ne ba Hesekia bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 16:216
Ahene

2 Ahene 16:3
 Nanso Israel ahene akwan so na ɔfae; ɔmaa n’ankasa ne ba mpo faa ogya mu de no bɔɔ afɔde nam so yɛɛ akyide a amanaman a Awurade pam wɔn fii Israelfo anim yɛe no bi. 

2 Ahene 16:4
 Na ɔkɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔre na ɔhyew aaduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea ne nkoko so ne nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa bi ase.

2 Ahene 16:5
Saa bere no mu na Siria hene Resin ne Remalia ba Peka a ɔyɛ Israel hene no baa Yerusalem so sɛ wɔne wɔn rebɛko, na wɔkaa Ahas hyɛɛ mu, nanso wɔantumi wɔn. 

2 Ahene 16:6
Bere no ara mu na Siria hene Resin san gyee Elat maa Edom, na ɔpam Yudafo no fii Elat maa Edomfo no kɔɔ hɔ kɔtenaa hɔ de besi nnɛ. 

2 Ahene 16:7
Enti Ahas tuu abɔfo kɔɔ Asiria hene Tiglat-Pilesa nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Meyɛ w’akoa ne wo ba, enti bra begye me fi Siria hene nsam ne Israel hene nsam na wɔasɔre aba me so.” 

2 Ahene 16:8
Ahas sesaw dwetɛ ne sika a ɛwɔ Awurade fie ne ahemfie akorade mu no, na ɔsoma ma wɔde kɔmaa Asiria hene sɛ ayɛyɛde. 

2 Ahene 16:9
Ɛnna Asiria hene tiee no, na Asiria hene kɔɔ Damasko kogyei; ɔde emu nnipa kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Kir, na okum Resin.

2 Ahene 17:1
 Yuda hene Ahas afe a ɛto so dumien mu no, na Ela ba Hosea bedii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfe akron. 

2 Ahene 17:10
wosisii abosom adum ne abosonnua wɔ nkoko atenten so ne nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa bi ase; 

2 Ahene 17:11
wɔkɔɔ so hyew aduhuam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea no so te sɛ amanaman a wɔn nti Awurade de wɔn kɔɔ nkoasom mu no, na wɔyɛɛ nneɛma bɔne de hyɛɛ Awurade abufuw.

2 Ahene 17:12
Wɔsom abosom fi a Awurade kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monnyɛ saa ade yi” no; 

2 Ahene 17:13
 Na Awurade nam n’adiyifo nyinaa ne adehufo nyinaa so bɔɔ Israel ne Yuda kɔkɔ sɛ: “Monnan mfi mo akwammɔne ho, na munni me mmara nsɛm ne m’ahyɛde so sɛnea mmara a mede maa mo agyanom na menam me nkoa adiyifo so de brɛɛ mo no te”. 

2 Ahene 17:14
Nanso wɔantie na wosinsen wɔn kɔn sɛnea wɔn agyanom a wɔannye Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn anni no sinsen wɔn kɔn no; 

2 Ahene 17:15
wɔpoo n’ahyɛde ne apam a ɔne wɔn agyanom yɛe ne ne nkaesɛm a ɔde bɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ no, na wokodii abosonhuhuw akyi, na wɔn nso bɛyɛɛ ahuhufo, na suasuaa amanaman a atwa wɔn ho ahyia a Awurade hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnnyɛ sɛ wɔn no nyinaa.

2 Ahene 17:16
 Na wogyaw Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn ahyɛde nyinaa, na wɔyeyɛɛ dade ahoni, nantwi mma abien, na wɔyɛɛ ɔbosom dua, na wɔkotow ɔsoro asafo nyinaa, na wɔsom Baal; 

2 Ahene 17:17
wɔmaa wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea faa ogya mu na wɔhyehyɛɛ abosonkɔm kɔɔ abisa, na wɔtɔn wɔn ho yɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne de hyɛɛ no abufuw.

2 Ahene 17:18
Enti Awurade bo fuw Israel pii, na oyii wɔn fii n’anim. Wamma obiara anka, gye Yuda abusuakuw no nko.

2 Ahene 17:19
Yuda mpo anni Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so, na mmom Israel ahene ahyɛde a wɔn ankasa hyehyɛe no mu na wɔnantewee. 

2 Ahene 17:2
 Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne de, nanso anto Israel ahene a wodii n’anim no. 

2 Ahene 17:20
Ɛno nti Awurade poo Israel asefo nyinaa na ɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase de wɔn hyɛɛ afowfo nsa kosii sɛ ɔtow wɔn fii n’anim kyenee. 

2 Ahene 17:21
Na ɔtew Israel fii Dawid fie ho, na wɔde Nebat ba Yeroboam sii hene; Yeroboam danee Israel fii Awurade akyi, na ɔma wɔyɛɛ bɔne kɛse. 

2 Ahene 17:217
Ahene

2 Ahene 17:22
Na Israelfo nantew Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe nyinaa mu. Wɔantwe wɔn ho amfi ho, 

2 Ahene 17:23
kosii sɛ Awurade tow Israel fii n’anim kyenee sɛnea ɔnam ne nkoa adiyifo no nyinaa so kae no. Enti Israel fii wɔn asase so kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Asiria de besi nnɛ.

2 Ahene 17:24
Ɛnna Asiria hene de nnipa fi Babilon ne Kuta ne Awa ne Hamat ne Sefarwayim bɛtenatenaa Samaria nkurow mu, na wobesii Israelfo ananmu, na wɔfaa Samaria tenatenaa ɛhɔ nkurow mu. 

2 Ahene 17:25
Bere a wɔbɛtenaa hɔ foforo no, na wonsuro Awurade. Enti Awurade maa agyata kɔɔ wɔn mu kokunkum wɔn mu binom. 

2 Ahene 17:26
Ɛnna wɔsoma kɔka kyerɛɛ Asiria hene sɛ: “Amanaman a woafa wɔn nnommum de wɔn akɔtenatena Samaria nkurow mu no, esiane sɛ wonnim sɛnea wɔsom asase no Nyame nti, ɔsoma agyata ba wɔn mu; na hwɛ! kum ara na wɔrekunkum wɔn, efisɛ obiara nnim sɛnea wɔsom asase no Nyame.”

2 Ahene 17:27
Ɛnna Asiria hene hyɛe sɛ: “Momfa asɔfo a mofaa wɔn nnommum wɔ hɔ no biako nkɔ hɔ, na ɔnkɔtena hɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛnea wɔsom asase no Nyame.” 

2 Ahene 17:28
Enti asɔfo a wɔfaa wɔn nnommum fii Samaria no mu biako kɔɔ hɔ, na ɔkɔtenaa Betel kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛnea wɔnsom Awurade.

2 Ahene 17:29
Nanso amanaman no biara yɛɛ ne nyame, na wɔde wɔn sisii sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ adan a Samariafo sisii no mu. Ɔman biara yɛɛ ne de wɔ kurow a wɔte mu no mu. 

2 Ahene 17:3
Ɔno na Asiria hene Salmaneser baa no so, na Hosea bɛyɛɛ n’akoa na ofii ase tuaa tow maa no.

2 Ahene 17:30
Babilonfo yɛɛ Sukot-Benot, na Kutfo yɛɛ Nergal, na Hamatfo nso yɛɛ Asima. 

2 Ahene 17:31
Awafo yɛɛ Nibhas ne Tartak, na Sefarwayimfo hyew wɔn mma ogya mu maa Sefarwayimfo anyame Adramelek ne Anamelek. 

2 Ahene 17:32
Wosuroo Awurade, na wɔyeyɛɛ wɔn man mufo asɔfo wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ ma wodii wɔn anim somee wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ adan no mu. 

2 Ahene 17:33
Wosuroo Awurade de, nanso wɔn ankasa anyame na wɔsom wɔn, sɛnea amanaman a woyii wɔn fii wɔn mu kɔɔ nkoasom mu no som te.

2 Ahene 17:34
Ɛde besi nnɛ no, wɔda so ara som sɛnea na wɔyɛ kan no. Wɔn mu biara ansom Awurade, na n’ahyɛde ne n’atemmusɛm ne ne mmara ne mmara nsɛm a Awurade de maa Yakob a ɔbɛfrɛɛ no Israel no mma nso, wɔn mu biara anni so; 

2 Ahene 17:35
ɛhɔ na Awurade ne wɔn yɛɛ apam na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monnsuro anyame foforo, monnkotow wɔn, monnsom wɔn, na mommmɔ afɔre mmma wɔn. 

2 Ahene 17:36
Na mmom Awurade a ɔde tumi kɛse ne nsa a wateɛ mu yii mo fii Egypt no, ɔno na monnsuro no, na ɔno na monkotow no, na mommɔ afɔre mma no. 

2 Ahene 17:37
Na ahyɛde ne atemmusɛm ne mmara ne mmara nsɛm a ɔkyerɛw maa mo no, monhwɛ nni so daa; munnsuro anyame foforo. 

2 Ahene 17:38
Na apam a me ne mo ayɛ no, mommma mo werɛ mmfi; munnsuro anyame foforo. 

2 Ahene 17:39
 Na mmom Awurade mo Nyankopɔn nko na monnsuro no, efisɛ ɔno na obegye mo afi mo atamfo nyinaa nsam.”

2 Ahene 17:4
Nanso Asiria hene hui sɛ Hosea pɛ sɛ ɔtew atua, efisɛ ɔsomaa abɔfo kɔɔ Egypt hene a wɔfrɛ no So nkyɛn, na tow a ɛsɛ sɛ otua ma Asiria hene no, wantua sɛnea na ɔyɛ kan mfe mu no. Enti Asiria hene kyekyeree no too afiase too no mu.

2 Ahene 17:40
Nanso wɔantie, na mmom wɔsom sɛnea wɔsom kan no. 

2 Ahene 17:41
Amanaman yi suroo Awurade de, nanso wɔn ahoni a wɔasen na wɔsom wɔn. Wɔn mma ne wɔn mmanana nso, sɛnea wɔn agyanom yɛe no, saa ara na wɔn nso ayɛ de besi nnɛ.

2 Ahene 17:5
Asiria hene tu baa asase no nyinaa so, na ɔbaa Samaria betwaa ho hyiae mfe abiɛsa. 

2 Ahene 17:6
Hosea afe a ɛto so akron mu na Asiria hene dii Samaria so nkonim, na ɔde Israelfo kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Asiria, na ɔde wɔn kɔtenatenaa Hala ne Habor wɔ asubɔnten Gosan ho ne Mediafo nkurow mu.

2 Ahene 17:7
 Na nea ɛma ɛbaa saa ne sɛ, Israelfo yɛɛ bɔne tiaa Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn a oyii wɔn fii Egypt asase so wɔ Egypt hene Farao nsam no, na wɔkɔsom anyame foforo; 

2 Ahene 17:8
 na wɔnantew amanaman a Awurade pam wɔn fii Israelfo anim no ahyɛde mu, ne Israel ahene ahyɛde a wɔn ankasa hyehyɛe mu. 

2 Ahene 17:9
 Na Israelfo yɛɛ Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn ani so bɔne, na wosisii sorɔnsorɔmmea wɔn nkurow nyinaa mu, efi awɛmfo aban so kosi kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban so; 

2 Ahene 18:1
 Ɛbae sɛ Ela ba, Israel hene Hosea afe a ɛto so abiɛsa mu no, na Yuda hene Ahas ba Hesekia bedii hene. 

2 Ahene 18:10
Mfe abiɛsa rekɔ awiei no, odii so nkonim; Hesekia afe a ɛto so asia a ɛyɛ Israel hene Hosea afe a ɛto so akron mu na wodii Samaria so nkonim. 

2 Ahene 18:11
Ɛno akyi no, Asiria hene de Israelfo kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Asiria, na ɔde wɔn kɔtenatenaa Hala ne Habor wɔ asubɔnten Gosan ho ne Mediafo nkurow mu, 

2 Ahene 18:12
efisɛ wɔantie Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn nne, na mmom wobuu n’apam so, kyerɛ sɛ, nea Awurade akoa Mose hyɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa; wɔantie na wɔanyɛ.

2 Ahene 18:13
 Na ɔhene Hesekia afe a ɛto so dunan mu no, Asiria hene Senaherib baa Yuda nkurow a wɔabɔ ho ban no nyinaa so bɛfae. 

2 Ahene 18:14
Ɛnna Yuda hene Hesekia soma kɔɔ Asiria hene nkyɛn wɔ Lakis sɛ: “Mayɛ bɔne. San fi me so, na nea wode bɛto me so biara, metua.” Enti Asiria hene kae sɛ Yuda hene Hesekia ntua dwetɛ dwetikɛse ahasa ne sika dwetikɛse aduasa. 

2 Ahene 18:15
Na Hesekia de dwetɛ a ɛwɔ Awurade fie ne ahemfie akorade mu no nyinaa maa no. 

2 Ahene 18:16
Saa bere no, Hesekia twitwaa Awurade asɔrefie no apon ne apongua a Yuda hene Hesekia de sika duraa ho no, na ɔde maa Asiria hene.

2 Ahene 18:17
Na Asiria hene somaa Tartan ne Rabsaris ne Rabsake fii Lakis de asraafodɔm kɛse kaa wɔn ho sɛ wɔnkɔ Ɔhene Hesekia nkyɛn wɔ Yerusalem, enti wosiim kɔɔ Yerusalem. Wɔkɔe no, wokogyinaa atifi fam ɔtare no suka ho, ɔtempɔn a ɛkɔ ntamasifo asase so no so. 

2 Ahene 18:18
Na wɔteɛɛm frɛɛ ɔhene no, na Hilkia ba Eliakim a ɔyɛ ofiepanyin, ne Sebna a ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo, ne Asaf ba Yoa a ɔyɛ ɔhene krakye behyiaa wɔn.

2 Ahene 18:19
Ɛnna Rabsake ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔka nkyerɛ Hesekia sɛ, ‘Nea ɔhenkɛse, Asiria hene, se ni: “Dɛn koraa na wode wo ho ato so yi? 

2 Ahene 18:2
Obedii ade no na wadi mfe aduonu anum, na odii hene mfe aduonu akron wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne maame din de Abi a ɔyɛ Sakaria ba. 

2 Ahene 18:20
Wususuw sɛ anosɛm nko yɛ akodi ho nyansa ne mmaninyɛ. Hwɛ, hena koraa na wode wo ho ato no so a enti woatew atua atia me yi? 

2 Ahene 18:21
Wo ara hwɛ! Egypt na wode wo ho ato no so, demmire a emu abu a sɛ onipa tweri a ɛbɛwɔ ne nsam ahwirew mu yi. Saa na Egypt hene Farao te ma wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to no so nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 18:218
Ahene

2 Ahene 18:22
Na sɛ moka kyerɛ me sɛ, ‘Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn na yɛde yɛn ho ato no so’ a, ɛnyɛ ɔno ara na Hesekia atutu ne sorɔnsorɔmmea ne n’afɔremuka na waka akyerɛ Yuda ne Yerusalem sɛ: ‘Afɔremuka yi anim na monkotow wɔ Yerusalem’ no?”’ 

2 Ahene 18:23
Afei wopɛ a, wo ne me wura Asiria hene nto nkyia na memma wo apɔnkɔ mpem abien, na hwɛ sɛ wubetumi anya mmarima atenatena so anaa. 

2 Ahene 18:24
Na sɛ nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔsotefo nti na wode wo ho ato Egypt so a, wobɛyɛ dɛn atumi ako atia me wura nkoa nkumaa no mu amrado biako mpo? 

2 Ahene 18:25
Mugye di sɛ Awurade amma me kwan a anka mɛba sɛ merebɛsɛe ha? Awurade na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, ‘Kɔ asase yi so na kɔsɛe no.’”

2 Ahene 18:26
Ɛnna Hilkia ba Eliakim ne Sebna ne Yoa ka kyerɛɛ Rabsake sɛ: “Yɛsrɛ wo, wo ne wo nkoa nka Siria kasa, na yɛte; wo ne yɛn nnka Yudafo kasa mmma nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ ɔfasu no so no nnte.” 

2 Ahene 18:27
Nanso Rabsake ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Mo wura ne mo nti na me wura somaa me sɛ memmɛka nsɛm yi anaa? Ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔtete ɔfasu no so nti, sɛnea ɛbɛma wɔadi wɔn tiafi na wɔanom wɔn dwensɔ sɛ mo ara?”

2 Ahene 18:28
Afei Rabsake gyinaa yiye, na ɔde nne kɛse teɛɛm wɔ Yudafo kasa mu kae sɛ: “Muntie ɔhenkɛse, Asiria hene no, nsɛm. 

2 Ahene 18:29
Nea ɔhene aka ni, ‘Mommma Hesekia nnnaadaa mo, na ɔrentumi nnye mo mfi me nsam. 

2 Ahene 18:3
Na ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so sɛnea ne nana Dawid yɛe no ara. 

2 Ahene 18:30
Munnni Hesekia akyi mmfa mo ho nnto Awurade so nnka sɛ: “Ogye na Awurade begye yɛn, na ɔremfa kurow yi nhyɛ Asiria hene nsa.” 

2 Ahene 18:31
Munntie Hesekia, na Asiria hene aka sɛ: “Mungow mo ho mma me na mommra me nkyɛn na obiara nni n’ankasa bobe ne ne borɔdɔma, na ɔnnom n’ankasa abura mu nsu, 

2 Ahene 18:32
nkosi sɛ mɛba abɛfa mo akɔ asase a ɛte sɛ mo ara mo asase so, asase a awi ne nsafoforo wɔ so, asase a paanoo ne bobe nturo wɔ so, asase a ngodua ne ɛwo wɔ so, na moatena nkwa mu, na moanwuwu. Munntie Hesekia efisɛ sɛ ɔka sɛ, ‘Awurade begye yɛn’ a, na ɔredaadaa mo. 

2 Ahene 18:33
Amanaman no anyame no bi atumi agye ne nkurɔfo afi Asiria hene nsam pɛn? 

2 Ahene 18:34
Hamat ne Arpad anyame no wɔ he? Sefarwayim ne Hena ne Iwa anyame no nso wɔ he? Wɔatumi agye Samaria afi me nsam anaa? 

2 Ahene 18:35
Amanaman no anyame nyinaa mu hena na watumi agye ne man afi me nsam a enti Awurade betumi agye Yerusalem afi me nsam?”’”

2 Ahene 18:36
Nanso nkurɔfo no yɛɛ komm na wɔanka asɛm biara, efisɛ na ɔhene aka sɛ: “Mummmua no.” 

2 Ahene 18:37
Ɛnna Hilkia ba Eliakim a ɔyɛ ofiepanyin, ne Sebna a ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo, ne Asaf ba Yoa a ɔyɛ ɔhene krakye sunsuan wɔn ntade mu, kɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn, na wɔkaa Rabsake nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no.

2 Ahene 18:4
Ɔno na oyiyii sorɔnsorɔmmea no, na obubuu abosom adum no pasaa, otwitwaa ɔbosom dua no, na obubuu kɔbere ɔwɔ a Mose yɛe no muhumuhu, efisɛ ɛde besi saa bere no, na Israelfo hyew aduhuam ma no, na wɔfrɛ no kɔbere ɔwɔ honi no sɛ Nehustan. 

2 Ahene 18:5
Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn so na ɔde ne ho toe; n’akyi no, obiara amma sɛ ɔno, Yuda ahene mu, obiara anni n’anim saa. 

2 Ahene 18:6
Ɔbataa Awurade ho. Wannan amfi n’akyi, na mmom odii Awurade mmara nsɛm a ɔhyɛɛ Mose no so. 

2 Ahene 18:7
Awurade dii n’akyi. Ɔyɛɛ n’ade nyansam wɔ biribiara mu; ɔtew Asiria hene so atua, na wansom no. 

2 Ahene 18:8
Ɔno na okunkum Filistifo koduu Gasa ne n’ahye so, efi awɛmfo aban so kosii kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban so.

2 Ahene 18:9
Na Ɔhene Hesekia afe a ɛto so anan a ɛyɛ Ela ba, Israel hene Hosea afe a ɛto so ason mu no, Asiria hene Salmaneser baa Samaria so betwaa ho hyiae. 

2 Ahene 19:1
 Bere a Ɔhene Hesekia tee asɛm no ara na osuan n’atade mu na ofuraa atweaatam kɔɔ Awurade fie. 

2 Ahene 19:10
“Monkɔka nkyerɛ Yuda hene Hesekia sɛ, ‘Mma wo Nyankopɔn a wode wo ho ato no so no nnnaadaa wo sɛ: “Wɔremfa Yerusalem nhyɛ Asiria hene nsa.” 

2 Ahene 19:11
 Hwɛ, w’ankasa woate nea Asiria ahene de yɛɛ nsase no nyinaa, sɛnea wɔsɛee wɔn pasaa no; wo na wubenya wo ti adidi mu anaa? 

2 Ahene 19:12
Aman a m’agyanom sɛee wɔn no anyame tumi gyee wɔn anaa? Wotumi gyee Gosan ne Haran ne Resef ne Eden mma a na wɔwɔ Tel-Asar no? 

2 Ahene 19:13
Ɛhe na Hamat hene ne Arpad hene ne Sefarwayim ne Hena ne Iwa nkurow so ahene no wɔ?’”

2 Ahene 19:14
Ɛnna Hesekia gyee krataa no fii abɔfo no nsam kenkanee, na Hesekia kɔɔ Awurade fie kɔtrɛw mu wɔ Awurade anim. 

2 Ahene 19:15
Na Hesekia bɔɔ mpae Awurade anim sɛ: “O Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a wote kerubim so, wo nko ara ne Nyankopɔn, asase so ahenni nyinaa so. Wo na woyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase. 

2 Ahene 19:16
O Awurade, yɛ aso, na tie. Awurade, bue w’aniwa, na hwɛ, na tie nsɛm a Senaherib asoma sɛ wɔmfa mmetwa Onyankopɔn teasefo no mpoa. 

2 Ahene 19:17
Awurade, ɛyɛ nokware sɛ Asiria ahene asɛe amanaman ne wɔn nsase, 

2 Ahene 19:18
na wɔtow wɔn anyame guu ogya mu, efisɛ wɔnyɛ anyame, na mmom wɔyɛ nnipa nsa ano adwuma, nnua ne abo, enti wɔsɛee wɔn. 

2 Ahene 19:19
Enti afei, O Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, yɛsrɛ wo, gye yɛn fi ne nsam na asase so ahenni nyinaa nhu sɛ wo, Awurade, wo nkutoo ne Onyankopɔn.”

2 Ahene 19:2
Afei ɔsomaa Eliakim a ɔyɛ ofiepanyin, ne Sebna a ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo, ne asɔfo mpanyinfo kɔɔ Amos ba odiyifo Yesaia nkyɛn; na wofurafura ntweaatam. 

2 Ahene 19:20
Na Amos ba Yesaia soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Hesekia sɛ: “Nea Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade se ni, ‘Mpae a woabɔ wɔ Asiria hene Senaherib ho no, mate. 

2 Ahene 19:21
Awurade asɛm a waka atia no ni:

2 Ahene 19:219
Ahene

2 Ahene 19:22
Hena na woatwa no mpoa akasa atia no yi?

2 Ahene 19:23
Wonam abɔfo so atwa Awurade mpoa aka sɛ,

2 Ahene 19:24
Me na metutu fam na manom amannɔne nsu,

2 Ahene 19:25
Wontee anaa sɛ mebɔɔ me tirim sɛ mɛyɛ akyɛ?

2 Ahene 19:26
Na emu nnipa nsam behodwow;

2 Ahene 19:27
Na w'asetra ne w'adifi ne wo muba nyinaa, minim,

2 Ahene 19:28
Esiane sɛ wabɔ me so dam, na w'ahoahoa aforo abedu m'asom nti, me nso mede me darewa bewura wo hwene mu na mede me nnareka ato w’ano,

2 Ahene 19:29
“‘Eyi bɛyɛ sɛnkyerɛnne ama wo: Afe yi, mubedi aba a atotɔ fam afifi, afe a ɛto so abien no, mubedi ntwakae a afifi, nanso afe a ɛto so abiɛsa no de, mungu aba na muntwa, na monyɛ bobe nturo na munni mu aba. 

2 Ahene 19:3
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Hesekia aka ni, ‘Ɛnnɛ yɛ ahohia ne animka ne nsopa da, efisɛ mma abedu awotwaa ano, nanso ahoɔden nni hɔ a wɔde bɛwo wɔn. 

2 Ahene 19:30
Na Yuda fiefo a wɔafi mu aka no begye ntini akɔ fam, na wobenyin akɔ soro na wɔasow aba. 

2 Ahene 19:31
Na Yerusalem na nkae bi befi, na nnipa a wɔafi mu aka befi Bepɔw Sion so. Asafo Awurade ninkuntwe na ɛbɛyɛ eyi.

2 Ahene 19:32
“‘Ɛno nti na Awurade aka eyi afa Asiria hene ho no: “Ɔremma kurow yi mu, na ɔrentow agyan mma ha, na ɔremfa ɔkyɛm mma ha, na ɔrensi akoban wɔ ho. 

2 Ahene 19:33
Awurade na ose, ɔkwan a ɔfaa so bae no ara so na ɔbɛfa akɔ, na ɔremma kurow yi mu. 

2 Ahene 19:34
Na ɔko na mɛko agye kurow yi, me ara ne m’akoa Dawid nti.”’”

2 Ahene 19:35
Na anadwo no ara Awurade bɔfo fi kokunkum Asiriafo nsraban no mu nnipa mpem ɔha aduɔwɔtwe anum. Bere a nkurɔfo sɔree anɔpatutuutu no, wɔnkɔhwɛ a, wɔn nyinaa afunu sam hɔ.

2 Ahene 19:36
Ɛno nti Asiria hene Senaherib san n’akyi kɔe, na ɔkɔtenaa Niniwe. 

2 Ahene 19:37
Ɛbae sɛ bere a ɔkɔɔ ne nyame Nisrok fie kɔkotowee no, n’ankasa mma Adramelek ne Sareser de nkrante kum no, na woguan kɔɔ Ararat asase so. Na ne ba Esar-Haddon bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 19:4
Ebia Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn bɛte Rabsake nsɛm no nyinaa; ɔno na ne wura Asiria hene asoma no sɛ ɔmmɛsopa Onyankopɔn teasefo no. Na nsɛm a Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ate no nti, ɔbɛma wabu ho akontaa. Ɛno nti bɔ mpae ma wɔn a wɔaka wɔ ha no.’”

2 Ahene 19:5
Enti Ɔhene Hesekia nkoa no kɔɔ Yesaia nkyɛn. 

2 Ahene 19:6
Na Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔka nkyerɛ mo wura sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade se ni: “Mma nsɛm a Asiria hene nkoa aka atia me a wotee no mmmɔ wo hu. 

2 Ahene 19:7
 Hwɛ, mede honhom bi bɛhyɛ ne mu, na ɔbɛte amanneɛbɔ bi na wasan akɔ n’asase so, na mɛma watɔ nkrante ano wɔ n’ankasa asase so.”’”

2 Ahene 19:8
Afei Rabsake san n’akyi kɔe, na ɔkɔtoe sɛ Asiria hene ne Libna reko. Saa bere no na wate sɛ wafi Lakis. 

2 Ahene 19:9
Na ɔhene ate sɛ Etiopia hene Tirhaka aba sɛ ɔne no rebɛko. Enti ɔsan somaa abɔfo kɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn sɛ: 

2 Ahene 2:1
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a Awurade rebɛfa Elia wɔ ahum mu akɔ ɔsoro no, Elia ne Elisa siim fii Gilgal. 

2 Ahene 2:10
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Woabisa ade a ɛyɛ den. Sɛ wuhu sɛ wɔrefa me afi wo nkyɛn a, wubenya; na sɛ woanhu de a, worennya.”

2 Ahene 2:11
Bere a wɔnam rekɔ na wɔrekasa no, hwɛ! ogya teaseɛnam ne ogya apɔnkɔ bɛtetew wɔn baanu ntam, na Elia faa ahum mu kɔɔ soro. 

2 Ahene 2:12
Saa bere no nyinaa na Elisa rehwɛ nea ɛrekɔ so, na ɔteɛɛm sɛ: “M'agya, m'agya, Israel teaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo na ɔrekorɔ no!” Na wanhu no bio. Ɛnna osoo n’ankasa atade mu na osuan mu abien. 

2 Ahene 2:13
Ɛno akyi no, ɔfaa Elia atade a afi ne ho agu fam no, na ɔsan kogyinaa Yordan ano. 

2 Ahene 2:14
Ɛnna ɔfaa Elia atade a efii ne ho guu fam no, na ɔde bɔɔ nsu no mu kae sɛ: “Ɛhe na Awurade, Elia Nyankopɔn no wɔ?” Bere a ɔde bɔɔ nsu no mu no, nkakrankakra emu paee abien wɔ ha ne ha, na Elisa twae.

2 Ahene 2:15
Bere a adiyifo mma a wɔwɔ Yeriko no huu no wɔ akyirikyiri no, wɔkae sɛ: “Elia honhom aba Elisa so.” Ɛnna wokohyiaa no, na wɔkotow no butuw fam. 

2 Ahene 2:16
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mmarima ahoɔdenfo aduonum ka wo nkoa ho wɔ ha. Ma wɔnkɔ ɛ, na wɔnkɔhwehwɛ wo wura. Ebia Awurade honhom ama no so akɔto bepɔw bi so anaa obon bi mu.” Nanso ɔkae sɛ: “Monnsoma wɔn.” 

2 Ahene 2:17
Na wɔkae ara kosii sɛ ɛyɛɛ no ahometew, na ɔkae sɛ: “Monsoma ɛ.” Ɛnna wɔsomaa mmarima aduonum kɔe; wɔkɔhwehwɛɛ no nnansa, nanso wɔanhu no. 

2 Ahene 2:18
Bere a wɔsan baa ne nkyɛn no na ɔwɔ Yeriko. Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Manka ankyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Monnkɔ’?”

2 Ahene 2:19
Akyiri yi, kurow no mu mmarima bɛka kyerɛɛ Elisa sɛ: “Hwɛ, kurow yi da baabi pa sɛnea me wura ani tua yi; nanso nsu no nye, na asase no nso awu.” 

2 Ahene 2:2
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ Elisa sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, tena ha, na Awurade asoma me sɛ menkɔ Betel.” Nanso Elisa kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade te ase na wo kra nso te ase yi, merennyaw wo.” Enti wosian kɔɔ Betel. 

2 Ahene 2:20
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Momfa kuruwa foforo na momfa nkyene ngu mu mmrɛ me.” Na wɔkɔfa brɛɛ no. 

2 Ahene 2:21
Ɛnna ofii adi kɔɔ asuti hɔ de nkyene koguu mu, na ɔkae sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘Masa nsu yi yare. Ɛrenkum obiara bio, na ɛremma ɔpɔn nso bio.’” 

2 Ahene 2:22
Ahene

2 Ahene 2:22
Na nsu no nyaa ayaresa de besi nnɛ, sɛnea Elisa kae no.

2 Ahene 2:23
Na ofii hɔ sɛ ɔreforo akɔ Betel. Bere a ɔnam kwan so no, mmofra nketewa bi fii kurow no mu bae begoruu ne ho kae sɛ: “Tipae, foro ɛ! Tipae, foro ɛ!” 

2 Ahene 2:24
Na ɔdan n’ani hwɛɛ wɔn, na ɔde Awurade din domee wɔn. Ɛnna asisibere abien fi wuram ba bɛtetew mmofra no mu aduanan abien mu. 

2 Ahene 2:25
Na ɔtoaa so koduu Bepɔw Karmel so, na ofi hɔ san kɔɔ Samaria.

2 Ahene 2:3
Ɛnna adiyifo mma a wɔwɔ Betel no baa Elisa nkyɛn bebisaa no sɛ: “Wunim sɛ ɛnnɛ Awurade rebɛfa wo wura a odi w’anim no akɔ?” Na ɔkae sɛ: “Me nso minim. Monyɛ komm.”

2 Ahene 2:4
Afei Elia ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Elisa, mesrɛ wo, tena ha, na Awurade asoma me sɛ menkɔ Yeriko.” Nanso ɔkae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade te ase na wo kra nso te ase yi, merennyaw wo.” Enti wosiim kɔɔ Yeriko. 

2 Ahene 2:5
Ɛnna adiyifo mma a wɔwɔ Yeriko no baa Elisa nkyɛn bebisaa no sɛ: “Wunim sɛ ɛnnɛ Awurade rebɛfa wo wura a odi w’anim no akɔ?” Na ɔkae sɛ: “Me nso minim. Monyɛ komm.”

2 Ahene 2:6
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, tena ha, na Awurade asoma me sɛ menkɔ Yordan ano.” Nanso ɔkae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade te ase na wo kra nso te ase yi, merennyaw wo.” Enti wɔn baanu siim kɔe. 

2 Ahene 2:7
Na adiyifo mma no aduonum kogyinagyinaa wɔn ntentenso; na wɔn baanu de, wogyinaa Yordan ho. 

2 Ahene 2:8
Ɛnna Elia yii n’atade, na ɔbobɔw de bɔɔ nsu no mu, na nsu no mu pae nkakrankakra kɔɔ ha ne ha maa wɔn baanu no faa asase kesee so twae.

2 Ahene 2:9
Bere a wotwae no ara pɛ na Elia ka kyerɛɛ Elisa sɛ: “Bisa nea menyɛ mma wo ansa na wɔafa me afi wo nkyɛn.” Na Elisa kae sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, mepɛ sɛ minya wo honhom no abupɛn abien.” 

2 Ahene 20:1
Bere bi owuyare bɔɔ Hesekia. Na Amos ba odiyifo Yesaia baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Nea Awurade aka ni, ‘Hyɛ wo fie samansew, efisɛ wubewu, na worennya nkwa.’” 

2 Ahene 20:10
Na Hesekia kae sɛ: “Ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ sunsuma bɛkɔ anim ntrapoe du sen sɛ ɛbɛsan akyi ntrapoe du.” 

2 Ahene 20:11
Ɛnna odiyifo Yesaia maa ne nne so kyerɛɛ Awurade, na ɔmaa sunsuma no sian n'akyi ntrapoe du; ɛsan n'akyi ntrapoe du wɔ Ahas ntrapoe no so.

2 Ahene 20:12
Saa bere no, Baladan ba, Berodak-Baladan a ɔyɛ Babilon hene no soma ma wɔde nkrataa ne akyɛde kɔmaa Hesekia, efisɛ ɔtee sɛ Hesekia yaree. 

2 Ahene 20:13
Hesekia tiee wɔn, na ɔde n’adekoradan mu nneɛma nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn, dwetɛ ne sika ne balsam ngo ne ngo pa ne n’akode korabea ne biribiara a ɛwɔ n’akorae. Biribiara nni Hesekia fie ne n’ahenni mu a wamfa ankyerɛ wɔn.

2 Ahene 20:14
Afei odiyifo Yesaia baa Ɔhene Hesekia nkyɛn bebisaa no sɛ: “Asɛm bɛn na mmarima yi kae, na ɛhe na wofi baa wo nkyɛn?” Ɛnna Hesekia buae sɛ: “Wofi akyirikyiri asase so na ɛbae, Babilon tɔnn.” 

2 Ahene 20:15
Na ɔsan bisae sɛ: “Dɛn na wohui wɔ wo fie?” Ɛnna Hesekia kae sɛ: “Wohuu biribiara a ɛwɔ me fie. Biribiara nni m’akorae mu a mamfa ankyerɛ wɔn.”

2 Ahene 20:16
Ɛnna Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ Hesekia sɛ: “Tie Awurade asɛm yi, 

2 Ahene 20:17
‘“Hwɛ! Nna bi reba, na nea ɛwɔ wo fie a w’agyanom de asie abesi nnɛ no nyinaa wɔbɛsoa akɔ Babilon. Biribiara renka,” Awurade asɛm ni. 

2 Ahene 20:18
“Na wɔbɛfa w’ankasa wo mma a wobefi wo mu aba, mmofra a wobɛwo wɔn, no mu bi akɔ ma wɔakɔyɛ nhenkwaa wɔ Babilon hene ahemfie.”’”

2 Ahene 20:19
Ɛnna Hesekia ka kyerɛɛ Yesaia sɛ: “Awurade asɛm a woaka no ye.” Na ɔtoaa so kae sɛ: “Sɛ asomdwoe ne nokware bɛtena hɔ wɔ me bere so a, eye, anaa meboa?”

2 Ahene 20:2
Ɛnna ɔde n’ani kyerɛɛ dan bɔɔ Awurade mpae sɛ: 

2 Ahene 20:20
Hesekia ho nsɛm a aka ne ne nnwuma akɛse nyinaa, sɛnea ɔyɛɛ ɔtare ne suka, na ɔde nsu baa kurow no mu no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 20:21
Na Hesekia ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na ne ba Manase bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 20:220
Ahene

2 Ahene 20:3
“O Awurade, mesrɛ wo, kae sɛnea mede nokwaredi ne koma mu anantew w’anim, na mayɛ nea ɛsɔ w’ani biara.” Na Hesekia sui pii.

2 Ahene 20:4
Na ɛbae sɛ Yesaia nnya mfii ahemfie adiwo hɔ no, Awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: 

2 Ahene 20:5
“San w’akyi na kɔka kyerɛ me man kannifo Hesekia sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade, wo nana Dawid Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mate wo mpaebɔ no. Mahu wo nusu, hwɛ, meresa wo yare. Da a ɛto so abiɛsa no, wobɛforo akɔ Awurade fie. 

2 Ahene 20:6
Mede mfe dunum bɛka wo nna ho, na megye wo ne kurow yi afi Asiria hene nsam, na mɛbɔ kurow yi ho ban, me ne m’akoa Dawid nti.”’”

2 Ahene 20:7
Na Yesaia toaa so kae sɛ: “Momfa borɔdɔma a wɔabɔ no tɔw mmra.” Enti wɔkɔfa de bɛtaree mpɔmpɔ no so, na nkakrankakra, ne ho san no.

2 Ahene 20:8
Saa bere no, Hesekia bisaa Yesaia sɛ: “Dɛn ne sɛnkyerɛnne a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Awurade bɛsa me yare na mɛforo akɔ Awurade fie hɔ da a ɛto so abiɛsa?” 

2 Ahene 20:9
Ɛnna Yesaia kae sɛ: “Eyi ne sɛnkyerɛnne a efi Awurade hɔ a ɛbɛma woahu sɛ Awurade bɛyɛ nea waka no: Wopɛ sɛ sunsuma no kɔ anim ntrapoe du anaa ɛsan n'akyi ntrapoe du?” 

2 Ahene 21:1
Manase bedii ade no, na wadi mfe dumien, na odii hene mfe aduonum anum wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Hefsiba. 

2 Ahene 21:10
Na Awurade nam ne nkoa adiyifo no so ne wɔn kasae daa sɛ: 

2 Ahene 21:11
“Esiane sɛ Yuda hene Manase ayɛ akyide yi nti, wayɛ bɔne kyɛn nea Amorifo a wodii n’anim no yɛe nyinaa, na ɔde n’abosom fi no ama Yuda nso ayɛ bɔne. 

2 Ahene 21:12
Ɛno nti sɛ Awurade, Israel, Nyankopɔn se sɛ ni, ‘Hwɛ, mede mmusu reba Yerusalem ne Yuda so, na obiara a ɔbɛte no, n’aso abien nyinaa mu bɛyɛ no yɔnn. 

2 Ahene 21:13
Na susuhama a wɔde too Samaria so ne susudua a wɔde too Ahab fie so no, ɛno na mɛtwe mu Yerusalem so; mɛpopa Yerusalem korakora sɛnea obi popa ayowa mu na ɔdan butuw no. 

2 Ahene 21:14
Na mɛpo m’agyapade nkae no, na mede wɔn bɛhyɛ wɔn atamfo nsa, na afowde ne asade na wɔbɛyɛ ama wɔn atamfo nyinaa, 

2 Ahene 21:15
efisɛ wɔyɛɛ m’ani so bɔne, na wɔhyɛɛ me abufuw fi da a wɔn agyanom fi Egypt bae de besi nnɛ da yi.’”

2 Ahene 21:16
Bio nso, Manase hwiee mogya a edi bem bebree pa gui kosii sɛ ɔde hyɛɛ Yerusalem nyinaa ma, efi ano kosi ano, ɛsono bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛnam so maa Yuda nso yɛɛ bɔne wɔ Awurade ani so no. 

2 Ahene 21:17
Manase ho nsɛm a aka, nea ɔyɛe nyinaa ne ne bɔne no, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 21:18
Na Manase ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na wosiee no ne fie mfikyifuw mu, Usa mfikyifuw no, na ne ba Amon bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 21:19
Amon bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu abien, na odii hene mfe abien wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Mesulemet a ɔyɛ Harus a ofi Yotba no ba. 

2 Ahene 21:2
 Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, na ɔyɛɛ akyide a amanaman a Awurade pam wɔn fii Israelfo anim yɛe no bi. 

2 Ahene 21:20
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea ne papa Manase yɛe no. 

2 Ahene 21:21
Akwan a ne papa faa so no nyinaa mu na ɔnantewee, na ɔsom abosom fi a ne papa somee no, na ɔkotow wɔn. 

2 Ahene 21:22
Saa na ɛyɛe a ogyaw Awurade, n’agyanom Nyankopɔn no, na wannantew Awurade kwan mu. 

2 Ahene 21:221
Ahene

2 Ahene 21:23
Na Amon nkoa bɔɔ ne ho pɔw, na wokum ɔhene wɔ n’ankasa fie. 

2 Ahene 21:24
Nanso asase no sofo kunkum wɔn a wɔbɔɔ Ɔhene Amon ho pɔw no nyinaa, na asase no sofo de ne ba Yosia sii hene ma odii n’ade. 

2 Ahene 21:25
Amon ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 21:26
Na wosiee no ne damoa mu wɔ Usa mfikyifuw no mu, na ne ba Yosia bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 21:3
 Enti sorɔnsorɔmmea a ne papa Hesekia bubui no, ɔsan sisii, na osisii afɔremuka maa Baal; osii ɔbosom dua sɛnea Israel hene Ahab yɛe no; ɔkotow ɔsoro asafo nyinaa, na ɔsom wɔn. 

2 Ahene 21:4
Na Awurade fie a Awurade kaa ho asɛm sɛ: “Yerusalem na me din bɛtena” no, osisii afɔremuka wɔ hɔ. 

2 Ahene 21:5
Afei nso osisii afɔremuka maa ɔsoro asafo nyinaa wɔ Awurade fie adiwo abien hɔ. 

2 Ahene 21:6
 Na ɔmaa ɔno ara ne babarima faa ogya mu, na odii nkonyaayi akyi, ɔkɔɔ abisa, na ɔne akɔmfo ne asumanfo gorui. Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne kɔɔ akyiri paa de hyɛɛ no abufuw.

2 Ahene 21:7
Bio nso, ɔde ɔbosom dua a wasen no sɛ ohoni no kosii fie hɔ, ofie a Awurade kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Dawid ne ne ba Solomon no sɛ: “Ofie yi ne Yerusalem a mapaw afi Israel mmusuakuw nyinaa mu no na mede me din bɛto so akosi daa. 

2 Ahene 21:8
Na sɛ Israel hwɛ di nea mahyɛ wɔn no nyinaa, mmara a m’akoa Mose hyɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa so a, me nso meremma wɔn nan mfi asase a mede maa wɔn agyanom no so nkokyinkyin bio.” 

2 Ahene 21:9
Nanso wɔantie, na Manase daadaa wɔn ma wɔyɛɛ bɔne sen aman a Awurade sɛee wɔn fii Israelfo anim no.

2 Ahene 22:1
Yosia bedii ade no, na wadi mfe awotwe, na odii hene mfe aduasa biako wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne maame din de Yedida a ɔyɛ Adaia a ofi Boskat no ba. 

2 Ahene 22:10
Afei ɔkyerɛwfo Safan ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Ɔsɔfo Hilkia de nhoma bi ama me.” Ɛnna Safan fii ase kenkanee wɔ ɔhene anim.

2 Ahene 22:11
Na bere a ɔhene tee mmara nhoma no mu nsɛm ara pɛ, osunsuanee ne ntade mu. 

2 Ahene 22:12
Ɛnna ɔhene hyɛɛ ɔsɔfo Hilkia ne Safan ba Ahikam ne Mikaia ba Akbor ne ɔkyerɛwfo Safan ne ɔhene akoa Asaia sɛ: 

2 Ahene 22:13
“Monkɔ nkobisa Awurade mma me ne ɔman no ne Yuda nyinaa, nhoma a wɔahu yi mu nsɛm nti, na Awurade abufuw a aba yɛn so no so, efisɛ yɛn agyanom antie nhoma yi mu nsɛm anyɛ sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wom afa yɛn ho no nyinaa.”

2 Ahene 22:14
Ɛnna ɔsɔfo Hilkia ne Ahikam ne Akbor ne Safan ne Asaia kɔɔ odiyifobea Hulda, ntade sohwɛfo Harhas ba Tikwa ba Salum yere, no nkyɛn; saa bere no, na odiyifobea no te Yerusalem kurow foforo no mu, na wɔkɔkaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ no. 

2 Ahene 22:15
Na ɔno nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Nea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Monkɔka nkyerɛ ɔbarima a ɔsomaa mo me nkyɛn no sɛ: 

2 Ahene 22:16
“Nea Awurade se ni, ‘Hwɛ, mede mmusu reba kurow yi ne wɔn a wɔtete mu no so; nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ nhoma a Yuda hene akenkan no mu nyinaa, mede reba; 

2 Ahene 22:17
efisɛ wɔagyaw me akɔhyew aduhuam ama anyame foforo, sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa ano adwuma nyinaa bɛhyɛ me abufuw; enti m’abufuw bɛdɛw atia kurow yi a ɛrennum.’”’ 

2 Ahene 22:18
Na Yuda hene a ɔsomaa mo sɛ mummebisa Awurade anom asɛm no, monka nkyerɛ no sɛ: ‘Nea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no aka ni: “Nsɛm a woate no, 

2 Ahene 22:19
sɛ woanyɛ wo koma den na wobrɛɛ wo ho ase Awurade anim bere a wotee nsɛm a maka atia kurow yi ne wɔn a wɔtete mu sɛ ɛbɛyɛ ahodwiriwde ne nnome, na wusuan w’atade mu sui m’anim nti, me nso mate,” Awurade na ose. 

2 Ahene 22:2
 Na ɔyɛɛ nea ɛteɛ Awurade ani so, na ɔnantew ne nana Dawid kwan nyinaa so, na wamman ankɔ nifa anaa benkum.

2 Ahene 22:20
“Ɛno nti hwɛ, mɛboaboa wo akɔka w’agyanom ho, na wɔbɛboaboa wo akɔ wo damoa mu asomdwoe mu, na w’aniwa renhu mmusu a mede reba kurow yi so no.”’” Enti wɔde mmuae no kɔmaa ɔhene.

2 Ahene 22:222
Ahene

2 Ahene 22:3
Ɔhene Yosia afe a ɛto so dunwɔtwe mu no, ɔhene somaa Mesulam ba Asalia ba ɔkyerɛwfo Safan kɔɔ Awurade fie sɛ: 

2 Ahene 22:4
“Kɔ ɔsɔfo panyin Hilkia nkyɛn, na ka kyerɛ no sɛ sika a wɔde ba Awurade fie hɔ a apon ano ahwɛfo no boaboa ano fi ɔman no nkyɛn no, onwie ho adwuma. 

2 Ahene 22:5
Ma wɔmfa nhyɛ adwumayɛfo no nsa, kyerɛ sɛ, wɔn a wɔdeda adwuma no ano wɔ Awurade fie hɔ no, na wɔde ama nnipa a wɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ Awurade fie hɔ no ma wɔde asiesie fie no, 

2 Ahene 22:6
adwumfo ne adansifo ne abantofo no, na wɔde bi atɔ nnua a wɔapae ne abo a wɔapae a wɔde besiesie fie hɔ. 

2 Ahene 22:7
Nnipa a wɔde sika bɛhyɛ wɔn nsa no de, ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔma wobu ho akontaa, efisɛ nokwaredi mu na wɔreyɛ adwuma no.”

2 Ahene 22:8
Akyiri yi ɔsɔfo panyin Hilkia ka kyerɛɛ ɔkyerɛwfo Safan sɛ: “Mmara nhoma no, makohu wɔ Awurade fie hɔ.” Enti Hilkia de nhoma no maa Safan, na ofii ase kenkanee. 

2 Ahene 22:9
Na ɔkyerɛwfo Safan baa ɔhene anim, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: “Sika a ɛwɔ fie hɔ no, wo nkoa ahwie de ahyɛ adwumayɛfo, ahwɛfo no nsa wɔ Awurade fie hɔ.” 

2 Ahene 23:1
Na ɔhene soma ma wɔkɔboaboaa Yuda ne Yerusalem mpanyimfo nyinaa ano baa ne nkyɛn. 

2 Ahene 23:10
Na Tofet a ɛwɔ Hinom mma bon mu no, oguu ho fi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara remma ne babarima anaa ne babea mfa ogya mu mma Molek bio. 

2 Ahene 23:11
Afei nso wamma apɔnkɔ a Yuda ahene de maa owia no amfa ahemfie panyin Natan-Melek adidibea a ɛwɔ ntwironoo mu hɔ no amma Awurade fie hɔ bio, na ɔde ogya hyew nteaseɛnam a wɔde maa owia no. 

2 Ahene 23:12
Na afɔremuka a Yuda ahene yeyɛe a ɛwowɔ Ahas abansoro pia atifi ne afɔremuka a Manase sisii wɔ Awurade fie adiwo abien no, ɔhene bubui na ɔyamee wɔ hɔ, na ɔtow mfutuma no guu Kidron subon no mu. 

2 Ahene 23:13
 Na sorɔnsorɔmmea a ɛwowɔ Yerusalem anim wɔ Ɔsɛe Bepɔw no nifa so, nea Israel hene Solomon sisi maa Sidonfo akyide Astoret ne Moabfo akyide Kemos ne Ammonfo atantanne Milkom no, ɔhene guu ho fi. 

2 Ahene 23:14
Obubuu abosom adum no mu asinasin na otwitwaa abosonnua no, na ɔde nnipa nnompe hyɛɛ hɔ ma. 

2 Ahene 23:15
 Bio nso, Betel afɔremuka no ne sorɔnsorɔmmea a Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no yɛe no, obubuu saa afɔremuka no ne sorɔnsorɔmmea no. Afei ɔhyew sorɔnsorɔmmea no, na ɔyam no muhumuhu, na ɔhyew ɔbosom dum no.

2 Ahene 23:16
Bere a Yosia dan ne ho no, ohuu adamoa a ɛwowɔ bepɔw no so no. Enti ɔsoma ma wɔkɔfaa adamoa no mu nnompe bɛhyewee wɔ afɔremuka no so de guu ho fi, sɛnea Awurade asɛm a Nyankopɔn nipa no ka too hɔ no te. 

2 Ahene 23:17
Na obisae sɛ: “Nkaebo bɛn na mihu wɔ ha yi?” Na kurow no mufo ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn nipa a ofi Yuda bae a ɔkaa nea wode ayɛ Betel afɔremuka yi ho asɛm too hɔ no ɔdamoa.” 

2 Ahene 23:18
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Momma ɔnhome. Mma obiara nnka ne nnompe.” Enti wɔanka ne nnompe ne odiyifo a ofi Samaria bae no nnompe.

2 Ahene 23:19
Bio nso, sorɔnsorɔmmea afie a ɛwowɔ Samaria nkurow mu a Israel ahene sisi de hyɛɛ Onyankopɔn abufuw no, Yosia yiyii ne nyinaa, na ɔyɛɛ no sɛnea ɔyɛɛ Betel de no pɛpɛɛpɛ. 

2 Ahene 23:2
Afei ɔhene ne Yuda mmarima nyinaa ne Yerusalemfo nyinaa ne asɔfo ne adiyifo no ne ɔman no nyinaa, efi akumaa so kosi ɔkɛse so, kɔɔ Awurade fie hɔ, na ofii ase kenkan apam nhoma a wohui wɔ Awurade fie hɔ no mu nsɛm guu wɔn nyinaa asom. 

2 Ahene 23:20
Na ɔde sorɔnsorɔmmea asɔfo a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa bɔɔ afɔre wɔ afɔremuka no so, na ɔhyew nnipa nnompe wɔ so. Ɛno akyi no, ɔsan kɔɔ Yerusalem.

2 Ahene 23:21
Afei ɔhene hyɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ: “Munni twam mma Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn, sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ apam nhoma yi mu no.” 

2 Ahene 23:22
Efi atemmufo a wobuu Israel atɛn no nna mu ne Israel ne Yuda ahene nyinaa nna mu no, na wonnii twam bi sɛ eyi da. 

2 Ahene 23:223
Ahene

2 Ahene 23:23
Nanso Ɔhene Yosia afe a ɛto so dunwɔtwe mu no, wodii twam yi maa Awurade wɔ Yerusalem.

2 Ahene 23:24
Afei nso adebisafo ne asumanfo ne terafim honi ne abosom fi ne akyide a abepue Yuda asase so ne Yerusalem no, Yosia tuu ase na ama wadi mmara no mu nsɛm so, nea wɔakyerɛw wɔ nhoma a ɔsɔfo Hilkia kohui wɔ Awurade fie hɔ mu no. 

2 Ahene 23:25
N’anim no, ɔhene biara amma sɛ ɔno a ɔde ne koma nyinaa ne ne kra nyinaa ne n’ahoɔden nyinaa dan baa Awurade nkyɛn sɛnea Mose mmara no te pɛpɛɛpɛ, na n’akyi nso, obiara ansɔre a ɔte sɛ ɔno.

2 Ahene 23:26
Ne nyinaa akyi no, Awurade annan amfi n’abufuhyew kɛse no ho, abufuhyew a ɛdɛw Yuda so, Manase nneɛma bɔne a ɔyɛe de hyɛɛ no abufuw no nti. 

2 Ahene 23:27
Na Awurade kae sɛ: “Yuda nso mɛtow no afi m’anim akyene sɛnea metow Israel kyenee no; mɛtow kurow a mapaw yi, Yerusalem ne ofie yi akyene, ofie a mekae sɛ, ‘Me din bɛtena hɔ’ no.”

2 Ahene 23:28
Yosia ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe no, wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 23:29
Ne nna mu na Egypt hene Farao Neko baa Asiria hene nkyɛn wɔ asubɔnten Eufrate ho, na Ɔhene Yosia fii adi sɛ ɔne no de rekosi ani, nanso bere a ohuu no ara na okum no wɔ Megido. 

2 Ahene 23:3
Ɔhene gyinaa edum no ho, na ɔyɛɛ apam Awurade anim sɛ obedi Awurade akyi, na ɔde ne koma nyinaa ne ne kra nyinaa bedi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’adansesɛm ne n’ahyɛde so, na wadi apam no mu nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ nhoma yi mu no so. Na ɔman no nyinaa suaee sɛ wobedi apam no so.

2 Ahene 23:30
Enti ne nkoa de n’amu too teaseɛnam mu fi Megido kɔɔ Yerusalem, na wosiee no wɔ ne damoa mu. Ɛnna asase no sofo faa Yosia ba Yehoahas, na wɔsraa no sii no hene ma odii ne papa ade.

2 Ahene 23:31
Yehoahas bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu abiɛsa, na odii hene asram abiɛsa wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Hamutal a ɔyɛ Yeremia a ofi Libna no ba. 

2 Ahene 23:32
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea n’agyanom yɛe no ara. 

2 Ahene 23:33
Farao Neko guu no nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn wɔ Ribla, Hamat asase so, na wamma wanni hene bio wɔ Yerusalem, na ɔmaa asase no tuaa dwetɛ dwetikɛse ɔha ne sika dwetikɛse biako. 

2 Ahene 23:34
Afei, Farao Neko de Ɔhene Yosia ba Eliakim sii hene ma odii ne papa Yosia ade, na ɔsesaa ne din frɛɛ no Yehoiakim. Yehoahas de, ɔde no kɔɔ Egypt, na ɛhɔ na okowui. 

2 Ahene 23:35
Yehoiakim de dwetɛ ne sika no maa Farao. Ɔman no nkyɛn na ogyigyee tow, na ɔde dwetɛ no maa Farao sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ no no. Ogyigyee dwetɛ ne sika tow no fii ɔmanfo no nkyɛn sɛnea obiara tow a wɔatwa ama no te, na ɔde maa Farao Neko.

2 Ahene 23:36
Yehoiakim bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu anum, na odii hene mfe dubiako wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Sebida a ɔyɛ Pedaia a ofi Ruma no ba. 

2 Ahene 23:37
 Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea n’agyanom yɛe no ara.

2 Ahene 23:4
Na ɔhene hyɛɛ ɔsɔfo panyin Hilkia ne asɔfo a wodi hɔ no ne apon ano ahwɛfo no sɛ wonyiyi anwenne a wɔyɛ maa Baal ne ɔbosom dua no ne ɔsoro asafo nyinaa no mfi Awurade asɔredan no mu. Afei ɔkɔhyew ne nyinaa wɔ Yerusalem kurotia, Kidron ho mfuwa mu, na ɔde ɛho nso no kɔɔ Betel. 

2 Ahene 23:5
Na ananafo anyame no asɔfo hunu a Yuda ahene de wɔn sisii hɔ sɛ wɔnhyew afɔrebɔde wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ wɔ Yuda nkurow mu ne mmeae a ɛbemmɛn Yerusalem no, oguu wɔn adwuma no; wɔn a na wɔhyew afɔrebɔde ma Baal ne owia ne ɔsram ne sodiak nsorommakuw ne ɔsoro asafo nyinaa nso, oguu wɔn adwuma no. 

2 Ahene 23:6
Afei nso, oyii ɔbosom dua no fii Awurade fie hɔ de kɔɔ Yerusalem kurotia, Kidron subon no mu, na ɔhyewee wɔ Kidron subon no mu, na ɔyam no muhumuhu, na ɔtow mfutuma no guu ɔmanfo no mma damoa so. 

2 Ahene 23:7
Bio nso, asɔrefie mmarima nguaman no, obubuu wɔn adan a ɛwɔ Awurade fie hɔ no, baabi a na mmea no nwene mmɔɔhɔɔ ma ɔbosom dua no.

2 Ahene 23:8
Ɛnna ɔde asɔfo no nyinaa fi Yuda nkurow mu bae sɛ obegu sorɔnsorɔmmea a asɔfo no hyew aduhuam wɔ hɔ no ho fi, efi Geba kosi Beer-Seba; obubuu kurow pon ano sorɔnsorɔmmea a ɛwɔ kurow sohwɛfo Yosua pon ano no, faako a ɛwɔ kurow pon no benkum so, nea wɔfa hyɛn kurow no mu no. 

2 Ahene 23:9
 Na sorɔnsorɔmmea asɔfo no de, wɔamma Awurade afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Yerusalem no anim, nanso wodii paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim, wɔn nuanom mu. 

2 Ahene 24:1
Ne nna mu na Babilon hene Nebukadnesar tu bae, na Yehoiakim bɛyɛɛ n’akoa mfe abiɛsa. Nanso ɔdanee ne ho sɔre tew atua. 

2 Ahene 24:10
Saa bere no mu na Babilon hene Nebukadnesar nkoa baa Yerusalem so, na wobetwaa kurow no ho hyiae. 

2 Ahene 24:11
Na Babilon hene Nebukadnesar baa kurow no so bere a na ne nkoa atwa ho ahyia no.

2 Ahene 24:12
Akyiri yi, Yuda hene Yehoiakin fii adi kɔɔ Babilon hene nkyɛn, ɔne ne maame ne n’asomfo ne ne mmapɔmma ne n’ahemfie mpanyimfo; Babilon hene faa no dommum, n’ahenni afe a ɛto so awotwe mu. 

2 Ahene 24:13
Afei ɔfaa Awurade fie akorade nyinaa ne ahemfie akorade no kɔe, na otwitwaa sika anwenne a Israel hene Solomon yɛe wɔ Awurade asɔredan mu no nyinaa mu asinasin sɛnea Awurade kae no.

2 Ahene 24:14
Na ɔde Yerusalemfo nyinaa ne mmapɔmma no nyinaa ne mmarima akokodurufo a wɔn ho yɛ den no nyinaa, ne adwumfo ne abantofo no nyinaa, nnipa mpem du, kɔɔ nkoasom mu. Wɔannyaw obiara gye asase no so ahiafo nko. 

2 Ahene 24:15
Saa na ɛyɛe a ɔfaa Yehoiakin kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Babilon, na ɔhene maame ne ɔhene yerenom ne n’ahemfie mpanyimfo ne asase no so atitiriw nso, ɔde wɔn fi Yerusalem kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Babilon. 

2 Ahene 24:16
Na Babilon hene de mmarima akokodurufo a wɔn ho yɛ den nyinaa, nnipa mpemnson, ne adwumfo ne abantofo apem, ne mmarima a wɔkɔ ɔsa nyinaa kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ Babilon. 

2 Ahene 24:17
Bio nso, Babilon hene tuu Yehoiakin ade so yɛɛ ne papa nua Matania hene sii n’ananmu, na ɔsesaa ne din frɛɛ no Sedekia.

2 Ahene 24:18
Sedekia bedii ade no, na wadi mfe aduonu biako, na odii hene mfe dubiako wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Hamutal a ɔyɛ Yeremia a ofi Libna no babea. 

2 Ahene 24:19
 na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea Yehoiakim yɛe no ara. 

2 Ahene 24:2
Na Awurade somaa Kaldea asafo ne Siria asafo ne Moab afowfo ne Ammon asafo baa no so; ɔsomaa wɔn baa Yuda so sɛ wɔmmɛsɛe no sɛnea Awurade asɛm a ɔnam ne nkoa adiyifo no so kae no te. 

2 Ahene 24:20
Nneɛma a esisii wɔ Yerusalem ne Yuda yi na ɛmaa Awurade bo fuwii, kosii sɛ ɔtow wɔn fii n’anim kyenee. Na Sedekia tew Babilon hene so atua.

2 Ahene 24:224
Ahene

2 Ahene 24:3
Awurade asɛm so na eyi nam baa Yuda so sɛ obeyi no afi n’anim, Manase bɔne a ɔyɛe nyinaa, 

2 Ahene 24:4
ne afei mogya a edi bem a ohwie gui na ɔde mogya a edi bem hyɛɛ Yerusalem ma no nti. Na Awurade ampɛ sɛ ɔde befiri.

2 Ahene 24:5
Yehoiakim ho nsɛm a aka ne nea ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔakyerɛw wɔ Yuda ahene bere so nsɛm nhoma no mu. 

2 Ahene 24:6
Na Yehoiakim ne n’agyanom kɔdae, na ne ba Yehoiakin bedii n’ade.

2 Ahene 24:7
Na Egypt hene amfi n’asase so amma bio da, efisɛ Babilon hene faa Egypt hene nneɛma nyinaa, efi Egypt subon ho kosi asubɔnten Eufrate ho.

2 Ahene 24:8
Yehoiakin bedii ade no, na wadi mfe dunwɔtwe, na odii hene asram abiɛsa wɔ Yerusalem. Ne maame din de Nehusta a ɔyɛ Elnatan a ofi Yerusalem no babea. 

2 Ahene 24:9
 Na ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne sɛnea ne papa yɛe no ara. 

2 Ahene 25:1
Ɛbae sɛ n’ahenni afe a ɛto so akron, ɔsram a ɛto so du, ɔsram no da a ɛto so du no, Babilon hene Nebukadnesar bae; ɔne n’asraafodɔm nyinaa baa Yerusalem so betwaa ho hyiae, na wosii akoban twaa ho nyinaa hyiae. 

2 Ahene 25:10
Na Yerusalem afasu a atwa ho ahyia nyinaa, Kaldea asraafodɔm a wɔka awɛmfo so panyin no ho no nyinaa dwiriw gui. 

2 Ahene 25:11
Ɔmanfo nkae a wogyaw wɔn wɔ kurow no mu, ne wɔn a wɔdan kɔɔ Babilon hene afa, ne nnipa a wɔaka no, awɛmfo so panyin Nebusaradan de wɔn kɔɔ nkoasom mu. 

2 Ahene 25:1213
Na awɛmfo so panyin no gyaw asase no so ahiafo no bi sɛ wɔnyɛ bobe nturo mu adwumayɛfo ne apaafo.  Na kɔbere adum a ɛwɔ Awurade fie no ne nsutwe nnaka ne kɔbere po a ɛwɔ Awurade fie hɔ no, Kaldeafo no bubuu no asinasin, na wɔde ɛho kɔbere no kɔɔ Babilon. 

2 Ahene 25:14
Na nea wɔde sesaw nso ne sofi ne adumgya ne nkuruwa ne kɔbere nneɛma a wɔde som no nyinaa, wɔsesaw kɔe. 

2 Ahene 25:15
Na ogya nkukuwa ne nyaawa a wɔde sika amapa ayɛ ne nea wɔde dwetɛ amapa ayɛ no, awɛmfo so panyin no sesaw kɔe. 

2 Ahene 25:16
Na adum abien no ne ɛpo biako no ne nsutwe nnaka a Solomon yeyɛe wɔ Awurade fie hɔ no, nneɛma yi nyinaa ho kɔbere de, wɔantumi ankari. 

2 Ahene 25:17
Adum no biara tenten yɛ basafa dunwɔtwe, na wɔde kɔbere na ɛyɛɛ ɛso ntaaso no; ntaaso no tenten yɛ basafa abiɛsa; atena ne granate akutu a etwa ntaaso no ho hyia no, kɔbere na wɔde yɛɛ ne nyinaa; saa ara na edum a ɛto so abien no ho atena nso te.

2 Ahene 25:18
Bio nso, awɛmfo so panyin no faa ɔsɔfo panyin Seraia ne ɔsɔfo Sefania a odi no so ne apon ano ahwɛfo baasa; 

2 Ahene 25:19
na kurow no mu nso, ɔfaa ahemfie panyin biako a ɔda asraafo ano, ne mmarima a wɔkɔ ɔhene anim no baanum a wɔwɔ kurow no mu, ne ɔsahene no kyerɛwfo a ɔboaboa dɔm ano wɔ asase no so, ne ɔmanfo no mu mmarima aduosia a wɔwɔ kurow no mu; 

2 Ahene 25:2
 Na wotwaa kurow no ho hyiae kosii Ɔhene Sedekia afe a ɛto so dubiako mu. 

2 Ahene 25:20
awɛmfo so panyin Nebusaradan de wɔn kɔmaa Babilon hene wɔ Ribla. 

2 Ahene 25:21
Na Babilon hene bobɔɔ wɔn kum wɔn wɔ Ribla, Hamat asase so. Saa na ɛyɛe na Yuda fii n’asase so kɔɔ nkoasom mu.

2 Ahene 25:22
Na ɔmanfo a wɔkaa Yuda asase so a Babilon hene Nebukadnesar gyaw wɔn hɔ no, ɔde Safan ba Ahikam ba Gedalia dii wɔn so hwɛfo. 

2 Ahene 25:225
Ahene

2 Ahene 25:23
Bere a asahene no nyinaa ne wɔn mmarima tee sɛ Babilon hene apaw Gedalia no, ntɛm ara na wɔbaa Gedalia nkyɛn wɔ Mispa; Netania ba Ismael, ne Karea ba Yohanan, ne Netofani Tanhumet ba Seraia, ne Maakatni no ba Yaasania, ne wɔn mmarima na wɔbae. 

2 Ahene 25:24
Ɛnna Gedalia kaa ntam kyerɛɛ wɔne wɔn mmarima no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Munnsuro sɛ mobɛsom Kaldeafo no. Montena asase no so na monsom Babilon hene, na ebesi mo yiye.”

2 Ahene 25:25
Ɛbae sɛ ɔsram a ɛto so ason mu no, Elisama ba Netania ba Ismael a ofi adehye abusua mu no bae, ɔne mmarima du, na wɔbɔɔ Gedalia kum no, na wokunkum Yudafo ne Kaldeafo a wɔka ne ho wɔ Mispa no nso. 

2 Ahene 25:26
Ɛno akyi no, nnipa no nyinaa, efi akumaa so kosi ɔkɛse so, ne asahene no sɔree, na wɔkɔɔ Egypt, efisɛ Kaldeafo no nti wosuroe.

2 Ahene 25:27
Bere a Yuda hene Yehoiakin kɔɔ nkoasom mu no, n’afe a ɛto so aduasa ason, ɔsram a ɛto so dumien no da a ɛto so aduonu ason, afe a Babilon hene Ewil-Merodak bɛyɛɛ ɔhene no, ɔmaa Yuda hene Yehoiakin so fii nneduafie mu; 

2 Ahene 25:28
na ɔkasaa ayamye so kyerɛɛ no, na ɔmaa n’ahengua so ma ɛsen ahene a wɔka ne ho wɔ Babilon no nhengua. 

2 Ahene 25:29
Na oyii n’afiase ntade, na odidii n’anim daa, ne nkwa nna nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 25:3
Ɔsram a ɛto so anan no da a ɛto so akron no, ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ den wɔ kurow no mu; naaduan bi nni hɔ mma ɔmanfo no. 

2 Ahene 25:30
Nea wɔahyɛ sɛ wɔmfa mma no no, efi ɔhene nkyɛn na wɔde maa no daa, da biara ne ne de, ne nkwa nna nyinaa.

2 Ahene 25:4
Ɛnna wotuu kurow no mu hyɛn mu, na mmarima a wɔkɔ ɔsa no nyinaa guan anadwo kɔfaa afasu abien a ɛwɔ ɔhene turo ho no ntam pon no mu kɔe; saa bere no, na Kaldeafo no atwa kurow no ho nyinaa ahyia. Ɔhene no nso de n’ani kyerɛɛ Araba. 

2 Ahene 25:5
Na Kaldea asraafodɔm no de mmirika tiw ɔhene no, na wɔkɔtoo no wɔ Yeriko tataw no so; na n’asraafodɔm a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn nyinaa hwetee. 

2 Ahene 25:6
Ɛnna wɔkyeree ɔhene no de no kɔmaa Babilon hene wɔ Ribla, na wobuu no atɛn. 

2 Ahene 25:7
Wokunkum Sedekia mmabarima wɔ n’anim, na Sedekia nso, ɔtutuu n’ani. Afei ɔde kɔbere nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn guu no, na ɔde no kɔɔ Babilon.

2 Ahene 25:8
Ɔsram a ɛto so anum no da a ɛto so ason a ɛyɛ Ɔhene Nebukadnesar, Babilon hene, no afe a ɛto so dunkron no, awɛmfo so panyin Nebusaradan, Babilon hene akoa, no baa Yerusalem. 

2 Ahene 25:9
Na ɔhyew Awurade fie ne ahemfie no ne Yerusalem afie nyinaa; ɔde ogya hyew otitiriw biara fie.

2 Ahene 3:1
Ahab ba Yehoram bɛyɛɛ Israel hene wɔ Samaria, Yuda hene Yehosafat afe a ɛto so dunwɔtwe mu, na odii hene mfe dumien. 

2 Ahene 3:10
Ɛnna Israel hene kae sɛ: “Anyɛ yiye! Awurade aboa ahene baasa yi ano sɛ ɔde wɔn rebɛhyɛ Moabfo nsa!” 

2 Ahene 3:11
Ɛnna Yehosafat bisae sɛ: “Awurade diyifo biara nni ha anaa? Momma yɛmfa no so mmisa Awurade.” Na Israel hene nkoa no biako buae sɛ: “Safat ba Elisa a ɔde nsu guu Elia nsa so no wɔ ha.” 

2 Ahene 3:12
Ɛnna Yehosafat kae sɛ: “Awurade asɛm wɔ n’anom.” Enti Israel hene ne Yehosafat ne Edom hene kɔɔ ne nkyɛn.

2 Ahene 3:13
Na Elisa bisaa Israel hene sɛ: “Dɛn na me ne wo wɔ yɛ? Kɔ w'agya adiyifo ne wo na adiyifo no hɔ.” Nanso Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Dabi, efisɛ Awurade aboa ahene baasa yi ano sɛ ɔde yɛn rebɛhyɛ Moabfo nsa.” 

2 Ahene 3:14
Ɛnna Elisa kae sɛ: “Sɛ asafo Awurade a migyina n’anim no te ase yi, sɛ ɛnyɛ Yuda hene Yehosafat na mede m’ani ato n’anim a, anka merenhwɛ wo mpo na mahu wo. 

2 Ahene 3:15
Monkɔhwehwɛ sankubɔfo mmrɛ me.” Na bere a sankubɔfo no bɔɔ sanku no, Awurade nsa baa no so. 

2 Ahene 3:16
Na ɔtoaa so kae sɛ: “Nea Awurade se ni, ‘Muntutu amoa wɔ subon yi mu baabiara; 

2 Ahene 3:17
na Awurade aka sɛ: “Morenhu mframa, na morenhu sɛ osu retɔ; nanso nsu bɛhyɛ subon yi ma, na mobɛnom nsu afi mu, mo ne mo nyɛmmoa ne mo afieboa.”’ 

2 Ahene 3:18
Na eyi bɛyɛ ade ketewaa bi Awurade ani so, na ɔde Moabfo bɛhyɛ mo nsa. 

2 Ahene 3:19
Kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban ne kurow pa biara, mommɔ no, na muntwa dua pa biara, na munsisiw nsu aniwa nyinaa, na momfa abo nsɛe asase pa biara.”

2 Ahene 3:2
Ɔyɛɛ Awurade ani so bɔne, to na anto ne papa ne ne maame de no; na Baal honi a ne papa yɛe no, oyi fii hɔ. 

2 Ahene 3:20
Na ɛbae sɛ anɔpa, bere a wɔbɔ aduan afɔre no, hwɛ! nsu fi Edom fam bae, na nsu hyɛɛ asase no so ma.

2 Ahene 3:21
 Na Moabfo nyinaa tee sɛ ahene no aba sɛ wɔne wɔn rebɛko. Enti wɔfrɛfrɛɛ mmarima, efi wɔn a wotumi kura akode so rekɔ nyinaa, na wokogyinagyinaa ɔhye so. 

2 Ahene 3:22
Bere a wɔsɔree anɔpahema no, owia tɔɔ nsu no so, na Moabfo a wogyinagyina ɔfa nohoa no hui sɛ nsu no ayɛ kɔɔ sɛ mogya. 

2 Ahene 3:23
Ahene

2 Ahene 3:23
Ɛnna wɔkae sɛ: “Mogya nie! Ahene no atotɔ nkrante ano; wɔakunkum wɔn ho. Enti Moabfo, monkɔfa asade!” 

2 Ahene 3:24
Bere a wɔbaa Israelfo nsra mu no, ɛhɔ ara na Israelfo no sɔre tow hyɛɛ Moabfo no so, na woguan fii wɔn anim. Ɛno nti wɔbaa Moabfo mu, na wɔreba nyinaa na wɔrekunkum Moabfo no. 

2 Ahene 3:25
Wɔbɔɔ nkurow no, na wɔn nyinaa totow wɔn abo guguu asase pa biara so de hyɛɛ so ma; wosisiw nsu aniwa nyinaa na wotwitwaa nnua pa nyinaa kosii sɛ ɛkaa Kir-Hareset abo nko wɔ hɔ; ataabo towfo kotwaa ho hyiae, na wofii ase sɛee no.

2 Ahene 3:26
Bere a Moab hene hui sɛ ɔko no mu ayɛ den ama no no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔfaa mmarima ahanson a wokurakura nkrante sɛ ɔrekɔ Edom hene so, nanso wɔantumi. 

2 Ahene 3:27
Ɛnna ɔfaa n’abakan a obedi n’ade de no bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ɔfasu no ho. Na abufuw kɛse baa Israel so, na wofii ne ho kɔɔ wɔn asase so.

2 Ahene 3:3
Nanso ɔfam Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛe a ɛmaa Israel nso yɛɛ bɔne no ho. Wantwe ne ho amfi ho.

2 Ahene 3:4
 Na Moab hene Mesa nso, na ɔyɛ nguanyɛnfo, na ode nguammaa mpem ɔha ne adwennini a wontwitwaa wɔn ho nhwi mpem ɔha maa Israel hene. 

2 Ahene 3:5
Na ɛbae sɛ bere a Ahab wui no, ɛhɔ ara na Moab hene tew Israel hene so atua. 

2 Ahene 3:6
Enti saa bere no, Ɔhene Yehoram siim fii Samaria kɔkan Israel nyinaa. 

2 Ahene 3:7
Bio nso, ɔsoma kɔɔ Yuda hene Yehosafat nkyɛn sɛ: “Moab hene atew me so atua. Wo ne me bɛkɔ ne Moab akɔko?” Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Mɛkɔ. Me ne wo nyinaa yɛ onipa biako. Me man ne wo man nso yɛ biako. M’apɔnkɔ ne w’apɔnkɔ yɛ biako.” 

2 Ahene 3:8
Afei obisaa no sɛ: “Ɔkwan pɔtee bɛn na yɛbɛfa so akɔ?” Na ɔkae sɛ: “Edom sare so kwan no.”

2 Ahene 3:9
 Enti Israel hene ne Yuda hene ne Edom hene siim kɔe; wɔbɔɔ aporɔw twaa nnanson kwan, na na nsu nni hɔ mma dɔm no ne mmoa a wodi wɔn akyi no. 

2 Ahene 4:1
Na ɔbea bi a ɔyɛ adiyifo mma no biako yere besu kyerɛɛ Elisa sɛ: “Me kunu a ɔyɛ w’akoa no awu, na wo ara wunim sɛ na w’akoa suro Awurade. Mede obi ka, na waba rebɛfa me mma baanu no akɔyɛ nkoa.” 

2 Ahene 4:10
Ma yɛnyɛ atifi dan ketewa bi ɔfasu no ho, na yɛmfa mpa ne ɔpon ne agua ne kaneadua nsisi mu mma no ɛ, na da biara a ɔbɛba yɛn nkyɛn no, wakogye n’ahome wɔ hɔ.”

2 Ahene 4:11
Ɛbae sɛ da bi, ɔbaa hɔ sɛnea ɔyɛ daa no, na ɔman hɔ kɔdaa abansoro pia no mu. 

2 Ahene 4:12
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo Gehasi sɛ: “Frɛ Sunemni bea yi bra.” Ɛnna ɔfrɛɛ no begyinaa n’anim. 

2 Ahene 4:13
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Wode ɔhaw yi nyinaa ahaw wo ho ama yɛn. Dɛn na yɛnyɛ mma wo? Biribi wɔ hɔ a wopɛ sɛ wɔka kyerɛ ɔhene anaa asraafo panyin ma wo?’” Na ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Me de, mete me nkurɔfo mu.” 

2 Ahene 4:14
Na obisae bio sɛ: “Dɛn koraa na yɛnyɛ mma no?” Ɛnna Gehasi kae sɛ: “Nokwasɛm ni, onni ba na ne kunu nso abɔ akora.” 

2 Ahene 4:15
Ɛhɔ ara na ɔkae sɛ: “Frɛ no bra.” Enti ɔkɔfrɛɛ no, na ɔbea no begyinaa ɔpon no ano. 

2 Ahene 4:16
Ɛnna odiyifo no kae sɛ: “Afe sesɛɛ na wuturu ɔbabarima.” Ɛnna ɔbea no kae sɛ: “O Nyankopɔn nipa, me wura, eyi de, ɛrenyɛ yiye! Nni atoro nkyerɛ w’afenaa.”

2 Ahene 4:17
Nanso ɔbea no nyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima afedan no mu, sɛnea Elisa ka kyerɛɛ no no. 

2 Ahene 4:18
Na abofra no nyinii, na da bi ɔkɔɔ ne papa nkyɛn wɔ atwafo no mu. 

2 Ahene 4:19
Na abofra no ka kyerɛɛ ne papa sɛ: “Me ti, me ti!” Ɛnna papa no ka kyerɛɛ ne somfo sɛ: “Fa no kɔma ne maame.” 

2 Ahene 4:2
Ɛnna Elisa bisaa no sɛ: “Dɛn na menyɛ mma wo? Ka kyerɛ me; dɛn na wowɔ wɔ fie?” Na ɔkae sɛ: “W’afenaa nni hwee wɔ fie sɛ ngo ahina biako.” 

2 Ahene 4:20
Enti ɔmaa abofra no so de no kɔmaa ne maame. Ɔdaa ne maame nan so kosii owigyinae, na owui. 

2 Ahene 4:21
Ɛnna ɔbea no foro de no kɔtoo Nyankopɔn nipa no mpa so, na ɔtoo pon no mu fii adi.

2 Ahene 4:22
Afei ɔfrɛɛ ne kunu na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Mesrɛ wo, ma me asomfo no biako ne afurumbere biako, na mintu mmirika nkɔ Nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn mmra.” 

2 Ahene 4:23
Ɛnna ne kunu bisae sɛ: “Dɛn nti na worekɔ ne nkyɛn nnɛ? Ɛnnɛ nyɛ ɔsram foforo anaa homeda.” Nanso ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Ɛnyɛ hwee.” 

2 Ahene 4:24
Ahene

2 Ahene 4:24
Enti ɔbea no hyehyɛɛ afurum no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo no sɛ: “Ka wo ho. Nka sɛ me nti woretɔ wo bo ase, gye sɛ meka sɛ tɔ wo bo ase.”

2 Ahene 4:25
Na ɔbea no siim sɛ ɔrekɔ Nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn wɔ Bepɔw Karmel so. Bere a Nyankopɔn nipa no huu no wɔ akyirikyiri no, ntɛm ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo Gehasi sɛ: “Hwɛ! Sunemni bea no na ɔreba no. 

2 Ahene 4:26
Enti mesrɛ wo, tu mmirika kohyia no na bisa no sɛ, ‘Wo ho ye? Wo kunu ho ye? Abofra no ho ye?’” Ɛnna ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Eye.” 

2 Ahene 4:27
Bere a ɔbea no koduu Nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn wɔ bepɔw no so no, ɛhɔ ara na ɔbea no soo ne nan. Ɛnna Gehasi bae sɛ ɔrebepia no afi hɔ, nanso Nyankopɔn nipa no kae sɛ: “Gyaa no, na ne kra abotow wɔ ne mu; Awurade de ahintaw me na wanka ankyerɛ me.” 

2 Ahene 4:28
Afei ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Me na mekae sɛ me wura mma minnya ɔba anaa? Manka sɛ, ‘Mmɛdaadaa me’?”

2 Ahene 4:29
Ɛhɔ ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ Gehasi sɛ: “Bɔ w’asen na fa me poma kura na kɔ. Obiara a wubehyia no wɔ kwan so no, nkyia no; sɛ obi kyia wo nso a, nnye so. Fa me poma no kɔto abofra no anim.” 

2 Ahene 4:3
Ɛnna ɔkae sɛ: “Kɔ abɔnten kɔfemfɛm nhina fi wɔn a wɔtete bɛn wo nyinaa nkyɛn, nhina a hwee nni mu. Gyigye bebree. 

2 Ahene 4:30
Ɛnna abofra no maame kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade te ase na wo kra nso te ase yi, merennyaw wo hɔ nkɔ.” Enti ɔsɔree ne ɔbea no kɔe. 

2 Ahene 4:31
Na Gehasi de, odii wɔn anim kan de poma no kɔtoo abofra no anim, nanso wankasa na wankeka ne ho. Enti ɔsan n’akyi kohyiaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Abofra no annyan.”

2 Ahene 4:32
Bere a Elisa nso beduu fie hɔ no, na abofra no awu ma wɔde no akɔto ne mpa so. 

2 Ahene 4:33
Ɛnna ɔkɔɔ mu kɔtoo wɔn baanu pon mu, na ɔbɔɔ Awurade mpae. 

2 Ahene 4:34
Afei ɔforoo mpa no kɔdaa abofra no so, na ɔde n’ano butuw n’ano, na ɔde n’aniwa butuw n’aniwa so, na ɔde ne nsayam totoo ne nsayam, na obutuw abofra no so; nkakrankakra, abofra no honam yɛɛ hyew. 

2 Ahene 4:35
Afei ɔsan dii akɔneaba wɔ fie hɔ, ɔkɔ ha, na waba ha, na ɔsan foroo mpa no kobutuw abofra no so. Ɛnna abofra no nwansii mpɛn ason, na afei abofra no buee n’aniwa. 

2 Ahene 4:36
Ɛno akyi no, ɔfrɛɛ Gehasi kae sɛ: “Frɛ Sunemni bea no bra.” Enti ɔfrɛɛ no ma ɔbaa ne nkyɛn. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no sɛ: “Fa wo ba no.” 

2 Ahene 4:37
Ɛnna ɔbea no baa mu bɛhwee ne nan ase butuw fam, na ɔfaa ne ba no kɔe.

2 Ahene 4:38
Elisa san kɔɔ Gilgal. Ɔkɔe no na ɔkɔm wɔ asase no so. Bere a adiyifo asefo no tete n’anim no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne somfo no sɛ: “Fa kuku kɛse no si gya so yɛ aduan ma adiyifo asefo no.” 

2 Ahene 4:39
