Omununkum akata no so, na onhu ade,

Hiob 22:15
  Wobɛfa tete tempɔn no a mma amumuyɔfo nantew so no so anaa?

Hiob 22:16
 Wɔn a wɔpraa wɔn kɔe ansa na ɛbere dui,

Hiob 22:17
Wɔn na wɔka kyerɛ Nyankopɔn sɛ: ‘Fi yɛn nkyɛn kɔ!

Hiob 22:18
Nanso ɔno na ɔde nneɛma pa hyehyɛɛ wɔn afi amaama:

Hiob 22:19
 Atreneefo hu, na wɔn ani gye;

Hiob 22:2
“Ɔbarima so wɔ mfaso ma Onyankopɔn?

Hiob 22:20
 Ka sɛ ‘Ampa ara wɔapopa yɛn atamfo afi hɔ;

Hiob 22:21
  Fa wo ho bɔ Nyankopɔn ho ɛ, na wo ho nnwo wo;

Hiob 22:22
Bɔ mmɔden gye n’anomu mmara,

Hiob 22:23
Sɛ wosan kɔ ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no nkyɛn a, wɔde wo besi hɔ;

Hiob 22:24
  fa sika amapa gu mfutuma mu,

Hiob 22:25
Anka ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no nso bɛyɛ wo sika amapa bebree,

Hiob 22:26
 Ɛno na wo ho bɛsɛpɛw wo Otumfoɔ ho,

Hiob 22:27
Anka wobɛbɔ no mpae, na obetie wo,

Hiob 22:28
Wobɛbɔ wo tirim, na ebegyina ama wo,

Hiob 22:29
 Sɛ wɔbrɛ wo ase a, ɛno de, ahomaso ntira;

Hiob 22:3
Sɛ woyɛ ɔtreneeni a, ɛma ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no ani gye anaa,

Hiob 22:30
 Sɛ nea onnii bem mpo, obegye no a,

Hiob 22:4
Wo nyamesuro nti ɔbɛka w’anim,

Hiob 22:5
  Ɛnyɛ sɛ wo bɔne dɔɔso?

Hiob 22:6
 Sɛ woagye wo nuanom awowa ɔkwa,

Hiob 22:7
Woamma nea wabrɛ nsu annom,

Hiob 22:8
 Na onipa a ne basa mu yɛ den no, ɔno na asase wɔ no,

Hiob 22:9
 Woama mmea akunafo de nsapan kɔ,

Hiob 23:1
Ɛnna Hiob buae gyee so sɛ:

Hiob 23:10
Ɔno de, onim ɔkwan a menam so.

Hiob 23:11
Ne nammɔn mu na me nan tintimii;

Hiob 23:12
N’anom mmara, mentwe me ho mfi ho.

Hiob 23:13
 Nso ɔno de, ɔnsakra da, 

Hiob 23:14
Efisɛ nea wahyɛ ato hɔ ama me nyinaa ɔbɛyɛ,

Hiob 23:15
Ɛno nti na ehu ka me n’anim;

Hiob 23:16
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn ama me koma abotow,

Hiob 23:17
Efisɛ manyera esum no anim,

Hiob 23:2
“Ɛnnɛ na me nkɔmmɔdi mu ayɛ den,

Hiob 23:3
O sɛ anka minim faako a mehu no ɛ!

Hiob 23:4
Anka mede m’asɛm bɛto n’anim,

Hiob 23:5
Anka mehu nsɛm a ɔde bebua me,

Hiob 23:6
Anka ɔde n’ahoɔden dodow no ne me bedi asi anaa?

Hiob 23:7
  Ɛhɔ na ɔteefo ne no beyi ntɛn,

Hiob 23:8
  Hwɛ, mekɔ m’anim, nso onni hɔ,

Hiob 23:9
Mekɔ benkum, faako a ɔyɛ adwuma, 

Hiob 24:1
“Dɛn nti na ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no nhyɛ atemmu bere nsie,

Hiob 24:10
 Wɔnenam adagyaw, wonni ntama,

Hiob 24:11
  Wokyi ngo wɔn afasu mu,

Hiob 24:12
Kurow no mu na wɔn a wɔrewu no si apini ma wɔte wɔ akyi hɔ,

Hiob 24:13
 Ebinom ayɛ hann anim atuatewfo,

Hiob 24:14
Owudifo sɔre awiabere,

Hiob 24:15
Ɔwaresɛefo aniwa de, 

Hiob 24:16
 Esum mu na wohwirew adan mu;

Hiob 24:17
  Na wɔn nyinaa, esum kabii yɛ wɔn sɛ anɔpa,

Hiob 24:18
  Ne ho yɛ hare wɔ nsu ani;

Hiob 24:19
Ɔhyew ne ɔpɛ na ɛnan sukyerɛmma nsu;

Hiob 24:2
Ebinom piapia ahye;

Hiob 24:20
Ɔyafunu a ɛwoo no no werɛ fi no, 

Hiob 24:21
Obonin a ɔnwo mpo, ɔyɛ no basabasa,

Hiob 24:22
  Nanso Onyankopɔn de ne tumi twe atumfo nna mu;

Hiob 24:23
 Ɔma wɔtena hɔ dwoodwoo, na wɔde wɔn ho to ɛno so,

Hiob 24:24
Wodu nea ɛkorɔn, na ɛyɛ kakra pɛ, na wonni hɔ bio,

Hiob 24:25
Enti sɛ ɛnte saa a, hena na obeyi me atorofo,

Hiob 24:3
Wɔpam nnyanka afurum kɔ;

Hiob 24:4
Wosum ahiafo fi kwan so;

Hiob 24:5
Hwɛ! Sɛnea sare so mfurum fi adi no,

Hiob 24:6
Mfuw mu na otwa mmoa aduan,

Hiob 24:7
Ɔde adagyaw na ɛda, onni ntama,

Hiob 24:8
  Mmepɔw so sutɔ fɔw wɔn,

Hiob 24:9
  Wɔtew agyanka fi nufu ano,

Hiob 25:1
Ɛnna Bildad a ofi Suha no buae sɛ:

Hiob 25:2
“Ɔno na tumidi wɔ no, na ne ho yɛ hu;

Hiob 25:3
  N’asafodɔm  ano wɔ abuyɛ?

Hiob 25:4
Enti ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na onipa desani bɛteɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim?

Hiob 25:5
Hwɛ! Ɔsram mpo, ɛmpae hyɛnn;

Hiob 25:6
Na menne ɔdesani, abubummabaa yi, na obebu no dɛn,

Hiob 26:1
</

Hiob 26:10
  Otwa nsu ani hye

Hiob 26:11
  Ɔsoro nnyinaso hinhim,

Hiob 26:12
Ɔde ne tumi hwanyan ɛpo,

Hiob 26:13
  Ne honhom ano na ɔsoro tew,

Hiob 26:14
Hwɛ! Eyinom yɛ ne nnwuma mu ketewaa bi,

Hiob 26:2
“Woaboa nea onni tumi dɛn?

Hiob 26:3
  Ɛfo bɛn na woatu nea onni nyansa,

Hiob 26:4
Hena na woaka nsɛm akyerɛ no,

Hiob 26:5
  Nsamanfo ho yeraw wɔn,

Hiob 26:6
  Asaman da adagyaw n’anim,

Hiob 26:7
Ɔno na ɔtrɛ atifi fam wɔ ahunmu,

Hiob 26:8
  Ɔkyekyere nsu hyɛ amununkum mu,

Hiob 26:9
  Ɔbram n’ahengua anim

Hiob 27:1
  Ɛnna Hiob san toaa n’akasabebu no so sɛ:

Hiob 27:10
Anaasɛ obenya anigye wɔ ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no ho?

Hiob 27:11
Menam Onyankopɔn nsa so bɛkyerɛkyerɛ mo;

Hiob 27:12
 Hwɛ, mo de, mo nyinaa moahu,

Hiob 27:13
Eyi ne otirimuɔdenfo kyɛfa a onya Onyankopɔn hɔ;

Hiob 27:14
Sɛ ne mma dɔɔso mpo a, 

Hiob 27:15
Ne ho nnipa a wɔbɛka no, 

Hiob 27:16
Sɛ ɔboaboa dwetɛ ano sɛ mfutuma,

Hiob 27:17
Obesiesie de, nanso ɔtreneeni na ɔbɛhyɛ,

Hiob 27:18
 Osi ne dan sɛ abubummabaa,

Hiob 27:19
 Ɔrekɔda, na ɔyɛ ɔdefo, nso ɔrenna so nyɛ saa bio;

Hiob 27:2
“Sɛ Onyankopɔn a wagye me bemdi afi me nsam no te ase,

Hiob 27:20
Ahude bɛfa no sɛ nsu;

Hiob 27:21
 Apuei mframa soa no kɔ,

Hiob 27:22
 Na ɔtow gu no so, na ɛrenhu no mmɔbɔ;

Hiob 27:23
 Wɔbɛbobɔ wɔn nsam agu ne so,

Hiob 27:3
bere dodow a m’ahome da so wɔ me mu,

Hiob 27:4
M’ano renka amumɔyɛsɛm biara,

Hiob 27:5
Ɛmpare me sɛ mebu mo bem!

Hiob 27:6
Mikura me trenee mu denneennen, na merennyaa mu;

Hiob 27:7
Ma me tamfo nyɛ sɛ ɔbɔnefo, 

Hiob 27:8
 Na ɛdɛn ne ɔbɔnefo anidaso bere a wotwa ne nkwa so,

Hiob 27:9
Sɛ ahohia ba no so a,

Hiob 28:1
“Aane dwetɛ wɔ ne nkommena,

Hiob 28:10
  Ɔtwitwa aka abotan mu,

Hiob 28:11
   Osisiw asuasu kwan na ansosɔ,

Hiob 28:12
Nanso nyansa de, ɛhe na ɛwɔ?

Hiob 28:13
  Ɔdesani nnim ne bo,

Hiob 28:14
Subun donkodonko ka sɛ,

Hiob 28:15
Wɔrentumi mfa sika amapa nsi ananmu nnye,

Hiob 28:16
Wɔrentumi mfa Ofir sika ntua ka,

Hiob 28:17
Wɔrentumi mfa sika ne ahwehwɛ ntoto ho,

Hiob 28:18
  Wɔmmɔ nhene panyin ne abo a ɛhyerɛn din,

Hiob 28:19
Etiopia asase so akraatebo ne no nsɛ,

Hiob 28:2
  Dade nso wɔtu no fa mu,

Hiob 28:20
  Ɛnde na ɛhe na nyansa fi ba?

Hiob 28:21
  Wɔde ahintaw ateasefo nyinaa aniwa,

Hiob 28:22
Ɔsɛe amoa ne owu ka sɛ,

Hiob 28:23
Onyankopɔn na ɔte n’akwan ase,

Hiob 28:24
Ɔno na ohu asase ano nohoa;

Hiob 28:25
Ɔhyɛɛ mframa duru too hɔ;

Hiob 28:26
Bere a ɔhyɛɛ mmara maa osu,

Hiob 28:27
na ohui na ɔyii no adi,

Hiob 28:28
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ onipa sɛ,

Hiob 28:3
  Onipa ma esum to twa,

Hiob 28:4
  Wotu nkron nea obi nte hɔ,

Hiob 28:5
Asase wɔ hɔ yi, emu na aduan fi ba;

Hiob 28:6
N’abo mu na hoabo wɔ,

Hiob 28:7
Ɔkɔre biara nnim saa kwan no,

Hiob 28:8
Wuram mmoa akɛse nan nsii so;

Hiob 28:9
  Ɔteɛ ne nsa ka ɔbohemmaa,

Hiob 29:1
Ɛnna Hiob san toaa n’akasabebu no so sɛ:

Hiob 29:10
Mmakoma nne di ntɔremu,

Hiob 29:11
  Na aso te a, ehyira me,

Hiob 29:12
Efisɛ na meyi ɔmanehunufo a osu frɛ ɔboafo

Hiob 29:13
Nea ɔreyɛ awu nhyira no ba me so,

Hiob 29:14
Mifuraa trenee, efuraa me, 

Hiob 29:15
 Meyɛ aniwa maa onifuraefo,

Hiob 29:16
  Meyɛ agya maa ahiafo,

Hiob 29:17
Mibubuu ɔbɔnefo abogye,

Hiob 29:18
Na meka sɛ, ‘Me berebuw mu na megyaa mu,

Hiob 29:19
Me ntini mu bebue ama nsu,

Hiob 29:2
“O, sɛ anka meyɛ sɛ na mete kan asram no,

Hiob 29:20
M’anuonyam yɛ foforo ma me,

Hiob 29:21
Me na wotiee me; wɔtwɛn me,

Hiob 29:22
M’ano si a, wɔnkasa bio,

Hiob 29:23
Na wɔtwɛn me sɛnea wɔtwɛn osu,

Hiob 29:24
Meserew kyerɛɛ wɔn, na wɔannye anni,

Hiob 29:25
Mepaw ɔkwan maa wɔn, na metenaa ase sɛ otitiriw;

Hiob 29:3
Bere a ne kanea hyerɛn me ti so,

Hiob 29:4
Sɛnea na mete me twabere nna mu,

Hiob 29:5
Bere a na ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ ne me da so wɔ hɔ,

Hiob 29:6
Bere a nan ho fɔwee nufusu mu srade mu,

Hiob 29:7
Bere a mekɔɔ kurow pon ho,

Hiob 29:8
 Mmerante huu me, na wɔde wɔn ho hintawee;

Hiob 29:9
Mmapɔmma nso gyaee kasa,

Hiob 3:1
Ɛno akyi no, Hiob buee n’ano, na ɔdomee n’awoda. 

Hiob 3:10
Efisɛ antoto me maame yafunu apon mu, 

Hiob 3:11
Dɛn nti na manwu ɔyafunu mu?

Hiob 3:12
 Ɛdɛn nti na anankoroma sɔw me,

Hiob 3:13
Anka saa bere yi mada ma me ho adwo me komm;

Hiob 3:14
 me ne ahene ne asase so afotufo a wɔkyekyeree amamfo fae no,

Hiob 3:15
 anaasɛ me ne mmapɔmma a wɔwɔ sika,

Hiob 3:16
Anaa te sɛ ɔba a wɔapɔn no ahintawee mu no, anka mamma,

Hiob 3:17
 Ɛhɔ na abɔnefo nhaw obi bio,

Hiob 3:18
Ɛhɔ ara na nneduafo te dwoodwoo;

Hiob 3:19
Ɛhɔ na nnipa akɛse ne nketewa nyinaa wɔ,

Hiob 3:2
  Na Hiob bua kae sɛ:

Hiob 3:20
 Ɛdɛn nti na ɔma ɔbrɛfo hann,

Hiob 3:21
 wɔn a wɔtwɛn owu, nanso ɛmma,

Hiob 3:22
 Wɔn a wɔn ani gye boro soɔ no,

Hiob 3:23
 Ɛdɛn nti na wɔde hann ma ɔbarima a wɔde ne kwan ahintaw,

Hiob 3:24
 Na m’apinisi abesi m’aduan ananmu,

Hiob 3:25
 Na nea misuro no, ɛno ara na ɛto me,

Hiob 3:26
 Minnya ahodwo ne kommyɛ ne ɔhome,

Hiob 3:3
“Ma ɛda a wɔwoo me mu no nyera,

Hiob 3:4
  Ɛda no nnuru sum,

Hiob 3:5
Ma esum ne sunsum nnye mfa.

Hiob 3:6
Saa anadwo no, ma esum kabii nkita no;

Hiob 3:7
Hwɛ! Saa anadwo no—ma ɛnyɛ kwayow;

Hiob 3:8
Ma wɔn a wɔdome ɛda mmɔ no dua,

Hiob 3:9
Ma ahemadakye nsoromma nnuru sum;

Hiob 30:1
  “Na afei de wɔn a midi wɔn panyin koraa serew me,

Hiob 30:10
Wokyi me, wɔatwe wɔn ho afi me ho kɔ akyirikyiri;

Hiob 30:11
 Na sɛ Onyankopɔn asan me hama, na wabrɛ me ase nti,

Hiob 30:12
 Me nifa so na nkisiwa no sɔre,

Hiob 30:13
  Wɔdwiriw me kwan,

Hiob 30:14
Wɔba sɛnea wɔnam ɔkwan a ɛtrɛw so;

Hiob 30:15
  Ahuyide adan akyerɛ me so,

Hiob 30:16
Mprempren de, me kra nan gu me mu,

Hiob 30:17
 Anadwo gurow me nnompe wɔ me mu,

Hiob 30:18
 Emu den nko ara nti m’atade sakra;

Hiob 30:19
  Watow me akyene dontori mu,

Hiob 30:2
  Wɔn nsam tumi nso bɛyɛ me dɛn,

Hiob 30:20
 Misu mefrɛ wo, na wunnye me so,

Hiob 30:21
 Woadan ayɛ sɛ otirimɔdenfo ama me,

Hiob 30:22
  Woma me so ma metena mframa so kɔ,

Hiob 30:23
  Na minim sɛ wode me bɛsan ama owu

Hiob 30:24
 Nanso obi nteɛ ne nsa nhwehwɛ ogye odwiriw mu,

Hiob 30:25
 Mansu mamma nea ɔwɔ amaneɛ mu,

Hiob 30:26
 Na metwɛn adepa, nanso bɔne na ɛbae;

Hiob 30:27
Me nsono hurui na anyɛ komm;

Hiob 30:28
Awerɛhow mu na menantewee esum mu;

Hiob 30:29
Madan sakraman nua,

Hiob 30:3
  Ohia ne ɔkɔm nti wɔatyenkyen,

Hiob 30:30
Me were ayɛ tumm, na ɛwaewae fi me ho;

Hiob 30:31
 Na me sanku adan awerɛhow,

Hiob 30:4
  Wɔtetew nkyenhaban wɔ nnuaa so,

Hiob 30:5
Wɔpampam wɔn fii nnipa mu;

Hiob 30:6
 Abon a ɛhɔ yɛ hu mu na wɔtetee,

Hiob 30:7
Nnua ntam na wɔteɛteɛɛm;

Hiob 30:8
  Nnyennyentwi mma ne wɔn,

Hiob 30:9
 Na afei madan wɔn sanku dwom,

Hiob 31:1
“Apam na me ne m’aniwa ayɛ.

Hiob 31:10
ɛnde ma me yere nyam mma ɔbarima foforo,

Hiob 31:11
Anka ɛno bɛyɛ ahohwibra,

Hiob 31:12
  Na ɛno ne ogya a ɛhyew kɔ ɔyera amoa mu,

Hiob 31:13
  Sɛ mammu m’akoa anaa m’afenaa atemmu hwee

Hiob 31:14
Ɛnde sɛ Onyankopɔn sɔre a, dɛn na mɛyɛ?

Hiob 31:15
Ɛnyɛ Nea ɔyɛɛ me ɔyafunu mu no ara na ɔyɛɛ no?

Hiob 31:16
Sɛ mede nea abrɛfo pɛ kamee wɔn,

Hiob 31:17
Sɛ me nkutoo na midii m’aduan,

Hiob 31:18
 Mmom mifi me mmeranteberem na mahwɛ no sɛ agya,

Hiob 31:19
Sɛ mahu obi a atade a onni nti ɔrewu,

Hiob 31:2
Anka kyɛfa bɛn na menya afi Onyankopɔn hɔ afi soro?

Hiob 31:20
 Na sɛ n’asen anhyira me,

Hiob 31:21
Na sɛ meteɛɛ me nsa wɔ agyanka so,

Hiob 31:22
ɛnde ma me mmati nhuan mfi ne dompe so,

Hiob 31:23
Efisɛ mmusuo a efi Onyankopɔn yii me hu,

Hiob 31:24
Sɛ mede sika yɛɛ m’anidaso,

Hiob 31:25
  na sɛ m’ani gyei sɛ m’ahode dɔɔso,

Hiob 31:26
 na sɛ mihuu owia hann sɛ ɛhyerɛn,

Hiob 31:27
Na me koma daadaa me wɔ kokoam,

Hiob 31:28
  ɛno nso ne ɔtemmufo anim amumɔyɛ bi, 

Hiob 31:29
  Sɛ m’ani gyee me tamfo abu a ebuu no ho,

Hiob 31:3
Ɛnyɛ ɔsɛe na ɛwɔ hɔ ma obusufo?

Hiob 31:30
  nso mamma m’ano anyɛ bɔne,

Hiob 31:31
Ampa ara me ntomadan mufo anka sɛ:

Hiob 31:32
Ɔhɔho biara anna abɔnten anadwo;

Hiob 31:33
 sɛ mekataa me mmarato so sɛ Adam, 

Hiob 31:34
  efisɛ misuroo nkurɔfo dodow na abusuafo ahohorabɔ yii me hu,

Hiob 31:35
  O, sɛ anka menya obi a obetie me ɛ!

Hiob 31:36
Ampa ara, anka mede bɛto me mmati;

Hiob 31:37
 Anka mɛkyerɛ no m’anammɔntutu dodo,

Hiob 31:38
  Sɛ m’asase team tia me,

Hiob 31:39
Sɛ midii so aba a mantua sika biara,

Hiob 31:4
  Ɛnyɛ ɔno na ohu m’akwan,

Hiob 31:40
Ɛnde ma nsɔensɔe nsi awi ananmu,

Hiob 31:5
 Sɛ midii ahuhude akyi,

Hiob 31:6
  Ɔnkari me nsania pa mu,

Hiob 31:7
Sɛ me nan man fii ɔkwan no so,

Hiob 31:8
  ɛnde wɔmma mennua na obi nni,

Hiob 31:9
Sɛ me koma adaadaa me ɔbea ho,

Hiob 32:1
Ɛnna mmarima baasa yi gyaee sɛ wɔbɛma Hiob mmuae, efisɛ na ɔteɛ n’ankasa ani so. 

Hiob 32:10
Ɛno nti mekae sɛ, ‘Muntie me.

Hiob 32:11
 Hwɛ, matwɛn ama mo akasa awie,

Hiob 32:12
Meyɛɛ asomaa mo,

Hiob 32:13
Enti monhwɛ na moanka sɛ, ‘Yɛahu nyansa;

Hiob 32:14
  Efisɛ ɛnyɛ me na ɔkaa ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ me,

Hiob 32:15
  Wɔn abasam atu, wɔremmua bio,

Hiob 32:16
Metwɛnee, nanso wankasa bio;

Hiob 32:17
Me nso mebua me fam de;

Hiob 32:18
Efisɛ nsɛm ahyɛ me ma;

Hiob 32:19
  Hwɛ, me yam te sɛ nsa a wontuu ano,

Hiob 32:2
Na Busini Barakel a ofi Ram abusua mu no ba Elihu bo fuwii kɛse. Ne bo fuw Hiob sɛ obu ne ho treneeni sen Onyankopɔn. 

Hiob 32:20
Momma menkasa, na me ho ntɔ me.

Hiob 32:21
Ɛmpare me sɛ mɛhwɛ onipa anim;

Hiob 32:22
Minnim m’ano adɛfɛdɛfɛ,

Hiob 32:3
Na ne bo fuw ne mfɛfo baasa no nso, sɛ wonnya mmuae bi bio, na mmom wobuu Hiob fɔ. 

Hiob 32:4
Na Elihu twɛn maa Hiob kasae ansa, efisɛ na wɔn nyinaa sen no panyin.

Hiob 32:5
 Na Elihu hui sɛ mmuae biara nni mmarima baasa no anom, ne bo fuwii. 

Hiob 32:6
Enti Busni Barakel ba Elihu buae sɛ:

Hiob 32:7
  Mekae sɛ: Wɔmma nna nkasa, 

Hiob 32:8
Ampa, honhom a ɛwɔ ɔdasani mu,

Hiob 32:9
 Ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔanyini pii na wonim nyansa,

Hiob 33:1
  “Na afei, Hiob, tie me kasa ɛ,

Hiob 33:10
Hwɛ, ohu ntɔkwa nsɛm wɔ me ho,

Hiob 33:11
Ɔde me nan bɔ nnua mu,

Hiob 33:12
Hwɛ! Eyi mu de, mereka akyerɛ wo, woanyɛ no yiye;

Hiob 33:13
Dɛn nti na wo ne no reyiyi nsɛm ano?

Hiob 33:14
  Nso Onyankopɔn kasa prɛko

Hiob 33:15
Ɔdae mu, anadwo adehu mu,

Hiob 33:16
  Emu na obue nnipa aso,

Hiob 33:17
 sɛ ɔbɛsan onipa afi ne nneyɛe ho,

Hiob 33:18
  na watwe ne kra afi amena mu,

Hiob 33:19
  Na wɔde ɛyaw twe n’aso ne nnae so

Hiob 33:2
  Hwɛ, mabue m’ano,

Hiob 33:20
N’asetena ma aduan yɛ no abofono,

Hiob 33:21
  Ne honam afɔn ama no ayɛ hununa,

Hiob 33:22
Ne kra bɛn amoa,

Hiob 33:23
  Sɛ ɔbɔfo dimafo wɔ hɔ ma no,

Hiob 33:24
  ɛno na ohu no mmɔbɔ ka sɛ: Kogye no,

Hiob 33:25
  ɛnde ne honam nyɛ fɔɔfɔɔ sɛ mmofra de,

Hiob 33:26
  Ɔbɛbɔ Onyankopɔn mpae a, n’ani sɔ no,

Hiob 33:27
  na ɔto dwom kyerɛ nnipa sɛ:

Hiob 33:28
Wagye me kra na ankɔ amoa mu;

Hiob 33:29
  Hwɛ, eyinom nyinaa na Onyankopɔn yɛ

Hiob 33:3
 Me komam teeyɛ ne me nsɛm,

Hiob 33:30
Sɛ ɔde bɛdan ne kra afi amoa ho,

Hiob 33:31
Enti afei Hiob yɛ aso! Tie me!

Hiob 33:32
  Sɛ nsɛm bi wɔ hɔ a, yi ano kyerɛ me,

Hiob 33:33
Sɛ wunni hwee ka a, ɛnde tie me ɛ;

Hiob 33:4
Onyankopɔn honhom na ɛyɛɛ me,

Hiob 33:5
  Sɛ wubetumi a, yi ano kyerɛ me;

Hiob 33:6
Hwɛ! Sɛnea wote wɔ Nyankopɔn ani so no, saa ara na mete;

Hiob 33:7
Hwɛ! Me ho hu rentu wo koma,

Hiob 33:8
Woaka wɔ m’asom,

Hiob 33:9
‘ Me de, me ho tew, mmarato nni me ho;

Hiob 34:1
Elihu toaa ne nsɛm no so sɛ:

Hiob 34:10
  Enti mo a mowɔ ti, muntie me,

Hiob 34:11
  Na mmom, onipa nneyɛe so ka na otua no,

Hiob 34:12
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn de, ɔnyɛ bɔne,

Hiob 34:13
  Hena na ɔde asase hyɛɛ ne nsa,

Hiob 34:14
Sɛ ɔde n’ani si obi so,

Hiob 34:15
  anka ɔhonam nyinaa begyaa mu prɛko,

Hiob 34:16
  Na sɛ wowɔ nhunumu a, tie eyi,

Hiob 34:17
  Nea okyi atɛntrenee benya aman adi so anaa?

Hiob 34:18
Obi betumi aka akyerɛ ɔhene sɛ, ‘Woyɛ ohuhuni’?

Hiob 34:19
  Nea ɔnhwɛ atitiriw anim,

Hiob 34:2
“Muntie me nsɛm, mo anyansafo;

Hiob 34:20
 Mpofirim na wɔawuwu, anadwo dasum;

Hiob 34:21
Efisɛ n’ani tua onipa akwan,

Hiob 34:22
  Esum nni hɔ, na esum kabii nni hɔ,

Hiob 34:23
  Na enhia sɛ ɔhwɛ onipa ma no ɛkyɛ

Hiob 34:24
  Obubu abirɛmpɔn a ɔnhwehwɛ wɔn asɛm mu,

Hiob 34:25
Ne saa nti, ɔhwɛ wɔn nsɛnnii,

Hiob 34:26
Ɔbobɔ wɔn sɛ nnebɔneyɛfo

Hiob 34:27
Efisɛ wɔagyae n’akyidi,

Hiob 34:28
  sɛ wɔbɛma ɔbrɛfo sufrɛ adu ne nkyɛn,

Hiob 34:29
Sɛ ɔma kommyɛ ba a, hena na obetumi abu no fɔ?

Hiob 34:3
Efisɛ aso na ɛsɔ nsɛm hwɛ,

Hiob 34:30
  Na onipa kɔnkɔnsani anni hene,

Hiob 34:31
  Na obi bɛka akyerɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ:

Hiob 34:32
Me de, minhu nea mayɛ, enti w’ankasa kyerɛ me;

Hiob 34:33
 Ɔnhyɛ ananmu sɛ wopɛ na wopo ne nneyeɛ yi?

Hiob 34:34
  Nnipa a wɔwɔ ti bɛka akyerɛ me,

Hiob 34:35
‘Hiob de, ɛnyɛ nimdeɛ so na ɔkasa,

Hiob 34:36
  Sɛ anka wɔbɛsɔ Hiob ahwɛ akosi awiei ɛ,

Hiob 34:37
  Na ɔde mmusubɔ ka ne bɔne ho,

Hiob 34:4
Momma yɛnsɔ atemmu nhwɛ;

Hiob 34:5
  Na Hiob aka sɛ: Meteɛ,

Hiob 34:6
Me bem mu ara na wobu me torofo,

Hiob 34:7
  Ɔbarima bɛn na ɔte sɛ Hiob

Hiob 34:8
  na ɔhyɛne amumuyɛfo ayɔnkofa mu,

Hiob 34:9
  Na ɔka sɛ: Ɛnyɛ mfaso mma onipa

Hiob 35:1
Elihu toaa ne nsɛm no so sɛ:

Hiob 35:10
Nanso wɔn mu biara nka sɛ, ‘Ɛhe na Onyankopɔn, me Bɔfo Kɛse no wɔ,

Hiob 35:11
Ɔno na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ yɛn sen asase so mmoa,

Hiob 35:12
Wɔteɛm, nanso ommua,

Hiob 35:13
  Ampa ara Onyankopɔn rentie ahuhusɛm,

Hiob 35:14
 Na menne sɛ wuse: Wunhu no de,

Hiob 35:15
 Na afei sɛ ɔmmɛtwee aso, n’abufuw mu,

Hiob 35:16
Hiob bue n’ano kwa;

Hiob 35:2
“Eyi na wubu no trenee no?

Hiob 35:3
  Sɛ woka sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ me mfaso bɛn?

Hiob 35:4
Mɛma wo mmuae,

Hiob 35:5
Ma w’ani so hwɛ ɔsoro,

Hiob 35:6
Sɛ woyɛ bɔne a, dɛn na woyɛ tia no?

Hiob 35:7
Sɛ woyɛ nea ɛteɛ a, dɛn na ɛde ma no,

Hiob 35:8
Onipa te sɛ wo na w’amumɔyɛ betumi atia no,

Hiob 35:9
Nhyɛso bebrebe nti wɔteɛm hwehwɛ mmoa;

Hiob 36:1
Elihu toaa so bio sɛ:

Hiob 36:10
  Na obue wɔn aso ma ateɛso,

Hiob 36:11
Sɛ wotie na wɔsom no a,

Hiob 36:12
Na sɛ wɔantie de a, wobetɔ nkrantɛ ano;

Hiob 36:13
Na koma mu nkɔnkɔnsafo kora abufuw,

Hiob 36:14
  Wɔn kra wu mmerantebere mu,

Hiob 36:15
  Oyi ɔmanehunufo n’amane mu,

Hiob 36:16
  Anka obegye wo nso afi ahohia mu

Hiob 36:17
  Nanso ɔbɔnefo atemmu ayɛ wo ma,

Hiob 36:18
  Na mma abufuw nnnyigye wo nnkɔ ahiiyi mu,

Hiob 36:19
  W’ahonyade anaa wo tumi ahoɔdenne nyinaa

Hiob 36:2
“Nya abotare kakra ma me, na mɛma woahu sɛ

Hiob 36:20
Mma wo ho mmpere wo anadwo ho,

Hiob 36:21
Hwɛ yiye na woannan ankɔ amumɔyɛ ho,

Hiob 36:22
  Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn di ne tumi mu asɛnkɛse,

Hiob 36:23
Hena na ɔhyɛɛ no sɛnea ɔnyɛ n’ade mfa,

Hiob 36:24
Kae na kamfo ne nnwuma

Hiob 36:25
Adesamma nyinaa ahwɛ haa;

Hiob 36:26
  Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn so, na yɛnnim no;

Hiob 36:27
 Ɔno na ɔtwe nsu ntɔatɔw 

Hiob 36:28
  na efi mununkum mu tɔ gu fam,

Hiob 36:29
 Obi bɛtumi ate omununkum mu trɛw

Hiob 36:3
  Mɛfa me nimdeɛ afi akyirikyiri,

Hiob 36:30
 Hwɛ, ɔtrɛw ne hann mu wɔ no so,

Hiob 36:31
Na ɛno na ɔde di aman asɛm,

Hiob 36:32
Wakata anyinam so wɔ ne nsam,

Hiob 36:33
Ne mmobom ka ne ho asɛm,

Hiob 36:4
 Na ampa, me nsɛm nyɛ atoro,

Hiob 36:5
  Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn yɛ kɛse,

Hiob 36:6
  Ɔmma ɔbɔnefo nnya nkwa,

Hiob 36:7
Ɔrenyi n’ani mfi ɔtreneeni biara so;

Hiob 36:8
  Na sɛ wɔgu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn,

Hiob 36:9
ɛno na ɔbɛka wɔn nneyɛe akyerɛ wɔn,

Hiob 37:1
“Yiw, eyi ho na me koma tutuo,

Hiob 37:10
 Onyankopɔn home na ɛma nsukyenee,

Hiob 37:11
Nsu na ɔde soa omununkum,

Hiob 37:12
 Na ɔma edi kyinhyia sɛ n’akwankyerɛ te,

Hiob 37:13
 sɛ ɛyɛ nteɛso nti oo, sɛ ɛyɛ n’asase nti oo,

Hiob 37:14
O Hiob, yɛ aso tie eyi;

Hiob 37:15
  Wunim bere a Onyankopɔn susuw ho,

Hiob 37:16
 Wunim omununkum nkarii,

Hiob 37:17
Wunim sɛnea wo ntade mu yɛ hyew,

Hiob 37:18
  Wo ne no na ɛde wim tɔnn a ɛwɔ hɔ pintinn

Hiob 37:19
 Ma yɛnhunu nea yɛnka nkyerɛ no;

Hiob 37:2
Monyɛ aso ntie ne nne mmobom,

Hiob 37:20
  Wɔbɛka akyerɛ no sɛ mewɔ asɛm bi ka anaa?

Hiob 37:21
Nnipa de, wonhu hann;

Hiob 37:22
 Benkum fam asase so na sika fi ba,

Hiob 37:23
  Otumfoɔ de, yɛnhu no;

Hiob 37:24
  Enti nnipa monsuro no,

Hiob 37:3
Ogyaa mu wɔ ɔsoro ase nyinaa,

Hiob 37:4
  Ɔprannaa bobom di akyiri,

Hiob 37:5
 Onyankopɔn de ne nne prannaa bobom ma no yɛ nwanwa,

Hiob 37:6
  Na ɔka kyerɛ sukyerɛmma sɛ: Tɔ gu asase so!

Hiob 37:7
Ɔsɔ nnipa nyinaa nsa ano,

Hiob 37:8
 Ɛnna mmoadoma kɔ wɔn atu mu,

Hiob 37:9
  Ahum fi mpiakyiri hɔ ba,

Hiob 38:1
Ɛnna Awurade fi ahum mu buaa Hiob sɛ:

Hiob 38:10
Bere  a mitwaa no so hye,

Hiob 38:11
na mekae sɛ, ‘‘Ɛha yi na bra bedu, na ntra;

Hiob 38:12
Efi wo nna mfiase no, woahyɛ bere ama anɔpa pɛn?

Hiob 38:13
Sɛ ensuso asase ano,

Hiob 38:14
 Sɛ ɛdannan sɛ dɔte wɔ nsɔano ase,

Hiob 38:15
 na wɔde abɔnefo hann akame wɔn,

Hiob 38:16
  Woakɔ po aniwa ho,

Hiob 38:17
 Wɔayi owu aponkɛse adi akyerɛ wo,

Hiob 38:18
Woate asase tɛtrɛtɛ ase?

Hiob 38:19
 Ɛhe na hann trabea kwan wɔ,

Hiob 38:2
“Hena ne oyi a ɔdan afotu ani,

Hiob 38:20
  na wode akɔ ne hye so,

Hiob 38:21
Wunim, aane efisɛ saa bere no na wɔawo wo,

Hiob 38:22
  Woakɔ sukyerɛmma korabea,

Hiob 38:23
  ade a makora asie ahohi bere

Hiob 38:24
Ɛhe na ɔkwan a hann fa so hyerɛn no da,

Hiob 38:25
Hena na oyiyi aka ma nsu 

Hiob 38:26
  sɛ ɔbɛma nsu atɔ asase a obi nni hɔ so,

Hiob 38:27
  na wama amamfo ne asase hunu amee,

Hiob 38:28
  Nsu wɔ agya,

Hiob 38:29
Hena yam na nsukyenee fi,

Hiob 38:3
Bɔ w’asen sɛ dɔmmarima ɛ;

Hiob 38:30
  Nsu kyenkyen sɛ ɔbo,

Hiob 38:31
Wubetumi akyekyere Kima nsorommakuw abom?

Hiob 38:32
Wubetumi ama Masarot nsorommakuw apue ne bere mu?

Hiob 38:33
Wunim ɔsoro nhyehyɛe?

Hiob 38:34
Wubetumi ama wo nne so akyerɛ omununkum

Hiob 38:35
So wubetumi asoma anyinam ma akɔ,

Hiob 38:36
Hena na ɔde nyansa siee ayamde mu,

Hiob 38:37
Hena na obetumi de nyansa akan omununkum pɛpɛɛpɛ,

Hiob 38:38
Bere a mfutuma twe kɔhɔre siw,

Hiob 38:39
Wubetumi ayɛ ha ama gyata?

Hiob 38:4
Ɛhe na na wowɔ berɛ a metoo asase fapem?

Hiob 38:40
 ɛbere a wobutubutuw wɔn atu mu,

Hiob 38:41
Hena na osiesie aduan ma kwaakwaadabi,

Hiob 38:5
Hena na ɔde ne nsusuwii too hɔ, wunim anaa?

Hiob 38:6
Dɛn so na wɔde ne nnyinaso sisii?

Hiob 38:7
bere a adekyee nsoromma boom too ahurusi dwom,

Hiob 38:8
Hena na ɔkaa po hyehyɛɛ apon mu,

Hiob 38:9
Bere a mede omununkum yɛɛ ne nkataho,

Hiob 39:1
“Wunim abotan so mmirekyi awo bere?

Hiob 39:10
Wubetumi de hama akyekyere ɛkoɔ wɔ afuw mu?

Hiob 39:11
N’ahoɔden dodow nti, wode wo ho bɛto no so anaa,

Hiob 39:12
  Wubɛgye no adi sɛ ɔde w’aba bɛba,

Hiob 39:13
  Sohori bɔ ne ntaban mu ahurisidi mu,

Hiob 39:14
Ogyaw ne nkesua gu asase mu,

Hiob 39:15
Na ne werɛ fi sɛ obi nan betumi apɛkɛw no,

Hiob 39:16
Ɔbɔ ne mma atirimuɔden; ɔyɛ wɔn te sɛ nea wɔnyɛ ne mma,

Hiob 39:17
Onyankopɔn ama nyansa abɔ no,

Hiob 39:18
  Na sɛ ɔyere ne ho tu a,

Hiob 39:19
Wo na wode ahoɔden ma ɔpɔnkɔ?

Hiob 39:2
Wubetumi akan asram dodow a wɔn afuru de nyin?

Hiob 39:20
Wo na woma huruw sɛ boadabi?

Hiob 39:21
Ɔde ne nan pempem bon mu, 

Hiob 39:22
Ohu ahude a, ɔserew, na ne ho mpopo;

Hiob 39:23
 Agyan boha wosow no so,

Hiob 39:24
 Ɔde anibere ne abufuw twerɛw asase,

Hiob 39:25
Onya te abɛn pɛ a, ɔka sɛ, Ahaa!

Hiob 39:26
So wo nyansa nti na akorɔma tu kɔ sorosoro,

Hiob 39:27
Anaa wo na wohyɛ ma ɔkɔre tu kɔ sorosoro,

Hiob 39:28
Ɔbotan mu na ɔte na ɔda,

Hiob 39:29
Ɛhɔ na ofi hwehwɛ aduan;

Hiob 39:3
 Wɔkotow wowo wɔn mma,

Hiob 39:30
Na ne mma nso fifew mogya;

Hiob 39:4
Wɔn mma ho kokwaw, wonyini wuram;

Hiob 39:5
Hena na ogyaa sare so afunumu sɛ ɔnne ne ho,

Hiob 39:6
Nea mede sare pradada so ama no sɛ ne fi,

Hiob 39:7
  Ommu kurow mu gyegyeegyeyɛ,

Hiob 39:8
 Nea onya no mmepɔw so no ne n’aduan,

Hiob 39:9
Ɛkoɔ bɛpene so asom wo?

Hiob 4:1
Ɛnna Temanni Elifas bua see sɛ:

Hiob 4:10
 Gyata bobom, na wɔte gyata nne,

Hiob 4:11
Hanam a enni hɔ nti, gyata wu,

Hiob 4:12
Asɛm bi wiawiaa ne ho baa me nkyɛn,

Hiob 4:13
Ɔdadwen a efi anadwo anisoadehu mu no mu,

Hiob 4:14
 Ehu ne ahopopo kaa me, 

Hiob 4:15
 Na honhom bi twaam faa m’ani so,

Hiob 4:16
Ebegyinaa hɔ dinn

Hiob 4:17
‘Onipa desani betumi ateɛ asen Onyankopɔn anaa?

Hiob 4:18
 Hwɛ, ne nkoa po, ɔmfa ne ho nto wɔn so,

Hiob 4:19
Na wɔn a wɔtete dɔtedan mu de, obebu wɔn dɛn,

Hiob 4:2
“Sɛ obi ka asɛm bi kyerɛ wo a, ɛbɛyɛ wo ahometew anaa?

Hiob 4:20
Ebefi anɔpa akosi anwummere no, na wɔaposaw wɔn koraa;

Hiob 4:21
 Sɛ wɔtetew wɔn ho ntomadan homa a,

Hiob 4:3
Hwɛ! Woateɛ nnipa pii,

Hiob 4:4
Nea ɔrehwe ase no, wo nsɛm ama wasɔre agyina;

Hiob 4:5
 Na afei ɛtoo wo yi de, woagyigya;

Hiob 4:6
Ɛnyɛ wo Nyamesuro ne nea wode wo ho to so?

Hiob 4:7
Kae eyi: Hena na ne ho nni asɛm a wɔasɛe no pɛn?

Hiob 4:8
 Nea mahu ne sɛ wɔn a wɔfɛntɛm amumuyɛ, 

Hiob 4:9
 Onyankopɔn home sɛe wɔn,

Hiob 40:1
Na Awurade buaa Hiob sɛ:

Hiob 40:10
Fa kɛseyɛ ne tumidi hyehyɛ wo ho;

Hiob 40:11
Hwie w’abufuw mmoroso no gu,

Hiob 40:12
 Hwɛ ahantanfo nyinaa na brɛ wɔn ase,

Hiob 40:13
Fa wɔn nyinaa sie dɔte mu,

Hiob 40:14
Anka me na mɛkamfo wo,

Hiob 40:15
Hwɛ susono a meyɛɛ no ne wo,

Hiob 40:16
N’asen mu na ne tumi wɔ,

Hiob 40:17
Ɔkoa ne dua sɛ kyeneduru;

Hiob 40:18
Ne nnompe te sɛ kɔbere dorobɛn;

Hiob 40:19
Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn akwan mfiase;

Hiob 40:2
“Ɔtɛnyifo bi ne Otumfo no bɛham anaa?

Hiob 40:20
Mmepɔw na efifi aduan ma no,

Hiob 40:21
Nsɔe nnua ase na ɔda,

Hiob 40:22
Nsɔe nnua nwini kata no so;

Hiob 40:23
 Hwɛ, asubɔnten ano yɛ den mpo a, ne ho mpopo.

Hiob 40:24
Obi betumi agyina n’anim akyere no animono,

Hiob 40:3
Ɛnna Hiob buaa Awurade sɛ:

Hiob 40:4
“Ao! Mensɛ hwee: misua.

Hiob 40:5
Makasa pɛnkoro, na merenkasa bio,

Hiob 40:6
Ɛnna Awurade fi ahum mu buaa Hiob sɛ:

Hiob 40:7
“Bɔ w’asen sɛ ɔbarima ɛ;

Hiob 40:8
  Wobɛdan m’atemmu ani?

Hiob 40:9
 Wowɔ nsa sɛ Onyankopɔn de,

Hiob 41:1
“Wubetumi de darewa atwe dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn [Leviathan],

Hiob 41:10
Obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛpɛ ne ho asɛm akogyigye no.

Hiob 41:11
Hena na wadi kan ama me biribi a ɛsɛ sɛ mehyɛ no ananmu?

Hiob 41:12
  Merennyae ne honam ade,

Hiob 41:13
Hena na obeyi ne ho abon?

Hiob 41:14
N’anom apon, hena na obetumi abue?

Hiob 41:15
Abona a ɛwɔ ne ho ma ɔyɛ ahantan,

Hiob 41:16
Ɛfomfam so papee,

Hiob 41:17
Ɛtetare so denneennen;

Hiob 41:18
Ne nwansi pa gya hyerɛn,

Hiob 41:19
N’anom pa gya yerɛwyerɛw,

Hiob 41:2
Wubetumi de kaa ahyɛ ne hwene mu,

Hiob 41:20
Wusiw fi ne hwene mu ba

Hiob 41:21
  N’ahome sɔ nsramma,

Hiob 41:22
Ne kɔn mu na ahoɔden wɔ,

Hiob 41:23
Ne honam abubu agu so;

Hiob 41:24
 Ne koma yɛ den sɛ ɔbo,

Hiob 41:25
  Sɛ ɔma ne ho so a, atumfo ho popo,

Hiob 41:26
Wɔde nkrante ka no a, ɛnka,

Hiob 41:27
Obu dade sɛ sare bi kɛkɛ,

Hiob 41:28
Agyan ntumi mpam no;

Hiob 41:29
Obu aporibaa sɛ buronan hunu bi,

Hiob 41:3
Ɔbɛkotow asrɛ wo pii?

Hiob 41:30
Ne yam ase te sɛ abono hwetahweta;

Hiob 41:31
Ɔma ebun mu huru sɛ kuku;

Hiob 41:32
Ɔma ɔkwan hyerɛn wɔ n’akyi;

Hiob 41:33
Asase so nso, biribi nte sɛ ɔno;

Hiob 41:34
Ade wɔ soro sɛ dɛn koraa a, ohu.

Hiob 41:4
Ɔne wo bɛyɛ apam

Hiob 41:5
Wo ne no bedi agoru sɛ anomaa?

Hiob 41:6
Abatafo de no bedi nsesagua?

Hiob 41:7
Wubetumi de mpeaw ahyehyɛ ne were mu,

Hiob 41:8
Fa wo nsa to no so hwɛ,

Hiob 41:9
Hwɛ onipa anidaso yɛ ohunu.

Hiob 42:1
Ɛnna Hiob buaa Awurade sɛ:

Hiob 42:10
Bere a Hiob bɔɔ mpae maa ne nnamfo no, Awurade nso maa Hiob amanehunu no baa awiei, na Awurade de ade a Hiob nyae no nyinaa mmɔho abien maa no. 

Hiob 42:11
  Ɛnna ne nuanom mmarima nyinaa ne ne nuanom mmea nyinaa ne wɔn a wonim no kan nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn, na wɔne no bedidii wɔ ne fi, na wogyam no, na wɔkyekyee ne werɛ, amane a Awurade ma no baa no so nyinaa ho, na wɔn mu biara maa no sika dwetɛbena biako ne sika kaa biako.

Hiob 42:12
Na Awurade hyiraa Hiob awiei sen ne mfiase, ma onyaa nguan mpem dunan ne       yoma mpemnsia ne anantwi mpamho apem ne mfurum abere apem. 

Hiob 42:13
Onyaa mmabarima baason ne mmabea baasa nso. 

Hiob 42:14
Ɔfrɛɛ nea odi kan no Yemaima, nea ɔto so abien no, ɔfrɛɛ no Kesia, na ɔfrɛɛ nea      ɔto so abiɛsa no nso Keren-Hapuk. 

Hiob 42:15
Na wɔanhu mmea a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ te sɛ Hiob mmabea no wɔ asase no nyinaa so,      na wɔn papa momaa wɔn agyapade wɔ wɔn nuabarimanom mu.

Hiob 42:16
Ɛno akyi no Hiob tenaa ase mfe ɔha aduanan, na ohuu ne mma ne ne mmanana      kosii awo ntoatoaso a ɛto so anan so. 

Hiob 42:17
Na Hiob wui, na wabɔ akora, na wadi nna amee.

Hiob 42:2
“Mahu sɛ wutumi ade nyinaa yɛ,

Hiob 42:3
 ‘Hena ne oyi a ɔdan afotu ani, a nimdeɛ nnim yi?’

Hiob 42:4
 ‘Tie ɛ, na menkasa.

Hiob 42:5
Wo ho asɛm kɛkɛ na metee,

Hiob 42:6
Ɛno nti na matwe asan no,

Hiob 42:7
Ɛbae sɛ, Awurade kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Hiob wiei no, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Elifas a ofi Teman no sɛ:

Hiob 42:8
Enti momfa anantwinini ason ne adwennini ason, na monkɔ m’akoa Hiob nkyɛn, na mommɔ ɔhyew afɔre mma mo ho; na m’akoa Hiob na ɔbɛbɔ mpae ama mo. Ɔno nkutoo na mɛhwɛ n’anim, na me ne mo anni mo nkwaseasɛm nti, efisɛ moanka me ho nokwasɛm te sɛ m’akoa Hiob.”

Hiob 42:9
Ɛnna Elifas a ofi Teman ne Bildad a ofi Suha ne Sofar a ofi Naama no siim kɔyɛe nea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no pɛpɛɛpɛ; na Awurade tiee Hiob mpaebɔ.

Hiob 5:1
“Frɛ hwɛ ɛ! Obi wɔ hɔ a obegye wo so anaa?

Hiob 5:10
  Nea ɔma osu tɔ asase so,

Hiob 5:11
 Ɔde ahobrɛasefo tena nea ɛkorɔn,

Hiob 5:12
  Ɔsɛe anitefo atirimpɔw,

Hiob 5:13
 Ɔkyere anyansafo wɔn anifere mu,

Hiob 5:14
  Wɔtɔ sum mu awia,

Hiob 5:15
 Na ogye ohiani fi nkrante a efi wɔn anomu no ano,

Hiob 5:16
  Na ɔbrɛfo nya anidaso,

Hiob 5:17
 Hwɛ, nhyira ne ɔdesani a Onyankopɔn ka n’anim,

Hiob 5:18
  Na ɔno na opira, na ɔkyekyere so,

Hiob 5:19
 Obeyi wo afi ahohia asia mu,

Hiob 5:2
  Na ahisɛm kum ogyimifo,

Hiob 5:20
 Ɔkɔm bere obegye wo afi owu mu,

Hiob 5:21
 Ɔbɛkora wo afi tɛkrɛma mpire ano,

Hiob 5:22
  Wobɛserew ɔsɛe ne ɔkɔm,

Hiob 5:23
Efisɛ wo ne wuram abo po bɛyɛ apam,

Hiob 5:24
  Na wubɛhu sɛ wo ntomadan si hɔ dwoodwoo,

Hiob 5:25
Wubehu sɛ wo mma bɛdɔɔso pii,

Hiob 5:26
 wode onyinkyɛ na ɛbɛkɔ ɔdamoa mu,

Hiob 5:27
Hwɛ! Eyi na yɛahwehwɛ ahu. Saa na ɛte.

Hiob 5:3
  Me de, mahu ogyimifo a ogyee ntini,

Hiob 5:4
  Ne mma ne nkwagye ntam twe,

Hiob 5:5
  Wɔn a wodi kɔm bedi ne nnɔbae,

Hiob 5:6
Efisɛ mmusu mfifi mfi mfutuma mu,

Hiob 5:7
 Nanso wɔwoo onipa maa ɔhaw

Hiob 5:8
 Na me a, anka mɛhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn akyi kwan,

Hiob 5:9
 Nea ɔyɛ adekɛse a enni nhwehwem,

Hiob 6:1
Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:

Hiob 6:10
Ɛno mpo anka menya awerɛkyekye ara,

Hiob 6:11
M’ahoɔden ne dɛn, sɛ mede bɛtɔ me bo ase atwɛn?

Hiob 6:12
M’ahoɔden te sɛ abo ahoɔden anaa?

Hiob 6:13
 Ɛnyɛ ɔboa bi na enni me mu,

Hiob 6:14
Nea ɔde adɔe kame ne yɔnko no,

Hiob 6:15
Me nuanom twa nkontompo sɛ awɔw bere mu asu a ɛsen,

Hiob 6:16
Nsukyenee nti ani fono,

Hiob 6:17
Sɛ ɔhyew ka no a, etwitwa;

Hiob 6:18
N’akwan kɔntɔnkɔntɔn fa baabi;

Hiob 6:19
 Tema akwantemfo asafo no hwɛe,

Hiob 6:2
“O, sɛ anka wɔrekari m’awerɛhow,

Hiob 6:20
 Wɔn ani wui sɛ wɔde wɔn ani too so,

Hiob 6:21
 Saa ara na mo nso, monyɛ hwee;

Hiob 6:22
Maka akyerɛ mo sɛ momma me biribi anaa?

Hiob 6:23
 Anaa maka akyerɛ mo sɛ munnye me mfi ɔtamfo nsam?

Hiob 6:24
 Monkyerɛkyerɛ me, na mɛyɛ komm,

Hiob 6:25
 Sɛnea asɛntrenee si yɛ den fa!

Hiob 6:26
Nsɛm ho animka na mudwen,

Hiob 6:27
 Ayisaa so mpo morebɔ ntonto,

Hiob 6:28
 Na afei mompɛ ani pa nhwɛ me,

Hiob 6:29
 Mesrɛ mo, mompɛ mu bio ɛ, na mummmu ntɛnkyew;

Hiob 6:3
 Ɛno de anka ɛbɛsen mpoano ahwea duru,

Hiob 6:30
 Nea ɛnteɛ bi wɔ me tɛkrɛma so,

Hiob 6:4
Ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ agyan tuatua me mu,

Hiob 6:5
Sɛ sare so afurum nya sare momono a, ɔteɛteɛm?

Hiob 6:6
 Wodi aduan hunu a nkyene nni mu?

Hiob 6:7
 Ade a me kra ampɛ sɛ ɛbɛka me no,

Hiob 6:8
 O, sɛ anka menya nea mibisa,

Hiob 6:9
Sɛ anka Onyankopɔn bɛpɛtɛw me,

Hiob 7:1
“Ɛnyɛ akodi na ɛwɔ hɔ ma ɔdesani asase so,

Hiob 7:10
Ɔrensan mma ne fie bio,

Hiob 7:11
Enti me nso merenka m’ano ntom.

Hiob 7:12
 Meyɛ ɛpo anaa asu mu bɔpɔn,

Hiob 7:13
Bere a mekae sɛ, ‘Me mpa bɛkyekye me werɛ,

Hiob 7:14
  Wode adaeso hunahunaa me,

Hiob 7:15
 Na ɛma me kra paw menewamsiw ne owu mmom

Hiob 7:16
  Afono me, merentena ase daa.

Hiob 7:17
Onipa desani ne hena a wubu no ɔkɛse,

Hiob 7:18
  Na wohwɛ no daa anɔpa,

Hiob 7:19
 Worenyi w’ani mfi me so de rekosi da bɛn?

Hiob 7:2
 Sɛ akoa pere hwehwɛ onwini ho,

Hiob 7:20
Sɛ mayɛ bɔne a, dɛn na mayɛ wo, nnipa hwɛfo,

Hiob 7:21
Dɛn nti na womfa me mmarato mfiri me,

Hiob 7:3
 Saa ara na wɔama madi asram hunu,

Hiob 7:4
Sɛ mekɔda a, meka sɛ, ‘Da bɛn na mɛsɔre na anadwo atwam akɔ?’

Hiob 7:5
  Me honam fura mmoawa ne dɔte abon;

Hiob 7:6
  Me nna yɛ hare sen ɔnwemfo akurokurowa,

Hiob 7:7
Kae sɛ me nkwa yɛ mframa;

Hiob 7:8
Nea n’aniwa hu me no, ɔrenhu me bio;

Hiob 7:9
 Sɛnea omununkum sa na ɛkɔ no,

Hiob 8:1
  Ɛnna Suhini Bildad gyee so sɛ:

Hiob 8:10
 So ɛnyɛ wɔn na wɔbɛkyerɛ wo na wɔaka akyerɛ wo anaa,

Hiob 8:11
  Nkyɛkyerɛ fifi nea ɔwora nni?

Hiob 8:12
  Ɛda so wɔ ne frɔmfrɔmyɛ mu a wɔntwae no,

Hiob 8:13
 Saa ara na wɔn a wɔn werɛ fi Onyankopɔn nyinaa akwan te,

Hiob 8:14
  efisɛ wotwa n’ahotoso fi hɔ,

Hiob 8:15
Obetweri ne dan, nanso ɛrennyina;

Hiob 8:16
  Ɔyɛ frɔmfrɔm owia ano,

Hiob 8:17
Ne ntini mantammantam abokuw ho,

Hiob 8:18
  Sɛ wɔsɛe no fi ne trabea a,

Hiob 8:19
  Hwɛ, sɛ ne kwan ho ahosɛpɛw te ne no,

Hiob 8:2
“Enkosi bere bɛn na wobɛka eyinom,

Hiob 8:20
  Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn mpo nea odi mu,

Hiob 8:21
  kosi sɛ ɔde ɔserew bɛhyɛ w’anom ma,

Hiob 8:22
Aniwu na wɔde befura wɔn a wɔtan wo,

Hiob 8:3
  So Onyankopɔn bɛkyea atemmu,

Hiob 8:4
  Sɛ wo mma ayɛ no bɔne a,

Hiob 8:5
 Sɛ wo ara wohwehwɛ Onyankopɔn akyi kwan,

Hiob 8:6
  sɛ wo ho tew na woteɛ a,

Hiob 8:7
 Na sɛ mpo wo mfiase yɛ ketewa a,

Hiob 8:8
  Mesrɛ wo, bisa awo ntoatoaso ɛ,

Hiob 8:9
 Na yɛn de, nnɛra nko ara na yefi bae,

Hiob 9:1
Ɛnna Hiob buae gyee so sɛ:

Hiob 9:10
Wɔyɛ nneɛma akɛse a enni nhwehwɛm,

Hiob 9:11
Hwɛ! Otwa me ho a minhu no,

Hiob 9:12
Hwɛ! Ohwim kɔ. Na hena na obetumi asiw no kwan?

Hiob 9:13
Onyankopɔn de, ɔrensianka n’abufuw;

Hiob 9:14
Mene hena a mebua no!

Hiob 9:15
Na m’asɛm yɛ dɛ de, nanso merenyi ano.

Hiob 9:16
  Sɛ mefrɛ na ogye me so a,

Hiob 9:17
Ɔno na ɔde ahum apirapira me

Hiob 9:18
  Ɔmma minnya ahomeye,

Hiob 9:19
  Sɛ wodi no ɔhoɔdenfo tumi so a, anka: Ɔnni!

Hiob 9:2
“Ampa ara minim sɛ saa na ɛte,

Hiob 9:20
  Sɛ meteɛ mpo a, anka m’ano bɛbu me fɔ,

Hiob 9:21
 Me de, midi mu de, nanso mimmu me ho;

Hiob 9:22
  Ne nyinaa yɛ ade biako; enti na mise:

Hiob 9:23
 Sɛ mpire kum mpofirim a,

Hiob 9:24
Wɔde asase ahyɛ ɔbɔnefo nsa;

Hiob 9:25
  Na me nna ho yɛ hare sene ommirikatuni;

Hiob 9:26
  Ɛsen kɔ sɛ demmire nkyɛkyerɛ hyɛn,

Hiob 9:27
 Sɛ mise: Me werɛ bɛfi m’apinisi,

Hiob 9:28
Me yaw nyinaa bɔ me hu;

Hiob 9:29
  Na sɛ wobɛbu me fɔ a,

Hiob 9:3
  Sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne no yiyi ano a,

Hiob 9:30
Sɛ mede sukyerɛmma nsu guare,

Hiob 9:31
 ɛno nso wode me bɛto amoa mu,

Hiob 9:32
Efisɛ ɔnyɛ onipa te sɛ me na me ne no ayiyi nsɛm ano,

Hiob 9:33
Nso ɔsentwamfo bi nni hɔ a obedi yɛn ntam asɛm,

Hiob 9:34
Ma onyi n’abaa mfi me so,

Hiob 9:35
Ɛnna anka mɛkasa a merensuro no,

Hiob 9:4
 Koma mu nyansafo ne tumi mu hoɔdenfo no,

Hiob 9:5
   Otutu mmepɔw mpatuw mu,

Hiob 9:6
  Ɔwosow asase fi n’atrae,

Hiob 9:7
  Ɔhyɛ owia, na ɛmpue;

Hiob 9:8
  Ɔno nko na ɔtrɛw ɔsoro mu,

Hiob 9:9
 Ɔyɛɛ Nsorommason, Nyɛntrɛnte ne Akokɔtan-ne-ne-mma

Nnwom 1:1
Nhyira ne onipa a ɔnnantew nnebɔneyɛfo agyina mu,

Nnwom 1:141
(Nnwom  – )

Nnwom 1:2
Na mmom n’ani gye Awurade mmara ho,

Nnwom 1:3
  Ɔte sɛ dua

Nnwom 1:4
  Na abɔnefo de, wɔnte sa,

Nnwom 1:5
 Enti abɔnefo rennyina atemmu mu,

Nnwom 1:6
Efisɛ Awurade nim treneefo kwan,

Nnwom 10:1
  O Awurade, dɛn nti na wugyina akyirikyiri?

Nnwom 10:10
  Ɔkotow, ɔdɛɛdɛɛ,

Nnwom 10:11
Ɔka ne komam sɛ: “Onyankopɔn werɛ afi.

Nnwom 10:12
O Awurade, sɔre ɛ. O Onyankopɔn, ma wo nsa so ɛ.

Nnwom 10:13
  Adɛn nti na ɔbɔnefo yi Onyankopɔn ahi

Nnwom 10:14
  Woahu, efisɛ wo na wohwɛ ɔhaw ne awerɛhow,

Nnwom 10:15
  Bubu abɔnefo basa,

Nnwom 10:16
Awurade yɛ hene kosi mmeresanten, kosi daa;

Nnwom 10:17
  O Awurade, wobɛtie nea ahobrɛasefo pɛ,

Nnwom 10:18
  sɛ wubedi ayisaa ne nea wɔhyɛ no soɔ no asɛm,

Nnwom 10:2
Ahantan nti nnebɔneyɛfo tiw mmɔborɔni denneennen;

Nnwom 10:3
 Na ɔbɔnefo hoahoa ne ho ade a ne kra kɔn dɔ ho,

Nnwom 10:4
  Ɔbɔnefo hwene dwa ahun ka sɛ: Hwee mfa ne ho.

Nnwom 10:5
N’akwan si no yiye daa nyinaa.

Nnwom 10:6
Ɔka ne komam sɛ: “Merenhim ara da; 

Nnwom 10:7
  Nnome, nkontomposɛm ne amimdi ahyɛ n’anom ma,

Nnwom 10:8
  Ɔtratra nkuraa hintabea,

Nnwom 10:9
  Obuw kokoam sɛ gyata a ɔwɔ ne tu mu,

Nnwom 100:1
 Asase so aman nyinaa, mommɔ ose mma Awurade.

Nnwom 100:2
Momfa anigye nsom Awurade.

Nnwom 100:3
Munhu sɛ Awurade ne Onyankopɔn.

Nnwom 100:4
 Momfa aseda nhyɛn n’aponkɛse mu,

Nnwom 100:5
Na Awurade ye,

Nnwom 101:1
 Mɛto adɔeɛ ne atemmuo ho dwom,

Nnwom 101:2
Mede nimdeɛ bɛfa pɛyɛ kwan so.

Nnwom 101:3
 Meremma ahuhusɛm

Nnwom 101:4
 Koma kɔntɔnkye mpare me,

Nnwom 101:5
Obiara a ɔsɛe ne yɔnko din kokoam no,

Nnwom 101:6
Asase so anokwafo na m’ani wɔ wɔn so,

Nnwom 101:7
Ɔdaadaafo biara rentena me fie.

Nnwom 101:8
Anɔpa biara mɛsɛe asase so abɔnefoɔ nyinaa,

Nnwom 102:1
 O Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ ɛ;

Nnwom 102:10
 Efi w’abufuw ne w’anibere nti,

Nnwom 102:11
 Me nna te sɛ sunsuma a ɛretwam,

Nnwom 102:12
 Na wo Awurade de, wowɔ hɔ daa daa,

Nnwom 102:13
Wobɛsɔre, abehu Sion mmɔbɔ,

Nnwom 102:14
Wo nkoa nya n’abo ho anigye,

Nnwom 102:15
 Enti amanaman besuro Awurade din,

Nnwom 102:16
 Sɛ Awurade akyekye Sion;

Nnwom 102:17
 Ɔbɛdan n’ani akyerɛ onnibie mpaebɔ,

Nnwom 102:18
 Wɔbɛtwerɛw eyi ama nkyirimma,

Nnwom 102:19
 Ɔbrɛ n’ani ase hwɛ fam fi ne soro kronkronbea hɔ,

Nnwom 102:2
Mfa w’anim nhintaw me m’ahohia da,

Nnwom 102:20
Sɛ obetie deduani apinisi,

Nnwom 102:21
na wɔabɔ Awurade din wɔ Sion,

Nnwom 102:22
 da a aman bɛbom aboaboa wɔn ho ano

Nnwom 102:23
 Wagow me tumi mu ɔkwan mu,

Nnwom 102:24
Mekae sɛ: “O me Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 102:25
Teteete na wotoo asase fapem,

Nnwom 102:26
 Ɛno de, ɛbɛsɛe, na wo de, wugyina hɔ daa.

Nnwom 102:27
Nanso wo de, wonsesa da, 

Nnwom 102:28
Wo nkoa mma bɛtena ase,

Nnwom 102:3
Na me nna ahi sɛ owusiw,

Nnwom 102:4
Me koma abotow na akisa sɛ fan,

Nnwom 102:5
 M’apinisi nne nti

Nnwom 102:6
 Mete sɛ sare so pokupoku,

Nnwom 102:7
 Misi pɛ, mete sɛ akasanoma

Nnwom 102:8
 Da adesae m’atamfo bɔ me ahohora,

Nnwom 102:9
Na madi nso sɛ paanoo;

Nnwom 103:1
 O me kra, hyira Awurade,

Nnwom 103:10
Onsusuw yɛn bɔne so ne yɛn nni,

Nnwom 103:11
 Na sɛnea ɔsoro ware sen asase no,

Nnwom 103:12
Sɛnea apuei ne atɔe ntam ware no,

Nnwom 103:13
 Sɛ agya yam hyehye no ne mma ho no,

Nnwom 103:14
 Na onim yɛn nipaban;

Nnwom 103:15
 Onipa dasani de, ne nna te sɛ sare,

Nnwom 103:16
 Sɛ mframa bɔ fa ne so a, na onni hɔ,

Nnwom 103:17
Nanso Awurade adɔe de, 

Nnwom 103:18
 ma wɔn a wodi n’apam so,

Nnwom 103:19
Awurade de n’agua asi soro,

Nnwom 103:2
O me kra, hyira Awurade,

Nnwom 103:20
 O Awurade, abɔfo, munhyira no,

Nnwom 103:21
Awurade asafodɔm nyinaa, munhyira no,

Nnwom 103:22
 Awurade nnwuma nyinaa, munhyira no,

Nnwom 103:3
Ɔno na ɔde wo mfomso nyinaa kyɛ wo,

Nnwom 103:4
Ɔno na ogye wo nkwa fi amoa mu,

Nnwom 103:5
Ɔno na ɔde adepa hyɛ  w’afono ma,

Nnwom 103:6
Awurade di asɛntrenee,

Nnwom 103:7
 Ɔde n’akwan kyerɛɛ Mose,

Nnwom 103:8
Awurade yɛ mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔdomfo,

Nnwom 103:9
 Ɔrenham nkosi daapem,

Nnwom 104:1
  O me kra, hyira Awurade.

Nnwom 104:10
 Oyi nsuaniwa, abon mu,

Nnwom 104:11
 Ɛma wuram mmoa nyinaa nom bi,

Nnwom 104:12
 Ɛso na wim nnomaa tetee,

Nnwom 104:13
 Ofi ne soro mpia mu gu mmepɔw so nsu,

Nnwom 104:14
 Ɔma wura fifi ma afieboa,

Nnwom 104:15
 Na nsa ama ɔdesani koma atɔ ne yam,

Nnwom 104:16
 Wɔma Awurade nnua nso mee,

Nnwom 104:17
Ɛhɔ na nnomaa yɛ wɔn mmerebuw;

Nnwom 104:18
Mmepɔw atenten yɛ abotan so mmirekyi tenabea;

Nnwom 104:19
Ɔhyɛ ɔsram sɛ ɛnkyerɛ bere mu nsakrae;

Nnwom 104:2
 Wufura hann sɛ ntama,

Nnwom 104:20
 Woma sum duru, na ade sa,

Nnwom 104:21
Gyataforo bobom pɛ hanam

Nnwom 104:22
Sɛ owia pue a, wɔtwe wɔn ho,

Nnwom 104:23
Onipa fi adi kɔ n’adwuma

Nnwom 104:24
O Awurade, wo nnwuma dɔɔso dɛn ara!

Nnwom 104:25
Ɛpo kɛse a ɛtrɛw kakraa yi,

Nnwom 104:26
Ɛso na ahyɛn kɔ;

Nnwom 104:27
 Wɔn nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan

Nnwom 104:28
Nea wode ma wɔn na wɔtase.

Nnwom 104:29
Sɛ wode w’anim hintaw a, wɔyɛ basaa;

Nnwom 104:3
 ɔde ne mpia sɛm nsu so,

Nnwom 104:30
Sɛ wosoma wo honhom kɔ a, wode bɔ wɔn,

Nnwom 104:31
 ma Awurade anuonyam ntena hɔ daa,

Nnwom 104:32
Ɔno na ɔhwɛ asase na ɛwosow,

Nnwom 104:33
 Mete ase yi, mɛto dwom ama Awurade,

Nnwom 104:34
 Ɔmma m'adwene yi nyɛ no fɛ,

Nnwom 104:35
  Ma nnebɔneyɛfo nsa asase so,

Nnwom 104:4
 Ɔde mframa yɛ n’abɔfo,

Nnwom 104:5
  Ɔde asase atim ne nnyinaso so,

Nnwom 104:6
 Wode ebun kataa so sɛ ntama,

Nnwom 104:7
W’animka nti eguanguanee,

Nnwom 104:8
 mmepɔw momaa wɔn ho so, ɛsen kɔɔ abon mu,

Nnwom 104:9
 Woatwa hye sɛ ɛnntra,

Nnwom 105:1
  Monna Awurade ase, mommɔ ne din,

Nnwom 105:10
 na ɔde sii hɔ maa Yakob sɛ ahyɛde,

Nnwom 105:11
 sɛ: Wo na mede Kanaan asase mɛma wo

Nnwom 105:12
Saa bere no na wɔnnɔɔso,

Nnwom 105:13
 Na wɔnenam fi ɔman mu kɔ ɔman mu,

Nnwom 105:14
Wamma onipa biara ansisi wɔn,

Nnwom 105:15
 sɛ: “Mommfa mo nsa nnka me nkurɔfo a masra wɔn no,

Nnwom 105:16
 Na ɔmaa ɔkɔm baa asase no so;

Nnwom 105:17
Ɔsomaa ɔbarima bi dii wɔn anim,

Nnwom 105:18
 Wɔde mpokyerɛ miaa ne nan,

Nnwom 105:19
 kosii bere a n’asɛm baa mu,

Nnwom 105:2
Monto dwom mma no, monto ayeyi dwom mma no,

Nnwom 105:20
Ɔhene no soma ma wokoyii no,

Nnwom 105:21
Ɔde no sii ne fie so panyin,

Nnwom 105:22
Sɛ ɔnkyekyere ɔhene asafohene sɛnea ne kra pɛ,

Nnwom 105:23
Ɛnna Israel nso baa Egypt,

Nnwom 105:24
Onyankopɔn maa ne man ase trɛwee,

Nnwom 105:25
Ɔdan wɔn koma ma wɔtan ne man,

Nnwom 105:26
 Ɔsomaa n’akoa Mose; ne Aaron

Nnwom 105:27
Wɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnne wɔ wɔn mu,

Nnwom 105:28
Ɔsomaa sum maa no durui sum,

Nnwom 105:29
Ɔdanee wɔn nsu mogya,

Nnwom 105:3
Momfa ne din kronkron no nhoahoa mo ho.

Nnwom 105:30
Wɔn asase dɔɔ mponkyerɛn manyamanya,

Nnwom 105:31
 Ɔkasae, na anwansena borebore bae,

Nnwom 105:32
Ɔde amparuwbo yɛɛ osu tɔ guu wɔn so,

Nnwom 105:33
Ɛnna ɔbobɔɔ wɔn bobe ne wɔn borɔdɔma nnua,

Nnwom 105:34
 Ɔkasae, na ntuntummɛ bae

Nnwom 105:35
 na wɔbɛwee wɔn asase no so nhaban nyinaa;

Nnwom 105:36
Ɛnna ɔbobɔɔ wɔn asase so mmakan nyinaa,

Nnwom 105:37
Oyii wɔn fii hɔ de dwetɛ ne sika kaa wɔn ho kɔe;

Nnwom 105:38
Wofii hɔ no, Egyptfo dii ahurusi,

Nnwom 105:39
Ɔtrɛw omununkum mu yɛɛ nkataso,

Nnwom 105:4
Monhwehwɛ Awurade ne n’ahoɔden.

Nnwom 105:40
Wobisae, na ɔmaa wɔn nkokɔhwerew,

Nnwom 105:41
Ɔpaee ɔbotan mu ma nsu fii mu bae;

Nnwom 105:42
 Na ɔkaee n’asɛm kronkron no,

Nnwom 105:43
Enti oyii ne man maa wɔde abotɔyam fii adi,

Nnwom 105:44
Nkakrankakra, ɔde amanaman no nsase maa wɔn,

Nnwom 105:45
Na ama wɔadi n’ahyɛde ne ne mmara so.

Nnwom 105:5
Monkae n’anwanwade a wayɛ,

Nnwom 105:6
O n’akoa Abraham asefo,

Nnwom 105:7
Ɔno ne Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn;

Nnwom 105:8
 Ɔkae n’apam no de kosi daa,

Nnwom 105:9
 apam a ɔne Abraham pamee no,

Nnwom 106:1
 Munyi Yah ayɛ!

Nnwom 106:10
Ogyee wɔn fii wɔn a wokyi wɔn no nsam,

Nnwom 106:11
Nsu no twiw faa wɔn atamfo no so;

Nnwom 106:12
Ɛnna wogyee ne nsɛm dii,

Nnwom 106:13
Nanso ankyɛ na wɔn werɛ fii ne nnwuma;

Nnwom 106:14
 Na wɔn kɔn dɔe ntraso sare so,

Nnwom 106:15
Ɛnna ɔde wɔn abisade maa wɔn,

Nnwom 106:16
 Na wɔn ani beree Mose wɔ nsraban no mu,

Nnwom 106:17
Ɛno nti asase buee n’anom menee Datan,

Nnwom 106:18
Ogya bɛhyew wɔn asafo no;

Nnwom 106:19
Bio nso wɔyɛɛ nantwi ba wɔ Horeb,

Nnwom 106:2
Hena na obetumi aka Awurade nnwuma akɛse ho asɛm,

Nnwom 106:20
 Na wɔsesaa wɔn anuonyam

Nnwom 106:21
Wɔn werɛ fii Onyankopɔn, wɔn Gyefo no,

Nnwom 106:22
Nea ɔyɛɛ anwonwade wɔ Ham asase so,

Nnwom 106:23
  Na ose anka ɔbɛsɛe wɔn,

Nnwom 106:24
Wɔtoo asase fɛɛfɛ no ho mpe,

Nnwom 106:25
Wonwiinwii wɔ wɔn ntamadan mu,

na wabɔ wɔn asefo agu amanaman mu,

 na wɔde wɔn nneyɛe yii no ahii,

Nnwom 106:3
 Nhyira ne wɔn a wokura atemmu mu,

Nnwom 106:30
 Na Pinehas sɔre gyina patae,

Nnwom 106:31
 Na wobuu eyi trenee maa no

Nnwom 106:32

 Wɔankunkum aman

Nnwom 106:35

Nnwom 106:37

Nnwom 106:39
Wɔde wɔn nnwuma guu wɔn ho fi,

Nnwom 106:4
O Awurade, kae me sɛnea wodom wo man no,

Nnwom 106:40
Ɛnna Awurade abufuw dɛw tiaa ne man,

Nnwom 106:41
Enti ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ amanaman no nsa,

Nnwom 106:42
Wɔn atamfo no hyɛɛ wɔn so,

Nnwom 106:43
Mpɛn pii na ogyee wɔn,

Nnwom 106:44

 Wɔn nti, ɔkaee apam a ɔyɛe no,

Nnwom 106:46
 Na ɔmaa wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn nnommum nyinaa

Nnwom 107:1
 Monna Awurade ase, na oye,

Nnwom 107:10
 Wɔn a wɔtraa sum ne sum kabii mu,

(Nnwom  – )

Nnwom 107:11
Efisɛ wɔtew Onyankopɔn nsɛm ho atua;

Nnwom 107:12
Enti ɔde ɔhaw brɛɛ wɔn koma ase;

Nnwom 107:13
Na wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔn ahohia mu;

Nnwom 107:14
Oyii wɔn fii esum ne esum kabii mu;

Nnwom 107:15
 O Wɔnkamfo Awurade, n’adɔe ho,

Nnwom 107:16
 Sɛ wabubu kɔbere apon,

Nnwom 107:17
  Agyimifo, wɔn mmarato kwan

Nnwom 107:18
Wɔn kra kyii aduan biara,

Nnwom 107:19
 Na wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔn ahohia mu,

Nnwom 107:2
Ma wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn nka saa,

Nnwom 107:20
Ɔmaa n’asɛm bɛsaa wɔn yare,

Nnwom 107:21
 O Wɔnkamfo Awurade, n’adɔe ho,

Nnwom 107:22
 Na wɔmmɔ aseda afɔre,

Nnwom 107:23
Wɔn a wɔde ahyɛn kɔ po so,

Nnwom 107:24
wɔn na wɔahu Awurade nnwuma,

Nnwom 107:25
 na ɔka ma ahum kɛse tu,

Nnwom 107:26
Wɔkɔ sorosoro,

Nnwom 107:27
Wɔtɔ ntintan te sɛ ɔsabofo,

Ɔma ahum no yɛ komm,

Nnwom 107:3
na waboaboa wɔn ano afi nsase no so,

Nnwom 107:30

 O Wɔnkamfo Awurade, n’adɔe ho,

 Na wɔmma no so ɔman ahyiae mu,

Nnwom 107:33
 Ɔma nsubɔnten dane sare,

Nnwom 107:34
Ɔma asase pa dan tɛpa,

Nnwom 107:35
Ɔma sare so dan ɔtare,

Nnwom 107:36
Ɛhɔ na ɔma wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn tena,

Nnwom 107:37
Wɔyɛ mfuw, na wɔyeyɛ bobe nturo,

Nnwom 107:38
Ohyira wɔn ma wɔyɛ bebree;

Nnwom 107:39
Nanso nhyɛso ne ɔhaw ne awerɛhow nti,

Wokyinkyinii sare so,

Nnwom 107:40

Nnwom 109:1

 O Nhyira ne wo, Awurade,

 Wo ho hu ma me honam popo,

Nnwom 119:121
 Mayɛ atemmude ne treneede,

Nnwom 119:122
 Di agyinam pa ma w’akoa,

Nnwom 119:123
 M’ani ayɛ samoo repɛ wo nkwagye

Nnwom 119:124
Wo ne w’akoa nni no sɛ w’adɔe te,

Nnwom 119:125
Meyɛ w’akoa, ma minnya ntease,

Nnwom 119:126

Nnwom 119:127
Enti na medɔ wo mmara nsɛm

Mede m’ano aka

Nnwom 119:131

Ma w’anim nharan w’akoa so,

 Asuten sen fi m’aniwa mu gu,

W’ahyɛde ho na medwinnwen,

Nnwom 119:150
 Wɔn a wodi mmusu akyi twiw bɛn,

Nnwom 119:151
O Awurade, wobɛn,

Nnwom 119:152
Mihuu w’adansesɛm akyɛ,

Nnwom 119:153
 Hwɛ m’amanehunu, na yi me,

Nnwom 119:154
Di m’asɛm ma me na gye me;

Nnwom 119:155
Abɔnefo ne nkwagye ntam ware,

Nnwom 119:156
 Wo mmɔborohunu dɔɔso, O Awurade,

Nnwom 119:157
M’ataafo ne m’atamfo dɔɔso,

Nnwom 119:158
 Mihu akyipafo nkontompofo a,

Nnwom 119:159
O hwɛ sɛnea medɔ w’ahyɛde.

Nnwom 119:16
 W’ahyɛde ho na me ho sɛpɛw me,

Nnwom 119:160
W’asɛm ntoano yɛ nokware,

Nnwom 119:161
Adehye taa me kwa,

Nnwom 119:162
W’asɛm na midi ho ahurusi

Nnwom 119:163
Nkontompo de, mikyi, na ɛyɛ me tan,

Nnwom 119:164
Miyi wo ayɛ mpɛn ason da koro,

Nnwom 119:165
Asomdwoe pii wɔ hɔ ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo mmara,

Nnwom 119:166
Mehwɛ wo nkwagye kwan, O Awurade,

Nnwom 119:167
 Me kra di w’adansesɛm so,

Nnwom 119:168
 Midi w’ahyɛde ne w’adansesɛm so;

Nnwom 119:169
O Awurade, ma me sufrɛ nnu w’anim,

Nnwom 119:17
 Yɛ w’akoa yiye, na minnya nkwa,

Nnwom 119:170
Ma me nkotɔsrɛ nnu w’anim,

Nnwom 119:171
M’ano bɛworo w’ayeyi,

Nnwom 119:172
Me tɛkrɛma bɛka w’asɛm,

Nnwom 119:173
Ma wo nsa mmɛboa me,

Nnwom 119:174
 M’ani agyina wo nkwagye, O Awurade,

Nnwom 119:175
Ma me kra ntra ase nyi wo ayɛ,

Nnwom 119:176
Mafom kwan sɛ oguan a wayera. 

Nnwom 119:18
Bue m’aniwa, na menhwɛ

Nnwom 119:19
Meyɛ ɔhɔho asase so,

Nnwom 119:2
 Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔhwɛ n’adansesɛm so,

Nnwom 119:20
 Me kra posaw daa nyinaa,

Nnwom 119:21
 Woateɛteɛ ahantanfo a wɔadome wɔn

Nnwom 119:22
 Yi ahohora ne aniwuo fi me so,

Nnwom 119:23
Adehye nso tra ase keka me ho nsɛm a,

Nnwom 119:24
 W’adansesɛm yɛ m’adɔde,

Nnwom 119:25
 Me kra aka fam,

Nnwom 119:26
Maka m’akwan akyerɛ wo na woagye me so,

Nnwom 119:27
Ma mente w’ahyɛde akwan ase,

Nnwom 119:28
Awerɛhow ama me kra anan,

Nnwom 119:29
Yi atoro kwan fi me ho,

Nnwom 119:3
 nso wɔnyɛ amumɔyɛde,

Nnwom 119:30
 Mafa nokwaredi kwan,

Nnwom 119:31
Matim w’adansesɛm mu,

Nnwom 119:32
Wo mmara nsɛm kwan so na metu mmirika,

Nnwom 119:33
O Awurade, kyerɛkyerɛ me w’ahyɛde kwan,

Nnwom 119:34
 Ma minhu mu, na madi wo mmara so,

Nnwom 119:35
Ma mennantew wo mmara nsɛm kwan so,

Nnwom 119:36
 Kom me koma kɔ w’adansesɛm so,

Nnwom 119:37
Mma m’aniwa nnhwɛ ahuhude;

Nnwom 119:38
 Hyɛ w’asɛm mu den ma w’akoa

Nnwom 119:39
Ma m’ahohora a ɛyɛ me hu ntwa me ho nkɔ,

Nnwom 119:4
Wo na woahyɛ yɛn sɛ

Nnwom 119:40
Hwɛ! M’ani agyina w’ahyɛde,

Nnwom 119:41
O Awurade, ma w’adɔe mmra me so,

Nnwom 119:42
Na manya asɛm bi abua nea ɔbɔ me ahohora no,

Nnwom 119:43
Nyi nokwasɛm no mfi m’anom koraa,

Nnwom 119:44
Medi wo mmara so daa,

Nnwom 119:45
na mɛnante tɛtrɛtɛ mu,

Nnwom 119:46
 Na mɛka w’adanse ho asɛm ahene anim,

Nnwom 119:47
  Na me ho bɛsɛpɛw me wo mmara nsɛm ho,

Nnwom 119:48
 na mɛma me nsa so wo mmara nsɛm a medɔ no ho,

Nnwom 119:49
Kae asɛm a woka kyerɛɛ w’akoa no;

Nnwom 119:5
O sɛ anka wɔteɛteɛ m’akwan

Nnwom 119:50
 Eyi ne m’awerɛkyekye, m’amanehunu mu,

Nnwom 119:51
Ahantanfo de me ayɛ fɛdie pii,

Nnwom 119:52
O Awurade, mekae w’atemmu a ɛfiri teteete no,

Nnwom 119:53
Abufuhyew ahyɛ me so,

Nnwom 119:54
 W’ahyɛde adan me nnwom,

Nnwom 119:55
O Awurade, mekae wo din anadwo,

Nnwom 119:56
 Eyi ayɛ me ade,

Nnwom 119:57
O Awurade, wo ne me kyɛfa,

Nnwom 119:58
 Mede me koma nyinaa masrɛ wo:

Nnwom 119:59
 Meda midwen m’akwan ho,

Nnwom 119:6
 Sɛ mehwɛ wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa a,

Nnwom 119:60
Meyɛɛ ntɛm, na mantwentwɛn me nan ase

Nnwom 119:61
 Abɔnefo nhama abobare me ho,

Nnwom 119:62
Mesɔre ɔdasum ada wo ase

Nnwom 119:63
Meyɛ wɔn a wosuro wo nyinaa adamfo,

Nnwom 119:64
O Awurade, w’adɔe ahyɛ asase so ma,

Nnwom 119:65
Wo ne w’akoa adi no yiye,

Nnwom 119:66
 Kyerɛkyerɛ me nhumu pa ne nimdeɛ,

Nnwom 119:67
 Wonnya mmrɛɛ me ase no, mefomee,

Nnwom 119:69
Ahantanfo atoatoa atorɔ ato me so,

Nnwom 119:7
Sɛ misua w’atemmusɛm a ɛteɛ a,

Nnwom 119:70
Wɔn koma apirim sɛ srade,

Nnwom 119:71
 Eye ma me sɛ wobrɛɛ me aseɛ,

Nnwom 119:72
W’anom mmara ye ma me,

Nnwom 119:73
Wo nsa na ɛyɛɛ me na esiesiee me kama,

Nnwom 119:74
Wɔn a wosuro wo behu me na wɔn ani agye,

Nnwom 119:75
O Awurade, minim sɛ w’atemmusɛm teɛ,

Nnwom 119:76
Mesrɛ wo, Ma w’adɔe nyɛ me awerɛkyekye,

Nnwom 119:77
 Ma wo mmɔborɔhunu mmra me so na minnya nkwa,

Nnwom 119:78
 Ma ahantanfo ani nwu

Nnwom 119:79
Ma wɔn a wosuro wo no nnan mmra me nkyɛn,

Nnwom 119:8
Medi w’ahyɛde so,

Nnwom 119:80
 Ma me koma nyɛ pɛ w’ahyɛde mu,

Nnwom 119:81
Me kra tɔ wo nkwagye ho piti,

Nnwom 119:82
 W’asɛm nti m’ani ayɛ siamoo.

Nnwom 119:83
Mayɛ sɛ nsa kotoku a ɛsɛn wusiw mu,

Nnwom 119:84
W’akoa nna si ahe?

Nnwom 119:85
 Ahantanfo atutu amoa ama me,

Nnwom 119:86
Wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokware.

Nnwom 119:87
Ɛkaa kakraa bi sɛ anka wɔretɔre m’ase afi asase so;

Nnwom 119:88
 W’adɔe nti ma minnya nkwa,

Nnwom 119:89
O Awurade, w’asɛm wɔ hɔ daa, etim ɔsoro.

Nnwom 119:9
Ɛdeɛn na aberante de bɛtew ne kwan ho?

Nnwom 119:90
Wo nokwaredi wɔ hɔ ma awo ntoatoaso nyinaa;

Nnwom 119:91
 Egyina hɔ nnɛ sɛnea w’atemmu te,

Nnwom 119:92
 Sɛ wo mmara anyɛ m’adɔde a,

Nnwom 119:93
Me werɛ remfi w’ahyɛde da biara da,

Nnwom 119:94
Meyɛ wo dea, gye me nkwa,

Nnwom 119:95
Abɔnefo tetɛw me sɛ wobenya me asɛe me.

Nnwom 119:96
 Mahu pɛyɛ nyinaa awiee,

Nnwom 119:97
 O Medɔ wo mmara dɛn ara!

Nnwom 119:98
Wo mmara nsɛm ayɛ me onyansafo asen m’atamfo,

Nnwom 119:99
 Mewɔ nimdeɛ sen m’akyerɛkyerɛfo nyinaa, 

Nnwom 12:1
  O Awurade,  boa, na ahotefo rewie sa,

Nnwom 12:2
  Wɔne wɔn mfɛfo keka nsɛnhunu,

Nnwom 12:3
Awurade betwa ano ano dɛfɛdɛfɛ nyinaa afi hɔ,

Nnwom 12:4
  wɔn a wose: Yɛn tɛkrɛma na yɛde di abaninsɛm,

Nnwom 12:5
“ Abrɛfo so hyɛ ne ahiafo apinisi nti mɛsɔre afei,

Nnwom 12:6
Awurade nsɛm yɛ nsɛm nsɛm kronkron,

Nnwom 12:7
O Awurade, wobɛhwɛ wɔn so,

Nnwom 12:8
Abɔnefo abu so nenam baabiara,

Nnwom 120:1
 Awurade na m’ahohia mu misu mefrɛɛ no, 

Nnwom 120:2
O Awurade, yi me kra fi atoro ano,

Nnwom 120:3
Dɛn na ɔmfa mma wo,

Nnwom 120:4
Ɔdɔmmarima agyan a ano hwirenhwiren

Nnwom 120:5
Minnue sɛ mabɛyɛ ɔhɔho wɔ Mesek,

Nnwom 120:6
 Me kra ne wɔn a wɔtan asomdwoe

Nnwom 120:7
Me de, mepɛ asomdwoe; 

Nnwom 121:1
 Mɛma m’ani so makyerɛ mmepɔw no,

Nnwom 121:2
Me mmoa fi Awurade,

Nnwom 121:3
 Ɔremma wo nan nwatiriw,

Nnwom 121:4
Hwɛ! Nea ɔhwɛ Israel no,

Nnwom 121:5
Awurade  ne wo hwɛfo,

Nnwom 121:6
 Owia renhye wo awia,

Nnwom 121:7
Awurade bɛhwɛ wo so bɔne nyinaa ho,

Nnwom 121:8
Awurade bɛhwɛ

Nnwom 122:1
 M’ani gyei sɛ wosee me sɛ:

Nnwom 122:2
 Yɛn nan begyinaa

Nnwom 122:3
Wɔakyekye Yerusalem sɛ kurow a

Nnwom 122:4
Ɛhɔ na mmusuakuw no foro kɔ,

Nnwom 122:5
Ɛhɔ na atemmu nhengua sisi,

Nnwom 122:6
 Monsrɛ ma Yerusalem asomdwoe,

Nnwom 122:7
Asomdwoe ntra w’afasu mu,

Nnwom 122:8
 Me nuanom ne me mfɛfo nti

Nnwom 122:9
Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn fie nti,

Nnwom 123:1
 Wo na mema m’ani so mehwɛ wo,

Nnwom 123:2
 Hwɛ, sɛnea nkoa

Nnwom 123:3
Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, O Awurade, na dom yɛn,

Nnwom 123:4
 Taamudifo fɛwdi

Nnwom 124:1
 “Sɛ ɛnyɛ Awurade na ɔwɔ yɛn afa a,

Nnwom 124:2
“Sɛ ɛnyɛ Awurade na ɔwɔ yɛn afa,

Nnwom 124:3
Anka wɔmemmene yɛn animono,

Nnwom 124:4
 Anka nsu amene yɛn,

Nnwom 124:5
Anka ahantan nsu

Nnwom 124:6
Nhyira nka Awurade a wamfa yɛn anyɛ

Nnwom 124:7
Yɛn kra aguan sɛ anomaa

Nnwom 124:8
 Yɛn boa wɔ Awurade

Nnwom 125:1
 Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to Awurade so no

Nnwom 125:2
Sɛnea mmepɔw atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia no,

Nnwom 125:3
 Na bɔne ahempoma rentra

Nnwom 125:4
O Awurade, yɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ no yiye,

Nnwom 125:5
Wɔn a wɔman kɔ wɔn akɔntɔnkyesɛm so no,

Nnwom 126:1
 Bere a Awurade de Sion fi nnommum sane bae no,

Nnwom 126:2
 Ɛno na ɔserew hyɛɛ yɛn anom ma,

Nnwom 126:3
Awurade ayɛ ade kɛse ama yɛn

Nnwom 126:4
O Awurade, fa yɛn fi nnommum san bra

Nnwom 126:5
 Wɔn a wɔde nusu gu

Nnwom 126:6
 Ɔde nusu nennam

Nnwom 127:1
 Sɛ Awurade ansi ansi dan no a,

Nnwom 127:2
 Sɛ mosɔre anɔpahema kosi anadwo, di ɔbrɛ aduan a, ɛyɛ ɔkwa.

Nnwom 127:3
Hwɛ! Mma yɛ agyapade a efi Awurade hɔ.

Nnwom 127:4
 Sɛ ɔbran nsam bɛmma te no,

Nnwom 127:5
 Nhyira ne ɔbarima a

Nnwom 128:1
 Nhyira ne obiara a osuro Awurade,

Nnwom 128:2
Na wubedi wo nsa ano adwuma,

Nnwom 128:3
Wo yere bɛyɛ sɛ bobe a ɛsow aba

Nnwom 128:4
 Hwɛ, sɛ wohyira onipa a osuro Awurade ni.

Nnwom 128:5
Awurade mfi Sion nhyira wo,

Nnwom 128:6
 Yiw, na hu wo mma mma.

Nnwom 129:1
  Wɔahiahia me ho pii fi me mmɔfraase,

Nnwom 129:2
 Wɔahiahia me ho pii fi me mmɔfraase,

Nnwom 129:3
 Fɛntɛmfo afɛntɛm m’akyi,

Nnwom 129:4
 Awurade teɛ,

Nnwom 129:5
 Ma wɔn ani nwu

Nnwom 129:6
 Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ adan atifi wura

Nnwom 129:7
 ɛnhyɛ otwitwafo nsa,

Nnwom 129:8
Na wɔn a wotwam mpo nka sɛ:

Nnwom 13:1
  O Awurade, wo werɛ befi me daa akosi da bɛn?

Nnwom 13:2
  Minni me kra mu dadwen,

Nnwom 13:3
  Hwɛ na gye me so, O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 13:4
  na me tamfo anka sɛ: Matumi no,

Nnwom 13:5
  Na me de, m’ani da w’adɔe so,

Nnwom 13:6
Mɛto dwom ama Awurade efisɛ ɔne me adi no yiye.

Nnwom 130:1
  O Awurade, mifiri abun

Nnwom 130:2
 Awurade, tie me nne.

Nnwom 130:3
 Awurade, sɛ wudi amumɔyɛde akyi a,

Nnwom 130:4
Wo na fafiri wɔ wo nsam

Nnwom 130:5
 Mehwɛ Awurade kwan,

Nnwom 130:6
Me kra twɛn Awurade

Nnwom 130:7
O Israel, ma w’ani nna Awurade so,

Nnwom 130:8
Ɔno na obegye Israel afi n’amumɔyɛ nyinaa mu.

Nnwom 131:1
 Awurade, me koma nyɛ kwasiare,

Nnwom 131:2
 Ampa, madwudwo me kra ama no ayɛ komm,

Nnwom 131:3
 O Israel, ma w’ani nna Awurade so

Nnwom 132:1
  Awurade, kae Dawid

Nnwom 132:10
 Esiane w’akoa Dawid nti,

Nnwom 132:11
Awurade aka Dawid ntam nokwarem a ɔnnan ani:

Nnwom 132:12
 Sɛ wo mma di m’apam

Nnwom 132:13
 Na Awurade apaw Sion,

Nnwom 132:14
 Eyi ne me homebea daapem,

Nnwom 132:15
 Mede nhyira bɛhyira n’adidide,

Nnwom 132:16
 Na mede nkwagye mɛhyɛ n’asɔfo,

Nnwom 132:17
Ɛhɔ na mɛma Dawid abɛn afifi,

Nnwom 132:18
Mɛhyɛ n’atamfo aniwu,

Nnwom 132:2
Sɛnea ɔkaa Awurade ntam;

Nnwom 132:3
“Merenkɔ me fie ntamadan mu.

Nnwom 132:4
 meremma m'aniwa nna,

Nnwom 132:5
Kosi sɛ menya baabi ama Awurade,

Nnwom 132:6
 Hwɛ, yɛkɔtee wɔ Efrata,

Nnwom 132:7
 Momma yɛnkɔ ne trabea,

Nnwom 132:8
O Awurade, sɔre kɔ wo homebea ɛ,

Nnwom 132:9
Ma w’asɔfo nhyɛ trenee,

Nnwom 133:1
 Hwɛ! Oye a eye ne ne fɛ a ɛyɛ

Nnwom 133:2
 Ɛte sɛ mpampam ngo pa

Nnwom 133:3
Ɛte sɛ Hermon obosu a

Nnwom 134:1
 Hwɛ, mo Awurade nkoa

Nnwom 134:2
 Mommoma mo nsa so kronkronbea no mu,

Nnwom 134:3
Awurade a ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase no

Nnwom 135:1
 Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

Nnwom 135:10
Ɔno na ɔbobɔɔ aman bebree

Nnwom 135:11
 Amorifo hene Sihon,

Nnwom 135:12
 na ɔde wɔn asase mae sɛ agyapade,

Nnwom 135:13
O Awurade, wo din wɔ hɔ kosi daa.

Nnwom 135:14
Na Awurade bebu ne man atɛn,

Nnwom 135:15
Amanaman no ahoni yɛ dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ,

Nnwom 135:16
Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wɔnkasa;

Nnwom 135:17
Wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte hwee,

Nnwom 135:18
Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn no bɛyɛ sɛ wɔn ara,

Nnwom 135:19
O Israel fie, munhyira Awurade.

Nnwom 135:2
Mo a mugyina Awurade fie,

Nnwom 135:20
O Lewi fie, munhyira Awurade.

Nnwom 135:21
Nhyira nka Awurade wɔ Sion;

Nnwom 135:3
Munyi Awurade ayɛ, na Awurade ye,

Nnwom 135:4
 Na Awurade apaw Yakob afa,

Nnwom 135:5
Me de, minim sɛ Awurade so,

Nnwom 135:6
Nea ɛsɔ Awurade ani biara wɔyɛ,

Nnwom 135:7
 Ɔma amununkum fi asase ano ba,

Nnwom 135:8
Ɔno na okunkum Egypt mmakan,

Nnwom 135:9
Ɔsomaa nsɛnkyerɛnne ne anwonwade baa wo mu, O Egypt;

Nnwom 136:1
 O Monna Awurade ase, na oye:

Nnwom 136:10
 Nea ɔbobɔɔ Egypt wɔn mmakan mu,

Nnwom 136:11
Na oyii Israel fii wɔn mu no,

Nnwom 136:12
Ɔde nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a wateɛ mu na eyii wɔn:

Nnwom 136:13
Aseda nka nea ɔpaee Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu baanu no:

Nnwom 136:14
Nea ɔmaa Israel faa mfinimfini no:

Nnwom 136:15
Nea ɔkaa Farao ne n’asraafodɔm guu Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu no:

Nnwom 136:16
 Nea ogyaa ne man faa sare so no:

Nnwom 136:17
 Nea ɔbobɔɔ ahene akɛse no:

Nnwom 136:18
Na okunkum ahene anuonyamfo no:

Nnwom 136:19
Okum Amorifo hene Sihon:

Nnwom 136:2
 O Monna anyame mu Nyankopɔn no ase:

Nnwom 136:20
Ɛne Basan hene Og:

Nnwom 136:21
Na ɔde wɔn asase mae sɛ agyapade no:

Nnwom 136:22
Ɔde yɛɛ n’akoa Israel agyapade:

Nnwom 136:23
Nea ɔkaee yɛn wɔ yɛn ahobrɛase mu no:

Nnwom 136:24
Na ogyee yɛn fii yɛn atamfo nsam no:

Nnwom 136:25
Nea ɔma ɔhonam nyinaa aduan no:

Nnwom 136:26
Monna ɔsoro Nyankopɔn ase:

Nnwom 136:3
 O Monna awuranom mu Awurade no ase:

Nnwom 136:4
 Nea ne nko ara yɛ anwanwade akɛse no,

Nnwom 136:5
 Nea ɔde nyansa yɛɛ ɔsoro no:

Nnwom 136:6
Nea ɔde asase trɛw nsu so no,

Nnwom 136:7
 Nea ɔyɛɛ akanea akɛse no:

Nnwom 136:8
Owia sɛ enni adekyee so

Nnwom 136:9
Ɔsram ne nsoromma, sɛ enni anadwo so,

Nnwom 137:1
  Babilon nsubɔnten ho,

Nnwom 137:2
Ɛhɔ nsuano nnua so na

Nnwom 137:3
Ɛhɔ na wɔn a wɔafa yɛn nnommum no bisaa yɛn dwom bi,

Nnwom 137:4
Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ato Awurade dwom

Nnwom 137:5
O Yerusalem, sɛ me werɛ fi wo a,

Nnwom 137:6
Sɛ mankae wo a,

Nnwom 137:7
O Awurade, kae Edom mma, Yerusalem sɛe da no nti;

Nnwom 137:8
O Babilon babea a wɔrebɛyɛ wo pasaa no,

Nnwom 137:9
 Nhyira ne nea osɔ wo mma mu

Nnwom 138:1
 Mede me koma nyinaa mɛda wo ase,

Nnwom 138:2
 Mɛkotow makyerɛ w’asɔrefi kronkron no, na mada wo din ase,

Nnwom 138:3
 Da a mesu mefrɛeɛ no, wogyee me so,

Nnwom 138:4
O Awurade, asase so ahene nyinaa bɛda wo ase,

Nnwom 138:5
 Yiw, wɔbɛto Awurade akwan ho dwom,

Nnwom 138:6
Awurade wɔ ɔsorosoro, nanso ɔhwɛ ahobrɛasefo,

Nnwom 138:7
Sɛ menam ahohia mu mpo a, wobɛkora me nkwa so.

Nnwom 138:8
Awurade bewie nea ɔreyɛ ama me no.

Nnwom 139:1
 O Awurade, woahwehwɛ me mu, na woahu me.

Nnwom 139:10
 ɛhɔ nso na wo nsa bɛkɔ akogya me,

Nnwom 139:11
 Sɛ nso mise: “Esum nko mmɛkata me so a,

Nnwom 139:12
  Ampa ara, esum nso nnuru sum mma wo,

Nnwom 139:13
Wo na woyɛɛ m’asaabo;

Nnwom 139:14
Mɛkamfo wo, sɛnea woyɛɛ me no yɛ hu na ɛyɛ nwonwa.

Nnwom 139:15
Me nnompe anhintaw wo,

Nnwom 139:16
 Meyɛ mogya tɔw nko no,

Nnwom 139:17
Wo nsusuwii som bo ma me dɛn ara!

Nnwom 139:18
Sɛ mise merekan a, anka ɛbɛdɔɔso mpo asen anhwea;

Nnwom 139:19
O Onyankopɔn, sɛ wubekum abɔnefo

Nnwom 139:2
Wo na wunim m’asetena ne me sɔre;

Nnwom 139:20
 Wɔn a wɔkasa tia wo mmusu mu

Nnwom 139:21
O Awurade, wɔn a wɔtan wo no, mentan wɔn anaa?

Nnwom 139:22
Ɔtan fitaa na metan wɔn;

Nnwom 139:23
O Onyankopɔn, hwehwɛ me mu, na hu me koma,

Nnwom 139:24
 na hwɛ sɛ amane kwan bi wɔ me hɔ a,

Nnwom 139:3
Wohwehwɛ me nantew ne me nna mu,

Nnwom 139:4
Ansa na asɛm bi bɛtɔ  me tɛkrɛma so no,

Nnwom 139:5
Woaka me ahyɛm, m’akyi ne m’anim,

Nnwom 139:6
Saa nimdeɛ yi yɛ me nwonwa dodo.

Nnwom 139:7
 Ɛhe na mefi wo honhom no anim aguan akɔ?

Nnwom 139:8
 Sɛ meforo kɔ soro a, wowɔ hɔ;

Nnwom 139:9
 Sɛ mefa adekyee ntaban mitu

Nnwom 14:1
  Ogyegyentwi se ne komam sɛ:

Nnwom 14:2
Awurade fi soro hwɛ nnipa mma,

Nnwom 14:3
Wɔn nyinaa aman, wɔn nyinaa aporɔw;

Nnwom 14:4
   Enti omumuyɛfo biara anhu de,

Nnwom 14:5
Ɛhɔ na ehu kɛse bɛka wɔn,

Nnwom 14:6
Mugu mmɔborɔni anim ase wɔ ne tirimbɔ ho,

Nnwom 14:7
O sɛ Israel nkwagye befi Sion aba ɛ!

Nnwom 140:1
 O Awurade, gye me fi nnipa abɔnefo nsam;

Nnwom 140:10
Ma nsramma a ɛredɛw ngu wɔn so,

Nnwom 140:11
 Mma ɔtɛkrɛmafo nntim asase so,

Nnwom 140:12
Me de, minim sɛ Awurade bedi

Nnwom 140:13
Ampa, treneefo bɛda wo din ase,

Nnwom 140:2
Wɔn a wɔbɔ pɔw bɔne wɔn komam,

Nnwom 140:3
Wɔasew wɔn tɛkrɛma ano sɛ ɔwɔ;

Nnwom 140:4
O Awurade, hwɛ me so fi ɔbɔnefo nsam,

Nnwom 140:5
Ahantanfo de afiri ne nhama ahintaw ama me;

Nnwom 140:6
Misee Awurade sɛ: “Wone me Nyankopɔn.

Nnwom 140:7
O Awurade, me Wura, me nkwagye ahoɔden,

Nnwom 140:8
O Awurade, mma ɔbɔnefo nea ɔpɛ,

Nnwom 140:9
Wɔn a wotwa me ho hyia no de,

Nnwom 141:1
  O Awurade, misu mefrɛ wo, yɛ ntɛm ma me;

Nnwom 141:10
 Ma abɔnefo nhwe wɔn ankasa atena mu,

Nnwom 141:2
 Ma me mpaebɔ mmesi w’anim sɛ ohuam,

Nnwom 141:3
O Awurade, fa ɔwɛn bɛwɛn m’ano,

Nnwom 141:4
 Nkom me koma nkɔ nsɛmmɔne ho,

Nnwom 141:5
 Ma ɔtreneeni mmɔ me, ɛbɛyɛ adɔe ama me;

Nnwom 141:6
 Wɔasum wɔn atemmufo ahwe ɔbotan so,

Nnwom 141:7
 Sɛnea obi dwiriw asase funtum so no,

Nnwom 141:8
 Nanso, wo, Awurade, so na m’ani da,

Nnwom 141:9
 Kora me fi apa a wɔasum me,

Nnwom 142:1
 Mede me nne misu mefrɛ Awurade,

Nnwom 142:2
 Mihwie me nkɔmmɔdi gu n’anim,

Nnwom 142:3
 Me honhom tɔ beraw me mu a,

Nnwom 142:4
Hwɛ nifa so, na hwɛ,

Nnwom 142:5
Misu mefrɛ wo, O Awurade,

Nnwom 142:6
 Wɛn w’aso tie me su,

Nnwom 142:7
 Yi me kra fi afiase,

Nnwom 143:1
 O Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ;

Nnwom 143:10
Kyerɛkyerɛ me ma menyɛ nea wopɛ,

Nnwom 143:11
 Wo din nti, Awurade, ma minnya nkwa,

Nnwom 143:12
 na w’adɔe mu yi m’atamfo fi hɔ,

Nnwom 143:2
 Na mfa w’akoa nkɔ atemmu mu,

Nnwom 143:3
 Na ɔtamfo taa me kra,

Nnwom 143:4
 Na me honhom tɔ beraw me mu,

Nnwom 143:5
Mekae tete nna;

Nnwom 143:6
Metrɛw me nsam kyerɛ wo;

Nnwom 143:7
O Awurade, yɛ ntɛm gye me so,

Nnwom 143:8
Ma mente w’adɔe anɔpa,

Nnwom 143:9
O Awurade, gye me fi m’atamfo nsam.

Nnwom 144:1
 Nhyira nka Awurade, me Botan 

Nnwom 144:10
 Wo a woma ahene di nkonim,

Nnwom 144:11
 Gye me na yi me

Nnwom 144:12
 Na yɛn mmabanin ayɛ sɛ tɛ nnua

Nnwom 144:13
 Na yɛn aduan korabea ayeyɛ amaama; 

Nnwom 144:14
Yɛn anantwi mu ayeyɛ duru; 

Nnwom 144:15
 Nhyira ne ɔman a wɔte sɛɛ,

Nnwom 144:2
M’adɔe ne m’abankɛse,

Nnwom 144:3
O Awurade, onipa ne hena a wuhu no,

Nnwom 144:4
 Onipa te sɛ ahuhuw,

Nnwom 144:5
O Awurade, kuntunu wo soro, na si fam,

Nnwom 144:6
 Papa anyinam, na pansam wɔn,

Nnwom 144:7
Teɛ wo nsa fi soro nohɔ,

Nnwom 144:8
Wɔn na wɔn ano ka atosɛm,

Nnwom 144:9
O Onyankopɔn, mɛto dwom foforo mama wo.

Nnwom 145:1
 Meyi wo ayɛ, me Nyankopɔn, O Ɔhene,

Nnwom 145:10
O Awurade, wo nnwuma nyinaa bɛkamfo wo,

Nnwom 145:11
Wɔbɛka w’ahenni anuonyam ho asɛm,

Nnwom 145:12
Na ama nnipa mma ahu ne nnwuma akɛse,

Nnwom 145:13
W’ahenni yɛ daa ahenni,

Nnwom 145:14
Awurade wowaw wɔn a wɔhwe ase nyinaa,

Nnwom 145:15
Aniwa nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan,

Nnwom 145:16
Wubue wo nsam

Nnwom 145:17
Awurade teɛ wɔ n’akwan nyinaa mu,

Nnwom 145:18
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,

Nnwom 145:19
Ɔyɛ wɔn a wosuro no apɛde ma wɔn,

Nnwom 145:2
Mehyira wo daa nyinaa,

Nnwom 145:20
Awurade hwɛ n’adɔfo nyinaa so,

Nnwom 145:21
M’ano bɛka Awurade ayeyi,

Nnwom 145:3
Awurade so, na ɔsɛ ayeyi kɛse,

Nnwom 145:4
Awoɔ ntoatoaso bɛkamfo wo nnwuma akyerɛ awo ntoatoaso foforo,

Nnwom 145:5
W’anuonyam ne wo nidi a ɛhyerɛn,

Nnwom 145:6
 Nnipa bɛka wo nneyɛe a ɛyɛ hu no tumi ho asɛm;

Nnwom 145:7
Wɔbɛka wo papayɛ bebrebe no ho nkae,

Nnwom 145:8
Awurade yɛ ɔdomfo ne mmɔborɔhunufo,

Nnwom 145:9
Awurade ye ma nnipa nyinaa

Nnwom 146:1
 Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

Nnwom 146:10
Awurade bedi hene daapem,

Nnwom 146:2
Mete ase yi, mɛyi Awurade ayɛ,

Nnwom 146:3
Mommfa mo ho nnto adehye,

Nnwom 146:4
Ne honhom fi kɔ, na ɔsan kɔ ne dɔte mu;

Nnwom 146:5
 Nhyira ne nea Yakob Nyankopɔn ne ne boafo;

Nnwom 146:6
Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase,

Nnwom 146:7
Ɔno na obu atɛn ma wɔn a wɔdi wɔn amim,

Nnwom 146:8
Awurade bue anifuraefo aniwa;

Nnwom 146:9
Awurade kora ahɔho so,

Nnwom 147:1
  Munyi Awurade ayɛ,

Nnwom 147:10
Ɛnyɛ ɔpɔnkɔ ahoɔden na ɛyɛ no fɛ,

Nnwom 147:11
Awurade ani gye wɔn a wosuro no ho,

Nnwom 147:12
O Yerusalem, kamfo Awurade.

Nnwom 147:13
Efisɛ wahyɛ w’aponkɛse adaban den,

Nnwom 147:14
 Ɔma w’ahye so dwo,

Nnwom 147:15
 Ɔma ne kaseɛ ba asase so,

Nnwom 147:16
Ɔma sukyerɛmma tɔ sɛ asaawa mfuturu,

Nnwom 147:17
Ɔtow asukɔtweaa gu sɛ mporoporowa,

Nnwom 147:18
Ɔsoma n’asɛm, na ɛnan no,

Nnwom 147:19
Ɔyi n’asɛm kyerɛ Yakob,

Nnwom 147:2
Awurade na ɔkyekye Yerusalem;

Ɔnyɛɛ ɔman biara saa da;

Ɔsa wɔn a wɔn koma abubu yare,

Nnwom 147:4
Ɔkan nsoromma dodow,

Nnwom 147:5
Yɛn Awurade yɛ kɛse na ne tumi so;

Nnwom 147:6
 Awurade ma ahobrɛasefo gyina,

Nnwom 147:7
Monto aseda dwom mma Awurade;

Nnwom 147:8
Ɔno na ɔde omununkum kata ɔsoro,

Nnwom 147:9
Ɔno na ɔma mmoa nya wɔn ano aduan,

Nnwom 148:1
 Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

Nnwom 148:10
Wuram mmoa ne afieboa nyinaa,

Nnwom 148:11
Asase so ahene ne aman nyinaa,

Nnwom 148:12
Mmerante ne mmaabun,

Nnwom 148:13
Wonyi Awurade din ayɛ,

Nnwom 148:14
 Na wama abɛn so ama ne man,

Nnwom 148:2
N’abɔfo nyinaa, munyi no ayɛ.

Nnwom 148:3
Owia ne ɔsram, munyi no ayɛ.

Nnwom 148:4
Mo soro mu soro, munyi no ayɛ,

Nnwom 148:5
 Ma wonyi Awurade din ayɛ,

Nnwom 148:6
Na ɔde wɔn tintim hɔ daa daa,

Nnwom 148:7
Munyi Awurade ayɛ wɔ asase so,

Nnwom 148:8
Ogya ne amparuwbo, sukyerɛmma ne huruhuro,

Nnwom 148:9
Mmepɔw ne nkoko nyinaa,

Nnwom 149:1
 Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

Nnwom 149:2
 Ma Israel ani nnye ne yɛfo ho,

Nnwom 149:3
 Ma wɔmfa asaw nyi ne din ayɛ,

Nnwom 149:4
Awurade ani gye ne man ho,

Nnwom 149:5
Ma Ahotefo nni ahurusi wɔ anuonyam mu;

Nnwom 149:6
 Ma Onyankopɔn nnwom nnyigye  wɔn anom,

Nnwom 149:7
sɛ wobedi amanaman mu were,

Nnwom 149:8
wɔmfa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn nkyekyere wɔn ahene,

Nnwom 149:9
sɛ wɔde atɛn a wɔatwerɛw no bebu wɔn;

Nnwom 15:1
  O Awurade, hena na ɔbɛsoɛ wo ntamadan mu?

Nnwom 15:2
Nea ɔnantew pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɔdi asɛntrenee,

Nnwom 15:3
Ɔmfa ne tɛkrɛma ntwiri,

Nnwom 15:4
  N'ankasa n’ani so obu onipa huhuw animtia,

Nnwom 15:5
Ɔmfa ne sika mma nnye mfɛntom,

Nnwom 150:1
 Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

Nnwom 150:2
Munyi no ayɛ ne mmaninyɛ mu,

Nnwom 150:3
 Munyi no ayɛ ntotorobɛnto nne so,

Nnwom 150:4
Momfa mpintin ne asaw nyi no ayɛ.

Nnwom 150:5
Momfa nnawuta nnyigyei dɛdɛ nyi no ayɛ,

Nnwom 150:6
Momma nea ɛhome nyinaa nyi Awurade ayɛ.

Nnwom 16:1
 Onyankopɔn, fa me sie, efisɛ wone me guankɔbea.

 Na worennyaw me kra Asaman,

Nnwom 16:11
  Wobɛkyerɛ me nkwa kwan,

Nnwom 16:2
  Mise Awurade sɛ: M’Awurade ne wo,

Nnwom 16:3
  Na akronkronfo a wɔwɔ asase so no,

Nnwom 16:4
  Wɔn a wodi anyame afoforo akyi no, wɔma wɔn yaw dɔɔso.

Nnwom 16:5
Awurade  ne m’agyapade mu kyɛfa ne me kuruwa,

Nnwom 16:6
  Me hye hama akɔfa nea ɛhɔ yɛ ama me,

Mede Awurade asi m’anim daa,

Nnwom 17:1
 O Awurade,  tie trenee, wɛn w’aso ma nkɔmmɔ,

Nnwom 17:10
  Wɔapirim wɔn koma srade mu,

Nnwom 17:11
Wɔatu yɛn nsɔngɔ atwa yɛn ho ahyia afei;

Nnwom 17:12
  Wɔte sɛ gyata a wɔredɛe apɛ adifude,

Nnwom 17:13
Sɔre ɛ, O Awurade; kɔ n’anim;

Nnwom 17:14
  O Awurade, fa wo nsa gye me fi nnipa nsam,

Nnwom 17:15
  Me de, mɛhwɛ w’anim trenee mu,

Nnwom 17:2
  Ma m'atemmu mfi w’anim mmra,

Nnwom 17:3
  Woasɔ me koma ahwɛ, na woahwehwɛ me mu anadwo,

Nnwom 17:4
  Nnipa nneyɛe fam, w’anom asɛm no nti

Nnwom 17:5
W’anammɔn no ara so na me kwan nam,

Nnwom 17:6
Misu frɛ wo, efisɛ wubegye me so, O Onyankopɔn.

  Fa awanwa kwan so yi wo dɔ mapa adi kyerɛ,

Nnwom 17:8
Hwɛ me so sɛ aniwa kurutiayisi,

  abɔnefo a wɔbɔ me atirimɔden,

Nnwom 18:1
  Mɛdɔ wo, O Awurade, m’ahoɔden.

Nnwom 18:10
  Na ɔtraa Kerub so tui,

Nnwom 18:11
Ɔde sum kataa ne ho,

Nnwom 18:12
N’anim hann mu na mununkum fi betwaa mu,

Nnwom 18:13
Awurade fi ɔsoro boboom,

Nnwom 18:14
  Na ɔtotow n’agyan de bɔɔ wɔn hwetee,

Nnwom 18:15
  Ɛnna nsu mu mmɔnka yiyii adi,

Nnwom 18:16
  Ɔtenɛɛ ne nsa fi soro bɛfaa me,

Nnwom 18:17
Ogyee me fii me tamfo hoɔdenfo nsam;

Nnwom 18:18
Wɔbɛtoaa me m’amanehunu da,

Nnwom 18:19
Oyii me kogyinaa nea ɛhɔ trɛw;

Nnwom 18:2
Awurade ne me botan ne m’abankɛse ne me gyefo,

Nnwom 18:20
Awurade tua me ka sɛnea me trenee te;

Nnwom 18:21
Efisɛ mafa Awurade akwan so,

Nnwom 18:22
na mmom n’atemmusɛm nyinaa wɔ m’anim,

Nnwom 18:23
  Na me ho nni asɛm wɔ n’anim,

Nnwom 18:24
  Na Awurade atua me ka sɛnea me trenee,

Nnwom 18:25
  Ɔnokwafo na wo ne no bedi no nokwaredi mu,

Nnwom 18:26
Nea ɔma ne ho tew na wobɛtew wo ho ama no;

Nnwom 18:27
 Na wo na wugye ahobrɛasefo,

Nnwom 18:28
Wo na woma me kanea hyerɛn, O Awurade;

Nnwom 18:29
Wo nti, mitumi tow hyɛ afowfo dɔm so;

Nnwom 18:3
Misu mefrɛ Awurade, Ɔno a ɔfata sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ,

Nnwom 18:30
  Na Onyankopɔn de, ne kwan yɛ pɛ,

Nnwom 18:31
 Na hena ne Nyankopɔn sɛ Awurade nko,

Nnwom 18:32
Onyankopɔn na ɔde ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔso,

Nnwom 18:33
  Ɔyɛ m'anan sɛ aforotebere de,

Nnwom 18:34
Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa akodi,

Nnwom 18:35
 Na woama me wo nkwagye kyɛm,

Nnwom 18:36
 Wotrɛw m’anammɔn mu m’ase,

Nnwom 18:37
  Mitiw m’atamfo, na metoo wɔn,

Nnwom 18:38
  Mebobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔantumi ansɔre,

Nnwom 18:39
  Na wode ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔsoɔ maa akodi,

Nnwom 18:4
  Owuo nhama bobaree me ho,

Nnwom 18:40
  na womaa m’atamfo dan wɔn akyi kyerɛɛ me,

Nnwom 18:41
  Wosu frɛe, na ɔgyefo bi nni hɔ,

Nnwom 18:42
Meyam wɔn muhumuhu sɛ mfutuma, mframa anim,

Nnwom 18:43
  Wuyii me nnipa m'amanko mu, wode me sii amanaman so ti,

Nnwom 18:44
Aso tee ara pɛ, na wotiee me,

Nnwom 18:45
  Ananafo twintwamee,

Nnwom 18:46
Awurade te ase; nhyira nka me Botantim no,

Nnwom 18:47
Onyankopɔn na ɔtɔ were ma me;

Nnwom 18:48
  Wagye me afi m’atamfo nsam,

Nnwom 18:49
  Ɛno nti, mɛda wo ase amanaman mu, O Awurade,

Nnwom 18:5
  Asaman nhama twaa me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn,

Nnwom 18:50
Nkwagye nnwuma akɛse na ɔyɛ ma ne hene,

Nnwom 18:6
  M’ahohia mu misu frɛɛ Awurade,

Nnwom 18:7
Ɛnna asase hinhimii, na ɛwosowee,

Nnwom 18:8
  Owusiw tu fii ne hwenem,

Nnwom 18:9
 Na okuntun ɔsoro mu, na osii fam,

Nnwom 19:1
 Ɔsoro ka Onyankopɔn anuonyam;

Nnwom 19:10
Ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ sen sika, ɛsen sika amapa mpo;

Nnwom 19:11
  W'akoa nam so hu de,

Nnwom 19:12
Hena na otumi hu n’ankasa ne mfomso?

Nnwom 19:13
  Nso bɔ w’akoa ho ban wɔ bɔne a ɔboayɛ ho,

Nnwom 19:14
Ma m’anom nsɛm ne me komam nsusuwii

Nnwom 19:2
  Ɛda woro kyerɛ da,

Nnwom 19:3
Ɛnyɛ ɔkasa na ɛnyɛ nsɛm a wɔte;

Nnwom 19:4
Nanso wɔn susuhama du wiase nyinaa so,

Nnwom 19:6
  N’adifi wɔ ɔsoro ano,

  Awurade mmara yɛ pɛ,

Nnwom 19:8
