Nnwom 19:9
  Awurade suro yɛ kronkron,

Nnwom 2:1
Adɛn nti na amanaman yɛ gyegyeegye,

Nnwom 2:10
  Na afei, ahene, munhu nyansa.

Nnwom 2:11
  Monsom Awurade osuro mu,

Nnwom 2:12
  Mumfew ɔba no ano,

Nnwom 2:2
  Asase so ahene sɔre gyina,

Nnwom 2:3
 Momma yɛmmubu wɔn mpokyerɛ,

Nnwom 2:4
Nea ɔte ɔsorosoro no serew,

Nnwom 2:5
  Ɛno na ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ wɔn n’abufuw mu,

Nnwom 2:6
  Me Awurade na masi me hene,

Nnwom 2:7
  Na mɛka no sɛ Awurade ahyɛ no.

Nnwom 2:8
 Bisa me, na mede amanaman mɛyɛ wo apɛgyade,

Nnwom 2:9
 Wode dade poma bɛbubu wɔn,

Nnwom 20:1
  Awurade ntie wo hiada.

Nnwom 20:2
Ɔmfa wo mmoa mfi kronkronbea hɔ  mmɛboa wo,

Nnwom 20:3
  Ɔnkae w’aduan afɔre nyinaa,

Nnwom 20:4
Ɔmma wo nea wo koma pɛ,

Nnwom 20:5
  Ma yɛn mmɔ ose wɔ wo nkwagye mu,

Nnwom 20:6
Mahu sɛ Awurade gye nea wasra no no.

Nnwom 20:7
  Ebinom kamfo nteaseɛnam,

Nnwom 20:8
  Wɔn de, wobubu duedue so hwehwe ase,

Nnwom 20:9
O Awurade, gye ɔhene nkwa ɛ!

Nnwom 21:1
O Awurade, w’ahoɔden mu na ɔhene ani gye,

Nnwom 21:10
Wobɛsɛe wɔn mma afi asase so,

Nnwom 21:11
Efisɛ  wɔbɔ wo ho pɔw bɔne na wosusu bɔne bi ho a,

Nnwom 21:12
  Na wobɛma wɔasan wɔn akyi,

Nnwom 21:13
O Awurade, ma wo ho so, w’ahoɔden mu,

Nnwom 21:2
  Nea ne koma pɛ na wode ama no,

Nnwom 21:3
  Na wode papa mu nhyira hyia no,

Nnwom 21:4
Obisaa wo hɔ nkwa, na wode maa no,

Nnwom 21:5
N’anuonyam so wɔ wo nkwagye mu;

Nnwom 21:6
  Na wode no asi hɔ sɛ nhyira nko ara daa,

Nnwom 21:7
 Efisɛ, ɔhene de n'ani ato Awurade so,

Nnwom 21:8
Wo nsa bɛka w’atamfo nyinaa;

Nnwom 21:9
  Wubeyi wo ho adi

Nnwom 22:1
 Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, dɛn nti na woapa me?

Nnwom 22:10
Mifi ɔyafunu mu na wɔde me too wo so;

Nnwom 22:11
Mma me ne wo ntam nnware, efisɛ ahohia abɛn,

Nnwom 22:12
Anantwinini bebree atwa me ho ahyia;

Nnwom 22:13
  Wɔtɛɛ wɔn anomu hyɛ me

Nnwom 22:14
Wɔahwie me agu sɛ nsu,

Nnwom 22:15
M’ahoɔden mu ayow sɛ kyɛmfɛre,

Nnwom 22:16
Akraman atwa me ho ahyia;

Nnwom 22:17
Mitumi kan me nnompe nyinaa.

Nnwom 22:18
Wɔkyekyɛ me ntama mu fa,

Nnwom 22:19
O Awurade, mma me ne wo ntam nnware.

Nnwom 22:2
O me Nyankopɔn,  meteɛm mefrɛ wo awia,

Nnwom 22:20
Gye me kra fi nkrante ano;

Nnwom 22:21
Gye me fi gyata anom,

Nnwom 22:22
Mɛbɔ wo din akyerɛ me nuanom;

Nnwom 22:23
Mo a musuro Awurade nyinaa, munyi no ayɛ!

Nnwom 22:24
Wammu ɔmanehunufo animtiaa,

Nnwom 22:25
  Wo na woma miyi wo ayɛ asafo kɛse mu,

Nnwom 22:26
Ahobrɛasefo bedidi na wɔamee;

Nnwom 22:27
Asase ano nyinaa bɛkae, na wɔadan aba Awurade nkyɛn,

Nnwom 22:28
Awurade na ahenni wɔ no,

Nnwom 22:29
Asase so abran nyinaa bedidi na wɔakotow no;

Nnwom 22:3
  Na woyɛ kronkron,

Nnwom 22:30
Nkyirimma bɛsom no;

Nnwom 22:31
Wɔbɛba na wɔabɛka ne trenee ho asɛm

Nnwom 22:4
  Wo so na yɛn agyanom de wɔn ho toe,

Nnwom 22:5
Wo na wɔteɛɛm frɛɛ wo, na wugyee wɔn;

Nnwom 22:6
Na me de, meyɛ osunson, menyɛ onipa,

Nnwom 22:7
Wɔn a wohu me nyinaa di me ho fɛw;

Nnwom 22:8
“Ɔde ne ho ato Awurade so. Ma Onnye no ɛ!

Nnwom 22:9
Na wo na wuyii me fii me na yam,

Nnwom 23:1
Awurade ne me Hwɛfo;

Nnwom 23:2
Ɔma meda wura frɔmfrɔm adidibea.

Nnwom 23:3
Odwudwo me kra.

Nnwom 23:4
 Nso sɛ menam owu sum kabii bon mu mpo a,

Nnwom 23:5
Wotow me pon m’atamfo anim;

Nnwom 23:6
  Ampa ara yiye ne adɔe nko na ebedi m’akyi

Nnwom 24:1
Asase ne emu nneɛma nyinaa yɛ Awurade dea,

Nnwom 24:10
“Hena ne saa anuonyam hene yi?

Nnwom 24:2
  Na ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ ase, ɛpo so,

Nnwom 24:3
Hena na obeforo Awurade bepɔw no,

Nnwom 24:4
  Nea efi nni ne nsam na ne komam tew,

Nnwom 24:5
  Ɔno na obenya Awurade nsam nhyira

Nnwom 24:6
Eyinom ne wɔn a wɔpɛ n’akyi kwan no abusua,

Nnwom 24:7
“Momma mo ti so, O mo, aponkɛse,

Nnwom 24:8
“Hena ne anuonyam hene yi?

Nnwom 24:9
“O mo, aponkɛse, momma mo ti so,

Nnwom 25:1
O Awurade, wo na mema me kra so mekyerɛ wo.

Nnwom 25:10
Awurade atempɔn nyinaa yɛ adɔe ne nokware

Nnwom 25:11
O Awurade, wo din nti,

Nnwom 25:12
Hena ne onipa a osuro Awurade?

Nnwom 25:13
  Ne kra bɛtra papa mu,

Nnwom 25:14
  Awurade yi ne tirim asɛm kyerɛ wɔn a wosuro no,

Nnwom 25:15
M’aniwa hwɛ Awurade daa,

Nnwom 25:16
Dan w’ani kyerɛ me, na dom me,

Nnwom 25:17
  Me koma mu ahohia so,

Nnwom 25:18
 Hwɛ m’amane ne m’ahometew,

Nnwom 25:19
Hwɛ sɛnea m’atamfo adɔɔso,

Nnwom 25:2
O me Nyankopɔn, wo na mede me ho to wo so;

Nnwom 25:20
Hwɛ me kra so na gye me.

Nnwom 25:21
 Ma pɛyɛ ne teeyɛ nhwɛ me so,

Nnwom 25:22
Onyankopɔn, gye Israel, fi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.

Nnwom 25:3
  Ampa ara, wɔn a wɔhwɛ wo kwan no biara ani renwu,

Nnwom 25:4
O Awurade, ma minhu w’akwan;

Nnwom 25:5
  Ma mennantew wo nokware mu, na kyerɛkyerɛ me,

Nnwom 25:6
O Awurade, kae wo mmɔborɔhunu ne w’adɔe

Nnwom 25:7
  Nkae me mmofraase bɔne ne me mfomso, na mmom

Nnwom 25:8
Awurade ye na ɔteɛ.

Nnwom 25:9
  Ɔma ahobrɛasefo nantew trenee mu,

Nnwom 26:1
O Awurade, bu me atɛn, na me nokwaredi mu na manantew,

Nnwom 26:10
Wɔn na ahohwibra wɔ wɔn nsam,

Nnwom 26:11
Me de, me nokwaredi mu na mɛnantew.

Nnwom 26:12
Me nan begyina nea ɛhɔ da fam;

Nnwom 26:2
O Awurade,  hwehwɛ me mu na sɔ me hwɛ,

Nnwom 26:3
  Na w’adɔe wɔ m’ani so,

Nnwom 26:4
  Me ne nnipa huhuw antra,

Nnwom 26:5
Metan abɔnefo guabɔ,

Nnwom 26:6
Mɛhohoro me nsa bemdi mu;

Nnwom 26:7
  sɛ merema wɔate m’aseda dwom,

Nnwom 26:8
Awurade, medɔ wo fi trabea

Nnwom 26:9
Mpra me kra nka abɔnefo ho nkɔ,

Nnwom 27:1
Awurade ne me hann ne me nkwagye.

Nnwom 27:10
Sɛ m’agya ne me na mpo gyaw me a,

Nnwom 27:11
Kyerɛkyerɛ me wo kwan, O Awurade,

Nnwom 27:12
 Nnan me mma sɛdeɛ m’atamfo pɛ,

Nnwom 27:13
  Migye di sɛ mehu Awurade papa,

Nnwom 27:14
Fa w’ani to Awurade so; nya akokoduru na ma wo bo nyɛ duru.

Nnwom 27:2
  Nnipa bɔne a wɔhyɛ me so

Nnwom 27:3
  Sɛ dɔm kyere me so nsra a,

Nnwom 27:4
  Ade biako na masrɛ Awurade,

Nnwom 27:5
  Na ɔkora me ne sese mu

Nnwom 27:6
  Na afei ɔbɛma me ti so,

Nnwom 27:7
O Awurade,  tie me sufrɛ;

Nnwom 27:8
  Woaka sɛ: Monhwehwɛ m’anim, nti,

Nnwom 27:9
  Nyi w’ani nhintaw me,

Nnwom 28:1
O Awurade,  wo na misu mefrɛ wo, me Botan,

Nnwom 28:2
  Sɛ misu mefrɛ wo,

Nnwom 28:3
Mpra me mfra abɔnefo ne abusuyɛfo,

Nnwom 28:4
  Yɛ wɔn sɛ wɔn nneyɛe

Nnwom 28:5
Efisɛ wommu Awurade nnwuma hwee,

Nnwom 28:6
Nhyira nka Awurade efisɛ watie me nkotɔsrɛ.

Nnwom 28:7
Awurade ne m’ahoɔden ne me kyɛm.

Nnwom 28:8
Awurade ne ne nkurɔfo ahoɔden,

Nnwom 28:9
Gye wo nkurɔfo, na hyira w’agyapade;

Nnwom 29:1
 O mo ahoɔdenfo, momfa anuonyam mma Awurade,

Nnwom 29:10
Awurade te nsuyiri so;

Nnwom 29:11
Awurade bɛma ne man ahoɔden.

Nnwom 29:2
 Monhyɛ Awurade din anuonyam,

Nnwom 29:3
 Awurade nne wɔ nsu so,

Nnwom 29:4
Awurade nne mu yɛ den sɛ;

Nnwom 29:5
Awurade nne bubu nkyeneduru;

Nnwom 29:6
Na ɔma wohuruhuruw sɛ nantwi ba,

Nnwom 29:7
Awurade nne pa ogyaframa;

Nnwom 29:8
Awurade nne ma sare so wosow,

Nnwom 29:9
Awurade nne ma awo ka ɔforote mpofirim;

Nnwom 3:1
O Awurade, m’ahohiahiafo dɔɔso dɛn ara!

Nnwom 3:2
  Nnipa bebree se me kra sɛ:

Nnwom 3:3
  Na wo, Awurade, wone me ho kyɛm,

Nnwom 3:4
 Mede me nne misu mefrɛ Awurade,

Nnwom 3:5
   Mekɔdae na medae;

Nnwom 3:6
 Minsuro nkurɔfo mpempem a wɔatwa me ho ahyia yi.

Nnwom 3:7
  O Awurade, sɔre ɛ!

Nnwom 3:8
 Awurade na nkwagye wɔ no;

Nnwom 30:1
Mɛma wo so, O Awurade, efisɛ woayi me,

Nnwom 30:10
Awurade, tie me ɛ, na hu me mmɔbɔ!

Nnwom 30:11
Woama m’abooboo adan me asaw,

Nnwom 30:12
Ɛno na m’anuonyam bɛto dwom ama wo, na ɛrenyɛ komm.

Nnwom 30:2
O Awurade me Nyankopɔn, misu mefrɛɛ wo, na wosaa me yare.

Nnwom 30:3
O Awurade, woatwe me kra afi Asaman,

Nnwom 30:4
  Monto Awurade dwom, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefo,

Nnwom 30:5
  Na n’abufuw kyɛ kakraa bi,

Nnwom 30:6
Me de, misee m’ahodwo mu sɛ:

Nnwom 30:7
O Awurade, w’adom mu na woama me bepɔw atim ahoɔden mu;

Nnwom 30:8
O Awurade, wo na misu mefrɛɛ wo;

Nnwom 30:9
Sɛ mekɔ amoa mu a, mfaso bɛn na ɛwɔ me mogya so?

Nnwom 31:1
O Awurade, wo na maguan abɛtoa wo,

Nnwom 31:10
  Na me nkwa ahwere ɛyaw mu,

Nnwom 31:11
M’ahohiahiafo nyinaa nti mayɛ ɔhohorafo,

Nnwom 31:12
  Nnipa werɛ afi me sɛ owufo,

Nnwom 31:13
Mate nnipa bebree nsekudi no;

Nnwom 31:14
Nanso me de, wo so na mede me ho ato, O Awurade.

Nnwom 31:15
  Wo nsam na me mmere wɔ,

Nnwom 31:16
Tew w’anim kyerɛ w’akoa;

Nnwom 31:17
O Awurade, mma m’anim nngu ase, na misu frɛ wo.

Nnwom 31:18
Ma atorofo nka wɔn ano ntom;

Nnwom 31:19
 Wo papayɛ a wode asie ama wɔn a wosuro wo no dɔɔso dɛn ara!

Nnwom 31:2
Yɛ aso ma me,

Nnwom 31:20
 Wode w’anim bɔ wɔn ho ban

Nnwom 31:21
  Nhyira ne Awurade

Nnwom 31:22
  Nso me de, misee m’ahoyeraw mu sɛ:

Nnwom 31:23
  Monnɔ Awurade, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefo nyinaa.

Nnwom 31:24
Munnya akokoduru, na mo bo nyɛ duru,

Nnwom 31:3
  Na wone me botantim ne me trabea srɔnsrɔn,

Nnwom 31:4
 Wubeyi me afi afidi a wɔahintaw asum me no mu,

Nnwom 31:5
Wo nsam na mede me honhom ahyɛ.

Nnwom 31:6
  Metan wɔn a wodi atoro ahuhude akyi,

Nnwom 31:7
  Medi ahurusi, na m’ani agye w’adɔe ho,

Nnwom 31:8
  Na woanyi me anhyɛ ɔtamfo nsa,

Nnwom 31:9
O Awurade, dom me, na me ho akyere me.

Nnwom 32:1
  Nhyira ne nea wɔde ne mmarato afiri no,

Nnwom 32:10
Ɔdebɔneyɛfo yaw dɔɔso;

Nnwom 32:11
Treneefo, momma mo ani nnye Awurade ho, na munni ahurusi!

Nnwom 32:2
  Nhyira ne onipa a Awurade mmu n’amumɔyɛ ngu ne so,

Nnwom 32:3
  Na mimuaa m’ano no, me nnompe gurowee,

Nnwom 32:4
Na awia ne anadwo wo nsa yɛɛ me so duru,

Nnwom 32:5
Mekaa me bɔne kyerɛɛ wo, na mankata m'amumɔyɛ so.

Nnwom 32:6
Eyi nti teeni biara mmɔ wo mpae da a obehu wo no.

Nnwom 32:7
  Wone me hintabea,

Nnwom 32:8
 “Mebue w’adwenem na makyerɛ wo

Nnwom 32:9
Monnyɛ mo ho sɛ apɔnkɔ anaa mfurumpɔnkɔ a wonnim nyansa

Nnwom 33:1
Treneefo, momfa anigye nhuro Awurade mu,

Nnwom 33:10
Awurade ma amanaman agyina dan hunu,

Nnwom 33:11
Awurade agyina de,  egyina hɔ daa;

Nnwom 33:12
  Nhyira ne nkurɔfo a wɔn Nyankopɔn ne Awurade,

Nnwom 33:13
Awurade fi soro hwɛ,

Nnwom 33:14
Ɔte ne tenabea

Nnwom 33:15
  Ɔno na ɔnwene wɔn nyinaa koma,

Nnwom 33:16
Ɛnyɛ asraafo dodow na ɛma ɔhene di nkonim;

Nnwom 33:17
Nkwagye mu, ɔpɔnkɔ yɛ ade hunu,

Nnwom 33:18
Hwɛ! Awurade ani wɔ wɔn a wosuro no so;

Nnwom 33:19
Sɛ obegye wɔn kra afi owu mu,

Nnwom 33:2
  Momfa sanku nna Awurade ase,

Nnwom 33:20
  Yɛn kra twɛn Awurade,

Nnwom 33:21
  Na ne mu na yɛn koma bɛtɔ yɛn yam,

Nnwom 33:22
O Awurade, ma w’adɔe ntena yɛn so,

Nnwom 33:3
  Monto dwom foforo mma no,

Nnwom 33:4
  Na Awurade asɛm teɛ,

Nnwom 33:5
Ɔdɔ asɛntrenee ne atemmu,

Nnwom 33:6
Awurade  de n’asɛm na ɛyɛɛ ɔsoro,

Nnwom 33:7
  Ɔka po nsu boa ano kuw,

Nnwom 33:8
Momma asase sofo nyinaa nsuro Awurade;

Nnwom 33:9
Ɔno na ɔkae, na ɛbaa mu;

Nnwom 34:1
Mehyira Awurade bere nyinaa;

Nnwom 34:10
  Gyataforo di hia na ɔkɔm de wɔn,

Nnwom 34:11
  Mma, O mommra, monyɛ aso mma me!

Nnwom 34:12
  Mo mu hena na ɔhwehwɛ nkwa,

Nnwom 34:13
Kora wo tɛkrɛma so, bɔne ho,

Nnwom 34:14
Twe wo ho fi bɔne ho na yɛ papa;

Nnwom 34:15
Awurade ani wɔ treneefo so,

Nnwom 34:16
 Awurade ani sa nnebɔneyɛfo,

Nnwom 34:17
  Treneefo su frɛ, na Awurade tie,

Nnwom 34:18
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔn koma abubu;

Nnwom 34:19
Ɔtreneeni amane dɔɔso,

Nnwom 34:2
Awurade mu na me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho;

Nnwom 34:20
Ɔhwɛ ne nnompe nyinaa so;

Nnwom 34:21
  Bɔne bekum ɔbɔnefo,

Nnwom 34:22
Awurade  gye ne nkoa kra,

Nnwom 34:3
 O mo ne me nkamfo Awurade kɛseyɛ,

Nnwom 34:4
  Mahwehwɛ Awurade, na wabua me,

Nnwom 34:5
  Wɔn a wɔhwɛɛ no no anim tew,

Nnwom 34:6
  Ohiani yi teaam, na Awurade tiee no,

Nnwom 34:7
Awurade bɔfo bɔ wɔn a wosuro no ho nsra hyia,

Nnwom 34:8
  Monka nhwɛ na munhu sɛ Awurade ye,

Nnwom 34:9
 O Awurade akronkronfo nyinaa, munsuro no,

Nnwom 35:1
O Awurade,  wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ham no nham,

Nnwom 35:10
Me nnompe nyinaa bɛka sɛ:

Nnwom 35:11
  Adansefo nkontompofo sɔre;

Nnwom 35:12
  Wɔde bɔne tua me papa ka,

Nnwom 35:13
Me de, bere a wɔyaree no, mifuraa atweaatam,

Nnwom 35:14
  Meyɛe sɛnea ɔyɛ m’adamfo ne me nua,

Nnwom 35:15
  Na ɛnam sɛ merekɔhwe ase nti,

Nnwom 35:16
 Sɛ asatofo pɛ nkyewa ho tra di fɛw no,

Nnwom 35:17
O Awurade, wobɛhwɛ akosi da bɛn?

Nnwom 35:18
  Mɛda wo ase gua kɛse mu,

Nnwom 35:19
  Mma m’atamfo atorofo no

Nnwom 35:2
So ɔkyɛm ne nkatabo kɛse mu,

Nnwom 35:20
  Na wɔnka asomdwoensɛm,

Nnwom 35:21
Wɔbaabae wɔn anomu bayaa kyerɛ me;

Nnwom 35:22
O Awurade, woahu mmua w’ano,

Nnwom 35:23
Nyan, na sɔre bebu me atɛn,

Nnwom 35:24
Bu me atɛn sɛnea wo trenee te, O Awurade me Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 35:25
Mma wɔnnka wɔn koma mu sɛ: “Ahaa, nea yɛn kra hwehwɛ ara ni!”

Nnwom 35:26
Wɔn a wɔn ani gye m’amanehunu ho no,

Nnwom 35:27
  Wɔn a me trenee sɔ wɔn ani no,

Nnwom 35:28
Na me tɛkrɛma bɛka wo trenee wɔ me komam

Nnwom 35:3
  Twe peaw na siw wɔn a wɔtaa me no kwan,

Nnwom 35:4
  Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra no anim ngu ase na wɔn ani nwu,

Nnwom 35:5
Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ntɛtɛwa, mframa anim,

Nnwom 35:6
  Ma wɔn kwan mu nnuru sum na ɛnyɛ patoropatoro,

Nnwom 35:7
Wɔasum me afiri wɔ amoa mu kwa;

Nnwom 35:8
Ma ɔsɛe mmra wɔn so mpofirim,

Nnwom 35:9
  Na me kra bedi ahurisi Awurade mu,

Nnwom 36:1
  Ɔbɔnefo mmarato kasa

Nnwom 36:10
 Ma w’adɔe nkyɛ mma wɔn a wonim wo,

Nnwom 36:11
Mma ɔhantanni nan nntia me;

Nnwom 36:12
 Ɛnde na amumɔyɛfo atotɔ,

Nnwom 36:2
  Na obu ne ho bi n'ankasa ani so

Nnwom 36:3
 N’anomu nsɛm yɛ ahuhusɛm ne nnaadaa,

Nnwom 36:4
  Odwen amumɔyɛde ne kɛtɛ so,

Nnwom 36:5
O Awurade, w’adɔe kodu soro,

Nnwom 36:6
Wo trenee te sɛ mmepɔw, O Onyankopɔn;

Nnwom 36:7
Onyankopɔn, hwɛ sɛnea w’adɔe no so dɛn ara!

Nnwom 36:8
  Wo fi mu srade meemee wɔn,

Nnwom 36:9
Efisɛ wo nkyɛn na nkwa nsuti wɔ;

Nnwom 37:1
  Nhoran wo bo nnebɔneyɛfo nti,

Nnwom 37:10
Aka kakraa bi na ɔbɔnefo nni hɔ bio;

Nnwom 37:11
Na ahobrɛasefo benya asase no adi,

Nnwom 37:12
Ɔdebɔneyɛfo susu ɔtreneeni ho adwemmɔne,

Nnwom 37:13
Awurade serew no,

Nnwom 37:14
  Abɔnefo atwe nkrantɛ,

Nnwom 37:15
Wɔn nkrante bɛwɔ wɔn ara wɔn koma mu,

Nnwom 37:16
  Ade kakra a onipa trenee wɔ no ye

Nnwom 37:17
  Na abɔnefo abasa bebubu,

Nnwom 37:18
Awurade nim wɔn a wodi mu no nkwa nna,

Nnwom 37:19
  Wɔn ani renwu bere bɔne mu,

Nnwom 37:2
  Na ɛrenni da bi na wɔatwa wɔn agu sɛ sare,

Nnwom 37:20
  Na abɔnefo de, ɔbɛyera,

Nnwom 37:21
Ɔbɔnefo fɛm, na ontua,

Nnwom 37:22
Wɔn a ohyira wɔn na wobenya asase no adi,

Nnwom 37:23
Awurade na ɔde onipa anammɔn sisi yiye,

Nnwom 37:24
  Sɛ ɔhwe ase a, ɔremmea fam koraa,

Nnwom 37:25
Mayɛ abofra, na afei mabɔ akwakoraa,

Nnwom 37:26
 Ohu mmɔbɔ daa, na ɔde fɛm,

Nnwom 37:27
Fi bɔne ho na yɛ papa,

Nnwom 37:28
 Efisɛ Awurade dɔ atɛntrenee,

Nnwom 37:29
Treneefo benya asase no adi,

Nnwom 37:3
Fa wo ho to Awurade so na yɛ papa;

Nnwom 37:30
Ɔtreneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,

Nnwom 37:31
Ne Nyankopɔn mmara wɔ ne koma mu;

Nnwom 37:32
  Ɔbɔnefo tɛ ɔtreneeni,

Nnwom 37:33
Awurade de, ɔrennyaw ɔtreneeni, ɔbɔnefo nsam,

Nnwom 37:34
Twɛn Awurade, na fa ne kwan so,

Nnwom 37:35
Mahu ɔbɔnefo a odi tumi,

Nnwom 37:36
Nanso otwaam kɔe, na onni hɔ;

Nnwom 37:37
Kari onipa a ɔyɛ pɛ, na hwɛ nea ɔteɛ,

Nnwom 37:38
  Na mmaratofo de, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn nyinaa prɛko,

Nnwom 37:39
  Na treneefo nkwagye fi Awurade,

Nnwom 37:4
Ma w’ani nka Awurade ho,

Nnwom 37:40
Na Awurade boa wɔn, na ogye wɔn,

Nnwom 37:5
Fa wo kwan hyɛ Awurade nsa,

Nnwom 37:6
   Na wayi wo trenee adi sɛ adekyee,

Nnwom 37:7
Yɛ komm ma Awurade,

Nnwom 37:8
  Ma abufuw ntwa, na gyae bo bɔne yɛ,

Nnwom 37:9
  Na wobeyi nnebɔneyɛfo afi hɔ,

Nnwom 38:1
O Awurade, ntwiw m’anim w’abufuw mu,

Nnwom 38:10
  Me koma pere katirikatiri, m’ahoɔden atu,

Nnwom 38:11
  M’adɔfo ne me nnamfo afi me haw no ho akogyina nsrɛnso,

Nnwom 38:12
  Na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra no sum me afiri,

Nnwom 38:13
  Na me de, mete sɛ osotifo a ɔnte asɛm,

Nnwom 38:14
Mayɛ sɛ onipa a ɔnte asɛm,

Nnwom 38:15
  Na wo, O Awurade, na m’ani da wo so,

Nnwom 38:16
  Na mise: Mma wɔn ani nnnye wɔ me ho,

Nnwom 38:17
  Na mereyɛ ahwe ase,

Nnwom 38:18
  Na meka me mfomso,

Nnwom 38:19
 Na m’atamfo ho yɛ wɛwɛwɛ, wɔn ho yɛ den,

Nnwom 38:2
 Na w’agyan awowɔ me aka mu,

Nnwom 38:20
  Na wɔde bɔne tua papa so ka,

Nnwom 38:21
Awurade, nnyaw me.

Nnwom 38:22
Yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me,

Nnwom 38:3
  W’abohuru nti

Nnwom 38:4
  Na me mfomso aboro me tiri so,

Nnwom 38:5
  M’akuru bɔn na aporɔw

Nnwom 38:6
  Mapompono na mapua koraa,

Nnwom 38:7
  Na ahyehyekuru ayɛ m’asen mu ma,

Nnwom 38:8
Madwudwow, na mabubu pasaa;

Nnwom 38:9
O Awurade, nea mepɛ nyinaa da w’anim,

Nnwom 39:1
Mekae sɛ: “Mɛhwɛ m’akwan yiye

Nnwom 39:10
  Yi wo haw fi me so.

Nnwom 39:11
 Sɛ wode amumɔyɛ ho animka

Nnwom 39:12
O Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ,

Nnwom 39:13
  Yi w’ani fi me so, na mentew m’anim,

Nnwom 39:2
Medan mum yɛɛ komm;

Nnwom 39:3
Me koma yɛɛ hyehyeehyew me mu;

Nnwom 39:4
“O Awurade, ma minhu m’awiei,

Nnwom 39:5
Hwɛ! Woayɛ me nna kakraa bi;

Nnwom 39:6
  Ampa ara, onipa biara nam sɛ sunsum kwa.

Nnwom 39:7
Na afei Awurade, dɛn na meretwɛn?

Nnwom 39:8
  Gye me fi me mmarato nyinaa mu,

Nnwom 39:9
  Matɔ mum, mimmue m’ano,

Nnwom 4:1
  Sɛ me sufrɛ wo a, gye me so.

Nnwom 4:2
 Mo mmarima mma, m’anuonyam bɛdan ahohora akosi da bɛn?

Nnwom 4:3
  Na munhunu sɛ Awurade ayi ne dɔfo asi hɔ;

Nnwom 4:4
  Mo bo fuw a, monnyɛ bɔne!

Nnwom 4:5
Mommɔ trenee afɔre,

Nnwom 4:6
  Nnipa bebree ka sɛ: Hena na ɔbɛma yɛahu papa?

Nnwom 4:7
 Wode anigye ahyɛ me komam asen

Nnwom 4:8
Asomdwoe mu na mɛkɔ me kɛtɛ so, na asomdwoe mu na mɛda,

Nnwom 40:1
Ɔtwɛn na metwɛn Awurade,

Nnwom 40:10
 Mankora wo trenee so wɔ me koma mu.

Nnwom 40:11
O Awurade, mfa wo mmɔborɔhunu nkame me;

Nnwom 40:12
  Na bɔne a wonnim ano

Nnwom 40:13
O Awurade, ma ɛnyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wubegye me.

Nnwom 40:14
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra asɛe no no nyinaa

Nnwom 40:15
Ma wɔn a wɔse me sɛ: “Ahaa! Ahaa!” no,

Nnwom 40:16
  Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nyinaa

Nnwom 40:17
Na me de, meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani,

Nnwom 40:2
 Na ɔtee me fi ɔsɛe amoa mu,

Nnwom 40:3
 Na ɔde dwom foforo ahyɛ m’anomu,

Nnwom 40:4
  Nhyira ne onipa a

Nnwom 40:5
  O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 40:6
  Wompɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛde,

Nnwom 40:7
Ɛnna mekae sɛ: “Maba,

Nnwom 40:8

Nnwom 40:9
  Maka trenee ho asɛmpa

Nnwom 41:1
  Nhyira ne nea odwen ɔbrɛfo ho,

Nnwom 41:10
O Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ na ma me so,

Nnwom 41:11
Eyi ho na mehu sɛ wopɛ m’asɛm,

Nnwom 41:12
 Na me de, wuso me mu ma migyina hɔ, me mu a midi mu,

Nnwom 41:13
Nhyira nka Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no,

Nnwom 41:2
Awurade bɛhwɛ no so na wama no nkwa;

Nnwom 41:3
Awurade bɛwowaw no ɔyarepa so;

Nnwom 41:4
Me de, mekae sɛ: “O Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ.

Nnwom 41:5
M’atamfo de, bɔne nko na wɔka me ho sɛ:

Nnwom 41:6
 Na sɛ ɔba bɛhwɛ me a, ɔka atosɛm,

Nnwom 41:7
Wɔn a wɔtan me nyinaa ka bom besebese wɔn ano wɔ me ho;

Nnwom 41:8
“Ɔyare bɔne bi atew agu no so;

Nnwom 41:9
  M’adamfo pa po a mede me ho too no so

Nnwom 42:1
 Sɛ ɔforote pere

Nnwom 42:10
 Ahohora a m’ahohiafoɔ bɔ me no

Nnwom 42:11
  Me kra, adɛn na woabotow sɛɛ,

Nnwom 42:2
Onyankopɔn ho sukɔm de me kra, Onyankopɔn teasefo no.

Nnwom 42:3
Me nusu ayɛ me aduan awia ne anadwo;

Nnwom 42:4
  Mekae eyinom,

Nnwom 42:4272
(Nnwom  – )

Nnwom 42:5
  Me kra, adɛn na woabotow sɛɛ,

Nnwom 42:6
ne me Nyankopɔn. Me kra abotow wɔ me mu,

Nnwom 42:7
  Ebun frɛ ebun,

Nnwom 42:8

Nnwom 42:9
  Mɛka akyerɛ Onyankopɔn, me botan no, sɛ:

Nnwom 43:1
  Bu me atɛn, O Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 43:2
Na wone me Nyankopɔn, me guankɔbea;

Nnwom 43:3
Soma wo hann ne wo nokware;

Nnwom 43:4
 Na makɔ Onyankopɔn afɔremuka ho,

Nnwom 43:5
  Me kra, adɛn na woabotow sɛɛ,

Nnwom 44:1
O Onyankopɔn, yɛde yɛn aso ate,

Nnwom 44:10
Woma yɛdan yɛn akyi kyerɛ yɛn atamfo,

Nnwom 44:11
Wode yɛn mae sɛ nguan, woyɛɛ yɛn sɛ aduan,

Nnwom 44:12
Woatɔn wo nkurɔfo fofoofow,

Nnwom 44:13
  Wode yɛn asi hɔ ama wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho nsopa,

Nnwom 44:14
 Wode yɛn ayɛ akasabebui amanaman mu,

Nnwom 44:15
 Daa nyinaa m’ahohora da m’anim,

Nnwom 44:16
 nea ɔbɔ me ahohora na ɔsopa me no nne

Nnwom 44:17
  Eyi nyinaa aba yɛn so,

Nnwom 44:18
Yɛn koma nnyae w’akyi di,

Nnwom 44:19
 Nanso woabubu yɛn pasaa, nea kraman wɔ,

Nnwom 44:2
Wo na wode wo nsa pam amanaman,

Nnwom 44:20
 Sɛ yɛn werɛ afi yɛn Nyankopɔn din

Nnwom 44:21
 ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔbɛhwehwɛ?

Nnwom 44:22
Na wo nti na wokum yɛn daa nyinaa,

Nnwom 44:23
 O Awurade, nyan ɛ, adɛn nti na woda?

Nnwom 44:24
  Adɛn nti na wuyi w’ani hintaw,

Nnwom 44:25
Yɛn kra abrɛ ase kɔ mfutuma mu;

Nnwom 44:26
Sɔre bɛboa yɛn ɛ,

Nnwom 44:3
Ɛnyɛ wɔn ankasa nkrante na wɔde nyaa asase no,

Nnwom 44:4
Wo, Onyankopɔn, wone me Hene;

Nnwom 44:5
Wo so na yɛnam sum yɛn atamfo gu;

Nnwom 44:6
  Na memfa me ho nto me ta so,

Nnwom 44:7
Wo na wugyee yɛn fii yɛn atamfo nsam,

Nnwom 44:8
 Nyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho daa nyinaa,

Nnwom 44:9
Nanso afei de, woatow yɛn akyene, na woabɔ yɛn ahohora,

Nnwom 45:1
Asɛmpa ahyɛ me koma ma abu so.

Nnwom 45:10
Tie, O ɔbabea, na hwɛ, na yɛ aso;

Nnwom 45:11
 Ne saa nti na Ɔhene ani begyina w’ahoɔfɛ,

Nnwom 45:12
 Na Tiro babea nso de akyɛde bɛba,

Nnwom 45:13
Ɔhene babea wɔ anuonyam nyinaa bi wɔ fie hɔ;

Nnwom 45:14
Ɔhyɛ ntade a wɔanwene, na wɔde no bɛbrɛ ɔhene,

Nnwom 45:15
 Wɔde anigye ne ahosan na ɛde wɔn reba,

Nnwom 45:16
Wo mma besi w’agyanom ananmu,

Nnwom 45:17
 Mɛma wɔakae wo din, awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu,

Nnwom 45:2
  Wo ho yɛ fɛ sen nnipa mma,

Nnwom 45:3
Otumfoɔ, fa wo nkrante bɔ w’asen ɛ,

Nnwom 45:4
   Na fa w’ahensɛm no tew mu kɔ w’anim

Nnwom 45:5
  W’agyan ano yɛ nnam,

Nnwom 45:6
  Onyankopɔn, w’ahengua wɔ hɔ daa daa,

Nnwom 45:7
  Wodɔ trenee, na wotan abɔnefosɛm,

Nnwom 45:8
Kurobow ne pɛprɛ ne kasia dua yi hua wo ntade nyinaa mu;

Nnwom 45:9
 Ahemfo mmabea wɔ wo mmea anuonyamfo mu,

Onyankopɔn ne yɛn guankɔbea ne yɛn ahoɔden,

Nnwom 46:3
 na emu nsu woro na ehuru

Nnwom 47:1
Aman nyinaa, mommɔ mo nsam.

Nnwom 47:2

Nnwom 47:4
Ɔbɛpaw yɛn agyapade ama yɛn,

Nnwom 47:5
  Onyankopɔn de anigye huro kɔ ɔsoro,

Na Onyankopɔn ne asase nyinaa so Hene;

Nnwom 47:8
Onyankopɔn di amanaman so hene.

Nnwom 47:9

Awurade yɛ kɛse, na ɔfata ayeyi pii,

Nnwom 48:14
 sɛ saa Nyankopɔn yi yɛ

Nnwom 49:1
 Aman nyinaa, muntie eyi,

Nnwom 49:10
 Na ohu sɛ anyansafo wuwu,

Nnwom 49:11
 Wɔn tirim ne sɛ wɔn adan bɛtra hɔ daa,

Nnwom 49:12
Nanso ɔdesani, sɛ ɔwɔ nidi mpo a, ɔrentena ase daa;

Ɔkwan a agyimfo fa so ni,

Nnwom 49:14
Wɔte sɛ nguan a wɔapaw wɔn ama asaman;

Na me kra de, Onyankopɔn begye no Asaman nsam,

Sɛ obi nya ne ho a, nsuro,

Ɔte ase no na ohyira ne kra daa;

Nnwom 49:19
Ne kra bɛkɔ n’agyanom abusua nkyɛn.

 Nnipa mma mpapahwekwa oo,

Nnwom 49:20
Onipa desani, sɛ ɔwɔ nidi mpo na onni ntease a,

Nnwom 49:3
M’ano bɛka anyansasɛm,

Nnwom 49:4
 Mɛbrɛ m’aso ase matie abebusɛm,

 Wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn ahonyade so,

Nnwom 49:8
 Wɔn kra gye bo yɛ den

Nnwom 49:9
 sɛ ɔntena ase ara daa,

Nnwom 5:1
O Awurade, yɛ aso ma me nsɛm,

Onyankopɔn bebu wɔn fɔ;

Nnwom 5:2
Tie me sufrɛ,

Nnwom 5:3

Nnwom 5:4

Nnwom 50:1
Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn, Awurade akasa;

Nnwom 50:10
Efisɛ me na kwae mu mmoadoma nyinaa wɔ me,

Nnwom 50:11
Minim mmepɔw so ntakraboa nyinaa,

Nnwom 50:12
Sɛ ɔkɔm de me a, anka merenka nkyerɛ wo;

Nnwom 50:13
  Midi anantwinini nam, anaa 

Nnwom 50:14
Fa aseda bɔ Onyankopɔn afɔre,

Nnwom 50:15
 na frɛ me ahohia da mu,

Nnwom 50:16
  Na ɔbɔnefo de, Onyankopɔn se no sɛ:

Nnwom 50:17
 na wo koro yi ara wukyi animka,

Nnwom 50:18
 Sɛ wuhu owifo a, wopɛ n’asɛm,

Nnwom 50:19
Wugya w’ano mu kɔ bɔne mu,

Nnwom 50:2
Sion, ahoɔfɛ a ewie pɛyɛ mu na Onyankopɔn fi hyerɛn.

Nnwom 50:20
Wotena ase keka wo nua ho nsɛm,

Nnwom 50:21
Woayɛ eyinom nyinaa, na mayɛ komm nti,

Nnwom 50:22
  Mo a mo werɛ fi Onyankopɔn no, munnwen eyi ho ɛ,

Nnwom 50:23
Nea ɔde aseda bɔ afɔre no hyɛ me anuonyam;

Nnwom 50:3
Yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛba, na ɔrenyɛ komm.

Nnwom 50:4
Ɔbɛfrɛ ɔsorofo afi ɔsoro aba, ne asase,

Nnwom 50:5
“Mommoaboa m’ahotefo ano mma me,

Nnwom 50:6
Ɔsoro bɛka ne trenee akyerɛ,

Nnwom 50:7
“Me man, muntie, na merebɛkasa,

Nnwom 50:8
Ɛnyɛ mo afɔrebɔ nti na mɛka mo anim,

Nnwom 50:9
 Meremfa wo fi mu nantwinini,

Nnwom 51:1
O Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ, sɛnea w’adɔe te;

Nnwom 51:10
O Onyankopɔn, bɔ koma a emu tew ma me,

Nnwom 51:11
Ntow me nkyene mfi w’anim;

Nnwom 51:12
  Ma minnya wo nkwagye ho abotɔyam bio,

Nnwom 51:13
Mɛkyerɛkyerɛ mmaratofo w’akwan,

Nnwom 51:14
O Onyankopɔn, me nkwagye Nyankopɔn, gye me fi mogya ho afɔdi mu,

Nnwom 51:15
O Awurade, bue m’ano fafa,

Nnwom 51:16
Na wompɛ afɔrebɔ, anka mɛbɔ,

Nnwom 51:17
Onyankopɔn afɔre ne honhom a abubu;

Nnwom 51:18
 Ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ Sion yiye;

Nnwom 51:19
Ɛno na w’ani begye trenee afɔre ho,

Nnwom 51:2
 Hohoro me ho fi m’amumɔyɛ mu koraa,

Nnwom 51:3
 Na mmarato no, mahu,

Nnwom 51:4
  Wo nko ara na mafom wo,

Nnwom 51:5
Hwɛ! Amumɔyɛ mu na wɔwoo me,

Nnwom 51:6
Hwɛ! Koma mu nokwaredi na w’ani gye ho,

Nnwom 51:7
Fa sommɛ yi me ho bɔne na ama me ho afi,

Nnwom 51:8
  Ma mente anigye ne abotɔyam nsɛm,

Nnwom 51:9
  Yi w’ani fi me bɔne ho hintaw,

Nnwom 52:1
Ɔkatakyi, dɛn nti na wohoahoa wo ho bɔne ho?

Nnwom 52:2
Okontomponi wo tɛkrɛma dwen mmusubɔ ho

Nnwom 52:3
Wodɔ bɔne sen papa,

Nnwom 52:4
Amammɔesɛm nko na wopɛ,

Nnwom 52:5
  Onyankopɔn nso bɛbɔ wo ahwe fam koraa,

Nnwom 52:6
  Treneefo nso behu asuro,

Nnwom 52:7
 Hwɛ, onipa a wamfa

Nnwom 52:8
Na me de, mete sɛ ngodua frɔmfrɔm wɔ Onyankopɔn fie;

Nnwom 52:9
 Meyi wo ayɛ daa,

Nnwom 53:1
 Ogyegyentwi se ne komam sɛ:

Nnwom 53:2
 Onyankopɔn fi soro

Nnwom 53:3
Wɔn nyinaa aman, wɔn nyinaa aporɔw;

Nnwom 53:4
Amumɔyɛfo mu biara nni nimdeɛ anaa,

Nnwom 53:5
  Ɛno na wɔn ho popoe,

Nnwom 53:6
O sɛ Israel nkwagye befi Sion aba ɛ!

Nnwom 54:1
 O Onyankopɔn, fa wo din so gye me,

Nnwom 54:2
O Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ;

Nnwom 54:3
Na ananafo asɔre atia me,

Nnwom 54:4
Hwɛ! Onyankopɔn ne me boafo;

Nnwom 54:5
  Ɔbɛma m’atɛwfo bɔne asan akɔ wɔn so,

Nnwom 54:6
Meyi me yam abɔ afɔre ama wo.

Nnwom 54:7
  Na wagye me, amane nyinaa mu,

Nnwom 55:1
 O Onyankopɔn, yɛ aso tie me mpaebɔ,

Nnwom 55:10
  Awia ne anadwo wɔnam

Nnwom 55:11
Amammɔesɛm wɔ mu,

Nnwom 55:12
Ɛnyɛ ɔtamfo na ɔbɔ me ahohora;

Nnwom 55:13
Na mmom ɛyɛ wo, ɔdesani a wo ne me bɔ so,

Nnwom 55:14
 wo a wo ne me dii atirimusɛm dɛdɛ,

Nnwom 55:15
  Ma owu ntow nsi wɔn so,

Nnwom 55:16
Me de, mɛsu afrɛ Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 55:17
Anwummere ne anɔpa ne owigyinae, midwinnwen me tirim na masi apini,

Nnwom 55:18
 Wagye me kra asomdwoe mu afi ko a wɔko tia me no mu,

Nnwom 55:19
Onyankopɔn bɛte na wabua wɔn,

Nnwom 55:2
Wɛn w’aso ma me, na gye me so.

Nnwom 55:20
Wateɛ ne nsa aka wɔn a wɔne no te asomdwoe mu;

Nnwom 55:21
N’anom nsɛm yɛ fekɔɔ sen bɔta,

Nnwom 55:22
Dan w’adesoa to Awurade so,

Nnwom 55:23
Na wo, O Onyankopɔn, wode wɔn bɛkɔ ɔsɛe amoa mu tɔnn;

Nnwom 55:3
Ɔtamfo nne ne ɔbɔnefo ahoguan nti.

Nnwom 55:4
Me koma di yaw pii wɔ me mu,

Nnwom 55:5
 Osuro ne ahopopo aba me so,

Nnwom 55:6
Na mise: “O sɛ mewɔ ntaban te sɛ aburuburo a!

Nnwom 55:7
Yiw, anka metu akɔ akyirikyiri;

Nnwom 55:8
  Anka metu mmirika aguan afi mframa kɛse ne ahum yi mu.”

Nnwom 55:9
O Awurade,  yɛ wɔn basabasa, paepae wɔn tɛkrɛma mu,

Nnwom 56:1
O Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ, na onipa desani repɛ me amene me;

Nnwom 56:10
Onyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ;

Nnwom 56:11
Onyankopɔn so na mede me ho mato, merensuro.

Nnwom 56:12
O Onyankopɔn, w’aboade wɔ me hɔ,

Nnwom 56:13
Na woagye me kra afiri owuo mu,

Nnwom 56:2
M’atamfo pɛ me amene me daa nyinaa,

Nnwom 56:3
Me de, da biara a mɛbɔ hu no, mede me ho bɛto wo so.

Nnwom 56:4
Onyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ.

Nnwom 56:5
Daa nyinaa wosi me nsɛm ti ase;

Nnwom 56:6
Wɔboa ano hyia ma wɔtɛw me,

Nnwom 56:7
  Wɔde amumɔyɛ benya kwan aguan anaa?

Nnwom 56:8
Wo na woabu me kyini a mikyini yi ano,

Nnwom 56:9
Ɛno na m’atamfo bɛsan wɔn akyi, ɛda a misu mɛfrɛ no;

Nnwom 57:1
  Hu me mmɔbɔ, O Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ,

Nnwom 57:10
Efisɛ w’adɔe so kodu ɔsoro,

Nnwom 57:11
O Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tra ɔsoro;

Nnwom 57:2
Misu mefrɛ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn, mefrɛ Onyankopɔn a odi ma me wie.

Nnwom 57:3
 Ɔbɛsoma afi soro abegye me,

Nnwom 57:4
 Me kra da agyata mu;

Nnwom 57:5
O Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tra ɔsoro;

Nnwom 57:6
 Woasum m’anammɔn fidie,

Nnwom 57:7
Me koma atim, O Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 57:8
M’anuonyam, nyan ɛ;

Nnwom 57:9
O Awurade, mɛda wo ase amanaman mu;

Nnwom 58:1
Moayɛ dinn yi, mubeka asɛntenenee ni?

Nnwom 58:10
 Ɔtreneeni ani begye sɛ wahu aweredi,

Nnwom 58:11
 Na nnipa bɛka sɛ: Ampa, akatua wɔ hɔ ma ɔtreneeni,

Nnwom 58:2
 Dabi, mudi asɛmmɔne, koma mu,

Nnwom 58:3
Abɔnefoɔ bɔ ko firi ɔyafunum,

Nnwom 58:4
Wɔn bɔre te sɛ ɔwɔ bɔre,

Nnwom 58:5
  a entie ntafowayifo 

Nnwom 58:6
O Onyankopɔn, tutu wɔn se fi wɔn anom.

Nnwom 58:7
 Wɔbɛyow sɛ nsu a ɛretwe,

Nnwom 58:8
 Ɔsen sɛ nwa a wɔapɛkɛw no,

Nnwom 58:9
Ansa na mo nkuku bɛte nsɔe gya nka no,

Nnwom 59:1
O me Nyankopɔn, gye me fi m’atamfo nsam;

Nnwom 59:10
 Me Nyankopɔn de ne dom behyia me,

Nnwom 59:11
Nkum wɔn na me man werɛ amfi;

Nnwom 59:12
Wɔn anom asɛm bɔne ne nsɛm a wɔn tɛkrɛma keka nti;

Nnwom 59:13
 Hyew wɔn abufuw mu,

Nnwom 59:14
 Na wɔsan ba anadwofa,

Nnwom 59:15
 Wɔn de, wɔnwan hwehwɛ aduan,

Nnwom 59:16
Na me de, mɛto w’ahoɔden ho dwom,

Nnwom 59:17
M’ahoɔden, wo na mɛto wo dwom,

Nnwom 59:2
Gye me fi amumɔyɛfo nsam,

Nnwom 59:3
Hwɛ! wɔtɛw me kra;

Nnwom 59:4
 Ɛnyɛ m'amumɔyɛ nti na wotu mmirika siesie wɔn ho.

Nnwom 59:5
Na wo, asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, wone Israel Nyankopɔn.

Nnwom 59:6
Wɔba anwummere biara;

Nnwom 59:7
Hwɛ, wɔde wɔn ano woro kasa,

Nnwom 59:8
Na wo, Awurade, wobɛserew wɔn;

Nnwom 59:9
M’ahoɔden, O wo na mehwɛ wo kwan,

Nnwom 6:1
O Awurade, mfa w’abufuw nka m’anim,

Nnwom 6:10
M’atamfo nyinaa ani bewu pɔtɔɔ na wɔn ho adwiriw wɔn sɛ;

Nnwom 6:2
Hu me mmɔbɔ, O Awurade, efisɛ meyɛ hodwoo.

Nnwom 6:3
Me kra abotow dodo;

Nnwom 6:4
  San bra, O Awurade, begye me kra,

Nnwom 6:5
  Na wo ho nkae nni wu mu.

Nnwom 6:6
  M’apinisi ama mabrɛ,

Nnwom 6:7
  Awerɛhow ama m’ani ayɛ siamoo,

Nnwom 6:8
 Mo amumɔyɛfo nyinaa, mumfi me so nkɔ,

Nnwom 6:9
  Awurade ate me nkotɔsrɛ,

Nnwom 60:1
Onyankopɔn, woatow yɛn akyene, woabɔ yɛn apansam,

Nnwom 60:10
Ɛnyɛ wo, Onyankopɔn, na woatow yɛn akyene,

Nnwom 60:11
 Bɛboa yɛn ahohia mu,

Nnwom 60:12
Yɛde Onyankopɔn na ɛbɛyɛ mmaninne,

Nnwom 60:2
Woama asase awosow, woama emu apaapae;

Nnwom 60:3
 Woama wo man ahu nea ɛyɛ den,

Nnwom 60:4
 Wode frankaa ama wɔn a wosuro wo no,

Nnwom 60:5
Nea ɛbɛyɛ na wɔagye w’adɔfo no,

Nnwom 60:6
Onyankopɔn ankasa akasa ne kronkronyɛ mu sɛ:

Nnwom 60:7
Gilead yɛ me dea, Manase nso yɛ me dea,

Nnwom 60:8
Moab yɛ me guasɛn.

Nnwom 60:9
Hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ kurow dennen no mu,

Nnwom 61:1
Onyankopɔn, tie me sufrɛ,

Nnwom 61:2
Sɛ me koma bubu a, mefi asase ano nohoa masu mafrɛ wo.

Nnwom 61:3
 Na wo na woayɛ me guandɔbea

Nnwom 61:4
 Mɛtra wo ntomadan mu daa,

Nnwom 61:5
Na wo, Onyankopɔn, na woate bɔ a mahyɛ nyinaa;

Nnwom 61:6
Wode nna bɛka ɔhene mfe ho;

Nnwom 61:7
Ɔbɛtra Onyankopɔn anim daa,

Nnwom 61:8
Ɛno na mɛto dwom ama wo din daa,

Nnwom 62:1
Onyankopɔn na me kra yɛ komm twɛn no.

Nnwom 62:10
 Mommfa mo ho nnto amimdi so,

Nnwom 62:11
Onyankopɔn akasa pɛnkoro, na mprenu na mate:

Nnwom 62:12
Adɔe nso yɛ wo dea, O Awurade,

Nnwom 62:2
Ampa ara, ɔno ne me botan ne me nkwagye, m’abantenten;

Nnwom 62:3
 Mobɛhaw ɔbaakofo akosi da bɛn,

Nnwom 62:4
Ampa ara, wɔtu agyina sɛ wobetu no so ama nidi abɔ no;

Nnwom 62:5
O me kra, yɛ komm twɛn Onyankopɔn nko ara,

Nnwom 62:6
Ampa ara ɔne me botan ne me nkwagye, m’abankɛse,

Nnwom 62:7
 Nyankopɔn nsam na me nkwagye ne m’anuonyam wɔ,

Nnwom 62:8
 Nkurɔfo, momfa mo ho nto no so daa.

Nnwom 62:9
 Ampa ara nnipa mma yɛ huhuw,

Nnwom 63:1
 O Onyankopɔn, wone me Nyankopɔn, na wo na mehwehwɛ wo daa.

Nnwom 63:10
Wɔde wɔn bɛto afoa ano,

Nnwom 63:11
  Na ɔhene de, n’ani begye Onyankopɔn ho,

Nnwom 63:2
 Ne saa na mehwɛɛ woɔ wɔ kronkronbea hɔ,

Nnwom 63:3
Esiane sɛ w’adɔe ye sen nkwa nti,

Nnwom 63:4
 Ne saa na mete aseɛ yi mehyira wo,

Nnwom 63:5
 Ɛbɛmee me kra sɛ hon ne srade,

Nnwom 63:6
Sɛ mekae wo me kɛtɛ so

Nnwom 63:7
 Na woayɛ me boafo,

Nnwom 63:8
Me kra bata wo ho di w’anammɔn akyi;

Nnwom 63:9
Wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ me kra asɛe no no de,

Nnwom 64:1
 O Onyankopɔn, tie me nne, m’abooboo mu,

Nnwom 64:10
 Ɔtreneeni ani begye Awurade ho,

Nnwom 64:2
 Fa me hintaw fi nnipa bɔne kokoam agyinatu ho,

Nnwom 64:3
Wɔn na wɔasew wɔn tɛkrɛma ano sɛ nkrante,

Nnwom 64:4
Sɛ wobefi kokoam mu atow awɔ nea ne ho nni asɛm.

Nnwom 64:5
Wɔhyɛ wɔn asɛmmɔne mu den,

Nnwom 64:6
 Wɔbɔre hwehwɛ amumɔyɛ,

Nnwom 64:7
Nanso Onyankopɔn bɛtow agyan awɔ wɔn;

Nnwom 64:8
 wɔbɛnwe ase, na wɔn anom asɛm abua wɔn atifi,

Nnwom 64:9
 Na nnipa nyinaa besuro,

Nnwom 65:1
 O Onyankopɔn, wɔde abodam yi wo ayɛ wɔ Sion,

Nnwom 65:10
Wugugu n’akofi so nsu de honoo emu apɔwapɔw,

Nnwom 65:11
 Wobɔ w’ayamyɛ afirihyia abottiri,

Nnwom 65:12
Ɛsosɔ sare so adidibea so,

Nnwom 65:13
 Nnwankuw ahyɛ adidibea no ma,

Nnwom 65:2
O mpaebɔ Tiefo, wo nkyɛn na ɔhonam nyinaa bɛba.

Nnwom 65:3
 Amumuyɔde aboro me so,

Nnwom 65:4
 Nhyira ne nea wuyi no

Nnwom 65:5
 Wode asɛntrenee a eyi hu bɛbua yɛn,

Nnwom 65:6
 Wode w’ahoɔden de mmepɔw tintim hɔ,

Nnwom 65:7
Woma ɛpo tɛm dinn,

Nnwom 65:8
Na wo nsɛnkyerɛnne nti wɔn a wɔtete akyirikyiri suro wo,

Nnwom 65:9
 Wobɛhwɛ asase gugu so nsuo, woma ɛso aduan bu so bebree.

Nnwom 66:1
  Asase nyinaa, munni ahurisi mmɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 66:10
 Na wo, O Onyankopɔn, na woakari yɛn ahwɛ,

Nnwom 66:11
  Wode yɛn ahyɛ asawu mu,

Nnwom 66:12
Woama ɔdesani atwiw afa yɛn ti so;

Nnwom 66:13
 Mede ɔhyew afɔre bɛkɔ wo fi,

Nnwom 66:14
  nea mede mibuee m’ano,

Nnwom 66:15
Mede mmoa a wɔadɔ srade bɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre ama wo,

Nnwom 66:16
Mo a musuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa, mommra mmetie, na mɛka

Nnwom 66:17
 Mede m’ano misu mefrɛɛ no,

Nnwom 66:18
 Sɛ midi ahuhude akyi me komam a,

Nnwom 66:19
 Ampa ne ampa, Onyankopɔn atie me,

Nnwom 66:2
Monto dwom nhyɛ ne din anuonyam;

Nnwom 66:20
Nhyira nka Onyankopɔn a wanyi n’aso amfi me mpaebɔ ho,

Nnwom 66:3
 Munse Onyankopɔn sɛ: Wo nnwuma yɛ hu ampa.

Nnwom 66:4
 Asase nyinaa bɛsɔre wo

Nnwom 66:5
Mommra mmɛhwɛ Onyankopɔn nnwuma;

Nnwom 66:6
Ɔmaa ɛpo dan asase kesee,

Nnwom 66:7
 Nea ɔde ne tumi di hene daa no,

Nnwom 66:8
Amanaman, munhyira yɛn Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 66:9
Ɔde yɛn kra asi nkwa mu,

Nnwom 67:1
 Onyankopɔn, nnom yɛn, na nhyira yɛn,

Nnwom 67:2
 Na wonhu w’akwan wɔ asase so,

Nnwom 67:3
O Onyankopɔn, ma aman nyi wo ayɛ,

Nnwom 67:4
Ma amanaman nni ahurusi na wɔmmɔ ose,

Nnwom 67:5
O Onyankopɔn, ma aman nyi wo ayɛ,

Nnwom 67:6
Asase bɛma ne nnɔbae;

Nnwom 67:7
Onyankopɔn behyira yɛn,

Nnwom 68:1
  Ma Onyankopɔn nsɔre ɛ na n’atamfo nhwete,

Nnwom 68:10
 W’asafo traa so;

Nnwom 68:11
 Awurade kaa n’asɛm;

Nnwom 68:12
Asafodɔm so ahene de, guan na woguan,

Nnwom 68:13
  Ɛwom sɛ moda nguannan ntam de,

Nnwom 68:14
Bere a ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ bɔɔ asase no so ahene hwetee no,

Nnwom 68:15
Basan mmepɔw yɛ Onyankopɔn mmepɔw;

Nnwom 68:16
   Adɛn na mo mmepɔw atenten

Nnwom 68:17
Onyankopɔn akodi nteaseɛnam si ɔpedu ne mpempem huhaa.

Nnwom 68:18
  Woaforo kɔ ɔsoro,

Nnwom 68:19
Nhyira nka Awurade a ɔsoa yɛn adesoa ma yɛn daa daa,

Nnwom 68:2
Sɛdeɛ owisiw tu korɔ no, pam wɔn saa ara;

Nnwom 68:20
  Yɛn Nyankopɔn no ne yɛn nkwagye Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 68:21
  Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn bɛbobɔ 

Nnwom 68:22
Awurade aka sɛ: “Basan na mede wɔn befi aba,

Nnwom 68:23
na wode wo nan akeka mogya mu,

Nnwom 68:24
  O Onyankopɔn, wohu w’adi a worebefi,

Nnwom 68:25
 Nnwontofo di kan, asankubɔfo di akyiri,

Nnwom 68:26
  Munhyira Onyankopɔn, mo asafo ahyiae mu,

Nnwom 68:27
 Benyamin akumaa, wɔn sodifo, wɔ hɔ,

Nnwom 68:28
Wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ sɛ ahoɔden mmra wo so.

Nnwom 68:29
W’asɔrefie a ɛwɔ Yerusalem no nti, 

Nnwom 68:3
 Na treneefo de, wɔn ani begye,

Nnwom 68:30
  Ka kete mu aboa ne anantwininikuw

Nnwom 68:31
  Akunini befi Egypt aba;

Nnwom 68:32
Asase so ahenni, monto dwom mma Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 68:33
Monto mma Nea ɔte soro mu soro fi teteete no.

Nnwom 68:34
 Momfa tumi mma Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 68:35
Onyankopɔn, wo ho yɛ hu, wo trabea kronkron mu,

Nnwom 68:4
Monto Onyankopɔn dwom, monto dwom mma ne din;

Nnwom 68:5
Nyisaa se ne akunafo sɛ

Nnwom 68:6
  Onyankopɔn ma ankonam nya mpɔn-ne-mma,

Nnwom 68:7
O Onyankopɔn, wufii adi dii wo man anim,

Nnwom 68:8
  asase wosowee, ɔsoro nso sosɔe nsu

Nnwom 68:9
  O Onyankopɔn, wotɔɔ adɔe nsu guu w’agyapade so,

Nnwom 69:1
O Onyankopɔn, gye me, na nsu reyɛ afa me kra.

Nnwom 69:10
Me kra sui mmuada mu,

Nnwom 69:11
Bere a mede atweaatam yɛɛ m’atade no,

Nnwom 69:12
  Wɔn a wɔtete kurow pon mu ka me ho asɛm,

Nnwom 69:13
Nanso me de, wo Awurade, na mebɔ wo mpae

Nnwom 69:14
Yi me fi dontori mu na mammem,

Nnwom 69:15
  Mma asu a ayiri no mmfa me,

Nnwom 69:16
O Awurade, gye me so, na w’adɔe ye;

Nnwom 69:17
Na nyi w’ani nhintaw w’akoa,

Nnwom 69:18
Twiw bɛn me kra, na begye no,

Nnwom 69:19
Wo na wunim m’ahohora ne m’aniwu ne m’animguase,

Nnwom 69:2
  Matɔ amoa kuronkuron atɛkyɛ

Nnwom 69:20
Ahohora apɛkɛw me koma, na abɔ me yare,

Nnwom 69:21
 Wɔde bɔnwoma yɛɛ m’aduan,

Nnwom 69:22
  Ma wɔn pon a esi wɔn anim nnan sɛ apa,

Nnwom 69:23
 Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu,

Nnwom 69:24
Hwie w’abufuw gu wɔn so,

Nnwom 69:25
Ma wɔn trabea nnane amamfo,

Nnwom 69:26
 Efisɛ wɔtaa nea wo ara woabɔ no no,

Nnwom 69:27
Ma amumɔyɛ mmɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ so,

Nnwom 69:28
Ma wɔmpopa wɔn din mfi ateasefo nhoma mu,

Nnwom 69:29
 Mprempren meyɛ ɔmanehunufo ne ɔwerɛhoni,

Nnwom 69:3
  Me sufrɛ ama mabrɛ,

Nnwom 69:30
Mede nnwonto beyi Onyankopɔn din ayɛ,

Nnwom 69:31
Eyi bɛsɔ Awurade ani yiye

Nnwom 69:32
Ahobrɛasefo behu; wobedi ahurusi.

Nnwom 69:33
 Na Awurade tie ahiafo,

Nnwom 69:34
Momma ɔsoro ne asase nyi no ayɛ,

Nnwom 69:35
 Na Onyankopɔn na obegye Sion

Nnwom 69:36
Ne nkoa asefo na wobenya adi,

Nnwom 69:4
Wɔn a wɔtan me kwa no dɔɔso sen me ti so nhwi,

Nnwom 69:5
O Onyankopɔn, wo na wunim me nkwaseasɛm,

Nnwom 69:6
 O Awurade, asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn,

Nnwom 69:7
  Na wo nti na magye ahohora,

Nnwom 69:8
 Madan me nuanom mu ɔhɔho,

Nnwom 69:9
Wo fi no ho dɔ mmɔdenbɔ amene me,

Nnwom 7:1
  O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, wo na miguan betoa wo.

Nnwom 7:10
  Me kyɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn nsam,

Nnwom 7:11
  Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufo trenee,

Nnwom 7:12
  Sɛ obi annan n’akwan, Onyankopɔn bɛse n’afoa,

Nnwom 7:13
  Na wasiesie owu akode ama onii ko no;

Nnwom 7:14
  Hwɛ, ɔmumɔyɛfo nyinsɛn amumɔyɛ,

Nnwom 7:15
Wabɔ amoa, na watutu mu;

Nnwom 7:16
Ɔno ara ti so na ne haw bɛba,

Nnwom 7:17
 Mɛda Awurade ase sɛ ne trenee te,

Nnwom 7:2
  Na wɔansunsuane me kra sɛ gyata; antetew me mu

Nnwom 7:3
  O Awurade me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mayɛ eyi,

Nnwom 7:4
sɛ mayɛ nea ɔne me te asomdwoe mu bɔne,

Nnwom 7:5
ɛnde ma ɔtamfo ntaa me kra,

Nnwom 7:6
O Awurade, sɔre w’abufuw mu ɛ;

Nnwom 7:7
  Na ma aman asafo ntwa wo ho nhyia,

Nnwom 7:8
  Awurade bebu aman atɛn;

Nnwom 7:9
  Ao, ma abɔnefo bɔne to ntwa ɛ!

Nnwom 70:1
O Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm begye me,

Nnwom 70:2
 Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra ani nwu

Nnwom 70:3
Ma wɔn a wɔka sɛ: “Ahaa, ahaa!” no, ma wɔmfa aniwu nsan wɔn akyi.

Nnwom 70:4
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nyinaa ani nnye na wonni ahurusi wo mu,

Nnwom 70:5
Na me de, meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani.

Nnwom 71:1
O Awurade, wo na maguan abɛtoa wo.

Nnwom 71:10
 Na m’atamfo ka me ho asɛm,

Nnwom 71:11
Na wɔka sɛ: “Onyankopɔn agyaw no.

Nnwom 71:12
O Onyankopɔn, mma wo ne me ntam nnware.

Nnwom 71:13
Me kra ho asɛmpɛfo ani bewu na wɔayera,

Nnwom 71:14
Na me de, mɛtwɛn daa;

Nnwom 71:15
 M’ano bɛka wo trenee,

Nnwom 71:16
 Mede Awurade Nyankopɔn ahoɔdenne bɛba abɛka wo trenee

Nnwom 71:17
 O Onyankopɔn, wo na wufi me mmɔfraase kyerɛkyerɛɛ me,

Nnwom 71:18
O Onyankopɔn, sɛ mebɔ akwakoraa na mifuw dwen mpo a, nnyaw me,

Nnwom 71:19
O Onyankopɔn, wo trenee kodu sorosoro;

Nnwom 71:2
Fa wo trenee yi me, na gye me,

Nnwom 71:20
 Woama m'ahu amane bebree a ɛyɛ yaw,

Nnwom 71:21
 Wobɛma me kɛseyɛ adɔ,

Nnwom 71:22
Me nso mede bɛnta sanku beyi wo ayɛ,

Nnwom 71:23
 Sɛ meto ayeyi dwom ma wo a,

Nnwom 71:24
Mede me tɛkrɛma nso bɛka wo trenee ho asɛm daa,

Nnwom 71:3
Yɛ m’abannennen a mekɔ mu daa.

Nnwom 71:4
O me Nyankopɔn, gye me fi ɔbɔnefo nsam,

Nnwom 71:5
O Awurade Nyankopɔn, wone m’anidaso, 

Nnwom 71:6
Wo na mifi yafunum mede m’akyi mitwerii wo,

Nnwom 71:7
 Mayɛ nnipa bebree ani so anwanwade,

Nnwom 71:8
 W’ayeyi ne wo nidi

Nnwom 71:9
Ntow me nkyene me nkwakoraabere mu;

Nnwom 72:1
O Nyankopɔn, fa w’atemmu ma ɔhene,

Nnwom 72:10
Tarsis ne nsupɔw so ahene,

Nnwom 72:11
Na ahene nyinaa bɛkotow asɔre no;

Nnwom 72:12
 Na obegye ohiani a osu frɛ no,

Nnwom 72:13
 Ɔbɛkora ɔbrɛfo ne ohiani so,

Nnwom 72:14
Obegye wɔn kra afi nhyɛso ne atirimɔdensɛm mu,

Nnwom 72:15
 Na obenya nkwa,

Nnwom 72:16
Asase no so aburoofuw bɛdɔɔso;

Nnwom 72:17
Ne din bɛtra hɔ daa,

Nnwom 72:18
Nhyira nka Awurade Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn;

Nnwom 72:19
 Na nhyira nka n’anuonyam din no daa daa;

Nnwom 72:2
Ma ɔmfa trenee nni wo nkurɔfo asɛm mma wɔn,

Nnwom 72:20
Yese ba Dawid mpaebɔ no aba awiei.

Nnwom 72:3
 Mmepɔw bɛsow asomdwoe ama ɔman,

Nnwom 72:4
Ma onni ɔman no mu mmɔborɔfo asɛm mma wɔn,

Nnwom 72:5
 Owia ne ɔsram da so wɔ hɔ yi,

Nnwom 72:6
Ɔbɛba sɛ osu a ɛtɔ gu sare a wɔahuw so so,

Nnwom 72:7
Ne bere so, ɔtreneeni bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm,

Nnwom 72:8
 Obedi hene afi po so akosi po so,

Nnwom 72:9
 Wɔn a wɔte sare so bɛkotow n’anim,

Nnwom 73:1
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn ye ma Israel, oye ma wɔn a wɔn komam tew.

Nnwom 73:10
 Enti wɔn nkurɔfo twiw bɛdan wɔn,

Nnwom 73:11
 Na wose: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn bɛhu,

Nnwom 73:12
Hwɛ! Saa na abɔnefo a wɔte hɔ dwoodwoo daa no te.

Nnwom 73:13
Ampa ara matew me komam kwa,

Nnwom 73:14
 Nanso wɔahaw me daa adesae

Nnwom 73:15
Sɛ mekae sɛ: “Mɛka asɛm a ɛte saa” a,

Nnwom 73:16
 Na misusuw ho sɛ mehu ade yi,

Nnwom 73:17
 kosii sɛ mekɔɔ Onyankopɔn kronkron mu hɔ na 

Nnwom 73:18
 Ampa ara, wode wɔn gyina nea ɛhɔ yɛ toro,

Nnwom 73:19
O hwɛ sɛnea wɔadan sɛ amamfo mprempren yi ara,

Nnwom 73:2
 Na me de, anka me nan reyɛ aman,

Nnwom 73:20
Sɛnea obi so dae na n’ani tew no,

Nnwom 73:21
Me koma dii awerɛhow,

Nnwom 73:22
Meyɛɛ ɔkwasea a na minnim de,

Nnwom 73:23
 Na me de, mɛtra wo nkyɛn daa,

Nnwom 73:24
Wonam w’afotu so bɛkyerɛ me kwan,

Nnwom 73:25
Hena bio na mewɔ wɔ ɔsoro?

Nnwom 73:26
Ma me honam ne me koma nwie sa,

Nnwom 73:27
  Na hwɛ, wɔn a wofi wo nkyɛn kɔ akyiri no bɛyera,

Nnwom 73:28
  Na me de, Onyankopɔn nkyɛn tra ye ma me,

Nnwom 73:3
 Na metwee ahopoofo ho ninkunu,

Nnwom 73:4
 Wonhu owu mu aninyanne,

Nnwom 73:5
Adesamma haw mpo nka wɔn,

Nnwom 73:6
Ɛno nti wɔde ahantan ayɛ kɔnmuade;

Nnwom 73:7
Srade ama wɔn aniwa apupuw;

Nnwom 73:7389
(Nnwom  – )

Nnwom 73:8
 Wosi atwetwe na wɔde tibɔne ka amimdi asɛm,

Nnwom 73:9
Wɔma wɔn ano so tia ɔsoro,

Nnwom 74:1
O Onyankopɔn, dɛn nti na woatow yɛn akyene koraa yi,

Nnwom 74:10
O Onyankopɔn, da bɛn na atamfo mmɔ wo ahohora nkosi?

Nnwom 74:11
 Adɛn nti na wotwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa?

Nnwom 74:12
Nanso Onyankopɔn ne me Hene fi teteete,

Nnwom 74:13
 Wo na wode w’ahoɔden paee po mu;

Nnwom 74:14
  Wopɛtɛw dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn-[Leviathan] ti,

Nnwom 74:15
Wo na wopaee asuti ne asuten mu;

Nnwom 74:16
Wo na adekyee yɛ wo dea, na anadwo nso wɔ wo,

Nnwom 74:17
Ɛyɛ wo na wutwitwaa asase ahye nyinaa;

Nnwom 74:18
O Awurade, kae eyi sɛ atamfo bɔɔ wo ahohora,

Nnwom 74:19
Mfa w’aborɔnoma kra nhyɛ wuram mmoa nsa.

Nnwom 74:2
Kae w’asafo a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete,

Nnwom 74:20
 Ma w’ani mmra apam no so,

Nnwom 74:21
O mma nea wɔhyɛ no so mmfa animguase nsan mmma.

Nnwom 74:22
 O Onyankopɔn, sɔre, bedi wo ara w’asɛm,

Nnwom 74:23
Mma wo werɛ mmfi w’atamfo nne,

Nnwom 74:3
 Ma w'anan so bɛhwɛ daa amamfo no,

Nnwom 74:4
 W’atamfo teɛteɛm w’ahyiae mu,

Nnwom 74:5
 Ɛyɛe sɛ nnipa a wɔma mmonnua so kɔ soro

Nnwom 74:6
Na afei ɛho nnwinne nyinaa, wɔde akuma ne asae abubu.

Nnwom 74:7
 Wɔde ogya ato wo kronkron mu hɔ,

Nnwom 74:8
  Wɔkae wɔn komam sɛ:

Nnwom 74:9
Yenhu yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnne; odiyifo biara nni hɔ bio,

Nnwom 75:1
 O Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase da wo ase,

Nnwom 75:10
“Na abɔnefo mmɛn nyinaa, mebubu agu.”

Nnwom 75:2
“Mɛba bere a ɛsɛ mu,

Nnwom 75:3
 Asase ne wɔn a wɔte so nyinaa mu hodwo a,

Nnwom 75:4
 Meka kyerɛɛ ahupoofo sɛ: “Monnyɛ ahupoo,”

Nnwom 75:5
Mommma mo abɛn so nnkɔ soro.

Nnwom 75:6
 Na emfi apuei, na emfi atɔe,

Nnwom 75:7
Efisɛ Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufo.

Nnwom 75:8
Na kuruwa wɔ Awurade nsam;

Nnwom 75:9
Me de, mɛka ho asɛm daa daa;

Nnwom 76:1
Yuda mu na wɔahu Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 76:10
 Na nnipa abufuhyew dan wo ayeyi,

Nnwom 76:11
 Monhyɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn, bɔ, na momfa mma no.

Nnwom 76:12
Ɔbɛhuw atumfo home agu,

Nnwom 76:2
Ne sese si Salem,

Nnwom 76:3
Ɛhɔ na obubuu ta mu mmɛmma,

Nnwom 76:4
W’anim yɛ nyam, wokorɔn sen ahayɔ mmepɔw.

Nnwom 76:5
Wɔapa abran akokoɔdurufo no akode,

Nnwom 76:6
O Yakob Nyankopɔn, w’ateɛteɛ nti, 

Nnwom 76:7
Wo de, wo ho yɛ hu,

Nnwom 76:8
Woma wɔtee w’atemmu fii soro;

Nnwom 76:9
 bere a Onyankopɔn sɔre bebuu atɛn,

Nnwom 77:1
 Mɛma me nne so akyerɛ Onyankopɔn,

Nnwom 77:10
 Ɛnna mise: Me dadwen a ɛda me so ne sɛ,

Nnwom 77:11
Mɛkae Awurade nneyɛe;

Nnwom 77:12
Na masusuw wo nnwuma nyinaa ho,

Nnwom 77:13
O Onyankopɔn, w’akwan wɔ kronkronbea hɔ.

Nnwom 77:14
Wone Nyankopɔn a woyɛ anwonwade.

Nnwom 77:15
Wo basa na wode agye wo man,

Nnwom 77:16
O Onyankopɔn, nsu nyinaa ahu wo,

Nnwom 77:17
Omununkum atɔ osu bitibiti;

Nnwom 77:18
 W’aprannaa boboom, ahum a edi kyinhyia mu.

Nnwom 77:19
Wo kwan faa po mu,

Nnwom 77:2
M’ahohia da mu na mehwehwɛɛ Awurade,

Nnwom 77:20
 Wonam Mose ne Aaron nsa so 

Nnwom 77:3
 Mekae Onyankopɔn a, misi apini,

Nnwom 77:4
 Wukura m’anisuatɛtɛw mu,

Nnwom 77:5
  Midwen tete nna no,

Nnwom 77:6
 Mekae m’anadwo dwom, midwen me komam,

Nnwom 77:7
Awurade bɛtow yɛn atwene daa,

Nnwom 77:8
N’adɔe atwam kɔ dabidabi anaa?

Nnwom 77:9
Enti Onyankopɔn werɛ afi ɔdom,

Nnwom 78:1
O me man, monyɛ aso mma me mmara;

Nnwom 78:10
Wɔanni Onyankopɔn apam so,

Nnwom 78:11
Wɔn werɛ fii ne nneyɛe

Nnwom 78:12
Ɔyɛɛ anwonwade wɔ wɔn agyanom anim,

Nnwom 78:13
 Ɔpaee po mu de wɔn twaa mu,

Nnwom 78:14
Ɔde omununkum dii wɔn anim

Nnwom 78:15
Ɔpaee abotan mu wɔ sare so,

Nnwom 78:16
 Ɔmaa mmasu fii ɔbotan

Nnwom 78:17
Nanso wɔkɔɔ so ara yɛɛ no

Nnwom 78:18
 Na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe wɔn komam,

Nnwom 78:19
Wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn 

Nnwom 78:2
 Mebue m’ano mmebu mu,

Nnwom 78:20
 Hwɛ! ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan

Nnwom 78:21
Ɛno na Awurade tee na ne bo

Nnwom 78:22
 efisɛ wɔannye Onyankopɔn

Nnwom 78:23
Nanso ɔhyɛɛ ɔsoro mununkum,

Nnwom 78:24
Ɔtɔɔ mana guu wɔn so sɛ

Nnwom 78:25
Nnipa dii abɔfo aduan;

Nnwom 78:26
Ɔmaa apuei mframa bɔ fii soro,

Nnwom 78:27
Ɔtɔɔ nam guu wɔn so sɛ mfutuma,

Nnwom 78:28
  Ɔmaa wɔtotɔɔ wɔn nsram,

Nnwom 78:29
 Enti wodidi mee.

Nnwom 78:3
Nea yɛate na yenim

Nnwom 78:30
Bere a wɔn akɔnnɔ to ntwae,

Nnwom 78:31
Onyankopɔn hwiee n’abufuw guu wɔn so.

Nnwom 78:32
Eyi nyinaa akyi no, wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne,

Nnwom 78:33
Enti otwaa wɔn nkwa nna so te sɛ mframa ara kwa,

Nnwom 78:34
Bere biara nso a obekunkum

Nnwom 78:35
 Na wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn ne wɔn Botan,

Nnwom 78:36
Nanso wɔde wɔn ano dɛfɛdɛfɛɛ no;

Nnwom 78:37
Nawɔn koma nni mu wɔ ne ho;

Nnwom 78:38
Ne nyinaa akyi no, ohuu wɔn mmɔbɔ; 

Nnwom 78:39
Bere nyinaa ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ ɔhonam,

Nnwom 78:4
Yɛremfa nhintaw wɔn mma,

Nnwom 78:40
 Mpɛn ahe ara na wɔantew n’anim atua sare no so,

Nnwom 78:41
Wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe mpɛn pii,

Nnwom 78:42
Wɔankae ne tumi,

Nnwom 78:43
na ɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnne wɔ Egypt

Nnwom 78:44
Sɛnea ɔdan wɔn nsubɔnten mogya,

Nnwom 78:45
  Ɔsomaa ahurii beguu wɔn so maa wɔbɛwee wɔn,

Nnwom 78:46
Ɔde wɔn nnɔbae maa mmebɛw,

Nnwom 78:47
 Ɔde amparuwbo sɛee wɔn bobe,

Nnwom 78:48
Ɔde wɔn nyɛmmoa maa amparuwbo,

Nnwom 78:49
Ɔsomaa n’abufuhyew baa wɔn so,

Nnwom 78:5
Ɔde adanse tintimii Yakob mu,

Nnwom 78:50
Ɔbɔɔ kwan maa n’abufuw.

Nnwom 78:51
Ɔbobɔɔ Egypt mmakan nyinaa kunkum wɔn,

Nnwom 78:52
Na ogyaa ne man sɛ nguan,

Nnwom 78:53
Odii wɔn anim dwoodwoo kɔe na wɔansuro,

Nnwom 78:54
 Na ɔde wɔn baa ne kronkronbea hye so,

Nnwom 78:55
 Wɔn nti, 

Nnwom 78:56
Nanso wɔsɔɔ Ɔsorosoroni Nyankopɔn hwɛe tew no so atua,

Nnwom 78:57
Wɔsan wɔn akyi, na wotwaa nkontompo sɛ wɔn agyanom;

Nnwom 78:58
Wɔde wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea no hyɛɛ no abufuw,

Nnwom 78:59
Enti Onyankopɔn tee, no ne bo fuwii kɛse,

Nnwom 78:6
Ɛno na awo ntoatoaso a ɛbɛba,

Nnwom 78:60
 Na ogyaw Silo trabea no,

Nnwom 78:61
 Ɔde n’ahoɔden hyɛɛ nnommumfa mu,

Nnwom 78:62
 Ogyaa ne man maa nkrante,

Nnwom 78:63
Ogya hyew ne mmerante,

Nnwom 78:64
Wɔn asɔfo totɔɔ nkrante ano,

Nnwom 78:65
Awurade nyanee sɛnea obi nyan fi nna mu,

Nnwom 78:66
 Na ɔbobɔɔ n’atamfo maa wɔsan wɔn akyi,

Nnwom 78:67
 Nso ɔpoo Yosef ntamadan;

Nnwom 78:68
 Na mmom Yuda abusuakuw na ɔpawee,

Nnwom 78:69
Na osii ne kronkronbea sɛ sorosoro,

Nnwom 78:7
Ɛno bɛma wɔde wɔn ho ato

Nnwom 78:70
Ɛnna ɔpaw n’akoa Dawid,

Nnwom 78:71
 Ɔmaa no fii nnwammere a wɔma nufu akyiridi bae,

Nnwom 78:72
Ɔde komam nokwaredi yɛn wɔn,

Nnwom 78:8
 Na wɔanyɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom,

Nnwom 78:9
Efraim mma a wonim agyan tow no mpo,

Nnwom 79:1
O Onyankopɔn, amanaman aba w’agyapade so;

Nnwom 79:10

Nnwom 79:11
Ma ɔdeduani apinisi nnu w’anim.

Nnwom 79:12
 Na ahohora a wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho de abɔ wo, Awurade, no,

Nnwom 79:13
Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo man ne w’adidibea nguan no,

Nnwom 79:2
Wɔde wo nkoa afunu ama wim nnomaa sɛ aduan,

Nnwom 79:3
Wɔahwie wɔn mogya agu sɛ nsu

Nnwom 8:1
O Awurade, yɛn Awurade, nim bɛn na wo din nni

Nnwom 8:2
  Efi mmofra ne nkɔkoa anom na woasiesie ahoɔden, 

Nnwom 8:3
  Sɛ mehwɛ wo soro, wo nsateaa ano adwuma,

Nnwom 8:4
  ɔdesani ne hwan a wokae no,

Nnwom 8:5
Woama waba fam kakra sɛ ɔsoro abɔfo,

Nnwom 8:6
  Woama wadi wo nsa ano nnwuma so,

Nnwom 8:7
Aane nguan ne anantwi nyinaa,

Nnwom 8:8
wim nnomaa ne po mu mpataa,

Nnwom 8:9
O yɛn Awurade Awurade, 

Nnwom 80:1
O Israel guanhwɛfo, yɛ aso,

Nnwom 80:10
Ne nwini kataa mmepɔw so,

Nnwom 80:11
Ne mmaa nyin koduu po ho,

Nnwom 80:12
  Adɛn nti na woabubu ne ban,

Nnwom 80:13
 Kwaeɛm kɔkɔte sɛe no,

Nnwom 80:14
O asafo Nyankopɔn, yɛsrɛ wo, san w’akyi bra;

Nnwom 80:15
Ne dua a wo nsa nifa atɛw,

Nnwom 80:16
Wɔde ogya ahyew, wɔatwa akyene.

Nnwom 80:17
Ma wo nsa mmra onipa a ɔwɔ wo nifa so,

Nnwom 80:18
Na yɛrensan mfi w’akyi.

Nnwom 81:1

Nnwom 81:10

Nnwom 81:11
Nanso me man antie me nne;

Nnwom 81:12

Nnwom 81:13

Nnwom 83:1

wɔn na wɔka sɛ: “Momma yennye Onyankopɔn afi mfa.”

Nnwom 83:14

Nnwom 97:1
Awurade di hene, ma asase ho nsan no, na

Nnwom 97:10
O mo a modɔ Awurade nyinaa, munkyi bɔne.

Nnwom 97:11
Hann ahyerɛn ama ɔtreneeni,

Nnwom 97:12
 Treneefo, monni Awurade mu ahurisi,

Nnwom 97:2
Omununkum ne sum atwa ne ho ahyia;

Nnwom 97:3
Ogya di n’anim,

Nnwom 97:4
N’anyinam hyerɛnee wiase;

Nnwom 97:5
Mmepɔw nan sɛ hweawa Awurade anim,

Nnwom 97:6
 Ɔsoro ka ne trenee kyerɛ,

Nnwom 97:7
 Ma ahonisomfo nyinaa ani nwu,

Nnwom 97:8
 Sion te, na n’ani gye,

Nnwom 97:9
Efisɛ wo, Awurade, wo nko ara ne Ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so;

Nnwom 98:1
 O Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade,

Nnwom 98:2
Awurade ama wɔahu ne nkwagye;

Nnwom 98:3
Wakae n’adɔe ne ne nokwaredi ama Israel fie.

Nnwom 98:4
Asase so aman nyinaa, mommɔ ose mma Awurade.

Nnwom 98:5
Momfa sankuten nto dwom mma Awurade,

Nnwom 98:6
Momfa ntorobɛnto ne abɛn;

Nnwom 98:7
Ma ɛpo nworo, ɛne nea ɛwom nyinaa,

Nnwom 98:8
Ma nsubɔnten mmobɔ wɔn nsam;

Nnwom 98:9
 Awurade anim, efisɛ ɔrebebu asase atɛn.

Nnwom 99:1
Awurade di hene; ma amanaman no ho mpopo.

Nnwom 99:2
Awurade yɛ kɛse wɔ Sion,

Nnwom 99:3
Ma wɔ nyi wo din kɛse a ɛyɛ hu no ayɛ, 

Nnwom 99:4
  Ɔhene tumfo a wodɔ atemmu,

Nnwom 99:5
Momma Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn so, 

Nnwom 99:6
 Na Mose ne Aaron wɔ n’asɔfo mu,

Nnwom 99:7
Ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn omununkum dum mu,

Nnwom 99:8
O Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, wo na wugyee wɔn so,

Nnwom 99:9
Momma Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn so,

Exodus 1:1
Israel mma a wɔne Yakob baa Egypt no din ni; obiara ne ne fiefo na ɛbae: 

Exodus 1:10
Momma yɛmpɛ nyansakwan bi mfa wɔn mfa so, efisɛ sɛ yɛanhwɛ yiye a wɔn ase bɛtrɛw ayɛ pii, na ɔko bi ba a, wɔbɛkɔ akɔka yɛn atamfo ho ne yɛn ako na afei wɔafi ɔman yi mu akɔ.”

Exodus 1:11
Enti wɔde adwuma so ahwɛfo sisii wɔn so sɛ wɔmfa adwumaden nhyɛ wɔn so; na wɔkyekyee nkurow a wɔde bɛyɛ adekorabea maa Farao. Saa nkurow no ne Pitom ne Raamse. 

Exodus 1:12
Nanso bere a wɔtan wɔn ani no, ɛno mpo na wɔkɔɔ so dɔe na wɔn ase trɛwee, na Israelfo no ho hu tɔɔ wɔn so. 

Exodus 1:13
Enti Egyptfo no de Israelfo no yɛɛ nkoa atirimɔden so. 

Exodus 1:14
Wɔmaa asetena fonoo wɔn, na wɔhyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔwɔw dɔte de yɛɛ birikisi, na wɔma wɔyɛɛ afumdwuma nyinaa bi. Yiw, nkoadwuma biara a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ no, wɔhyɛɛ wɔn atirimɔden so ma wɔyɛe.

Exodus 1:15
Akyiri yi Egypt hene ka kyerɛɛ Hebrifo mmea a wogye awo a obiako de Sifra na obiako nso de Pua no, 

Exodus 1:16
yiw, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Sɛ moregye Hebrini bea bi awo wɔ awo agua so na muhu sɛ abofra no yɛ ɔbarima a, munkum no, na sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbea a, ɔntena ase.” 

Exodus 1:17
Nanso na wɔn a wogye awo no suro Nyankopɔn, enti wɔanyɛ nea Egypt hene ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na wɔkoraa mmarima no so. 

Exodus 1:18
Afei Egypt hene frɛɛ mmea a wogye awo no bisaa wɔn sɛ: “Dɛn na moayɛ yi? Dɛn nti na moakora mmarima no so?” 

Exodus 1:19
Ɛnna mmea a wogye awo no buaa Farao sɛ: “Hebrifo mmea no nte sɛ Egyptfo mmea. Wɔn ho yɛ den, enti ansa na nea ogye awo no bedu wɔn nkyɛn no na wɔawo dedaw.”

Exodus 1:2
Ruben, Simeon, Lewi, ne Yuda, 

Exodus 1:20
Enti Onyankopɔn ne mmea a wogye awo no dii no yiye; na Israelfo no dɔ yɛɛ pii na wɔn ho yɛɛ den.

Exodus 1:21
Na esiane sɛ wɔn a wogye awo no suro Nyankopɔn nti, akyiri yi ɔma wonyaa mmusua. 

Exodus 1:22
Afei Farao ka kyerɛɛ ne manfo sɛ: “Abofra biara a wɔbɛwo no foforo no, sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbarima a, montow no nkyene Nil asubɔnten mu, na ɔbea de, momma ɔntena ase.”

Exodus 1:3
Isakar, Sebulon, ne Benyamin, 

Exodus 1:4
Dan, Naftali, Gad, ne Aser. 

Exodus 1:5
Na nnipa a wofi Yakob asen mu bae nyinaa si aduɔson. Na Yosef wɔ Egypt dedaw. 

Exodus 1:6
Na Yosef ne ne nuanom ne wɔn bere sofo nyinaa wuwui. 

Exodus 1:7
Na Israel mma no wowoe, na wɔbɛyɛɛ bebree; wɔn ase trɛw ntɛmntɛm na wɔn ho bɛyɛɛ den papaapa, na wɔhyɛɛ asase no so ma.

Exodus 1:8
Akyiri yi ɔhene foforo bedii ade wɔ Egypt a na onnim Yosef. 

Exodus 1:9
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne manfo sɛ: “Hwɛ! Israelfo yi dɔɔso na wɔn ho yɛ den sen yɛn. 

Exodus 10:1
 Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Kɔ Farao nkyɛn, na mama ɔne ne nkoa apirim wɔn koma na mayi me nsɛnkyerɛnne yi adi wɔ n’anim. 

Exodus 10:10
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Sɛ mema mo ne mo mmofra kwan kɔ a, na mo Awurade no di mo akyi ampa! Mahu sɛ mowɔ adwemmɔne bi wɔ akyi. 

Exodus 10:11
Dabi! Mo a moyɛ mmarima no na monkɔsom Awurade, efisɛ ɛno na mohwehwɛ.” Ɔkaa saa no, wɔpam wɔn fii Farao anim.

Exodus 10:12
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Teɛ wo nsa wɔ Egypt asase so ma mmoadabi mmra Egypt asase nyinaa so, na wommedi asase no so nhaban ne afifide nyinaa, nea amparuwbo no ansɛe no biara.” 

Exodus 10:13
Enti Mose teɛɛ ne poma no wɔ Egypt asase so, na Awurade maa apuei mframa bɔ faa asase no so da no nyinaa, awia ne anadwo. Ade kyee anɔpa no, apuei mframa no soaa mmoadabi bae. 

Exodus 10:14
Afei mmoadabi no tu baa Egypt asase no nyinaa so, na wobesum asase no so baabiara. Na wɔn ho yɛ ahometew ankasa. Na mmoadabi a wɔte saa mmaa da, na ɛno akyi no, ebi remma saa da. 

Exodus 10:15
Wɔkataa asase no ani baabiara maa asase no so yɛɛ tumm; na wodii asase no so nhaban ne nnuaba a amparuwbo no gyawee nyinaa. Afei na ahaban momono biara nni nnua anaa afuw mu afifide biara so wɔ Egypt asase nyinaa so.

Exodus 10:16
Ntɛm ara na Farao soma kɔfrɛɛ Mose ne Aaron bae, na ɔkae sɛ: “Mayɛ mo Nyankopɔn Awurade no bɔne, na mo nso, mayɛ mo bɔne. 

Exodus 10:17
Afei mesrɛ mo momfa me bɔne yi nkyɛ me, prɛko yi; na monsrɛ mo Nyankopɔn Awurade mma me na onyi owu yi mfi me so.” 

Exodus 10:18
Enti ofii Farao nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ Awurade. 

Exodus 10:19
Afei Awurade maa atɔe mframa dennen bi bɔe, na ɛtwee mmoadabi no nyinaa koguu Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu. Na mmoadabi no mu biako mpo anka Egypt asase so. 

Exodus 10:2
Mayɛ eyi na wo nso woaka ama wo ba ne wo ba ba ate nea mede yɛɛ Egypt ne nsɛnkyerɛnne a miyii no adi kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na mubehu ampa sɛ mene Awurade.”

Exodus 10:20
Nanso Awurade maa Farao pirim ne koma ara, na wamma Israelfo no ankɔ.

Exodus 10:21
Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Teɛ wo nsa kyerɛ soro na esum mmra Egypt asase nyinaa so, esum a woso mu a ɛbɛyɛ yiye.” 

Exodus 10:22
Ntɛm ara Mose teɛɛ ne nsa kyerɛɛ soro, na esum kabii baa Egypt asase nyinaa so nnansa. 

Exodus 10:23
Obiara anhu ne yɔnko anim, na wɔantumi ampue nnansa; nanso baabi a Israelfo te no de, na hann wɔ hɔ. 

Exodus 10:24
Ɛnna Farao frɛɛ Mose ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Monkɔsom Awurade. Mo nguan ne mo anantwi nko na ɛbɛka ha. Mo mma nso betumi aka mo ho akɔ.” 

Exodus 10:25
Nanso Mose kae sɛ: “Ma yennya mmoa a yebekum abɔ afɔre ne nea yɛde bɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre nso na yɛde akɔbɔ afɔre ama Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn. 

Exodus 10:26
Yɛn mmoa nso bɛka yɛn ho akɔ. Aboa nan mpo renka ha, efisɛ wɔn mu bi na yebeyi de abɔ afɔre ama Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, nanso yennim nea yɛde bɛsom Awurade gye sɛ yedu hɔ ansa.” 

Exodus 10:27
Na Awurade maa Farao pirim ne koma, na wampene so sɛ wɔbɛkɔ. 

Exodus 10:28
Enti Farao ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Fi me so kɔ! Hwɛ wo ho yiye! Hwɛ na woansi m’anim bio, efisɛ da a wubesi m’anim no, wubewu.” 

Exodus 10:29
Ɛnna Mose kae sɛ: “Yoo, woaka a mate. Merensi w’anim bio.”

Exodus 10:3
Enti Mose ne Aaron kɔɔ Farao nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade Hebrifo Nyankopɔn no se ni: ‘Wobɛbɔ me so dwae akosi da bɛn? Ma me nkurɔfo kwan ma wɔnkɔsom me. 

Exodus 10:4
Na sɛ wusen wo kɔn na woamma me nkurɔfo no ankɔ a, ɛnde ɔkyena mɛma mmoadabi aba w’asase so. 

Exodus 10:5
Na wɔbɛkata asase ani baabiara, na nnipa rentumi nhu asase so dɔte mpo; na biribiara a amparuwbo no ansɛe no no mmoadabi no bedi ne nyinaa ma asa, na dua biara a ɛfefɛw wɔ mo afuw mu no, wɔbɛwe. 

Exodus 10:6
Na wɔbɛhyɛ w’afie ne wo nkoa nyinaa afie ne Egyptfo nyinaa afie ma, na ɛbɛyɛ biribi a efi bere a w’agyanom ne wɔn agyanom tenaa asase so besi nnɛ no, obiara nhuu bi da.’” Afei ɔdan ne ho fii Farao anim kɔe.

Exodus 10:7
Ɛno akyi no, Farao nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Enkosi da bɛn na saa ɔbarima yi bɛyɛ afiri ama yɛn? Ma nkurɔfo no nkɔsom Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn no. Enti Egypt asɛe yi wunhui?” 

Exodus 10:8
Na wɔde Mose ne Aaron san baa Farao anim bio, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔsom mo Nyankopɔn Awurade no. Na ɛhefo ankasa na wɔbɛkɔ?” 

Exodus 10:9
Na Mose buae sɛ: “Yɛne yɛn mmofra, yɛn nkwakoraa ne yɛn mmerewa, yɛn mmabarima ne yɛn mmabea, yɛn nguan ne yɛn anantwi na ɛbɛkɔ, efisɛ yɛrekɔhyɛ fa ama Awurade.” 

Exodus 11:1
 Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Aka ɔhaw biako bio a mede bɛba Farao ne Egypt so, na ɛno akyi no, ɔbɛma moafi ha akɔ. Ɔbɛma moakɔ koraa, obepiapia mo atiko mpo.

Exodus 11:10
Mose ne Aaron yɛɛ anwonwade yi nyinaa wɔ Farao anim, nanso Awurade maa Farao pirim ne koma, na wamma Israelfo no amfi n’asase so ankɔ.

Exodus 11:2
Afei ka ma ɔman no nte sɛ ɔbarima oo, ɔbea oo, obiara mmisa ne fipamfo hɔ nneɛma a wɔde dwetɛ ayɛ ne nea wɔde sika ayɛ.” 

Exodus 11:3
Awurade maa ɔman no anim baa nyam wɔ Egyptfo no anim. Na Mose nso bɛyɛɛ onipa kɛse wɔ Egypt asase so, Farao nkoa anim ne ɔman no anim.

Exodus 11:4
Mose toaa so kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade se ni, ‘Mɛba abɛfa Egypt anadwo dasum, 

Exodus 11:5
na abakan biara a ɔwɔ Egypt asase so bewu, efi Farao a ɔte agua so no abakan so kosi afenaa a ɔwɔ owiyammo akyi abakan ne aboa biara abakan so. 

Exodus 11:6
Na osu kɛse a ebi mmae da na ɛso bi remma bio bɛba Egypt asase nyinaa so. 

Exodus 11:7
Na Israel mma nyinaa de, ɔkraman po rentwe ne tɛkrɛma ntia wɔn, efi nnipa so kosi mmoa so, na moahu sɛ Awurade betumi apae Egyptfo ne Israelfo ntam.

Exodus 11:8
Wo nkoa yi nyinaa bɛba abɛbɔ wɔn mu ase wɔ m’anim aka sɛ, ‘Wo ne wo nkurɔfo a wodi w’akyi nyinaa nkɔ.’ Ɛba saa a afei mɛkɔ.” Ɛnna ɔde abufuw fii Farao anim kɔe.

Exodus 11:9
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Farao rentie mo, na eyi bɛma m’anwonwade adɔɔso wɔ Egypt asase so.” 

Exodus 12:1
 Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose ne Aaron wɔ Egypt asase so sɛ: 

Exodus 12:10
Na munnnyaw bi mmma ade nnkye so, na sɛ ebi ka ma ade kye so a, momfa ogya nhyew. 

Exodus 12:11
Saa kwan yi so na munni: Momfa ade mmɔ mo asen na monhyɛ mpaboa na momfa poma nkura; na munni no ɔhare so. Ɛyɛ Awurade twam. 

Exodus 12:12
Mɛba abetwam Egypt asase so anadwo no akunkum Egypt mmakan nyinaa, fi onipa so kosi aboa so. Na mebu Egypt anyame nyinaa atɛn. Mene Awurade. 

Exodus 12:13
Na ofie biara a mowɔ mu no, mogya no bɛyɛ mo sɛnkyerɛnne, na sɛ mihu mogya no a, metwam akɔ. Enti sɛ mede ɔsɛe ba Egypt asase so a, morenhu amane biara.

Exodus 12:14
“‘Monkae saa da yi na munni no sɛ Awurade afahyɛ, mo awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu. Monhyɛ fa no na ɛnyɛ ahyɛde a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa. 

Exodus 12:15
Munni paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim nnanson. Na da a edi kan no ara munyi mmɔkaw biara mfi mo afie mu, efisɛ obiara a obedi ade a mmɔkaw wom fi da a edi kan kosi da a ɛto so ason no, wobetwa onipa a ɔte saa afi Israel. 

Exodus 12:16
Da a edi kan no monyɛ nhyiam kronkron, na da a ɛto so ason no nso monyɛ nhyiam kronkron. Monnyɛ adwuma saa bere no; aduan a ɔkra biara bedi nkutoo na mubetumi ayɛ.

Exodus 12:17
“‘Na monhyɛ paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim no ho fa, efisɛ saa da yi na meyi mo asafodɔm afi Egypt asase so. Monkae saa da yi, mo awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu, na ɛnyɛ ahyɛde a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa. 

Exodus 12:18
Ɔsram a edi kan no da a ɛto so dunan anwummere kosi da a ɛto so aduonu biako anwummere no, munni paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim. 

Exodus 12:19
Na ɛnsɛ sɛ wohu mmɔkaw biara wɔ mo afie mu nnanson, efisɛ obiara a ɔde mmɔkaw bɛka n’ano no, ɔhɔho oo, Israelni oo, wobetwa onipa a ɔte saa afi Israel asafo mu. 

Exodus 12:2
“Ɔsram yi bɛyɛ asram no nyinaa mfiase. Ɛbɛyɛ afe no mu ɔsram a edi kan ama mo. 

Exodus 12:20
Munnni mmɔkaw biara. Baabi a mote biara munni paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim.’”

Exodus 12:21
Afei Mose frɛɛ Israel mpanyimfo nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Munyi nguan, sɛnea obiara abusua te, na munkum twam aboa no.

Exodus 12:22
Na momfa sommɛ [adwera kasiaw] mmɔ mogya a ɛwɔ ɛsɛn mu no mu na momfa nsra apongua abien no ho ne n’atifi; na obiara mmfi ne fie mmpue kosi anɔpa. 

Exodus 12:23
Na sɛ Awurade bɛfa ɔman no mu kunkum Egyptfo no na ohu mogya a ɛwɔ apongua abien no ho ne n’atifi a, Awurade betwam afa ɔpon no ho na ɔremma ɔsɛe biara mma mo fie.

Exodus 12:24
“Na momma eyi nyɛ ahyɛde a mo ne mo mma bedi so daa. 

Exodus 12:25
Afei sɛ mudu asase a Awurade de bɛma mo no so sɛnea waka no a, monkɔ so nyɛ saa amanne yi mfa nsom no. 

Exodus 12:26
Na sɛ da bi mo mma bisa mo sɛ, ‘Amanne yi kyerɛ dɛn?’ a, 

Exodus 12:27
monka sɛ, ‘Ɛyɛ twam afɔre a yɛbɔ ma Awurade, efisɛ bere a ɔrekunkum Egyptfo no, otwaam faa Israelfo afie ho wɔ Egypt, na oyii yɛn afie fii mu.’” Afei ɔman no nyinaa bɔɔ wɔn mu ase sɔree Awurade. 

Exodus 12:28
Enti Israelfo no kɔyɛɛ nea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose ne Aaron no nyinaa. Wɔyɛɛ saa pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Exodus 12:29
Na anadwo dasum no, Awurade kum Egypt asase no so abakan biara, efi Farao a ɔte n’agua so no abakan so kosi dommum a ɔda afiase abakan so. Okum aboa biara abakan nso. 

Exodus 12:3
Monka kyerɛ Israel asafo nyinaa sɛ, ‘Ɔsram yi da a ɛto so du no, abusua biara mpɛ oguan biako mma n'agya fie; kyerɛ sɛ ofie biara, oguan biako. 

Exodus 12:30
Ɛnna Farao ne ne nhenkwaa ne Egyptfo a wɔaka nyinaa sɔree anadwo; na osu kɛse baa Egypt baabiara, efisɛ ofie biako mpo nni hɔ a obi anwu wom. 

Exodus 12:31
Enti saa anadwo no ara Farao frɛɛ Mose ne Aaron ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monsɔre na mo ne Israelfo a wɔaka nyinaa mfi me man mu na monkɔsom Awurade, sɛnea moaka no. 

Exodus 12:32
Momfa mo nguan ne mo anantwi nyinaa nkɔ, sɛnea moaka no. Na ɛyɛ a, munhyira me nso.”

Exodus 12:33
Afei Egyptfo no gyinaa wɔn so sɛ wɔnyɛ ntɛm mfi ɔman no mu, na wɔkae sɛ, “Anyɛ saa a, ɛnde yɛn nyinaa awuwu awie!” 

Exodus 12:34
Enti ɔman no faa wɔn mmɔre a ennya nkawee, na wɔde ntama kyekyeree nea wɔfɔtɔw mmɔre wom no de sisii wɔn kɔn ho. 

Exodus 12:35
Na Israelfo no yɛɛ nea Mose kae no, na wobisaa nneɛma a wɔde dwetɛ ayɛ ne nea wɔde sika ayɛ ne ntama fii Egyptfo no hɔ. 

Exodus 12:36
Awurade maa nkurɔfo no anim baa nyam wɔ Egyptfo anim, enti biribiara a wobisae no, wɔde maa wɔn, na wɔwerɛw Egyptfo ho.

Exodus 12:37
Afei Israelfo no fii Ramese de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Sukot. Nawɔyɛ mmarima a wɔnam fam bɛyɛ mpem ahansia; wɔankan mmofra anka ho. 

Exodus 12:38
Na firamanfiramanfo bebree nso ne wɔn kɔe, na na nguan ne anantwi ne mmoa ahorow pii nso ka wɔn ho. 

Exodus 12:39
Afei wɔde esiam a wɔafɔtɔw a wɔde fi Egypt bae no too paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim, efisɛ wɔpam wɔn fii Egypt, enti wɔannya bere ansiesie biribi a wobedi wɔ kwan so.

Exodus 12:4
Na sɛ ofie no mufo sua sɛ wɔn nkutoo bɛwe oguan biako a, ɔne ne fipamfo nkyɛ wɔ ne fie, sɛnea nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ dodow te. Mummu wɔn dodow ano nkyɛ oguan no mma ɛnso obiara so. 

Exodus 12:40
Mfe dodow a Israelfo de tenaa ase—wɔn a wɔtenaa Egypt no—si ahanan aduasa.

Exodus 12:41
Na mfe ahanan aduasa soe pɛpɛɛpɛ no, da no ara na Awurade asafodɔm no fii Egypt asase so kɔe. 

Exodus 12:42
Ɛyɛ anadwo a Awurade ankasa dii Israelfo no afoofi na oyii wɔn fii Egypt asase so. Na Israelfo no bɛkae saa anadwo yi de ahyɛ Awurade anuonyam, wɔn awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.

Exodus 12:43
Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose ne Aaron sɛ: “Twam no ho ahyɛde ni: Ɔhɔho biara nnni bi. 

Exodus 12:44
Nanso sɛ akoa a wɔde sika atɔ no wɔ hɔ a, muntwa no twetia ansa na wadi bi. 

Exodus 12:45
Otubrafo ne ɔpaani nnni bi. 

Exodus 12:46
Munni wɔ ofie biako mu. Mommfa nam no bi mmfi fie hɔ nnkɔ abɔnten baabiara. Na mummmu ne dompe biara mu. 

Exodus 12:47
Israel asafo nyinaa nhyɛ saa fa yi. 

Exodus 12:48
Na sɛ ɔhɔho a wabɛtena mo mu pɛ sɛ odi twam no bi ma Awurade a, ma ɔbarima biara a ɔwɔ ne fie ntwa twetia ansa na wabɛn ho sɛ ɔrebedi bi. Ma ɔnyɛ sɛ okuromanni. Nanso obiara a ontwaa twetia nnni bi. 

Exodus 12:49
Mmara koro no ara na ɛwɔ hɔ ma okuromanni ne ɔhɔho a wabɛtena mo mu.”

Exodus 12:5
Oguammaa a onni dɛm na momfa, onini a wadi afe wɔ nguanten anaa mmirekyi mu.

Exodus 12:50
Enti Israelfo nyinaa yɛɛ nea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose ne Aaron no. Wɔyɛɛ saa pɛpɛɛpɛ. 

Exodus 12:51
Na da no ara Awurade yii Israelfo ne wɔn asafo fii Egypt asase so.

Exodus 12:6
Momfa aboa no nsie nkosi ɔsram yi da a ɛto so dunan, na Israel asafo mu no nyinaa nkum no anwummere. 

Exodus 12:7
Na ofie biara a wɔbɛwe wom no, wɔmfa mogya no bi nyɛ apongua abien no ho ne ɔpon no atifi.

Exodus 12:8
“‘Wɔnwe nam no anadwo no ara. Wɔmfa ogya ntoto na wɔmfa nka paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim ne ɛfan nwenenwene ho nni. 

Exodus 12:9
Monnwe no amono na mommfa nsu nnnoa, na mmom momfa ogya ntoto, ne ti ne ne nnyawa ne n’ayamde nyinaa. 

Exodus 13:1
 Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: 

Exodus 13:10
Na afe biara, bere no du a, kae na di saa ahyɛde yi so.

Exodus 13:11
“Afei sɛ Awurade de wo du Kanaanfo asase so, sɛnea waka wo ne w’agyanom ntam no, na ɔde ma wo a, 

Exodus 13:12
fa ɔbarima biara a obue yafunu ano no ma Awurade, ne wo mmoa mmakan nso. Anini no yɛ Awurade dea. 

Exodus 13:13
Afurum ba a odi kan de, fa oguan sesa, anyɛ saa a bu ne kɔn mu. Na wo babarima biara a ɔyɛ abakan de, tɔ no.

Exodus 13:14
“Na sɛ akyiri yi wo ba bisa wo sɛ, ‘Eyi kyerɛ dɛn?’ a, ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Awurade de nsa a ɛyɛ den na eyii yɛn fii Egypt nkoafie. 

Exodus 13:15
Na Farao pirim ne koma kae sɛ ɔremma yɛnkɔ, enti Awurade kum abakan biara a ɔwɔ Egypt asase so, efi onipa so kosi aboa so. Ɛno nti na mede anini a ebue yafunu ano nyinaa bɔ afɔre ma Awurade no, nanso m’abakan biara de, metɔ no.’ 

Exodus 13:16
Ma ɛnyɛ sɛ sɛnkyerɛnne a ɛkyekyere wo nsa ne nkaede a ɛwɔ w’aniwa ntam, efisɛ nsa a ɛyɛ den na Awurade de yii yɛn fii Egypt.”

Exodus 13:17
Na bere a Farao maa wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnkɔ no, Onyankopɔn amfa wɔn amfa Filistifo asase so, ɛwom sɛ na ɛhɔ yɛ tiaa de, efisɛ Onyankopɔn kae sɛ: “Sɛ ɔko bi si a, nkurɔfo no benu wɔn ho sɛ wɔbae, na wɔbɛsan akɔ Egypt.” 

Exodus 13:18
Enti Onyankopɔn ma wɔkɔnwonwan faa sare so wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no ho. Nso bere a na Israelfo no fi Egypt reba nyinaa, na wɔahyehyɛ wɔn ho sɛ asafodɔm. 

Exodus 13:19
Na Mose faa Yosef nnompe kaa ne ho, efisɛ na wama Israelfo no aka ntam, na ɔkae sɛ: “Onyankopɔn bɛdan n’ani aba mo so. Na monhwɛ sɛ mode me nnompe bɛka mo ho afi ha akɔ.” 

Exodus 13:2
“Ɔbarima biara a obebue yafunu ano wɔ Israel, ne aboa nini biara a odi kan no, hyira so ma me. Ɛyɛ me dea.”

Exodus 13:20
Afei wofii Sukot kɔsoɛɛ Etarm, wɔ sare no ano.

Exodus 13:21
Awurade dii wɔn anim kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan. Ɔnam omununkum dum mu kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan awia, na ɔnam ogya dum mu maa wɔn hann anadwo, na ɛma wɔnantew awia ne anadwo. 

Exodus 13:22
Na omununkum dum no amfi wɔn anim awia, na ogya dum no nso amfi wɔn anim anadwo.

Exodus 13:3
Na Mose ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Monkae da yi a woyii mo fii Egypt nkoafie no, efisɛ Awurade de nsa a ɛyɛ den na eyii mo fii ha. Enti munnni biara a mmɔkaw wom. 

Exodus 13:4
Morefi ha nnɛ wɔ ɔsram Abib mu. 

Exodus 13:5
Na sɛ Awurade de wo du Kanaanfo ne Hitifo ne Amorifo ne Hiwifo ne Yebusifo asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen wɔ so a ɔkaa w’agyanom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wo no so a, yɛ saa amanne yi wɔ ɔsram yi mu. 

Exodus 13:6
Di paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim nnanson, na da a ɛto so ason no yɛ Awurade afahyɛ. 

Exodus 13:7
Enti di paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim nnanson; na ɛnsɛ sɛ wohu biribiara a mmɔkaw wom wɔ wo ho wɔ w’asase so baabiara. 

Exodus 13:8
Saa da no, ka kyerɛ wo ba sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade yɛ maa me bere a mifii Egypt no nti na mereyɛ eyi.’ 

Exodus 13:9
Ma ɛnyɛ sɛ sɛnkyerɛnne a ɛkyekyere wo nsa ne nkaede a ɛwɔ w’aniwa ntam na ama Awurade mmara aka w’anom, efisɛ nsa a ɛyɛ den na Awurade de yii wo fii Egypt. 

Exodus 14:1
 Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: 

Exodus 14:10
Na Farao bɛnee no, Israelfo no momaa wɔn ani so, na hwɛ, na Egyptfo di wɔn akyi reba. Na Israelfo no suroe pii, na wosu frɛɛ Awurade.

Exodus 14:11
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Amusiei biara nni Egypt nti na wode yɛn aba sɛ yemmewuwu wɔ sare so ha yi? Dɛn nti koraa na wuyii yɛn fii Egypt baa ha? 

Exodus 14:12
Yɛanka ankyerɛ wo wɔ Egypt sɛ, ‘Gyae ma yɛnsom Egyptfo no’? Anka eye sɛ yɛbɛsom Egyptfo no mmom sen sɛ yebewuwu wɔ sare so.” 

Exodus 14:13
Ɛnna Mose ka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo no sɛ: “Munnsuro. Munnyina pintinn na monhwɛ sɛnea Awurade begye mo nkwa nnɛ. Na Egyptfo a muhu wɔn nnɛ yi, morenhu wɔn bio da. 

Exodus 14:14
Awurade bɛko ama mo, na mo de, monyɛ komm!”

Exodus 14:15
Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Adɛn nti na wusu frɛ me? Ka kyerɛ Israelfo no sɛ wɔnkɔ wɔn anim.

Exodus 14:16
Na fa wo poma no kyerɛ po no so ma emu mpae, na Israelfo no nnantew asase kesee so mfa po no mfinimfini. 

Exodus 14:17
Na mɛma Egyptfo no apirim wɔn koma na wɔatiw Israelfo no, na mede Farao ne n’asraafodɔm, ne ne nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo bɛhyɛ me ho anuonyam. 

Exodus 14:18
Na sɛ mede Farao ne ne nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo hyɛ me ho anuonyam a, Egyptfo no behu sɛ mene Awurade.”

Exodus 14:19
Afei Nyankopɔn bɔfo a na odi Israel asafo no anim no bedii wɔn akyi, na omununkum dum no nso fii wɔn anim bedii wɔn akyi. 

Exodus 14:2
“Ka kyerɛ Israelfo no sɛ wɔnsan wɔn akyi mmɛsoɛ wɔ Pihahirot anim, Migdol ne po no ntam. Na wɔmfa wɔn ani nkyerɛ Baal-Sefon wɔ po no ho. 

Exodus 14:20
Enti ebedii Egyptfo asafo ne Israelfo dɔm ntam. Ɔfa bi no na ɛyɛ omununkum ne sum, na ɔfa nohoa nso, na ɛma hann anadwo. Na Egyptfo no anto Israelfo no anadwo no nyinaa.

Exodus 14:21
Afei Mose de ne poma no kyerɛɛ po no so na Awurade maa apuei mframa dennen bɔe anadwo no nyinaa, na epiaa nsu no kɔɔ akyi maa po no ase dan asase kesee. Na nsu no mu paee abien. 

Exodus 14:22
Enti Israelfo no faa asase a awo no so wɔ po no mfinimfini, na nsu no bɛyɛɛ ɔfasu wɔ wɔn nifa ne wɔn benkum. 

Exodus 14:23
Na Egyptfo nyinaa, Farao apɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo nyinaa, tiw wɔn koduu po no mfinimfini. 

Exodus 14:24
Eduu ahemadakye no Awurade fi ogya ne omununkum dum no mu hwɛɛ Egyptfo dɔm no na ɔmaa wɔn ani so tan wɔn. 

Exodus 14:25
Afei otutuu wɔn nteaseɛnam no anan na ɛyɛɛ den maa wɔn sɛ wɔbɛkɔ, na Egyptfo no kae sɛ: “Momma yenguan mfi Israelfo no anim, efisɛ Awurade ne Egyptfo reko ama wɔn.”

Exodus 14:26
Akyiri yi Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Teɛ wo nsa wɔ po no so na nsu no mmu mfa Egyptfo ne wɔn nteaseɛnam ne wɔn apɔnkɔsotefo nyinaa so.” 

Exodus 14:27
Ɛhɔ ara na Mose teɛɛ ne nsa wɔ po no so, na ɛrekɔ anɔpa no, nsu no san baa baabi a na ɛwɔ. Afei Egyptfo no fii ase sɛ wɔreguan, nanso Awurade kaa wɔn guu po no mfinimfini. 

Exodus 14:28
Enti nsu no bae ara bɛkataa Farao nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo ne n’asraafodɔm a wotiw Israelfo kɔɔ po no mu nyinaa so. Wɔn mu biako mpo anka.

Exodus 14:29
Nanso Israelfo no faa asase kesee so wɔ po no mfinimfini, na nsu no yɛe sɛ ɔfasu wɔ wɔn nifa ne wɔn benkum. 

Exodus 14:3
Na Farao bɛka sɛ, ‘Israelfo no ayera ma wɔn ani so atan wɔn wɔ asase no so. Sare no aka wɔn ahyem.’ 

Exodus 14:30
Enti saa da no Awurade gyee Israel fii Egyptfo no nsam, na Israel hui sɛ Egyptfo no awuwu gu po no ano. 

Exodus 14:31
Bere a Israelfo huu nsa kɛse a Awurade de adwerɛw Egyptfo no, ɔman no suroo Awurade, na wogyee Awurade ne n’akoa Mose dii.

Exodus 14:4
Na mɛma Farao koma apirim na obetiw wɔn, na mede Farao ne n’asraafodɔm bɛhyɛ me ho anuonyam na Egyptfo ahu sɛ mene Awurade.” Enti wɔyɛɛ saa pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Exodus 14:5
Akyiri yi Egypt hene tee sɛ nkurɔfo no aguan. Ɛhɔ ara na Farao ne ne nkoa sesaa wɔn adwene wɔ Israelfo no ho, na wɔkae sɛ: “Dɛn koraa na yɛayɛ yi? Yɛama Israelfo kɔ yi, hena na ɔbɛsom yɛn?” 

Exodus 14:6
Enti ɔhyehyɛɛ ne nteaseɛnam, na ɔfaa ne dɔm kaa ne ho. 

Exodus 14:7
Ɔfaa ne nteaseɛnam atitiriw no ahansia, na ɔde Egypt nteaseɛnam a aka nyinaa kaa ho, na ɔpaw akofo a wɔbɛtena ebiara mu. 

Exodus 14:8
Na Awurade maa Egypt hene Farao pirim ne koma, enti bere a Israelfo no de ahosɛpɛw rekɔ no, otiw wɔn. 

Exodus 14:9
Egyptfo no tiw wɔn, na Farao nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔ ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo ne n’asraafodɔm nyinaa bɛn wɔn pɛɛ; saa bere no na Israelfo no asoɛ wɔ po no ho, wɔ Pihahirot, Baal-Sefon anim.

Exodus 15:1
 Afei Mose ne Israelfo no fii ase too dwom yi de kamfoo Awurade sɛ:

Exodus 15:10
Afei wuguu ahome, na po kataa wɔn so;

Exodus 15:11
Anyame mu hena na ɔte sɛ wo, O Awurade?

Exodus 15:12
Woteɛɛ wo nsa nifa, na asase menee wɔn.

Exodus 15:13
 Wode w’adɔe gyaa ɔman a woagye wɔn yi, 

Exodus 15:14
  Aman bɛte na wɔbɛbɔ hu; Awo yaw beso Filistifo mu denneennen.

Exodus 15:15
Awosoawosow bɛtew agu Edom mpanyimfo so;

Exodus 15:16
Ehu bɛma wɔn ho awosow biribiri.

Exodus 15:17
Wode wɔn bɛba abedua wo bepɔw so, w’agyapade so,

Exodus 15:18
Awurade bedi hene daapem.

Exodus 15:19
Bere a Farao apɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnam ne n’apɔnkɔsotefo no kɔɔ po no mu no,

Exodus 15:2
Yah ne m’ahoɔden ne me tumi, ɔne me nkwagye.

Exodus 15:20
Afei odiyifobea Miriam a ɔyɛ Aaron nua no faa mpintin kurae, na mmea no nyinaa de mpintin ne asaw dii n’akyi. 

Exodus 15:21
Na Miriam gyee mmarima no so sɛ:

Exodus 15:22
Akyiri yi Mose maa Israelfo no fii Po Kɔkɔɔ no ho kɔɔ Sur sare so na wotwaa kwan nnansa wɔ sare no so, nanso wɔannya nsu. 

Exodus 15:23
Afei wobeduu Mara, nanso na ɛhɔ nsu no yɛ nwene, enti wɔantumi anom. Ɛno nti na ɔfrɛɛ hɔ Mara no. 

Exodus 15:24
Na nkurɔfo no fii ase nwiinwii hyɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Dɛn na yɛbɛnom?” 

Exodus 15:25
Enti osu frɛɛ Awurade. Na Awurade kyerɛɛ no dua bi, na ɔde too nsu no mu ma ɛyɛɛ dɛ.

Exodus 15:26
Na ɔtoaa so kae sɛ: “Sɛ wowɛn w’aso tie Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na woyɛ nea ɛteɛ wɔ n’ani so, na wutie ne mmara di n’ahyɛde nyinaa so a, meremfa ɔyare a mede baa Egyptfo so no biara mma wo so, efisɛ me Awurade na meresa wo yare.”

Exodus 15:27
Afei wobeduu Elim, na na asuti dumien ne mmedua aduɔson wɔ hɔ. Enti wɔsoɛɛ nsu no ho.

Exodus 15:3
Awurade yɛ ɔko mu dɔmmarima. Ne din ne Awurade.

Exodus 15:4
Farao nteaseɛnam ne n’asraafodɔm nyinaa, waka wɔn agu po mu,

Exodus 15:5
 Ebun akata wɔn so, wɔamem kɔ ase tɔnn sɛ ɔbo.  

Exodus 15:6
Awurade, tumi ahyɛ wo nsa nifa anuonyam,

Exodus 15:7
W’anuonyam kɛse mu na wode wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo hwe fam;

Exodus 15:8
Wo hwene mu huruhuro kaa nsu boaa ano;

Exodus 15:9
Ɔtamfo no kae sɛ, ‘Metiw wɔn; mɛto wɔn!

Exodus 16:1
 Akyiri yi wotu fii Elim, na Israel asafo no nyinaa baa Sin sare a ɛda Elim ne Sinai ntam no so. Ɛno yɛ bere a wofii Egypt no akyi ɔsram a ɛto so abien no da a ɛto so dunum.

Exodus 16:10
Bere a Aaron kasa kyerɛɛ Israel asafo no nyinaa wiei no, wɔdan wɔn ani kyerɛɛ sare no so, na Awurade anuonyam puei wɔ omununkum no mu.

Exodus 16:11
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: 

Exodus 16:12
“Mate Israelfo anwiinwii no, na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Anwummere mobɛwe nam na anɔpa moadi aduan amee, na moahu sɛ mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn.’”

Exodus 16:13
Eduu anwummere no nkokɔhwerew bae bɛkataa nsraban no so, na anɔpa no obosu bɛkataa nsraban no ho nyinaa hyiae. 

Exodus 16:14
Akyiri yi obosu no kɔe; afei na ade nkorowankorowa nketenkete bi gugu sare no so te sɛ asukɔtweaa.

Exodus 16:15
Bere a Israelfo no hui no, wobisabisaa wɔn ho sɛ: “Dɛn ni?” Na wonnim ade ko. Enti Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Ɛyɛ aduan a Awurade de ama mo sɛ munni. 

Exodus 16:16
Ahyɛde a Awurade de ama ne sɛ, ‘Obiara mfa nea obetumi adi. Monhwɛ akra a wɔwɔ mo ntamadan mu na munhu dodow a mobɛfa, obiara omer biako.’” 

Exodus 16:17
Israelfo no yɛɛ saa; ebinom faa pii na ebinom nso faa kakraa bi. 

Exodus 16:18
Na wɔde omer susuw no, nea ɔfaa pii no annya ammoro so, na nea ɔfaa kakraa bi no de antɔ sin. Obiara faa nea obetumi adi.

Exodus 16:19
Afei Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Obiara nnnyaw bi mmma ade nnkye so.” 

Exodus 16:2
Afei Israel asafo no nyinaa fii ase nwiinwii hyɛɛ Mose ne Aaron wɔ sare no so. 

Exodus 16:20
Nanso wɔantie Mose. Ebinom gyaw bi ma ade kyee so, na ɛdɔɔ mmoawa ma ɛbɔnee, enti Mose bo fuw wɔn. 

Exodus 16:21
Anɔpa biara obiara kɔfa nea obetumi adi. Na sɛ owia ano yɛ den a, na anan.

Exodus 16:22
Na da a ɛto so asia no wɔfaa aduan no mmɔho abien, obiara de omer abien. Enti asafo no mu mpanyimfo nyinaa bɛbɔɔ Mose amanneɛ. 

Exodus 16:23
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Nea Awurade aka ni: Ɔkyena yɛ homeda, homeda kronkron ma Awurade. Nea mobɛtono monto, nea mobɛnoa nso monnoa. Na nea ɛbɛka no momfa nsie nkosi anɔpa.” 

Exodus 16:24
Enti wɔde siei kosii anɔpa, sɛnea Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no; na ammɔn na annɔ mmoawa nso. 

Exodus 16:25
Ɛnna Mose kae sɛ: “Munni no nnɛ, efisɛ nnɛ yɛ homeda ma Awurade. Ɛnnɛ de, morennya bi wɔ sare no so. 

Exodus 16:26
Momfa no nnansia, na da a ɛto so ason no de, ebi rentɔ, efisɛ ɛyɛ homeda.” 

Exodus 16:27
Na ɛbae sɛ da a ɛto so ason no ebinom kɔe sɛ wɔrekɔfa bi, nanso wɔannya bi.

Exodus 16:28
Ɛnna Awurade bisaa Mose sɛ: “Mubebu m’ahyɛde ne me mmara so akosi da bɛn? 

Exodus 16:29
Monhyɛ no nsow sɛ Awurade ama mo homeda. Ɛno nti na da a ɛto so asia no wama mo nnanu aduan no. Enti da a ɛto so ason no, obiara ntena ne fie, obiara mmfi adi.” 

Exodus 16:3
Na Israelfo no kae sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade kunkum yɛn wɔ Egypt asase so bere a yɛredidi na yɛte kwansɛn ho rewe nam mpo a, anka eye sen sɛ mode yɛn aba sare yi so sɛ ɔkɔm mmekunkum asafo mu yi nyinaa.”

Exodus 16:30
Enti ɔman no homee da a ɛto so ason no.

Exodus 16:31
Na Israelfo no frɛɛ aduan no “mana.” Na ɛte sɛ yisa aba fitaa, na ne dɛ te sɛ tetare a ɛwo wom. 

Exodus 16:32
Afei Mose kae sɛ: “Awurade ahyɛ sɛ, ‘Momfa ebi nhyɛ omer ma na monkora so mo awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu, na wɔahu aduan a mema mudii wɔ sare so bere a miyii mo fii Egypt asase so no.’” 

Exodus 16:33
Na Mose ka kyerɛɛ Aaron sɛ: “Fa kuruwa na hyɛ mana omer biako gu mu na fa si Awurade anim, na monkora so mo awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.” 

Exodus 16:34
Sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose no, Aaron de kosii Adanse no anim koraa so. 

Exodus 16:35
Enti Israelfo no dii mana mfe aduanan kosii sɛ woduu asase a nnipa te so so. Mana na wodi kosii sɛ woduu Kanaan hye so. 

Exodus 16:36
Na omer yɛ efa susude nkyem du mu biako.

Exodus 16:4
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Mɛma aduan atɔ afi soro ama mo, na obiara mfi adi nkɔfa nea ɛbɛso no da koro, na mede bɛsɔ wɔn ahwɛ sɛ wobedi me mmara so anaa wɔrenni so. 

Exodus 16:5
Na da a ɛto so asia no wɔmfa nea wɔfa daa no mmɔho abien na wonsiesie.”

Exodus 16:6
Enti Mose ne Aaron ka kyerɛɛ Israelfo no nyinaa sɛ: “Anwummere mubehu sɛ Awurade na oyii mo fii Egypt asase so. 

Exodus 16:7
Na anɔpa mubehu Awurade anuonyam, efisɛ Awurade ate anwiinwii a munwiinwii hyɛ no no. Na yɛn de, yɛne hena a munwiinwii hyɛ yɛn?” 

Exodus 16:8
 Na Mose toaa so sɛ: “Anwummere Awurade bɛma mo nam awe na anɔpa nso wama mo aduan adi amee, efisɛ Awurade ate anwiinwii a munwiinwii hyɛ no no. Yɛn de yɛyɛ dɛn? Awurade na munwiinwii hyɛ no na ɛnyɛ yɛn.”

Exodus 16:9
Na Mose ka kyerɛɛ Aaron sɛ: “Ka kyerɛ Israel asafo no sɛ, ‘Mommra Awurade anim, efisɛ wate mo anwiinwii no.’” 

Exodus 17:1
