Na awiabere a ahohuru wom no, wobenya asese ase onwini, na ɔprannaa ne osutɔ bere mu no, wɔanya guankɔbea ne hintabea.

Yesaia 40:1
“Monkyekye, monkyekye me man werɛ,” mo Nyankopɔn na ose.

Yesaia 40:10
Hwɛ, Awurade Nyankopɔn de tumi bɛba, na ne basa bedi nim ama no. Hwɛ, n’akatua ka no ho, na n’ananmuhyɛ di n’anim.

Yesaia 40:11
Ɔbɛyɛn ne nguankuw sɛ oguanhwɛfo, obeturu nguammaa ne basa so, na wasoa wɔn ne kokom; nguan mmaatan no, ɔbɛka wɔn brɛoo.

Yesaia 40:12
Hena na osusuw nsu wɔ ne nsayam, na ɔto ɔsoro saama, na ɔde susukora susuw asase so mfutuma, na ɔde nsenia kari mmepɔw ne abrammo kari nkoko? 

Yesaia 40:13
Hena na ɔteɛ Awurade honhom so, na ɔfotufo bɛn na ɔma ohu ade? 

Yesaia 40:14
Hena na ɔne no atu agyina na wama wate biribi ase, anaa ɔkyerɛɛ no atɛntrenee kwan? Hena na ɔkyerɛɛ no nimdeɛ anaa ɔmaa ohu ntease kwan?

Yesaia 40:15
Hwɛ, amanaman te sɛ bokiti mu nsukoko a ɛresosɔ, na obu wɔn sɛ nsenia so mfutuma bi kɛkɛ. Hwɛ, ɔmoma nsupɔw so sɛ mfutuma muhumuhu. 

Yesaia 40:16
Lebanon nnua nyinaa mpo nnɔɔso mma hyew, na ne mmoadoma renso ɔhyew afɔre.

Yesaia 40:17
Aman nyinaa te sɛ biribi a enni hɔ wɔ n’anim; obu wɔn sɛ adehunu bi a ɛmmae da.

Yesaia 40:18
 Na hena ho na mode Onyankopɔn bɛto, na suban bɛn na mode besusuw no?

Yesaia 40:19
Ohoni de, odwumfo na ɔgu, na sikadwumfo de sika adura ho, na ɔde dwetɛ ntweaban gugu ho. 

Yesaia 40:2
“Monka abodwoesɛm nkyerɛ Yerusalem, na mommɔ no kaseɛ sɛ n’akode asa, sɛ wɔde ne mfomso akyɛ, sɛ ne bɔne nyinaa ho wanya Awurade nsam mmɔho.”

Yesaia 40:20
Nea ayɛyɛde abɔ no no
paw dua a ɛmporɔw; na ɔhwehwɛ odwumfo a ne ho akokwaw wasen ohoni a enhinhim.

Yesaia 40:21
Munhui? Montee? Womfii mfiase nka nkyerɛɛ mo? Efi asase nnyinaso so, montee biribiara asase ase?

Yesaia 40:22
Ɔno na ɔte asase kɔntɔnkrɔn so, na ɛsotefo te sɛ mmoadabi; ɔno na ɔtwe soro mu sɛ ntontantam, na ɔtrɛw mu sɛ ntomadan a wɔtra mu.

Yesaia 40:23
Ɔno na ɔbrɛ abirɛmpɔn ase ma wɔba fam koraa a wɔnsɛ hwee, ɔdan asase so atemmufo sɛ ahuhude.

Yesaia 40:24
Sɛ wonya tɛw wɔn, na wodua wɔn, na wonya nya ntini wɔ asase mu, na ohuw mframa gu wɔn so ara pɛ a, na wɔakisa, na ahum soa wɔn kɔ te sɛ ntɛtɛwa.

Yesaia 40:25
“Hena ho na mode me bɛto na me ne no asɛ?” Ɔkronkronni no na ose.

Yesaia 40:26
“Momma mo ani so nhwɛ soro, na monhwɛ nea ɔbɔɔ eyinom! Ɔno na obu wɔn dɔm ano yi wɔn adi, na ɔbobɔ wɔn nyinaa din frɛfrɛ wɔn. Na n’ahoɔden dodow ne ne tumi mmoroso nti, wɔn mu biako mpo nyera.

Yesaia 40:27
 Ɛdɛn nti na, Yakob, woka, na Israel, wokasa sɛ: “ ‘Me kwan ahuntaw Awurade, na me Nyankopɔn abu n’ani agu m’atemmu so?

Yesaia 40:28
Wunhui? Wontee? Sɛ Awurade a ɔbɔɔ asase ano nohoa no yɛ daa Nyankopɔn. Ɔmmrɛ na ɔmpa abaw; ne nhumu mu nni ahwehwɛyɛ.

Yesaia 40:29
Ɔno na ɔma nea wabrɛ otumi, na ɔma nea onni home ahoɔden dɔɔso.

Yesaia 40:3
 Obi nne reteɛm wɔ sare so sɛ: “Mommɔ Awurade kwan, momma yɛn Nyankopɔn tempɔn nteɛ wɔ anhwea paradada so.

Yesaia 40:30
 Mmerante mpo brɛ, na wɔpa abaw,
na nkwankwaa hwehwe ase,

Yesaia 40:31
nanso wɔn a wɔtwɛn Awurade no benya ahoɔden foforo, wɔde ntaban betu sɛ akɔre, wobetu mmirika, na wɔmpa abaw, wɔbɛnantew, na wɔmmrɛ.”

Yesaia 40:4
Momma abon nyinaa so, na mommrɛ mmepɔw ne nkoko nyinaa ase. Na nea ayɛ afuafu no nyɛ asasetamaa na abonkyiabonkyi nyɛ toromtorom. 

Yesaia 40:5
 

Yesaia 40:6
Ɛnne bi se: “Teɛm!” Na obisae sɛ: “Menteɛm nka dɛn?” “Ɔhonam nyinaa te sɛ wura, na n'ahoɔfɛw nyinaa te sɛ wuram nhwiren.

Yesaia 40:7
Wura guan, na nhwiren twam, efisɛ Awurade ahome huw fa so. Ampa ara ɔman no yɛ wura. 

Yesaia 40:8
Wura guan, na nhwiren twam, nanso yɛn Nyankopɔn asɛm de, etim hɔ daa.”

Yesaia 40:9
O Ɔsɛmpakafo Sion, foro kɔ bepɔw tenten so. O Ɔsɛmpakafo Yerusalem, ma wo nne so ahoɔden so. Ma so, nsuro. Ka kyerɛ Yuda nkurow sɛ: “Hwɛ, Nyankopɔn ni.” 

Yesaia 41:1
“Nsuano aman, monyɛ komm ntie me; na amanaman nnya ahoɔden foforo. Ma wɔmmra mmɛkasa, momma yemmom nhyia asenni.

Yesaia 41:10
Nsuro, na me ne wo wɔ hɔ, mma wo bo nntu, na mene wo Nyankopɔn, yiw, mɛhyɛ wo den, meboa wo. Mede me trenee nsa nifa bekura wo mu.

Yesaia 41:11
“Hwɛ, wɔn a wɔn bo ahuru wo nyinaa ani bewu na wɔasopa, na nnipa a wɔne wo anya no bɛyɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ hwee, na wɔayera.

Yesaia 41:12
Wɔn a wɔne wo ham no, wobɛhwehwɛ wɔn, nanso worenhu wɔn; na wɔn a wɔne wo di ako no bɛyɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ hwee, na wɔasa.

Yesaia 41:13
 Na me Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, mikura wo nsa nifa mu; me na mise wo sɛ: ‘Nsuro, me ara mɛboa wo.’

Yesaia 41:14
“Nsuro, aboawa Yakob, Israel mmarima. M’ankasa mɛboa mo,” Awurade na ose, na mo Gyefo ne Israel Kronkronni no.

Yesaia 41:15
“Hwɛ, mede wo bɛyɛ ɔporow afiri nnamnnam, foforo, anofanu, na woaporow mmepɔw ayam wɔn dukuduku, na woayɛ nkokoɔ sɛ ntɛtɛwa.

Yesaia 41:16
Wobɛhuw wɔn so, na mframa asoa akɔ, na ahum abɔ apete. Na wo de, wubedi Awurade mu ahurusi de Israel Kronkronni no ahyehye wo ho.”

Yesaia 41:17
“Mmɔborɔfo ne ahiafo hwehwɛ nsu, nanso ebi nni hɔ. Osukɔm nti wɔn tɛkrɛma so awo. Nanso me Awurade, megye wɔn so. Me, Israel Nyankopɔn, merennyaw wɔn. 

Yesaia 41:18
Mɛma nsu atue mpampa peredee so, na nsuwansuwa atue abon mu. Mɛma sare so adan ɔtare na asase kesee adan asuti. 

Yesaia 41:19
Mɛma kyeneduru, ɔkanto, ohuadua, ne ngodua anyin wɔ sare so. Na mɛma ɔpopaw, ɔsɛsɛ ne kwabɔhɔrɔ dua abom asisi sare so,

Yesaia 41:2
“Hena na wɔnyanee obi fii apuei no? Hena na ɔnam trenee mu frɛɛ no baa ne nan ase? Hena na ɔde amanaman guu n’anim, na ɔde ahene hyɛɛ n’ase? Hena na ɔde wɔn maa no sɛ mfutuma wɔ ne nkrantɛ ano, na wɔbɔɔ wɔn petee sɛ ntɛtɛwa wɔ agyan ano yi?

Yesaia 41:20
 na nnipa ahu, ate ase, de asie koma mu na wonnwen ho prɛko sɛ: Awurade nsa na ɛyɛɛ eyinom, na Israel Kronkronni no na ɔbɔe.”

Yesaia 41:21
“Momfa mo asɛm mmɛto gua,” Awurade na ose. “mommɛkyerɛ mo nsɛm ase” Yakob hene na ose.

Yesaia 41:22
“Wɔmfa mmra mmɛkyerɛ yɛn nea ɛbɛba. Monkyerɛ yɛn kan nneɛma no sɛ ɛte, na yennwennwen ho na yenhu nea ɛbɛba daakye. Anna nea ɛbɛba no, momma yɛnte. 

Yesaia 41:23
Monka nea ɛbɛba daakye no nkyerɛ yɛn na yenhu sɛ moyɛ anyame ampa; yiw, monyɛ papa anaa bɔne na yɛn ho nnwiriw yɛn na yensuro.

Yesaia 41:24
Hwɛ, monyɛ hwee, na mo nneyɛe yɛ adehuhuw; akyide ne nea ɔfa mo.

Yesaia 41:25
“Manyan obi afi atifi fam, na ɔbɛba. Ofi owiapuei bɛbɔ me din. Na ɔbɛba asoafo so te sɛ dɔte, te sɛ ɔnwemfo a ɔwɔw dɔte.

Yesaia 41:26
“Hena na ofi mfiase kae, na anka yenhu, anaasɛ waka ato hɔ na yɛbɛka sɛ ‘Ɔyɛ ɔnokwafo’? Ampa ara obiara nni hɔ a ɔka biribi, obiara nni hɔ a ɔma ɔte biribi, na obiara nso nni hɔ a ɔte mo nsɛm.”

Yesaia 41:27
Me na midii kan ka kyerɛɛ Sion sɛ: Hwɛ, wɔn ni: Na Yerusalem na mema no ɔsɛmpakafoɔ.

Yesaia 41:28
Na mehwɛe, na obiara nni hɔ, na wɔn mu nso, ɔfotufo nni hɔ a mibisa a, anka obebua me.

Yesaia 41:29
Hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa yɛ ɔkwa, wɔn nneyɛe nyɛ hwee; wɔn dade ahoni yɛ mframa ne ahuhude.

Yesaia 41:3
Hena na otiw wɔn na otwam sɔnn faa ɔkwan a ne nan nsii so da so? 

Yesaia 41:4
Hena na ɔyɛe, na ɔma ɛbae, na ɔfrɛ awo ntoatoaso fi mfiase? “Me Awurade, mene Odikanfo; na akyikafo mu nso; mene ɔno ara.”

Yesaia 41:5
Nsuano aman hui na wosuroe. Asase awiei ho popoe. Wotwiw bɛnee na wɔbae. 

Yesaia 41:6
Obiara boaa ne yɔnko, na oyi ka kyerɛɛ ne nua sɛ: “Hyɛ wo ho den.” 

Yesaia 41:7
Odwumfo hyɛ sikadwumfo den, nea ɔde asae tonomtonom ho yɛ nea ɔbɔ atommo so saa ara, na nea wɔasosɔ abom no nso, ɔka ho asɛm sɛ: “Ayɛ yiye.” na ɔde nnadewa bobɔ mu na antu.

Yesaia 41:8
“Na wo, m’akoa Israel, Yakob a mapaw no, m’adamfo Abraham asefo.

Yesaia 41:9
Wo a mefaa wo fii asase ano nohoa bae, na mefrɛɛ wo fii n’ahye so. Na meka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ, ‘M’akoa ne wo, wo na mapaw wo, na merento wo nkyene!

Yesaia 42:1
 Hwɛ, m’akoa a mehyɛ no mpamden ni, nea mapaw no a me kra ani sɔ no! Mede me honhom ahyɛ ne mu, na ɔde atɛntrenee bɛbrɛ amanaman no. 

Yesaia 42:10
Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade, mumfi asase ano nto n’ayeyi dwom; mo a mokɔ ɛpo ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa ase, nsuano aman ne mo a motete so. 

Yesaia 42:11
 Sare so ne ɛso nkurow mma wɔn nne so, nkurowa a Kedar te so no. Ma wɔn a wɔte Sela nto ahurusi dwom, wɔmfi mmepɔw atifi nteɛm denneennen. 

Yesaia 42:12
 Ma wɔnhyɛ Awurade anuonyam, na wɔnka n’ayeyi nsu ano aman mu.

Yesaia 42:13
Awurade befi adi sɛ dɔmmarima, ɔbɛhwanyan n’abufuw mu sɛ ɔkofoni. Ɔbɛteɛm, ɔbɛbɔ ose; yiw, obedi n’atamfo so abaninsɛm.

Yesaia 42:14
“Mifi muaa m’ano akyɛ, mayɛ komm, asianka me ho. Afei mɛbom sɛ ɔbea a ɔrewo, na mɛhome hahyeehahyee na magu ahome prɛko. 

Yesaia 42:15
Mɛma mmepɔw ne nkokoɔ atwintwam, na mɛma ɛso nhaban nyinaa ahyew. Mɛma nsubɔnten adan nsupɔw na ntade ayoyow. 

Yesaia 42:16
Na megya anifuraefo wɔ ɔkwan a wonnim mu so, mɛma wɔanantew atempɔn a wɔmfaa so da so. Mɛma sum ayɛ hann wɔ wɔn anim, na nea ɛhɔ yɛ abonkyiabonkyi adan asasetamaa. Eyi na mɛyɛ ama wɔn, na merennyaw wɔn.”

Yesaia 42:17
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ahoni a wɔasen so, wɔn a wɔka kyerɛ ahoni a wɔagu sɛ: “Mone yɛn anyame” no, wɔbɛsan wɔn akyi, na wɔn ani bewu.

Yesaia 42:18
Asotifo, muntie; anifuraefo, monhwɛ na munhu. 

Yesaia 42:19
Hena na n’ani afura sɛ m’akoa, na hena na n’aso asiw sɛ me bɔfo a mesoma no? Hena na n’ani afura sɛ nea ɔyɛ pɛ, anaa n’ani afura sɛ Awurade akoa? 

Yesaia 42:2
Ɔrenteɛm na ɔremma ne nne so, na ɔremma obiara nte ne nne wɔ abɔnten so. 

Yesaia 42:20
Ɔhu nneɛma pii, nanso ɔnhwɛ. Wɔabue n’aso, nso ɔnte asɛm.

Yesaia 42:21
Awurade ani sɔɔ ne trenee nti, sɛ ɔbɛma mmara no ayɛ kɛse na anya anuonyam.

Yesaia 42:22
Nanso wɔyɛ ɔman a wɔafa wɔn nneɛma, afom wɔn afa; na wɔn nyinaa aka ntokuru mu, na wɔde wɔn aintaw nneduadan mu. Wɔafow wɔn a ɔgyefo nni hɔ, wɔafom wɔn afa a nea ɔbɛka sɛ: Dan ma! nni hɔ.”

Yesaia 42:23
Mo mu hena na ɔbɛyɛ aso atie asɛm yi? Hena na ɔbɛwɛn n’aso atie nea wɔbɛka akyiri yi? 

Yesaia 42:24
Hena na ɔde Yakob maa ɔfom, na ɔde Israel maa afowfo? Ɛnyɛ Awurade a yɛayɛ no bɔne no, na wɔampɛ sɛ wɔnantew n’akwan mu, na wɔantie ne mmara no?

Yesaia 42:25
Enti na ohwiee n’abufuhyew ne nnɔkoe a ano yɛ den no guu ne so, na ɔsɔɔ ne ho gya hyiae, nanso wanhu, na ɛhyew no, nanso wamfa ansie ne komam.

Yesaia 42:3
Ɔremmu demmire a abukaw biara mu, na ɔrennum asaawa biara a ɛrefi wusiw. Ɔde nokwaredi beyi atɛntrenee adi. 

Yesaia 42:4
N’asɛm ano rennwo, na ɔrempa abaw kosi sɛ ɔde atɛntrenee besi asase so, na nsuano aman bɛtwɛn ne mmara.

Yesaia 42:5
Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, nea ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro na ɔtwee mu, nea ɔtrɛw asase ne ɛso nneɛma mu, nea ɔde ahome ma nnipa a wɔte so na ɔde honhom ma wɔn a wɔnam so no se ni: 

Yesaia 42:6
“Me Awurade, na mafrɛ wo trenee mu, na maso wo nsa, na makora wo, na na mede wo ayɛ ɔman apam ne amanaman hann,

Yesaia 42:7
na woabue anifuraefo ani, na woayi apokyerɛfo afi afiase, na woayi wɔn a wɔte sum mu afi nneduadan mu.

Yesaia 42:8
“Mene Awurade; me din ne no. Na meremfa m’anuonyam mma obiara, na m’ayeyi nso, meremfa mma ahoni.

Yesaia 42:9
“Kan nneɛma no, hwɛ, aba mu, na mereka nsɛm foforo. Merema moate ansa na afi adi.”

Yesaia 43:1
Na afei, sɛ Awurade a ɔbɔɔ wo, O Yakob na ɔnwenee wo, O Israel, no ka ni:  “Nsuro na magye wo; mabɔ wo din afrɛ wo, me na wowɔ me.

Yesaia 43:10
Awurade na ose: “Mone m’adansefo, m’akoa a mapaw no, sɛ munhu na munnye me nni, na moahu sɛ me ara mene no. Wɔnnwenee Onyankopɔn bi m’anim, na m’akyi nso, obiara remma.

Yesaia 43:11
Me, mene Awurade, na ogyefo bi nni hɔ sɛ me!”

Yesaia 43:12
Me na maka, na magye nkwa, na mama wɔate, na onyame foforo bi nni mo mu; na mone m’adansefo, Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 43:13
Mene Onyankopɔn, na ef nnɛ nso Mene No, na obiara ntumi nnye mfi me nsam, mɛyɛ ade a hena na ɔbɛdan ani?

Yesaia 43:14
 Sɛ Awurade, mo Gyefo, Israel Kronkronni no se ni: “Mo nti mɛsoma akɔ Babilon, na mabubu adaban nyinaa, na mama Kaldeafo ahurusidi adan adwotwa. 

Yesaia 43:15
Mene Awurade, mo Kronkronni no, Israel Bɔfo no, mo Hene no.”

Yesaia 43:16
Saa na Awurade se, nea ɔma ɛpo mu da ɔkwan na ɔsa da asu a ɛyɛ den mu no,

Yesaia 43:17
nea ɔma nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ, ɛdɔm ne nnɔmmarima fi adi no; “Wɔbɛda fam, na wɔrensɔre bio, wɔsae, wodunnumii sɛ asaawa. ”

Yesaia 43:18
“Monnkae kan nneɛma no, na munnnwen tete nneɛma ho. 

Yesaia 43:19
 Hwɛ, mereyɛ ade foforo bi, afei na ɛrefifi, munhu? Mɛbɔ sare so kwan, mɛma nsubɔnten aba anhwea pradada so.

Yesaia 43:2
Sɛ wutwa nsu a, me ne wo na ɛwɔ hɔ, sɛ wofa asubɔnten mu a, ɛremfa wo nkɔ. Sɛ wonam ogya mu a, ɛrenhyew wo, na ogyaframa renhyew wo.

Yesaia 43:20
 Wuram mmoadoma bɛhyɛ me anuonyam, sakraman ne nsohori, sɛ mama nsu aba sare so na nsubɔnten aba anhwea pradada so, na mede ama me man a mapaw wɔn no anom,

Yesaia 43:21
ɔman a manwene wɔn afa no, na wɔbɛka m’ayeyi akyerɛ.

Yesaia 43:22
“Nanso womfrɛɛ me, O Yakob, na me ho afono wo, O Israel. 

Yesaia 43:23
Womfaa oguan mmɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre mmaa me, na womfaa w’afɔre nhyɛɛ me anuonyam. Menhyɛɛ wo sɛ fa aduan bɛsom me, na mamma woammrɛ aduhuam ho.

Yesaia 43:24
Womfaa wo sika ntɔɔ ahwerew dɛdɛ biara mmaa me, na wommaa w’afɔre srade mmee me. Nanso me mmom na wo bɔne nti, woahyɛ me ama masoa, na wode w’amumɔyɛ ama mabrɛ.

Yesaia 43:25
“Me, me ara, mene nea ɔpopa wo mmarato, me ara me nti, na wo bɔne nso, merenkae.

Yesaia 43:26
Kaakae me; ma yenhyia nni asɛm; ka w’asɛm na di bem. 

Yesaia 43:27
W’agya a odi kan no yɛɛ bɔne, na w’akasamafo afom me. 

Yesaia 43:28
Enti megu kronkronbea hɔ mpanyimfo no ho fi, na mɛyi Yakob ama mmusu, na mama wɔatwa Israel adapaa.

Yesaia 43:3
 Na mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, Israel Kronkronni, wo Gyefo no. Mede Egypt ayɛ agyede ama wo, na mede Etiopia ne Seba asi w’ananmu. 

Yesaia 43:4
Esiane sɛ wosom bo m’ani so nti, w’anim aba nyam, na medɔ wo. Mede nnipa besi w’ananmu, na mede aman asi wo kra ananmu.

Yesaia 43:5
“Nsuro na midi w’akyi. Mede w’asefo befi apuei aba, na mafi atɔe aboa wo ano.

Yesaia 43:6
Mɛka akyerɛ atifi fam sɛ ‘Fa ma!’ Na mɛka akyerɛ anafo fam sɛ ‘Nnye wɔn nka hɔ. Fa me mmabanin fi akyirikyiri bra, ne me mmabea fi asase ano,

Yesaia 43:7
obiara a wɔbɔ Me Din frɛ no, na mebɔɔ no maa m’auonyam, me na menwenee no, yiw, na me na meyɛɛ no’.

Yesaia 43:8
“Fa ɔman a wɔwɔ aniwa nanso wɔyɛ anifuraefo, ne wɔn a wɔwɔ aso nanso wɔyɛ asotifo no bra. 

Yesaia 43:9
Amanaman nyinaa, munhyia faako, na aman horow mmoa ano. Wɔn mu hena na obetumi aka eyi, anaa wɔn mu hena na obetumi ama yɛate kan nneɛma no ho asɛm? Wɔmfa wɔn adansefo mmra na wommu wɔn bem, anaasɛ ma wɔnte na wɔnka sɛ, ‘Ɛyɛ nokware!’”

Yesaia 44:1
“Na afei tie, O m’akoa Yakob ne Israel a mapaw wo.

Yesaia 44:10
Hena na wɔbɛnwene onyame anaa wɔbegu ohoni bi a ɛho nni mfaso?

Yesaia 44:11
Hwɛ, ne mpamfo nyinaa ani bewu, na adwumfo no nso yɛ nnipa; ma wɔn nyinaa mbom nhyia nnyina hɔ, nanso ehu bɛka wɔn, na wɔn nyinaa ani bewu.

Yesaia 44:12
Ɔtomfo de n'adwinnade yɛ ogya mu adwuma; na ɔde asae bɔ, de ne basa a ahoɔden wom yɛ ɛho adwuma. Odi kɔm nso a, ahoɔden nni hɔ bio, ɔnnom nsu a ɔtɔ piti.

Yesaia 44:13
Duadwumfo nso twe susuhama; ɔde pɛnsere sensan dua ho, ɔde adwinnade yɛ, ɔde kompase sensan ho, na ɔde nkakrankakra yɛ onipa sɛso, sɛnea ɔdesani ahoɔfɛ te, sɛ ɛntra ɔdan mu.

Yesaia 44:14
Obi nso adwuma ne sɛ obebu nkyeneduru anaa ɔbɛhwehwɛ dupɔn bi, na wama anyin wɔ kwae mu nnua mu. Ɔtɛw osennuru, na osu tɔ gu so ma enyin yɛ kɛse. 

Yesaia 44:15
Afei onipa de sɔ ogya. Oyi bi to ma ne ho yɛ no hyew. Na ɔde bi sɔ ogya de to paanoo. Afei ɔde bi nso yɛ onyame kotow no. Osen ohoni bɔ ne mu ase wɔ n’anim. 

Yesaia 44:16
Ɔde fa sɔ ogya. Na ɔde fa nso toto nam we mee. Afei ɔto gya, na ɔka sɛ: “Ah, me ho ayɛ me hyew. Mahu ogya.” 

Yesaia 44:17
Na ɔde nea aka no yɛ onyame, ohoni a wasen. Ɔbɔ ne mu ase kotow no bɔ no mpae sɛ: “Gye me, na wone me nyame.”

Yesaia 44:18
Wonnim de, na wonni nhumu, na wasram wɔn ani so, na wɔanhu ade, ne wɔn koma nso, na wɔante ase.

Yesaia 44:19
Na obiara nnwen ho, na nimdeɛ biara nni hɔ, na nhumu biara nni hɔ na wɔaka sɛ: “Mede bi asɔ ogya, mato paanoo wɔ ne nsramma so; matoto nam wɔ so awe. Afei memfa nea aka no nyɛ akyide? Du sin na menkotow no anaa?” 

Yesaia 44:2
Sɛ Awurade a ɔyɛɛ wo, na ɔnwenee wo fii yafunum, na ɔbɛboa wo no se ni: Nsuro, m’akoa Yakob, ne Yesurun a mapaw wo. 

Yesaia 44:20
Nso na odi; wɔadaadaa ne koma ma no ayera ɔkwan. Ontumi nnye ne kra, nso ɔnka sɛ: “Enti ɛnyɛ atosɛm na ɛwɔ me nsa nifa mu yi?”

Yesaia 44:21
“Kae eyinom, O Yakob, ne Israel nso, efisɛ woyɛ m’akoa. Me na menwenee wo. Woyɛ m’akoa, O Israel, me werɛ remfi wo. 

Yesaia 44:22
Mapopa wo mmarato sɛ omununkum, ne wo bɔne sɛ suwusiw. San bra me nkyɛn, na magye wo.

Yesaia 44:23
“Ɔsoro, monto anigye dwom, na Awurade na wayɛ; asase ase tɔnn, mommɔ ose! Mompaepae ahurusi dwom mu, mmepɔw, O kwae ne emu nnua nyinaa. Efisɛ Awurade agye Yakob, na wahyɛ ne ho anuonyam, wɔ Israel mu.”

Yesaia 44:24
Sɛnea Awurade, wo Gyefo ne nea ɔnwenee wo fii yafunu mu no se ni: Mene, Awurade, nea ɔyɛ ade nyinaa, nea ɔno nko ara twe ɔsoro mu no, nea ɔtrɛw asase mu no, na obi nka me ho;

Yesaia 44:25
 nea ɔma adebisafo nsɛnkyerɛnne yɛ ɔkwa, na ɔma nkɔmhyɛfo bobɔ adam; nea ɔma anyansafo san nkyirinkyiri, na ɔdan wɔn nimdeɛ nkwaseasɛm

Yesaia 44:26
nea ɔma n’akoa asɛm gyina, na ɔma n’abɔfo agyinatusɛm ba mu; nea ɔka Yerusalem ho sɛ: Nnipa bɛtra mu! ne Yuda nkuro ho sɛ: Wɔbɛkyekye, na n’amamfo nso, mɛma so agyina.’ 

Yesaia 44:27
Nea ɔka kyerɛ ebun sɛ: Yow na mɛma wo nsuten ayoyow koraa.’ 

Yesaia 44:28
Nea ɔka Cyrus ho sɛ: Me guanhwɛfo ni, na ɔbɛma nea ɛsɔ m'ani nyinaa aba mu, na waka Yerusalem ho sɛ: Wɔbɛkyekye! ne asɔrefi nso sɛ: Wɔbɛto wo fapem!’”

Yesaia 44:3
Mehwie nsu agu nea osukɔm de no so, na nsuwansuwa agu asase kesee so. Mehwie me honhom agu w’asefo so na mede me nhyira agu wo nkyirimma so. 

Yesaia 44:4
Na wɔafefɛw wura ntam, sɛ asukɔn so nnuaa, nsuten so.

Yesaia 44:5
Oyi bɛka sɛ: “Meyɛ Awurade dea.” Na obiako de Yakob din bɛfrɛ ne ho, na ɔfoforo bɛkyerɛw agu ne nsa ho sɛ: “Awurade dea.” Na obi nso de Israel din bɛto ne ho.’

Yesaia 44:6
“Sɛ Awurade Israel Hene ne ne Gyefo, Asafo Awurade se ni: ‘Mene Odikanfo na mene Okyikafo, na Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ gye me nko.

Yesaia 44:7
Hena na ɔte sɛ me? Ma no nka ɛ! Ma ɔmpae mu nka mfa nsi m’anim. Hena na ofi tete nteredee kyerɛɛ ɔman a mede mesi hɔ daa ne nneɛma a ɛbɛba no? Ma wɔnkyerɛ yɛn nea ɛbɛba no.  

Yesaia 44:8
Mommma mo bo nntu, na munnsuro! Ɛno emfi tete beeme na mema motee na mekae? Na mone m’adansefo. So Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ ka me ho? Dabi, Ɔbotan biara nni hɔ. Minnim obi.

Yesaia 44:9
Wɔn a wosen ahoni nyinaa yɛ nnipahunu, na mfaso biara nni ade a wɔn ani gye ho no so; wɔn ara yɛ wɔn adansefo, wɔnhu ade na wonnim hwee, enti wɔn ani bewu. 

Yesaia 45:1
 Saa na Awurade ka kyerɛ nea wasra no, Cyrus, nea maso ne nsa nifa mu sɛ mɛbrɛ amanaman ase n’anim, na masanesan ahene abɔso, sɛ mebue apon a ɛbɔ ho abien ama no, na wɔantoto kurow apon no mu: 

Yesaia 45:10
Nea ɔka kyerɛ n'agya sɛ: Ɛdɛn na wowoe? Anaa ɔbea sɛ: Ɛdɛn na wokyem woe no nnue?

Yesaia 45:11
Nea Awurade, Israel Kronkronni ne ne Nwemfo no se ni: “Mummisa me nea ɛbɛba me mma so; monkyerɛ me nea menyɛ wɔ me nsa ano adwuma ho. 

Yesaia 45:12
Me na meyɛɛ asase, na mebɔɔ ɛso nnipa. M’ankasa me nsa na ɛtwee ɔsoro mu, me na mehyɛɛ emu asafo nyinaa.”

Yesaia 45:13
“Me na mama no so trenee mu, na mɛteɛteɛ n’akwan nyinaa. Ɔno na ɔbɛkyekye me kurow, na ɔbɛma me nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ nkoasom mu ade wɔn ho. Ɔrennye tiade anaa akyɛde bi,” asafo Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 45:14
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Egypt adwumade ne Etiopia aguadifo ne Sabeanfo mmarima atenten bɛba wo nkyɛn, na wɔbɛyɛ wo dea. Wobedi w’akyi, na wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn bɛba wo nkyɛn abɛkotow wo. Wɔbɛbɔ wo mpae aka sɛ, ‘Ampa, wo mu na Onyankopɔn wɔ, na obiara nni hɔ bio; Onyankopɔn bi nni baabi.’”

Yesaia 45:15
Ampa, wone Onyankopɔn a woahintaw, O Israel Nyankopɔn, Ogyefo no. 

Yesaia 45:16
Wɔn nyinaa ani bewu na wɔn anim agu ase mpo. Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa bɛbom abɔ ahohora.

Yesaia 45:17
 Nanso Israel de, Awurade de daa nkwagye begye no wɔ; mo ani renwu, na mo anim rengu ase da biara da.

Yesaia 45:18
 Na sɛ Awurade a ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro, ɔne Nyankopɔn a ɔnwenee asase na ɔyɛe de tim hɔ, na ɔde sii hɔ, nea wammɔ no hunu, na mmom ɔnwenee sɛ wɔntena so no, se ni: “Mene Awurade, na obiara nni hɔ bio. 

Yesaia 45:19
Mankasa wɔ ahintawee mu, asase so sum mu; na manka ankyerɛ Yakob asefo sɛ, ‘Monhwehwɛ me kwa.’ Mene Awurade a meka asɛntrenee, meka nea ɛteɛ.

Yesaia 45:2
“Me ara medi w’anim na mafɛntɛm nea ɛkorɔnkorɔn, mebubu kɔbere apon mu na matwitwa dade adaban mu. 

Yesaia 45:20
“Mommoa mo ano mmra. Mommom ntwiw mmɛn, mo a moafi mu afi amanaman mu. Wonnim de, wɔn a wɔsoso wɔn ahoni nnua, na wɔbɔ onyame a ontumi nnye nkwa mpae.

Yesaia 45:21
Monkasa, momfa mo asɛm nto gua. Momma wontu agyina. Hena na ɔmaa wɔtee eyinom fii teteete, na ɔkae fii tete beeme? Ɛnyɛ me Awurade? Na Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ gye me nko, Onyankopɔn a ɔteɛ na ogye nkwa; obi nni baabi gye me nko.

Yesaia 45:22
“Mo a mowɔ asase no afanan nyinaa, mommra me nkyɛn na munnya nkwa; mene Onyankopɔn, na obiara nni hɔ bio. 

Yesaia 45:23
Maka me ho ntam—na asɛm no apue afi m’anom wɔ trenee mu, na ɛrensan—sɛ nkotodwe nyinaa bɛkotow me na tɛkrɛma nyinaa aka me ntam 

Yesaia 45:24
sɛ, ‘Awurade mu na trenee ne ahoɔden wɔ. Wɔn a wɔn bo afuw no nyinaa bɛba n’anim, na wɔn ani bewu. 

Yesaia 45:25
Awurade mu na Israel asefo nyinaa bedi bem na wɔahoahoa wɔn ho.’”

Yesaia 45:3
Mede akorade a ɛwɔ sum mu ne ademude a ahintaw bɛma wo, na ama woahu sɛ me Awurade, mene nea mebɔɔ wo din frɛɛ wo no, Israel Nyankopɔn no.

Yesaia 45:4
M’akoa Yakob ne Israel a mapaw no nti na mebɔɔ wo din frɛɛ wo, na mebɔɔ wo abodin, nso wonnya nhuu me.

Yesaia 45:5
Mene Awurade, na obiara nni hɔ bio. Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ ka me ho. Me na mɛbɔ wo abɔso, nso wunnim me,

Yesaia 45:6
na ama nnipa ahu sɛ efi owiapuei kosi owiatɔe, obiara nni hɔ ka me ho. Mene Awurade, na obiara nni hɔ bio. 

Yesaia 45:7
Me na mebɔ hann na mebɔ sum, mema asomdwoe na mede amane ba. Me Awurade na meyɛ eyinom nyinaa.

Yesaia 45:8
“Ɔsoro, momma ɛnsosɔ, momma ɔsoro mununkum nsosɔ trenee. Asase mu mmue  na ɛmfa ogye mmra, na ɛne trenee mmom mfifi: Me Awurade na mebɔe.”

Yesaia 45:9
Nea ɔne ne Nwemfo ham, fam nkyɛmfɛre mu kyɛmfɛre no nnue! Dɔtebo bɛka akyerɛ ne nwemfo sɛ: “Woreyɛ dɛn?” Anaa w’adwuma no nni nsa? 

Yesaia 46:1
Bel butuw hɔ, Nebo bɔ ne mu ase. Na wɔn mmoa ne anantwi soso wɔn ahoni, wɔakyekyere mo nnesoa duruduru asoa mmoa a wɔabrɛ. 

Yesaia 46:10
Me na mifi mfiase ka awiei asɛm, na mifi tete ka nea wɔnyɛe; me na meka sɛ, ‘Me tirimbɔ begyina, na nea ɛsɔ m’ani nyinaa mɛyɛ.’ 

Yesaia 46:11
Merefrɛ ɔkoropɔn [anomaa a wɔdi nam] afi owiapuei, ne ɔbarima a ɔbɛma me tirimbɔ aba mu afi akyirikyiri. Makasa, na mɛma aba mu; mabɔ me tirim, na mɛyɛ.

Yesaia 46:12
“Muntie me, asowuifo a mo ne trenee ntam pan.

Yesaia 46:13
Mede me trenee abɛn, enni akyiri koraa, na me nkwagye renka akyi. Mede nkwagye bɛba Sion na mede m’anuonyam ama Israel.”

Yesaia 46:2
Wɔbɔ wɔn mu ase; wɔn nyinaa bom butuw hɔ; wɔantumi ansoɛ nnosoa no, na wɔn ankasa nso kɔ atukɔ mu.

Yesaia 46:3
“O Yakob fie ne Israel fie nkae nyinaa, mo a mefaa mo fii yafunu mu na mesoaa mo fii awotwaa mu nyinaa, muntie me. 

Yesaia 46:4
 Na ekosi w’akorayɛ mu, mene me ara, na ekosi dwen fuw mu mpo, mɛbɔ akɔnkɔn; me na mayɛ, na me na mɛsoa, me na mɛbɔ wo akɔnkɔn, na mayi wo masi.

Yesaia 46:5
“Hena na mode me bɛtoto ne ho na ɔne me ayɛ pɛ, na mode no besusuw me na yɛasɛ?

Yesaia 46:6
Ebinom hwie sika fi foto mu, na wɔde nsenia kari dwetɛ. Wɔbɔ ɔtomfo paa ma ɔde yɛ onyame. Afei wɔbɔ wɔn mu ase kotow no. 

Yesaia 46:7
Wɔma no so si wɔn kɔn ho kɔsoɛ no si ne sibea, na egyina faako kyerebenn; ɛntwe ne ho nkɔ benkum anaa nifa. Sɛ obi teɛm frɛ no a, ommua, na ontumi nnye obi mfi n’ahohia mu.

Yesaia 46:8
“Monkae eyi na munnya akokoduru. Momfa nhyɛ mo komam, O mo mmaratofo. 

Yesaia 46:9
 Monkae kan nneɛma a efi tete no, sɛ me ara mene Nyankopɔn, na obi nni hɔ bio; mene Nyankopɔn, na nea ɔte sɛ me nni hɔ koraa. 

Yesaia 47:1
Babilon babea, O ɔbaabun, si fam bɛtena mfutuma mu; O Kaldea babea, tena fam, baabi a agua nni. Worennya obiara nhoahoa wo nnyigye wo so bio. 

Yesaia 47:10
Wode wo ho too wo bɔne so, na kae sɛ: “Obi nhu me.” Wo nyansa ne wo nimdeɛ bɔɔ w’adwen ko, ma wokae no wo koma mu sɛ: “Me ara mene no, na obiara nni hɔ.” 

Yesaia 47:11
Mmusu kɛse bɛba wo so a worenhu baabi a efi bae. Na amanehunu bɛba wo so, na worentumi nsiw ano. Na ɔsɛe a wonsoo ho dae da bɛba wo so prɛko pɛ.

Yesaia 47:12
Afei fa wo kaberɛkyere ne w’asumansɛm bebrebe a wufi wo mmofraase ayɛ ho adwuma no begyina hɔ. Ebia ɛbɛboa wo, ebia ɛbɛbɔ nnipa hu. 

Yesaia 47:13
Woabrɛ w’agyinatu pii no mu, ma wɔnsɔre mmegye wo, ɔsoro ani mu kyekyɛfo no, nsorommahwɛfo a ɔsram foforo daa wɔkyerɛ nneɛma a ɛbɛba wo so no.

Yesaia 47:14
Hwɛ, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ sareguanguan, na ogya bɛhyew wɔn dwerɛbee. Wɔrentumi nnye wɔn kra mfi ogyaframa no nsam. Ɛnyɛ nsramma a nnipa de bɛka wɔn ho hyew anaa ogya a wɔbɛtena ho. 

Yesaia 47:15
Eyi na ɛbɛto kaberɛkyerefo a wo ne wɔn abrɛ fi wo mmofraase no. Wɔbɛwɔ ntwɛtwɛdɛ na obiara akɔ n’asase so, na obiara nni hɔ a obegye wo nkwa.

Yesaia 47:2
Fa owiyammo na yam awi. Yi wo nkataanim, na yi w’atade ma wo nan ho nna hɔ, afei twa asu. 

Yesaia 47:3
W’adagyaw bɛda adi, na wɔahu w’animguase. Medi were, na merenhu onipa mmɔbɔ.

Yesaia 47:4
“Yɛn Gyefo no, asafo Awurade ne ne din, Israel Kronkronni no.”

Yesaia 47:5
 O Kaldea babea, tena ase dinn, bra sum mu, na wɔremfrɛ wo ahenni horow no awuraa bio.

Yesaia 47:6
Me bo fuw me man, mihuraa m’agyapade ho, na mede wɔn hyɛɛ wo nsa. Nanso woanhu wɔn mmɔbɔ, akwakoraa mpo womaa wo kɔndua yɛɛ duru dodo wɔ no so, 

Yesaia 47:7
na wokae sɛ: Mɛyɛ awuraa akosi daa; na amma woamfa eyinom anhyɛ wo komam, woankae wɔn awiei.

Yesaia 47:8
Afei tie eyi ɛ, ɔhodomfo a wote hɔ anibiannaso so, wo a woka wɔ wo komam sɛ: “Me ara mene no, na obiara nni hɔ, merentra ase sɛ kunafo, na merenni mmasigyaw.” 

Yesaia 47:9
Nanso nneɛma abien yi nyinaa bɛba wo so prɛko pɛ, da koro: Abawu ne kunayɛ. Ɛbɛba wo so ahoɔden so, wo ntafowayi dodow ne wo kaberɛkyere a ano yɛ den no ara mu.

Yesaia 48:1
Muntie eyi, O Yakob fi, mo a wɔde Israel din ato mo na mufi Yuda asen mu no, mo a mode Awurade din ka ntam na mobɔ Israel Nyankopɔn din, na ɛnyɛ nokware anaa trenee mu no. 

Yesaia 48:10
Hwɛ, manan wo, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ dwetɛ, na mayi wo amane fononoo mu.

Yesaia 48:11
Me nti, me nti na mɛyɛ. Dɛn nti na memma wongu me din ho fi? Meremfa m’anuonyam mma obiara.

Yesaia 48:12
“Tie me, O Yakob, ne Israel a mafrɛ wo, mene ɔno ara, mene odikanfo, na me ara nso ne okyiridifo.

Yesaia 48:13
Ampa ara me nsa na ɛtoo asase fapem, na me nsa nifa na ɛtrɛw ɔsoro mu, sɛ mefrɛ wɔn a, na wɔn nyinaa abegyinagyina hɔ.

Yesaia 48:14
“Mo nyinaa mommoaboa mo ho ano ntie. Wɔn mu hena na waka eyinom? Awurade ankasa dɔ no. Nea ɛsɔ n’ani na ɔbɛyɛ Babilon, na ne basa atia Kaldeafo. 

Yesaia 48:15
Me, me ara na maka. Mafrɛ no; mede no aba, na ne kwan besi no yiye.

Yesaia 48:16
“Muntwiw mmɛn me, na muntie eyi. Efi mfiase nyinaa menkaa biribiara wɔ ahintawee mu. Bere a efii ase bae no, na mewɔ hɔ.” Na afei Awurade Nkyankopɔn ne ne honhom asoma me. 

Yesaia 48:17
Sɛ Awurade, wo Gyefo, Israel Kronkronni no, se ni: “Me Awurade, mene wo Nyankopɔn, nea ɔkyerɛkyerɛ wo nea eye ma wo, nea ogya wo kɔ ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ wofa so no so. 

Yesaia 48:18
O sɛ wutiee me mmara nsɛm ɛ, anka w’asomdwoe bɛyɛ sɛ asubɔnten, na wo trenee ayɛ sɛ po asorɔkye. 

Yesaia 48:19
Afei anka wo nkyirimma bɛyɛ sɛ anhwea, na w’asefo ayɛ sɛ akoko. Anka wɔrentwa ne din nkyene, na wɔrensɛe no mfi m’anim”

Yesaia 48:2
Na wɔde kuro kronkron no frɛ wɔn ho, na wotweri Israel Nyankopɔn a asafo Awurade ne ne din no.

Yesaia 48:20
Mumfi Babilon! Munguan mfi Kaldeafo nkyɛn. Momfa anigye nto ahurusi dwom, na momma wɔnte eyi, momma ennu asase ano. Monka sɛ: “Awurade agye n’akoa Yakob. 

Yesaia 48:21
Ɔde wɔn nam anhwea pradada so no, osukɔm anne wɔn. Ɔmaa nsu tue fii ɔbotan mu maa wɔn, ɔpaee ɔbotan mu maa nsu senee.”

Yesaia 48:22
“Asomdwoe nni hɔ mma abɔnefo,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 48:3
“Kan nneɛma no, mekae akyɛ. Epue fii m’anom, na mema wɔtee, mpofirim na meyɛe, na ɛbae. 

Yesaia 48:4
Efisɛ menim sɛ woyɛ asoɔden, na wo kɔn yɛ dade ntini, na wo moma yɛ kɔbere, 

Yesaia 48:5
enti meka kyerɛɛ wo akyɛ. Ennya mmae no, mema wotee, na woanka sɛ, ‘M’ankasa me bosom na ayɛ, me honi a wɔasen ne me honi a wɔagu na wɔhyɛ ma ɛbae.’ 

Yesaia 48:6
Woate; hwɛ eyi nyinaa; na wo nso worenka nkyerɛ? Mprempren mama woate nsɛm foforo afi sesɛɛ, ne nsɛm a wɔde asie a wunnim ho hwee. 

Yesaia 48:7
Afei na wɔabɔ, na emfi tete; ɛyɛ biribi a wontee da gye nnɛ, na woanka sɛ, ‘Hwɛ, minim dedaw.’

Yesaia 48:8
“Wontee pɛn, na wunnim, na efi tete w’aso mmuei. Minim sɛ nkontomposɛm ara na wutwa, na wɔfrɛɛ wo ‘mmaratofo fi yafunu mu.’ 

Yesaia 48:9
Me din nti, mɛka m’abufuw ahyɛ, na m’ayeyi nti, mɛhyɛ me ho so na mantwa wo ankyene. 

Yesaia 49:1
 O Nsuano aman, muntie me; aman a mowɔ akyirikyiri, monyɛ aso. Awurade ankasa na ɔfrɛɛ me fii yafunu mu. Ofi me maame yam na ɔbɔɔ me din. 

Yesaia 49:10
Ɔkɔm renne wɔn, osukɔm nso renne wɔn, ahohuru renne wɔn na owia renhye wɔn, efisɛ nea ohu wɔn mmɔbɔ no bedi wɔn anim, na wakyerɛ wɔn mmasu so kwan.

Yesaia 49:11
Mɛma me mmepɔw nyinaa adan ɔkwan na mama m’atempɔn so akɔ soro. 

Yesaia 49:12
Hwɛ, eyinom befi akyirikyiri aba, na eyinom befi atifi ne atɔe, na eyinom nso befi Sinim asase so.”

Yesaia 49:13
 O Ɔsoro, monto dwom; asase, di ahurusi. Mmepɔw nso nto dwom, efisɛ Awurade akyekye ne manfo werɛ, na obehu ne mmɔborɔfo mmɔbɔ!

Yesaia 49:14
Nanso Sion kae sɛ: “Awurade agyaw me; Awurade werɛ afi me.” 

Yesaia 49:15
 So ɔbea werɛ befi ne ba akokoaa, na ne yam renhyehye no mma ne yafunu mu ba? Ampa ara eyinom werɛ betumi afi, nanso me de, me werɛ remfi wo.

Yesaia 49:16
Hwɛ, mede wo akurukyerɛw me nsayam; w’afasu sisi m’anim daa.

Yesaia 49:17
Wo mma de ahoɔhare bɛsen. Na wɔn a wodwiriw wo gu na wɔsɛe wo no befi wo mu akɔ. 

Yesaia 49:18
Ma w’ani so hwɛ wo ho hyia, eyinom nyinaa rehyia aba wo nkyɛn. Sɛ mete aseɛ yi, Awurade na ose, wode wɔn nyinaa bɛhyehyɛ wo ho sɛ agude, na wode abɛbobare wo ho te sɛ ayeforo.

Yesaia 49:19
 Na w’amamfo ne wo nkurow a asɛe ne w’afasusini asase no, afei ɛbɛyɛ hihiaa a wɔn a wɔbɛtra so no rensen hɔ, na wɔn a wɔmenee wo no bɛwɔ akyirikyiri. 

Yesaia 49:2
Na ɔyɛɛ m’ano yɛe sɛ nkrante nnamnam, na ɔde me siee ne nsa nwini ase. Na ɔyɛɛ me sɛ agyan a wɔatwiw ho kokwakokwa, na ɔde me siee n’agyan kotoku mu. 

Yesaia 49:20
Na mma a wɔbɛwo wɔn wɔ nea ɛbɔɔ wo kan no bɛka agu w’asom sɛ, ‘Ɛha kyere so dodo. Ma me baabi ntena.’ 

Yesaia 49:21
Na wobɛka wɔ wo komam sɛ, ‘Hena na ɔwoo eyinom maa me? Mahwere me mma na meyɛ obonin, na wɔfaa me dommum de me kɔe sɛ ɔdeduani, enti hena na ɔtetee eyinom? Wogyaw me nkutoo, na eyinom de, wofi he?’”

Yesaia 49:22
 Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se nie: “Hwɛ, mɛma me nsa so akyerɛ amanaman, na masi me frankaa ama aman, na wɔaturu wo mmabanin, wɔ wɔn kokom, na wo mmammaa nso, wɔasi wɔn akɔnkɔn aba.

Yesaia 49:23
Na ahene bɛyɛ wo mmagyigyefo, na wɔn ahemmaa ayɛ wo nufumafo; wɔde wɔn anim bebutuwbutuw fam ama wo na wɔataforo wo nan ase mfutuma; na woahu sɛ mene Awurade, na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to me so no ani renwu.”

Yesaia 49:24
Wɔn a ɔdɔmmarima afa wɔn no, so obi betumi agye wɔn afi ne nsam, na nkoa a otirimɔdenfo afa wɔn nonnommum no, wobetumi aguan? 

Yesaia 49:25
Na nea Awurade aka ni: “Ɔdɔmmarima nkoa mpo, wobegye afi ne nsam, na wɔn a otirimɔdenfo afa wɔn no beguan. Me ara me nea ɔne wo wo ham no bɛham, na me ara megye wo mma nkwa. 

Yesaia 49:26
Mɛma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wo so no awe wɔn ankasa nam, na wɔn ankasa mogya bɛbow wɔn te sɛ nsa fremfrem. Na ɔhonam nyinaa behu sɛ me Awurade, mene w’Agyenkwa ne wo Gyefo, Yakob Tumfoɔ no.”

Yesaia 49:3
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: M’akoa ne wo, O Israel, wo mu na wɔbɛhyɛ me anuonyam.

Yesaia 49:4
Na me de, mekae sɛ: “Mabrɛ agu. Masɛe m’ahoɔden ama adehunu ne ahuhude. Nanso m’atemmu wɔ Awurade hɔ, na m’akatua wɔ me Nyankopɔn nkyɛn.” 

Yesaia 49:5
Na afei Awurade se, nea ɔnwenee me fi yafunu mu sɛ memmɛyɛ n’akoa, na memfa Yakob nsan mmrɛ no, na memmoa Israel ano mma no. Na m’anim bɛba nyam wɔ Awurade anim na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ m’ahoɔden. 

Yesaia 49:6
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Ɛnyɛ ade ketewa sɛ wobɛyɛ m’akoa na woama Yakob mmusua so na wode Israelfo a wɔakora wɔn so no aba, na mede wo mɛyɛ aman hann, na woayɛ me nkwagye akodu asase ano.”

Yesaia 49:7
Saa na Awurade, Israel Gyefo ne Kronkronni no ka, nea wobu no animtiaa, nea ɔman no kyi no, nea ɔyɛ ɔman sodifo akoa no sɛ: “Ahene behu na wɔasɔresɔre na abirɛmpɔn nso akotow asɔre, ɛsian Awurade a ɔyɛ nokwafoɔ, Israel Kronkronni a ɔpaw wo no nti.”

Yesaia 49:8
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Anisɔ berɛ mu na matie wo, na nkwagye da na maboa wo, na mɛkora wo, na mede wo ayɛ ɔman apam, sɛ: Ma asase no so si hɔ, na ma wɔmfa agyapade a ayɛ amamfo no nni so bio;

Yesaia 49:9
 na ka kyerɛ nneduafo no sɛ, ‘Mumpue mmra!’ na ka kyerɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ sum mu sɛ, ‘Munyi mo ho adi!’ Akwan so na wobedidi, na akwan pradada nyinaa so bɛyɛ wɔn adidibea. 

Yesaia 5:1
Ma mento me dɔfo ho dwom, me dɔfo dwom a ɛfa ne bobeturo ho: Me dɔfo wɔ bobeturo wɔ koko so, asase pa bi so. 

Yesaia 5:10
 Na bobeturo ahama du bɛma mo bobesa bat susuhina biako pɛ, na mudua aduaba homar susude biako a, mubenya efa susude biako pɛ.

Yesaia 5:11
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔsɔre anɔpatutu kodi mmosa akyi, wɔn a wɔtena nsa ase ma ade sa tumm kosi sɛ wɔbɛbow ayɛ titaa! 

Yesaia 5:12
Sanku ne sankuten, mpintin ne atɛntɛbɛn ne nsa wɔ wɔn apontow ase; nanso Awurade nneyɛe de, wɔnhaw wɔn ho wɔ ho, ne nsa ano adwuma nso, wonhu.

Yesaia 5:13
Enti me man akɔ nkoasom mu, nimdeɛ a wonni nti; na ɔkɔm adosaw wɔn anuonyamfo na osukɔm ade wɔn nnipadɔm no. 

Yesaia 5:14
 Enti Asaman atrɛw n’akɔnnɔ mu, na ahaa n’anom haharaa, na kurow no anuonyamfo ne nnipa dodow ne nnipadɔm ne wɔn a wɔn ani ka mu no besian akɔ hɔ.

Yesaia 5:15
Na wɔbɛbrɛ nnipa ase, na wɔde mmarima bɛba fam, na wɔabrɛ ahantanfo aniwa ase.

Yesaia 5:16
Na asafo Awurade de wɔbɛma no so wɔ atemmu mu, na Kronkron Nyankopɔn ate ne ho, trenee mu.

Yesaia 5:17
Na nguammaa bedidi wɔn adidibea; na ananafoɔ adidi taamudifo amamfo so.

Yesaia 5:18
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔde ahuhusɛm hama twe amumɔyɛ, na wɔde teaseɛnam ntampehama twe bɔne,

Yesaia 5:19
wɔn a wɔka sɛ: “Ɔmma ne ho nyɛ hare, nyɛ n’adwuma ntɛm na yɛnhu; na Israel Kronkronni no agyinatu mmra ntɛm mma yenhu” no!

Yesaia 5:2
 Na ɔfɛtɛw asase no yiyii so abo, na oduaa bobe pa wɔ so too aban wɔ turo no mfinimfini. Otuu nsa-kyi-amoa mpo wɔ hɔ. Na ɔtwɛn sɛ ɛbɛsow aba pa, nanso ɛsow abuntwɛre.

Yesaia 5:20
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔfrɛ bɔne sɛ papa ne papa sɛ bɔne, wɔn a wɔde sum yɛ hann, na wɔde hann yɛ sum, wɔde nwenenwene yɛ fremfrem, na wɔde fremfrem yɛ nwenenwene!

Yesaia 5:21
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn ankasa ani so anyansafo, na wobu wɔn ho nhumufo no nnue!

Yesaia 5:22
Wonnue, nsanom mu mmarima ne nsafra mu ahoɔdenfo!

Yesaia 5:23
Wɔn a wobu ɔbɔnefo bem gye adanmude, na wɔmfa nea odi bem no bem mma no.

Yesaia 5:24
Enti, sɛ ogyaframa hyew sakran na ogya framfram hyew wura guanguan no, saa ara nso na wɔn nhini bɛporɔw, na wɔn nhwiren betu akɔ sɛ otutuw, efisɛ wɔapa asafo Awurade mmara, na wɔatew Israel Kronkronni no asɛm ahi.

Yesaia 5:25
 Eyi nti Awurade bo afuw ne man, na ɔteɛ ne nsa hyɛ wɔn na ɔbobɔ wɔn, na ɛma mmepɔw ho him. Na wɔn afunu yɛ sɛ mmorɔn so wura dodow.  Eyi nyinaa mu no n’abufu no nnyaee ɛ, na ne nsa mu ateɛ ara.

Yesaia 5:26
Na obesi frankaa ama amanaman a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri, na wabɔ hwirema afrɛ ɔman bi afi asase ano, na ɔde mmirika bɛba ntɛm. 

Yesaia 5:27
Nea ɔbrɛ ne deɛ ohintiw nni wɔn mu, wɔrentɔ nko na wɔn ani renkum, abɔso a ɛbɔ wɔn asen rensan, na wɔn mpaboa hama rentew. 

Yesaia 5:28
Wɔn agyan ano yɛ hwiremhwirem, na wɔn tadua mu akuntunkuntun; wɔn apɔnkɔ tɔte te sɛ twɛrebo, na wɔn nteaseɛnam nan te sɛ ahum. 

Yesaia 5:29
Wɔn mmobom te sɛ gyata de, na wɔbobom sɛ agyataforo, wɔpa so kyere wɔn hanam, wɔde kɔ a ogyefo bi nni hɔ. 

Yesaia 5:3
“Na afei O Yerusalemfo, Yuda mmarima, mesrɛ mo mummu me ne me bobeturo ntam atɛn. 

Yesaia 5:30
Saa da no, wɔbɛworo agu wɔn so sɛ po woro no. Na wɔhwɛ asase a, na hwɛ, ahohia ne sum ni, na hann aduru wɔn so sum.

Yesaia 5:4
Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ ma me bobeturo no bio a menyɛe? Dɛn nti na m’ani da so sɛ ɛbɛsow aba pa na asow aba fo – abuntwɛre yi? 

Yesaia 5:5
Afei momma menkyerɛ mo nea merebɛyɛ me bobeturo no: Metutu ɛho ban na wɔahyew no. Na mebubu ne fasu no na wɔatiatia so. 

Yesaia 5:6
Mɛma adan ntuw, wɔrentwitwa ho na wɔrennɔw ase. Na nsɔe ne nkyɛkyerɛ bɛfa afuw no. Na mɛhyɛ omununkum sɛ ɔnntɔ osu nngu so. 

Yesaia 5:7
Asafo Awurade bobeturo ne Israel fie, na Yuda mmarima ne n’afuw a ɔdɔ ho. Na ɔhwehwɛɛ atemmu kwan, na hwɛ, nhyɛso na ohui; ɔhwehwɛɛ trenee, na hwɛ, osu ne nteɛteɛm na ɔtee.”

Yesaia 5:8
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔde ɔdan toa ɔdan so, wɔn a wɔde afuw ka afuw ho kosi sɛ ɔkwan biara nna hɔ bio, na mo nkutoo motena asase no so! 

Yesaia 5:9
Asafo Awurade aka agu m’aso mu sɛ: Ampa ara, adan pii bɛdan amamfo, adan a ɛsosoe na eye fɛ rennya nnipa ntra mu. 

Yesaia 50:1
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Ɛhe na awaregyae krataa a mede gyaa mo maame no wɔ? Anaasɛ wɔn a mede wɔn ka no mu hena na metɔn mo maa no? Mo amumɔyɛ nti na wɔatɔn mo, na mo mmarato nti na wɔapam mo maame. 

Yesaia 50:10
Mo mu hena na osuro Awurade, na otie n’akoa asɛm? Nea ɔnam sum mu na hann bi nhyerɛn mma no no? Ma ɔmfa ne ho nto Awurade din so, na ɔmfa ne ho ntweri ne Nyankopɔn.

Yesaia 50:11
“Hwɛ, mo a mososɔ gya a moma ogya dɛw nyinaa, monnantew mo gya no hann ne ogya a moama ɛredɛw no mu. Na nea mubenya afi me nsam ni: Yaw mu na mobɛdeda hɔ.

Yesaia 50:2
Dɛn nti na mebae no na obiara nni hɔ? Na dɛn nti na mefrɛe no obiara annye so? Me nsa yɛ tiaa sɛ mintumi nnye, anaa minni tumi a mede beyi mo? Hwɛ, mede m’animka ma po yow, mema nsubɔnten dannan sare so, na emu nam bɔn, efisɛ nsu nnim; na osukɔm nti, wowuwu. 

Yesaia 50:3
Mede tumm kata soro, na mede atweaatam yɛ ne nkataho.”

Yesaia 50:4
Awurade Nyankopɔn ama me asuafo tɛkrɛma na mahu asɛm a mede bebua nea wabrɛ. Anɔpa biara onyan me, onyan m’aso ma mitie sɛ asuafo. 

Yesaia 50:5
Awurade Nyankopɔn abue m’aso, na me nso mantew atua mansan m’akyi.

Yesaia 50:6
Medan m’akyi maa mmaakafo, na mede m’afono maa wɔn a wotutu nhwi. Manyi m’ani amfi animguase ne ntasu ho.

Yesaia 50:7
 Na Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛboa me, enti m’anim rengu ase. Mama m’anim ayɛ sɛ twɛrebo, na minim sɛ m’ani renwu.

Yesaia 50:8
   Nea obu me bem no bɛn me. Hena na ɔne me bedi asi? Ɔmma yɛnnyina nhyiam. Hena na ɔne me anya? Ma ɔmmɛn me. 

Yesaia 50:9
Hwɛ, Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛboa me. Hena na obetumi abu me fɔ? Hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa begow atetew sɛ atade. Nwewee bɛwe wɔn ma wɔasa.

Yesaia 51:1
“Muntie me, mo a mudi trenee akyi na mohwehwɛ Awurade no: Monhwɛ ɔbotan a wɔpaee mo fii mu ne amoa a wotuu mo fii mu no. 

Yesaia 51:10
Ɛnyɛ wo na womaa ɛpo yowee, na subun akɛse mu nsu sae, na wopaee kwan faa po ase maa wɔn a wɔagye wɔn no twae no? 

Yesaia 51:11
Afei wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn no de osebɔ bɛsan aba Sion, na ahurusidi bɛtena wɔn atifi daa. Wɔn nsa bɛka anigye ne ahosɛpɛw, na awerɛhow ne apinisi beguan.

Yesaia 51:12
“Me ara mene mo werɛkyekyefo. “Hena ne wo na ɛsɛ sɛ wusuro ɔdesani a obewu ne onipa ba a wɔbɛma wayɛ sɛ wura? 

Yesaia 51:13
Na wo werɛ fii Awurade wo Yɛfo no, nea ɔtrɛw ɔsoro mu na ɔtoo asase fapem, na wo ho popo daa yi daa nyinaa, nea ɔhyɛ wo so no abufuw nti, sɛnea ɔresiesie ne ho abɛsɛe biribi. Na ɛhe na nea ɔhyɛ wo so no abufuw wɔ?

Yesaia 51:14
“Nea mpokyerɛ gu no no, wɔbɛsan no ntɛm, na wanwu ankɔ amoa mu, na n’ano aduan ammɔ no.

Yesaia 51:15
“Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, a ɔhwanyan ɛpo ma n’asorɔkye yɛ hu no, asafo Awurade ne ne din. 

Yesaia 51:16
Na mede me nsɛm ahyɛ w’anom, na mede me nsa ase onwini akata wo so, na mede ɔsoro asi hɔ ato asase fapem, na maka akyerɛ Sion sɛ, ‘Wone me man.’

Yesaia 51:17
“Nyan ɛ, nyan! Sɔre ɛ, Yerusalem, wo a woanom Awurade abufuhyew kuruwa ano wɔ ne nsam. Kuruwa a ɛma nnipa tɔ ntintan no, woanom; woafifew mu ma asa. 

Yesaia 51:18
Ne mma a ɔwoo wɔn no mu biara nni hɔ a ɔbɛkyerɛ no kwan, na ne mma a ɔtetee wɔn no mu biara nni hɔ a ɔbɛso ne nsa. 

Yesaia 51:19
Nneɛma abien yi na ɛtoo wo. Hena na obegyam wo? Amamfoyɛ ne ɔsɛe, ɔkɔm ne nkrante! Hena na ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ? 

Yesaia 51:2
Monhwɛ mo agya Abraham ne Sara a ɔkyem woo mo no, sɛ obiakofo na mefrɛɛ no, na mihyiraa no maa no dɔree.

Yesaia 51:20
Wo mma atotɔ piti, na wɔdeda mmɔnten ntwea so baabiara te sɛ ɔdabɔ a afiri ayi no, na Awurade abufuhyew ne wo Nyankopɔn animka ayɛ wɔn amaama.”

Yesaia 51:21
Enti tie eyi ɛ, mmɔborɔni, wo a woabow nanso ɛnyɛ nsa.

Yesaia 51:22
Sɛ wo wura Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn a odi ma ne man no se ni: “Hwɛ, magye wo nsam ntintantɔ kuruwa no, m’abufuhyew kuruwa no, worennom ano bio. 

Yesaia 51:23
Nanso mede bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔhaw wo no nsam, wɔn a wɔka kyerɛɛ wo kra sɛ, ‘Butuw hɔ na yɛmfa wo so,’ na wode w’akyi too hɔ sɛ fam anaasɛ borɔn maa wɔn sɛ wɔfa so no.”

Yesaia 51:3
 Na Awurade bɛkyekye Sion werɛ, ɔbɛkyekye n’amamfo nyinaa werɛ, na wadan ne sare so sɛ Eden, na n’anhwea pradaa ayɛ sɛ Awurade turom. Wobehu mu ahosɛpɛw ne anigye, aseda ne dwonto.

Yesaia 51:4
“Me nkurɔfo, muntie me, O na me man, monyɛ aso mma me, na mmara befi me nkyɛn akɔ, na m’atemmusɛm betim hɔ ayɛ aman hann.

Yesaia 51:5
Me trenee abɛn, me nkwagye afi adi, na me basa bebu aman atɛn. Nsu ano aman de wɔn ho bɛto me so, na wɔbɛtwɛn me basa.

Yesaia 51:6
“Momma mo ani so nhwɛ soro, na monhwɛ asase wɔ fam. Na ɔsoro beyera akɔ sɛ owusiw na asase asuw sɛ atade, na ɛsotefo awuwu te sɛ nwansena, Nanso me nkwagye bɛtena hɔ daa, na me trenee rensa da.

Yesaia 51:7
“Muntie me, mo a munim trenee, ɔman a me mmara wɔ wɔn koma mu: munnsuro ɔdasani ahohorabɔ, na mommma wɔn ahiiyi nnyɛ mo ahopopo.

Yesaia 51:8
 Na nwewee bɛwe wɔn te sɛ atade, na abubummabaa awe wɔn te sɛ kuntu. Nanso me trenee bɛtena hɔ daa, na me nkwagye bɛtena hɔ akosi awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.”

Yesaia 51:9
O Awurade basa, nyan ɛ, nyan na hyɛ ahoɔden! Nyan sɛ kan nna no mu, teteete awo ntoatoaso mu.  Ɛnyɛ wo na wutwitwaa Rahab mu pasaa, na wuhwirew asuboa kɛse no mu no? 

Yesaia 52:1
Nyan ɛ, nyan ɛ, O Sion, na hyɛ w’ahoɔden! O Yerusalem, kurow kronkron, hyɛ w’atade fɛfɛ no! Na momonotoni ne nea ne ho ntew biara renkɔ so nhyɛn wo mu bio.

Yesaia 52:10
Awurade ayi ne basa kronkron no ho amanaman nyinaa anim; na asase afanan ano nyinaa behu yɛn Nyankopɔn nkwagye.

Yesaia 52:11
Montwe mo ho, montwe mo ho mumfi hɔ nkɔ, mommfa mo nsa nnka biribiara a ɛho ntew; mumfi ne mu, montew mo ho, mo a mosoa Awurade anwenne no. 

Yesaia 52:12
Mubefi hɔ akɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ ahopopo so, na ɛnyɛ aguan so na mobɛguan, Awurade bedi mo anim akɔ, na Israel Nyankopɔn bɛbɔ mo kyidɔm.

Yesaia 52:13
Hwɛ, m’akoa bedi no nyansam, obenya dibea a ɛkorɔn, wɔbɛma no so, wɔbɛpagyaw no papaapa. 

Yesaia 52:14
Sɛnea ne ho yɛɛ nnipa pii ahodwiriw no, esian sɛ n’anim asɛe a ɛnte sɛ onipa de, na ne nipaban nte sɛ nnipa mma de bio no nti,

Yesaia 52:15
saa ara na ɔbɛma amanaman pii abobɔ piriw, na ahemfo amuamua wɔn ano wɔ ne ho, efisɛ nea wɔnka nkyerɛɛ wɔn no, wobehu, na nea wɔntee da no, wɔbɛte ase.

Yesaia 52:2
 O Yerusalem, poroporow wo ho mfutuma gu na sɔre tena ase. O Sion babea a wɔafa wo dommum, san ahama a ɛkyekyere wo kɔn no.

Yesaia 52:3
 Na sɛ Awurade se ni: “Wɔantɔn mo annye hwee, enti ɛnyɛ sika na wɔde begye mo.”

Yesaia 52:4
Na sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Egypt na me man dii kan kɔsoɛe sɛ ahɔho, na Asiria nso hyɛɛ wɔn so kwa.”

Yesaia 52:5
“Na afei, dɛn na mewɔ yɛ ɛha” Awurade asɛm ni. “Na wɔafa me man kwa yi? Wɔn a wodi wɔn so no teɛteɛm,” Awurade asɛm ni. “Na wɔka me din ho abususɛm daa daa nyinaa.

Yesaia 52:6
Ɛno nti me man behu me din da no ara, me ara na merekasa. Hwɛ, ɛyɛ me.”

Yesaia 52:7
Hwɛ, nea ɔde asɛmpa ba no nan ase yɛ fɛ wɔ mmepɔw so dɛn ara, nea ɔka asomdwoesɛm, nea ɔka adepa ho asɛmpa, nea ɔka nkwagye ho asɛm, nea ɔka kyerɛ Sion sɛ: “Wo Nyankopɔn di hene!”

Yesaia 52:8
W’awɛmfo bɛma wɔn nne so, wɔn nyinaa de wɔn nne bebom ato ahurusi dwom, na sɛ Awurade boaboa Sion ano ba a, wɔde wɔn ani kann behu.

Yesaia 52:9
Yerusalem amamfo, mo ani nnye, mommom mmɔ ose, efisɛ Awurade akyekye ne man werɛ; wagye Yerusalem. 

Yesaia 53:1
Hena na wagye yɛn asɛnka no adi, na hena na wɔayi Awurade basa akyerɛ no? 

Yesaia 53:10
Nanso ɛsɔɔ Awurade ani sɛ ɔdwerɛw no, na ɔde no too amanehunu mu. Sɛ onya de ne kra to hɔ yɛ asodi afɔre a, obehu n'asefo, ne nna bɛware, na nea ɛsɔ Awurade ani afa ne nsa so ayɛ yiye.

Yesaia 53:11
Obehu ne kra amanehunu no ho mfaso, na ne koma atɔ ne yam. Na ne nhu mu mu na m’akoa treneeni no, bebu nnipa pii bem; na ɔno ara afa wɔn amumɔyɛ nso asoa. 

Yesaia 53:12
Ɛno nti mɛkyɛ ade mu ama ɔne atitiri, na ɔne ahoɔdenfo akyɛ asade, efisɛ ɔde ne kra too hɔ maa owu, na wɔkan no fraa mmaratofo mu, nso ɔno na ɔsoaa nnipa pii bɔne, na odi maa mmaratofo.

Yesaia 53:2
Obefifi sɛ duforo n’anim, sɛ ntini wɔ asase kesee so. Ɔnyɛ onipa mu biara, na onni anuonyam, na yehu no a, ahoɔfɛ bi nni ne ho a ɛbɛma yɛn ani agye ne ho.

Yesaia 53:3
Wobuu no animtiaa, na nnipa paa no; ɔyɛ onipa a ohuu ayayade na onim yare. Na yɛde yɛn anim hintawee na n’ani antɔ yɛn anim. Wobuu no animtiaa, na yɛammu no hwee.

Yesaia 53:4
Ampa, ɔno na wafa yɛn nyarewa; na yɛn ayayade nso, wasoa; na yɛn de, yebuu no sɛ nea wɔahwe no, nea Onyankopɔn aka no de no ahyɛ amane mu.

Yesaia 53:5
Nanso ɔno de, yɛn mmarato nti na wopiraa no, yɛn amumɔyɛ nti na wɔdwerɛw no; yɛn asomdwoe ho asotwe daa no so, na ne mmaa ntape na wɔde asa yɛn yare. 

Yesaia 53:6
Yɛn nyinaa wowɔɔ ntwɛtwɛdɛ sɛ nguan; obiara faa ne kwan. Na Awurade de yɛn nyinaa ammɔyɛ guu no so. 

Yesaia 53:7
Wɔhyɛɛ no ahoɔyaw na wɔpiraa no, nanso ɔno de wammue n’ano, wɔde no kɔɔ sɛ oguammaa a wɔrekɔku no, sɛ oguanten a watɔ nwitwitwafo nsam na wayɛ komm no, saa nso na wammue n’ano. 

Yesaia 53:8
 Wɔde ahoguan ne atemmu yii no kɔe; ne bere nso, hwan na ɔbɛkyerɛ? Na wotwaa no fii ateasefo asase so, me man mmarato nti na wɔboroo no. 

Yesaia 53:9
Na wɔmaa ne damoa fraa abɔnefo, na ɔdefo de mu wɔ ne wuo mu, nanso wanni abɔnefosɛm, na nnaadaasɛm bi nni n’anom.

Yesaia 54:1
“O obonini a wo nwoo da, to ahurusi dwom na fa ahosan teɛm! Wo a wonkyem nwoo da! Na onnibie mma bɛdɔɔso asen nea ɔwɔ okunu mma,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 54:10
Na mmepɔw bɛtwiw akɔ na nkokoɔ atutu, na m’adɔe de, ɛrentwe mfi wo so, na m’asomdwoe apam no rentutu,” Awurade a ohu wo mmɔbɔ no na ose. 

Yesaia 54:11
“O mmɔboroni a ahum bɔɔ woɔ a wɔnkyekyeree wo werɛ, hwɛ, me ara mede w’abo mɛtoto anintɔnkadubiri mu, na mede hoa abo bɛto wo fapem. 

Yesaia 54:12
Mede aboɔden abo kɔkɔɔ bɛto w’abantifi, na mede nnyansramma abo bɛyɛ w’aponkɛse, ne w’afasu nyinaa abo afɛfɛ.

Yesaia 54:13
Na wo mma nyinaa bɛyɛ Awurade asuafo, na wo mma asomdwoe bɛdɔɔso. 

Yesaia 54:14
Trenee mu na w’ase betim; wo ne nhyɛso ntam bɛpan, na worensuro, na wo ne ahude nso ntam bɛpan, na ɛremmɛn wo.

Yesaia 54:15
Sɛ wɔpɛ wo atutuw a, ɛnde na emfi me. Na obiara a wɔbɛpɛ wo atutuw no, wo nti ɔbɛhwe ase.”

Yesaia 54:16
“Hwɛ, me na mebɔɔ ɔtomfo, nea ohuw ogyagya mu yɛ akode sɛ ne nsa ano adwuma no. Na me ara na mebɔɔ ɔsɛefo sɛ ɔnsɛe.

Yesaia 54:17
Akode biara nni hɔ a wɔabɔ atia wo a ɛbɛyɛ yiye, na tɛkrɛma biara a ɛbɛsɔre atia wo wɔ atemmu mu no, wubebu no fɔ. Eyi ne Awurade nkoa agyapade, na wɔn trenee fi me,” Awurade asɛm ni.

Yesaia 54:2
“Ma wo ntamadan mu ntrɛw, na wɔntwe wo trabea ho nkataho no mu, nkyɛe biara so. Ma wo ntampehama nware, na ma mpɛɛwa mu nyɛ den. 

Yesaia 54:3
Na wobɛtrɛw akɔ nifa ne benkum, na w’asefo afa amanaman no adi so, na woama wɔatratra nkurofo so.

Yesaia 54:4
Nsuro, na w’anim rengu ase; mma w’ani nnwu, na wo nsa rensi fam. Na wo werɛ befi wo mmabaaberem aniwu, na worenkae wo kunayɛ mu ahohora bio.”

Yesaia 54:5
“Wo Yɛfo no ne wo kunu, asafo Awurade ne ne din. Israel Kronkronni no ne wo Gyefo, na wɔfrɛ no asase nyinaa Nyankopɔn. 

Yesaia 54:6
Awurade frɛɛ wo te sɛ ɔbea a ne kunu apo no ma ɔredi awerɛhow; sɛ ɔbea a waware ne mmabaaberem a wɔagyaa no,” wo Nyankopɔn na ose.

Yesaia 54:7
“Migyaa wo bere tiaa bi, nanso mmɔborɔhunu kɛse na mede mɛboa w'ano. 

Yesaia 54:8
Abufuw mmoroso mu na mede m’ani mihuntaw wo kakraa bi, nanso mede daa adɔe behu wo mmɔbɔ, wo Gyefo Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 54:9
“Na eyi yɛ me sɛ Noa nna no: sɛnea mekaa ntam sɛ Noa nsu no remfa asase so bio no, saa ara na maka ntam sɛ me bo remfuw wo na merenka w’anim bio. 

Yesaia 55:1
 Huu, mo a sukɔm de mo nyinaa, mommra nsu ho, na mo a munni sika no, mommra mmɛtɔ, na munni. Mommɛtɔ nsa ne nufusu; ɛnyɛ sika na wɔde tɔ na bo biara nna so. 

Yesaia 55:10
Na sɛnea osu ne sukyerɛmma fi soro tɔ gu fam na ɛnsan nkɔ hɔ bio, gye sɛ ɛfɔw asase ma no ɛba aduan na ɛsow aba, na ɛde aba ma ogufo ne aduan ma odifo no,

Yesaia 55:11
saa ara na m'asɛm a efi m’anom bɛyɛ. Ɛrensan mma me nkyɛn kwa, gye sɛ ɛyɛ nea mepɛ, na ewie nea enti a mesomae no.

Yesaia 55:12
“Mode anigye bɛkɔ, na wɔde asomdwoe agya mo kwan. Mmepɔw ne nkoko de anigye bɛbɔ ose wɔ mo anim na wuram nnua abobɔ wɔn nsam. 

Yesaia 55:13
Na ɔpopaw dua befifi wɔ nsɔe ananmu. Ohuannua befifi wɔ akraate ananmu. Na ɛbɛyɛ din ama Awurade, ne daa sɛnkyerɛnne a wɔrentwa nkyene.”

Yesaia 55:2
 Ɛdɛn nti na mode sika tɔ nea ɛnyɛ aduan, ne mo brɛ so ade tɔ nea ɛmmee mo? Monyɛ aso ntie me, na munni adepa, na sradeduan nyɛ mo kra dɛ.

Yesaia 55:3
Monyɛ aso na mommra me nkyɛn. Muntie na mo kra nnya nkwa, na me ne mo bɛyɛ daa apam, Dawid adɔeyɛde a esi hɔ pintinn no.

Yesaia 55:4
Hwɛ, mede no ayɛ amanaman dansefo, amanaman kannifo ne ɔsahene.

Yesaia 55:5
Hwɛ, wobɛfrɛ ɔman a wunnim wɔn, na aman a wonnim wo de mmirika bɛba wo nkyɛn, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn nti, Israel Kronkronni no nti, efisɛ wahyɛ wo anuonyam.

Yesaia 55:6
Monhwehwɛ Awurade bere a mubehu no. Momfrɛ no bere a ɔbɛn no.

Yesaia 55:7
Ma ɔbɔnefo nnyaw ne kwan, na onipa huhuw mpa n’adwene, na ɔnsan mmra Awurade nkyɛn, na obehu no mmɔbɔ, ɔmmra yɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na ɔde befiri no mmoroso.

Yesaia 55:8
“Na ɛnyɛ m’adwene ne mo adwene, na ɛnyɛ mo akwan ne m’akwan,” Awurade asɛm ni. 

Yesaia 55:9
“Na sɛnea ɔsoro korɔn sen asase no, saa ara na m’akwan korɔn sen mo akwan, na m’adwene nso sen mo adwene. 

Yesaia 56:1
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Munni atɛntrenee so na monyɛ adetrenee. Bere aso sɛ mede me nkwagye ba na miyi me trenee adi. 

Yesaia 56:10
N’awɛmfo yɛ anifuraefo, wɔn mu biara nnim nea ɛrekɔ so. Wɔn nyinaa yɛ akraman mum; wontumi mpa so, wɔyɛ nnamukasafo, wɔdeda hɔ, na wɔpɛ nkotɔ. 

Yesaia 56:11
 Yiw, wɔyɛ akraman adifudepɛfo; wonnim ɔmee. Na wɔyɛ nguanhwɛfo a wonni nhumu. Wɔn nyinaa fa wɔn ankasa kwan so, na obiara pɛ mfaso wɔ n’ankasa asase so: 

Yesaia 56:12
 Wɔka sɛ, “Mommra! Merekɔfa nsa aba, na yɛnwe mmosa. Na ɔkyena bɛyɛ sɛ nnɛ, ɛbɛso aboro so pii.”

Yesaia 56:2
Nhyira ne ɔdasani a ɔyɛ eyi, ne onipa ba a okura mu no, nea odi homeda a ongu ho fi na ɔhwɛ ne nsa na anyɛ bɔne biara no.

Yesaia 56:3
Na mma ɔhɔho a ɔde ne ho abɛbata Awurade ho no nnka sɛ, ‘Sɛnea ɛte biara Awurade betu me afi ne nkurɔfo mu.’ Na mma ayitotoni nso nnka sɛ, ‘Hwɛ, meyɛ duwui.’”

Yesaia 56:4
Na sɛ Awurade ka ni: Ayitotofo a wɔdi me homeda, na wɔpaw nea a ɛsɔ m’ani na wokura m’apam mu no,

Yesaia 56:5
“Mɛma wɔn nkaedum ne edin wɔ me fie ne m’afasu mu, nea ɛsen mmabarima ne mmabea. Mɛma wɔn edin a ɛwɔ hɔ daa a wɔrentwa nkyene.

Yesaia 56:6
“Na ahɔho a wɔabɛbata Awurade ho sɛ wɔrebɛsom no na wɔadɔ Awurade din, na wɔayɛ no nkoa no, obiara a wodi homeda a wongu ho fi na wokura m’apam mu no, 

Yesaia 56:7
me nso mede wɔn bɛba me bepɔw kronkron no so na mama wɔadi ahurusi wɔ me mpaebɔ fie. Wɔn hyew afɔrebɔde ne wɔn ayɛyɛde nyinaa bɛsɔ m’ani wɔ m’afɔremuka so. Na wɔbɛfrɛ me fie mpaebɔ fie ama aman nyinaa.”

Yesaia 56:8
 Awurade Nyankopɔn a ɔboaboa Israelfo panyifo ano no asɛm ni: “Mɛkɔ so aboaboa nnipa foforo ano aka ne nkurɔfo a maboaboa wɔn ano dedaw no ho ama no.”

Yesaia 56:9
Wuram mmoa nyinaa, kwae mu mmoa nyinaa, mommra mmedidi. 

Yesaia 57:1
Ɔtreneeni yera, na obiara mfa nhyɛ ne koma mu, na wɔfa nnipa pa kɔ, na obiara nnwen ho sɛ bɔne a ɛbɛba nti na wɔafa ɔtreneeni kɔ. 

Yesaia 57:10
Wo kwantenten no nti wobrɛe, nanso woanka sɛ: ‘Ɛyɛ ɔbrɛ hunu!’ wunyaa wo nsam akwanhosan nti, anyɛ wo yaw.

Yesaia 57:11
“Na hena nti na wo koma tui na wusuroe, na wodii atoro, na woankae me amfa anhyɛ wo koma mu yi? Me de, ɛnyɛ komm a mifi tete ayɛ nti na wunsuro me yi?

Yesaia 57:12
Mɛka wo trenee ne wo nneyɛe akyerɛ, na ɛso remma wo mfaso. 

Yesaia 57:13
Sɛ wusu hwehwɛ mmoa a, ma w’abosompem a woaboaboa ano no rennye wo. Na mframa bɛsoa ne nyinaa akɔ, na hwenem mframa kɛkɛ mpo de ne nyinaa bɛkɔ, nanso nea oguan toa me no benya asase no adi na wanya me bepɔw kronkron no so atra. 

Yesaia 57:14
Na wɔbɛka sɛ: Muntu ngu so, muntu ngu so, mommɔ ɔkwan, munyi akwammew mfi me man kwan mu.’”

Yesaia 57:15
Na sɛ nea Ɔkorɔn na ɔyɛ Kokuroo, nea ɔte hɔ daa a ne din yɛ kronkron no, se ni: “Mete baabi a ɛkorɔn na ɛyɛ kronkron; ne nea wabubu na ne honhom abrɛ ase no nkyɛn, sɛ mɛma ahobrɛasefo honhom anya nkwa, na mama wɔn a wɔabubu wɔn no koma anya nkwa.

Yesaia 57:16
Merenni asi nkosi daa na me bo remfuw afebɔɔ, efisɛ me nti nnipa honhom begurow, ne akra a me ara meyɛe.

Yesaia 57:17
“N’amumɔyɛ mu mfaso bɔne nti, na me bo fuwii, na mehwee no, mihintawee, na me bo hurui; nanso ɔkɔɔ so san n’akyi faa ne koma kwan so.

Yesaia 57:18
Mahu n’akwan nyinaa; nanso mɛsa no yare, na mɛkyerɛ no kwan, na masan makyekye ne werɛ ɔne ne nkɔmmɔdifo.”

Yesaia 57:19
Mebɔ anofafa aduaba: asomdwoe, asomdwoe nka nea ɔwɔ akyirikyiri ne nea ɔbɛn, Awurade na ose, na mɛsa no yare.”

Yesaia 57:2
Ɔkɔ asomdwoe mu; wɔhome wɔ wɔn mpa so, wɔn a wɔnantew wɔn teeyɛ mu no.

Yesaia 57:20
“Na abɔnefo te sɛ ɛpo a ehuru kutukutu; na entumi nyɛ komm, na emu nsu puw dontori ne dɔte gu.

Yesaia 57:21
Asomdwoe nni hɔ mma abɔnefo,” me Nyankopɔn na ose.

Yesaia 57:3
“Na mo de, muntwe mmra ha, ɔbaayɛn mma, ɔwaresɛefo ne oguamam asefo.

Yesaia 57:4
Hena ho na mudi fɛw? Hena so na motɛɛtɛɛ mo anom, na motwe mo tɛkrɛma yi? So monyɛ mmaratofo mma ne atoro asefo? 

Yesaia 57:5
Mo a mo ani so yɛ hyew abosonnua ho, nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa ase, na mukunkumm mo mmofra asubon mu, abotan mu ntokuru mu.

Yesaia 57:6
“Nsubon mu abo torotoro mu na wo kyɛfa wɔ, ɛno, ɛno ne wo ntonto, ɛno so mpo na wuhwiee afɔrebɔ nsa, na wode ayɛyɛde beguu so. So menka me koma nto me yam wɔ eyinom ho anaa? 

Yesaia 57:7
Mmepɔw atenten a ɛkorɔn so na wode wo mpa sii. Na ɛhɔ nso woforo kɔbɔɔ afɔre.

Yesaia 57:8
 Bio nso wode wo nkaedum sii ɔpon ne apongua akyi. Wufii m’akyi yii wo ho kyerɛe na woforoe; wotrɛw wo mpa mu, na wo ne wɔn yɛɛ apam ma wo kɔn dɔɔ wɔn mpa. Na wuhuu wɔn adagyaw mu.

Yesaia 57:9
Na wode ngo tuu kwan kɔmaa ɔhene no, na womaa wo nnuhuam dɔɔso, na wosomaa w'abɔfo kɔɔ akyirikyiri, na wobrɛɛ wo ho ase kɔɔ Asaman.

Yesaia 58:1
“Teɛm denneennen; ntwentwɛn wo nan ase, ma wo nne so sɛ torobɛnto, na ka me man mmarato ne Yakob fie bɔne kyerɛ wɔn.

Yesaia 58:10
na wode nea wo kra kɔn dɔ ma nea ɔkɔm de no, na woma nea ne kra werɛ ahow mee a, wo hann bɛhyerɛn esum mu na wo sum kabii adan awia ketee. 

Yesaia 58:11
Na Awurade nso bɛkyerɛ wo kwan daa nyinaa, na ɔde nnepa amee wo kra, na wahyɛ wo nnompe mu den; wobɛyɛ sɛ turo a nsu sen wom, te sɛ asuti a emu nsu nni huammɔ. 

Yesaia 58:12
Na wo mufo bɛkyekyere tete akurofo, wobɛma awo ntoatoaso horow fapem agyina. Na wɔbɛfrɛ wo nea ɔyɛ akwan yiye [ɔpamago], nea osiesie akwan ma wɔtena hɔ.

Yesaia 58:13
“Sɛ wusianka wo nan homeda na me da kronkron no woanyɛ nea wo pɛ, na wofrɛ me homeda sɛ anigyede, ne Awurade da kronkron no sɛ da a ɛsɛ nidi, na wudi no ni na woamfa wo ankasa akwan so, na woanyɛ nea wo ara wo pɛ, na woankeka nsɛnhunu a,

Yesaia 58:14
ɛnde wubedi ahurusi Awurade mu, na mɛma woafa asase so mmepɔw sorɔnsorɔn ne nkoko so, na mɛma woadi w’agya Yakob agyapade no, efisɛ Awurade ano na aka.”

Yesaia 58:2
Nanso wɔhwehwɛ me daa, na wɔpɛ sɛ wohu m’akwan sɛ gyama wɔyɛ ɔman bi a wodi asɛntrenee, na wonnyaw wɔn Nyankopɔn ahyɛde no. Wɔbisa me hɔ asɛntrenee, na wɔtwe bɛn Onyankopɔn wɔ anigye kwan so.

Yesaia 58:3
“Na wɔka sɛ: ‘Ɛdɛn nti na yedi mmuada na wunhu, na yɛbrɛ yɛn kra ase na wunnim yi? Hwɛ, mo abuada da no, moyɛ nea mo ara mopɛ, gye mo ani, na mupiapia mo adwumayɛfo nyinaa.

Yesaia 58:4
Hwɛ, ɔham ne atutuw na mode di mmuada, na mobɔ kuturuku atirimɔden so. Ɛnyɛ mo mmuadadi a mudi no ɛnnɛ na ɛbɛma wɔate mo nne ɔsoro.

Yesaia 58:5
Sɛɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mmuadadi a mɛpɛ no ɛda a onipa brɛ ne kra ase no nyɛ ni? So ɛsɛ sɛ osi ne ti ase te sɛ demmire, na ɔtrɛw atweaatam mu ne nso da so? So eyi na mofrɛ no mmuadadi ne da a ɛsɔ Awurade ani?

Yesaia 58:6
“So ɛnyɛ eyi ne mmuadadi a mɛpɛ? Sɛ mobɛsansan abɔnefo apɔw, na moayi kɔndua ahama, na moama wɔn a wɔteetee wɔn no ade wɔn ho, na moabubu kɔndua nyinaa mu? 

Yesaia 58:7
Ɛnyɛ ɛno ne sɛ wobɛkyɛ w’aduan mu ama nea ɔkɔm de no, na wode ahiafo a wonni baabi te akɔ wo fie? Na sɛ wuhu dagyafo a, wobɛkata ne ho, na womfa wo ho nhintaw wo nua?

Yesaia 58:8
“Ɛno na wo hann begyigye sɛ adekyee, na w’akwahosan afefɛw ntɛm. Wo trenee bedi w’anim na Awurade anuonyam abɔ wo kyidɔm. 

Yesaia 58:9
Ɛno wobɛfrɛ na Awurade bebua, wubesu afrɛ no, na ɔbɛka sɛ, ‘Mini!’ “Sɛ wubeyi kɔndua afi wo mu, na wogyae wo nsa a wode kyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfo so ne atirimɔdensɛm kasa,

Yesaia 59:1
Hwɛ, Awurade nsa nyɛ tiaa a ɛnso ogye, na n’aso mu nyɛ den a ɛrente asɛm.

Yesaia 59:10
 Yesunsiane ɔfasu ho sɛ afuraefo, na yesunsiane sɛ wɔn a wonni aniwa. Yehintiw awia ketee sɛ sum mu; yehinhim atwentwemfo mu sɛ awufo.

Yesaia 59:11
Yɛn nyinaa po so sɛ asisi, na yesi apini sɛ mmorɔnoma. Yɛtwɛn atɛntrenee, nso ebi nni hɔ, ne nkwagye, na ɛne yɛn ntam ware.

Yesaia 59:12
Na yɛn mmaratode dɔɔso w’anim, na yɛn bɔne di adanse tia yɛn; na yɛn mmaratode da yɛn anim, na yɛn amumɔyɛ nso, yenim. 

Yesaia 59:13
Yɛato Awurade mmara atwa no nkontompo, na yɛapa yɛn Nyankopɔn akyi. Yɛkasa nhyɛso ne mfomso kasa, yɛsusuw atosɛm wɔ koma mu yi no adi.

Yesaia 59:14
Wɔama atɛntrenee asan n’akyi kɔ, na adetrenee atwe ne ho akogyina akyirikyiri. Nokwaredi ahwe ase wɔ gua so, na nea ɛteɛ ntumi mma mu. 

Yesaia 59:15
 Na nokware ayɛ ade a ɛho yɛ na, na nea ɔtwe ne ho fi bɔne ho no, wɔfow no. Awurade hui, na ɛyɛɛ n'ani so bɔne sɛ atɛntrenee biara nni hɔ. 

Yesaia 59:16
Na ohui sɛ ɔbarima biara nni hɔ, ɛyɛɛ no nwonwa sɛ ɔkamafo biara nni hɔ. Enti n’abasa de nkwagye brɛɛ no, na ne trenee wowaw no den. 

Yesaia 59:17
Na ɔhyɛɛ trenee sɛ nkatabo, na ɔde nkwagye dade kyɛw hyɛɛ ne ti. Afei ɔhyɛɛ aweredi sɛ atade, na ofuraa ninkuntwe sɛ ntama. 

Yesaia 59:18
Sɛnea wɔyɛe no, saa ara na wobetua wɔn ka; de abufuhyew ama n’ahohiafo, ne akatua ama n’atamfo, obetua nsuano aman ka sɛnea ɛsɛ wɔn. 

Yesaia 59:19
Na wobesuro Awurade din afi atɔe, ne n’anuonyam afi owia puebea, na sɛ ɔtamfo no ba sɛ nsuyiri a, Awurade honhom bɛsɔre atia no.

Yesaia 59:2
Na mmom mo amumɔyɛ ne nea ɛma mo ne mo Nyankopɔn ntam pan, na mo bɔne na akata n’ani afi mo ho a enti ontie.

Yesaia 59:20
“Na Ogyefoɔ no bɛba Sion, ne Yakob mu nnipa a wɔsan fi mmarato mu no, Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 59:21
“Na me de, eyi ne me ne wɔn apam no, Awurade na ose: Me honhom a ɛwɔ wo so no ne me nsɛm a mede ahyɛ w’anomu no, ɛremfiri w’anom ne w’asefo anom ne w’asefo asefoɔ anom, fi nnɛ de kosi daa,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 59:3
Na mogya akeka mo nsam, na amumɔyɛ agu mo nsateaa ho fi; mo ano keka atosɛm, na mo tɛkrɛma woro nkontompo. 

Yesaia 59:4
Obiara nsamena asɛntrenee so, na obiara nni asɛm nokware so. Wɔde wɔn ho to nsɛnhunu so, na wɔka nsɛnhuhuw, wonyinsɛn bɔne na wɔwo mmusu.

Yesaia 59:5
Wosow ɔkyereben nkesua, na wɔnwene ananse ntentan, nea odi wɔn nkesua wu, na wotia bi so a, ɛpae ahurutoa.

Yesaia 59:6
Wɔn ntontan no renyɛ atade, na nnipa remfa nea wɔyɛ no nkata wɔn ho; wɔn nnwuma yɛ abusudwuma, na akokobirisɛmdi wɔ wɔn nsam. 

Yesaia 59:7
Wɔn anan tutu mmirika kɔyɛ bɔne, na wɔyɛ ntɛm kohwie mogya a edi bem gu, wɔn nsusuwii nyinaa yɛ bɔne, na amamfoyɛ ne ɔsɛe wɔ wɔn atempɔn so. 

Yesaia 59:8
Asomdwoe kwan de, wonnim, na atɛntrenee nni wɔn akwan mu. Wɔakyeakyea wɔn akwan, na obiara a ɔfa so no renhu asomdwoe.

Yesaia 59:9
Ɛno nti atɛntrenee ne yɛn ntam kwan aware, na trenee nso nto yɛn. Yɛtwɛn hann, na hwɛ, esum ni, ne ɔhyerɛn nso a, na sum kabii mu na yɛnam.

Yesaia 6:1
Afe a Ɔhene Usia wui no, mihuu Awurade sɛ ɔte ahengua ɛkorɔn a wɔama so so, na n’atade mmuano ayɛ asɔrefi hɔ ma. 

Yesaia 6:10
Ma ɔman yi koma mpirim, na wɔn aso mu nyɛ den, na ka wɔn ani fomfam so, na wɔamfa wɔn aniwa anhu, na wɔamfa wɔn aso ante, na wɔn koma anhu mu, na wɔansakra annya ayaresa.”

Yesaia 6:11
Ɛnna mibisae sɛ: “O Awurade, enkosi da bɛn?” Na obuae sɛ: “Enkosi sɛ kurow yi bɛsɛe na adan amamfo, na afie ada mpan a ɔdesani biara nni mu, na asase no asɛe koraa, 

Yesaia 6:12
na Awurade apam nnipa akɔ akyirikyiri, na amamfo adɔɔso wɔ asase no so.

Yesaia 6:13
Na ɛbɛka nkyem du mu biako wɔ hɔ, na wɔbɛsan ahyew ɛno nso, te sɛ odupɔn ne odum a wɔatwa ma aka ne dunsin. Dunsin no ne asefo kronkron no.”

Yesaia 6:2
Na serafim gyinagyina no so a wɔn mu biara wɔ ntaban asia. wɔde abien kata wɔn anim, wɔde abien kata wɔn nan ho, na wɔde abien nso tu. 

Yesaia 6:3
Na oyi teɛm kyerɛ oyi sɛ: “Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron ne asafo Awurade. N’anuonyam ahyɛ asase nyinaa so ma.” 

Yesaia 6:4
Na apon no ase wosowee, nea na ɔkasa no nne nti, na owusiw yɛɛ ɔdan no ma.

Yesaia 6:5
Ɛnna mekae sɛ: Minnue, “Asɛm ato me! Mawu awie, efisɛ m’ano ho ntew, na nkurɔfo a mete wɔn mu nso ano ho ntew; na hwɛ, mede m’ani ahu Ɔhene no, asafo Awurade ankasa!”

Yesaia 6:6
Ɛnna Serafim no mu biako tu baa me nkyɛn, na okura nsramma a ɔde afagya kɔfae no afɔremuka no so. 

Yesaia 6:7
Na ɔde kaa m’ano kae sɛ: “Hwɛ, eyi  aka w’ano, na wɔayi w’amumɔyɛ afi hɔ, na wɔapata ama wo bɔne.”

Yesaia 6:8
Na metee Awurade nne sɛ ose: “Hena na mensoma no, na hena na ɔbɛkɔ ama yɛn?” Na mise: “Mini, soma me.” 

Yesaia 6:9
Na ɔkae sɛ: “Kɔ na kɔka kyerɛ ɔman yi sɛ, ‘Ɔte ara na monte, nanso monnte ase; na ohu ara na munhu, nanso munnhu mu.’ 

Yesaia 60:1
“Sɔre, haran, na wo hann aba, na Awurade anuonyam apue wo so.

Yesaia 60:10
 Na ahɔho mma bɛto w’afasu, na wɔn ahene bɛsom wo. Na m’abufuw mu na mehwee woɔ, na m’adɔeyɛ mu na mahu wo mmɔbɔ.

Yesaia 60:11
“Wobebuebue wo kurow apon ato hɔ daa; wɔrentoto mu awia anaa anadwo, na nkurɔfo de amanaman ahonyade abrɛ wo a wɔn ahene di wɔn anim.

Yesaia 60:12
Na ɔman ne ahenni a ɛrensom woɔ no begu, na saa aman no, ɔsɛe na wɔbɛsɛe wɔn pasaa.

Yesaia 60:13
“Lebanon anuonyam bɛba wo nkyɛn, na ɔpopaw ne ɔsɛsɛ ne kwabɔhɔrɔ nyinaa bɛbom ama me kronkronbea hɔ ayɛ fɛ; na mɛhyɛ me nan tiabea anuonyam.

Yesaia 60:14
“Bio nso wo nhyɛsofo mma de akotoakotow bɛba wo nkyɛn, na wɔn a wɔbuu wo animtiaa nyinaa bɛba abebum wo nan ase, na wɔbɛfrɛ wo Awurade kurow, Israel Kronkronni no Sion.

Yesaia 60:15
“Wo a anka wɔagyaw wo ato hɔ koraa na wɔtan wo a obiara mfa wo kwan so no, mɛma wo ayɛ kɛseyɛ na mayɛ wo awo ntoatoasoɔ a edidi so anigye.

Yesaia 60:16
Wobɛnom amanaman nufusu, na woanum ahene mpokua, na woahu sɛ me, Awurade, mene w’Agyenkwa, ne wo Gyefo, Yakob Tumfoɔ no. 

Yesaia 60:17
Mede sika kɔkɔɔ besi kɔbere ananmu, na mede dwetɛ bɛba abɛsi dade ananmu, na kɔbere asi dua ananmu, na dade asi abo ananmu. Na mɛma asomdwoe adi wo so panyin ahwɛ wo, na mede trenee ayɛ wo kafo.

Yesaia 60:18
“Wɔrente basabasayɛ wɔ w’asase so bio, na wɔrente amamfoyɛ ne ɔsɛe wɔ w’ahye so. Na wobɛfrɛ w’afasu sɛ Nkwagye na woafrɛ wo nkurow apon sɛ Ayeyi. 

Yesaia 60:19
Ɛnyɛ owia na ɛbɛyɛ wo hann awia bio, na ɛnyɛ ɔsram hann na ɛbɛhyerɛn ama wo. Na mmom Awurade na ɔbɛyɛ wo hann daa, na wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ w’anuonyam. 

Yesaia 60:2
Hwɛ, esum bɛkata asase so na sum kabii akata amanaman so, nanso Awurade bɛpue wo so, na n’anuonyam bɛda adi wo so. 

Yesaia 60:20
Wo wia rentɔ bio, na wo sram rennum bio, efisɛ Awurade bɛyɛ wo hann daa, na w’awerɛhow nna bɛba awiei. 

Yesaia 60:21
Wo man de, wɔn nyinaa bɛyɛ treneefo, na wɔbɛfa asase no adi so daa. Wɔbɛyɛ me tɛdua dubaa a afefɛw, me nsa ano adwuma a ɛhyɛ me anuonyam.

Yesaia 60:22
Nea ɔyɛ ketewa koraa no bɛdan apem, na nea osua adan ɔman a ɛyɛ den. Me Awurade, mɛyɛ no ntɛm wɔ ne bere mu.”

Yesaia 60:3
Na amanaman bɛnantew aba wo hann no ho, na ahene aba hyerɛn a apue wo so no ho.

Yesaia 60:4
“Ma w’ani so hwɛ wo ho hyia: Wɔn nyinaa aboa ano reba wo nkyɛn; wo mmabanin fi akyirikyiri reba, na wobeturu wo mmabea wɔ wo nkyɛnmu. 

Yesaia 60:5
Ɛno na wubehu, na w’anim ahyerɛn, w’akoma de ahosɛpɛw bedi ahurusi, efisɛ po mu ahonyade nyinaa bɛba abɛdi wo nkyɛn, na aman ahode bɛba wo nkyɛn.

Yesaia 60:6
Yoma manyamanya bɛkata w'asase so, Midian ne Efa yoma anini nyinaa. Wɔn nyinaa befi Seba de sika kɔkɔɔ ne aduhuam aba. Na wɔbɛka Awurade ayeyi akyerɛ. 

Yesaia 60:7
Wɔbɛboa Kedar nnwankuw nyinaa ano abrɛ wo, na Nebaiot adwennini bɛsom wo, wɔde anisɔ bɛforo m’afɔremuka, na mɛhyɛ me fie fɛfɛ no anuonyam.

Yesaia 60:8
“Henanom ne eyinom a wotu sɛ omununkum, ne mmorɔnoma a wɔba wɔn ahunaniankasa mu yi?

Yesaia 60:9
 Yiw, nsuano aman nyinaa bɛtwɛn me, Tarsis ahyɛn na ebedi kan, na wɔde wo mma fi akyirikyiri aba a wɔn dwetɛ ne wɔn sika kɔkɔɔ ka wɔn ho. Na wɔde rebrɛ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn din, ne Israel Kronkronni no, efisɛ ɔno na wahyɛ wo anuonyam.

Yesaia 61:1
Awurade Nyankopɔn honhom wɔ me so, efisɛ Awurade asra me sɛ menka asɛmpa nkyerɛ amanehunufo; wasoma me sɛ memmɛkyekye wɔn a wɔn koma abubu werɛ, mempae ahofadi nkyerɛ nnommum, na mimmue nneduadan mma apokyerɛfo.

Yesaia 61:10
Awurade mu na medi ahurusi, na me Nyankopɔn mu na me kra ani begye, efisɛ ɔde nkwagye atade ahyɛ me, na ɔde trenee batakari awura me te sɛ ayeforokunu a ɔkeka ne ho bɔ n’abotiri, te sɛ ayeforo a ɔde ne nnwinne hyehyɛ ne ho.

Yesaia 61:11
Na sɛnea asase ma afifide pue na turo ma nea wɔadua wɔ mu fifi no, saa ara na Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛma trenee ne ayeyi afifi amanaman nyinaa anim.

Yesaia 61:2
Na mempae Awurade anisɔ afe ne yɛn Nyankopɔn aweredi da no, menkyekye abooboodifo nyinaa werɛ,

Yesaia 61:3
na menkyekye abooboodifo nyinaa werɛ wɔ Sion, na memma  ahoɔfɛ nsi nso ananmu, na ayeyi atade nsi honhom a watɔ beraw ananmu, na wɔmfrɛ wɔn trenee nnua, nea Awurade ankasa atɛw sɛ ɔde bɛhyɛ ne ho anuonyam. 

Yesaia 61:4
 Na wɔbɛsan akyekye mmeae a adan amamfo no bio na wɔama tete nkurow a asɛe no so agyina. Na wɔayɛ nkurow agowagow ne awo ntoatoaso santen amamfo foforo.

Yesaia 61:5
“Na ahɔhoɔ begyina ahwɛ mo nguan, na ananafo ayeyɛ mo akuafo ne mo turoyɛfo.

Yesaia 61:6
 Na mo de, wɔbɛfrɛ mo Awurade asɔfo, na wɔabɔ mo din sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn asomfo. Mubedi amanaman ahonyade na mode wɔn anuonyam ahoahoa mo ho. 

Yesaia 61:7
Mo aniwu ananmu mubenya kyɛfa mmɔho, na ahohora ananmu mubedi mo kyɛfa ho ahurusi; ɛno nti mubenya mmɔho, mo asase so, daa anigye bɛyɛ mo dea.

Yesaia 61:8
Me Awurade, medɔ atɛntrenee, mikyi atirimɔden ne adwotwa. Metua wɔn ka nokware mu, na me ne wɔn ayɛ daa apam. 

Yesaia 61:9
Na wobehu wɔn asefo, amanaman mu, ne wɔn mma wɔ aman mu; obiara a n’ani bɔ wɔn so no behu wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ ɔman a Awurade ahyira wɔn.”

Yesaia 62:1
Sion nti meremmua m’ano, na Yerusalem nti merentena hɔ dinn kosi sɛ ne trenee bepue sɛ hann na ne nkwagye adɛw sɛ ogyatɛn.

Yesaia 62:10
Monsen, monsen mfa kurow no apon mu. Munsiesie ɔman no kwan. Muntu ngu so, muntu dɔte ngu so nyɛ ɔtempɔn no. Munyiyi ɛso abo nyinaa, na munsi aman no so frankaa.

Yesaia 62:11
Hwɛ, Awurade ama wɔate akodu asase ano nohoa sɛ: “Monka nkyerɛ Sion babea sɛ, ‘Hwɛ, wo nkwagye reba. Hwɛ, n’akatua ka ne ho, na n’ananmuhyɛ di n’anim.’”

Yesaia 62:12
Na wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn sɛ ɔman kronkron, wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn. Na wo nso, wɔbɛfrɛ wo Nea Wɔahwehwɛ n’akyi kwan, Kurow a Wonnyaw No Koraa.

Yesaia 62:2
“Na amanaman behu wo trenee, na ahene ahu w’anuonyam. Na wɔato wo din foforo, edin a Awurade ankasa ano bɛkyerɛ no. 

Yesaia 62:3
 Na wobɛyɛ abotiri fɛfɛ wɔ Awurade nsam, ne ahemmotiri wɔ wo Nyankopɔn nsam. 

Yesaia 62:4
Wɔrense wo sɛ: Nea wɔagyaw no bio, na wɔrenka sɛ w’asase yɛ amamfo bio. Na mmom wɔbɛfrɛ wo sɛ: Hephsiba ne w’asase nso sɛ: Beula; efisɛ Awurade ani sɔ wo, na w’asase nso, wɔbɛware no.

Yesaia 62:5
 Na sɛnea aberante ware ɔbaabun no, saa ara na wo mma bɛware wo. Na sɛnea ayeforokunu di ayeforo ho ahurusi no, saa ara na wo Nyankopɔn bedi wo ho ahurusi. 

Yesaia 62:6
 O Yerusalem, mede awɛmfo asisi w’afasu so. Adekyee ne anadwo daa nyinaa, wɔrenyɛ komm. “Mo a mobɔ Awurade din nyinaa, monhwɛ na moanyɛ komm. 

Yesaia 62:7
Na mommma no nnye n’ahome kosi sɛ ɔbɛsesɛw Yerusalem ma no asi hɔ ayɛ ayeyi wɔ asase so.”

Yesaia 62:8
Awurade de ne nsa nifa ne ne basa tumi aka ntam sɛ: “Meremfa w’awi mma w’atamfo nni bio, na ananafo mma rennom wo nsa a wobrɛɛ ho no

Yesaia 62:9
Mmom wɔn a wɔaboaboa ano no na wobedi ayi Awurade ayɛ, na wɔn a wɔde aba ofie no na wɔbɛnom wɔ m’adiwo kronkron hɔ.”

Yesaia 63:1
Hena ne oyi a ofi Edom reba, nea ne ntade bere kɔɔ a ofi Bosra reba yi, nea n’atade ama ne ho ayɛ fɛ na ɔde tumi mmoroso yi akyeayi? “Ɛyɛ me, nea ɔkasa trenee mu, na meso nkwagye no.

Yesaia 63:10
Na wɔn de, wɔtew atua na wɔhyɛɛ ne Honhom kronkron no yaw, enti ɔdan bɛyɛɛ wɔn tamfo, na ɔne wɔn koe. 

Yesaia 63:11
Ɛnna wɔkaee tete nna no, Mose ne ne nkurɔfo, se: “Nea oyii wɔn ne ne nguan so ahwɛfo fii po mu no wɔ he? Ɛhe na nea ɔde ne Honhom kronkron sii wɔn mu no wɔ?

Yesaia 63:12
 Hena na ɔmaa n’anuonyam basa no dii Mose nifa so kɔe, na ɔpaee nsu no mu wɔ wɔn anim de gyee din fae afebɔɔ no? 

Yesaia 63:13
Hena ɔma wɔfaa ebun mu sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ a ɔnam sare so nanso wɔanhintiw no? 

Yesaia 63:14
Sɛnea aboa sian kɔ bon mu, na Awurade honhom ma no home no, saa ara na wudii wo man anim de gyee anuonyam din fae. 

Yesaia 63:15
Brɛ w’ani ase fi soro, na fi wo kronkronyɛ ne w’anuonyam trabea hɔ hwɛ. Ɛhe na wo ninkuntwe ne wo mmaninne no wɔ? W’ayamhyehye ne wo mmɔborɔhunu no wɔ he? Ne nyinaa atwe afi me ho? 

Yesaia 63:16
Wone yɛn Agya. Na Abraham nnim yɛn na Israel renkae yɛn. Nanso wo, O Awurade, wone yɛn Agya. Yɛn Gyefo ne wo din fi tete beeme.

Yesaia 63:17
O Awurade, adɛn nti na woama yɛaman afi w’akwan so, na wupirim yɛn koma na yɛansuro wo? Wo nkoa nti san bra, abusua a wɔyɛ w’agyapade nti. 

Yesaia 63:18
Ebedii wo man kronkron no nsam bere tiaa bi. Nanso yɛn ahohiafo atiatia wo kronkronbea so. 

Yesaia 63:19
Yɛadannan sɛ wɔn a wunnii wɔn so da; sɛ wɔn a wɔmmɔɔ wɔ wɔn so da.

Yesaia 63:2
Dɛn nti na wo ntama ayɛ kɔɔ na w’atade te sɛ nea otiatia nsa-kyi-amoa mu yi?

Yesaia 63:3
“Me nkutoo na mitiatiaa nsa-kyi-amoa no mu, na na ɔmanfo no mu biara nka me ho. M’abufuw mu na mitiatiaa wɔn so, na m’anibere mu na mewɔw wɔn. Na wɔn mogya abɔ apete me ntade mu, na akeka me ntade nyinaa mu. 

Yesaia 63:4
Na aweredi da wɔ me komam, na me gye afe no aba.

Yesaia 63:5
Mehwɛe, nanso na ɔboafo biara nni hɔ; ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa sɛ na obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛboa. Enti me ankasa me basa de nkwagye brɛɛ me, na m’abufuhyew nso soo me mu pintinn.

Yesaia 63:6
Mitiatiaa aman no so m’abufuw mu, na mema wɔbowee wɔ m’anibere mu, na mihwiee wɔn mogya guu asase so.”

Yesaia 63:7
Mɛbɔ Awurade adɔe ne Awurade ayeyi, sɛnea Awurade ne yɛn adi no nyinaa, ne nnepa a ɔnam ne mmɔborɔhunu ne n’adɔe mmoroso so ayɛ ama Israel fie nyinaa. 

Yesaia 63:8
Ɔtoaa so kae sɛ: “Wɔyɛ me man ampa, mma a wɔrenni atoro.” Enti ɔbɛyɛɛ wɔn Agyenkwa. 

Yesaia 63:9
Wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu no, ne ho hiaa no. Na ɔno ara ne bɔfo a ɔwɔ n'anim no gyee wɔn. Ne dɔ ne n’ahummɔbɔ nti ogyee wɔn, na ɔmomaa wɔn so, na ɔsoaa wɔn tete nna no nyinaa.

Yesaia 64:1
O sɛ anka wusunsuane ɔsoro mu sian ba fam ma mmepɔw wosow w’anim ɛ!

Yesaia 64:10
Wo nkurow kronkron adan sare so, Sion adan sare so, na Yerusalem ayɛ amamfo. 

Yesaia 64:11
Wɔde gya ahyew yɛn kronkronyɛ ne yɛn anuonyam fie a yɛn agyanom yii wo ayɛ wom no; na yɛn afɛfɛɛfɛ nyinaa ayɛ amamfo.

Yesaia 64:12
O Awurade, eyi nyinaa mu, wubeyi w’ani? Wobɛyɛ komm abrɛ yɛn ase koraa?

Yesaia 64:2
Sɛnea ogya hyew mmobaa na ogya ma nsu huru no, na woama w’atamfo ahu wo din, na amanaman ho apopo, w’anim! 

Yesaia 64:3
Woyɛɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu a na yɛn ani anna kwan no, wusian sii fam na mmepɔw wosowee w’anim!

Yesaia 64:4
Efi tete, obiara ntee na entwaa obiara aso mu, aniwa nso nhui sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ a odi ma nea n’ani da ne so, gye wo nko. 

Yesaia 64:5
 Wuhyia nea ɔde anigye di asɛntrenee, wɔn a wɔkae wo w’akwan so no. Hwɛ, wo bo fuwii, na yɛyɛɛ bɔne; na ɛno mu na yɛwɔ dabidabi yi, na wobegye yɛn nkwa anaa?

Yesaia 64:6
 Na yɛn nyinaa ayɛ sɛ nea ne ho ntew, na yɛn adetrenee nyinaa te sɛ ntomagow afiafi, na yɛn nyinaa kisa sɛ ahaban, na yɛn amumɔyɛ soa yɛn kɔ sɛ mframa.  

Yesaia 64:7
 Na obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɔ wo din, na ɔkanyan ne ho so wo mu, efisɛ wode w’anim ahintaw yɛn, na yɛn amumɔyɛ nti woama yɛayera.

Yesaia 64:8
 Na afei, O Awurade, wone yɛn Agya. Yɛyɛ dɔte, na wone yɛn Nwemfo; na yɛn nyinaa yɛ wo nsa ano adwuma.

Yesaia 64:9
 O Awurade, mma wo bo nnhuru bebree, na nkae amumɔyɛ nkosi daa. Yɛsrɛ wo, hwɛ: yɛn nyinaa yɛ wo man. 

Yesaia 65:1
“Wɔn a wɔammisa m’akyi kwan no wɔn na wɔhwehwɛɛ me; na wɔn a wɔanhwehwɛ me no, wɔn na wɔhuu me. Na mekae sɛ, ‘Mini, Mini, kyerɛɛ ɔman a wammɔ me din no.

Yesaia 65:10
Na Saron bɛdan nguankuw adidibea, na Akor bon no ayɛ anantwi ahomegyebea ama me man a wɔahwehwɛ m’akyi kwan no.

Yesaia 65:11
“Nanso moyɛ wɔn a wɔgyaw Awurade, na mo werɛ fi me bepɔw kronkron no, na moto pon ma Siade bosom-Gad, na mohyɛ mfrasa nkuruwa amaama ma Hyɛbea bosom-Meni no.

Yesaia 65:12
Enti mede mo bɛma nkrante, na mo nyinaa bɛkotow ma wɔakum mo, efisɛ mefrɛe nanso moannye so; mekasae na moantie; nanso moyɛɛ nea ɛyɛ m’ani so bɔne, na nea mempɛ na mopawee.”

Yesaia 65:13
Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Hwɛ, me nkoa bedidi, na mo de, ɔkɔm bɛde mo. Hwɛ, me nkoa bɛnom, na mo de, sukɔm bɛde mo. Hwɛ, me nkoa ani begye, na mo de, mo ani bewu. 

Yesaia 65:14
Hwɛ, me nkoa de koma pa bɛto ahurusi dwom, na mo de, mode koma mu yaw betwa adwo, na mode honhom a abubu asu yɔɔ.

Yesaia 65:15
Na mubegyaw mo din de ayɛ ntanka ama wɔn a mapaw wɔn, na Awurade Nyankopɔn bekum mo, na wato ne nkoa din foforo,

Yesaia 65:16
na ama nea ohyira ne ho asase so no ahyira ne ho wɔ nokwaredi Nyankopɔn mu; na nea ɔka ntam wɔ asase so no de nokwaredi Nyankopɔn no aka ntam; efisɛ wɔn werɛ befi kan amanehunu no, na ahintaw afi m’anim. 

Yesaia 65:17
“Na hwɛ, merebɔ ɔsoro foforo ne asase foforo, na wɔrenkae kan nneɛma no na ɛremma koma mu bio.

Yesaia 65:18
Na mmom, momma mo ho nsɛpɛw mo na munni ahurusi daa daa, ade a merebɔ no nti; na hwɛ, merebɔ Yerusalem ama no ayɛ ahurusidi, ne ne man, ama no ayɛ ahosɛpɛw. 

Yesaia 65:19
Na medi Yerusalem ho ahurusi, na me ho asɛpɛw me me man ho, na wɔrente osu ne nteɛteɛm wɔ mu bio.”

Yesaia 65:2
“Matrɛw me nsam da mu nyinaa akyerɛ ɔman asowuifo wɔn a wɔnam ɔkwammɔne so, wɔn a wodi wɔn nsusuwii akyi no; 

Yesaia 65:20
“Wɔrenhu akokoaa a ne nna yɛ tiaa wɔ hɔ bio, anaa akwakoraa a wanwie ne nna di. Na abofra bedi mfirihyia ɔha ansa na wawu, na ɔdebɔneyɛfo a wadi mfirihyia ɔha no yɛ nea wadome no.

Yesaia 65:21
 Na wobesisi adan atena mu na wɔayeyɛ bobe nturo adi mu aba. 

Yesaia 65:22
 Na wɔrensisi adan mma obi mmɛtena mu, na wɔrennua mma obi nni. Na me man nna bɛyɛ sɛ dua nna, na wɔn a mapaw wɔn no bedi wɔn nsa ano adwuma amee. 

Yesaia 65:23
Wɔrenyɛ adwumahunu, na mma a wɔbɛwo wɔn no, mmusu renka wɔn, efisɛ wɔyɛ wɔn a Awurade ahyira wɔn no asefo, wɔne wɔn mma.

Yesaia 65:24
Na ɛbɛba sɛ wonnya mfrɛe no, megye so, na wogu so rekasa no, metie.

Yesaia 65:25
“Pataku ne oguan bɛbom adidi na gyata awe wura sɛ nantwi; na ɔwɔ de, dɔte na ɛbɛyɛ n’aduan. Wɔrempira na wɔrensɛe ade bio wɔ me bepɔw kronkron no nyinaa so,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 65:3
ɔman a woyi me ahii wɔ m’anim daa, na wɔbɔ afɔre wɔ nturo mu hyew nnuhuam wɔ birikisi so; 

Yesaia 65:4
wɔtratra adamoa mu, na wɔdede aboda mu anadwo; wɔwe prakonam, na akyide nkwan wɔ wɔn nkutu mu.

Yesaia 65:5
Na wɔka sɛ, ‘Twe wo ho, mmɛn me, na me ho tew sen wo no.’ Eyinom ne me hwene mu wusiw, ogya a ɛdɛw daa adesae.

Yesaia 65:6
“Hwɛ, wɔakyerɛw no wɔ m’anim. Merenyɛ komm, na mmom metua so ka; metua so ka agu wɔn kokom.

Yesaia 65:7
Mɛka mo amumɔyɛde ne mo agyanom amumɔyɛde abom atua so ka, Awurade na ose; sɛ wɔahyew aduhuam wɔ mmepɔw so na wɔasopa me wɔ nkoko so nti, mesusuw wɔn kan nsennii no so agu wɔn kokom. 

Yesaia 65:8
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Sɛnea wonya nsa foforo fi bobe mu na wɔka sɛ, ‘Nsɛe no na nhyira wom’ no, saa ara na me nkoa nti mɛyɛ; na mansɛe wɔn nyinaa.

Yesaia 65:9
Mede aseni bi befi Yakob mu aba, ne me bepɔw sodifo afi Yuda mu, na wɔn a mayi wɔn no bedi so, na me nkoa atra hɔ. 

Yesaia 66:1
Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Ɔsoro yɛ m’agua, na asase yɛ me nan ntiaso. Ofie bɛn na mubesi ama me, na ɛhe na me homebea wɔ?

Yesaia 66:10
Mo ne Yerusalem ani nnye, na munni ne ho ahurusi, mo a modɔ no nyinaa; mo ne no ho nsɛpɛw mo, mo a mudi ne ho nkɔmmɔ nyinaa; 

Yesaia 66:11
na moanum n’awerɛkyekye nufu amee, na moafew n’anuonyam mmoroso ama mo bo atɔ mo yam. 

Yesaia 66:12
Na sɛ Awurade se ni: “Mɛtoa asomdwoe so ama no te sɛ asubɔnten, na amanaman anuonyam ayɛ sɛ asuten a ayiri, na moanom. Wobeturu mo wɔn nkyɛnmu na wɔagyigye mo anankoroma so.

Yesaia 66:13
Sɛnea obi maame kyekye ne werɛ no, saa ara na me nso mɛkyekye mo werɛ, na mo werɛ akyekye wɔ Yerusalem.

Yesaia 66:14
 Sɛ muhu a, mo koma ani bɛgye, na mo nnompe ayɛ frɔmfrɔm te sɛ sare momono. Na Awurade nkoa behu ne nsa, na n’atamfo de, wobenya n'abufuhye”

Yesaia 66:15
“Na hwɛ, Awurade de ogya ne ne nteaseɛnam a ɛte sɛ ahum bɛba, de abufuhyew abetua n’abufuw so ka, na ɔde ogyaframa aka wɔn anim. 

Yesaia 66:16
Na ogya na Awurade de bebu atɛn, na ɔde nkrante akunkum ɔhonam nyinaa, na wɔn a Awurade bekum wɔn no bɛdɔɔso. 

Yesaia 66:17
Wɔn a wɔtew wɔn ho na wodwira wɔn ho kɔ nturo mu, na wodi obiakofo wodi mfinimfini akyi, na wɔwe prakonam ne akyide ne akura mpo no, wɔn nyinaa bɛbom awie sa” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 66:18
“Na minim wɔn nneyɛe ne wɔn adwene, na ɛbɛba sɛ mɛboaboa amanaman ne kasa horow nyinaa ano, na wɔbɛba abehu m’anuonyam.”

Yesaia 66:19
“Na mɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne wɔn mu, na masoma wɔn mu nnipa a wɔafi mu afi no akɔ amanaman nkyɛn, Tarsis, Pul ne Lud, takuntunfo no, Tubal ne Yawan, nsuano aman a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri a wɔntee me nka, na wonhuu m’anuonyam no, na wɔakɔka m’anuonyam amanaman no mu.

Yesaia 66:2
Na eyinom nyinaa, me nsa na ɛyɛe, na saa na ɛyɛe a ne nyinaa bae, Awurade asɛm ni. Na nea mɛhwɛ no ne obi a ɔyɛ mmɔbɔ na ne honhom abubu, na ne ho popo wɔ m’asɛm ho.

Yesaia 66:20
Na wɔde mo nuanom nyinaa befi amanaman no nyinaa mu abrɛ Awurade sɛ ayɛyɛde, apɔnkɔ so ne nteaseɛnam mu ne asako mu ne mfurumpɔnkɔ ne yoma so, aba me bepɔw kronkron Yerusalem so, Awurade na ose, sɛnea Israel mma de aduan afɔre a ɛwɔ ade a emu tew mu ba Awurade fi no. 

Yesaia 66:21
“Na mɛpaw wɔn mu binom ayɛ wɔn asɔfo ne Lewifo,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 66:22
“Na sɛnea ɔsoro foforo ne asase foforo a mɛyɛ no begyina m’anim no, Awurade asɛm ni, saa ara na mo asefo ne mo din begyina.”

Yesaia 66:23
“Na ɛbɛba sɛ ɔsram foforo biara ne homeda biara, ɔhonam nyinaa bɛba abesɔre wɔ m’anim,” Awurade na ose.

Yesaia 66:24
“Na wobefi adi akɔhwɛ nnipa a wɔato me mmara no afunu, na wɔn mu mmoawa renwu, na wɔn gya nso rennum da, na wɔbɛyɛ abofonode ama ɔhonam nyinaa.”

Yesaia 66:3
“Nea okum nantwi no te sɛ nea okum onipa. Nea ɔde oguan bɔ afɔre no te sɛ nea obu ɔkraman kɔn mu. Nea ɔbɔ aduan afɔre no te sɛ nea ɔde prako mogya ba! Nea ɔhyew aduhuam no te sɛ nea ɔhyira ohoni. Wɔn de, wɔapaw wɔn ankasa akwan, na wɔn kra ani sɔ wɔn akyide. 

Yesaia 66:4
Me nso mɛpaw amane bi ama wɔn, na mede nea wosuro aba wɔn so, efisɛ mefrɛe, na obiara annye so, mekasae, nanso obiara antie. Na wɔyɛɛ m’ani so bɔne, na nea mempɛ no na wɔpawee. ”

Yesaia 66:5
Muntie Awurade asɛm, mo a n’asɛm nti mo ho popo: “Mo nuanom a wɔtan mo, na me din nti wɔpo mo no ka sɛ, ‘Anuonyam nka Awurade!’ Na yɛnhu mo anigye;, nanso wɔn de, wɔn ani bewu.”

Yesaia 66:6
 Ɛnne gyegyeegye bi fi kurow no mu! Na dede bi fi asɔrefie hɔ! Ɛyɛ Awurade a otua n’atamfo nsɛnnii so ka no nne!

Yesaia 66:7
 Onnya nkyemee no, na wawo , onnya ntee awoko yaw no, na wawo ɔbabarima. 

Yesaia 66:8
Hena na wate asɛm yi bi pɛn? Hena na wahu biribi a ɛte sɛ eyi pɛn? So wɔkyem wo asase da koro? Anaasɛ wobetumi awo ɔman prɛko pɛ? Nanso awo kaa Sion pɛ na ɔwoo ne mma.

Yesaia 66:9
“So mebue awotwaa ano a meremma wɔnwo?” Awurade na ose. “Anaa me a mema wɔwo no, mesiw ano anaa?” Wo Nyankopɔn na ose.

Yesaia 7:1
Na ɛbae sɛ Usia ba Yotam ba Ahas a ɔyɛ Yuda hene berɛ so no, Siria hene Resin ne Israel hene Peka a ɔyɛ Remalia ba baa Yerusalem, sɛ wɔne no rebɛko, nanso wɔantumi no.

Yesaia 7:10
 Na Awurade toaa so ka kyerɛɛ Ahas sɛ: 

Yesaia 7:11
“Bisa Awurade wo Nyankopɔn hɔ sɛnkyerɛnne bi, sɛ ɛkɔ fam kodu asaman tɔnn anaa ɛkɔ soro kodu ɔsoro pɛɛ mpo a.” 

Yesaia 7:12
