Hesekiel 16:2
“Onipa ba, ma Yerusalem nhu n’akyide no,

Hesekiel 16:20
“‘Wofaa wo mmabarima ne wo mmabea a wowoo wɔn maa me no de wɔn bɔɔ afɔre maa wɔn sɛ wonni. Adɛn, w’aguamammɔ ade ketewaa,

Hesekiel 16:21
 sɛ wukunkum me mma, na wode wɔn faa ogya mu maa wɔn. 

Hesekiel 16:22
Na w’akyide ne w’aguamammɔ nyinaa mu woankae wo mmabaaberem, bere a woda adagyaw na wo ho da so, bere a na worepere wɔ wo mogya mu no. 

Hesekiel 16:23
Enti wo bɔne nyinaa akyi no, wo a “due, due,” Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, 

Hesekiel 16:24
 sɛ wotoo dampan fae na woyɛɛ pampa fae, mmɔnten so baabiara. 

Hesekiel 16:25
Wusii wo pampa wɔ nkwantia baabiara na wuguu w’ahoɔfɛ ho fi, na wobaee w’anan mu maa obiara a ɔretwam na womaa w’aguamammɔ dɔɔso. 

Hesekiel 16:26
Wo ne w’afipamfo Egypt mmarima a wɔn ho soso no bɔɔ aguaman, na wode aguamammɔ dodow de huruu me bo.

Hesekiel 16:27
Na hwɛ, wo so na meteɛɛ me nsa, na memaa wo kyɛfa so hwanee, na miyii wo maa w’atamfo sɛnea wɔpɛ biara, Filistifo mmabea a wɔn ani wuu w’ahohwibɔ ho no.

Hesekiel 16:28
“‘Na wo ne Asiriafo bɔɔ aguaman efisɛ wo ho ammee wo, na wo ne wɔn kɔɔ so bɔɔ aguaman nanso woammee ara. 

Hesekiel 16:29
Enti womaa w’aguamammɔ dɔɔso wɔ Kanaan asase so, Kaldeafo mu, na eyi nso ammee wo. 

Hesekiel 16:3
na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛ Yerusalem ni: “W’ase fi Kanaan na ɛhɔ na wɔwoo wo. Na wo papa yɛ Amorini na wo maame nso yɛ Hitini. 

Hesekiel 16:30
 Wo koma ayɛ gorɔw dɛn ara, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, sɛ ɔbea aguaman a wasi ne bo wɔ n’adwamammɔ mu!’ 

Hesekiel 16:31
‘Wotoo wo dampan, wɔ akwantia baabiara, na wusii pampa wɔ mmɔnten nyinaa so, woanyɛ sɛ odwamamfo mpo, ɛne sɛ wopoo akatua. 

Hesekiel 16:32
 Ɔyere a ɔsɛe aware, ɔfa ananafo si ne kunu ananmu ne wo.

Hesekiel 16:33
Nguaman nyinaa gye akatua fi mmarima hɔ, nanso wo de, wokyɛkyɛ akyɛde ma w’adɔfo, na wutua wɔn ka ma wofi mmeae nyinaa ba wo nkyɛn ne wo bɛbɔ aguaman. 

Hesekiel 16:34
W’aguamammɔ nte sɛ mmea foforo de, na w’aguamammɔ sɛso nni hɔ, efisɛ wutua nkurɔfo ka bere a wo de wunnya akatua biara; eyi na ɛma wo yɛ soronko no.’

Hesekiel 16:35
“Aguaman ee, afei tie Awurade asɛm. 

Hesekiel 16:36
Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ woahwere w'ade, na wɔayi w’adagyaw so, w’aguamammɔ mu, ama w’akyide abosonhunu no nyinaa ne wo mma a wode wɔn maa wɔn no mogya nti,

Hesekiel 16:37
mɛboaboa w’adɔfo nyinaa a wode wɔn gyee w'ani no ano, wɔn a wodɔɔ wɔn ne wɔn a wotanee wɔn nyinaa ano afi mmeae nyinaa aba wo so, na mayi w’adagyaw so ama wɔahu wo ho nyinaa.

Hesekiel 16:38
“‘Na mede awaresɛefo ne mmea mogyakagufo atemmude mebu wo atɛn, na mede abufuw ne ninkuntwe mogya bɛba wo so. 

Hesekiel 16:39
Na mede wo ahyɛ wɔn nsa, na wɔadwiriw wo dampan na wɔabubu wo mpampa agu, na wɔaworɔw wo ho ntade ne w’agude fɛfɛ no, na wɔagyaw wo adagyaw ne kwaterekwa mu.

Hesekiel 16:4
W’awo ho asɛm ni: Da a wɔwoo wo no, wɔantwa wo funuma, wɔamfa nsu anguare wo amma wo ho amfi, nkyene nso wɔamfa ansra wo, na wɔamfa ntamawa ankyekyere wo.

Hesekiel 16:40
Na wɔama wɔabɛbɔ wo so gua, na wɔasiw wo abo, na wɔde wɔn nkrantɛ atwitwa wo mu.

Hesekiel 16:41
Wɔde ogya bɛhyew w’afie na wɔabu wo atɛn wɔ mmea bebree anim; na mɛma woagyae aguamammɔ na worentua obiara ka bio. 

Hesekiel 16:42
Afei m’abufuw ano bedwo wɔ wo so na ninkuntwe afi wo so, na mɛyɛ komm a me bo renhuru bio.

Hesekiel 16:43
“‘Na esiane sɛ woankae wo mmabaaberem nna no, na wode eyinom nyinaa hyɛɛ me anibere nti, me nso mɛma w’akwan abua wo ti so, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, na woremfa ahohwibra mfoa w'akyide nyinaa so bio.

Hesekiel 16:44
“‘Hwɛ, obiara a obubu mmɛ no bebu wo ho bɛ yi sɛ: “Sɛnea maame te no, saa ara na ne babea te!” 

Hesekiel 16:45
Wo ne wo maame babea a ɔpo ne kunu ne ne mma no ba. Na wo ne nuabeanom a wɔpo wɔn kununom ne wɔn mma no nuabea. Mo maame yɛ Hitini na mo papa nso yɛ Amorini.’”

Hesekiel 16:46
“‘Na wo nuabea panyin ne Samaria, ɔno ne ne mmabea a wɔte wo benkum so no, na wo nuabea kumaa a ɔte wo nifa so ne Sodom ne ne mmabea.

Hesekiel 16:47
Ɛnyɛ wɔn akwan so nko na wofae na ɛnyɛ wɔn akyide no bi na woyɛe, na mmom bere tiaa bi ntam wosɛe sen wɔn koraa wɔ w’akwan nyinaa mu. 

Hesekiel 16:48
Sɛ mete aseɛ yi, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, hwɛ, wo nuabea Sodom ne ne mmabea anyɛ sɛnea wo ne wo mmabea ayɛ yi. 

Hesekiel 16:49
‘Hwɛ, eyi ne wo nuabea Sodom amumɔyɛ no: Ahantan, didimee ne yiyedi dwoodwoo mu na ɔno ne ne mmabea trae, na ɔbrɛfo ne ohiani nsa de, wansɔ mu.

Hesekiel 16:5
Obiara yam anhyehye no amma wo anyɛ wo eyinom mu biara amfa anhu wo mmɔbɔ; na mmom wɔtow wo kyenee wuram, efisɛ da a wɔwoo wo no, na wo kra ho yɛ abofono.

Hesekiel 16:50
Wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ ahantan na wɔyɛɛ akyide wɔ m’anim, enti miyii wɔn fii hɔ sɛnea mehwɛ a ɛfata.

Hesekiel 16:51
“‘Samaria anyɛ wo bɔne no mu fa mpo, na womaa w’akyide dɔɔso sen wɔn, na wode w’akyide a woyɛe no nyinaa buu wo nuabeanom bem.  

Hesekiel 16:52
Wo nso, soa w’ahohora a wubuu atɛn maa wo nuabeanom no. Wo bɔne a woama no ayɛ akyide asen wɔn no nti, wɔteɛ sen wo, na wo nso, ma w’ani nwu na soa w’ahohora, sɛ woabu wo nuabeanom bem.

Hesekiel 16:53
“‘ Na mede wɔn nnommum, Sodom ne ne mmabea nnommum, ne Samaria ne ne mmabea nnommum, ne wo nnommumfa mu nnommum a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no mɛsan aba,

Hesekiel 16:54
nea ɛbɛyɛ na woasoa w’ahohora, ade a woayɛ nyinaa ho de akyekye wɔn werɛ.

Hesekiel 16:55
Na wo nuabeanom, Sodom ne ne mmabaa bɛsan aba wɔn kan dibea mu, na Samaria ne ne mmammaa bɛsan aba wɔn kan dibea mu, na wo nso wo ne wo mmabea bɛsan aba mo kan dibea mu.

Hesekiel 16:56
Na wo nuabea Sodom anyɛ w’anom asɛnka, w’ahantan nna no mu,

Hesekiel 16:57
ansa na wo bɔne ho reda hɔ, te sɛ bere a Siria mmabea ne wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa ne Filistifo mmabea bɔɔ wo ahohora no; eyinom na wɔsopaa wo afa nyinaa no. 

Hesekiel 16:58
W’abusude ne w’akyide no, wo ara na woso,’ Awurade asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 16:59
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Me nso me ne wo bedi sɛnea woayɛ no, efisɛ wubuu ntanka animtiaa sɛ worebu apam so no.

Hesekiel 16:6
“‘“Bere a mibetwaam faa wo ho no, mihui sɛ worepere wɔ wo mogya mu, na meka kyerɛɛ wo wɔ wo mogya mu sɛ, ‘Nya nkwa!’ Yiw, meka kyerɛɛ wo wɔ wo mogya mu sɛ, ‘Nya nkwa!’ 

Hesekiel 16:60
Nanso me de, mɛkae apam a me ne wo yɛe wɔ wo mmabaaberem no, na mede daa apam besi hɔ ama wo. 

Hesekiel 16:61
Na sɛ wugye wo nuabeanom, wɔn a wɔsen wo panyin ne wɔn a woanyin sen wɔn no a, wobɛkae w’akwan na w’anim agu ase, na mede wɔn bɛma wo sɛ wo mmabea, nanso ɛnyɛ w’apam nti.’

Hesekiel 16:62
“‘Afei m’ankasa me ne wo bɛyɛ apam na woahu sɛ mene Awurade, 

Hesekiel 16:63
na ɛbɛma woakae na w’ani awu, na w'aniwu nti worentumi mmue w’ano bio, bere a mapata ama wo wɔ nea woayɛ nyinaa ho no,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 16:7
Meyɛɛ wo dodow mpem huhaa sɛ wuram mfefɛwee, na wodɔe yɛɛ kɛse, na w’ahoɔfɛ boroo so, wo mpokua bobɔe na wo nwi fuwii; nanso na woda adagyaw, nam kwaterekwa.”’

Hesekiel 16:8
“‘Mibetwaam faa wo ho, na mihui sɛ wo bere yɛ ɔdɔ bere. Enti metrɛw m’atade mu wɔ wo so kataa w’adagyaw so, na mekaa ntam ne wo yɛɛ apam,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni. ‘Na wobɛyɛɛ me dea. 

Hesekiel 16:9
Afei mede nsu guaree wo hohoroo wo ho mogya, na mede ngo sraa wo. 

Hesekiel 17:1
 Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ: 

Hesekiel 17:10
Na sɛ wotu koduae a, anka ɛbɛyɛ yiye ni? Sɛ apuei mframa fa ho a, ɛrenwu anaa? Akofi a efifii so no so na ebetwintwam.”’”

Hesekiel 17:11
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn bio sɛ: 

Hesekiel 17:12
“Ka kyerɛ atuatew fie no sɛ, ‘So monte eyi ase?’ Ka sɛ, ‘Hwɛ, Babilon hene baa Yerusalem bɛfaa ne hene ne ne mmapɔmma, na ɔde wɔn kɔɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ Babilon. 

Hesekiel 17:13
Afei ɔfaa adehye no mu biako ne no yɛɛ apam na ɔma ɔkaa no ntam; na ɔfaa asase no so atitiriw de wɔn kɔe, 

Hesekiel 17:14
sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ahenni no bɛbrɛ ase, na amma ne ho so, na sɛ edi n’apam no so a, agyina. 

Hesekiel 17:15
Nanso ɔtew atua tiaa no, na ɔsomaa n'abɔfo kɔɔ Egypt sɛ wɔmma no apɔnkɔ ne dɔm bebree. So ebesi no yiye anaa? Nea ɔyɛ eyi no befi mu afi? Nea wabu apam so no bɛfa ne ho adi anaa?’

Hesekiel 17:16
“‘“Sɛ mete ase yi,” Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, “ampa ara, ɔhene a osii no hene a wammu ne nsew no, na wabu n’apam so no trabea, ne nkyɛn hɔ wɔ Babilon, na obewu. 

Hesekiel 17:17
 Na ɛnyɛ dɔm kɛse ne asafo bebree na Farao de bedi ama no. Ɔsa mu wɔbɛto mpempe na wɔasisi aban atenten de atwa akra pii agu.

Hesekiel 17:18
 Ɛnam sɛ watoto ntam ase na wabu apam so, na wadi nse, nanso wayɛ eyinom nyinaa. Ɔremfi mu mfi.”’

Hesekiel 17:19
“‘Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Sɛ mete ase yi, me ntam a ɔtotoo no ase ne m’apam a wabu so nti, mede n'asotwe mebua n'atifi.

Hesekiel 17:2
“Onipa ba, to Israel fie aborɔme, na ka mfatohosɛm yi kyerɛ wɔn,

Hesekiel 17:20
Mɛtrɛw m’atena mu agu ne so, na wɔayi no m'afiri mu; na mede no bɛba Babilon na me ne no adi wɔ hɔ, nokware a wanni me nti. 

Hesekiel 17:21
Na n’asraafo a wobeguan no nyinaa, nkrantɛ ano na bewuwu, na wɔn a wɔaka no, wɔbɛbɔ wɔn apete mframa nyinaa mu. Na moahu sɛ me Awurade na maka.”’

Hesekiel 17:22
“‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mebu kyeneduru kokuroo no nkɔnmu no bi akodua; na mebu nea afefɛw frɔmfrɔm no bi so akɔtɛw wɔ bepɔw tenten kokuroo bi so. 

Hesekiel 17:23
Medua wɔ Israel bepɔw tenten so, na ebeyiyi mmaa na asow aba, na anyin abɛyɛ kyeneduru kɛse. Nnomaa ahorow nyinaa bɛba ase, na wɔbɛtenatena ne nwini ase. 

Hesekiel 17:24
Na wuram nnua nyinaa behu sɛ me, Awurade na mabrɛ dua tenten no ase, na mama dua a ɛba fam so; mama dumono awu, na mama duwui afefɛw. Me Awurade na maka, na mayɛ nso.”’”

Hesekiel 17:3
 sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Da bi ɔkɔre kɛse a ɔwɔ ntaban akɛse ne ntakra atenten, a ntakra nworanworan ayɛ ne ho ma, baa Lebanon bebuu kyeneduru nkoa.

Hesekiel 17:4
Ɔpan dua no mmaa frɔmfrɔm no nkɔnmu de baa kɔɔ aguadi asase bi so, na okoduae wɔ aguadifo kurow bi so. 

Hesekiel 17:5
Afei ɔfaa asase no so aba no bi koduae wɔ asase pa bi so. Oduae wɔ nsu bebree ano te sɛ asukɔn so dua. 

Hesekiel 17:6
 Na efifii yɛɛ bobe a ɛdennanee. Ankɔ soro, na ne mmaa ka buaa ne ho, na ne ntini wɔ n’ase. Afei ɛbɛyɛɛ obobe, na ɛfefɛwee na enyaa nkorata.

Hesekiel 17:7
“‘“Na ɔkɔre kɛse foforo a ɔwɔ ntaban ne ntakra akɛse nso bae. Na obobe no trɛw ne ntini no mu kɔɔ no so. Na ɛtrɛw ne mmaa mu fii n’akofi so kɔɔ ne nkyɛn sɛ ongugu no so nsu. 

Hesekiel 17:8
Woduae wɔ asase pa so, faako a nsu bebree wɔ, sɛnea ebeyiyi mmaa na asow aba, na anyin abɛyɛ obobe dua kɛse.”’

Hesekiel 17:9
“Ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “So ɛbɛyɛ yiye? So ɔrentutu ne ntini, na ontwitwa n’aba na entwintam anaa? Ahaban a ɛfefɛwee no nyinaa betwintwam, na ɛnyɛ basa kɛse anaa dɔm bebree na wɔde beso ne ntini mu atu n’ase. 

Hesekiel 18:1
 Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ: 

Hesekiel 18:10
“‘Na sɛ ɔwɔ ɔba busufo a ɔka mogya gu, na ɔyɛ eyinom nyinaa bi, 

Hesekiel 18:11
 nanso ɔno de, wanyɛ eyinom biara bi; na sɛ odi abosonnuan wɔ bepɔw so na ogu ne yɔnko yere ho fi; 

Hesekiel 18:12
 na sɛ ɔhyɛ ɔbrɛfo ne ohiani so, na ɔbɔ nkurɔfo apoo hwim wɔn nsam nneɛma, ɔmfa awowade mma wɔn na ɔma n’ani so hwɛ abosom fi, yɛ akyide,

Hesekiel 18:13
 na sɛ ɔbɔ bosea gye apempensika ne mfɛntom a, obenya nkwa? Ɔrennya nkwa! Esiane sɛ wayɛ akyide yi nyinaa bi nti, wu na obewu. Ɔno ankasa mogya bebua n'atifi.

Hesekiel 18:14
“‘Na sɛ nso ɔwo ɔba, na ohu bɔne a ne papa yɛe nyinaa, na osuro, na wanyɛ saa bi, 

Hesekiel 18:15
 na wanni abosonnuan wɔ bepɔw so, wamma n’ani so anhwɛ Israel fie abosom fi, na wangu ne yɔnko yere ho fi; 

Hesekiel 18:16
wanhyɛ obiara so, na wannye awowade, wammɔ obiara apoo, ɔde n’aduan ma nea ɔkɔm de no, na ofura ɔdagyafo ntama; 

Hesekiel 18:17
na osianka ne nsa fi ɔbrɛfo ho, na wannye apempensika anaa mfɛntom biara, na odi m’atemmusɛm so na ɔnantew m’ahyɛde mu a, ɔrenwu n’agya amumɔyɛ mu; nkwa na ɔbɛnya.

Hesekiel 18:18
 Na ne papa de, esiane sɛ ɔyɛ osisifo na ɔbɔɔ ne nua apoo hwim ne nneɛma na nea enye nkutoo na ɔyɛe wɔ ne man mu nti, obewu n’amumɔyɛ mu.

Hesekiel 18:19
“‘Afei mubebisa sɛ: “Dɛn nti na ɔba no ansoa agya no bɔne no bi?” Ɔba no de, odii asɛntrenee yɛɛ nea ɛteɛ, na odii m’ahyɛde nyinaa so. Enti nkwa na obenya. 

Hesekiel 18:2
“Motaa fa abebusɛm yi ka wɔ Israel asase so sɛ, ‘Agyanom di bobe bun, nanso mma na wɔn sẽ fem.’ Asɛm yi, mokyerɛ sɛn?

Hesekiel 18:20
Ɔkra a ɔyɛ bɔne no, ɔno ara na obewu. Ɔba rensoa agya bɔne, na agya rensoa ɔba bɔne. Ɔtreneeni trenee bɛba n’ankasa so, na ɔbɔnefo nso abɔnefosɛm bɛba n’ankasa so.

Hesekiel 18:21
“‘Sɛ ɔbɔnefo dan fi ne bɔne a wayɛ nyinaa ho bedi m’ahyɛde nyinaa so, na odi asɛntrenee yɛ nea ɛteɛ a, nkwa na obenya; ɔrenwu. 

Hesekiel 18:22
Bɔne a wayɛ biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛkae. Adetrenee a wayɛ nti, obenya nkwa.’

Hesekiel 18:23
“‘So ɔbɔnefo wu na m’ani gye ho? Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni. Ɛnyɛ nea mepɛ ne sɛ ɔbɛdan afi n’akwan ho na wanya nkwa?’

Hesekiel 18:24
“‘Nanso sɛ ɔtreneeni dan fi ne trenee ho kodi amumɔyɛsɛm, na ɔyɛ akyide a ɔbɔnefo yɛ no nyinaa bi a, so obɛnya nkwa anaa? Ne trenee a ɔyɛe nyinaa, wɔrenkae; ne fom a wafom ne ne bɔne a wayɛ no nti, obewu.

Hesekiel 18:25
“‘Nanso moka sɛ: “Awurade kwan nteɛ.” O Israel fie, monyɛ aso ntie. So m’akwan nteɛ ampa? Ɛnyɛ mo mmom na mo akwan nteɛ?

Hesekiel 18:26
“‘Sɛ ɔtreneeni dan fi ne trenee ho kodi amumɔyɛsɛm na owu wɔ mu a, n’amumɔyɛ a ɔyɛe no nti na wawu.

Hesekiel 18:27
“‘Nanso sɛ ɔbɔnefo dan fi n’abɔnefosɛm a wadi no ho, bedi asɛntrenee na ɔyɛ nea ɛteɛ a, obegye ne kra nkwa. 

Hesekiel 18:28
Sɛ wahu abɔnefosɛm a wadi na wagyae ne nyinaa nti, nkwa na obenya; ɔrenwu.

Hesekiel 18:29
“‘Nanso Israel fie ka sɛ: “Awurade kwan nteɛ.” O Israel fie, so m’akwan nteɛ ampa? Ɛnyɛ mo mmom na mo akwan nteɛ?’

Hesekiel 18:3
“Sɛ mete ase yi, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, moremmu bɛ yi Israel mu bio.

Hesekiel 18:30
“‘Ɛno nti, O Israel fie, mebu mo atɛn sɛnea obiara akwan te,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni. ‘Ne saa nti, monsan na monnan mo ho mfi mo mmaratode nyinaa ho, na mmusu anyɛ hintidua amma mo.

Hesekiel 18:31
Montow mo mmaratode a mode too mmara no nyinaa mfi mo so ngu na munnya koma foforo ne honhom foforo. Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mowuwu yi, O Israel fie?’

Hesekiel 18:32
“‘M’ani nnye ho sɛ obi bewu. Enti monsan na munnya nkwa,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 18:4
Hwɛ, akra nyinaa wɔ me. Sɛnea agya kra wɔ me no, saa ara na ɔba kra wɔ me. Ɔkra a ɔyɛ bɔne no, ɔno ara na obewu.

Hesekiel 18:5
“‘Na sɛ ɔtreneeni di asɛntrenee na ɔyɛ nea ɛteɛ; 

Hesekiel 18:6
 na sɛ wanni abosonnuan wɔ bepɔw so, wamma n’ani so anhwɛ Israel fie abosom fi, wangu ne yɔnko yere ho fi, na wankɔ ɔbea a wayɛ bra ho; 

Hesekiel 18:7
 na sɛ wanhyɛ obi so, na ɔde ɔkafoni awowaside san ma no, na ɔmmɔ obiara apoo nhwim ne nsam nneɛma, na ɔde n’aduan ma nea ɔkɔm de no na ofura ɔdagyafo ntama;

Hesekiel 18:8
 na sɛ wamfa biribiara amma annye mfɛntom anaa apempensika, na ɔtwe ne nsa fi abusude ho, na obu onipa ne ne yɔnko ntam nokwatɛn,

Hesekiel 18:9
 na sɛ ɔnantew m’ahyɛde mu, na odi m’atemmusɛm so na odi nokware a, na ɔyɛ ɔtreneeni. Obenya nkwa,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 19:1
 “Afei twa Israel abirɛmpɔn ho kwadwom, 

Hesekiel 19:10
“‘Anka na wo maame te sɛ wo mogya mu bobe a esi nsu ho. Nsu pii nti, enyaa nkorata bebree na ɛsow aba. 

Hesekiel 19:11
Na ɛbɛyɛɛ poma a ɛyɛ den maa no, ahempoma. Enyin yɛɛ tenten sen nnua a aka, na ne tenten ne ne mman dodow nti, na obiara hu. 

Hesekiel 19:12
Nanso wɔde abufuw tuu n’ase, na wɔtow no kyenee fam maa apuei mframa kisaa n’aba no. Afei wobubuu ne poma dennen no mu, na etwintwamee. Na ogya hyew no. 

Hesekiel 19:13
Na afei wɔatɛw no sare so, asase kesee a nsu nni so so. 

Hesekiel 19:14
Ogya afi ne poma mman no mu, na ahyew n’aba. Na annya poma a ɛyɛ den, ahempoma, bio.

Hesekiel 19:2
na ka sɛ, ‘Wo maame yɛ dɛn? Gyatabere a ɔwɔ agyata mu; ɔda agyatanini ntam, na ɔyɛn ne mma.

Hesekiel 19:3
“‘Ɔyɛn ne mma no mu biako ma ɔbɛyɛɛ gyataforo, na osuaa ahayɔ. Na ɔwee nnipa mpo. 

Hesekiel 19:4
Amanaman tee ne nka, na wɔkyeree no wɔ wɔn amoa mu, na wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn twee no kɔɔ Egypt asase so.

Hesekiel 19:5
“‘Bere a ne maame hui sɛ watwɛn nanso anidaso biara nni hɔ no, ɔfaa ne ba foforo, na ɔde no gyinaa hɔ sɛ gyataforo. 

Hesekiel 19:6
Afei ɔne agyata dii akɔneaba, na ɔbɛyɛɛ gyataforo, osuaa ahayɔ. Ɔwee nnipa mpo. 

Hesekiel 19:7
Afei ohuu faako a ɔte, na ɔsɛee wɔn nkurow maa asase no dan amamfo, na ɔde ne mmobom gyegyeegye hyɛɛ hɔ ma. 

Hesekiel 19:8
Na aman a ɛwɔ ɔmantam no mu nyinaa de wɔn ani sii no so, na wɔtrɛw wɔn asawu mu guu no so, na wɔkyeree no wɔ wɔn amoa mu. 

Hesekiel 19:9
Afei wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn twee no kɔhyɛɛ buw mu de no kɔmaa Babilon hene. Na wɔde atena twee no kɔe sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnte ne nne wɔ Israel mmepɔw so bio.

Hesekiel 2:1
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Onipa ba, sɔre gyina wo nan so na me ne wo nkasa.” 

Hesekiel 2:10
Na ɔtrɛw mu m’anim, na wɔatwerɛw emu ne akyiri, na wɔatwerɛw mu kwadwom, apinisi ne osu.

Hesekiel 2:2
Na ɔrekasa akyerɛ me no, honhom bi baa me mu, na ɛmaa me so gyinaa me nan so, na mitiee nea ɔne me kae no.

Hesekiel 2:3
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Onipa ba, meresoma wo Israel mma nkyɛn, ɔman atuatefo a wɔate m’anim atua no nkyɛn; wɔne wɔn agyanom na afom me de besi nnɛ da yi.

Hesekiel 2:4
Wɔyɛ anuɔdenfo a wɔapirim wɔn koma; me na meresoma wo wɔ wɔn nkyɛn, na woaka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ:  ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni.’ 

Hesekiel 2:5
Na sɛ wotie oo, wɔantie oo; efisɛ wɔyɛ atuatew fie nti; ɛnyɛ dɛn ara a, wobehu sɛ odiyifo bi aba wɔn mu.

Hesekiel 2:6
“Na wo, onipa ba, nsuro wɔn, na nsuro wɔn nsɛm nso, na nsansono ne nsɔe wɔ wo ho, na nkekantwɛre ho na wote de, nanso nsuro wɔn nsɛm, na mma wo bo nntu wɔn anim; na wɔyɛ atuatew fie. 

Hesekiel 2:7
Wo de, sɛ wotie oo, wɔantie oo, ka me nsɛm kyerɛ wɔn, na wɔyɛ atuatewfo.

Hesekiel 2:8
“Na wo, onipa ba, tie nea mereka akyerɛ wo yi. Nyɛ wo ho otuatewfo te sɛ atuatew fie yi. Bue w’anom na di nea mede rema wo yi.”

Hesekiel 2:9
Na mihui sɛ nsa bi ateɛ akyerɛ m’anim a ekura nhoma mmobɔwee. 

Hesekiel 20:1
Afe a ɛto so ason, ɔsram a ɛto so anum no da a ɛto so du no, Israel mpanyimfo bi bae sɛ wɔrebebisa Awurade hɔ ade, na wɔbɛtenatenaa m’anim. 

Hesekiel 20:10
Enti miyii wɔn fii Egypt asase so de wɔn baa sare so.

Hesekiel 20:11
“‘“Na mede m’ahyɛde maa wɔn, na mema wohuu m’atemmusɛm a sɛ onipa di so a, onya mu nkwa no.

Hesekiel 20:12
 Bio nso, mede me home nna maa wɔn na ayɛ sɛnkyerɛnne wɔ me ne wɔn ntam, na wɔahu sɛ me Awurade na matew wɔn ho.

Hesekiel 20:13
“‘“Nanso Israel fie tew me so atua wɔ sare so. Wɔannantew m’ahyɛde mu na wɔpoo m’atemmusɛm a sɛ onipa di so a, onya nkwa no. Na woguu me home nna ho fi pɔtɔɔ, enti mekae sɛ mehwie m’anibere agu wɔn so wɔ sare so na madwerɛw wɔn.

Hesekiel 20:14
Nanso me din nti meyɛe na ɛho anhura, amanaman a wohui sɛ mereyi wɔn no anim. 

Hesekiel 20:15
Na memaa me nsa so kaa wɔn ntam wɔ sare so sɛ meremfa wɔn nkɔ asase a mede maa wɔn no so, asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen wɔ so no. Asase a ɛso yɛ fɛ sen asase biara, 

Hesekiel 20:16
nea enti a ɛte saa ne sɛ wɔpoo m’atemmusɛm, na wɔanni m’ahyɛde so, na me home nna nso, woguu ho fi, na wɔde wɔn koma dii wɔn abosom fi no akyi.

Hesekiel 20:17
“‘“Afei ɛyɛɛ me mmɔbɔ sɛ mɛsɛe wɔn, enti mantɔre wɔn ase wɔ sare no so. 

Hesekiel 20:18
Na meka kyerɛɛ wɔn mma wɔ sare no so sɛ, ‘Monnnantew mo agyanom ahyɛde mu, munnni wɔn atemmusɛm so, na mommfa wɔn abosom fi no nngu mo ho fi. 

Hesekiel 20:19
Mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn. Monnantew m’ahyɛde mu na monkora m’atemmusɛm so na munni so na monyɛ.

Hesekiel 20:2
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 20:20
Monyɛ me home nna no kronkron, na ɛnyɛ sɛnkyerɛnne wɔ me ne mo ntam na moahu sɛ mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn.’

Hesekiel 20:21
“‘“Na wɔn mma no nso tew me so atua. Wɔannantew m’ahyɛde mu na wɔanni m’atemmusɛm a sɛ onipa di so a, onya nkwa no so, woguu me home nna ho fi. Enti mekae sɛ mehwie m’abufuw agu wɔn so, na mede m’anibere awie wɔn so wɔ sare no so. 

Hesekiel 20:22
 Nanso misiankaa me nsa, na me din nti, meyɛe, na ɛho anhura amanaman a miyii wɔn fii wɔn anim no.

Hesekiel 20:23
Na memaa me nsa so kaa wɔn ntam wɔ sare no so, sɛ mɛbɔ wɔn apete amanaman mu, na mapansam wɔn agu nsase so, 

Hesekiel 20:24
efisɛ wɔanni m’atemmusɛm so na wɔpoo m’ahyɛde, na me home nna nso, woguu ho fi; na wɔde wɔn ani dii wɔn agyanom abosom fi no akyi. 

Hesekiel 20:25
Enti me nso memaa wɔn ahyɛde a enye ne atemmusɛm a ɛremma wonnya nkwa ho kwan. 

Hesekiel 20:26
Na miguu wɔn ho fi wɔn ayɛyɛde mu, ne sɛnea wɔma wɔn mmakan fa ogya mu no, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mɛsɛe wɔn, na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.”’

Hesekiel 20:27
“Enti onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Israel fie sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Eyi mu nso mo agyanom kaa abususɛm tiaa me, na wɔanni me nokware. 

Hesekiel 20:28
Mede wɔn baa asase a memaa me nsa so kaa ntam sɛ mede bɛma wɔn no so, na wohuu koko a ɛkorɔn ne dua kusuu biara pɛ na, na wɔfii ase bɔɔ afɔre wɔ hɔ, na wɔde wɔn ayɛyɛde baa hɔ de huruu me bo, na wɔbɔɔ afɔre huamhuam guu nsa wɔ hɔ. 

Hesekiel 20:29
Na meka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Dɛn ne sorɔnsorɔmmea a mokɔ hɔ daa yi? Enti wɔtoo hɔ din sɛ Bamah de besi nnɛ da yi.’”’

Hesekiel 20:3
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Israel mpanyimfo no sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “So me hɔ adebisa na mobae anaa? ‘Sɛ mete ase yi, meremma wommisa me hɔ ade mma mo,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”’

Hesekiel 20:30
“Afei ka kyerɛ Israel fie sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Enti mo agyanom akwan na mode regu mo ho fi, na wɔn akyide na mudi akyi rebɔ aguaman? 

Hesekiel 20:31
 Na sɛ mode mo ayɛyɛde ba na moma mo mma fa ogya mu a, ɛno na mode mo abosom fi yi nyinaa gu mo ho fi mpo de besi nnɛ yi. Enti mema wɔmmisa me hɔ ade mma mo, O Israel fie?

Hesekiel 20:32
‘Na nea ɛba mo adwene mu no, ɛrenyɛ hɔ oo! Nea moka sɛ: Yɛbɛyɛ sɛ amanaman no, sɛ nsase so mmusua no, na yɛasom dua ne ɔbo no.”’”

Hesekiel 20:33
“Sɛ mete ase yi, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni: ampa ara, nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a emu ateɛ ne abufuhyew a wɔahwie agu na mede bedi mo so hene. 

Hesekiel 20:34
Na meyi mo afi aman horow mu na maboaboa mo ano afi nsase a wɔabɔ mo apete so no so. Mede nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a emu ateɛ ne abufuhyew a wɔahwie agu na ɛbɛyɛ eyi. 

Hesekiel 20:35
Na mede mo bɛba amanaman no sare so, na mabɛbu mo atɛn wɔ hɔ, anim ne anim.

Hesekiel 20:36
“‘Sɛnea me ne mo agyanom dii wɔ Egypt sare so no, saa ara na me ne mo bedi; abu mo atɛn,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni. 

Hesekiel 20:37
‘Na mɛma moafa poma no ase na mede mo aba apam hama no mu. 

Hesekiel 20:38
 Na meyiyi mo mu atuatewfo ne wɔn a wɔto me mmara no, wɔn ahɔhobea asase no so na meyi wɔn, nanso wɔremma Israel asase so, na moahu sɛ mene Awurade.’

Hesekiel 20:39
“Enti Israel fie, sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn aka ni, ‘Mo mu biara nkɔsom n’abosom fi. Na sɛ akyiri yi nso moantie me a, morentumi mfa mo abosom fi ne mo ayɛyɛde no ngu me din kronkron no ho fi bio.’

Hesekiel 20:4
“So wubebu wɔn atɛn? Onipa ba, wubebu wɔn atɛn anaa? Ma wonhu wɔn agyanom akyide.

Hesekiel 20:40
“Me bepɔw kronkron so, Israel bepɔw a ɛkorɔn no so, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, ɛhɔ na Israel fie nyinaa, wɔn dodow a ɛwɔ asase no so nyinaa bɛsom me. Ɛhɔ na megye wɔn atom, na mebisa mo ntoboa ne mo ayɛyɛde mu nea edi kan, mo akronkronne nyinaa mu. 

Hesekiel 20:41
Mobɛsɔ m’ani sɛ hua huamhuam, ɛbere a meyi mo afi aman mu no, na maboa mo ano afi nsase a wɔabɔ mo apete so no, mo mu na mɛma wɔayɛ me kronkron, amanaman no anim.

Hesekiel 20:42
“‘Na sɛ mede mo bedu Israel asase a memaa me nsa so kaa mo agyanom ntam sɛ mede bɛma wɔn no so a, mubehu sɛ mene Awurade. 

Hesekiel 20:43
Na ɛhɔ na mobɛkae mo akwan ne mo nneyɛe a mode guu me ho fi no nyinaa, na mo ho ayɛ mo nwini, mo ani so, mo bɔne a moyɛe no nyinaa nti. 

Hesekiel 20:44
Na mubehu sɛ mene Awurade, sɛ me din nti na me ne mo bɛdi, na ɛnyɛ mo akwammɔne no so, ne mo nneyɛe a asɛe no so ntira a, O Israel fie,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 20:45
Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ: 

Hesekiel 20:46
“Onipa ba, fa w’ani kyerɛ anafo fam na ka nsɛm gu anafo fam, na hyɛ anafo fam kwae ho nkɔm.

Hesekiel 20:47
Na ka kyerɛ anafo fam kwae sɛ, ‘Tie Awurade asɛm. Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Hwɛ, mede ogya bɛto wo mu ma ahyew dumono ne duwui biara. Na ogyaframa no rennum, na ahyew asase ani nyinaa afi anafo fam akosi atifi fam.

Hesekiel 20:48
Na ɔhonam nyinaa behu sɛ me Awurade na mede ogya too mu, na ɛrennum.”’”

Hesekiel 20:49
Ɛnna mekae sɛ: “Ah, Awurade Nyankopɔn! Wɔn de, wɔka no ne me ho sɛ: ‘Ɛnyɛ ɛbɛ na ɔrebubu yi?’”

Hesekiel 20:5
Na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Da a mepaw Israel no, memaa me nsa so kaa Yakob fie ntam na mema wohuu me wɔ Egypt asase so. Yiw, memaa me nsa so kaa wɔn ntam sɛ, ‘Mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn.’ 

Hesekiel 20:6
Saa da no, memaa me nsa so kaa wɔn ntam sɛ meyi wɔn afi Egypt asase so akɔ asase a mapɛ ato hɔ ama wɔn so, asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen wɔ so. Ɛyɛ asase a ɛso yɛ fɛ sen asase biara. 

Hesekiel 20:7
Na meka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Mo mu biara ntow akyide a n’ani gye ho no ngu, na mommfa Egypt abosom fi no nngu mo ho fi. Mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn.’

Hesekiel 20:8
“‘“Nanso wɔtew me so atua, na wɔantie me. Wɔn mu biara antow akyide a n’ani gye ho no angu, na wɔannyaw Egypt abosom fi no. Enti mekae sɛ mehwie m’abufuw agu wɔn so, na mede m’anibere awie wɔn so wɔ Egypt asase so. 

Hesekiel 20:9
Nanso me din nti, meyɛe na ɛho anhura amanaman a wɔte wɔn mu no anim, efisɛ bere a miyii wɔn fii Egypt asase so no, mema wohuu me, wɔn ani so. 

Hesekiel 21:1
 Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 21:10
Wɔasew ano sɛ enkum; wɔatwiw ho ma etwa nyinamnyinam.’”’”

Hesekiel 21:11
“‘Wɔde ama sɛ wontwiw ho, sɛnea wɔde nsa bekura mu. Wɔasew nkrante no ano, wɔatwiw ho sɛ wɔde bɛhyɛ okumfo nsam.

Hesekiel 21:12
“‘Onipa ba, su na twa adwo, efisɛ nkrante reba me man so; reba Israel abirɛmpɔn nyinaa so. Wɔde wɔne me man ato hɔ ama nkrante. Enti bɔ wo srɛ ho. 

Hesekiel 21:13
 Na wɔasɔ ahwɛ, na sɛ ɛpo nkrante no bu ahempoma no animtiaa, dɛn na ebesi? Ɛrenkɔ so ntena hɔ,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 21:14
“Na wo, onipa ba, hyɛ nkɔm na bɔ wo nsam, na ne mprɛnsa so no ma ‘Nkrantɛ’ no nsɛe mprenu. Ɛyɛ awufo nkrante. Ɛyɛ otitiriw a wawu nkrante, na edi wɔn so kyinhyia. 

Hesekiel 21:15
Mede nkrante no asisi wɔn apon nyinaa ano, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ na koma atutu, na hintidua adɔɔso nti. Ah, ɛho retwa yerɛwyerɛw, na wɔatwiw ho sɛ enkum! 

Hesekiel 21:16
 O nkrante, twa kɔ nifa! Na twa kɔ benkum! Baabiara a wɔde w’ani bɛkyerɛ biara! 

Hesekiel 21:17
Na me nso mefua twɛde abom, na mama m’anibere ano adwo. Me Awurade na maka.”

Hesekiel 21:18
Na Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 21:19
“Onipa ba, yɛ akwan abien ma Babilon hene nkrante mfa so mmra. Ma abien no nyinaa mfi asase biako so, na yɛ akyerɛkyerɛkwan; yɛ wɔ kurow no nkwanta so. 

Hesekiel 21:2
“Onipa ba, fa w’ani kyerɛ Yerusalem na woro nsɛm gu kronkronbea hɔ, na hyɛ nkɔm tia Israel asase,

Hesekiel 21:20
Siesie ɔkwan ma nkrante no nkɔ Ammonfo kurow Raba mu, na biako nkɔ Yuda, Yerusalem kurow a ɛyɛ den no mu. 

Hesekiel 21:21
Babilon hene gyina nkwanta no so, akwan abien no nkwanta so, sɛ rekɔ abisa. Ɔwosow agyan no, nam terafim ahoni so bisa ade; hwɛ berɛbo mu. 

Hesekiel 21:22
Na nea adebisa no ma ohui wɔ ne nsa nifa mu ne Yerusalem, sɛ ɔnhyehyɛ mfiri a wɔde dwiriw afasu, na wɔmmɔ ose, ɔmfa mfiri nnwiriw kurow no apon ngu, na onsi pempe ntwa ho nhyia, na ɔnto akoban. 

Hesekiel 21:23
Na ɛbɛyɛɛ wɔn ani so sɛ nkɔntoro wɔ wɔn a wɔaka wɔn ntam no. Nanso ɔbɛkae wɔn amumɔyɛ na wakyere wɔn.

Hesekiel 21:24
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ moama wɔakae mo amumɔyɛ na mo mmarato ho ada hɔ ama wɔahu mo bɔne wɔ biribiara mu nti, esiane sɛ wɔkae mo, wɔde nsa bɛkyere mo.’

Hesekiel 21:25
“Na wo, O Israel obirɛmpɔn omumɔyɛfo a wo da adu, amumɔyɛ bere a etwa to mu, 

Hesekiel 21:26
sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Yi abotiten no na tu ahemmotiri no. Ɛrenyɛ sɛnea ɛte no bio. Nea abrɛ ase no, ma so; na nea ɛwɔ soro no, brɛ no ase. 

Hesekiel 21:27
Ɔsɛe, ɔsɛe, ɔsɛe na mɛma aba. Na eyi nso rentra hɔ, de bɛkɔ akosi sɛ nea atemmu wɔ no no, na mede ama no.’

Hesekiel 21:28
“Na wo, onipa ba, hyɛ nkɔm na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn ka fa Ammonfo ne ahohora a wɔde aba ho ni.’ Na ka sɛ, ‘Nkrante, wɔatwe nkrante a wɔde bekum, na wɔatwiw ho sɛ enni nam na ɛho ntwa yerɛwyerɛw. 

Hesekiel 21:29
Ɛbere a wɔka anisoadehu a ɛnyɛ nokware hyɛ nkɔntoro kyerɛ wo, sɛnea wɔde wo bɛto abɔnefo a wɔawuwu kɔn ho, atɔfo a wɔn da adu wɔ amumɔyɛ bere a etwa to mu. 

Hesekiel 21:3
 na ka kyerɛ Israel asase sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Hwɛ, me ne wo anya asɛm, na mɛtwe me nkrante afi ne boha mu atwa ɔtreneeni ne ɔbɔnefo afi asase no so. 

Hesekiel 21:30
Fa wo nkrantɛ san hyɛ ne boha mu. Faako a wɔbɔɔ wo, asase a wɔwoo wo so no so na mebu wo atɛn. 

Hesekiel 21:31
Mehwie m’abufuw agu wo so. Na mefita m’anibere gya mu wɔ wo so, na mayi wo ahyɛ mmarima atirimɔdenfo a wonim sɛe ho nyansa no nsa. 

Hesekiel 21:32
Wɔde wo bɛsɔ gya, ama wo mogya agu asase no mfimfini, na wɔrenkae wo bio. Me Awurade na maka.’”

Hesekiel 21:4
Enti me nkrante befi ne boha mu aba ɔhonam nyinaa so, fi anafo kosi atifi, na metwa ɔtreneeni ne ɔbɔnefo afi asase no so. 

Hesekiel 21:5
Na ɔhonam nyinaa behu sɛ me Awurade na matwe me nkrante afi ne boha mu. Ɛrensan nkɔ n’akyi bio.”’

Hesekiel 21:6
“Onipa ba, fa koma a abubu si apini, na gu ahome yawyaw wɔ wɔn anim.

Hesekiel 21:7
 Na sɛ wobisa wo sɛ, ‘Dɛn nti na woresi apini?’ a, ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Amanneɛbɔ bi ntia.’ Na ɛbɛba mu, na koma nyinaa bɛnan na nsa nyinaa mu agugow, na honhom nyinaa abotow na nkotodwe nyinaa mu adwudwo sɛ nsu. ‘Hwɛ, ɛbɛba mu ɔkwan biara so,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 21:8
Na Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 21:9
“Onipa ba, hyɛ nkɔm na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade se ni: “Ka sɛ, ‘Nkrante, nkrante! Wɔasew ano, na wɔatwiw ho. 

Hesekiel 22:1
 Na Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 22:10
Wo mu na woyi agya adagyaw so; wo mu na wɔkɔ nea asabu ama ne ho akum no ho.

Hesekiel 22:11
 Na obi ne ne yɔnko yere yɛ akyide, na obi gu ne sew ho fi aniwude mu, wo mu na obi to ne nuabea, ne papa ba mmonaa.

Hesekiel 22:12
 Wo mu na wogye adanmude hwie mogya gu. Wugye mfɛntom ne apempensika, na wobɔ wo mfɛfo apoo de nya wo ho, na me de, wo werɛ afi me,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 22:13
“‘Hwɛ, mede me twɛde bɛbom agu wo mfaso bɔne ne mogyahwiegu a ɛwɔ wo mu no so. 

Hesekiel 22:14
Wo koma betumi agyina anaasɛ wo nsam bɛyɛ den, nna a mene wo bɛdi no? Me Awurade na maka, na mɛyɛ nso. 

Hesekiel 22:15
Mɛbɔ wo apete amanaman mu, na mapansam wo, nsase so, na mayi afide a ɛwɔ wo mu nyinaa.

Hesekiel 22:16
Wo ho begu fi wɔ amanaman anim na woahu sɛ mene Awurade.’”

Hesekiel 22:17
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 22:18
“Onipa ba, Israel fie ayɛ sɛ dwetɛ mu fi wɔ m’ani so. Wɔn nyinaa yɛ kɔbere ne sanyaa ne dade ne sumpii wɔ fononoo mu. Wɔayɛ sɛ dwetɛ mu fi pɔtɔɔ.

Hesekiel 22:19
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ mo nyinaa ayɛ sɛ dwetɛ mu fi nti, mɛboaboa mo ano wɔ Yerusalem mfinimfini. 

Hesekiel 22:2
“Na afei, onipa ba, wubebu atɛn, wubebu mogya kurow no atɛn ama wahu n’akyide nyinaa? 

Hesekiel 22:20
Sɛnea wɔboa dwetɛ ne kɔbere ne dade ne sumpii ne sanyaa ano gu fononoo mu na wofita gya mu ma ɛnan no, saa ara na mɛboaboa mo ano wɔ m’abufuw ne m’anibere mu na mafita mu ma moanan. 

Hesekiel 22:21
 Yiw, mɛboaboa mo ano na mafita m’abufuw gya mu agu mo so, na moanan wɔ kurow no mu. 

Hesekiel 22:22
Sɛnea dwetɛ nan wɔ fononoo mu no, saa ara na mobɛnan wɔ kurow no mu, na mubehu sɛ me Awurade na mahwie m’abufuw agu mo so.’”

Hesekiel 22:23
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 22:24
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Woyɛ asase a ɛso ntew, asase a osu ntɔ nguu so abufuw da. 

Hesekiel 22:25
N’adiyifo pam wɔ so, te sɛ gyata a ɔbobom tetew ne hanam mu. Wɔmemene akra, wɔfa ademude ne aboɔdenne, na wɔma emu akunafo dɔɔso. 

Hesekiel 22:26
N’asɔfo bu me mmara so, na wɔgu m’akronkronne ho fi. Wɔmma nsonsonoe mmɛda akronkronne ne nea ɛnyɛ kronkron ntam, anaa nea ɛho tew ne nea ɛho ntew ntam. Wobu wɔn ani gu me home nna so, na wogu me ho fi wɔ wɔn mfinimfini. 

Hesekiel 22:27
Ne mmapɔmma a wɔte wɔn mu te sɛ mpataku a wɔtetew hanam mu hwie mogya gu, na wɔsɛe akra de pɛ mfaso bɔne. 

Hesekiel 22:28
Nanso n’adiyifo de akado sra so ma wɔn, na wonya anisoadehu a ɛnyɛ nokware hyɛ nkɔntoro sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni,” bere a Awurade nkaa hwee. 

Hesekiel 22:29
Ɔman no mufo bɔ nkurɔfo apoo hwim wɔn nneɛma, wɔtan ɔbrɛfo ne ohiani ani, na wɔde atɛntrenee to nkyɛn bɔ ɔhɔho apoo.’

Hesekiel 22:3
Na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “O Kurow a ɛhwie mogya guo wɔ mu, sɛ ne bere mmra, na ɛyɛ abosonhuhuw de gu ne ho fi, 

Hesekiel 22:30
“‘Na mehwɛe sɛ menya ɔbarima bi wɔ wɔn mu a obesiesie kurow no ɔfasu na wagyina ntokuru no mu wɔ m’anim ama asase no na mansɛe no, nanso mannya obiara. 

Hesekiel 22:31
Enti mehwie m’abufuw agu wɔn so na matɔre wɔn ase wɔ m’anibere gya mu. Na mɛma wɔn akwan abua wɔn ti so,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 22:4
mogya a wuhwie gui no ama woadi fɔ, na abosom fi a woyɛe no ama wo ho agu fi. Woama wo nna abɛn, na wo mfe aba awiei. Ɛno nti mede wo ayɛ ahohorade ama amanaman, ne fɛwdi ama nsase nyinaa.

Hesekiel 22:5
Nsase a ɛbɛn wo ne nea ɛwɔ akyirikyiri nyinaa bedi wo ho fɛw, sɛ O kurow a wo din ho agu fi, kurow a basabasayɛ ahyɛ wo ma. 

Hesekiel 22:6
Hwɛ sɛnea Israel abirɛmpɔn a wɔwɔ mo mu no, wɔn mu biara de ne tumi hwie mogya gu.

Hesekiel 22:7
Wo mu na wɔbɔ agya ne ɛna so mpekua, wosisi ɔhɔho, na wɔteetee agyanka ne okunafo a wɔwɔ wo nkyɛn no.”’”

Hesekiel 22:8
“‘Woabu m’akronkronne animtiaa, na woagu me home nna ho fi.

Hesekiel 22:9
Wo mu na nkontompofo wɔ, sɛ wobɛhwie mogya agu, wo mu na wɔn a wodi abosonnuan wɔ mmepɔw so wɔ, wo mfinimfini na wɔn a wɔbɔ ahohwibra wɔ.

Hesekiel 23:1
 Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 23:10
Wɔn na woyii n’adagyaw so, na wɔfaa ne mmabarima ne ne mmabea kɔe, na ɔno nso, wɔde nkrante kum no. Ogyee dimmɔne wɔ mmea mu, na wobuu no atɛn.

Hesekiel 23:11
“Bere a ne nuabea Oholiba hui no, n’akɔnnɔ bɔne no bɛyɛɛ hu sen no, na na n’aguamammɔ no sen ne nua no de koraa. 

Hesekiel 23:12
Ɔde akɔnnɔ bɔne dii Asiriafo akyi, amradofo ne asoafo a na wɔbɛn wɔn, wɔn a wofurafura ntama pa, apɔnkɔsotefo a wɔn nyinaa yɛ mmerante ahoɔfɛfo. 

Hesekiel 23:13
Na mihui sɛ wagu ne ho fi, wɔn baanu nyinaa nam ɔkwan koro so. 

Hesekiel 23:14
Afei n’aguamammɔ no yɛɛ kɛse koraa bere a ohuu nnipa a wɔakurukyerɛw wɔn agu ɔfasu ho, Kaldeafo ahoni mfonini a wɔde adukɔkɔɔ ayɛ no. 

Hesekiel 23:15
Nawɔde abɔso akyekyere wɔn asen bobɔ abotiri atenten. Wɔn nyinaa te sɛ akofofo, te sɛ Babilonfo a wɔn ase fi Kaldea asase so. 

Hesekiel 23:16
N’ani bɔɔ wɔn so no, wɔn ho akɔnnɔ dɛw ne mu, na otuu abɔfo kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn wɔ Kaldea. 

Hesekiel 23:17
Babilonfo baa ne nkyɛn wɔ ne dɔ mpa so, na wɔde wɔn aguamammɔ guu ne ho fi. Na ɔde wɔn guu ne ho fi no, ɔtew ne kra fii wɔn ho. 

Hesekiel 23:18
“Oyii n’adagyaw so maa n’aguamammɔ ho daa hɔ, enti ne ho yɛɛ me abofono na me kra twee ne ho sɛnea ne nuabea ho yɛɛ me abofono na me kra twee ne ho no. 

Hesekiel 23:19
 Na ɔkɔɔ so ara bɔɔ aguaman ma wɔkaee ne mmabaaberem aguamammɔ wɔ Egypt asase so. 

Hesekiel 23:2
“Onipa ba, nammea baanu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔn nyinaa fi maame biako. 

Hesekiel 23:20
Na n’ani beree ne mpenafo nom a, wɔn barima te sɛ mfurum de, na wɔn ahobaa te sɛ apɔnkɔ de no. 

Hesekiel 23:21
Na wo kɔn dɔɔ wo mmabaabere mu ahohwibra, berɛ a wo mmabaabere mu mpokua nti Egyptfo miamiaa wo nufu no.

Hesekiel 23:22
“Ɛno nti, Oholiba, sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Hwɛ, mɛhwanyan w’adɔfo a wo kra atwe ne ho afi wɔn ho no aba wo so; mede wɔn bɛba wo so wɔ afa nyinaa, 

Hesekiel 23:23
Babilonfo ne Kaldeafo nyinaa, ne Pekod ne Soa ne Koa mmarima, ne Asiriafo a wɔka wɔn ho nyinaa, mmarima ahoɔfɛfo, amradofo ne asoafo nyinaa, nnɔnkunini ne wɔn a wɔwɔ din, a wɔn nyinaa tete apɔnkɔ so. 

Hesekiel 23:24
Nteaseɛnam ne ntwahonan ne asafodɔm ne akyɛm akɛse ne nketewa ne dade kyɛw na wɔde bɛba wo so. Na wobetwa wo ho nyinaa ahyia, na mɛma wɔabu wo atɛn sɛnea wɔn atemmu te. 

Hesekiel 23:25
Na mede me ninkuntwe mɛsa wo, na wɔne wo bedi wɔ abufuw so. Wobetwa wo hwene ne w’aso, na wo mu nkae bɛtotɔ nkrantɛ ano. Wɔbɛfa wo mmabarima ne wo mmabea akɔ, na wɔde ogya bɛhyew wo nneɛma a ɛbɛka nyinaa. 

Hesekiel 23:26
Wɔbɛworɔw wo ntade na wɔafa w’agude afɛfɛ no akɔ. 

Hesekiel 23:27
Na mɛma w’ahohwibra to atwa, w’aguamammɔ a wode fi Egypt bae no. Na woremma w’ani so nhwɛ wɔn, na worenkae Egypt bio.’

Hesekiel 23:28
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Hwɛ, mede wo bɛhyɛ wɔn a wotan wɔn no nsa, wɔn a wo kra atwe ne ho afi wɔn ho no nsa.

Hesekiel 23:29
Wɔne wo bedi wɔ ɔtan so na wɔafa nea woabrɛ anya nyinaa, na wobegyaw wo adagyaw ne, kwaterekwa mu. Na wɔayi w’aguamammɔ adagya so ne w’ahohwibra ne w’aguamammɔ de nyinaa so.

Hesekiel 23:3
Na wɔbɔɔ aguaman wɔ Egypt, wɔn mmabaaberem pɛɛ. Ɛhɔ na womiamiaa wɔn nufu na wogoruu wɔn kokom, wɔn mmaabunberem. 

Hesekiel 23:30
Mɛyɛ wo eyinom nyinaa efisɛ woyɛɛ wo ho aguaman dii amanaman no akyi, na wode wɔn abosom fi guu wo ho fi. 

Hesekiel 23:31
Wofaa wo nuabea no kwan so; enti mede ne kuruwa bɛhyɛ wo nsam.’

Hesekiel 23:32
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Wobɛnom wo nuabea no kuruwa a emu dɔ na ɛtrɛw no ano. Na wɔbɛserew wo adi wo ho fɛw, efisɛ kuruwa no mu nneɛma dɔɔso. 

Hesekiel 23:33
Asabow ne awerɛhow bɛhyɛ wo ma, ahodwiriw ne ahoyeraw kuruwa, wo nuabea Samaria kuruwa no. 

Hesekiel 23:34
Wobɛnom afifew mu ma asa, na wobɛwe ne nkyɛmfɛre na woatetew wo nufu. “Me na maka,” Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.’

Hesekiel 23:35
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ wo werɛ afi me na woatow me akyene w’akyi nti, wobɛsoa ɛho nsunsuanso no; w’ahohwibra ne w’aguamammɔ.’”

Hesekiel 23:36
Na Awurade san ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Onipa ba, wubebu Ohola ne Oholiba atɛn? Ɛnde ka wɔn akyide kyerɛ wɔn.

Hesekiel 23:37
Wɔasɛe aware, na mogya wɔ wɔn nsam; wɔde wɔn abosom fi na asɛe aware. Afei nso, wɔde wɔn mma a wɔawo wɔn ama me no afa ogya mu ama abosom no adi sɛ aduan. 

Hesekiel 23:38
Bio nso, eyi na wɔayɛ me, wɔguu me kronkronbea ho fi da no ara, na me home nna nso, wɔguu ho fi.

Hesekiel 23:39
Na bere a wokunkum wɔn mma maa wɔn abosom fi no wiei no, wɔsan baa me kronkronbea hɔ saa da no behuraa ho. Hwɛ, saa na wɔayɛ wɔ me fie mfinimfini pɛɛ. 

Hesekiel 23:4
Ɔpanyin no din de Ohola, na ne nua no de Oholiba, wɔbɛyɛɛ me dea, na wɔwoo mmabarima ne mmabea. Edin Ohola no gyina hɔ ma Samaria, na Oholiba nso gyina hɔ ma Yerusalem.

Hesekiel 23:40
Afei nso wotuu abɔfo kɔɔ mmarima a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri nkyɛn maa wɔbae, na wɔn nti wuguare de adubiri kekaa w’ani akyi, na wode agude hyehyɛɛ wo ho. 

Hesekiel 23:41
Wotenaa mpa fɛfɛ so, na wusiesiee ɔpon de sii ho, na wode m’aduhuam ne me ngo sisii so. 

Hesekiel 23:42
Afei wɔtee nnipa pii a wɔn ho adwo wɔn nne wɔ hɔ, na wɔde asabofo fii sare so bɛkaa nnipadɔm no mu mmarima ho, na wɔde nkapo guu wɔn nsa de abotiri fɛfɛ bobɔɔ wɔn ti.

Hesekiel 23:43
“Ɛnna mekaa nea awaresɛe nti ama wagurow no ho asɛm sɛ, ‘Mmarima no ne no bɛbɔ aguaman mprempren yi ara, na ɔno nso ne wɔn bɛbɔ?

Hesekiel 23:44
Na wɔkɔɔ ne ho sɛnea mmarima kɔ ɔbea aguaman ho no; saa kwan no so na wɔkɔɔ mmea ahohwifo Ohola ne Oholiba ho.

Hesekiel 23:45
Na mmarima atreneefo na wɔde awaresɛefo atemmu ne mogyakagufo atemmu bebu wɔn atɛn, efisɛ wɔyɛ awaresɛefo, na mogya wɔ wɔn nsam.

Hesekiel 23:46
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Ma asafo bi ntu mmra wɔn so, na yi wɔn ma ahoguan ne ɔfom.

Hesekiel 23:47
Na asafo no besiw wɔn abo de nkrante atwa wɔn akyene. Wobekunkum wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea na wɔde ogya ahyew wɔn afie. 

Hesekiel 23:48
Afei metu ahohwibra ase afi asase no so, na mmea nyinaa besua biribi afi mu na wɔammɔ mo ahohwibra no bi. 

Hesekiel 23:49
Na wɔde mo ahohwibra begu mo ti so na moasoa mo abosom fi no ho bɔne, na mubehu sɛ mene Awurade Nyankopɔn.’”

Hesekiel 23:5
“Ohola fii m’akyi kɔbɔɔ aguaman, na ɔde akɔnnɔ anibere kodii n’adɔfo Asiriafo a na wɔbɛn no no akyi, 

Hesekiel 23:6
amradofo a wofurafura ntama bruu, ne asoafo a wɔn nyinaa yɛ mmerante ahoɔfɛfo, apɔnkɔsotefo a wɔtete apɔnkɔ so. 

Hesekiel 23:7
Na ɔde n’aguamammɔ kɔɔ wɔn so, Asiriafo a wɔapaw mu ayi wɔn no nyinaa, na ɔde wɔn a ne kɔn dɔ wɔn nyinaa, wɔn abosom nyinaa guu ne ho fi. 

Hesekiel 23:8
 Nanso wannyae n’aguamammɔ a ɔde fii Egypt no, efisɛ wɔne no dae ne mmabaaberem, na wogoruu ne kokom, ne mmaabunberem; na wɔhwiee wɔn aguamammɔ guu no so.

Hesekiel 23:9
Ɛno nti mayi no ahyɛ n’adɔfo nsa, Asiriafo a ɔde n'akɔnnɔ anibere dii wɔn akyi no nsa. 

Hesekiel 24:1
 Bio nso, afe a ɛto so akron, ɔsram a ɛto so du no da a ɛto so du no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 24:10
Ma nnyina no nnɔɔso, ma ogya no nnɛw. Noa nam no ma ɛmmen yiye. Na fa nnuhuam gu mu ma no empiw na nnompe no nhyew. 

Hesekiel 24:11
Afei fa kuku a hwee nnim no si nnyansramma no so na ɛnnɔ. Nea ɛbɛyɛ na ne kɔbere adɔ ayɛ kɔɔ, na emu fi no anan na ne nnaakyen asa. 

Hesekiel 24:12
Ɛyɛ ɔhaw! Ɛyɛ ɔbrɛ, nanso ne nkannare bebree no mfii ne mu. Ogya mu na wɔmma ne nkannare ngu!’

Hesekiel 24:13
“‘W’afide mu na ahohwibra wɔ, sɛ matwiw wo ho na emfi nti, wo ho rentew mfiri wo fi no mu bio, de bɛkɔ akosi sɛ mɛma m’abufuhyew ano adwo wo so.

Hesekiel 24:14
Me Awurade na maka. Ɛbɛba mu, na mɛyɛ nso. Meremmu m’ani ngu so, merenhu mmɔbɔ na merennu me ho. Sɛnea w’akwan te ne wo nneyɛe te no, saa ara na wobebu wo atɛn,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 24:15
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 24:16
“Onipa ba, mɛbɔ ade a w’ani gye ho afi hɔ, nanso mmɔ wo koko nni awerɛhow, nsu, ntew nusu. 

Hesekiel 24:17
Gu ahome komm, nni owufo ho nkɔmmɔ, fa w’abɔtiri bɔ wo ti, na fa wo mpaboa hyɛ, na nkata w’ano, na nni nnipa aduan.”

Hesekiel 24:18
 Enti mekasa kyerɛɛ ɔman no anɔpa, na me yere wui anwummere. Na anɔpa no meyɛe sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ me no.

Hesekiel 24:19
Ɛnna ɔman no bisaa me sɛ: “Worenka nea eyinom kyerɛ nkyerɛ yɛn a woreyɛ seyiye?” 

Hesekiel 24:2
“Onipa ba, kyerɛw da yi din to hɔ, da yi ara. Babilon hene atow ahyɛ Yerusalem so saa da yi ara. 

Hesekiel 24:20
Na meka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 24:21
‘Ka kyerɛ Israel fie sɛ: “Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Merehura me kronkronbea no ho, nea mode hoahoa mo ho denneennen no, nea mo ani gye ho no, ne mo kra ade a ɛdɔ no; na mo mmabarima ne mo mmabea a mugyaw wɔn akyiri no bɛtotɔ nkrante ano. 

Hesekiel 24:22
Na mobɛyɛ sɛnea mayɛ yi, morenkata mo ano na morenni nnipa aduan.

Hesekiel 24:23
Na mo abotiri bɛbobɔ mo ti, na mo mpaboa ahyehyɛ mo anan. Morentwa adwo na morensu, na mobɛsɔn agu, na amumɔyɛ mu, na mobɛsisi apini akyerɛkyerɛ mo ho mo ho.

Hesekiel 24:24
Na Hesekiel ayɛ mo sɛnkyerɛnne. Na nea wayɛ nyinaa mo nso mobɛyɛ bi. Na sɛ ɛba mu a, moahu sɛ mene Awurade Nyankopɔn.’”’”

Hesekiel 24:25
“Na wo, onipa ba, da a meyi wɔn guankɔbea, nea wodi ho ahurusi, nea wɔn ani gye ho na wɔn kra kɔn dɔ, wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea a,

Hesekiel 24:26
wafi mu afi no bɛba wo nkyɛn abɛma w'aso ate.

Hesekiel 24:27
Saa da no wubebue w’ano akyerɛ nea wanya ne ti adidi mu no na woakasa, na worentɔ mum bio. Na wobɛyɛ sɛnkyerɛnne ama wɔn na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.”

Hesekiel 24:3
Enti bu atuatew fie yi bɛ na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ,

Hesekiel 24:4
Fa nankum pa nyinaa bi gu mu, srɛ ne basa; na fa nnompe a ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ nso hyɛ no ma. 

Hesekiel 24:5
Fa oguan a ne ho yɛ akɔnnɔ, na fa nnyina hyehyɛ nnompe no ase ma no enhuru yiye, na noa ma ɛmmen.”’”

Hesekiel 24:6
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Due, mogya kurow! Ɔsɛn a emu awe nkannare, a ne nkannare mfii no mu! Yiyi mu ade, nankum, nankum, a wɔmmɔɔ so ntonto. 

Hesekiel 24:7
Ne mogya wɔ ne mu. Ɔde guu ɔbotan kwaboo so. Wamfa angu fam amfa dɔte ankata so. 

Hesekiel 24:8
Nea ɛbɛyɛ na ahwanyan anibere na ama aweredi aba nti, na memaa ne mogya guu ɔbotan kwaboo so, na wɔankata so. 

Hesekiel 24:9
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mogyahwiegu kurow, due! Na mɛma ase gya adɔɔso. 

Hesekiel 25:1
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 25:10
Mede bɛka Ammon ho ama Apuei Famfo adi so na wɔankae Ammonfo bio wɔ aman no mu. 

Hesekiel 25:11
Na mebu atɛn wɔ Moab, na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.’

Hesekiel 25:12
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ Edom tɔɔ Yuda fie so were na wɔyɛɛ wɔn bɔne kɛse saa kwan no so nti, 

Hesekiel 25:13
sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Me nso mɛteɛ me nsa wɔ Edom so na matwa nnipa ne nyɛmmoa afi asase no so, na efi Teman kosi Dedan nyinaa, mɛma adan amamfo. Nkrante ano na wobewuwu. 

Hesekiel 25:14
‘Na menam me man Israel nsa so bebu Edom atɛn; na m’abufuw ne m’anibere so na wɔne Edom bedi; na wobehu sɛnea m’aweredi te, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”’

Hesekiel 25:15
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ Filistifo tɔɔ wɔn so were na wɔn kra yii wɔn ahii, na wɔtan wɔn daa pɛe sɛ wɔsɛe wɔn nti, 

Hesekiel 25:16
ɛno nti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn seɛ ni: “Mɛteɛ me nsa wɔ Filistifo so na matwa Keretifo afi hɔ, na masɛe nea aka mpoano no. 

Hesekiel 25:17
Na mede abufuhyew kɛse mɛtɔ wɔn so were, na sɛ mɛtɔ wɔn so were a wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.”’”

Hesekiel 25:2
“Onipa ba, fa w’ani kyerɛ Ammonfo na hyɛ wɔn ho nkɔm. 

Hesekiel 25:3
Na ka kyerɛ Ammonfo sɛ, ‘Muntie Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm. Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Esiane sɛ mokae sɛ Ahaa! bere a wohuraa me kronkronbea ho, ne bere a Israel asase dan amamfo, ne bere a Yuda fie kɔɔ nkoasom mu nti, 

Hesekiel 25:4
 ɛno nti, mede wo bɛma Apuei Famfo ma wɔadi wo so, na wɔbɛba abɛkyekye wɔn asoɛe na wɔasisi wɔn ntamadan wɔ w’asase so. Na wobedi wo nnɔbae anom wo nufusu. 

Hesekiel 25:5
Mɛma Raba adan yoma adidibea na Ammon adan nguan ahomegyebea; na moahu sɛ mene Awurade.”’”

Hesekiel 25:6
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ wobɔɔ wo nsam de wo nan pempem hɔ dii ahurusi wo koma mu na dii Israel asase ho fɛw nti, 

Hesekiel 25:7
me nso mɛteɛ me nsa wɔ wo so, na mede wo bɛma amanaman sɛ asade; metwa wo afi aman mu na matɔre w’ase afi nsase so. Mɛsɛe wo na woahu sɛ mene Awurade.’

Hesekiel 25:8
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ Moab ne Seir ka sɛ: “Yuda fie te sɛ aman a aka no nyinaa” nti, 

Hesekiel 25:9
mɛma Moab nkyɛn mu ada hɔ wɔ nkurow no mu, nkurow a ɛwɔ n’ahye so, asase a eye no, Bet-Yesimot ne Baal-Meon kosi Kiriataim. 

Hesekiel 26:1
Afe a ɛto so dubiako, ɔsram no da a edi kan no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 26:10
N’apɔnkɔ dodow no bɛma mfutuma akata wo so. Na apɔnkɔsotefo ne ntwahonan ne nteaseɛnam gyegyeegye nti w’afasu bɛwosow, bere a ɔfa w’apon mu ba wo so te sɛ kurow a abubu ma akwan abɛdeda mu no. 

Hesekiel 26:11
Ɔde n’apɔnkɔ nan betiatia wo mmorɔn nyinaa so. Na ɔde nkrante bekunkum wo nkurɔfo na w’ahoɔden adum ahwehwe fam. 

Hesekiel 26:12
Wɔbɛfa w’ahode na wɔafom w’aguade, na wobebubu w’afasu na wɔadwiriw w’adan fɛfɛ no agu. Na wɔde w’abo ne wo nnua ne wo dɔte begu nsu mu.’

Hesekiel 26:13
“‘Mɛma wo dwonto gyegyeegye no agyae, na wɔrente w’asanku nne bio. 

Hesekiel 26:14
Mɛma woayɛ sɛ ɔbotan kwaboo na woadan asau hatabea. Wɔrenkyekye wo bio; me Awurade na maka,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 26:15
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛ Tiro ni, ‘Sɛ wɔte w’asehwe, na wɔn a wɔapirapira no penepene, na wokunkum wo mu nnipa a, nsuano aman renwosow anaa? 

Hesekiel 26:16
 Ɛhɔ na ɛpo so abirɛmpɔn nyinaa befi wɔn agua so asisi fam, na wobeyiyi wɔn ntade nguguso ne wɔn nwentama agu hɔ. Na wobefura ahopopo na wɔatenatena fam. Wɔn ho bɛpopo bere biara na wɔatɛɛ wɔn anom ahwɛ wo. 

Hesekiel 26:17
Na wobetwa wo ho kwadwom aka akyerɛ wo sɛ:

Hesekiel 26:18
 Afei ɛda a wobɛhwe ase no, nsuano aman ho bɛpopo. Yiw, w’awiei bɛma po mu nsupɔw awosow.”’

Hesekiel 26:19
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Sɛ mema wodan amamfo te sɛ nkurow a obiara nte mu, na mema subun kata wo so na nsu pii yiri fa wo so a, 

Hesekiel 26:2
“Onipa ba, Tiro adi Yerusalem ho fɛw sɛ, ‘Ahaa, wɔabubu aman no pon no. Afei ɛbɛdan aba me nkyɛn. Wɔasɛe no yi, mɛyɛ ma.’

Hesekiel 26:20
mede wo bɛka wɔn a wɔsian kɔ adamoa mu no ho akɔka tetefo ho, na mɛma woatena asase ase tɔnn, te sɛ tete amamfo so, wo ne wɔn a wɔsian kɔ adamoa mu no, na obiara rentena wo mu bio. Na mesiesie ateasefo asase so fɛfɛɛfɛ.

Hesekiel 26:21
“‘Mɛma ehu atɔ wo so na worentena hɔ bio; nnipa bɛhwehwɛ wo, nanso wɔrenhu wo da biara da bio,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 26:3
Eyi nti, sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Hwɛ, mene wo anya, O Tiro, na mede amanaman bebree mɛba wo so, sɛnea ɛpo de n’asorɔkye ba no. 

Hesekiel 26:4
Na wɔbɛsɛe Tiro afasu adwiriw n’aban agu, na mɛwerɛwerɛw ne ho dɔte ma wayɛ ɔbotan kwaboo. 

Hesekiel 26:5
Ɛbɛdan beae a wɔhata asau wɔ po mfinimfini.’ “‘Me na maka, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, ɛbɛyɛ amanaman asade. 

Hesekiel 26:6
Na nkuraa-nkuraa a atwa ho ahyia nyinaa bɛtotɔ nkrante ano, na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.’

Hesekiel 26:7
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mɛma Babilon hene Nebukadnessar, ahene mu hene no, afi atifi fam aba Tiro so. Na ɔde apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔsotefo ne asafodɔm kɛse na ɛbɛba. 

Hesekiel 26:8
Nkuraa-nkuraa a atwa wo ho ahyia nyinaa bɛtotɔ nkrante ano, na ɔbɛto akoban na wasi pempe atwa wo ho ahyia na ɔde kyɛm kɛse aba wo so; 

Hesekiel 26:9
na ɔde n’afiri bedwiriw w’afasu na ɔde n’akode abubu w’aban. 

Hesekiel 27:1
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 27:10
 Na Persia ne Lidia ne Put mmarima wɔ wo dɔm mu sɛ w’akofo. Wɔde kyɛm ne dade kyɛw sensɛnee wo mu, wɔn na wɔmaa w’anim baa nyam.

Hesekiel 27:11
Awadfo ne w’asraafo na wɔtwaa w’afasu ho hyiae, na Gamadfo wɔ w’aban atentene mu. Wɔde wɔn akyɛm sensɛnee w’afasu ho hyiae, na wɔmaa w’ahoɔfɛ wiee pɛyɛ.

Hesekiel 27:12
“‘“Wo ne Tarsis dii gua, ɛnam wo nnepa ahorow pii nti. Wɔde dwetɛ, dade, sanyaa, ne sumpii bɛsesaa wo nneɛma. 

Hesekiel 27:13
Wo ne Yawan ne Tubal ne Mesek dii gua. Na wode w’aguade maa wɔn de gyee nnipa akra ne kɔbere nneɛma. 

Hesekiel 27:14
Wɔde apɔnkɔ ne ako-pɔnkɔ ne mfurumpɔnkɔ fi Togarma fie bae de begyee wo nneɛma. 

Hesekiel 27:15
Dedanfo ne wo dii gua; na nsuano aman bebree dii gua maa wo, na wɔde asommɛn ne duabo tuaa wo ka. 

Hesekiel 27:16
 Siria ne wo dii gua, w’aguade pii nti. Na wode wo nneɛma maa wɔn de gyee nsrammabo, ɔtankɔkɔɔ, nwentama, mmota, ne aboɔden abo kɔkɔɔ.

Hesekiel 27:17
“‘“Wo ne Yuda ne Israel dii gua. Wode w’aguade maa wɔn de gyee Minit awi, aduan pa, ɛwo, ngo, ne balsam aduhuam.

Hesekiel 27:18
“‘“Wo ne Damasko dii gua nneɛma pii a woyɛe, ɛnam wo nnepa pii nti, na ɔno nso maa wo Helbon nsa ne oguan nhwi fitaa.

Hesekiel 27:19
Dan ne Yawan fi Usal bae ne wo bedii gua. Wɔde dade nneɛma ne kasia dua ne sibiri huamhuam brɛɛ wo de gyee w’aguade. 

Hesekiel 27:2
“Na afei onipa ba, twa Tiro ho kwadwom. 

Hesekiel 27:20
Wo ne Dedanfo dii gua ma wɔmaa wo nwentama a wɔde to apɔnkɔ so tena so. 

Hesekiel 27:21
Arabiafo ne Kedar abirɛmpɔn nyinaa dii gua maa wo. Wodii nguammaa ne adwennini ne mpapo ho gua maa wo. 

Hesekiel 27:22
Wo ne Seba ne Raama aguadifo dii gua, na wode wo nneɛma maa wɔn de gyee nnuhuam papa ne aboɔden abo nyinaa bi ne sika kɔkɔɔ. 

Hesekiel 27:23
Wo ne Haran ne Kane ne Eden a wɔyɛ Seba, Asur ne Kilmad aguadifo dii gua. 

Hesekiel 27:24
Wɔne wo dii gua, na wɔde ntade fɛfɛ, nguguso a wɔde ntama bruu ne ntama ahorow ahorow ayɛ, kuntu a wɔde asaawa abien abom ayɛ, ne ahama a wɔakyinkyim no denneennen baa wo gua so.

Hesekiel 27:25
“‘“Tarsis ahyɛn soaa w’aguade maa wo, na ama woayɛ ma na w’anim aba nyam wɔ po mfinimfini tɔnn.

Hesekiel 27:26
“‘“W’aharefo no de wo kɔɔ nsu bebree so, nanso apuei mframa bubuu wo wɔ po no mfinimfini tɔnn.

Hesekiel 27:27
Wo nnepa ne nneɛma a wotɔn, w’aguade, w’ahyɛn mufo ne emu adwumayɛfo, wɔn a wotuatua wo mu ntokuru, w’aguadifo ne w’akofo nyinaa, w’asafo ne wɔn a wɔwɔ wo mu nyinaa bɛmem po mu, da a wobɛhwe ase no.

Hesekiel 27:28
“‘“W’ahyɛn kwankyerɛfo nteɛmu nne nti mpoano nsase bɛwosow. 

Hesekiel 27:29
Wɔn a wokura atabon, ne hyɛn mufo, ne po so kwankyerɛfo nyinaa besisi afi wɔn ahyɛn mu abegyinagyina asase so. 

Hesekiel 27:3
Na ka kyerɛ Tiro sɛ:

Hesekiel 27:30
Wɔbɛma wɔn nne so asu wo yayaayaw. Na wɔde mfutuma begu wɔn atifi amunumunum wɔ nso mu. 

Hesekiel 27:31
Wo nti, wɔbɛbɔ tikwaw afurafura atweaatam na wɔn kra de awerɛhow asu wo yayaayaw. 

Hesekiel 27:32
Na wobetwa wo ho kwadwom atwa adwo sɛ,

Hesekiel 27:33
Bere a wode w’aguade fi po so bae no, womaa aman pii mee. Wode wo nnepa pii ne w’aguade maa asase so ahene nyaa wɔn ho. 

Hesekiel 27:34
Afei po no abubu wo wɔ subun mu tɔnn. W’aguade ne w’asafo nyinaa bɛhwe ase wɔ wo mu.

Hesekiel 27:35
Nsuano aman nyinaa bɛtɛɛ wɔn anom ahwɛ wo, na awɔse begu wɔn ahene. Na obiara benyinyan n’anim. 

Hesekiel 27:36
Aguadifo a wofi aman horow so bɛbɔ wo so hwirema hwee hwee. Mɛma ehu abubu wo, na worentra hɔ bio da biara da.’”’”

Hesekiel 27:4
W’ahye wɔ po mfinimfini tɔnn. W’abantofo ama w’ahoɔfɛ awie pɛyɛ. 

Hesekiel 27:5
Senir ɔpopaw mu mpuran na wɔde yɛɛ w’ahye nyinaa, Lebanon kyeneduru na wɔde yɛɛ wo hyɛnnua. 

Hesekiel 27:6
Basan adum na wɔde yɛɛ w’atabon. Na Kitim nsupɔw so kwabɔhɔrɔ a wɔde asommɛn asiesie ho na wɔde yɛɛ w’anim. 

Hesekiel 27:7
Egypt nwera a ɛyɛ fɛ na wɔde yɛɛ wo so ntama, wo mframatama. Na hama bruu ne ɔtankɔkɔɔ a efi Elisah nsupɔw so na wɔde yɛɛ wo nkataso.

Hesekiel 27:8
“‘“Sidonfo ne Awadfo ne w’aharefo. O Tiro, w’animdefo a wɔwɔ wo mu no bɛyɛɛ w’ahyɛn mu akwankyerɛfo. 

Hesekiel 27:9
Gebal mpanyimfo ne emu animdefo na wotuatuaa wo mu ntokuru. Na po so ahyɛn ne emu adwumayɛfo nyinaa baa wo nkyɛn ne wo bedii gua. 

Hesekiel 28:1
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 28:10
“‘Wubewu momonotofo wu wɔ ahɔho nsam; me na maka,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 28:11
Na Awurade asɛm toaa baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 28:12
“Onipa ba, twa Tiro hene ho kwadwom, na ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni:

Hesekiel 28:13
 Na wote Eden, Onyankopɔn turom. Na aboɔden abo nyinaa yɛ wo nkataho, bogyanambo, akraatebo, ahwehwɛbo, sikaberebo, apopobibiribo, yasepe, hoabo, nsrammabo, ne ahabammonobo, na sika kɔkɔɔ na wɔde hyehyɛɛ ne nyinaa. Na wo mpintin ne wo bɔmmaa som w’anim, da a wɔbɔɔ wo no na wosiesie maa wo. 

Hesekiel 28:14
Mede wo sii hɔ sɛ kerub a wɔasra no a ɔkata so. Onyankopɔn bepɔw kronkron so na wotenae. Na ogya abo ntam na wonantewee. 

Hesekiel 28:15
Da a wɔbɔɔ wo no, na w’akwan nyinaa teɛ kosii sɛ wohuu wo mu abusude no.

Hesekiel 28:16
“‘“W’aguade dodow nti, wɔde amimdi hyɛɛ wo mu ma, na woyɛɛ bɔne. Enti metow wo fii Onyankopɔn bepɔw so sɛ afide. Na mesɛee wo, O kerub a wokata so, fii ogya abo no ntam.

Hesekiel 28:17
“‘“W’ahoɔfɛ nti, wo koma maa ne ho so. Na w’anuonyam nti, wosɛee wo nyansa. Ɛno nti, metow wo kyenee asase so na mede wo too ahene anim sɛ wɔnhwɛ wo.

Hesekiel 28:18
“‘“W’amumɔyɛ dodow ne w’aguadi bɔne nti, woguu wo kronkronbea ho fi. Ɛno nti memaa ogya fii wo mu bae, na ɛbɛhyew wo. Na memaa wodanee nso asase so, wɔ wɔn a wɔhuu wo nyinaa anim. 

Hesekiel 28:19
Wɔn a na wonim wo, aman nyinaa mu bɛtɛɛ wɔn anom ahwɛ wo. Woabɛyɛ ehu, na wɔrenhu wo bio da biara da.”’”

Hesekiel 28:2
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Tiro ɔkannifo sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni:

Hesekiel 28:20
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 28:21
“Onipa ba, fa w’ani kyerɛ Sidon na hyɛ ne ho nkɔm,

Hesekiel 28:22
na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “O Sidon, me ne wo anya asɛm, na wɔbɛhyɛ me anuonyam wɔ wo mu. Sɛ mebu atɛn wɔ ne mu, na miyi ne mu kronkronyɛ adi a, wɔbɛhu sɛ mene Awurade.

Hesekiel 28:23
Mɛma owuyare aba no so na mogya atene afa ne mmɔnten so. Na apirafo atotɔ no mu, nkrantɛ a efi mmaa nyinaa bɛba no so no ano, na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade. 

Hesekiel 28:24
Na ohwirom bɔne biara remma Israel fie so, na nsɔe a ano yɛ yaw remfi wɔn a wɔatwa wɔn ho ahyia a wɔbu wɔn animtiaa no mu mma bio; na wobehu sɛ mene Awurade Nyankopɔn.”’

Hesekiel 28:25
“‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Sɛ meboaboa Israel fie ano fi aman a wɔapete wɔn kɔ so no mu a, mɛyi me kronkronyɛ adi wɔ wɔn mu amanaman no ani so. Na wɔbɛtena wɔn asase so, asase a mede maa m’akoa Yakob no so. 

Hesekiel 28:26
 Na wɔbɛtena so dwoodwoo na wɔasisi adan ayeyɛ bobe nturo. Yiw, wɔbɛtena ase dwoodwoo bere a mabu wɔn a wɔatwa wɔn ho ahyia a wobu wɔn animtiaa no atɛn no; na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn.”’”

Hesekiel 28:3
hwɛ, wunim nyansa sen Daniel! Na ahintasɛm biara nni hɔ a ɛboro wo so. 

Hesekiel 28:4
Wo nyansa ne wo nhumu ama woanya wo ho, na woanya sika ne dwetɛ agu w’akorade mu.

Hesekiel 28:5
Wo nyansa dodow ne wo w’aguadi na wode ama w’ahode adɔɔso, na w’ahonya dodow ama wo koma ahoman.”’

Hesekiel 28:6
“‘Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Esiane sɛ woama wo koma ayɛ sɛ onyame koma nti, 

Hesekiel 28:7
 hwɛ, mede ahɔho bɛba wo so, amanaman mu anuɔdenfo, na wɔde wɔn nkrante bɛsɛe wo nyansa fɛfɛ no na wɔahura w’anuonyam ho. 

Hesekiel 28:8
Wɔde wo besian akɔ amoa mu tɔnn, na wubewu atɔfo wu wɔ ɛpo mfimfini.

Hesekiel 28:9
So wobɛka akyerɛ nea ɔrekum wo no sɛ, ‘Meyɛ onyame? Na wo de, wobɛyɛ onipa na wonyɛ onyame, wɔ nea wɔreku wo no nsam.”’

Hesekiel 29:1
Afe a ɛto so du, ɔsram a ɛto so du no da a ɛto so dumien no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 29:10
Enti hwɛ, me ne wo ne Nil asuasu anya, na mɛma Egypt asase asɛe, na ɛso awo, na adan amamfo afi Migdol akosi Sine ne Etiopia ahye so nyinaa. 

Hesekiel 29:11
Ɔdesani anaa aboa biara nan remfa so, na wɔrentena so mfe aduanan. 

Hesekiel 29:12
Na mɛma Egypt asase adan amamfo aka nsase a adan amamfo mu; aka nkurow ada mpan mu, na ne nkurow asɛe mfe aduanan, na mɛbɔ Egyptfo apete aman so na mabɔ wɔn apansam nsase so.”

Hesekiel 29:13
“‘Na sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mfe aduanan no ba awiei a, mɛboaboa Egyptfo ano afi aman a wɔbɔɔ wɔn pansam so no mu. 

Hesekiel 29:14
Na mede Egyptfo a wɔwɔ nkoasom mu no bɛsan aba, na mede wɔn aba Patros asase so bio, wɔn asase a wofi so no so, na wɔayɛ ahenni a abrɛ ase wɔ hɔ.

Hesekiel 29:15
Ɛbɛyɛ ahenni mu nea abrɛ ase, na ɛremma ne ho so bio wɔ amanaman so, na mɛma wɔn so ahuan na wɔanni amanaman no so bio. 

Hesekiel 29:16
Na Israel fie remfa wɔn ho nto no so bio, na wɔankae wɔn amumɔyɛ ankodi wɔn akyi sɛ wɔmmoa wɔn. Na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade Nyankopɔn.”’”

Hesekiel 29:17
Afe a ɛto so aduonu ason, ɔsram a edi kan no da a edi kan no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 29:18
“Onipa ba, Babilon hene Nebukadnessar maa n’asraafo kɔyɛɛ Tiro ho adwuma. Na eti nyinaa so popae na mmati nyinaa ho worɔworɔwee. Nanso ɔne n’asraafo no annya akatua biara amfi dwuma a wokodii Tiro no mu.

Hesekiel 29:19
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mede Egypt asase bɛhyɛ Babilon hene Nebukadnessar nsa, na ɔbɛfa n’ahode, asoa asade pii akɔ, na wafom emu nneɛma nyinaa; ɛno na ɛbɛyɛ n’asraafo no akatua.’

Hesekiel 29:2
“Onipa ba, fa w’ani si Egypt hene Farao so na hyɛ nkɔm tia ɔne Egypt nyinaa. 

Hesekiel 29:20
“‘Na mede Egypt asase ama no sɛ ne som ho akatua, efisɛ wɔyɛɛ adwuma maa me,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 29:21
“Saa da no, mɛma abɛn bi afifi wɔ Israel fie na mama woabue w’ano wɔ wɔn mu; na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.”

Hesekiel 29:3
Kasa na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Hwɛ, me ne wo anya, O Egypt hene Farao, O asuboa kɛse a woda Nil asuasu mu, wo a woka sɛ, M‘Asubɔnten Nil yɛ me dea, na m’ankasa na meyɛ fae’. 

Hesekiel 29:4
Mede akɔtɔkoro mɛwora w’afono mu na mama Nil asuasu mu mpataa afomfam w’abona ho. Na matwe wo ne mpataa a ɛfomfam w’abona ho no nyinaa afi Nil asuasu mu. 

Hesekiel 29:5
Mɛtow wo ne Nil asuasu mu mpataa nyinaa agu sare so. Na wobɛkɔ akɔtɔ wuram wɔ petee mu. Wɔrentase wo na wɔremmoa w’ano. Na mede wo bɛma wuram mmoa ne wim nnomaa sɛ aduan. 

Hesekiel 29:6
Na Egyptfo nyinaa behu sɛ mene Awurade, efisɛ wɔbɛyɛɛ demmire poma maa Israel fie. 

Hesekiel 29:7
Bere a wosoo wo mu no, wubukawee na womaa wɔn mmati hunhuanee. Na bere a wɔde wɔn ho twerii wo no, wububui ma wɔn sisi wosowee.”

Hesekiel 29:8
“‘Ɛno nti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mede nkrante reba wo so, na metwitwa nnipa ne nyɛmmoa nyinaa afi wo mu.

Hesekiel 29:9
Egypt asase bɛsɛe adan amamfo, na wobehu sɛ mene Awurade, efisɛ ɔkae sɛ, ‘Asubɔnten Nil wɔ me, na m’ankasa na meyɛe.’ 

Hesekiel 3:1
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me bio sɛ: “Onipa ba, di nea wuhu yi. Di nhoma mmobɔwee yi na kɔkasa kyerɛ Israel fie.”

Hesekiel 3:10
Na ɔtoaa so ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Onipa ba, me nsɛm a mɛka akyerɛ wo no nyinaa fa wo koma gye, na fa w’aso tie. 

Hesekiel 3:11
 Na sim kɔ nkurɔfo a wɔafa wɔn nnommum no, wo manfo no nkyɛn, na sɛ wotie oo, wɔantie oo, ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛɛ na Awurade Nyankopɔn se.’”

Hesekiel 3:12
Ɛnna honhom no maa me so, na metee ɔwosow kɛse nne wɔ m’akyi sɛ: Nhyira ne Awurade anuonyam fi nea ɔte hɔ. 

Hesekiel 3:13
Na mesan tee ateasefo no ntaban a ɛretwitwiw mu no nnyigyei, ne ntwahonan a ɛwɔ wɔn nkyɛn mu no nnyigyei, ne ɔwosow kɛse nne.

Hesekiel 3:14
Enti honhom no maa me so faa me kɔe, na mekɔɔ no awerɛhow mu, me honhom anibere mu; nanso Awurade nsa yɛɛ den wɔ me so. 

Hesekiel 3:15
Enti mebaa nnommum a wɔtete Kebar asubɔnten ho no nkyɛn wɔ Tel-Abib, na mekɔtenaa wɔn mu. Midii nnanson wɔ hɔ, na me ho dwiriw me wɔ wɔn mu.

Hesekiel 3:16
Nnanson twaa mu no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 3:17
“Onipa ba, mede wo asi Israel fie ɔwɛmfo, enti tie m’anom asɛm na bɔ wɔn kɔkɔ ma me. 

Hesekiel 3:18
Sɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbɔnefo sɛ, ‘Owu na wubewu,’ na woammɔ no kɔkɔ, na woankasa ankyerɛ ɔbɔnefo no ma wamfi n'akwammɔne so na wannya nkwa a, ɛnde ɔno ɔbɔnefo no bewu n’amumɔyɛ mu de, nanso ne mogya de, mebisa afi wo nsam. 

Hesekiel 3:19
Na sɛ wobɔ ɔbɔnefo kɔkɔ na wamfi n’amumɔyɛ ho ne n'akwammɔne so a, obewu n’amumɔyɛ mu, na wo de, woayi wo kra. 

Hesekiel 3:2
Enti mibuee m’anom, na ɔma midii nhoma mmobɔwee no. 

Hesekiel 3:20
 Bio nso, sɛ ɔtreneeni dan fi ne trenee ho kodi amumɔyɛsɛm na mede hintidua to n’anim a, obewu efisɛ woammɔ no kɔkɔ. Obewu ne bɔne no mu, na wɔrenkae adetrenee a ɔyɛe no, nanso ne mogya de, mebisa afi wo nsam. 

Hesekiel 3:21
Na sɛ wobɔ ɔtreneeni kɔkɔ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔtreneeni yɛ bɔne, na sɛ wanyɛ bɔne a, obenya nkwa efisɛ watie kɔkɔbɔ, na wo nso woayi wo kra.”

Hesekiel 3:22
Afei Awurade nsa baa me so wɔ hɔ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Sɔre kɔ asasetaw no so, na me ne wo bɛkasa wɔ hɔ.” 

Hesekiel 3:23
Enti mesɔre kɔɔ asasetaw no so, na hwɛ, mihuu Awurade anuonyam sɛ egyina hɔ te sɛ anuonyam a mihui wɔ Kebar asubɔnten ho no, na mede m’anim butuw fam. 

Hesekiel 3:24
 Na honhom no bɛhyɛn me mu maa migyinaa m'anan so, na ɔne me kasae, ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Kɔ na kɔto wo ho mu hyɛ wo fie.

Hesekiel 3:25
Na wo, O onipa ba, wɔde ntampehama bɛkyekyere wo, na worentumi mfi adi nkɔ wɔn mu. 

Hesekiel 3:26
Na mɛma wo tɛkrɛma afam wo dodom na woatɔ mum, na worentumi nkasa nkyerɛ wɔn, efisɛ wɔyɛ atuatew fie. 

Hesekiel 3:27
Na sɛ me ne wo kasa a, mebue w’ano na woaka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Sɛɛ na Awurade Nyankopɔn se.’ Ma nea obetie ntie, na nea ɔrentie nnyae, efisɛ wɔyɛ atuatew fie.

Hesekiel 3:3
Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Onipa ba, di gu wo yafunu mu, na ma nhoma mmobɔwee a mede rema wo yi nhyɛ wo nsono ma.” Enti midii, na ɛyɛɛ m’anom dɛdɛɛdɛ te sɛ ɛwo.

Hesekiel 3:4
Na ɔtoaa so ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Onipa ba, sim kɔ Israel fie kɔka me nsɛm kyerɛ wɔn. 

Hesekiel 3:5
Ɛnyɛ ɔman a wɔka pɔtɔ kasa anaa ɔman a wɔn tɛkrɛma yɛ duru nkyɛn na meresoma wo, na mmom Israel fie. 

Hesekiel 3:6
Ɛnyɛ aman pii a wɔka pɔtɔ kasa anaa wɔn a wɔn tɛkrɛma yɛ duru a wonte wɔn kasa. Sɛ saafo no nkyɛn na mesomaa wo a, anka wobetie wo. 

Hesekiel 3:7
Nanso Israel fie de, wɔrentie wo, efisɛ wɔmpɛ sɛ wotie me, na Israel fie nyinaa kɔn asen na wɔn koma yɛ den. 

Hesekiel 3:8
Hwɛ, mama w’anim ayɛ den te sɛ wɔn anim na wo moma so ayɛ den te sɛ wɔn moma so. 

Hesekiel 3:9
Mayɛ wo moma so sɛ dɛnkyɛmmo, na ɛyɛ den sen twɛrebo. Nsuro wɔn, na mma wo bo nntu wɔn anim, efisɛ wɔyɛ atuatew fie.”

Hesekiel 30:1
Na Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn bio sɛ:

Hesekiel 30:10
“Sɛa Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mɛfa Babilon hene Nebukadnessar nsa so ama Egypt dɔm to atwa. 

Hesekiel 30:11
Na mede ɔne ne man, atirimɔdenfo a wɔhyɛ aman so, bɛba abɛsɛe asase no. Na wɔbɛtwe nkrante wɔ Egypt so na atɔfo ahyɛ asase no so ma. 

Hesekiel 30:12
Mɛma Nil asuasu ayow adan asase kesee na matɔn asase no ama abɔnefo, na mɛma ahɔho asɛe asase no ne nea ɛwɔ so nyinaa. Me Awurade na maka.’

Hesekiel 30:13
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mɛsɛe abosom fi no; na matwa abosonhuhuw no so afi Nof, na abirɛmpɔn rentena Egypt asase so bio, na mɛma ehu aka Egypt asase. 

Hesekiel 30:14
Mɛsɛe Patros pasaa, mɛsɔ Soan ase gya na mabu Noh atɛn. 

Hesekiel 30:15
Mehwie m’abufuw agu Egypt abannennen Sin so, na metwa Noh dɔm akyene. 

Hesekiel 30:16
Mɛsɔ Egypt ase gya. Sin ho bɛdɛre no, wobebubu akɔfa Noh mu, na Nof bɛwɔ ahohiahia mu da biara! 

Hesekiel 30:17
On ne Pi-Beset mmerante bɛtotɔ nkrante ano, na nkurow no bɛkɔ nkoasom mu. 

Hesekiel 30:18
Sɛ miyi Egypt kɔndua fi hɔ a, esum beduru Tapanes ɛda no. Na n’ahoɔden ahantan to betwa wɔ ne mu. Ɔno de, omununkum bɛkata no so, na ne mmabea akɔ nkoasom mu. 

Hesekiel 30:19
Sei na mebu Egypt atɛn na wɔahu sɛ mene Awurade.’”

Hesekiel 30:2
“Onipa ba, hyɛ nkɔm na ka sɛ, ‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Muntwa adwo, ‘Ɛda no!’ 

Hesekiel 30:20
Na afe a ɛto so dubiako, ɔsram a edi kan no da a ɛto so ason no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 30:21
“Onipa ba, mabu Egypt hene Farao basa, na hwɛ, wɔnkyekyeree sɛ wɔresa no yare; na wɔremfaa ntamabamma nso nkyekyeree so na anya ahoɔden de aso nkrante mu.”

Hesekiel 30:22
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Me ne Egypt hene Farao anya asɛm, na mebubu n’abasa, nea ɛyɛ den ne nea emu abu no, na mɛma nkrante afi ne nsam atɔ fam.

Hesekiel 30:23
Na mɛbɔ Egyptfo apete aman so na mabɔ wɔn apansam nsase so. 

Hesekiel 30:24
Mɛhyɛ Babilon hene abasa mu den na mede me nkrante ahyɛ ne nsam, mebubu Farao abasa na wasi apini wɔ n’anim te sɛ obi a wapira opirabɔne. 

Hesekiel 30:25
 Na mɛhyɛ Babilon hene abasa mu den na Farao abasa mu agow; na sɛ mede me nkrante hyɛ Babilon hene nsam na wɔtene no Egypt asase so a, wobehu sɛ mene Awurade. 

Hesekiel 30:26
Na mɛbɔ Egyptfo apete aman so na mabɔ wɔn apansam nsase so. Na wobehu sɛ mene Awurade.’”

Hesekiel 30:3
Na ɛda no abɛn, Awurade da no abɛn. Na ɛbɛyɛ omununkum da, amanaman no bere. 

Hesekiel 30:4
Nkrante bɛba Egypt so, na nketenkete akita Etiopia, ɛbere a nnipa bɛtotɔ wɔ Egypt, na wɔafa n’ahode kɔ, adwiriw ne fapem agu, 

Hesekiel 30:5
Etiopia, Put, Lidia, ne afrafrafo dɔm nyinaa, ne Kub, ne wɔn a wɔne wɔn wɔ apam no nyinaa bɛtotɔ nkrantɛ ano.”’

Hesekiel 30:6
“Sɛ Awurade se ni, ‘Wɔn a wɔboa Egypt nso bɛtotɔ, na n’ahoɔden ahantan no abrɛ ase. Efi Migdol kosi Siene wɔbɛtotɔ nkrantɛ ano, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.’ 

Hesekiel 30:7
‘Na wɔayɛ pasaa, nsase a ayɛ pasaa mu, na ne nkurow ada nkurow a asɛe mu. 

Hesekiel 30:8
Na sɛ mesɔ Egypt ase gya na n’aboafo nyinaa sɛe a, wobehu sɛ mene Awurade. 

Hesekiel 30:9
Saa da no, metu abɔfo ma wɔde hyɛn akɔ, akɔma Etiopiafo wɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ anibiannaso mu no abɔ piriw, na ehu bɛba wɔn mu sɛ Egypt da no, na hwɛ, ɛreba.’

Hesekiel 31:1
Na afe a ɛto so dubiako, ɔsram a ɛto so abiɛsa no da a edi kan no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ: 

Hesekiel 31:10
“Enti sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Esiane sɛ ɛbɛyɛɛ tenten kokuroo maa ne nkɔnmu duu omununkum mu na ne tenten maa ne koma homan nti, 

Hesekiel 31:11
mede no bɛhyɛ amanaman tumfoɔ no nsa. Na ɔne no bedi no nwenweenwene. N’abɔnefosɛm nti mɛpam no. 

Hesekiel 31:12
Na ahɔho, amanaman mu anuɔdenfo na wɔbetwa no ato fam na wɔagyaw no hɔ, mmepɔw so ne abon nyinaa mu na ne nnubaa begugu, na ne mman akɛseɛ no abubu wɔ asase so nsubon nyinaa mu. Na asase so aman nyinaa befi ne nwini ase agyaw no hɔ. 

Hesekiel 31:13
Wim nnomaa nyinaa bɛba abesisi ne dutan a ɛda fam no so, na wuram mmoa nyinaa bɛba ne mmaa so. 

Hesekiel 31:14
Afei nsu ho dua biara renyɛ tenten kokuroo bio, na ne nkɔnmu rennu omununkum mu bio, na nea ɛnom nsu biara remma ne ho so ntia wɔn bio, efisɛ wɔde wɔn nyinaa bɛma owu na wɔakɔ asase ase tɔnn, wɔ adesamma mu, wɔn a wosian kɔ amoa mu no nkyɛn.’

Hesekiel 31:15
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Da a ɛbɛkɔ asaman no, mɛma awerɛhow aba. Na ne nti mɛkata subun no so, na mɛtwe ne nsuwansuwa no asan na masiw nsu bebree ano. Ne nti mɛma Lebanon asu no na wuram nnua nyinaa abotow. 

Hesekiel 31:16
N’asehwe gyegyeegye so na mɛma amanaman awosow, bere a mɛto no akɔ Asaman aka wɔn a wosian kɔ Amoa mu no ho. Na Eden nnua nyinaa, Lebanon nnepa a ɛyɛ fɛ nyinaa, nea ɛnom nsu nyinaa bɛkyekye wɔn werɛ wɔ asase ase. 

Hesekiel 31:17
Wɔn nso a na wɔyɛ ne basa a wɔte n’ase nwini mu, amanaman mu no, wɔne no besian akɔ Asaman, akɔ nkrante ano atɔfo nkyɛn.

Hesekiel 31:18
“‘Eden dua bɛn na wosɛ no wɔ anuonyam ne kɛseyɛ mu? Nanso wɔde wo bɛka Eden nnua ho akɔ asase ase tɔnn. Na wo ne momonotofo bɛda faako, wɔn a wɔde nkrante akunkum wɔn nkyɛn. Farao ne ne dɔm nyinaa ni,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 31:2
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Egypt hene Farao ne ne dɔm sɛ,

Hesekiel 31:3
Hwɛ, Asiria te sɛ Lebanon so kyeneduru, ne mman fɛfɛ, n’ahaban kusuu a ɛma onwini, dua a ɛkorɔn a ne nkɔnmu du omununkum mu tɔnn. 

Hesekiel 31:4
Nsu ma ɛyɛɛ kɛse; subun ma enyin kɔɔ soro. Na ɛho nsuwansuwa twaa ne mfuw ho nyinaa hyiae, na eyiyii nsuka kɔɔ wuram nnua nyinaa ho. 

Hesekiel 31:5
Ɛno nti na enyin kokuroo kɔɔ soro sen wuram nnua a aka nyinaa.

Hesekiel 31:6
Ne nnubaa no so na wim nnomaa nyinaa bɛyɛɛ wɔn mmerebuw, na ne mmaa ase na wuram mmoa nyinaa woo wɔn mma, na ne nwini ase na aman akɛse nyinaa tenae. 

Hesekiel 31:7
Ɛbɛyɛɛ dupɔn fɛfɛ, na ne mmaa yɛɛ atenten kusuu, efisɛ na ne ntini kɔ nsu bebree ho. 

Hesekiel 31:8
 Nkyeneduru biara nni Onyankopɔn turom a na ɛte sɛ ɛno. Na ɔpopaw dua biara nni hɔ a ɛne ne nnubaa sɛ, na kyɛnkyɛn dua biara nni hɔ a na ɛte sɛ ne mmaa. Dua biara nni Onyankopɔn turom a na ɛyɛ fɛ te sɛ ɛno. 

Hesekiel 31:9
Mede ne mman dodow maa ɛyɛɛ fɛ maa nnua a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn Eden turo mu no nyinaa ani beree no.

Hesekiel 32:1
 Na afe a ɛto so dumien, ɔsram a ɛto so dumien no da a edi kan no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 32:10
Wo nti mɛma aman pii ho adwiriw wɔn, na wɔn ahene bɛbɔ hu bere a mihim me nkrante wɔ wɔn anim no, na da a wobɛhwe ase no wɔn ho bɛpopo bere nyinaa, wɔn mu biara kra nti.’

Hesekiel 32:11
“Na sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Babilon hene nkrante bɛba wo so. 

Hesekiel 32:12
Na mɛma nnɔmmarima, atirimɔdenfo a wɔhyɛ aman so nyinaa, de wɔn nkrante akunkum wo dɔm, na wɔbɛsɛe Egypt ahantan na wɔatɔre ne dɔm nyinaa ase. 

Hesekiel 32:13
Na mɛsɛe n’afieboa nyinaa afi nsu akɛse ho, na onipa nan remfono no bio, na afieboa mpo nan remfono no.’

Hesekiel 32:14
“‘Ɛno na mɛma wɔn nsu ani agyen, na wɔn nsubɔnten asen sɛ ngo,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 32:15
“‘Sɛ mema Egypt asase dan amamfo na nea ama asase no so ayɛ ma nyinaa sɛe na mikunkum wɔn a wɔte so nyinaa a, wobehu sɛ mene Awurade.

Hesekiel 32:16
“‘Eyi ne kwadwom a wɔde besu no. Amanaman mmabea de besu no; wobetwa Egypt ne ne dɔm nyinaa ho kwadwom,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 32:17
Na afe a ɛto so dumien, ɔsram no da a ɛto so dunum no, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 32:18
“Onipa ba, twa Egypt dɔm ho agyaadwo na ma wɔne amanaman atumfo mmabea nsian nkɔ asase ase tɔnn; nka wɔn a wosian kɔ Amoa mu no ho.

Hesekiel 32:19
“‘Hena na wo ho yɛ fɛ sen no? Sian kɔ fam kɔda momonotofo nkyɛn!’

Hesekiel 32:2
“Onipa ba, twa Egypt hene Farao ho kwadwom na ka kyerɛ no sɛ, ‘Wote sɛ amanaman mu gyataforo, wote sɛ asuboa kɛse wɔ po mu, na wuhuruhuruw wɔ wo nsu mu de wo nan fono nsubɔnte no yɛ no fi.

Hesekiel 32:20
“‘Nkrante ano atɔfo mu na wɔbɛtotɔ; wɔde no ama nkrante; montwe ɔno ne n’asafo yuu nyinaa nkɔ.

Hesekiel 32:21
“‘Nnɔmmarima no mu atitiriw befi asaman akasa akyerɛ ɔne n’aboafo no nɛ: Wɔasian kɔ fam tɔnn, wɔne momonotofo a wɔde nkrante akunkum wɔn deda hɔ. 

Hesekiel 32:22
Ɛhɔ na Asiria ne n’asafo nyinaa wɔ. Wɔn adamoa atwa ne ho ahyia. Wɔakunkum wɔn nyinaa, wɔatotɔ nkrante ano. 

Hesekiel 32:23
Wɔabɔ n’ada wɔ amoa mu tɔnn, na n’asafo atwa n’adamoa ho ahyia. Wɔn nyinaa atotɔ nkrante ano, wɔn a wɔmaa ehu baa ateasefo asase so no.

Hesekiel 32:24
“‘Ɛhɔ na Elam ne n’asafo yuu nyinaa wɔ, wɔn adamoa atwa ne ho ahyia, wɔn a wɔtotɔɔ nkrante ano no, na wɔkɔɔ asase ase tɔnn wɔ wɔn momonoto mu. Eyinom na wɔmaa ehu baa ateasefo asase so, na wɔne wɔn a wosian kɔ amoa mu no asoa wɔn ahohora.

Hesekiel 32:25
Wɔde ne mpa asi atɔfo mfinimfini, n’asafo yuu no nyinaa mu, na wɔn adamoa atwa ho ahyia. Wɔn nyinaa yɛ momonotofo a wɔtotɔɔ nkrante ano. Wɔn ho hu kaa nnipa ateasefo asase so nti, wɔne wɔn a wosian kɔ Amoa mu no asoa wɔn ahohora; wɔde no ato atɔfo mu.

Hesekiel 32:26
“‘Ɛhɔ na Mesek ne Tubal ne ne dɔm nyinaa wɔ. Na wɔn adamoa atwa ne ho ahyia. Wɔn nyinaa yɛ momonotofo a wɔde nkrante ahwirew wɔn mu, efisɛ wɔmaa wɔn ho hu kaa nnipa, ateasefo asase so.

Hesekiel 32:27
Na wɔrenneda momonotofo mu nnɔmmarima a wɔatotɔ na wɔde wɔn akode asian kɔ Asaman, wɔde wɔn nkrante ahyehyɛ wɔn tiri ase nanso wɔn amumɔyɛde bɛba wɔn nnompe so, efisɛ wɔyɛ nnɔmmarima a wɔma ehu ba ateasefo asase so. 

Hesekiel 32:28
Yiw wo nso, wobebubu wo momonotofo mu, na wo ne wɔn a wɔtotɔɔ nkrante ano no akɔda.

Hesekiel 32:29
“‘Ɛhɔ na Edom ne n’ahene ne n’abirɛmpɔn nyinaa wɔ. Na wɔn mmaninyɛ mu, wɔde wɔn kaa wɔn a nkrante akunkum wɔn no ho. Wɔn nso wɔne momonotofo ne wɔn a wosian kɔ Amoa mu no bɛdeda hɔ.

Hesekiel 32:3
“Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Mɛto m’asawu agu wo so, aman bebree asafo mu, na wɔde m’asau beyi wo. 

Hesekiel 32:30
“‘Ɛhɔ na atifi fam abirɛmpɔn ne Sidonfo nyinaa wɔ. Eyinom na wɔn ho hu ne wɔn mmaninyɛ nyinaa akyi, wɔne atɔfo asian kɔ fam tɔnn wɔ aniwu mu no. Na wɔda wɔn a nkrante akunkum wɔn no nkyɛn wɔ wɔn momonoto mu, na wɔde wɔn animguase bɛka wɔn a wosian kɔ amoa mu no ho.

Hesekiel 32:31
“‘Farao behu wɔn, na wakyekye ne werɛ, n’asafo yuu no nyinaa ho; nkrante ano atɔfo ne Farao ne ne dɔm nyinaa ho,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 32:32
“‘Na memaa no yii hu, ateasefo asase so, enti na wɔde no ato momonotofo mu aka nkrante ano atɔfo ho, Farao ne ne dɔm nyinaa,’ Awurade Awurade asɛm ni.”

Hesekiel 32:4
 Na megyaw wo ato asase so na matow wo akyene wuram. Na mɛma wim nnomaa nyinaa abesisi wo so na mama asase nyinaa so mmoadoma adi wo nam amee. 

Hesekiel 32:5
Mede wo nam bɛto mmepɔw so na mede wo funu ahyɛ abon ma. 

Hesekiel 32:6
Na mɛma asase no anom wo mogya sɛ nsu akodu mmepɔw ho, na woahyɛ nsubon no mama.’

Hesekiel 32:7
“‘Na sɛ midum wo sɛ kanea a, mɛkata ɔsoro na mama ne nsoromma ayɛ tumm. Mede omununkum bɛkata owia so na ɔsram renhyerɛn. 

Hesekiel 32:8
Mɛma ɔsoro akanea a ɛhyerɛn nyinaa ayɛ tumm wɔ wo so na w’asase aduru sum,’ Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni.

Hesekiel 32:9
“‘Na mehuru aman bebree koma, bere a mede wo sɛe bɛba amanaman mu, nsase a wunnim so no so. 

Hesekiel 33:1
Bio Awurade asɛm san baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 33:10
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Israel fie sɛ, ‘Mo de, moka sɛ: “Esiane sɛ yɛn atuatew ne yɛn bɔne da yɛn so na ama yɛaporɔw ɛretetew yi, yɛbɛyɛ dɛn anya nkwa?”’ 

Hesekiel 33:11
Ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘“Sɛ mete ase yi, Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, ɔbɔnefo wu nyɛ me fɛ, na mmom sɛ ɔbɔnefo bɛsan afi ne kwan so na wanya nkwa. Enti monsan, monsan mfi mo akwammɔne so. Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mobewuwu yi, O Israel fie?”’.

Hesekiel 33:12
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ wo manfo sɛ, ‘Da a ɔtreneeni bɛto mmara no, ne trenee ntumi nnye no. Na ɔbɔnefo abɔnefosɛm nso renhwe no ase, ɛda a ɔbɛsan afi n’abɔnefosɛm mu no. Saa ara na da a ɔtreneeni bɛyɛ bɔne no, ne trenee no rennye no nkwa. 

Hesekiel 33:13
Sɛ meka kyerɛ ɔtreneeni sɛ: “Wubenya nkwa,” na ɔde ne ho to ne trenee so na okodi amumɔyɛsɛm a, wɔrenkae ne trenee no koraa, na mmom n’amumɔyɛ nti, obewu.

Hesekiel 33:14
“‘Bio, sɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbɔnefo sɛ: “Owu na wubewu,” na ɔsan fi ne bɔne ho na odi asɛntrenee yɛ nea ɛteɛ, 

Hesekiel 33:15
na sɛ ɔbɔnefo dan awowaside kɔma, na otua nea ɔbɔɔ apoo gyei no, na ɔnantew nkwa ahyɛde mu, na wanni amumɔyɛsɛm biara a, obenya nkwa, ɔrenwu. 

Hesekiel 33:16
Wɔrenkae bɔne a wayɛ no mu biara. Esiane sɛ wadi asɛntrenee ayɛ nea ɛteɛ nti, obenya nkwa.’

Hesekiel 33:17
“Na wo manfo ka sɛ, ‘Awurade akwan nteɛ.’ Nanso wɔn mmom na wɔn akwan nteɛ.

Hesekiel 33:18
“Sɛ ɔtreneeni dan fi ne trenee ho kodi amumɔyɛsɛm a, eyi mu na obewu. 

Hesekiel 33:19
Na sɛ ɔbɔnefo dan fi ne kwammɔne so kodi asɛntrenee na ɔyɛ nea ɛteɛ a, eyi ho nti obenya nkwa.

Hesekiel 33:2
“Onipa ba, kasa kyerɛ wo man mma, na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ mede nkrante ba asase bi so, na asase no sofo no yi wɔn mu barima bi, na wɔyɛ no ɔwɛmfo, 

Hesekiel 33:20
“Nanso moka sɛ, ‘Awurade akwan nteɛ.’ O Israel fie, mebu obiara atɛn sɛnea n’akwan te.”

Hesekiel 33:21
Afei bere a wɔfaa yɛn nnommum no akyi afe a ɛto so dumien, ɔsram a ɛto so du no da a ɛto so anum no, obi guan fii Yerusalem baa me nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: “Wɔabɔ kurow no!”

Hesekiel 33:22
Nso na Awurade nsa aba me so anwummere no, ansa na oguanefo no reba. Ɔbaa me nkyɛn anɔpa no, na wabue m’ano, na mantɔre mum bio.

Hesekiel 33:23
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ: 

Hesekiel 33:24
“Onipa ba, wɔn a wɔtete Israel mmeae a asɛe yi ka sɛ, ‘Na Abraham yɛ obiakofo nanso odii asase no so. Na yɛn de, yɛdɔɔso; wɔde asase no ama yɛn sɛ yɛmfa nni so.’

Hesekiel 33:25
“Afei ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mudi mogya ka nam ho, moma mo ani so kyerɛ mo abosom fi, na moka mogya gu. Enti mubenya asase no adi so anaa? 

Hesekiel 33:26
Mode mo ho to mo nkrante so, moyɛ akyide, na obiara gu ne yɔnko yere ho fi. Enti mubenya asase no adi so anaa?”’

Hesekiel 33:27
“Ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Nea Awurade Nyankopɔn aka ni: “Sɛ mete ase yi, wɔn a wɔtete mmeae a asɛe no bɛtotɔ nkrante ano; na nea ɔte wuram no, mɛma mmoa bɔne awe no; na wɔn a wɔtete abannennen ne abodan mu no, owuyare bekunkum wɔn. 

Hesekiel 33:28
Na mɛma asase no asɛe pasaa, na n’ahoɔden ahantan no to betwa, na Israel mmepɔw bɛdan amamfo, na obiara remfa so. 

Hesekiel 33:29
Wɔn akyide a wɔayɛ nyinaa nti, mesɛe asase no pasaa ma ɛdan amamfo a, wobehu sɛ mene Awurade.”’

Hesekiel 33:3
na ohu sɛ nkrante reba asase no so, na ɔhyɛn abɛn bɔ ɔman no kɔkɔ, 

Hesekiel 33:30
“Na wo onipa ba, wo man mma rekeka wo ho nsɛm wɔ afasu ho ne afie apon ano. Oyi ka kyerɛ ne yɔnko, obiara ne ne nua sɛ, ‘Mommra mmetie asɛm ko a efi Awurade hɔ aba no.’ 

Hesekiel 33:31
Na wɔbɛba wo nkyɛn yuu sɛnea ɔman bi ba, abɛtenatena w’anim te sɛ me man; na wɔbɛte wo nsɛm, nanso wɔrenni so, na wɔn anom adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm na wɔka, nanso wɔn koma di mfaso bɔne akyi. 

Hesekiel 33:32
Hwɛ, wote sɛ obi a ɔto ɔdɔ nnwom wɔ wɔn ani so, obi a ne nne yɛ dɛ a onim sankubɔ yiye. Na wɔte wo nsɛm de, nanso wonni so.

Hesekiel 33:33
Na sɛ enya ba mu a—hwɛ, ɛbɛba mu nso—wobehu sɛ odiyifo bi atra wɔn mu pɛn.”

Hesekiel 33:4
na obi te abɛn no nanso wamfa kɔkɔbɔ no anyɛ hwee, na nkrante no bɛfa no kɔ a, ne mogya begu n’atifi. 

Hesekiel 33:5
Ɔtee abɛn no, nanso wamfa kɔkɔbɔ no anyɛ hwee. Enti ne mogya begu n’atifi. Sɛ otiee kɔkɔbɔ no a, anka obegye ne kra.

Hesekiel 33:6
“‘Na sɛ ɔwɛmfo no hu sɛ nkrante reba na wanhyɛn abɛn ammɔ ɔman no kɔkɔ na nkrante no bɛfa ɔkra bi kɔ a, ɔno de, n’amumɔyɛ nti na wɔafa no kɔ, nanso ne mogya de, mebisa afi ɔwɛmfo no nsam.’

Hesekiel 33:7
“Na wo onipa ba, mayɛ wo ɔwɛmfo ama Israel fie, enti tie m’anom asɛm na fa bɔ wɔn kɔkɔ ma me.

Hesekiel 33:8
Sɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbɔnefo sɛ, ‘O Ɔbɔnefo, owu na wubewu,’ na woankasa ankyerɛ ɔbɔnefo no ammɔ no kɔkɔ amma wamfi ne kwan so a, ɔbɔnefo no bewu n’amumɔyɛ mu, nanso ne mogya de, mebisa afi wo nsam. 

Hesekiel 33:9
Na sɛ wobɔ ɔbɔnefo kɔkɔ sɛ ɔnsan mfi ne kwan so na wansan a, obewu n’amumɔyɛ mu, na wo de, woagye wo kra.

Hesekiel 34:1
Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:

Hesekiel 34:10
Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni, ‘Me ne nguanhwɛfo no anya asɛm, na mebisa me nguan afi wɔn nsam; wɔrenyɛn me nguan bio, na nguanhwɛfo no renyɛn wɔn ho bio; meyi me nguan no afi wɔn anom na wɔamfa wɔn anyɛ aduan bio.’”

Hesekiel 34:11
“‘Sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Hwɛ, m’ankasa mɛhwehwɛ me nguan na mayɛn wɔn. 

Hesekiel 34:12
Sɛnea oguanhwɛfo hwehwɛ ne nguan a wɔahwete da a ɔba wɔn mu no, saa ara na mɛhwehwɛ me nguan akyi kwan. Na meyi wɔn afi baabi a wɔahwete kɔ no nyinaa, omununkum ne esum kabii da no. 

Hesekiel 34:13
Meyi wɔn afi aman mu na maboaboa wɔn ano afi nsase so de wɔn aba wɔn asase so. Na mɛyɛn wɔn Israel mmepɔw so, nsubon mu ne asase no so trabea nyinaa. 

Hesekiel 34:14
Mɛma wɔn baabi pa adidi na Israel mmepɔw atenten so ayɛ wɔn tenabea. Ɛhɔ na wobenya tenabea pa adwudwo wɔn ho na wɔawe sare pa wɔ Israel mmepɔw so.”

Hesekiel 34:15
“‘“M’ankasa mɛyɛn me nguan na m’ankasa mama wɔabutubutuw hɔ,” Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni. 

Hesekiel 34:16
“Nea wayera no mɛhwehwɛ no, nea waguan no mede no bɛba, nea wapira no mɛkyekyere ne kuru, na nea ɔyare no mɛhyɛ no den. Na nea wadɔ srade ne nea ne ho yɛ den no de, metwa no afi hɔ; mede atemmu bɛyɛn no.”

Hesekiel 34:17
“‘Na mo a moyɛ me nguan no de, sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni: “Mebu oguan ne oguan ntam atɛn, adwennini ne mpapo ntam atɛn. 

Hesekiel 34:18
