Enti owia gyinae, na ɔsram nso gyinae kosii sɛ ɔman no tuaa n’atamfo ka. So wɔnkyerɛw eyi ho asɛm wɔ Yasar nhoma mu? Owia gyinae wɔ wim, na ampere ne ho ankɔtɔ bɛyɛ da mu nyinaa. 

Yosua 10:14
Da yi sɛso mmae da—n’anim oo, n’akyi oo, ebi nsii da—sɛ Awurade atie onipa nne wɔ saa kwan yi so. Saa da no, na Awurade ankasa reko ama Israel.

Yosua 10:15
Afei Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa san baa wɔn asoɛe wɔ Gilgal.

Yosua 10:16
 Na saa bere yi na ahene baanum no aguan akɔhyɛ ɔbodan mu wɔ Makeda. 

Yosua 10:17
Ɛnna nkurɔfo bɛka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Wɔahu sɛ ahene baanum no aguan akɔhyɛ ɔbodan mu wɔ Makeda.” 

Yosua 10:18
Na Yosua kae sɛ: “Mumpia abo akɛse nkata ɔbodan no ano na momma mmarima nwɛn wɔn. 

Yosua 10:19
Na mo nso munnnyina faako. Muntiw mo atamfo no nkunkum wɔn. Mommma wɔnnkɔ wɔn kurom, na Awurade mo Nyankopɔn de wɔn ahyɛ mo nsa.”

Yosua 10:2
ehu kaa no efisɛ na Gibeon yɛ kurow kɛse te sɛ nhenkurow no bi. Bio nso na ɛso sen Ai koraa, na emu mmarima ho yɛ den. 

Yosua 10:20
Afei bere a Yosua ne Israelfo no kunkum nkurɔfo no maa wɔn nyinaa sae, na wɔn a wonyaa wɔn ti didii mu no guan kɔɔ nkurow a wɔatoto ho afasu mu no, 

Yosua 10:21
ɔman no nyinaa san baa Yosua nkyɛn asomdwoe mu wɔ Makeda, wɔn asoɛe hɔ. Na obiara antwe ne tɛkrɛma mpo antia Israelfo no. 

Yosua 10:22
Ɛnna Yosua kae sɛ: “Mummue ɔbodan no ano na munyi ahene baanum a wɔhyɛhyɛ hɔ no mmrɛ me.”

Yosua 10:23
 Na wɔyɛɛ nea ɔkae no, na woyii ahene baanum yi fii ɔbodan no mu brɛɛ no: Yerusalem hene, Hebron hene, Yarmut hene, Lakis hene, ne Eglon hene. 

Yosua 10:24
Bere a wɔde ahene yi brɛɛ Yosua no, ɔfrɛɛ Israel mmarima nyinaa na ɔka kyerɛɛ asraafo mpanyimfo a wɔne no kɔe no sɛ: “Mommra. Momfa mo nan nsisi ahene yi kɔn so.” Na wɔbae de wɔn nan besisii wɔn kɔn so. 

Yosua 10:25
Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Munnsuro na mommmɔ hu. Momma mo bo nyɛ duru na mo ho nyɛ den, na sɛɛ na Awurade bɛyɛ mo atamfo a mo ne wɔn redi ako nyinaa.”

Yosua 10:26
Ɛno akyi no Yosua kunkum wɔn, na ɔde wɔn sensɛn nnua anum so kosii anwummere. 

Yosua 10:27
Na bere a owia kɔtɔe no, Yosua ma woyii wɔn fii nnua no so, na wɔkɔtow wɔn guu ɔbodan a wɔkɔhyɛɛ mu no mu. Na wɔde abo akɛse guu ɔbodan no ano besi nnɛ.

Yosua 10:28
 Na saa da no, Yosua faa Makeda, na ɔtwee nkrante too kurow no so, na okum ɔhene no ne nnipa a wɔwɔ kurow no mu nyinaa. Wannyaw obiara wɔ hɔ. Na sɛnea ɔyɛɛ Yeriko hene no, saa ara na ɔyɛɛ Makeda hene nso.

Yosua 10:29
Afei Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa fii Makeda kɔɔ Libna ne Libnafo kɔkoe. 

Yosua 10:3
Enti Yerusalem hene Adoni-Sedek soma kɔɔ Hebron hene Hoham ne Yamut hene Piram ne Lakis hene Yafia ne Eglon hene Debir nkyɛn sɛ, 

Yosua 10:30
Na Awurade de kurow no ne ɛhɔ hene hyɛɛ Israel nsa, na wɔtwee nkrante wɔ kurow no so kunkum akra a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa. Wɔannyaw obiara. Na sɛnea wɔyɛɛ Yeriko hene no, saa ara na wɔyɛɛ kurom hɔ hene no nso.

Yosua 10:31
Ɛno akyi no, Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa fii Libna kɔɔ Lakis, na wɔboaa wɔn ho ano ne wɔn kɔkoe.

Yosua 10:32
Na Awurade de Lakis hyɛɛ Israel nsa, na da a ɛto so abien no, wɔfaa kurow no. Afei wɔtwee nkrante wɔ kurow no so kunkum nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa, sɛnea wɔyɛɛ Libna no.

Yosua 10:33
Na Geser hene Horam huu saa no, ɔkɔe sɛ ɔrekɔboa Lakis. Enti Yosua kum ɔne ne nkurɔfo nyinaa, na wannyaw obiara.

Yosua 10:34
Ɛnna Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa fii Lakis kɔɔ Eglon, na wɔboaa wɔn ho ano ne wɔn kɔkoe. 

Yosua 10:35
Na wɔfaa kurow no saa da no. Na wɔtwee nkrante too so kunkum nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa saa da no, sɛnea wɔyɛɛ Lakis no.

Yosua 10:36
Enti Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa fii Eglon kɔɔ Hebron ne wɔn kɔkoe. 

Yosua 10:37
Na wɔfaa kurow no ne ne nkuraa nyinaa, na wɔtwee nkrante wɔ so. Na wokum ɔhene no ne nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa. Wannyaw obiara, sɛnea ɔyɛɛ Eglon no. Enti ɔsɛee kurow no ne nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa.

Yosua 10:38
Akyiri yi Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa san baa Debir ne wɔn bɛkoe. 

Yosua 10:39
Na ɔfaa kurow no ne ɛhɔ hene ne nkuraa a ɛwowɔ hɔ nyinaa. Na wɔtwee nkrante wɔ so kunkum nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa. Wannyaw obiara. Na sɛnea ɔyɛɛ Hebron ne Libna ne ne hene no, saa ara na ɔyɛɛ Debir ne ne hene.

Yosua 10:4
“Mommɛboa me mma yɛnsɛe Gibeon efisɛ wɔne Yosua ne Israelfo no akɔyɛ asomdwoe apam.” 

Yosua 10:40
Enti Yosua sɛee nsase a ɛwɔ mmepɔw so ne Negeb ne Sefela ne nkoko ase no nyinaa, na okunkum wɔn ahene nyinaa. Wannyaw obiara. Ɔsɛee biribiara a ɛhome sɛnea Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade hyɛe no. 

Yosua 10:41
Na Yosua de nkrante faa asase no nyinaa so fi Kades-Barnea kosi Gasa, ne Gosen asase nyinaa de kɔpem Gibeon. 

Yosua 10:42
 Na Yosua faa ahene yi nyinaa ne wɔn nsase prɛko, efisɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade ko maa Israel. 

Yosua 10:43
Afei Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa san kɔɔ wɔn asoɛe wɔ Gilgal.

Yosua 10:5
Enti Amorifo ahene baanum no kaa wɔn ho boom, Yerusalem hene ne Hebron hene ne Yarmut hene ne Lakis hene ne Eglon hene ne wɔn dɔm nyinaa, na wɔboaa wɔn ano sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Gibeon so ne wɔn akɔko.

Yosua 10:6
Ɛnna Gibeonfo soma kɔka kyerɛɛ Yosua wɔ Gilgal sɛ: “Yɛ ntɛm bɛboa wo nkoa na gye yɛn. Mma wo nsa nnyɛ tia, efisɛ Amorifo ahene a wɔte mmepɔw so no aboaboa wɔn ano ne yɛn rebɛko.” 

Yosua 10:7
Enti Yosua ne asraafo ne nnɔmmarima a wɔka ne ho nyinaa fii Gilgal kɔe.

Yosua 10:8
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Nsuro wɔn na mede wɔn ahyɛ wo nsa. Wɔn mu biara rentumi nnyina w’anim.” 

Yosua 10:9
Afei Yosua baa wɔn so mpofirim. Ɔde anadwo mu no nyinaa na efii Gilgal bae. 

Yosua 11:1
Na bere a Hasor hene Yabin tee nea asi no, ɔsoma kɔɔ Madon hene Yobab, ne Simron hene, ne Aksaf hene, 

Yosua 11:10
Afei Yosua danee ne ho saa bere no bɛfaa Hasor, na ɔde nkrante kum ɛhɔ hene, efisɛ na Hasor ne ahemman yi nyinaa ti. 

Yosua 11:11
 Na wɔde nkrante kunkum nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinaa tɔree wɔn ase. Wɔannyaw biribiara a ɛhome wɔ hɔ, na ɔde ogya hyew Hasor. 

Yosua 11:12
 Na Yosua faa nhenkurow a ɛwowɔ hɔ ne emu ahene nyinaa, na ɔde nkrante kunkum wɔn. Ɔsɛee wɔn pasaa, sɛnea Awurade akoa Mose kae no. 

Yosua 11:13
 Nanso nkurow a egugu nkoko so no de, Israel anhyew, gye Hasor na Yosua hyewee. 

Yosua 11:14
 Na Israelfo no faa nkurow no mu afieboa ne asade a aka nyinaa. Nnipa no de, wɔde nkrante kunkum wɔn nyinaa tɔree wɔn ase. Obiara a ɔhome biara nni hɔ a wɔma ɔkae. 

Yosua 11:15
 Na sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ n’akoa Mose no, saa ara na Mose ka kyerɛɛ Yosua, na saa ara nso na Yosua yɛe. Wanyi asɛm biako mpo amfi nea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose no mu.

Yosua 11:16
 Enti Yosua faa asase yi nyinaa, mmepɔw no ne Negeb ne Gosen asase nyinaa, ne Sefela ne Araba ne Israel mmepɔw ne asase tratra, 

Yosua 11:17
fi Bepɔw Halak a anim kyerɛ Seir kosi Baal-Gad a ɛwɔ Lebanon tataw so wɔ Bepɔw Hermon ase, na ɔkyeree wɔn ahene nyinaa kunkum wɔn. 

Yosua 11:18
Yosua ne ahene yi nyinaa koe nna pii. 

Yosua 11:19
Kurow biara nni hɔ a wɔne Israelfo yɛɛ asomdwoe apam, gye Hiwifo a wɔte Gibeon no. Wɔn a aka no de, ɔko mu na wɔfaa wɔn.

Yosua 11:2
 na ɔde nkra kɔmaa ahene a wɔwɔ atifi fam mmepɔw so, ne sare so wɔ Kineret anafo fam, ne Sefela, ne Dor bepɔw so wɔ atɔe fam, 

Yosua 11:20
Awurade na ɔma wopirim wɔn koma sɛ wɔne Israelfo bɛko na wasɛe wɔn a ahummɔbɔ biara nnim, na watɔre wɔn ase sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose no.

Yosua 11:21
Saa bere no nso, Yosua kokunkum Anakimfo a wɔwɔ mmepɔw so, Hebron ne Debir ne Anab ne Yuda ne Israel mmepɔw so nyinaa. Yosua sɛee wɔne wɔn nkurow no nyinaa. 

Yosua 11:22
Wannyaw Anakimni biara wɔ Israelfo asase so, gye Gasa ne Gat ne Asdod na ebi kae.

Yosua 11:23
Enti Yosua faa nsase no nyinaa sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose bɔ no, na Yosua kyɛ maa Israelfo no sɛ wɔn kyɛfa, sɛnea wɔn mmusua te. Efi saa bere no, ɔko anhaw asase no bio.

Yosua 11:3
ne Kanaanfo a wɔwɔ apuei ne atɔe, ne Amorifo, ne Hitifo, ne Perisifo, ne Yebusifo a wɔwɔ mmepɔw so, ne Hiwifo a wɔwɔ Hermon ase wɔ Mispa asase so no nkyɛn. 

Yosua 11:4
Enti wɔne wɔn dɔm huhaa te sɛ mpoano anhwea ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam bebree fi bae. 

Yosua 11:5
Na bere a wɔhyɛe no dui no, ahene no nyinaa boaboaa wɔn ano wɔ Merom asu ho sɛ wɔne Israel rebɛko.

Yosua 11:6
Nanso Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Nsuro wɔn, na ɔkyena sesɛɛ mɛma wɔn nyinaa atotɔ wɔ Israelfo nsa ano. Twitwa wɔn apɔnkɔ nantin na fa ogya hyew wɔn nteaseɛnam.” 

Yosua 11:7
Na Yosua ne asraafo no nyinaa faa Merom asu ho bɛtow hyɛɛ wɔn so prɛko pɛ. 

Yosua 11:8
Enti Awurade de wɔn hyɛɛ Israelfo no nsa, na wotiw wɔn kokunkum wɔn koduu Sidon kɛse ne Misrefot-Maim ne Mispe tataw so wɔ atɔe fam. Wokunkum wɔn nyinaa, na obiako mpo anka. 

Yosua 11:9
Na nea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua no, saa pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɔde yɛɛ wɔn: Otwitwaa wɔn apɔnkɔ nantin, na ɔde ogya hyew wɔn nteaseɛnam.

Yosua 12:1
 Na eyinom ne asase no so ahemfo a Israelfo dii wɔn so faa wɔn nsase wɔ Yordan agya wɔ apuei fam, fi Arnon subon ho kosi Bepɔw Hermon ne Araba nyinaa wɔ apuei fam no: 

Yosua 12:10
Yerusalem hene ne Hebron hene;

Yosua 12:11
Yamut hene ne Lakis hene;

Yosua 12:12
Eglon hene ne Geser hene;

Yosua 12:13
Debir hene ne Geder hene;

Yosua 12:14
Horma hene ne Arad hene;

Yosua 12:15
Libna hene ne Adulam hene;

Yosua 12:16
Makeda hene ne Betel hene;

Yosua 12:17
Tapua hene ne Hefer hene;

Yosua 12:18
Afek hene ne Lasaron hene;

Yosua 12:19
Madon hene ne Hasor hene;

Yosua 12:2
Amorifo hene Sihon a na ɔte Hesbon no. Odii hene faa Aroer a ɛwɔ Arnon subon ho ne subon no mfinimfini ne Gilead asase no fa kosi Yabok subon ho wɔ Ammonfo hye so, 

Yosua 12:20
Simron-Meron hene ne Aksaf hene;

Yosua 12:21
Taanak hene ne Megido hene;

Yosua 12:22
Kedes hene ne Yokneam a ɛwɔ Karmel no hene;

Yosua 12:23
Dor a ɛwɔ Dor bepɔw so no hene, ne Goiim a ɛwɔ Gilgal no hene;

Yosua 12:24
ne Tirsa hene. Ahene no nyinaa yɛ aduasa biako.

Yosua 12:3
ne Araba kosi Kineret mpoano wɔ apuei fam, ne Araba po anaa Nkyene Po no ano wɔ apuei, Bet-Yesimot kwan so, de kɔ anafo wɔ Pisga bepɔw ase.

Yosua 12:4
Obiako nso ne Basan hene Og. Ɔno ne Refaimni na ofi abran akɛse no mu a waka, na ɔtenaa Astarot ne Edrei. 

Yosua 12:5
 Na odii hene wɔ Bepɔw Hermon so ne Saleka ne Basan nyinaa kosii Gesurfo ne Maakatfo hye so ne Gilead asase no fa kɔpem Hesbon hene Sihon asase so.

Yosua 12:6
Awurade akoa Mose ne Israelfo no dii wɔn so, na ɛno akyi no Awurade akoa Mose de asase no maa Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw no fa no.

Yosua 12:7
Ahene yi nso na Yosua ne Israelfo no dii wɔn so wɔ Yordan atɔe fam, fi Baal-Gad wɔ Lebanon tataw so kosi Bepɔw Halak so kɔ Seir. Ɛno akyi na Yosua kyɛɛ asase no maa Israelfo mmusua no sɛ wɔn kyɛfa, 

Yosua 12:8
mmepɔw so nsase ne Sefela ne Araba ne mmepɔw ase ne sare so ne Negeb. Ɛha na na Hitifo ne Amorifo ne Kanaanfo ne Perisifo ne Hiwifo ne Yebusifo no te. Ahene yi ni:

Yosua 12:9
Yeriko hene ne Ai a ɛbɛn Betel no hene;

Yosua 13:1
 Saa bere yi na Yosua mfe akɔ anim na wabɔ akora. Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wo mfe akɔ anim na woabɔ akora, nanso asase a aka a ɛsɛ sɛ wofa no dɔɔso bebree. 

Yosua 13:10
ne Amorifo hene Sihon a odii ade wɔ Hesbon no nkurow nyinaa, kosi Ammonfo hye so; 

Yosua 13:11
ne Gilead, ne Gesurfo ne Maakatfo nsase nyinaa, ne Bepɔw Hermon ne Basan nyinaa de kosi Saleka;

Yosua 13:12
ne Og a odii ade wɔ Astarot ne Edrei no ahemman a ɛwɔ Basan nyinaa. Og na na waka wɔ Refaimfo (abran akɛse) no mu. Na Mose kunkum wɔn faa wɔn asase. 

Yosua 13:13
 Nanso Israelfo amfa Gesurfo ne Maakatfo nsase; mmom Gesurfo ne Maakatfo te Israelfo mu de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 13:14
Lewi abusuakuw no nkutoo na wamma wɔn agyapade. Ogya afɔre a wɔbɔ ma Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade no ne wɔn agyapade, sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ no.

Yosua 13:15
Na Mose maa Ruben asefo nyaa wɔn asase, sɛnea wɔn mmusua te. 

Yosua 13:16
 Na wɔn asase no fi Aroer a ɛwɔ Arnon bon ano ne kurow a ɛwɔ bon no mfinimfini ne Medeba asase tratraa no so nyinaa; 

Yosua 13:17
ne Hesbon ne ɛho nkurow a ɛwɔ asase tratraa no so nyinaa, Dibon ne Bamot-Baal ne Bet-Baal-Meon, 

Yosua 13:18
ne Yahas ne Kedemot ne Mefaat, 

Yosua 13:19
ne Kiriataim ne Sibma ne Seret-Saha wɔ asasetaw no bepɔw so, 

Yosua 13:2
Asase a aka ni: Filistifo ne Gesurfo mpɔtam hɔ nyinaa, 

Yosua 13:20
ne Bet-Peor ne Pisga bepɔw ase ne Bet-Yesimot, 

Yosua 13:21
ne nkurow a ɛwɔ asase tratraa no so ne Amorifo hene Sihon a odii ade wɔ Hesbon no ahemman nyinaa. Mose kum ɔne Midian atitiriw yi nyinaa: Ewi ne Rekem ne Sur ne Hur ne Reba. Eyinom ne Sihon abirɛmpɔn a na wɔwɔ asase no so. 

Yosua 13:22
Na Israelfo de nkrante kum Beor ba Balaam, nkɔmhyɛni no, kaa wɔn a wokunkum wɔn no ho. 

Yosua 13:23
Ruben asefo hye besi Yordan ho; na asase yi nyinaa bɛyɛɛ Ruben asefo mmusua no dea, nkurow no ne nkuraa a ɛwowɔ ho nyinaa.

Yosua 13:24
Na Mose maa Gad asefo nyaa wɔn asase, sɛnea wɔn mmusua te. 

Yosua 13:25
 Na wɔn hye fi Yaser ne Gilead nyinaa ne Ammonfo asase no fa kosi Aroer a ɛda Raba anim. 

Yosua 13:26
Na efi Hesbon kɔ Ramat-Mispe ne Betonim, na ɛkɔfa Mahanaim kɔ Debir hye so. 

Yosua 13:27
Na asasetaw no fam nso, ɛfa Bet-Haram ne Bet-Nimra ne Sukot ne Safon, Hesbon hene Sihon ahemman a aka no, na ɛfa Yordan ho kɔpem Kineret po no ano nohoa wɔ Yordan apuei fam. 

Yosua 13:28
Eyi ne Gad asefo mmusua no asase, nkurow no ne nkuraa a ɛwowɔ ho nyinaa.

Yosua 13:29
Na Mose maa Manase abusuakuw fa no nyaa wɔn asase, na ɛbɛyɛɛ Manase abusuakuw fa no agyapade, sɛnea wɔn mmusua te. 

Yosua 13:3
 wobu Nil fa a ɛda Egypt anim kosi Ekron hye so wɔ atifi fam no sɛ Kanaanfo asase; Filistifo ahene baanum dii nkurow yi so, Gasa, Asdod, Askelon, Gat, Ekron, ne Awim. 

Yosua 13:30
 Na wɔn hye fi Mahanaim ne Basan nyinaa, ne Basan hene Og ahemman nyinaa, ne Yair nkuraa-nkuraa a ɛwowɔ Basan nyinaa; nkurow no yɛ aduosia. 

Yosua 13:31
Na Gilead asase no fa ne Astarot ne Edrei nkurow a ɛwɔ Basan hene Og ahemman mu no kodii Manase ba Makir mma nsam, na ɛbɛyɛɛ Makir mma no mu fa dea, sɛnea wɔn mmusua te.

Yosua 13:32
Eyi ne asase a Mose de maa wɔn wɔ Moab sare so wɔ Yordan apuei, Yeriko nkyɛn.

Yosua 13:33
 Nanso Lewi abusuakuw no de, Mose amma wɔn agyapade no bi. Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade ne wɔn agyapade, sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ no.

Yosua 13:4
Anafo fam nso, wobɛfa Kanaanfo asase nyinaa; ne Meara a ɛyɛ Sidonfo asase akosi Afek, na ɛbɛkɔ akɔpem Amorifo hye so; 

Yosua 13:5
ne Gebalfo asase ne Lebanon nyinaa wɔ apuei, fi Baal-Gad wɔ Bepɔw Hermon ase de kosi Hamat; 

Yosua 13:6
wɔn a wɔtete mmepɔw no so nyinaa, fi Lebanon kɔ Misrefot-Maim, kyerɛ sɛ Sidonfo nyinaa. Na m’ankasa metu wɔn afi wɔn asase so ama Israelfo. Nanso hwɛ sɛ wode bɛka Israel agyapade ho, sɛnea maka akyerɛ wo no. 

Yosua 13:7
Na afei kyɛ asase no ma mmusua akron no ne Manase abusuakuw fa no.”

Yosua 13:8
Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne abusuakuw no fa a aka no kɔfaa asase a Mose de maa wɔn wɔ Yordan agya wɔ apuei fam no, sɛnea na Awurade akoa Mose atwa ama wɔn dedaw no, 

Yosua 13:9
 efi Aroer a ɛwɔ Arnon bon ano ne kurow a ɛwɔ bon no mfinimfini ne Medeba asase tratraa no so de kosi Dibon; 

Yosua 14:1
 Eyi na Israelfo nyae sɛ wɔn agyapade wɔ Kanaan asase so. Asase yi na ɔsɔfo Eleasar ne Nun ba Yosua ne Israel agyanom mmusua mu atitiriw kyɛ maa wɔn. 

Yosua 14:10
 Na Awurade adaworoma meda so te ase sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose bɔ mfe aduanan anum ni, bere a Israelfo nam sare so no, na ɛnnɛ, madi mfe aduɔwɔtwe anum.

Yosua 14:11
Nanso ɛnnɛ mpo me ho yɛ den te sɛ da a Mose somaa me no. Ahoɔden a na mewɔ saa bere no, ebi na mewɔ nnɛ a metumi akɔ akono asan aba. 

Yosua 14:12
Enti mesrɛ wo, fa asase a ɛwɔ bepɔw so a Awurade hyɛɛ ho bɔ saa da no ma me, efisɛ da no wotee sɛ Anakimfo wɔ hɔ na wɔabɔ wɔn nkurow ho ban. Minim sɛ Awurade bɛka me ho, na mɛpam asase no sofo sɛnea Awurade aka no.”

Yosua 14:13
Na Yosua hyiraa Yefune ba Kaleb, na ɔde Hebron maa no sɛ n’agyapade. 

Yosua 14:14
Ɛno nti na ɛde besi nnɛ, Hebron yɛ Kenisini Yefune ba Kaleb agyapade no, efisɛ ɔde ne koma nyinaa dii Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade akyi. 

Yosua 14:15
Kan no na Hebron de Kiriat-Arba efisɛ na Arba yɛ Anakimfo mu ɔkatakyi. Efi saa bere no, ɔko anhaw asase no bio.

Yosua 14:2
Wɔbɔɔ ntonto de kyɛɛ asase no maa mmusua akron ne fa no, sɛnea na Awurade nam Mose so aka no. 

Yosua 14:3
Saa bere no na Mose de mmusua abien ne fa no agyapade ama wɔn dedaw wɔ Yordan agya nohoa. Lewifo de, wamma wɔn agyapade no bi wɔ wɔn mu. 

Yosua 14:4
Nanso na Yosef mma Manase ne Efraim abɛyɛ mmusua abien; na wɔantwa asase no bi amma Lewifo no, gye nkurow a wɔbɛtena mu ne mfikyisase a wɔn mmoa bedidi so na wɔakora agyapade ahorow wɔ so. 

Yosua 14:5
 Sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose no, saa ara na Israelfo no yɛe, na wɔkyekyɛɛ asase no mu.

Yosua 14:6
Afei Yuda asefo baa Yosua nkyɛn wɔ Gilgal, na Kenisini Yefune ba Kaleb ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Wo ara wunim nea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn nipa Mose wɔ Kades-Barnea faa me ne wo ho. 

Yosua 14:7
 Na bere a Awurade akoa Mose somaa me fii Kades-Barnea sɛ menkɔhwɛ asase no, na madi mfe aduanan, na mesan bae de asɛm a ɛwom biara bɛtoo n’anim, nea ɛwɔ me komam biara. 

Yosua 14:8
Me nuanom a me ne wɔn kɔe no maa nnipa no koma tui; nanso me de, mede me koma nyinaa dii Awurade me Nyankopɔn akyi. 

Yosua 14:9
Enti saa da no, Mose kaa ntam sɛ: ‘Asase a wode wo nan sii so no bɛyɛ wo ne wo mma agyapade daa, efisɛ wode wo koma nyinaa adi Awurade me Nyankopɔn akyi.’ 

Yosua 15:1
 Bere a wɔbɔɔ ntonto kyɛɛ asase no, Yuda asefo ne wɔn mmusua no hye kɔfaa Edom, Sin sare so, kosi Negeb anafo. 

Yosua 15:10
Na ɔhye no fi Baala wɔ atɔe kɔfa Bepɔw Seir ho, na ɛkɔ atifi fam kɔfa Bepɔw Yearim ho, kyerɛ sɛ Kesalon; na esian kɔfa Bet-Semes kɔ Timna. 

Yosua 15:11
 Na ɔhye no kɔfa Ekron koko so wɔ atifi fam, na efi hɔ kɔ Sikeron twam kɔ Bepɔw Baala no ho, na efi hɔ kɔ Yabneel; na ɔhye no kɔpem po no ano.

Yosua 15:12
Na atɔe fam hye no nso nam Po Kɛse no ano. Eyi ne Yuda asefo mmusua no asase no hye ano nyinaa.

Yosua 15:13
 Afei Yefune ba Kaleb de, ɔmaa no asase wɔ Yudafo mu sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua no; ɛno ne Kiriat-Arba efisɛ na Arba yɛ Anak agya. Saa kurow yi ara ne Hebron. 

Yosua 15:14
Na Kaleb tuu Anak mma baasa no fii hɔ. Anak mma yi ne Sesai, Ahiman, ne Talmai. 

Yosua 15:15
 Na ofi hɔ kɔɔ Debirfo so. Kan no na wɔfrɛ Debir sɛ Kiriat-Sefer. 

Yosua 15:16
Na Kaleb kae sɛ: “Nea obetumi ako afa Kiriat-Sefer no, mede me babea Aksa bɛma no aware.”

Yosua 15:17
Ɛnna Kaleb nua Kenas ba Otniel kɔko fae, enti ɔde ne babea Aksa maa no waree. 

Yosua 15:18
Na ɔbea no rekɔ fie no, osii so ka kyerɛɛ ne kunu sɛ ommisa asase mfi ne papa nkyɛn. Afei bere a Aksa si fi n'afurum so no, Kaleb bisaa no sɛ: “Dɛn na wopɛ?” 

Yosua 15:19
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Ma me nhyira. Asase a ɛda anafo na wode maa me, enti ma me mmasu nso.” Na ɔde atifi mmasu ne anafo mmasu maa no.

Yosua 15:2
Na wɔn hye a ɛda anafo no fi Nkyene Po no ano, dɔnnɔn a ani kyerɛ anafo fam no ano. 

Yosua 15:20
Eyi ne agyapade a wɔde maa Yuda asefo ne wɔn mmusua.

Yosua 15:21
Yuda abusuakuw no nkurow a ɛda anafo fam a ɛbɛn Edom hye pɛɛ no ne Kabseel, Eder, Yagur,

Yosua 15:22
ne Kina, Dimona, Adada, 

Yosua 15:23
ne Kedes, Hasor, Yitnan, 

Yosua 15:24
ne Sif, Telem, Bealot, 

Yosua 15:25
ne Hasor-Hadata, Keriot-Hesron, anaa Hasor, 

Yosua 15:26
ne Amam, Sema, Molada,

Yosua 15:27
ne Hasar-Gada, Hesmon, Bet-Pelet, 

Yosua 15:28
ne Hasar-Sual, Beer-Seba, Bisiotia, 

Yosua 15:29
ne Baala, Yim, Esem, 

Yosua 15:3
Ɛkɔfa anafo fam kɔ Akrabim koko so kosi Sin, na efi anafo kɔfa Kades-Barnea twam kɔ Hesron, na ɛkɔfa Adar kɔntɔn kɔ Karka. 

Yosua 15:30
ne Eltolad, Kesil, Horma, 

Yosua 15:31
ne Siklag, Madmana, Sansana, 

Yosua 15:32
ne Lebaot, Silhim, Ain, ne Rimon; nkurow aduonu akron ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:33
Sefela nso, nkurow a ɛwɔ hɔ ne Estaol, Sora, Asnah, 

Yosua 15:34
ne Sanoa, En-Ganim, Tapua, Enam, 

Yosua 15:35
ne Yamut, Adulam, Soko, Aseka, 

Yosua 15:36
ne Saaraim, Aditaim, Gedera, ne Gederotaim; nkurow dunan ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:37
Senan, Hadasa, Migdal-Gad, 

Yosua 15:38
ne Dilean, Mispe, Yokteel, 

Yosua 15:39
ne Lakis, Boskat, Eglon, 

Yosua 15:4
Afei etwam kɔ Asmon kɔfa Egypt subon no ho, na ɔhye no ano kɔpem mpoano. Eyi ne mo hye a ɛda anafo fam no.

Yosua 15:40
ne Kabon, Lamam, Kitlis, 

Yosua 15:41
ne Gederot, Bet-Dagon, Naama, ne Makeda; nkurow dunsia ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:42
Libna, Eter, Asan, 

Yosua 15:43
ne Yifta, Asnah, Nesib, 

Yosua 15:44
ne Keila, Aksib, ne Maresa; nkurow akron ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:45
Ekron ne ɛho nkurow ne nkuraa.

Yosua 15:46
Efi Ekron kɔ atɔe fam nsase a ɛwɔ Asdod ne ɛho nkuraa nyinaa.

Yosua 15:47
Asdod ne ɛho nkurow ne nkuraa; Gasa ne ɛho nkurow ne nkuraa, kosi Egypt subon no ne Po Kɛse no ho ne mantam hɔ nyinaa.

Yosua 15:48
Na mmepɔw so nkurow ne Samir, Yatir, Soko, 

Yosua 15:49
ne Dana, Kiriat-Sanna, anaa Debir, 

Yosua 15:5
Wɔn hye a ɛda apuei no nam Nkyene Po no ano de kosi Yordan agya. Na atifi fam hye no fi po no ho dɔnnɔn a ɛwɔ Yordan agya no ho. 

Yosua 15:50
ne Anab, Estemo, Anim, 

Yosua 15:51
ne Gosen, Holon, ne Gilo; nkurow dubiako ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:52
Arab, Duma, Esan, 

Yosua 15:53
ne Yanim, Bet-Tapua, Afeka, 

Yosua 15:54
ne Humta, Kiriat-Arba, anaa Hebron, ne Sior; nkurow akron ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:55
Maon, Karmel, Sif, Yuta, 

Yosua 15:56
ne Yesreel, Yokdeam, Sanoa, 

Yosua 15:57
ne Kain, Gibea, ne Timna; nkurow du ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:58
Halhul, Bet-Sur, Gedor, 

Yosua 15:59
ne Maarat, Bet-Anot, ne Eltekon; nkurow asia ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:6
Na ɔhye no san kɔfa Bet-Hogla twam kɔ Bet-Araba atifi, na ɛforo kɔ Ruben ba Bohan bo no ho. 

Yosua 15:60
Kiriat-Baal, anaa Kiriat-Yearim, ne Raba; nkurow abien ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:61
Sare so nkurow nso ne Bet-Araba, Midin, Sekaka, 

Yosua 15:62
ne Nibsan, ne Nkyene Kurow, ne En-Gedi; nkurow asia ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 15:63
Nanso Yebusifo a wɔwɔ Yerusalem no de, Yudafo no antumi ampam wɔn amfi hɔ; na Yebusifo ne Yudafo tenaa Yerusalem de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 15:7
 Na ɛsan kɔfa Debir wɔ Akor bon no mu, na ɛdan kɔ atifi kodu Gilgal a ɛda Adumim koko anim wɔ subon no anafo. Na ɔhye no twam kɔfa En-Semes nsu no ho kɔpem En-Rogel. 

Yosua 15:8
Na ɔhye no toa so kɔfa Hinom ba bon no ano kosi Yebusi koko so wɔ anafo, kyerɛ sɛ Yerusalem. Na ɛforo kɔ bepɔw a ani kyerɛ Hinom bon no atɔe fam wɔ Refaim bon no atifi fam. 

Yosua 15:9
Na ɔhye no fi mmepɔw so kɔ Neftoa asuti ho, na efi hɔ kɔfa nkurow a ɛwɔ Bepɔw Efron so no ho; na ɛtoa so kɔ Baala a wɔfrɛ no Kiriat-Yearim. 

Yosua 16:1
 Na bere a wɔbɔɔ ntonto kyɛɛ asase no, na Yosef asefo no hye fi Yordan agya a ɛbɛn Yeriko kosi Yeriko nsu ho wɔ apuei, sare a efi Yeriko foro kɔ Betel mmepɔw so no. 

Yosua 16:10
Nanso wɔampam Kanaanfo a na wɔwɔ Geser no, enti Kanaanfo kɔɔ so tenaa Efraimfo mu de besi nnɛ, na wɔde wɔn yɛɛ nkoadwuma.

Yosua 16:2
Na asase no san kɔfa Betel a ɛwɔ Lus, na etwam kɔ Arkifo hye so wɔ Atarot, 

Yosua 16:3
na esian kɔ atɔe kɔfa Yafletfo hye so de kosi Anafo Bet-Horon hye so, na efi hɔ kɔ Geser kɔpem po no ano.

Yosua 16:4
Na Yosef mma Manase ne Efraim nyaa wɔn asase. 

Yosua 16:5
 Na asase a Efraim asefo mmusua no nyae no hye a ɛwɔ apuei no fi Atarot-Adar de kosi Atifi wɔ Bet-Horon; 

Yosua 16:6
na ɔhye no kɔfa po no ano wɔ Mikmetat atifi fam, na ɔhye no kɔntɔn fa apuei kɔ Taanat-Silo, na etwam kɔ apuei kodu Yanoa. 

Yosua 16:7
Na esian fi Yanoa kɔ Atarot ne Naara, na ɛkɔfa Yeriko kɔ Yordan. 

Yosua 16:8
Ɔhye no fi Tapua toa so kɔ atɔe kodu Kana subon ho, na efi hɔ kɔ po no ano. Eyi ne Efraim asefo ne wɔn mmusua no asase. 

Yosua 16:9
Afei Efraimfo nyaa nkurow wɔ Manasefo asase so, nkurow ne ɛho nkuraa nyinaa.

Yosua 17:1
 Na wɔbɔɔ ntonto maa Manase abusuakuw no nyaa asase, efisɛ ɔno ne Yosef ba panyin, na ebedii Manase ba panyin Makir, Gilead papa, nsam, efisɛ na ɔyɛ ɔsabarima; na wɔde Gilead ne Basan maa no. 

Yosua 17:10
Enti na Efraim wɔ anafo na Manase nso wɔ atifi; ne hye kɔpem po no ano. Wɔne Aser bɔ hye wɔ atifi na wɔne Isakar nso bɔ hye wɔ apuei.

Yosua 17:11
 Afei Manase benyaa nkurow a edidi so yi ne ɛho nkuraa ne emu nnipa wɔ Isakar ne Aser nsase so: Bet-Sean ne Yibleam ne Dor ne En-Dor ne Taanak ne Megido, ne nkurow abiɛsa a egu nkoko so.

Yosua 17:12
 Nanso Manasefo antumi anko amfa nkurow yi, enti Kanaanfo kɔɔ so tenaa asase no so. 

Yosua 17:13
Afei bere a Israelfo ho yɛɛ den no, wɔmaa Kanaanfo no yɛɛ nkoadwuma, nanso wɔantu wɔn amfi hɔ koraa.

Yosua 17:14
Na Yosef mma no kobisaa Yosua sɛ: “Bere a Awurade ahyira me abedu sesɛɛ ma mayɛ ɔman kɛse yi, adɛn nti na woatwa asase biako pɛ ama me sɛ m’agyapade?” 

Yosua 17:15
Ɛnna Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Sɛ woyɛ ɔman kɛse a, ɛnde kobu kwae a ɛwɔ Perisifo ne Abranfo asase so no fa, efisɛ bepɔw so asase a ɛwɔ Efraim no sua ma wo.” 

Yosua 17:16
Na Yosef mma no kae sɛ: “Bepɔw no sua ma yɛn, na Kanaanfo a wɔte asasetaw no so nyinaa, wɔn a wɔte Bet-Sean ne ɛho nkurow mu ne Yesreel bon mu no, wɔ nteaseɛnam a wɔde nnade ayɛ.”

Yosua 17:17
Enti Yosua ka kyerɛɛ Yosef fie, Efraim ne Manase, sɛ: “Woyɛ ɔman kɛse na wo ho yɛ den ankasa. Ɛnyɛ asase biako na ɛsɛ sɛ wunya, 

Yosua 17:18
na mmom bepɔw no so bɛyɛ wo dea. Ɛyɛ kwae, enti bu fa, na ɛhɔ na w’asase no ano bɛpem. Kanaanfo no ho yɛ den na wɔwɔ nnade nteaseɛnam de, nanso wobetumi apam wɔn fi hɔ.”

Yosua 17:2
 Na wɔbɔɔ ntonto maa Manase mma a aka no mmusua nso nyaa asase. Enti wɔkyɛ maa Abiesar asefo ne Helek asefo ne Asriel asefo ne Sekem asefo ne Hefer asefo ne Semida asefo. Eyinom ne Yosef ba Manase mmabarima mmusua. 

Yosua 17:3
 Na Manase ba ne Makir, na Makir ba ne Gilead. Na Gilead ba Hefer nso ba ne Selofehad. Na Selofehad nni ɔbabarima biara; na ne mma nyinaa yɛ mmea na wɔn din ne Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka, ne Tirsa. 

Yosua 17:4
 Na mmea yi baa ɔsɔfo Eleasar ne Nun ba Yosua ne mpanyimfo no nkyɛn bɛkae sɛ: “Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ ɔmma yɛn agyapade wɔ yɛn nuabarimanom mu.” Enti ɔmaa wɔn agyapade wɔ wɔn papa nuanom mu sɛnea Awurade hyɛe no.

Yosua 17:5
Manase nyaa nsase du; ɛsono Gilead ne Basan asase a ɛwɔ Yordan agya no; 

Yosua 17:6
efisɛ Manase mmabea no nyaa agyapade wɔ ne mmabarimanom mu; na Gilead asase no bɛyɛɛ Manase mma nkae no agyapade.

Yosua 17:7
 Na Manase hye no fi Aser kɔ Mikmetat, wɔ Sekem anim. Ɔhye no fi hɔ fa nifa so kɔ En-Tapuafo asase so. 

Yosua 17:8
Tapua asase no bedii Manasefo nsam, nanso Tapua kurow a ɛwɔ Manase hye so no yɛ Efraimfo dea. 

Yosua 17:9
 Na ɔhye no fa Kana subon ho kɔ anafo de kɔfa Efraim nkurow a ɛwɔ subon ho no mu, wɔ Manase nkurow no mfinimfini. Na Manase hye no wɔ subon no atifi, na ano kɔpem po no ho. 

Yosua 18:1
 Afei Israel asafo no nyinaa kohyiae wɔ Shilo, na wosii ahyiae ntamadan no wɔ hɔ, efisɛ afei de, na asase no abedi wɔn nsam. 

Yosua 18:10
 Na Yosua twee ntonto maa wɔn wɔ Silo wɔ Awurade anim. Enti Yosua kyɛɛ asase no maa Israelfo no maa obiara nyaa ne kyɛfa.

Yosua 18:11
Wɔtwee ntonto maa Benyamin asefo mmusua no nyaa wɔn asase. Na wɔn asase no da Yuda ne Yosef mma no ntam. 

Yosua 18:12
Na wɔn hye no kɔpem Yordan atifi, na ɛforo kɔfa Yeriko nkoko so wɔ atifi, na etwam fa bepɔw so wɔ atɔe kɔpem Bet-Awen sare so. 

Yosua 18:13
Na ɔhye no fi hɔ kɔfa Lus, wɔ Lus anaa Betel nkoko a ɛwɔ anafo no ho; na esian kɔfa Atarot-Adar, bepɔw a ɛwɔ Anafo Bet-Horon anafo no so. 

Yosua 18:14
 Na ɔhye no fi bepɔw a ɛwɔ Bet-Horon anim wɔ anafo no so kɔntɔn fa atɔe fam kɔ anafo; na ɛkɔpem Kiriat-Baal anaa Kiriat-Yearim, Yudafo kurow bi. Eyi ne atɔe fam hye no.

Yosua 18:15
Na anafo fam hye no fi Kiriat-Yearim ano nohoa kɔ atɔe kɔfa Neftoa asuti ho. 

Yosua 18:16
Na esian kɔfa bepɔw a ɛne Hinom ba bon di nhwɛanim no akyi pɛɛ. Saa bepɔw yi kɔ ara kodu Refaim bon no atifi fam. Na ɔhye no sian kɔfa Hinom bon mu kɔ Yebusifo koko so wɔ anafo fam, na efi hɔ kɔ En-Rogel. 

Yosua 18:17
Na ɛkɔ atifi kɔfa En-Semes kɔ Gelilot wɔ Adumim koko no anim, na esian kɔ Ruben ba Bohan bo no ho. 

Yosua 18:18
Na ɛforo kɔ atifi fam kɔfa Araba koko no anim sian kɔ Araba. 

Yosua 18:19
 Na ɔhye no twam kɔ Bet-Hogla koko so wɔ atifi fam. Na ano kɔpem Nkyene Po no dɔnnɔn a ɛwɔ atifi fam no ho wɔ Yordan anafo. Eyi ne anafo fam hye no. 

Yosua 18:2
Nanso na aka Israelfo mmusua ason a wontwitwaa wɔn agyapade mmaa wɔn. 

Yosua 18:20
Na Yordan ne n'apuei fam hye. Eyi ne asase a wɔde maa Benyamin asefo mmusua no; n’ahye nyinaa ni.

Yosua 18:21
Nkurow a ebedii Benyamin asefo ne wɔn mmusua nsam ne Yeriko, Bet-Hogla, Emek-Kesis, 

Yosua 18:22
ne Bet-Araba, Semaraim, Betel,

Yosua 18:23
ne Awim, Para, Ofra, 

Yosua 18:24
ne Kefa-Amoni, Ofni, Geba; nkurow dumien ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 18:25
Gibeon, Rama, Beerot, 

Yosua 18:26
ne Mispe, Kefira, Mosa, 

Yosua 18:27
ne Rekem, Yirpeel, Tarala, 

Yosua 18:28
ne Sela, Ha-Elef, ne Yebusifo kurow Yerusalem, ne Gibea ne Kiriat; nkurow dunan ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 18:3
Enti Yosua bisaa Israelfo no sɛ: “Mobɛtwentwɛn mo nan ase akosi da bɛn na moakɔfa asase a Awurade mo agyanom Nyankopɔn de ama mo no? 

Yosua 18:4
Mompaw mmarima baasa mfi abusuakuw biara mu na memma wɔnkɔfa asase no so; wonsusuw na wɔnkyerɛw ho nsɛm sɛ wɔn agyapade, na wɔmmra me nkyɛn. 

Yosua 18:5
 Na wɔnkyɛ asase no mu ason mfa. Yuda nnyina n’asase so wɔ anafo na Yosef fie nso nnyina wɔn asase so wɔ atifi fam. 

Yosua 18:6
Monkyekyɛ asase no mu ason, na monkyerɛw ho nsɛm mmrɛ me, na mentwe ntonto wɔ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn anim mma mo.

Yosua 18:7
Na Lewifo no de, wɔrennya mo asase no bi, efisɛ wɔn agyapade ne Awurade asɔfodi. Gad ne Ruben ne Manase abusuakuw fa no nso anya wɔn agyapade a Awurade akoa Mose de maa wɔn wɔ Yordan agya wɔ apuei no.”

Yosua 18:8
Enti mmarima no sɔree sɛ wɔrekɔ, na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔrekɔyɛ asase no ho krataa no sɛ: “Monkɔfa asase no so ntwitwa nto hɔ na monsan mmra, na mentwe ntonto wɔ Awurade anim wɔ Shilo mma mo.” 

Yosua 18:9
Na mmarima no siim kɔfaa asase no so kyekyɛɛ mu ason, emu biara ne ne nkurow, na wɔkyerɛw wɔ nhoma mu. Afei wɔsan baa Yosua nkyɛn wɔ Shilo asoɛe hɔ.

Yosua 19:1
 Afei ntonto a ɛto so abien no bɔɔ Simeon abusuakuw no, Simeon mma mmusua no. Na wɔn agyapade no wɔ Yuda abusuakuw no asase so. 

Yosua 19:10
Ntonto a ɛto so abiɛsa no bɔɔ Sebulon mma mmusua no. Na wɔn asase no hye kosi Sarid. 

Yosua 19:11
 Na ɔhye no toa so fa atɔe fam kɔ Mareal de kosi Dabeset, na ɛkɔ ara kɔfa subon a ɛne Yokneam di nhwɛanim no ho. 

Yosua 19:12
Na efi Sarid san kɔfa apuei kɔ Kislot-Tabor hye so, na efi hɔ kɔfa Daberat foro kɔ Yafia. 

Yosua 19:13
Afei na etwam fa apuei kɔ Gat-Hefer ne Et-Kasin. Efi hɔ kɔ Rimon, na ɛtoa so kɔ Nea. 

Yosua 19:14
 Na ɔhye no kɔntɔn fa atifi kɔ Hanaton, na ano kɔpem Yifta-El bon mu. 

Yosua 19:15
 Ne Katat, Nahalal, Simron, Yidala, ne Betlehem; nkurow dumien ne ɛho nkuraa. 

Yosua 19:16
Eyi ne Sebulon mma mmusua no agyapade; nkurow ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 19:17
 Ntonto a ɛto so anan no bɔɔ Isakar mma mmusua no. 

Yosua 19:18
 Na wɔn asase no hye kɔfa Yesreel, Kesulot, Sunem, 

Yosua 19:19
ne Hafraim, Sihon, Anaharat, 

Yosua 19:2
 Na bere a wɔmaa wɔn agyapade no, nkurow a wonyae no bi ne Beer-Seba, Saba, Molada, 

Yosua 19:20
ne Rabit, Kision, Ebes, 

Yosua 19:21
ne Remet, En-Ganim, En-Hada, ne Bet-Pases. 

Yosua 19:22
Na ɔhye no san kɔfa Tabor, Sahasuma, ne Bet-Semes, na ano kɔpem Yordan ho; nkurow dunsia ne ɛho nkuraa. 

Yosua 19:23
Eyi ne Isakar mma mmusua no agyapade; nkurow no ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 19:24
Ntonto a ɛto so anum no bɔɔ Aser mma mmusua no. 

Yosua 19:25
 Na wɔn hye ne Helkat, Hali, Beten, Aksaf,

Yosua 19:26
ne Alamelek, Amad, ne Misal. Ɛkɔ atɔe kɔfa Karmel ne Sihor-Libnat, 

Yosua 19:27
na ɛsan kɔfa apuei kɔ Bet-Dagon kosi Sebulon ne Yifta-El bon mu wɔ atifi; ɛkɔ Bet-Emek ne Neiel, na efi hɔ kɔ Kabul wɔ benkum so, 

Yosua 19:28
na ɛkɔfa Ebron, Rehob, Hamon, ne Kana, na ekodu Sidon kɛse. 

Yosua 19:29
Na ɔhye no dan kɔfa Rama kɔ ara kodu Tiro (Tyre) kurow a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu. Afei ɛkɔfa Hosa de kosi po no ho wɔ Aksib mpɔtam, 

Yosua 19:3
ne Hasar-Sual, Bala, Esem, 

Yosua 19:30
ne Uma, Afek, ne Rehob; nkurow aduonu abien ne ɛho nkuraa. 

Yosua 19:31
Eyi ne Aser asefo mmusua no agyapade; nkurow ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 19:32
Ntonto a ɛto so asia no bɔɔ Naftali abusuakuw no, Naftali mma sɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ. 

Yosua 19:33
 Na wɔn hye no fi Helef kɔfa Saananim dua kɛse no ho kɔ Adami-Nekeb ne Yabneel kosi Lakum; na ano kɔpem Yordan ho. 

Yosua 19:34
 Na ɛkɔfa atɔe kɔ Asnot-Tabor, na efi hɔ kɔ Hukok kosi Sebulon wɔ anafo, Aser wɔ atɔe, Yuda wɔ Yordan apuei fam. 

Yosua 19:35
 Na nkurow a wɔabɔ ho ban no ne Sidim, Ser, Hammat, Rakat, Kineret, 

Yosua 19:36
ne Adama, Rama, Hasor, 

Yosua 19:37
ne Kedes, Edrei, En-Hasor, 

Yosua 19:38
ne Yiron, Migdal-El, Horem, Bet-Anat, ne Bet-Semes; nkurow dunkron ne ɛho nkuraa. 

Yosua 19:39
Eyi ne Naftali mma mmusua no agyapade; nkurow ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 19:4
ne Eltolad, Betul, Horma, 

Yosua 19:40
Ntonto a ɛto so ason no bɔɔ Dan mma mmusua no. 

Yosua 19:41
Wɔn agyapade no hye fa Sora, Estaol, Ir-Semes, 

Yosua 19:42
ne Saalabin, Ayalon, Yitla, 

Yosua 19:43
ne Elon, Timna, Ekron, 

Yosua 19:44
ne Elteke, Gibeton, Baalat, 

Yosua 19:45
ne Yehud, Bene-Berak, Gat-Rimon, 

Yosua 19:46
ne Me-Yarkon ne Rakon, na ɔhye no kɔfa Yopa anim. 

Yosua 19:47
Nanso na Dan mma no asase sua ma wɔn. Enti Dan mma no de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ atifi ne Lesemfo kɔkoe, na wɔtwee nkrante too kurow no so, na wɔfa tenaa so. Afei wɔde wɔn agya Dan din too Lesem so, enti wɔfrɛɛ kurow no Dan. 

Yosua 19:48
Eyi ne Dan mma mmusua no agyapade; nkurow ne ɛho nkuraa.

Yosua 19:49
Afei wowiee asase no kyekyɛ. Na Israelfo maa Nun ba Yosua agyapade wɔ wɔn mfinimfini. 

Yosua 19:5
ne Siklag, Bet-Makabot, Hasar-Susa, 

Yosua 19:50
Wɔde kurow a obisae no maa no sɛnea Awurade hyɛe no. Kurow no ne Timnat-Sera a ɛwɔ Efraim bepɔw so no; na ɔkyekyee kurow no tenaa mu.

Yosua 19:51
Eyinom ne nsase a ɔsɔfo Eleasar ne Nun ba Yosua ne Israel agyanom mmusua mu atitiriw bɔɔ ntonto wɔ Shilo kyɛ maa wɔn. Wɔyɛɛ saa wɔ Awurade anim wɔ ahyiae ntamadan no ano. Afei wowiee asase no kyekyɛ.

Yosua 19:6
ne Bet-Lebaot ne Saruhen; nkurow dumiɛnsa ne ɛho nkuraa. 

Yosua 19:7
Ain, Rimon, Eter, ne Asan; nkurow anan ne ɛho nkuraa, 

Yosua 19:8
ne nkuraa a atwa nkurow yi nyinaa ho ahyia de kosi Baalat-Beer ne Rama wɔ anafo. Eyi ne Simeon mma mmusua no agyapade. 

Yosua 19:9
Yuda abusuakuw no agyapade no bi na wɔde maa Simeon abusuakuw no, efisɛ na Yudafo agyapade no so dodo ma wɔn. Enti na Simeon abusuakuw no nkurow wɔ Yudafo asase so.

Yosua 2:1
Afei Nun ba Yosua somaa mmarima baanu kodɛɛ fii Sitim, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔhwɛ sɛnea asase no ne Yeriko kurow no te.” Enti wosiim kɔe, na wokoduu ɔbea aguaman bi a ne din de Rahab fie, na wɔdaa hɔ. 

Yosua 2:10
Yɛate sɛnea mufi Egypt reba no Awurade maa Po Kɔkɔɔ no yowee wɔ mo anim, ne nea mode yɛɛ Amorifo ahene baanu, Sihon ne Og, a wɔwɔ Yordan agya no, sɛe a mosɛee wɔn pasaa no. 

Yosua 2:11
 Na bere a yɛtee no, yɛn koma tui, na mo nti obiara honhom aguan besi nnɛ, efisɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn yɛ ɔsoro a ɛwɔ soro ne asase a ɛwɔ fam yi Nyankopɔn. 

Yosua 2:12
Esiane sɛ mayɛ mo adɔe nti, monka ntam Awurade din mu sɛ mo nso mobɛyɛ m'agya fiefo adɔe. Enti momma me sɛnkyerɛnne a ɛyɛ nokware. 

Yosua 2:13
Mesrɛ mo munnye me papa ne me maame ne me nuanom mmarima ne mmea ne wɔn fiefo nyinaa. Na munyi yɛn kra mfi owu mu.”

Yosua 2:14
Ɛnna mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Sɛ mubewu de, anka yɛde yɛn kra betwa so! Na sɛ moammɔ asɛm yi so na Awurade de asase yi ma yɛn a, yɛn nso yɛbɛyɛ mo adɔe na yɛadi mo nokware.” 

Yosua 2:15
Afei ɔbea maa wɔn hama ma wɔde faa mfɛnsere mu sii fam, efisɛ na ne dan si kurow no fasu so, na ɔfasu so na na ɔte. 

Yosua 2:16
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔ bepɔw so na wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ mo no anhu mo; afei momfa mo ho nsie nnansa nkosi sɛ wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ mo no bɛsan aba ansa na moakɔ mo kwan.”

Yosua 2:17
Na mmarima no nso ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Yɛrenni fɔ wɔ ntam a woama yɛaka yi ho. 

Yosua 2:18
Hwɛ! Yɛreba asase yi so. Enti fa hama kɔkɔɔ yi sɛn mfɛnsere a woma yɛfaa mu yi ho, na ma wo papa ne wo maame ne wo nuanom ne wo papa fiefo nyinaa mmɛka wo ho wɔ fie ha. 

Yosua 2:19
Na obiara a obefi fie yi mu akɔ abɔnten no, ne mogya begu ne ti so, na yɛrenni fɔ. Na obiara a ɔwɔ wo nkyɛn wɔ fie ha de, sɛ obi de ne nsa ka no a, ne mogya bɛba yɛn ti so. 

Yosua 2:2
Na asɛm no kɔduu Yeriko hene asom sɛ: “Hwɛ! Israelfo mmarima bi aba ha anadwo yi rebɛhwɛ sɛnea yɛn asase yi te.” 

Yosua 2:20
Na sɛ wobɔ asɛm yi so a, ɛnde yɛrenni fɔ wɔ ntam a woama yɛaka yi ho.” 

Yosua 2:21
Ɛnna ɔbea no kae sɛ: “Nea moaka yi mmra mu saa.” Afei ogyaa wɔn kwan ma wɔkɔe. Na ɔde hama kɔkɔɔ no sɛn mfɛnsere no ho. 

Yosua 2:22
Enti wɔkɔɔ bepɔw so na wɔtenaa hɔ nnansa kosii sɛ wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn no san bae. Na wɔhwehwɛɛ akwan no nyinaa so nanso wɔanhu wɔn. 

Yosua 2:23
Afei mmarima baanu no sian fii bepɔw no so, na wotwaa nsu no baa Nun ba Yosua nkyɛn, na wɔbɛkaa nea wɔfaa mu nyinaa kyerɛɛ no. 

Yosua 2:24
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Awurade de asase no nyinaa ahyɛ yɛn nsa. Na yɛn nti, asase no sofo nyinaa koma abotow.”

Yosua 2:3
Ɛnna Yeriko hene soma kɔɔ Rahab nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Yi mmarima a wɔaba wo nkyɛn wɔ wo fie no bra, na wɔaba ha sɛ wɔrebɛhwɛ sɛnea yɛn asase no afa nyinaa te.”

Yosua 2:4
 Nanso saa bere yi nyinaa na ɔbea no de mmarima baanu no asie. Na ɔkae sɛ: “Ampa, mmarima no baa me nkyɛn, nanso minnim baabi a wofi. 

Yosua 2:5
Na esum durui a wɔrebɛto kurow pon no mu no, na mmarima no fii adi, nanso minnim baabi a wɔfae. Monyɛ ntɛm ntiw wɔn na mobɛto wɔn.” 

Yosua 2:6
 Nso na ɔde wɔn kɔ ɔdan no atifi de wɔn akosie asaawa nnua bi a wɔahyehyɛ wɔ atifi hɔ mu. 

Yosua 2:7
Enti ɔhene no nkurɔfo no de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Yordan asutwaree tiw wɔn. Bere a wofii adi ara pɛ na wɔtoo kurow no pon mu.

Yosua 2:8
Ansa na mmarima a wɔwɔ ɔdan no atifi bɛda no, ɔbea no kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn, 

Yosua 2:9
 na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Minim sɛ ɔkwan biara so Awurade de asase yi ama mo, na mo ho hu mpo atɔ yɛn so dedaw. Na moama asase yi sofo nyinaa koma abotow. 

Yosua 20:1
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: 

Yosua 20:2
“Ka kyerɛ Israelfo no sɛ, ‘Munyi guankɔbea nkurow a menam Mose so kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ mo no, 

Yosua 20:3
na sɛ obi anhyɛ da na ne nsa pa kum onipa bi a, waguan akɔ hɔ. Ɛbɛyɛ mo guankɔbea na nea ne nsa apa no atumi akɔbɔ ne ho aguaa wɔ hɔ na owufo no busuani ankum no antua ka. 

Yosua 20:4
Onguan nkɔ nkurow yi biako mu na onkogyina kurow no pon ano. Afei ɔmfa n’asɛm nto ɛhɔ mpanyimfo anim, na wɔmfa no nkɔ kurow no mu nkɔma no baabi ntena wɔ wɔn nkyɛn. 

Yosua 20:5
 Na sɛ obusuani no tiw no kɔ hɔ a, wɔnhwɛ na wɔamfa nea wakum nipa no amma no, efisɛ wanhyɛ da na okum no; onni ne ho adwemmɔne biara. 

Yosua 20:6
 Na ɔntena kurom hɔ nkosi sɛ ɔbɛba abegyina asafo no anim na wɔabu no atɛn, na ɔbɛtena hɔ akosi sɛ ɔsɔfo panyin a ɔwɔ so saa bere no bewu. Ɛno akyi no, nea ne nsa apa no betumi asan akɔ ne fie ne kurow a oguan fii mu no mu.’”

Yosua 20:7
Enti woyiyii nkurow yi sii hɔ: Kedes a ɛwɔ Galilea wɔ Naftali mmepɔw so; Sekem a ɛwɔ Efraim mmepɔw so; ne Kiriat-Arba anaa Hebron a ɛwɔ Yuda mmepɔw so. 

Yosua 20:8
Afei Yordan mpɔtam wɔ Yeriko apuei nso, woyii Beser a ɛwɔ sare so fii Ruben abusuakuw mu; Ramot a ɛwɔ Gilead fii Gad abusuakuw mu; ne Golan a ɛwɔ Basan fii Manase abusuakuw mu.

Yosua 20:9
 Eyinom ne nkurow a woyiyi maa Israelfo ne ahɔho a wɔte wɔn mu no na sɛ obi nsa pa kum ɔkra bi a, waguan akɔ hɔ, na nea wawu no busuani ankum no ansa na wabegyina asafo no anim ma wɔadi n’asɛm.

Yosua 21:1
Afei Lewi abusuakuw no mpanyimfo baa ɔsɔfo Eleasar ne Nun ba Yosua ne Israel agyanom mmusua mu atitiriw nkyɛn 

Yosua 21:10
na ebedii Aaron mma a wɔyɛ Kohat asefo a wofi Lewi abusuakuw mu no nsam, efisɛ wɔn na wonyaa ntonto a edi kan no. 

Yosua 21:11
Enti wɔde Kiriat-Arba efisɛ na Arba yɛ Anak agya, anaa Hebron, a ɛwɔ Yuda bepɔw so no ne ɛho mfikyisase nyinaa maa wɔn. 

Yosua 21:12
Na wɔde kurow no ho asase ne ne nkuraa nyinaa maa Yefune ba Kaleb sɛ n’agyapade.

Yosua 21:13
Afei wɔde nkurow yi nso maa Aaron mma asɔfo no: Hebron a sɛ obi kum onipa a obeguan akɔ hɔ ne ɛho mfikyisase, Libna ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:14
Yatir ne ɛho mfikyisase, Estemoa ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:15
Holon ne ɛho mfikyisase, Debir ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:16
Ain ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Yuta ne Bet-Semes ne ɛho mfikyisase. Wonyaa nkurow akron fii mmusua abien yi mu.

Yosua 21:17
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Benyamin abusuakuw no hɔ ni: Gibeon ne ɛho mfikyisase, Geba ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:18
Anatot ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Almon ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:19
Enti nkurow a Aaron mma asɔfo no nyae nyinaa yɛ nkurow dumiɛnsa ne ɛho mfikyisase.

Yosua 21:2
wɔ Shilo wɔ Kanaan asase so bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Awurade nam Mose so kae sɛ momma yɛn nkurow a yɛbɛtena mu ne mfikyisase a yɛn mmoa bedidi so.” 

Yosua 21:20
Na wɔbɔɔ ntonto no, Kohat mma mmusua a aka a wɔn nyinaa yɛ Lewifo no nso nyaa nkurow fii Efraim abusuakuw no nkyɛn. 

Yosua 21:21
Nkurow a wɔde maa wɔn ni: Sekem a sɛ obi kum onipa a obeguan akɔ hɔ ne ɛho mfikyisase wɔ Efraim bepɔw so, Geser ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:22
Kibsaim ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Bet-Horon ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:23
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Dan abusuakuw no mu ni: Elteke ne ɛho mfikyisase, Gibeton ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:24
Ayalon ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Gat-Rimon ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:25
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Manase abusuakuw fano mu ni: Taanak ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Gat-Rimon ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow abien.

Yosua 21:26
Nkurow a Kohat mma mmusua a aka no nyae nyinaa yɛ nkurow du ne ɛho mfikyisase.

Yosua 21:27
 Na Gerson mma a wɔyɛ Lewifo no nso nyaa nkurow. Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Manase abusuakuw fano asase so ni: Golan a sɛ obi kum onipa a obeguan akɔ hɔ ne ɛho mfikyisase wɔ Basan, ne Beestera ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow abien.

Yosua 21:28
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Isakar abusuakuw no mu ni: Kision ne ɛho mfikyisase, Daberat ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:29
Yarmut ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne En-Ganim ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:3
Enti Israelfo maa Lewifo no nkurow ne mfikyisase; woyii eyi fii wɔn agyapade mu, sɛnea Awurade kae no.

Yosua 21:30
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Aser abusuakuw no mu ni: Misal ne ɛho mfikyisase, Abdon ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:31
Helkat ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Rehob ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:32
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Naftali abusuakuw no mu ni: Kedes a ɛwɔ Galilea a sɛ obi kum onipa a obeguan akɔ hɔ ne ɛho mfikyisase, Hamot-Dor ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Kartan ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow abiɛsa.

Yosua 21:33
Enti nkurow a Gerson mma mmusua no nyae nyinaa yɛ nkurow dumiɛnsa ne ɛho mfikyisase.

Yosua 21:34
Lewifo a na wɔaka ne Merari mma mmusua no nkurow a wonyae wɔ Sebulon abusuakuw no mu ni: Yokneam ne ɛho mfikyisase, Karta ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:35
Dimna ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Nahalal ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:36
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Ruben abusuakuw no mu ni: Beser ne ɛho mfikyisase, Yahas ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:37
Kedemot ne ɛho mfikyisase, ne Mefaat ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow anan.

Yosua 21:38
Nkurow a wonyae wɔ Gad abusuakuw no mu ni: Ramot a ɛwɔ Gilead a sɛ obi kum onipa a obeguan akɔ hɔ ne ɛho mfikyisase, Mahanaim ne ɛho mfikyisase, 

Yosua 21:39
Hesbon ne ɛho mfikyisase, Yaser ne ɛho mfikyisase; nkurow no nyinaa yɛ anan.

Yosua 21:4
Afei wɔbɔɔ ntonto maa Kohatfo mmusua nyaa wɔn de, na Aaron mma asɔfo a wofi Lewi abusuakuw mu no nyaa nkurow dumiɛnsa fii Yuda ne Simeon ne Benyamin mmusua no mu.

Yosua 21:40
Enti wɔbɔɔ ntonto no, nkurow a Lewifo a na wɔaka a wɔyɛ Merari mma mmusua no nyae nyinaa yɛ dumien.

Yosua 21:41
Nkurow a Lewifo no nyae wɔ Israelfo asase so nyinaa yɛ nkurow aduanan awotwe ne ɛho mfikyisase. 

Yosua 21:42
Namfikyisase atwa nkurow yi nyinaa ho ahyia; saa na na nkurow no nyinaa te.

Yosua 21:43
Enti Awurade de asase a ɔkaa ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn agyanom no nyinaa maa Israelfo tenaa so.

Yosua 21:44
Na baabi a wɔwɔ biara no, Awurade ma wɔhomee sɛnea ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wɔn agyanom no, na wɔn atamfo no mu biara antumi annyina wɔn anim. Awurade de wɔn atamfo nyinaa hyɛɛ wɔn nsa.

Yosua 21:45
Asɛm pa a Awurade de hyɛɛ Israelfo bɔ no mu biako mpo antɔ fam; ne nyinaa baa mu.

Yosua 21:5
Na wɔbɔɔ ntonto maa Kohat mma a aka no nso nyaa nkurow du fii Efraim ne Dan mmusua ne Manase abusuakuw fano hɔ.

Yosua 21:6
Na wɔbɔɔ ntonto maa Gerson mma no nyaa nkurow dumiɛnsa fii Isakar abusuakuw ne Aser abusuakuw ne Naftali abusuakuw ne Manase abusuakuw faa ɛwɔ Basan no mu.

Yosua 21:7
Na Merari mma mmusua nso nyaa nkurow dumien fii Ruben abusuakuw ne Gad abusuakuw ne Sebulon abusuakuw no mu.

Yosua 21:8
Enti Israelfo bɔɔ ntonto de nkurow yi ne ɛho mfikyisase a mmoa bedidi so maa Lewi abusuakuw no, sɛnea Awurade nam Mose so kae no.

Yosua 21:9
Na Yuda mma mmusua ne Simeon mma mmusua no de nkurow a wɔabobɔ din yi mae, 

Yosua 22:1
Ɛnna Yosua frɛɛ Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no, 

Yosua 22:10
 Na bere a woduu Yordan mantam mu wɔ Kanaan asase so no, Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no sii afɔremuka wɔ Yordan ho. Na ɛyɛ afɔremuka kɛse soronko bi. 

Yosua 22:11
Akyiri yi, Israelfo a aka no tee sɛ wɔrekeka sɛ: “Hwɛ, Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no asi afɔremuka wɔ Yordan mpɔtam, Kanaan hye so, wɔ Israelfo no afa hɔ.” 

Yosua 22:12
 Na bere a Israelfo no tee no, Israel asafo no nyinaa boaboaa wɔn ano wɔ Shilo sɛ wɔne wɔn rekɔko.

Yosua 22:13
Na Israelfo somaa ɔsɔfo Eleasar ba Finehas kɔɔ Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no nkyɛn wɔ Gilead asase so. 

Yosua 22:14
na wɔde mpanyimfo du kaa ne ho. Woyii ɔpanyin biako fii Israel agyanom abusuakuw biara mu. Eyinom na wɔdeda wɔn agyanom fie ano, Israel mpempem mu. 

Yosua 22:15
 Na bere a woduu Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no nkyɛn wɔ Gilead asase so no, wɔde too wɔn anim sɛ:

Yosua 22:16
“Awurade asafo no nyinaa se yemmisa mo sɛ, ‘Dɛn nti na moayɛ adebɔne yi atia Israel Nyankopɔn, na moadan afi Awurade akyi akosi afɔremuka? Ɛnyɛ atua na moatew atia Awurade nnɛ yi? 

Yosua 22:17
Bɔne a yɛyɛe wɔ Peor a ɛkɔfaa ɔhaw baa Awurade asafo so a ɛde besi nnɛ yentumi nnwiraa yɛn ho yi nnɔɔso mma yɛn? 

Yosua 22:18
Ɛnnɛ nso moasi mo bo sɛ mobɛdan afi Awurade akyi. Munhu sɛ sɛ motew atua tia Awurade nnɛ a, ɔkyena Israel asafo no nyinaa na ɛbɛsoa n’abufuw. 

Yosua 22:19
 Nanso sɛ asase a wɔde ama mo no ho agu fi a, ɛnde mommra mmɛtena yɛn nkyɛn wɔ Awurade asase no so, baabi a Awurade ntamadan si no. Sɛ musi afɔremuka foforo ka Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn afɔremuka no ho a, na moretew atua atia Awurade, ne yɛn nso.

Yosua 22:2
na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Moadi nea Awurade akoa Mose ka kyerɛɛ mo no nyinaa so, na me nso moayɛ aso ama me wɔ biribiara mu. 

Yosua 22:20
Ɛnyɛ Sera ba Akan na ɔfaa nneɛma a wɔkae sɛ wɔnsɛe no no? Nso ɛnyɛ Israel asafo no nyinaa na wɔsoaa ɛho abufuw? Ɔno nkutoo anwu wɔ ne bɔne no mu.’”

Yosua 22:21
Ɛnna Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no ka kyerɛɛ Israel mpempem so mpanyimfo no sɛ: 

Yosua 22:22
“Onyankopɔn, Tweaduampɔn Awurade, Onyankopɔn, Tweaduampɔn Awurade, ɔno na onim, na Israel nso nhunu, yɛyɛɛ no atuatew mu anaa Awurade fom mu na yɛyɛe a, nnye yɛn nkwa nnɛ!

Yosua 22:23
Sɛ yesii afɔremuka no sɛ yɛde redan afi Awurade akyi, anaasɛ yesii sɛ yɛbɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre anaa aduan afɔre anaa asomdwoe afɔre wɔ so a, ɛnde Awurade ankasa bebisa ho asɛm. 

Yosua 22:24
Ɛnyɛ biribi a yesuro nti na yɛyɛɛ eyi? Yɛkae wɔ yɛn tirim sɛ, ‘Daakye bi mo mma bebisa yɛn mma sɛ: “Dɛn na mo ne Awurade Israel Nyankopɔn no wɔ yɛ? 

Yosua 22:25
 Na Awurade de Yordan ayɛ ɔhye ato yɛne mo Rubenfo ne Gadfo ntam. Munni kyɛfa biara wɔ Awurade mu.” Ɛba saa a, mo mma bɛma yɛn mma agyae Awurade suro.’

Yosua 22:26
“Enti yɛkae sɛ: ‘Momma yɛnyɛ ho biribi; momma yensi afɔremuka. Yɛremmɔ ɔhyew afɔre anaa afɔre foforo biara wɔ so, 

Yosua 22:27
na mmom ɛbɛyɛ adanse wɔ yɛne mo ne yɛn nkyirimma ntam sɛ yɛde yɛn hyew afɔre ne yɛn asomdwoe afɔre ne afɔre foforo a aka bɛba Awurade anim abɛsom no, na ɔkyena bi mo mma anka ankyerɛ yɛn mma sɛ: “Munni kyɛfa biara wɔ Awurade mu.”’ 

Yosua 22:28
Enti yɛkae sɛ, ‘Sɛ ɛba sɛ ɔkyena bi wɔka saa kyerɛ yɛne yɛn nkyirimma a, yɛbɛka sɛ: “Monhwɛ Awurade afɔremuka sɛso a yɛn agyanom yɛe. Ɛnyɛ ɔhyew afɔre anaa afɔre foforo biara nti na wɔyɛe, na mmom wɔyɛe sɛ ɛnyɛ adanse wɔ yɛne mo ntam.”’ 

Yosua 22:29
Ɛmpare yɛn sɛ yɛbɛhyɛ da atew atua atia Awurade na yɛadan yɛn ho afi Awurade akyi akosi afɔremuka foforo aka Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn afɔremuka a esi ne ntamadan anim no ho, na yɛabɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne aduan afɔre anaa afɔre foforo biara wɔ so!”

Yosua 22:3
Saa nna dodow yi nyinaa moannyaw mo nuanom de besi nnɛ, na moadi Awurade mo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so. 

Yosua 22:30
 Na bere a ɔsɔfo Finehas ne asafo no mu mpanyimfo ne wɔn a wɔdeda Israel mpempem ano a wɔka ne ho no tee asɛm a Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manasefo kae no, wohui sɛ ɛtɔ asom. 

Yosua 22:31
Enti ɔsɔfo Eleasar ba Finehas ka kyerɛɛ Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manasefo no sɛ: “Ɛnnɛ yɛahu sɛ Awurade wɔ yɛn ntam, efisɛ moanyɛ eyi sɛ mode resɔre atia Awurade. Na moagye Israelfo afi Awurade nsam.”

Yosua 22:32
Afei ɔsɔfo Eleasar ba Finehas ne mpanyimfo no ne Rubenfo ne Gadfo no dii mpaapaemu wɔ Gilead asase so, na wɔsan baa Israelfo a aka no nkyɛn wɔ Kanaan asase so bɛbɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ.

Yosua 22:33
 Na Israelfo no hui sɛ asɛm no tɔ asom; enti Israelfo no hyiraa Onyankopɔn, na wɔanka bio sɛ wɔne Rubenfo ne Gadfo bɛkɔ akɔko asɛe asase a wɔte so no.

Yosua 22:34
Na Rubenfo ne Gadfo no too afɔremuka no din sɛ "adanse", efisɛ “ɛyɛ adanse wɔ yɛn ntam sɛ Awurade ne Nyankopɔn.”

Yosua 22:4
Na afei Awurade mo Nyankopɔn ama mo nuanom ahome, sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ no. Enti monsan nkɔ mo ntamadan mu, asase a Awurade akoa Mose de maa mo wɔ Yordan agya no so. 

Yosua 22:5
Na monhwɛ nni ahyɛde ne mmara a Awurade akoa Mose de maa mo no so; monnɔ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn, na momfa n’akwan so nni n’ahyɛde so, na momfa mo ho mfam ne ho, na momfa mo koma nyinaa ne mo kra nyinaa nsom no.”

Yosua 22:6
Enti Yosua hyiraa wɔn na ogyaa wɔn kwan na wɔkɔɔ wɔn ntamadan mu. 

Yosua 22:7
 Na Mose de Basan maa Manase abusuakuw fa no, na Yosua nso maa abusuakuw no fa a aka no ne wɔn nuanom nyinaa agyapade wɔ Yordan atɔe fam. Bere a Yosua regya wɔn kwan akɔ wɔn ntamadan mu no, ohyiraa wɔn nso. 

Yosua 22:8
Na ɔtoaa so ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Momfa ahonyade ne nyɛmmoa ne dwetɛ ne sika ne kɔbere ne nnade ne ntade bebree nkɔ. Na mo ne mo nuanom nkyɛ asade a munya fii mo atamfo hɔ no.”

Yosua 22:9
Enti Rubenfo ne Gadfo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no ne Israelfo a aka no dii mpaapaemu, na wofii Shilo a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase so no de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Gilead asase so, agyapade a Awurade nam Mose so de maa wɔn sɛ wɔntena so no. 

Yosua 23:1
Bere a Awurade maa Israelfo no home fii wɔn atamfo a wɔatwa wɔn ho ahyia nyinaa nsam akyi nna pii a Yosua mfe akɔ anim na wabɔ akora no, 

Yosua 23:10
Mo mu biako pɛ bɛpam nnipa apem, efisɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔko ma mo sɛnea wahyɛ mo bɔ no. 

Yosua 23:11
 Enti monhwɛ mo ho yiye paa na monnɔ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn.

Yosua 23:12
“Na sɛ mosan mo akyi de mo ho kɔfam aman a aka a mo ne wɔn te yi ho, na mo ne wɔn di ayeware anaa mo ne wɔn di nhwebom a, 

Yosua 23:13
ɛnde monhyɛ no nsow sɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn renkɔ so mpam aman yi mfi mo anim. Na mmom wɔbɛdan afiri ama mo na wɔabɛyɛ mpire wɔ mo akyi ne nsɔe wɔ mo aniwa mu akosi sɛ mo ase bɛtɔre afi asase pa a Awurade mo Nyankopɔn de ama mo yi so.

Yosua 23:14
“Ɛnnɛ merekɔ asase sofo nyinaa kwan, na munim mo koma nyinaa mu ne mo kra nyinaa mu sɛ nsɛmpa a Awurade mo Nyankopɔn kae wɔ mo ho no nyinaa aba mu, emu biako mpo ntɔɔ fam. 

Yosua 23:15
Na munhu sɛ sɛnea asɛmpa a Awurade mo Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ mo no nyinaa aba mu no, saa ara na Awurade de nnome no nyinaa bɛba mo so akosi sɛ ɔbɛtɔre mo ase afi asase pa a Awurade mo Nyankopɔn de ama mo yi so, 

Yosua 23:16
 sɛ mofom Awurade mo Nyankopɔn apam a ɔde ama mo no so, na mokɔsom anyame foforo na mkɔkotow sɔre wɔn a, ɛnde Awurade abufuw bɛdɛw ahyɛ mo, na ɛrenni da bi na mo ase ahyew koraa afi asase pa a ɔde ama mo yi so.”

Yosua 23:2
Yosua frɛɛ Israelfo nyinaa, mpanyimfo ne ahwɛfo ne atemmufo ne atitiriw, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Me de, me mfe akɔ anim na mabɔ akora. 

Yosua 23:3
Na moahu nea mo nti Awurade mo Nyankopɔn de yɛɛ aman yi nyinaa; Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔko maa mo. 

Yosua 23:4
Monhwɛ, mebɔɔ ntonto kyɛɛ aman a aka yi ne wɔn a mituu wɔn ase no nyinaa nsase ama mo mmusua no sɛ agyapade, fi Yordan de kosi Po Kɛse no ho wɔ atɔe fam. 

Yosua 23:5
 Na Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔbɛpam wɔn afi mo anim, na obɛgye wɔn nsase ama mo atena so, sɛnea Awurade mo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ mo bɔ no.

Yosua 23:6
“Enti momma mo bo nyɛ duru na monhwɛ sɛ mubedi nea wɔakyerɛw wɔ Mose mmara nhoma no mu nyinaa so, na moamman ankɔ nifa anaa benkum. 

Yosua 23:7
Na mommfa mo ho mmmɔ aman a aka wɔ mo nkyɛn yi ho. Mommmɔ wɔn anyame din, mommfa wɔn din nnka ntam, monnsom wɔn na monnkotow wɔn. 

Yosua 23:8
 Na mmom Awurade mo Nyankopɔn ho na momfa mo ho mfam, sɛnea moayɛ de abesi nnɛ yi. 

Yosua 23:9
 Na Awurade nso apam aman akɛse a wɔn ho yɛ den afi mo anim. Mo de, ɛde besi nnɛ, obiara ntumi nnyinaa mo anim.

Yosua 24:1
Afei Yosua maa Israel mmusua no nyinaa behyiae wɔ Sekem, na ɔfrɛɛ Israel mpanyimfo ne ahwɛfo ne atemmufo ne atitiriw nyinaa begyinaa Nyankopɔn anim. 

Yosua 24:10
Nanso mampɛ sɛ metie Balaam. Na nhyira ara na ohyiraa mo. Enti migyee mo fii ne nsam.

Yosua 24:11
“‘Ɛnna mutwaa Yordan beduu Yeriko, na Yerikofo ne Amorifo ne Perisifo ne Kanaanfo ne Hitifo ne Girgasifo ne Hiwifo ne Yebusifo fii ase ne mo koe; nanso mede wɔn hyɛɛ mo nsa. 

Yosua 24:12
Na mesomaa nkotokurodu dii mo anim, na wɔpam Amorifo ahene baanu no, ɛnyɛ mo ntrante so na ɛnyɛ mo tadua so. 

Yosua 24:13
Na memaa mo asase a moammrɛ ho, na munyaa nkurow a ɛnyɛ mo na mokyekyee tenaa mu. Bobenturo ne ngo nnua a mudidi so yi nso, ɛnyɛ mo na muduae.’

Yosua 24:14
“Enti afei munsuro Awurade na monsom no emudi ne nokoware mu. Na montow anyame a mo agyanom som wɔn wɔ asubɔnten kɛse no agya ne Egypt no ngu, na monsom Awurade. 

Yosua 24:15
Na sɛ ɛyɛ bɔne wɔ mo ani so sɛ mobɛsom Awurade a, ɛnde ɛnnɛ mompaw nea mobɛsom no, sɛ anyame a mo agyanom a na wɔwɔ asubɔnten kɛse no agya no som wɔn no oo, sɛ Amorifo a mote wɔn asase so no anyame oo, mompaw nea mobɛsom no. Na me ne me fie de, yɛbɛsom Awurade.”

Yosua 24:16
Ɛnna ɔman no buae sɛ: “Ɛmpare yɛn sɛ yebegyaw Awurade hɔ akɔsom anyame foforo. 

Yosua 24:17
 Efisɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn na oyii yɛne yɛn agyanom fii Egypt nkoafie, ɔno na ɔyɛɛ anwonwade akɛse yi wɔ yɛn ani so, ɔno na ɔbɔɔ yɛn ho ban wɔ yɛn akwantu mu, na ɔno na ɔhwɛɛ yɛn so faa aman horow no nyinaa mu. 

Yosua 24:18
Na Awurade pam aman no nyinaa fii yɛn anim, Amorifo a wɔte asase no so no. Enti yɛn nso yɛbɛsom Awurade, efisɛ ɔno ne yɛn Nyankopɔn.”

Yosua 24:19
Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Morentumi nsom Awurade, efisɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn kronkron. Na ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn ninkufo a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔne obi bɛkyɛ ne som. Sɛ motew atua yɛ bɔne a, ɔremfa nkyɛ mo. 

Yosua 24:2
Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ: “Sɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade se ni, ‘Tete no na mo agyanom te asubɔnten kɛse no agya nohoa; ɛhɔ na na Abraham ne Nahor agya Tera te, na saa bere no, na wɔsom anyame foforo.

Yosua 24:20
Na sɛ mugyaw Awurade hɔ kɔsom ananafo anyame a, ɔno nso bɛdan ne ho ne mo adi no nwenweenwene na watɔre mo ase, bere a wayɛ mo papa akyi no.”

Yosua 24:21
Ɛnna nkurɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Dabi, Awurade ara na yɛbɛsom no!” 

Yosua 24:22
Afei Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Mo ankasa mo anom na moapaw sɛ mobɛsom Awurade; mo ara moyɛ adansefo.” Na wobuae sɛ: “Yɛyɛ adansefo.”

Yosua 24:23
“Ɛnde montow ananafo anyame a ɛwɔ mo nkyɛn no ngu, na monnan mo koma mmra Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade nkyɛn.” 

Yosua 24:24
Na ɔman no ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn na yɛbɛsom no, na ɔno na yebetie no!”

Yosua 24:25
Saa da no Yosua ne ɔman no yɛɛ apam, na ɔmaa wɔn ahyɛde ne atemmude wɔ Sekem. 

Yosua 24:26
Afei Yosua kyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Onyankopɔn mmara nhoma no mu, na ɔde ɔbo kɛse bi sii hɔ wɔ odupɔn a esi Awurade kronkronbea ho no ase.

Yosua 24:27
Na Yosua toaa so ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Monhwɛ, ɔbo yi bɛyɛ yɛn dansefo, efisɛ ate nea Awurade aka akyerɛ yɛn nyinaa. Enti ɔbo yi bɛyɛ ɔdansefo na moampa mo Nyankopɔn akyi.” 

Yosua 24:28
Enti Yosua gyaa ɔman no kwan ma obiara kɔɔ n’agyapade so.

Yosua 24:29110
Nsɛm yi nyinaa akyi no, Awurade akoa Yosua, Nun ba no, wui bere a na wadi mfe ɔha ne du (). 

Yosua 24:3
“‘Akyiri yi mefaa mo nana Abraham fii asubɔnten kɛse no agya, na mema okyin Kanaan asase nyinaa so, na memaa n’asefo dɔe. Na mede Isak maa no. 

Yosua 24:30
Na wosiee no n’asase so wɔ Timnat-Sera a ɛwɔ Efraim bepɔw so wɔ Bepɔw Gaas atifi fam.

Yosua 24:31
Na Israelfo kɔɔ so som Awurade wɔ Yosua ne mpanyimfo a wɔtenaa ase wɔ Yosua akyi nyinaa bere so, mpanyimfo a wohuu nnwuma a Awurade yɛ maa Israel no nyinaa.

Yosua 24:32
Afei wosiee Yosef nnompe a Israelfo de fi Egypt bae no wɔ Sekem, asase a Yakob tɔ fii Sekem papa Hamor mma nkyɛn nnwetɛbona ɔha no so, na ɛbɛyɛɛ Yosef mma agyapade.

Yosua 24:33
 Na Aaron ba Eleasar nso wui, na wosiee no wɔ ne ba Finehas Koko so, asase a ɔde maa no wɔ Efraim bepɔw so no so.

Yosua 24:4
 Na memaa Isak nso nyaa Yakob ne Esau. Akyiri yi mede Bepɔw Seir maa Esau tenaa so; na Yakob ne ne mma nso kɔɔ Egypt. 

Yosua 24:5
Afei mesomaa Mose ne Aaron, na mede ɔhaw baa Egypt so; na ɛno akyi no miyii mo fii hɔ. 

Yosua 24:6
 Na bere a miyii mo agyanom fii Egypt beduu po no ho no, Egyptfo de nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔsotefo tiw mo agyanom baa Po Kɔkɔɔ no ho. 

Yosua 24:7
Na wosu frɛɛ Awurade, enti ɔmaa esum kabii bɛdaa mo ne Egyptfo no ntam, na ɔmaa po no bu faa wɔn so kataa wɔn so. Mode mo ani huu nea meyɛe wɔ Egypt no, na motenaa sare so nna pii.

Yosua 24:8
“‘Nkakrankakra mede mo beduu Amorifo a wɔte Yordan agya no asase so, na wɔne mo koe. Na mede wɔn hyɛɛ mo nsa sɛ momfa wɔn asase ntena so, na mesɛee wɔn wɔ mo anim. 

Yosua 24:9
Afei Sipor ba Balak a ɔyɛ Moab hene no sɔre baa Israelfo so ne wɔn bɛkoe. Na ɔsoma kɔfrɛɛ Beor ba Balaam sɛ ɔmmɛdome mo. 

Yosua 3:1
Na Yosua sɔree anɔpahema ne Israelfo nyinaa tu fii Sitim kɔɔ Yordan ho; na wɔdaa hɔ maa ade kyee ansa na wɔretwa.

Yosua 3:10
Ɛnna Yosua kae sɛ: “Afei mubehu sɛ Onyankopɔn teasefo no wɔ mo mu, na ɔbɛpam Kanaanfo ne Hitifo ne Hiwifo ne Perisifo ne Girgasifo ne Amorifo ne Yebusifo afi mo anim. 

Yosua 3:11
Hwɛ, asase nyinaa wura no apam adaka di mo anim rekɔ Yordan mu. 

Yosua 3:12
Enti mompaw mmarima dumien mfi Israel mmusuakuw no mu, abusuakuw biara mu ɔbarima biako. 

Yosua 3:13
Na sɛ asɔfo a wɔso asase nyinaa Wura Awurade adaka no de wɔn nan si Yordan nsu no mu ara pɛ a, nsu a efi atifi no betwa na agyina faako na ayɛ ɔtare kɛse.”

Yosua 3:14
Na bere a ɔman no tu fii wɔn ntamadan mu a wɔrekotwa Yordan no, na asɔfo no so apam adaka no di ɔman no anim. 

Yosua 3:15
 Edu awitwa bere a na Yordan yiri fa ne kɔn so nyinaa. Na bere a wɔn a wɔso adaka no duu Yordan nsu no ano na asɔfo a wɔso adaka no de wɔn nan sii nsu no mu ara pɛ, 

Yosua 3:16
 ɛnna nsu a efi atifi reba no nyinaa begyinaa faako. Ɛyɛɛ ɔtare kɛse wɔ akyirikyiri, wɔ Adam, kurow bi a ɛbɛn Saretan. Enti nsu a ɛsen kɔ Araba po, Nkyene Po, no mu no twae koraa ma ɔman no tumi twa kɔɔ Yeriko ntentenso. 

Yosua 3:17
Na asɔfo a wɔso Awurade apam adaka no gyinae wɔ asase kesee so wɔ Yordan mfinimfini pintinn kosii sɛ Israel man no nyinaa faa asase kesee no so twaa Yordan wiei.

Yosua 3:2
Nnansa akyi no ahwɛfoɔ no faa nsraban no mu, 

Yosua 3:3
na wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Sɛ muhu sɛ Lewifo asɔfo no so Awurade mo Nyankopɔn apam adaka no a, mumfi mo atenae na munni akyi. 

Yosua 3:4
Nanso momma kwan bɛyɛ basafa mpem abien nna mo ne no ntam; mommmɛn ho. Ɛno bɛma moahu ɔkwan a mobɛfa so, efisɛ momfaa ɔkwan no so da.”

Yosua 3:5
Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Monyɛ mo ho kronkron, efisɛ ɔkyena Awurade bɛyɛ anwonwade wɔ mo mu.”

Yosua 3:6
Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ asɔfo no sɛ: “Momfa apam adaka no na munni ɔman no anim.” Enti wɔfaa apam adaka no dii ɔman no anim.

Yosua 3:7
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Efi nnɛ rekɔ mɛma wo so wɔ Israelfo nyinaa anim, na wɔahu sɛ sɛnea midii Mose akyi no saa ara na medi w’akyi. 

Yosua 3:8
Na ka kyerɛ asɔfo a wɔso apam adaka no sɛ, ‘Sɛ mudu Yordan nsu no ano ara pɛ a, munnyina Yordan mu.’”

Yosua 3:9
 Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ Israelfo no sɛ: “Mommra mmetie Awurade mo Nyankopɔn asɛm.” 

Yosua 4:1
Afei bere a ɔman no nyinaa twaa Yordan wiei no, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: 

Yosua 4:10
Na asɔfo a wɔso adaka no kɔɔ so gyinaa Yordan mfinimfini kosii sɛ wowiee nea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ ɔman no nyinaa, sɛnea Mose ka kyerɛɛ Yosua no. Na ɔman no yɛɛ ntɛm twae. 

Yosua 4:11
 Na bere a ɔman no nyinaa twae no, Awurade adaka no ne asɔfo no twae wɔ ɔman no anim. 

Yosua 4:12
Na Ruben asefo ne Gad asefo ne Manase abusuakuw fa no de wɔn akode twae wɔ Israelfo no anim, sɛnea Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no. 

Yosua 4:13
 Na asraafo a wɔasiesie wɔn ho ama ɔko bɛyɛ mpem aduanan na wotwa faa Awurade anim kɔɔ Yeriko tataw so.

Yosua 4:14
Saa da no Awurade maa Yosua so wɔ Israelfo nyinaa anim, na wofii ase suroo no sɛnea na wosuro Mose no, ne nkwa nna nyinaa.

Yosua 4:15
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: 

Yosua 4:16
“Ka kyerɛ asɔfo a wɔso adanse adaka no sɛ womfi Yordan mu.” 

Yosua 4:17
Enti Yosua ka kyerɛɛ asɔfo no sɛ: “Mumfi Yordan mu.” 

Yosua 4:18
Afei bere a asɔfo a wɔso Awurade apam adaka no fii Yordan mu bae a wɔn nan kaa asase kesee no ara pɛ na Yordan nsu no san bae, na eyiri faa ne kɔn so nyinaa sɛnea na ɛte kan no.

Yosua 4:19
 Na ɔsram a edi kan no da a ɛto so du na ɔman no fii Yordan mu, na wɔbɛsoɛɛ Gilgal wɔ Yeriko hye so wɔ apuei fam.

Yosua 4:2
“Yi mmarima dumien fi ɔman no mu, abusuakuw biara mu ɔbarima biako, 

Yosua 4:20
 Enti Yosua de abo dumien a wɔfa fii Yordan mu no besisii Gilgal. 

Yosua 4:21
 Na ɔtoaa so ka kyerɛɛ Israelfo no sɛ: “Sɛ da bi mo mma bisa wɔn papanom sɛ, ‘Abo yi nso kyerɛ dɛn?’ a, 

Yosua 4:22
monka nkyerɛ mo mma no sɛ, ‘Israelfo faa asase kesee so na wotwaa Yordan yi. 

Yosua 4:23
Awurade mo Nyankopɔn maa Yordan nsu no yowee kosii sɛ wɔn nyinaa twa kɔɔ n’agya, sɛnea Awurade mo Nyankopɔn maa Po Kɔkɔɔ no yowee wɔ yɛn anim kosii sɛ yetwae no. 

Yosua 4:24
Na ama asase so aman nyinaa ahu sɛ Awurade nsa yɛ den, na mo nso moasuro Awurade mo Nyankopɔn daa.’”

Yosua 4:3
na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Momfa abo dumien mfi Yordan mfinimfini, faako a na asɔfo no nan sisi no, na momfa nkogu baabi a mobɛsoɛ anadwo yi.’”

Yosua 4:4
Enti Yosua frɛɛ Israel mmarima dumien a wɔpaw wɔn no, abusuakuw biara mu ɔbarima biako; 

Yosua 4:5
na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monsen nkodi Awurade mo Nyankopɔn apam adaka no anim nkɔ Yordan mfinimfini, na obiara mfa ɔbo biako nto n’abati, sɛnea Israel mmusua dodow te, 

Yosua 4:6
na eyi nyɛ sɛnkyerɛnne mma mo. Na sɛ da bi mo mma bisa mo sɛ, ‘Mode abo yi reyɛ dɛn?’ a, 

Yosua 4:7
monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Bere a wɔde Awurade apam adaka no kɔfaa Yordan nsu no mu no, nsu no twae wɔ adaka no anim, na abo yi bɛyɛ nkae ama Israelfo daa.’”

Yosua 4:8
Enti Israelfo no yɛɛ nea Yosua kae no pɛpɛɛpɛ, na wɔtasee abo dumien fii Yordan mfinimfini, sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua no. Abo no dodow ne Israel mmusua no dodow yɛ pɛ, na wɔde kaa wɔn ho koguu wɔn asoɛe.

Yosua 4:9
Na Yosua de abo dumien no guu Yordan mfinimfini, baabi a na asɔfo a wɔso apam adaka no nan sisi no, na ɛwɔ hɔ de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 5:1
Afei bere a Amorifo ahene a wɔwɔ Yordan agya wɔ atɔe fam, ne Kanaanfo ahene a wɔtete po ho no nyinaa tee sɛ Awurade maa Yordan nsu no yowee wɔ Israelfo no anim kosii sɛ wɔn nyinaa twae no, wɔn koma tui, na Israelfo no nti wɔn ho mmoa nyinaa guanee.

Yosua 5:10
 Na Israelfo no kɔɔ so tenaa Gilgal, na ɔsram no da a ɛto so dunan anwummere no, wodii twam no wɔ Yeriko tataw no so. 

Yosua 5:11
 Na bere a wodii twam no akyi na ade kyee, saa da no wofii ase dii asase no so nnɔbae, paanoo a mmɔkaw nnim ne nkyewe. 

Yosua 5:12
Na efi da a wodii asase no so nnɔbae no bi no, mana no to twae, na Israelfo annya mana bio. Saa afe no, wofii ase dii Kanaan asase no so nnɔbae no bi.

Yosua 5:13
 Na bere bi na Yosua wɔ Yeriko mpɔtam hɔ baabi, afei ɔbɛma n’ani so a, ɔbarima bi na watwe nkrante gyina n’anim yi! Ɛnna Yosua twiw bɛn no bisaa no sɛ: “Hena afa na wowɔ, yɛn anaa yɛn atamfo?” 

Yosua 5:14
 Na ɔbarima no buae sɛ: “Ɛnte saa, mmom maba sɛ Awurade dɔm so safohene.” Ɛnna Yosua de n’anim butuw fam bisaa no sɛ: “Asɛm bɛn na me wura wɔ ma n’akoa?” 

Yosua 5:15
Na Awurade safohene no ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Yi wo nan ase mpaboa, efisɛ baabi a wugyina no yɛ kronkron.” Ntɛm ara na Yosua yɛɛ saa.

Yosua 5:2
Saa bere no ara Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Fa abo a ano yɛ nnam yɛ asekan na twitwa Israelfo no twetia, nea ɛto so abien.” 

Yosua 5:3
Enti Yosua de abo yɛɛ asekan twaa Israelfo no twetia wɔ Gibeat-Haaralot koko so. 

Yosua 5:4
Nea enti a Yosua twitwaa wɔn twetia ni: Mmarima a wofi Egypt bae a na wobetumi akɔ ɔko no nyinaa wuwui ɔkwan mu wɔ sare no so bere a wofi Egypt reba no. 

Yosua 5:5
Wɔn a wofi Egypt bae no nyinaa de, na wɔatwa wɔn twetia dedaw, nanso wɔn a wofi Egypt reba a wɔwoo wɔn kwan so wɔ sare so no nyinaa de, na wontwaa wɔn twetia. 

Yosua 5:6
Israelfo no nantew sare no so mfe aduanan kosii sɛ ɔman no mu mmarima a wobetumi akɔ ɔko a wofi Egypt bae a wɔantie Awurade no nyinaa ase hyewee. Wɔn na Awurade kaa wɔn ntam sɛ ɔremma wonhu asase a Awurade kaa wɔn agyanom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma yɛn no, asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen wɔ so no. 

Yosua 5:7
 Enti ɔmaa wɔn mma besii wɔn anan. Eyinom na Yosua twaa wɔn twetia, efisɛ wɔantwa wɔn twetia wɔ kwan so.

Yosua 5:8
Na bere a wotwaa ɔman no nyinaa twetia wiei no, wɔtenaa wɔn asoɛe hɔ kosii sɛ wɔn ho tɔɔ wɔn.

Yosua 5:9
Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Ɛnnɛ mapia Egypt animguase nyinaa afi mo so.” Enti wɔtoo hɔ din Gilgal, na wɔfrɛ hɔ saa de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 6:1
 Na Yeriko de, Israelfo no nti, na wɔato kurow no mu abram ano; obi nkɔ, ɛnna obi mma mu.

Yosua 6:10
Na Yosua aka akyerɛ ɔman no dedaw sɛ: “Monnteɛm na mommma obi nnte mo nne, na mummmue mo ano nnka biribiara kosi sɛ mɛka akyerɛ mo sɛ, ‘Monteɛm!’ ansa na moateɛm.” 

Yosua 6:11
Na ɔmaa wɔde Awurade adaka no twaa kurow no ho hyiae pɛnkoro, na wɔsan kɔɔ wɔn asoɛe kɔdae ma ade kyee.

Yosua 6:12
Afei Yosua sɔree anɔpahema, na asɔfo no soaa Awurade adaka no. 

Yosua 6:13
Ɛnna asɔfo baason a wokurakura nguan mmɛn ason no hyɛn mmɛn no dii Awurade adaka no anim, na asraafo no nso dii wɔn anim. Afei wɔn a wɔbɔ kyidɔm no nso dii Awurade adaka no akyi bere a asɔfo no gu so rehyɛn mmɛn no. 

Yosua 6:14
 Na da a ɛto so abien no nso wɔbɔɔ nsra twa kurow no ho nyinaa hyiae pɛnkoro, na wɔsan kɔɔ wɔn asoɛe. Wɔyɛɛ saa ara nnansia.

Yosua 6:15
Na da a ɛto so ason no, anɔpahema a anim rebaabae no ara na wɔsɔree, na wɔkɔfaa kurow no ho saa ara mpɛn ason. Saa da no nkutoo na wɔbɔɔ nsra twa kurow no ho nyinaa hyiae mpɛn ason. 

Yosua 6:16
 Na eduu nea ɛto so ason so no, asɔfo no hyɛn mmɛn no na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Monteɛm, efisɛ Awurade de kurow no ama mo. 

Yosua 6:17
 Na kurow no nyɛ abusude a ɛsɛ sɛ mosɛe no; ɛno ne biribiara a ɛwom yɛ Awurade dea. Aguaman Rahab ne obiara a ɔka ne ho wɔ ne fie nkutoo na wɔbɛka, efisɛ ɔde nnipa a yɛsomaa wɔn no siei.

Yosua 6:18
Mo nso, montwe mo ho mfi abusude biara ho, na mo kɔn annɔ, na moamfa abusude no bi, na Israel nsraban no annan abusude na ankɔfa ɔhaw biara amma so. 

Yosua 6:19
Na dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ ne nneɛma a wɔde kɔbere ne dade ayɛ nyinaa yɛ Awurade akronkronne. Ɛsɛ sɛ ne nyinaa kɔ Awurade adekorabea.”

Yosua 6:2
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Hwɛ, mede Yeriko ne ne hene ne ne nnɔmmarima ahyɛ wo nsa. 

Yosua 6:20
Enti wɔhyɛn mmɛn no, na ɔman no teɛɛm. Bere a ɔman no tee abɛn no a wɔteɛɛm denneennen no, ɔfasu no dwiriw guu fam. Afei obiara de n’ani kyerɛɛ kurow no mu na wɔfaa kurow no. 

Yosua 6:21
 Na wɔde nkrante faa kurow no mu sɛee biribiara a ɛwɔ hɔ, mmarima ne mmea, mmofra ne mpanyin, anantwi ne nguan ne mfurum.

Yosua 6:22
Ɛnna Yosua ka kyerɛɛ mmarima baanu a wɔkɔhwɛɛ asase no sɛ: “Monkɔ ɔbea aguaman no fie nkɔfa ɔne wɔn a wɔka ne ho nyinaa mmra, sɛnea mokaa no ntam no.” 

Yosua 6:23
Enti mmarima a wɔkɔhwɛɛ kurow no kɔfaa Rahab ne ne papa ne ne maame ne ne nuabarimanom ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn nyinaa, n’abusuafo nyinaa, bae. Na wɔma wɔtenaa Israelfo nsraban no akyi.

Yosua 6:24
Nanso wɔde ogya hyew kurow no ne emu nneɛma nyinaa. Dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ ne nneɛma a wɔde kɔbere ne dade ayɛ nkutoo na wɔde kɔɔ Awurade fie adekorabea. 

Yosua 6:25
Na Yosua koraa aguaman Rahab ne ne papa fiefo ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn nyinaa so, na ɔtenaa Israelfo mu besi nnɛ, efisɛ ɔde nnipa a Yosua somaa wɔn ma wɔkɔhwɛɛ Yeriko no siei.

Yosua 6:26
Ɛnna Yosua kaa ntam saa bere no sɛ: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔbɛkyekye Yeriko kurow yi wɔ Awurade anim. Sɛ ɔto kurow no fapem a, ɔde ne ba panyin nkwa betwa so, na osisi n’apon a, ɔde ne ba kumaa nkwa betwa so.”

Yosua 6:27
Enti Awurade gyinaa Yosua akyi, na ne din trɛwee wɔ asase no nyinaa so.

Yosua 6:3
Enti mmarima akofo no nyinaa mmɔ nsra mfa kurow no ho nyinaa pɛnkoro. Monyɛ saa nnansia. 

Yosua 6:4
 Enti ma asɔfo baason mfa nguan mmɛn ason nni Adaka no anim. Na da a ɛto so ason no mommɔ nsra mfa kurow no ho nyinaa nhyia mpɛn ason, na asɔfo no nhyɛn ntorobɛnto no. 

Yosua 6:5
 Na sɛ wɔhyɛn abɛn no na mote abɛn no nnyigyei a, ɔman no nyinaa nteɛm denneennen; na kurow no fasu nyinaa bedwiriw agu. Ɛba saa a, obiara nkɔ n’anim tee.”

Yosua 6:6
Enti Nun ba Yosua frɛɛ asɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Momfa apam adaka no, na asɔfo baason mfa nguan mmɛn ason nni Awurade adaka no anim.” 

Yosua 6:7
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: “Monsen nkɔbɔ nsra ntwa kurow no ho nhyia, na asraafo no nni Awurade adaka no anim.” 

Yosua 6:8
Enti ɔman no yɛɛ nea Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no pɛpɛɛpɛ; na asɔfo baason a wokurakura nguan mmɛn ason wɔ Awurade anim no bedii anim hyɛn mmɛn no, na Awurade apam adaka no dii wɔn akyi.

Yosua 6:9
Na asraafo no di asɔfo a wɔrehyɛn mmɛn no anim, na wɔn a wɔbɔ kyidɔm no nso dii Adaka no akyi bere a asɔfo no gu so rehyɛn mmɛn no.

Yosua 7:1
 Na bere a wɔkae sɛ Israelfo nsɛe abusude biara no, wɔanni nokware, efisɛ Sera a ofi Yuda abusuakuw mu no ba Sabdi ba Karmi ba Akan faa nneɛma a wɔkae sɛ wɔnsɛe no no bi. Na Awurade bo fuw Israelfo no denneennen.

Yosua 7:10
Ɛnna Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Sɔre! Dɛn nti na wode w’anim abutuw fam? 

Yosua 7:11
Israel ayɛ bɔne, na wɔabu m’apam a mehyɛɛ maa wɔn no so. Na wɔafa abusude a mekae sɛ wɔnsɛe no no bi, wɔawia bi, wɔakata so, na wɔde akɔka wɔn nneɛma ho. 

Yosua 7:12
Ɛnno nti Israelfo rentumi nnyina wɔn atamfo anim. Wɔn akyi na wɔbɛdan akyerɛ wɔn atamfo, efisɛ wɔadan abusude. Enti sɛ moanyi abusude yi amfi mo mfinimfini ansɛe no a, merenni mo akyi. 

Yosua 7:13
Sɔre! Tew ɔman no ho na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ, ‘Montew mo ho ɔkyena, na sɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade se ni: “O Israel, abusude bi wɔ wo mfinimfini. Sɛ moanyi abusude yi amfi mo mu a, morentumi nnyina mo atamfo anim. 

Yosua 7:14
Na ɔkyena anɔpa mmusuakuw mmusuakuw a ɛwɔ Israel nyinaa mmra mmiako mmiako, na abusuakuw a Awurade beyi no, emu mmusua nso mmra mmiako mmiako. Afei abusua a Awurade beyi no mu afie mmra mmiako mmiako. Na ofie a Awurade beyi no mu mmarima nso mmra mmiako mmiako. 

Yosua 7:15
Na nea obeyi no sɛ ɔno na abusude no wɔ ne nkyɛn no, wɔmfa ogya nhyew ɔne nea ɔwɔ nyinaa, efisɛ wabu Awurade apam so ayɛ aniwude wɔ Israel.”’”

Yosua 7:16
Enti Yosua sɔree anɔpahema frɛɛ mmusuakuw a ɛwɔ Israel nyinaa bae mmiako mmiako, na woyii Yuda abusuakuw no. 

Yosua 7:17
Afei ɔmaa Yuda abusuakuw no mu mmusua nyinaa bae mmiako mmiako, na woyii Sera abusua no. Na ɔmaa Sera abusua no mu mmarima bae mmiako mmiako, na woyii Sabdi. 

Yosua 7:18
Awiei koraa no ɔmaa ne fie mmarima bae mmiako mmiako, na Sera a ofi Yuda abusuakuw mu no ba Sabdi ba Karmi ba Akan na woyii no. 

Yosua 7:19
Afei Yosua ka kyerɛɛ Akan sɛ: “Me ba, hyɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade anuonyam na ka wo bɔne kyerɛ no. Dɛn na woyɛe? Ka kyerɛ me, mfa hwee nsie.”

Yosua 7:2
Afei Yosua somaa mmarima fii Yeriko sɛ wɔnkɔ Ai a ɛbɛn Bet-Awen wɔ Betel apuei fam, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Munwia mo ho nkɔhwɛ sɛnea asase no te.” Enti mmarima no kɔhwɛe sɛnea Ai te. 

Yosua 7:20
Ɛnna Akan buaa Yosua sɛ: “Nokwasɛm ni, mayɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Awurade bɔne, na nea meyɛe ni: 

Yosua 7:21
Mihuu atade fɛfɛ bi a efi Sinar ne dwetɛ nnwetɛbona ahanu ne sika kɔkɔɔ a emu duru yɛ nnwetɛbona aduonum wɔ asade no mu, na na m’ani gye ho enti mefae. Na mede asie fam wɔ me ntamadan mu na sika no hyɛ ase.”

Yosua 7:22
Ɛnna Yosua somaa nnipa ntɛm kɔɔ ntamadan no mu, na ampa ara na ɔde sika no ahyɛ nneɛma no ase de asie ne ntamadan mu. 

Yosua 7:23
Enti woyi fii ntamadan no mu de brɛɛ Yosua ne Israelfo no nyinaa, na wɔde beguu Awurade anim. 

Yosua 7:24
Afei Yosua ne Israelfo nyinaa de Sera ba Akan ne dwetɛ ne atade ne sika kɔkɔɔ no ne ne mmabarima ne ne mmabea ne ne nantwi ne n’afurum ne ne nguan ne ne ntamadan ne biribiara a ɔwɔ baa Akor bon mu. 

Yosua 7:25
Na Yosua kae sɛ: “Dɛn nti na wode mmusu aba yɛn so yi? Awurade nso de mmusu bɛba wo so nnɛ.” Ɔkaa saa no, Israelfo nyinaa siw no abo, na akyiri yi wɔde ogya hyew wɔn. Enti wosiw wɔn abo. 

Yosua 7:26
Na wɔsoaa abo guu no so ma ɛbɛyɛɛ siw kɛse, na ɛwɔ hɔ de besi nnɛ. Afei Awurade bo dwoe. Enti wɔtoo hɔ din Akor Bon, na wɔfrɛ hɔ saa de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 7:3
 Na wɔbae no, wɔka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Enhia sɛ woma ɔman yi nyinaa foro kɔ hɔ. Ma mmarima bɛyɛ mpem abien anaa mpem abiɛsa pɛ nkɔ Ai so. Nhaw ɔman no nyinaa sɛ wɔnkɔ hɔ, efisɛ wosua.”

Yosua 7:43000
Enti mmarima bɛyɛ mpem abiɛsa (,) kɔɔ hɔ, nanso woguan fii Ai mmarima no anim. 

Yosua 7:5
Na Ai mmarima no kunkum wɔn mu bɛyɛ aduasa asia, na wɔtaa wɔn fii kurow no ano kosii Sebarim, na bere a wɔresian nyinaa na wɔrekunkum wɔn. Eyi maa nnipa no koma nanee na ɛyɛe sɛ nsu.

Yosua 7:6
 Enti Yosua huu nea asi no, osunsuanee ne ntade mu na ɔde n’anim butuw fam wɔ Awurade adaka no anim kosii anwummere, ɔne Israel mpanyimfo no, na wɔde dɔte guu wɔn tirim. 

Yosua 7:7
Na Yosua kae sɛ: “Ao Awurade Nyankopɔn, dɛn nti na wode ɔman yi atwa Yordan aba ha sɛ wode yɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifo nsa na wɔasɛe yɛn? Eyi de, sɛ yɛtenaa yɛn baabi wɔ Yordan agya nohoa a, anka eye. 

Yosua 7:8
Ao Awurade, Israel na adan n’akyi akyerɛ n’atamfo yi, dɛn bio na metumi aka? 

Yosua 7:9
 Kanaanfo ne asase no so nnipa nyinaa bɛte, na wɔbɛba abetwa yɛn ho ahyia, na wɔatwa yɛn din afi asase so. Dɛn na wobɛyɛ de agye wo din kɛse yi?”

Yosua 8:1
Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Nsuro na mmɔ hu. Fa asraafo no nyinaa ka wo ho na monkɔ Ai, na mede Ai hene ne ne man ne ne kurow ne n’asase ahyɛ wo nsa. 

Yosua 8:10
Na Yosua sɔree anɔpahema boaboaa ɔman no ano, na ɔne Israel mpanyimfo dii wɔn anim foro kɔɔ Ai. 

Yosua 8:11
Afei asraafo a wɔka ne ho no foro kɔɔ kurow no anim kɔsoɛɛ Ai atifi fam, na na obon da wɔne Ai ntam. 

Yosua 8:12
 Enti Yosua yii mmarima bɛyɛ mpemnum sɛ wɔnkɔtɛw Betel ne Ai ntam, wɔ kurow no atɔe fam. 

Yosua 8:13
Na asraafo no mu fa kɛse kɔsoɛɛ kurow no atifi fam, na ebinom nso kɔtɛw atɔe fam, na Yosua kɔɔ obon no mu anadwo no.

Yosua 8:14
Bere a Ai hene huu saa no, ɔne ne man nyinaa, kurow no mu mmarima, sɔree ntɛm sɛ wɔne Israelfo no rekɔko wɔ tataw no so wɔ bere a wɔahyɛ mu. Nanso na onnim sɛ ebinom akɔtɛw kurow no akyi. 

Yosua 8:15
 Na Yosua ne Israelfo no nyinaa yɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ nea wɔadi nkogu, na woguan de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ sare no so. 

Yosua 8:16
Ɛnna wɔteɛɛm frɛɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ Ai kurow no mu nyinaa ma wotiw wɔn; enti wofii kurow no mu betiw Yosua.

Yosua 8:17
 Na ɔbarima biara anka Ai ne Betel a wankodi Israelfo no akyi. Enti wogyaw kurow no ano too hɔ hahraa kotiw Israelfo no.

Yosua 8:18
Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: “Teɛ peaw a wukura no kyerɛ Ai so, efisɛ mede bɛhyɛ wo nsa.” Enti Yosua teɛɛ peaw a okura no kyerɛɛ kurow no so. 

Yosua 8:19
 Na bere a ɔteɛɛ ne nsa no ara na wɔn a wɔakɔtɛw kurow no akyi no de mmirika bɔ wuraa kurow no mu. Na ntɛm ara na wɔde ogya too kurow no mu.

Yosua 8:2
 Na yɛ Ai ne ne hene sɛnea woyɛɛ Yeriko ne ne hene no. Nanso kurow yi mu mmoa ne asade a aka de, momfa. Ma nnipa bi nkɔtɛw kurow no akyi baabi.”

Yosua 8:20
Na bere a Ai mmarima no dan wɔn ani hwɛɛ wɔn akyi no, wohui sɛ wusiw fi kurow no mu ayɛ wim kumɔnn, na na wontumi nguan nkɔ benkum anaa nifa. Afei wɔn a wɔreguan kɔ sare so no dan baa wɔn ataafo no so. 

Yosua 8:21
Enti bere a Yosua ne Israelfo no nyinaa hui sɛ wɔn a wɔkɔtɛwee no akɔfa kurow no na kurow no mu wusiw ayɛ wim kumɔnn no, wɔsan wɔn akyi bɛtow hyɛɛ Ai mmarima no so kunkum wɔn. 

Yosua 8:22
Na wɔn a wɔwɔ kurow no mu no nso behyiaa wɔn. Enti na Israelfo no fa wɔ wɔn anim ne wɔn akyi, na wɔkaa wɔn hyɛɛ mfinimfini kunkum wɔn nyinaa. Onipa biako mpo anka, na obiara nso antumi anguan. 

Yosua 8:23
 Nanso Ai hene de, wɔkyeree no animono brɛɛ Yosua.

Yosua 8:24
Bere a Israelfo kunkum Aifo a wodii wɔn akyi kɔɔ sare so na wɔn nyinaa totɔɔ nkrante ano ma wɔsae no, Israelfo nyinaa san kɔɔ Ai twee nkrante too kurow no so kokunkum wɔn. 

Yosua 8:2512000
Na da no, mmarima ne mmea a wowuwui nyinaa yɛ mpem dumien (,), Aifo nyinaa. 

Yosua 8:26
Na Yosua amfa ne nsa a ɔde teɛɛ peaw no anto hɔ kosii sɛ ɔsɛee Aifo nyinaa pasaa. 

Yosua 8:27
Kurow no mu mmoa ne asade foforo a aka na Israelfo fae, sɛnea ahyɛde a Awurade de maa Yosua no te.

Yosua 8:28
Enti Yosua hyew Ai dwerɛbee ma ɛdanee daa amamfo siw de besi nnɛ. 

Yosua 8:29
Na ɔsɛn Ai hene no wɔ dua so kosii anwummere, na bere a owia kɔtɔe no, Yosua ma woyii ne funu fii dua no so kɔtoo kurow no pon ano, na wɔsoaa abo pii guu no so ma ɛyɛɛ siw kɛse a ɛwɔ hɔ de besi nnɛ.

Yosua 8:3
Enti Yosua ne asraafo no nyinaa sɔre de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Ai, na Yosua paw mmarima akokodurufo mpem aduasa, na ogyaa wɔn kwan anadwo no. 

Yosua 8:30
Na Yosua sii afɔremuka wɔ Bepɔw Ebal so maa Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, 

Yosua 8:31
sɛnea Awurade akoa Mose ka kyerɛɛ Israelfo a wɔakyerɛw ho asɛm wɔ Mose mmara nhoma mu no sɛ: “Abo amuamu a dade nkae na momfa nsi afɔremuka no.” Na wɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre wɔ so maa Awurade.

Yosua 8:32
Na ɔkyerɛw mmara a Mose kyerɛw wɔ Israelfo anim no ntimu guu abo no so. 

Yosua 8:33
Afei Israelfo nyinaa ne ɔman no mu mpanyimfo ne atitiriw ne atemmufo, ahɔho ne kuromma nyinaa begyinagyinaa Lewifo asɔfo a wɔso Awurade apam adaka no anim, wɔ Adaka no benkum ne nifa so. Na nnipa no fa gyinaa Bepɔw Gerisim anim na fa nso gyinaa Bepɔw Ebal anim ma wodii kan hyiraa Israelfo, sɛnea Awurade akoa Mose hyɛɛ wɔn no.

Yosua 8:34
Ɛno akyi no, ɔkenkan mmara no mu nsɛm nyinaa, nhyira ne nnome, sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ mmara nhoma no mu no. 

Yosua 8:35
Yosua annyaw asɛm a Mose kae no mu biako mpo a wankenkan ankyerɛ Israel asafo no nyinaa ne mmea ne mmofra nkumaa ne ahɔho a wɔwɔ wɔn mu nyinaa anim.

Yosua 8:4
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Monkɔtɛw kurow no akyi. Monhwɛ na mo ne kurow no ntam antwe pii, na obiara nyɛ krado. 

Yosua 8:5
Me nso me ne nnipa a aka no nyinaa betwiw abɛn kurow no. Na sɛ ɛba sɛ wopue behyia yɛn sɛnea wɔyɛɛ kan no a, yebeguan afi wɔn anim. 

Yosua 8:6
Ɛba saa a wobefi adi atiw yɛn akosi sɛ yɛbɛtwe wɔn afi kurow no mu, na wɔbɛka sɛ, ‘Wɔreguan sɛnea wɔyɛe kan no.’ Na yɛn nso yebeguan afi wɔn anim. 

Yosua 8:7
Afei mubefi faako a mokɔtɛwee no abɔ awura kurow no mu; na Awurade mo Nyankopɔn de bɛhyɛ mo nsa. 

Yosua 8:8
Na sɛ mofa kurow no a, momfa ogya ntom, na monyɛ sɛnea Awurade aka no ara. Eyi ne akwankyerɛ a mepɛ sɛ mudi so.”

Yosua 8:9
Ɛnna Yosua gyaa wɔn kwan ma wɔkɔtɛw Betel ne Ai ntam wɔ Ai atɔe fam. Na Yosua daa nnipa a aka no nkyɛn anadwo no.

Yosua 9:1
Ɛbae sɛ bere a ahene a wɔwɔ Yordan agya wɔ bepɔw so ne Sefela ne Po Kɛse no ano wɔ Lebanon anim, Hitifo, Amorifo, Kanaanfo, Perisifo, Hiwifo ne Yebusifo tee nea asi no, 

Yosua 9:10
ne nea ɔde yɛɛ Amorifo ahene a na wɔtete Yordan agya nohoa no, Hesbon hene Sihon ne Basan hene Og a na ɔte Astarot no. 

Yosua 9:11
Enti yɛn mpanyimfo ne ɔmanfo no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ, ‘Momfa akwansoduan na munkohyia wɔn nka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: “Yɛyɛ mo nkoa. Enti mo ne yɛn nyɛ apam.’” 

Yosua 9:12
Monhwɛ yɛn paanoo yi; da a yɛresim aba mo nkyɛn a yɛfa fii yɛn afie sɛ akwansoduan no, na ɛyɛ hyew, nanso seesei akyenkyen na efurofurow. 

Yosua 9:13
Na nsa nkotoku yi nso, na ɛyɛ foforo koraa, nanso monhwɛ sɛ atetew. Na kwan no tenten nti, yɛn ntade ne yɛn mpaboa nso atetew.”

Yosua 9:14
Ɛnna Israel mmarima no faa akwansoduan no bi ka hwɛe, na Awurade anom asɛm wɔammisa . 

Yosua 9:15
 Enti Yosua ne wɔn dii no asomdwoe so na ɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam sɛnea wobenya wɔn ti adidi mu. Enti asafo no mu mpanyimfo no kekaa wɔn ntam.

Yosua 9:16
 Na wɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam no wiei no, nnansa akyi na wɔtee sɛ nkurɔfo no te bɛn wɔn wɔ wɔn mpɔtam hɔ ara. 

Yosua 9:17
Afei Israelfo no tui, na da a ɛto so abiɛsa no, wokoduu wɔn nkurow mu. Nkurow no ne Gibeon ne Kefira ne Beerot ne Kiriat-Yearim. 

Yosua 9:18
Na Israelfo no amfa wɔn nsa anka wɔn, efisɛ na asafo no mu mpanyimfo de Israel Awurade Nyankopɔn din aka wɔn ntam. Afei asafo no nyinaa fii ase nwiinwii hyɛɛ mpanyimfo no. 

Yosua 9:19
